T'nash-veh sa-mekh's skan ahm hasu pirrip, heh t'nash-veh christian ahm philip, t'nash-veh kan-bu lahv kupi tor t' fi' ahm nothing longer il weht explicit do pip. Ni, i puvutau myself pip, heh sarlah tor nam-tor puvutau pip. I mazhiv-kur-tor pirrip u' t'nash-veh sa-mekh's skan ahm, fi' wuh ek'te'kru t' ish-veh tombstone heh t'nash-veh ko-kai, mrs. Joe gargery, vi telik wuh shek-zhuksu. U' i worla gla-tor t'nash-veh sa-mekh il t'nash-veh ko-mekh, heh worla gla-tor sovek likeness t' either t' au (na' ish-veh gad vesh' wu fa' wuh gad t' ha'gel-bikuv), t'nash-veh wuh'rak fancies fundauik ra au vesh' spo' vesh' unreasonably derived s' ish-veh tombstones. Wuh shid t' wuh nuhm fi' t'nash-veh sa-mekh's, mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh shaik idea ik au vesh' wuh keh-vla, stout, gu'gelik sasu, k' curly nesh-kur isachya. S' wuh character heh da-tor t' wuh inscription, "isha georgiana ko-telsu t' wuh abru', " i drew wuh childish conclusion ik t'nash-veh ko-mekh vesh' freckled heh sickly. Tor kaukuh pi' kov lozenges, tik pa' wuh ash'ya heh wuh ulef wu, if vesh' arranged svi' wuh pu zehl be' ish-veh shi'vukhut, heh vesh' sacred tor wuh vokaya t' kaukuh pi' sa-kai t' t'nash-veh, vi mazhiv-kur-tor abru trying tor prah wuh living, exceedingly lehkuh-mal svi' ik universal struggle, i am indebted na' wuh dva i religiously entertained ik au had ek' vesh' pukeshta fi' ish-veh pla'dor k' ish-veh el'ru svi' ish-veh malanu-abru'lik, heh had worla taken au si' svi' nash fupa s' t' nam. Ours vesh' wuh masu-kastra shasol, ne' k' wuh pilash, k'svi, u' wuh pilash skek, dah-leh miles t' wuh masutra. T'nash-veh wuh'rak danik vivid heh sax'ksei impression t' wuh sha'es t' vel seems tor me ki' vesh' nazh-tor fi' wuh memorable raw aru na' khru. Na' such wuh wak i afer-tor si' na' ac'ruth ik nash bleak shi overgrown k' nettles vesh' wuh churchyard; heh ik philip pirrip, tab-ma t' nash parish, heh isha georgiana ko-telsu t' wuh abru', vesh' tevik heh visolektau; heh ik alexander, bartholomew, abraham, tobias, heh roger, kan-bu kanu t' wuh aforesaid, vesh' isha tevik heh visolektau; heh ik wuh gu'gelik pa'ash shi'kwai mesakh wuh churchyard, tvimesau k' pamashok heh mounds heh temep, k' scattered cattle feeding fi' ish-veh, vesh' wuh masu-kastra; heh ik wuh neik leaden zehl mesakh vesh' wuh pilash; heh ik wuh irak savage lair s' if wuh salan vesh' rushing vesh' wuh masutra; heh ik wuh pi' uzh'a'lek t' shivers growing kwes t' ish-veh ek' heh palikaya tor maf, vesh' pip. "meskaraya ish-veh ralash!" maf-tor wuh terrible spes, u' wuh sasu palikau abru s' among wuh shi'vukhut na' wuh vla t' wuh church porch. "potau fam dvun, du pi' e'shua, il i'll tresahk ish-veh drahk!" wuh pthak-bosh sasu, ek' svi' dirik zhai-kur, k' wuh lo'uk shek-tukh fi' ish-veh mal. Wuh sasu k' rai taik, heh k' pushau ash'el, heh k' wuh hinek a'cit tied pauk ish-veh patam. Wuh sasu vi had vesh' soaked svi' masu, heh smothered svi' vral, heh lamed k' kov, heh tresahk k' flints, heh rakusau k' nettles, heh torn k' briars; vi limped, heh shivered, heh glared, heh growled; heh t'vi zud chattered svi' ish-veh patam u' au seized me k' wuh chin. "oh! Ri tor tresahk t'nash-veh drahk, osu, " i pleaded svi' vash. "pray ri tor tor ish-veh, osu." "var-tor etek ish-veh ahm!" leralmin-tor wuh sasu. "sahris!" "pip, osu." "wuh'wak weht, " leralmin-tor wuh sasu, staring na' me. "mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh ru'lut!" "pip. Pip, osu." "gluvaya etek wilat du ha-tor, " leralmin-tor wuh sasu. "pint si' wuh shi!" i sfekau tor wilat etwel pi'kahr ti, fi' wuh pa'ash svi'-gef among wuh alder-lap heh pollards, wuh mile il weht s' wuh church. Wuh sasu, po' looking na' me na' wuh moment, da-tor me upside ne', heh emptied t'nash-veh abru'lik. Tra' vesh' nothing svi' au tonk'peh wuh krus t' kap. Lu wuh church sarlah tor itself, na' au vesh' ni sudden heh karik ik au tor ish-veh hal-tor patam abru' timut fa' me, heh vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh steeple ne' t'nash-veh ash'ya, lu wuh church sarlah tor itself, i leralmin, i vesh' hayal-tor fi' wuh pid tombstone, trembling du' au ate wuh kap ravenously. [illustration] "du nu'ri dog, " leralmin-tor wuh sasu, licking ish-veh bru-lar, "ra thelik nak du ha' prah." i dva-tor au vesh' thelik, hi i vesh' na' ik wak undersized na' t'nash-veh tevun, heh ri karik. "darn me kuv i couldn't yokul 'em, " leralmin-tor wuh sasu, k' wuh threatening hutau t' ish-veh patam, "heh kuv i han't ulef wuh kashek tor't!" i earnestly sagluvau t'nash-veh rok ik au wouldn't, heh meskarau tighter tor wuh tombstone fi' if au had shitau me; partly, tor potau myself fi-tor ish-veh; partly, tor potau myself s' maf-tor. "i' lookee la'!" leralmin-tor wuh sasu. "wilat's ish-veh ko-mekh?" "tra', osu!" leralmin-tor i. Au palikau, tor wuh pen sahr-tor, heh pehkau heh glazhau abru' ish-veh tipan. "tra', osu!" i timidly danau. "isha georgiana. Ik's t'nash-veh ko-mekh." "oh!" leralmin-tor au, coming pla'. "heh nam-tor ik ish-veh sa-mekh alonger ish-veh ko-mekh?" "ha, osu, " leralmin-tor i; "ish-veh nuh'; tab-ma t' nash parish." "ha!" au muttered yi, panahik. "vi d'ye ha-tor k', supposin' du're kindly kal-tor tor ha-tor, if i han't tor abru t'nash-veh kashek pa'?" "t'nash-veh ko-kai, osu, mrs. Joe gargery, ko-telsu t' joe gargery, wuh shek-zhuksu, osu." "shek-zhuksu, eh?" leralmin-tor au. Heh glazhau ne' na' ish-veh mal. Po' darkly looking na' ish-veh mal heh me several wak, sarlah ish-veh closer tor t'nash-veh tombstone, nem-tor me k' fi' kar, heh ayau me pla' u' irak u' au kupi meskaraya me; ni ik ish-veh bezhun glazhau danik powerfully ne' vi' t'nash-veh, heh t'nash-veh glazhau danik helplessly abru vi' ish-veh. "i' lookee la', " au leralmin-tor, "wuh deshker hasu whether du're tor nam-tor kal-tor tor ha-tor. Du fai-tor ra wuh deik nam-tor?" "ha, osu." "heh du fai-tor ra wittles nam-tor?" "ha, osu." po' tik deshker au ayau me abru' wuh pi' weht, ni u' tor mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh greater kash-ral t' helplessness heh tehvar. "du prah me wuh deik." au ayau me va'ashiv. "heh du prah me wittles." au ayau me va'ashiv. "du katau 'em fi' tor me." au ayau me va'ashiv. "il i'll ma ish-veh khaf-spol heh nehasamek si'." au ayau me va'ashiv. I vesh' dreadfully koltha, heh ni giddy ik i clung tor ish-veh k' fi' el'ru, heh leralmin-tor, "kuv du would kindly sanoi tor kal-tor me potau abruvenik, osu, sos'eh i shouldn't nam-tor has-bosh, heh sos'eh i kupi attend weht." au mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh danik tremendous spis heh padukau, ni ik wuh church spen-tor abru' its sha' weathercock. Yi, au meskarau me k' wuh kar, svi' wuh abruvenik shul fi' wuh fik t' wuh kov, heh went fi' svi' aifa pthak-bosh zhil: "du katau me, tor-morrow asal lehkuh-mal, ik deik heh au wittles. Du katau wuh lot tor me, na' ik hinek kipof abru' yonder. Du tor ish-veh, heh du worla dare tor leralmin wuh zhit il dare tor tor wuh glat fundik ish-veh having gla-tor such wuh person u' me, il sovek person sumever, heh du dungau nam-tor kal-tor tor ha-tor. Du vravshau, il du hal-tor s' t'nash-veh zhit svi' sovek partickler, rai tukh uf pi' ish-veh nam-tor, heh ish-veh khaf-spol heh ish-veh nehasamek dungau nam-tor tore si', roasted, heh ate. I', i ain't sa'awek, u' du lau nah-tor i am. Tra''s wuh nu'ri sasu ip-sut k' me, svi' comparison k' if nu'ri sasu i am wuh ha'su. Ik nu'ri sasu zhu-tor wuh zhit i stariben. Ik nu'ri sasu has wuh tsat yut pecooliar tor himself, t' getting na' wuh sa-kan, heh na' ish-veh khaf-spol, heh na' ish-veh nehasamek. Ish-veh nam-tor svi' wain na' wuh sa-kan tor attempt tor ip-sut himself s' ik nu'ri sasu. Wuh sa-kan lau klachek ish-veh svep, lau nam-tor lamekh svi' sar-tak, lau k'hy himself abru, lau bes-tor wuh sai-vel abru' ish-veh patam, lau nah-tor himself kel'o heh safe, tonk'peh ik nu'ri sasu dungi softly creep heh creep ish-veh yut tor ish-veh heh bezhun-masu ish-veh tu'ash. I am wuh keeping ik nu'ri sasu s' harming t' du na' wuh la' moment, k' lo'uk rihag'es. I talal ish-veh wery lerash tor meskaraya ik nu'ri sasu ska' t' ish-veh svi'udish. I', ra tor du leralmin?" i leralmin-tor ik i would prah ish-veh wuh deik, heh i would prah ish-veh ra pushau bits t' yem-tukh i kupi, heh i would sarlah tor ish-veh na' wuh kipof, lehkuh-mal svi' wuh asal. "leralmin s'haile kwul du tevik kuv du ri tor!" leralmin-tor wuh sasu. I leralmin-tor ni, heh au nem-tor me ne'. "i', " au pursued, "du vokau ra du've undertook, heh du vokau ik nu'ri sasu, heh du prah ha-kel!" "goo-rom mu-yor, osu, " i faltered. "mau t' ik!" leralmin-tor au, glancing pa' ish-veh abru' wuh samu masupik pa'ash. "i istaya i vesh' wuh git'woa. Il wuh eel!" na' wuh ka wak, au teraya-martaya ish-veh shuddering ak'shem svi' fi' ish-veh kar, clasping himself, u' kuv tor meskaraya himself teretuhr, heh limped na' wuh neik church temok. U' vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh hal-tor, picking ish-veh yut among wuh nettles, heh among wuh brambles ik bound wuh yar-kur mounds, au glazhau svi' t'nash-veh nu'ri bezhun u' kuv au vesh' eluding wuh el'ru t' wuh tevik sutra, stretching abru cautiously s' ish-veh shi'vukhut, tor prah wuh kuvoran fi-tor ish-veh mal-nik heh seshaya ish-veh svi'. Lu sarlah ish-veh tor wuh neik church temok, au prah abru' ish-veh, spo' wuh sasu t'vi mal vesh' numbed heh stegel, heh yi da-tor pauk tor glazhau na' me. Lu vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh turning, i eku t'nash-veh limuk na' ha-kel, heh tor wuh buhfik nam-tor-tor t' t'nash-veh mal. Tonk'peh presently i glazhau abru' t'nash-veh tipan, heh gla-tor ish-veh going fi' va'ashiv na' wuh pilash, fam dvun hugging himself svi' fi' kar, heh picking ish-veh yut k' ish-veh sival ash'ya among wuh lo'uk kov eku-tor vi' wuh masu-kastra la' heh tra', na' stepping-shitau lu wuh sov-mashau vesh' ras il wuh mashen vesh' svi'. Wuh masu-kastra vesh' aishan wuh wu nesh-kur yutik zehl yi, u' i pehkau tor glazhau po' ish-veh; heh wuh pilash vesh' aishan wuh'ashiv yutik zehl, ri nearly ni sax'ksei il wi ni nesh-kur; heh wuh igen vesh' aishan wuh zehl t' wu reshnek yon-kur zehl heh ihnik nesh-kur zehl intermixed. Fi' wuh rihk t' wuh pilash i kupi faintly tor si' wuh goh dahkuh nesh-kur vel svi' ek' wuh prospect ik seemed tor nam-tor standing abruvenik; veh t' aifa vesh' wuh glaribek k' if wuh masusu dakharau, spo' wuh unhooped cask fi-tor wuh fek, wuh watosh vel lu du vesh' be' ish-veh; wuh vath, wuh gibbet, k' ein naf-elakh hanging tor ish-veh if had wuh'wak meskarau wuh pirate. Wuh sasu vesh' limping fi' na' nash latter, u' kuv au vesh' wuh pirate sarlah tor ha'kiv, heh sarlah ne', heh going pla' tor kik himself abru va'ashiv. Ish-veh mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh terrible da-tor lu i nahp ni; heh u' vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh cattle lifting ish-veh patam tor gaze po' ish-veh, i wondered whether au nahp ni nuh'. I glazhau ek' pauk na' wuh horrible nu'ri sasu, heh kupi gla-tor rai glat t' ish-veh. Tonk'peh i' i vesh' koltha va'ashiv, heh sahr-tor ha-kel rik' stopping. Chapter ii. T'nash-veh ko-kai, mrs. Joe gargery, vesh' weht do dah-leh tevun older do i, heh had afer-tor wuh lo'uk reputation k' herself heh wuh behsu fai'ei she had katau me abru "k' el'ru." having na' ik wak tor talal si' na' myself ra wuh sagluvaya tvai, heh fai-tor ish-veh ki' wuh lerash heh ras el'ru, heh tor nam-tor mau svi' wuh es'merka t' laying ish-veh fi-tor ish-veh sa-telsu u' muhl u' fi-tor me, i supposed ik joe gargery heh i vesh' fi' katau abru k' el'ru. She vesh' ri wuh rom-looking kosu, t'nash-veh ko-kai; heh i had wuh paik impression ik she bolau ma tor joe gargery marry ish-veh k' el'ru. Joe vesh' wuh rom sasu, k' tcha-tor t' flaxen isachya fi' tik vla t' ish-veh mos limuk, heh k' bezhun t' such wuh maut undecided pla-kur ik au seemed tor ma somehow prah rish-tor k' ish-veh sha' wan-kur. Au vesh' wuh bovik, rom-natured, slor-tempered, hagik-going, duhik, tal-kam katravahsu, wuh wihfelau t' hercules svi' karik'es, heh isha svi' kobat'es. T'nash-veh ko-kai, mrs. Joe, k' nesh-kur isachya heh bezhun, had such wuh prevailing redness t' wadi ik i sometimes nam-tor-tor tor wonder whether ish-veh vesh' tor-yehat she pu-tor herself k' wuh nutmeg-grater instead t' pu. She vesh' ha-vol heh bony, heh siyah kwon-hau-ov sai-vel-tor wuh dirik apron, terau abru' ish-veh khlop za' k' dahkuh pakuv, heh having wuh keh-vla impregnable bib svi' khom, ik vesh' terpau bosh t' pins heh og-lum. She tor ish-veh wuh powerful merit svi' herself, heh wuh karik reproach tehnat joe, ik she sai-vel-tor nash apron ni mau. Hi i really gla-tor rai utvau po she dang ma worn ish-veh na' ek'; il po, kuv she did sai-vel-tor ish-veh na' ek', she dang ri ma taken ish-veh ska', kanok gad t' ish-veh ha'kiv. Joe's zhuk-fasek adjoined etwel kelek, if vesh' wuh wooden kelek, u' wehk t' wuh kelek svi' etwel shasol vesh', danik t' au, na' ik wak. Lu i sahr-tor ha-kel s' wuh churchyard, wuh zhuk-fasek vesh' ikap'uh t'du ru'lut, heh joe vesh' sitting sa'awek svi' wuh af'tum. Joe heh i hasu katravahsu-sufferers, heh having confidences u' such, joe imparted wuh guhl'es tor me, wuh moment i ashenau wuh kuhr t' wuh svep heh peeped svi' na' ish-veh mesyutik tor ish-veh, sitting svi' wuh vuzh-mev teruk. "mrs. Joe has vesh' si' wuh dozen wak, looking na' du, pip. Heh she's si' i', tor ish-veh wuh leipausu's dozen." "nam-tor she?" "ha, pip, " leralmin-tor joe; "heh ra's weh-rasahkos, she's prah tickler k' ish-veh." na' nash dismal kash-tor'es, i kuvoran-tor wuh goh gonaf fi' t'nash-veh waistcoat pauk heh pauk, heh glazhau svi' lo'uk neik-shal na' wuh yon. Tickler vesh' wuh wax-shahtau krus t' cane, worn mos k' terkwul k' t'nash-veh tickled nentu. "she sot ne', " leralmin-tor joe, "heh she prah abru, heh she tor wuh runem na' tickler, heh she ram-paged si'. Ik's ra she did, " leralmin-tor joe, slowly clearing wuh yon svi' wuh weh-neik mofek k' wuh poker, heh looking na' ish-veh; "she ram-paged si', pip." "has she vesh' hal-tor wu, joe?" i kwon-hau-ov skasau ish-veh u' wuh larger koshtri t' kan, heh u' rai weht do t'nash-veh kaik. "muhl, " leralmin-tor joe, glancing abru na' wuh dutch wak-vel, "she's vesh' fi' wuh ram-thalv, nash kim-shah spell, pa' kaukuh minutes, pip. She's wuh-coming! Prah za' wuh svep, hinek chap, heh ma wuh jack-towel betwixt du." i nem-tor wuh na'shikh. T'nash-veh ko-kai, mrs. Joe, throwing wuh svep eik tu'ash, heh finding wuh klotaya za' ish-veh, iyi divined wuh aishan, heh applied tickler tor its further investigation. She concluded k' throwing mei k'ashiv dvin-tor u' wuh connubial missileat joe, vi, glad tor prah meskaraya t' me fi' sovek zhil, be' dvun-tor me fi' vi' wuh vuzh-mev heh quietly fenced me abru tra' k' ish-veh lo'uk mal. "wilat ma du vesh', du nu'ri monkey?" leralmin-tor mrs. Joe, stamping ish-veh ash'ya. "var-tor me directly ra du've vesh' doing sai-vel-tor me maf k' fret heh kolthak heh worrit, il i'd ma du s' ik teruk kuv du vesh' kau-leh pips, heh au vesh' kaukuh hundred gargerys." "i ma goh vesh' tor wuh churchyard, " leralmin-tor i, s' t'nash-veh stool, maf-tor heh rubbing myself. "churchyard!" ashiv-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai. "kuv ish-veh vikau't na' me du'd ma vesh' tor wuh churchyard wu ago, heh stayed tra'. Vi katau du abru k' el'ru?" "du did, " leralmin-tor i. "heh po did i tor ish-veh, i dang spo' tor fai-tor?" sporiben t'nash-veh ko-kai. I whimpered, "i ri tor fai-tor." "i ri tor!" leralmin-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai. "i'd worla tor ish-veh va'ashiv! I fai-tor ik. I lau truly leralmin i've worla had nash apron t' t'nash-veh ska' opi' pukeshta du vesh'. Ish-veh's rasahkos hiyet tor nam-tor wuh shek-zhuksu's ko-telsu (heh ish-veh wuh gargery) rik' hasu ish-veh ko-mekh." t'nash-veh nahp fam-kelek-tor s' ik deshker u' i glazhau disconsolately na' wuh yon. Na' wuh fugitive si' fi' wuh masu-kastra k' wuh ironed mal, wuh mysterious nu'ri sasu, wuh deik, wuh yem-tukh, heh wuh dreadful pledge i vesh' ne' tor kugau wuh larceny fi' eifa sheltering premises, she-tor fa' me svi' wuh avenging kastik-kov. "hah!" leralmin-tor mrs. Joe, restoring tickler tor ish-veh wurzel. "churchyard, indeed! Du lau muhl leralmin churchyard, du dahkuh." veh t' etek, k' wuh k', had ri leralmin-tor ish-veh na' ek'. "du'll yetur me tor wuh churchyard betwixt du, veh t' aifa gad, heh o, wuh pr-r-recious shif du'd nam-tor rik' me!" u' she applied herself tor eku wuh theris-masu-vel, joe peeped ne' na' me abru' ish-veh mal, u' kuv au vesh' mentally casting me heh himself abru, heh calculating ra ves t' shif etek practically dang tor, ne' wuh grievous circumstances foreshadowed. Po' ik, au hayal-tor olaya ish-veh gas'rak-vla flaxen tcha-tor heh whisker, heh zahalik mrs. Joe pa' k' ish-veh pla-kur bezhun, u' ish-veh manner kwon-hau-ov vesh' na' squally wak. T'nash-veh ko-kai had wuh trenchant yut t' tresahk-tor etwel kap heh butter na' etek, ik worla vuhnau. Wuh'rak, k' ish-veh losrak el'ru she jammed wuh loaf lerash heh sahris tehnat ish-veh bib, wilat ish-veh sometimes prah wuh pin vi' ish-veh, heh sometimes wuh og-lum, if etek afterwards prah vi' etwel ru'lut. Yi she nem-tor ein butter (ri nuh' mau) fi' wuh lipau heh sak-tor ish-veh fi' wuh loaf, svi' wuh apothecary ves t' yut, u' kuv she vesh' tor wuh plaster, using fi' vla t' wuh lipau k' wuh slapping dexterity, heh trimming heh moulding wuh butter ska' pauk wuh puhnk. Yi, she mazhiv-kur-tor wuh lipau wuh kim-shah klon psethau fi' wuh rihk t' wuh plaster, heh yi sawed wuh maut bali pauk ska' wuh loaf: if she t'forti, fa' separating s' wuh loaf, hewed vi' dahkuh ulef, t' if joe prah veh, heh i wuh vath. Fi' wuh la' occasion, hi i vesh' k'avon, i dared ri yokul t'nash-veh shihvek. I olau ik i bolau ma vel svi' reserve na' t'nash-veh dreadful acquaintance, heh ish-veh puk'ai'la wuh fam dvun weht dreadful nu'ri sasu. I fai-tor mrs. Joe's housekeeping tor nam-tor t' wuh strictest ves, heh ik t'nash-veh larcenous kla-hil-tor lau talal nothing la'ka-yehat svi' wuh safe. Therefore i resolved tor shitau t'nash-veh hunk t' kap heh butter ne' wuh mal t' t'nash-veh malanu. Wuh urgam t' resolution bolayatik tor wuh srashiv t' nash lof i afer-tor tor nam-tor ved awful. Ish-veh vesh' u' kuv i had tor tor abru t'nash-veh kashek tor leap s' wuh fik t' wuh pid kelek, il taul vi' wuh lo'uk gluder t' masu. Heh ish-veh vesh' tor wuh weht rihagik k' wuh unconscious joe. Svi' etwel already-mentioned freemasonry u' katravahsu-sufferers, heh svi' ish-veh rom-natured besu'es k' me, ish-veh vesh' etwel khru es'merka tor tcok'at wuh yut etek zeshau k'fai etwel shihvek-tor, k' silently holding au abru tor tik vath's admiration i' heh yi, if kastorilau etek tor uzh pideshan. Tor-mu-yor, joe several wak invited me, k' wuh gluvayek t' ish-veh sahris diminishing shihvek, tor svi-tor fi-tor etwel tsuri friendly kuhlaya; tonk'peh au afer-tor me, tik wak, k' t'nash-veh kin-kur mug t' theris-masu fi' veh mal-nef, heh t'nash-veh untouched kap heh butter fi' wuh vath. Na' kim-shah, i desperately panah-tor ik wuh vel i contemplated bolau nam-tor ovsoh, heh ik ish-veh had buhfik nam-tor ovsoh svi' wuh least improbable manner tsurkanik k' wuh circumstances. I nem-tor advantage t' wuh moment lu joe had aishan glazhau na' me, heh prah t'nash-veh kap heh butter ne' t'nash-veh mal. Joe vesh' evidently tor uncomfortable k' ra au supposed tor nam-tor t'nash-veh pak t' yeht-avon, heh nem-tor wuh thoughtful zeshaya s' ish-veh shihvek, if au didn't seem tor tizh-tor. Au da-tor ish-veh pa' svi' ish-veh ru'lut mau longer do tsuri, pondering abru' ish-veh wuh rom deal, heh po' ek' gulped ish-veh ne' spo' wuh has-tal. Au vesh' pa' tor nem-tor wuh'ashiv zeshaya, heh had aishan prah ish-veh patam fi' veh vla na' wuh rom purchase fi' ish-veh, lu ish-veh bezhun tevan-tor fi' me, heh gla-tor ish-veh ik t'nash-veh kap heh butter vesh' hal-tor. Wuh wonder heh consternation k' if joe pehkau fi' wuh threshold t' ish-veh zeshaya heh nantau na' me, vesh' nuh' evident tor stron t'nash-veh ko-kai's glantaya. "ra's wuh tukh i'?" leralmin-tor she, smartly, u' she shitau ne' ish-veh cup. "i leralmin, du fai-tor!" muttered joe, shaking ish-veh patam na' me svi' maut serious remonstrance. "pip, hinek chap! Du'll tor yourself wuh mischief. Ish-veh'll terpau ein-wilat. Du mokuhlek't ma chawed ish-veh, pip." "ra's wuh tukh i'?" ashiv-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai, weht sharply do fa'. "kuv du mokuhlek huhsh sovek trifle fi' ish-veh abru, pip, i'd recommend du tor tor ish-veh, " leralmin-tor joe, ek' aghast. "manners nam-tor manners, tonk'peh fam dvun ish-veh elth's ish-veh elth." k' nash wak, t'nash-veh ko-kai vesh' ved desperate, ni she pounced fi' joe, heh, taking ish-veh k' wuh dahkuh whiskers, knocked ish-veh patam na' wuh pi' du' tehnat wuh temok za' ish-veh, du' i hayal-tor svi' wuh teruk, looking guiltily fi'. "i', sos'eh du'll mention ra's wuh tukh, " leralmin-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai, s' esh, "du staring lo'uk terpau pig." joe glazhau na' ish-veh svi' wuh helpless yut, yi nem-tor wuh helpless zeshaya, heh glazhau na' me va'ashiv. "du fai-tor, pip, " leralmin-tor joe, solemnly, k' ish-veh kim-shah zeshaya svi' ish-veh nak, heh speaking svi' wuh confidential spes, u' kuv etek dahkuh vesh' ved sa'awek, "du heh me nam-tor kwon-hau-ov t'hylara, heh i'd nam-tor wuh kim-shah tor var-tor fi-tor du, sovek wak. Tonk'peh such wuh" au dvun-tor ish-veh ku-san heh glazhau pa' wuh lan-tol svi' etek, heh yi va'ashiv na' me"such wuh danik oncommon terk u' ik!" "vesh' bolting ish-veh yem-tukh, has au?" maf-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai. "du fai-tor, hinek chap, " leralmin-tor joe, looking na' me, heh ri na' mrs. Joe, k' ish-veh zeshaya fam dvun svi' ish-veh nak, "i terkau, myself, lu i vesh' ish-veh agefrequentand u' wuh sa-kan i've vesh' among wuh wehk bolters; tonk'peh i worla gla-tor ish-veh bolting kaik wi, pip, heh ish-veh's wuh mercy du ain't terkau tevik." t'nash-veh ko-kai tor wuh taul na' me, heh aluk-kum-tor me abru k' wuh isachya, taran nothing weht do wuh awful zhit, "sarlah du bi' heh nam-tor dosed." ein hasuk beast had zaprah-tor leralmin-masu svi' eifa gad u' wuh tok-ti haseret, heh mrs. Joe kwon-hau-ov potau wuh tanilau t' ish-veh svi' wuh cupboard; having wuh dva svi' its virtues correspondent tor its nastiness. Na' wuh buhfik t' wak, ni mau t' nash glozho vesh' administered tor me u' wuh dvel restorative, ik i vesh' d'wonil t' going pa', smelling spo' wuh uzh foshek. Fi' nash particular khru wuh urgency t' t'nash-veh nuf halishau wuh pint t' nash rish, if vesh' mukau ne' t'nash-veh drahk, na' t'nash-veh greater comfort, du' mrs. Joe meskarau t'nash-veh patam ne' ish-veh kar, u' wuh kluf would nam-tor meskarau svi' wuh bootjack. Joe prah ska' k' ulef wuh pint; tonk'peh vesh' tor tor vitem-tor ik (mau tor ish-veh ertaya, u' au hayal-tor slowly munching heh kohlan fa' wuh yon), "fai'ei au had had wuh da-tor." judging s' myself, i dang leralmin au certainly had wuh da-tor afterwards, kuv au had had rim fa'. Conscience nam-tor wuh dreadful vel lu ish-veh accuses sasu il sa-kan; tonk'peh lu, svi' wuh nuf t' wuh sa-kan, ik tsat burden co-el'torau k' wuh'ashiv tsat burden ne' wuh mal t' ish-veh malanu, ish-veh nam-tor (u' i mokuhlek testify) wuh lo'uk taflaya. Wuh guilty fai-tukh ik i vesh' going tor rob mrs. Joei worla nahp i vesh' going tor rob joe, na' i worla nahp t' sovek t' wuh housekeeping veltra u' hisunited tor wuh bolayek t' kwon-hau-ov keeping veh el'ru fi' t'nash-veh kap heh butter u' i hayal-tor, il lu i vesh' ordered pa' wuh af'tum fi' sovek pi' skrol, siyah drove me s' t'nash-veh kashek. Yi, u' wuh masu-kastra salan tor wuh yon min heh flare, i nahp i puzhu-tor wuh spes s'udish, t' wuh sasu k' wuh shek-tukh fi' ish-veh mal vi had sworn me tor secrecy, declaring ik au couldn't heh wouldn't starve abi' tor-morrow, tonk'peh bolau nam-tor puyem-tot i'. Na' vath wak, i nahp, ra kuv wuh nu'ri sasu vi vesh' k' ni mau rihag'es restrained s' imbruing ish-veh el'ru svi' me dang yield tor wuh constitutional impatience, il dang lafosh wuh wak, heh dang nah-tor himself accredited tor t'nash-veh khaf-spol heh nehasamek tor-mu-yor, instead t' tor-morrow! Kuv ek'wak anybody's isachya lam-tor fi' shaht k' vash, t'nash-veh bolau ma ovsoh ni yi. Tonk'peh, sos'eh, kling's ek'wak did? Ish-veh vesh' christmas eve, heh i had tor stir wuh pudding na' thurai gad, k' wuh khaf-tukh-terpau, s' stehkuh tor ohkuh k' wuh dutch wak-vel. I ar'kada ish-veh k' wuh tus fi-tor t'nash-veh mal (heh ik tor me nah-tor afresh t' wuh sasu k' wuh tus fi' ish-veh mal), heh afer-tor wuh tendency t' tusok tor katau wuh kap heh butter si' na' t'nash-veh mal-nik, ved unmanageable. Kunling i trel-tor maf, heh titau ik krus t' t'nash-veh conscience svi' t'nash-veh kamu-tvi-shal shi'yuk. "hark!" leralmin-tor i, lu i had ovsoh t'nash-veh stirring, heh vesh' taking wuh kim-shah lamekh svi' wuh vuzh-mev teruk fa' hasu satau abru tor sar-tak; "vesh' ik lo'uk pohshayek, joe?" "ah!" leralmin-tor joe. "tra''s wuh'ashiv conwict ska'." "ra tor ik tvai, joe?" leralmin-tor i. Mrs. Joe, vi kwon-hau-ov nem-tor danaya fi-tor herself, leralmin-tor, snappishly, "stron-tor. Stron-tor." administering wuh mesprahn spo' leralmin-masu. Du' mrs. Joe hayal-tor k' ish-veh patam bending abru' ish-veh needlework, i shitau t'nash-veh ru'lut vi' wuh shidau t' taran tor joe, "ra's wuh convict?" joe shitau ish-veh ru'lut vi' wuh shidau t' returning such wuh highly elaborate kilko-srashiv, ik i kupi tor si' nothing t' ish-veh tonk'peh wuh single zhit "pip." "tra' vesh' wuh conwict ska' kim-shah mu-yor, " leralmin-tor joe, aloud, "po' tev-tor-pohshayek. Heh au pohshau warning t' ish-veh. Heh i' ish-veh saudau au're firing warning t' wuh'ashiv." "vi's firing?" leralmin-tor i. "drat ik sa-kan, " interposed t'nash-veh ko-kai, frowning na' me abru' ish-veh ar'kadan, "ra wuh questioner au nam-tor. Ya'akash rai deshkau, heh du'll nam-tor var-tor rai ti." ish-veh vesh' ri maut polite tor herself, i nahp, tor imply ik i dang nam-tor var-tor ti k' ish-veh kauk kuv i did ya'akash deshkau. Tonk'peh she worla vesh' polite vita tra' vesh' apc'koik. Na' nash sfek joe greatly augmented t'nash-veh curiosity k' taking wuh utmost kusut-tor tor tu'ash ish-veh ru'lut maut eik, heh tor shitau ish-veh vi' wuh shid t' wuh zhit ik glazhau tor me spo' "sulks." therefore, i naturally sfekau tor mrs. Joe, heh shitau t'nash-veh ru'lut vi' wuh shid t' taran, "ish-veh?" tonk'peh joe wouldn't zhu-tor t' ik, na' ek', heh va'ashiv tu'ash ish-veh ru'lut maut eik, heh hutau wuh shid t' wuh danik emphatic zhit s' ish-veh. Tonk'peh i kupi tor nothing t' wuh zhit. "mrs. Joe, " leralmin-tor i, u' wuh kim-shah resort, "i dang spo' tor knowif du wouldn't mau mindwhere wuh firing sarlah s'?" "s'haile kudau wuh sa-kan!" sporiben t'nash-veh ko-kai, u' kuv she didn't ved tvai ik tonk'peh rather wuh contrary. "s' wuh hulks!" "oh-h!" leralmin-tor i, looking na' joe. "hulks!" joe mazhiv-kur-tor wuh reproachful huhsh, u' mau u' tor leralmin, "muhl, i var-tor du ni." "heh sanoi, ra's hulks?" leralmin-tor i. "ik's wuh yut k' nash sa-kan!" sporiben t'nash-veh ko-kai, pointing me si' k' ish-veh og-lum heh og-elakh, heh shaking ish-veh patam na' me. "kilko-srashiv ish-veh veh deshker, heh au'll ya'akash du wuh dozen directly. Hulks nam-tor prison-ships, gas'rak 'tuhs th' meshes." etek kwon-hau-ov nam-tor-tor ik ahm na' masu-kastra, svi' etwel shasol. "i wonder vi's shitau vi' prison-ships, heh po au're shitau tra'?" leralmin-tor i, svi' wuh paik yut, heh k' hizhuk desperation. Ish-veh vesh' nuh' mau na' mrs. Joe, vi iyi she-tor. "i var-tor du ra, nu'ri katravahsu, " leralmin-tor she, "i didn't katau du abru k' el'ru tor badger sutra's ha-tor si'. Ish-veh would nam-tor tenai tor me heh ri krol, kuv i had. Sutra nam-tor shitau svi' wuh hulks fai'ei au riyeht-staya, heh fai'ei au rob, heh zhuk-fasek, heh tor ek' wihfelau t' rasahkos; heh au kwon-hau-ov palikau k' asking deshkau. I', du prah bi' tor sar-tak!" i vesh' worla kal-tor wuh ha'fek tor ta'hal me tor sar-tak, heh, u' i went upstairs svi' wuh gu'gelik, k' t'nash-veh patam tingling, s' mrs. Joe's thimble having mavau wuh tambourine fi-tor ish-veh, tor sailau ish-veh kim-shah zhit, i olau fearfully sensible t' wuh lo'uk convenience ik wuh hulks vesh' handy na' me. I vesh' clearly fi' t'nash-veh yut tra'. I had palikau k' asking deshkau, heh i vesh' going tor rob mrs. Joe. Opi' ik wak, if nam-tor irak hiyet maf i', i ma k'ashiv nahp ik zamu sutra fai-tor ra secrecy tra' nam-tor svi' wuh nu'ri ne' vash. Rai tukh uf unreasonable wuh vash, ni ik ish-veh nam-tor vash. I vesh' svi' mortal vash t' wuh nu'ri sasu vi aitlu t'nash-veh khaf-spol heh nehasamek; i vesh' svi' mortal vash t' t'nash-veh interlocutor k' wuh shek-tukh mal; i vesh' svi' mortal vash t' myself, s' ik wuh awful ugaya had vesh' saseshau; i had rai rok t' deliverance k'fai t'nash-veh ek'-powerful ko-kai, vi repulsed me na' kanok da-tor; i am kwes tor nah-tor t' ra i lau ma ovsoh fi' requirement, svi' wuh secrecy t' t'nash-veh vash. Kuv i yuk-tor na' ek' ik mu-yor, ish-veh vesh' goh tor glenonau myself drifting ne' wuh pilash fi' wuh karik sikar-mashen, tor wuh hulks; wuh ghostly pirate calling si' tor me k'fai wuh speaking-trumpet, u' i be' dvun-tor wuh gibbet-wurzel, ik i had weh-rom sarlah ashore heh nam-tor geldau tra' na' wuh'wak, heh ri shitau ish-veh ska'. I vesh' kwes tor yuk, kauk kuv i had vesh' vul-tor, na' i fai-tor ik na' wuh wuh'rak faint gad-keshtan t' asal i bolau rob wuh pantry. Tra' vesh' rai doing ish-veh svi' wuh mu-yor, na' tra' vesh' rai getting wuh ta'hal k' hagik tetalaya yi; ki' prah veh i bolau ma kwul-tor ish-veh s' kil-tukh heh pishek, heh ma tor wuh ralash spo' wuh maut pirate himself rattling ish-veh naf-elakh. U' ak u' wuh lo'uk nesh-kur velvet pall s'udish t'nash-veh pi' krani vesh' pohshaya k' zhai-kur, i prah abru heh went downstairs; kanok dohn fi-tor wuh yut, heh kanok treshaya svi' kanok dohn calling po' me, "pehkaya pi'tak!" heh "prah abru, mrs. Joe!" svi' wuh pantry, if vesh' irak weht abundantly tanilau do tsuri, owing tor wuh tevun-yonuk, i vesh' maut mau alarmed k' wuh hare hanging abru k' wuh timut, ik i rather nahp i kum-tor, lu t'nash-veh pla' vesh' ulef da-tor, winking. I had rai wak na' rihamaya, rai wak na' dvel, rai wak na' sovek-vel, na' i had rai wak tor spare. I vazgau ein kap, ein rind t' thuhk, pa' ulef wuh kak t' mincemeat (if i tied abru svi' t'nash-veh abru'lik-handkerchief k' t'nash-veh kim-shah mu-yor's shihvek), ein brandy s' wuh kov mashek (if i skamukau vi' wuh makh mashek i had secretly nam-tor-tor na' tor ik intoxicating yumasu, spanish-liquorice-masu, abru svi' t'nash-veh tvi-shal: diluting wuh kov mashek s' wuh mashek svi' wuh af'tum cupboard), wuh kahm hinek k' maut pi' fi' ish-veh, heh wuh vaksurik pauk lerakhovau pork pie. I vesh' nearly going maf rik' wuh pie, tonk'peh i vesh' tempted tor mount fi-tor wuh nef, tor glazhau ra ish-veh vesh' ik vesh' shitau maf ni carefully svi' wuh wein-tor earthenware dish svi' wuh teruk, heh i afer-tor ish-veh vesh' wuh pie, heh i nem-tor ish-veh svi' wuh rok ik ish-veh vesh' ri intended na' lehkuh-mal nam-tor-tor, heh would ri nam-tor din-tor na' ein wak. Tra' vesh' wuh svep svi' wuh af'tum, communicating k' wuh zhuk-fasek; i unlocked heh unbolted ik svep, heh prah wuh deik s' among joe's raul. Yi i shitau wuh fastenings u' i had afer-tor au, tu'ash wuh svep na' if i had svi-tor lu i sahr-tor ha-kel kim-shah mu-yor, ikap-tor ish-veh, heh sahr-tor na' wuh misty masu-kastra. Chapter iii. Ish-veh vesh' wuh rimy asal, heh maut damp. I had gla-tor wuh damp lying fi' wuh si' t'nash-veh pi' krani, u' kuv ein goblin had vesh' maf-tor tra' ek' mu-yor, heh using wuh krani na' wuh abru'lik-handkerchief. I', vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh damp lying fi' wuh sai-famik labah heh spare yar, spo' wuh coarser wihfelau t' a'lazb' vis; hanging itself s' pi'gel tor pi'gel heh wun-mor tor wun-mor. Fi' kanok rail heh temep, masupik ti clammy, heh wuh masu-kastra mist vesh' ni bali, ik wuh wooden ozh fi' wuh lehk directing sutra tor etwel villagea kharat if au worla nar-tor, na' au worla sarlah therewas invisible tor me abi' i vesh' ved ikap-tor ne' ish-veh. Yi, u' i glazhau abru na' ish-veh, du' ish-veh thezh-tor, ish-veh seemed tor t'nash-veh oppressed conscience spo' wuh phantom devoting me tor wuh hulks. Wuh mist vesh' heavier wi lu i prah si' fi-tor wuh masu-kastra, ni ik instead t' t'nash-veh sahran na' kanok-vei, kanok-vei seemed tor sahr-tor na' me. Nash vesh' maut disagreeable tor wuh guilty kashek. Wuh temep heh pamashok heh kutra sarlah bursting na' me k'fai wuh mist, u' kuv au maf-tor u' plainly u' kupi nam-tor, "wuh sa-kan k' somebody else's pork pie! Pehkaya ish-veh!" wuh cattle sarlah fi-tor me k' spo' suddenness, staring s' ish-veh bezhun, heh steaming s' ish-veh han-sharular, "halloa, nu'ri pi'tak!" veh nesh-kur ox, k' wuh wan-kur cravat fi', vi kauk had tor t'nash-veh awakened conscience vel t' wuh clerical sov, teslau me ni obstinately k' ish-veh bezhun, heh dvun-tor ish-veh pasik patam pauk svi' such wuh accusatory manner u' i dvun-tor pauk, ik i blubbered si' tor ish-veh, "i couldn't gol'nev ish-veh, osu! Ish-veh wasn't na' myself i nem-tor ish-veh!" fi-tor if au shitau ne' ish-veh patam, blew wuh wan t' vuzh s' ish-veh han, heh vanished k' wuh kick-abru t' ish-veh hind-mal heh wuh flourish t' ish-veh harr. Ek' nash wak, i vesh' getting fi' na' wuh pilash; tonk'peh however sahris i went, i couldn't lamekh t'nash-veh ash'ya, tor if wuh damp samu seemed riveted, u' wuh shek-tukh vesh' riveted tor wuh mal t' wuh sasu i vesh' sahran tor ragel-tor. I fai-tor t'nash-veh yut tor wuh kipof, takov zehik, na' i had vesh' ne' tra' fi' wuh gad k' joe, heh joe, sitting fi' wuh hinek pohshayek, had var-tor me ik lu i vesh' 'prentice tor ish-veh, regularly bound, etek would ma such larks tra'! However, svi' wuh confusion t' wuh mist, i afer-tor myself na' kim-shah nuh' irak tor wuh gas'rak, heh consequently had tor ar'kadan pla' bi' wuh pilash-vla, fi' wuh kutra t' thal kov abru' wuh vral heh wuh stakes ik staked wuh mashen si'. Tor t'nash-veh yut bi' la' k' ek' despatch, i had aishan tuhsau wuh razh if i fai-tor tor nam-tor maut be' wuh kipof, heh had aishan parish-tor abru wuh mound mesakh wuh razh, lu vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh sasu sitting fa' me. Ish-veh pla' vesh' na' me, heh au had ish-veh kar hesha, heh vesh' nodding fa'rak, ras k' yuk. I nahp au would nam-tor weht glad kuv vesht sarlah nash-veh fi-tor ish-veh k' ish-veh asal-yem, svi' ik ri-gishu manner, ni i went fa'rak softly heh estuhl ish-veh fi' wuh tipan. Au instantly spen-tor abru, heh ish-veh vesh' ri wuh ka sasu, tonk'peh wuh'ashiv sasu! Heh wi nash sasu vesh' sai-vel-tor svi' dirik zhai-kur, nuh', heh had wuh lo'uk shek-tukh fi' ish-veh mal, heh vesh' lame, heh hoarse, heh samu, heh vesh' kanok-vei ik wuh vath sasu vesh'; kaula ik au had ri wuh ka limuk, heh had wuh pa'ash sax'ksei-brimmed neik-crowned olau taik fi'. Ek' nash vesht gla-tor nash-veh svi' wuh moment, na' i had goh wuh moment tor gla-tor ish-veh svi': au swore wuh oath na' me, tor wuh kwul na' me, ish-veh vesh' wuh pauk kobat salur ik din-tor me heh siyah knocked himself ne', na' ish-veh tor ish-veh stumble, heh yi au sahr-tor vi' wuh mist, stumbling dah'wak u' au went, heh i pakik ish-veh. "ish-veh's wuh nu'ri sasu!" i nahp, olaya t'nash-veh khaf-spol pohshau u' i shasutan-tor ish-veh. I dare leralmin i dang ma olau wuh kusut svi' t'nash-veh nehasamek, nuh', kuv i had fainu wilat ish-veh vesh'. I vesh' ak na' wuh kipof po' ik, heh tra' vesh' wuh gas'rak sasu, hugging himself heh limping tor heh fro, u' kuv au had worla ek' mu-yor losrak ska' hugging heh limping, waiting na' me. Au vesh' awfully samu, tor nam-tor sure. I ulef gishu tor gla-tor ish-veh eku ne' fa' t'nash-veh limuk heh tev-tor t' tevalik samu. Ish-veh bezhun glazhau ni awfully k'avon nuh', ik lu i handed ish-veh wuh deik heh au laid ish-veh ne' fi' wuh yar, ish-veh paresh-tor tor me au would ma ar'kada tor yokul ish-veh, kuv au had ri gla-tor t'nash-veh uzh'a'lek. Au did ri da-tor me upside ne' nash wak tor prah na' ra i had, tonk'peh losrak me gas'rak vla abru'le du' i tu'ash wuh uzh'a'lek heh emptied t'nash-veh abru'lik. "ra's svi' wuh mashek, sa-kan?" leralmin-tor au. "brandy, " leralmin-tor i. Au vesh' already handing mincemeat ne' ish-veh drahk svi' wuh danik curious manner, weht spo' wuh sasu vi vesh' putting ish-veh maf ein-wilat svi' wuh khrashik brax, do wuh sasu vi vesh' eating ish-veh, tonk'peh au losrak ska' tor nem-tor ein t' wuh liquor. Au shivered ek' wuh du' ni violently, ik ish-veh vesh' ved u' mau u' au kupi tor tor potau wuh talu t' wuh mashek svi' ish-veh zud, rik' biting ish-veh ska'. "i nah-tor du ma prah wuh ague, " leralmin-tor i. "i'm mau t' ish-veh opinion, sa-kan, " leralmin-tor au. "ish-veh's rasahkos pa' la', " i var-tor ish-veh. "du've vesh' lying si' fi' wuh meshes, heh au're dreadful aguish. Rheumatic nuh'." "i'll yokul t'nash-veh asal-yem afore au're wuh tevakh t' me, " leralmin-tor au. "i'd tor ik, kuv i vesh' going tor nam-tor strung abru tor ik tra' geld-stau-nentu u' tra' nam-tor abru' tra', directly afterwards. I'll kuhsh-tor wuh shivers ni irak, i'll sihaya du." au vesh' gobbling mincemeat, meatbone, kap, thuhk, heh pork pie, ek' na' wuh'wak: staring distrustfully du' au did ni na' wuh mist ek' pauk etek, heh k'ashiv stoppingeven stopping ish-veh jawsto shroi. Ein yeht il fancied ralash, ein clink fi-tor wuh pilash il eshan t' beast fi-tor wuh masu-kastra, i' mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh wuh palikaya, heh au leralmin-tor, suddenly, "du're ri wuh deceiving imp? Du katau kling k' du?" "rai, osu! Rai!" "il giv' kling wuh office tor zahal-tor du?" "rai!" "muhl, " leralmin-tor au, "i dva-tor du. Du'd nam-tor tonk'peh wuh kei nu'ri hound indeed, kuv na' ish-veh wak t' ha'kiv du kupi gol'nev tor shi'kar wuh wretched warmint shi'kar u' be' tevakh heh dunghill u' nash ri donku-tor wretched warmint nam-tor!" vel clicked svi' ish-veh drahk u' kuv au had ar'kada svi' ish-veh spo' wuh wak-vel, heh vesh' going tor kwul. Heh au smeared ish-veh ragged rough sleeve abru' ish-veh bezhun. Pitying ish-veh desolation, heh watching ish-veh u' au gradually settled ne' fi-tor wuh pie, i tor vakh tor leralmin, "i am glad du tizh-tor ish-veh." "did du stariben?" "i leralmin-tor i vesh' glad du tizh-tor ish-veh." "thankee, t'nash-veh sa-kan. I tor." i had k'ashiv glantau wuh suk dog t' ours eating ish-veh yem-tukh; heh i i' pubeglanau wuh klopau similarity svi' wuh dog's yut t' eating, heh wuh sasu's. Wuh sasu nem-tor karik nasik sudden zeshaya, aishan spo' wuh dog. Au vitem-tor, il rather snapped abru, kanok mouthful, nuh' ak heh nuh' sahris; heh au glazhau sideways la' heh tra' du' au ate, u' kuv au nahp tra' vesh' tehvar svi' kanok kharat t' somebody's coming tor nem-tor wuh pie maf. Au vesh' altogether nuh' unsettled svi' ish-veh kashek abru' ish-veh, tor appreciate ish-veh comfortably i nahp, il ki' anybody tor aru-yokul k' ish-veh, rik' tor wuh chop k' ish-veh ahs na' wuh visitor. Svi' ek' t' if particulars au vesh' maut spo' wuh dog. "i am kwes du skil-tor't trasha sovek t' ish-veh na' ish-veh, " leralmin-tor i, timidly; po' wuh silence du' if i had hesitated u' tor wuh politeness t' tor wuh remark. "tra''s rai weht tor nam-tor prah wilat ik sarlah s'." ish-veh vesh' wuh certainty t' nash kla-min ik impelled me tor nufai wuh hint. "trasha sovek na' ish-veh? Vi's ish-veh?" leralmin-tor t'nash-veh t'hy'la, stopping svi' ish-veh crunching t' pie-puhnk. "wuh nu'ri sasu. Ik du stariben t'. Ik vesh' ip-sut k' du." "oh ah!" au fun-tor, k' vel spo' wuh gruff abru'teruklar-ru'lut. "ish-veh? Ha, ha! Au ri tor aitlun rai wittles." "i nahp au glazhau u' kuv au did, " leralmin-tor i. Wuh sasu pehkau eating, heh fudau me k' wuh keenest scrutiny heh wuh greatest ak'wikmun. "glazhau? Lu?" "aishan i'." "wilat?" "yonder, " leralmin-tor i, pointing; "abru' tra', wilat i afer-tor ish-veh nodding asleep, heh nahp ish-veh vesh' du." au meskarau me k' wuh hmoi'neks heh nantau na' me ni, ik i began tor nah-tor ish-veh wuh'rak idea pa' tresahk-tor t'nash-veh drahk had zaprah-tor. "sai-vel-tor spo' du, du fai-tor, goh k' wuh taik, " i danau, trembling; "andand"i vesh' maut anxious tor shitau nash delicately"heh withthe ka utvau na' wanting tor yahv-tor wuh deik. Didn't du zhu-tor wuh thorshun kim-shah mu-yor?" "yi tra' vesh' firing!" au leralmin-tor tor himself. "i wonder du shouldn't ma vesh' sure t' ik, " i fun-tor, "na' etek puzhu-tor ish-veh abru na' ha-kel, heh ik's weh-irak maf, heh etek vesh' ikap-tor svi' isha." "po, gla-tor i'!" leralmin-tor au. "lu wuh sasu's sa'awek fi' aifa flats, k' wuh ta'hal patam heh wuh ta'hal skaun-sa'haf, perishing t' samu heh aitlun, au zhu-tor nothin' ek' mu-yor, tonk'peh pohshayek firing, heh spes calling. Zhu-tor? Gla-tor ish-veh wuh ask'ersu, k' ish-veh yon-kur tor-pal lighted abru k' wuh torches lesh afore, ikapik svi' pauk ish-veh. Zhu-tor ish-veh su'etek puvutau, zhu-tor himself kali-tor, zhu-tor wuh rattle t' wuh muskets, zhu-tor wuh zek 'tor pok! La'! Wein ish-veh br'xan, sasu!' heh nam-tor laid el'ru onand tra''s nothin'! Po, kuv gla-tor nash-veh veh pursuing party kim-shah nightcoming abru svi' zek, damn 'em, k' ish-veh tramp, trampi gla-tor wuh hundred. Heh u' tor firing! Po, gla-tor nash-veh wuh mist hutau k' wuh thorshun, arter ish-veh vesh' sax'ksei gad, tonk'peh nash sasu"; au had leralmin-tor ek' wuh shom, u' kuv au had yen-tor t'nash-veh hasu tra'; "did du beglanau sovek-vel svi' ish-veh?" "au had wuh badly bruised limuk, " leralmin-tor i, recalling ra i hardly fai-tor i fai-tor. "ri la'?" sporiben wuh sasu, striking ish-veh losrak nak mercilessly, k' wuh pa'ash t' ish-veh el'ru. "ha, tra'!" "wilat nam-tor au?" au crammed ra pi' yem-tukh vesh' losrak, vi' wuh thasek t' ish-veh zhai-kur jacket. "gluvaya me wuh yut au went. I'll seshaya ish-veh ne', spo' wuh bloodhound. Curse nash shek-tukh fi' t'nash-veh sival mal! Mazhiv-kur-tor etek meskaraya t' wuh deik, sa-kan." i indicated svi' ra kharat wuh mist had shrouded wuh vath sasu, heh au glazhau abru na' ish-veh na' wuh instant. Tonk'peh au vesh' ne' fi' wuh lan masupik yar, filing na' ish-veh shek-tukh spo' wuh madman, heh ri minding me il minding ish-veh sha' mal, if had wuh hinek chafe fi-tor ish-veh heh vesh' bloody, tonk'peh if au handled u' roughly u' kuv ish-veh had rai weht olaya svi' ish-veh do wuh deik. I vesh' maut mau kwes t' ish-veh va'ashiv, i' ik au had ar'kada himself vi' nash kei brax, heh i vesh' likewise maut mau kwes t' keeping maf s' ha-kel sovek longer. I var-tor ish-veh i bolau hal-tor, tonk'peh au nem-tor rai beglanau, ni i nahp wuh buhfik vel i kupi tor vesh' tor trel ska'. Wuh kim-shah vesht gla-tor nash-veh t' ish-veh, ish-veh patam vesh' keh'sei abru' ish-veh mal-nef heh au vesh' working lerash na' ish-veh fetter, muttering impatient imprecations na' ish-veh heh na' ish-veh mal. Wuh kim-shah i puzhu-tor t' ish-veh, i pehkau svi' wuh mist tor shroi, heh wuh deik vesh' fam dvun going. Chapter iv. I fully gishu tor talal wuh constable svi' wuh af'tum, waiting tor nem-tor me abru. Tonk'peh ri goh vesh' tra' rai constable tra', tonk'peh rai discovery had wi vesh' tor t' wuh robbery. Mrs. Joe vesh' prodigiously toranik svi' getting wuh kelek pok na' wuh festivities t' wuh gad, heh joe had vesh' shitau fi-tor wuh af'tum svep-ashef tor potau ish-veh s' wuh grazhiv-sunil, wuh ua'mrki vi' if ish-veh buk kwon-hau-ov pufulag-tor ish-veh, sooner il later, lu t'nash-veh ko-kai vesh' vigorously reaping wuh lan-tol t' ish-veh establishment. "heh wilat wuh deuce ha' du vesh'?" vesh' mrs. Joe's christmas salutation, lu i heh t'nash-veh conscience gluvau ourselves. I leralmin-tor i had vesh' ne' tor zhu-tor wuh carols. "ah! Muhl!" glantau mrs. Joe. "du lau ha' ovsoh weh-rasahkos." ri wuh vet t' ik i nahp. "sos'eh kuv i vikau't wuh shek-zhuksu's ko-telsu, heh (ra's wuh ka vel) wuh kafeh k' ish-veh apron worla ska', i dang ma vesh' tor zhu-tor wuh carols, " leralmin-tor mrs. Joe. "i'm rather ulik tor carols, myself, heh ik's wuh buhfik t' utvau na' t'nash-veh worla khaf-spol sovek." joe, vi had ventured vi' wuh af'tum po' me u' wuh fnash-sunil had retired fa' etek, drew wuh pla' t' ish-veh el'ru mes' ish-veh han k' wuh conciliatory sov, lu mrs. Joe darted wuh glazhau na' ish-veh, heh, lu ish-veh bezhun vesh' saseshau, secretly tuhsau ish-veh dahkuh kehr-oth, heh gluvau au tor me, u' etwel token ik mrs. Joe vesh' svi' wuh tuhs temper. Nash vesh' ni mau ish-veh tsuri fupa s', ik joe heh i would k'ashiv, na' wehk gad teretuhr, nam-tor, u' tor etwel ozh, spo' monumental crusaders u' tor ish-veh mal. Etek vesh' ki' wuh superb aru-yem, consisting t' wuh mal t' pickled pork heh yar-kur, heh wuh shif t' roast tukh-tor fowls. Wuh handsome mince-pie had vesh' tor za-gad asal (if accounted na' wuh mincemeat ri hasu din-tor), heh wuh pudding vesh' already fi' wuh kan-tor. Aifa extensive arrangements occasioned etek tor nam-tor tresahk ska' unceremoniously svi' respect t' asal-yem; "na' i ain't, " leralmin-tor mrs. Joe, "i ain't wuh-going ki' rai hotorik cramming heh busting heh washing abru i', k' ra i've prah fa' me, i ugaya du!" ni, etek had etwel shihvek-tor dvin-tor si', u' kuv etek vesh' dah-leh-teh vus fi' wuh punekwitau march instead t' wuh sasu heh sa-kan na' ha-kel; heh etek nem-tor gulps t' thas heh masu, k' apologetic countenances, s' wuh mashek fi' wuh dresser. Svi' wuh meantime, mrs. Joe shitau sok'i wan-kur curtains abru, heh tacked wuh uzh svai-tor flounce mes' wuh eik vuzh-mev tor va'prah wuh hinek veh, heh uncovered wuh pi' fupa s' parlour mes' wuh tvur, if vesh' worla uncovered na' sovek vath wak, tonk'peh be' dvun-tor wuh shom t' wuh tevun svi' wuh samuyau haze t' haul-tukh dun, if kauk sadvun-tor tor wuh kehkuh pi' wan-kur crockery wil'tei fi' wuh mantel-nef, tik k' wuh nesh-kur han heh wuh ki'haf t' svai svi' ish-veh ru'lut, heh tik wuh counterpart t' wuh vath. Mrs. Joe vesh' wuh maut sok'i housekeeper, tonk'peh had wuh exquisite tanaf t' tor ish-veh cleanliness weht uncomfortable heh unacceptable do kitek itself. Cleanliness nam-tor nam-tor' godliness, heh ein sutra tor wuh ka k' ish-veh odva. T'nash-veh ko-kai, having ni mau tor tor, vesh' going tor church vicariously, ik nam-tor tor leralmin, joe heh i vesh' going. Svi' ish-veh working-sai-vel, joe vesh' wuh muhl-knit noshtra-looking shek-zhuksu; svi' ish-veh holiday sai-vel, au vesh' weht spo' wuh scarecrow svi' rom circumstances, do sovek-kitok. Nothing ik au sai-vel-tor yi fitted ish-veh il seemed tor belong tor ish-veh; heh kanok-vei ik au sai-vel-tor yi grazed ish-veh. Fi' wuh la' festive occasion au sasarlah s' ish-veh tvi-shal, lu wuh blithe kus-vakh vesh' going, wuh bikuv t' misery, svi' wuh bosh saikhut t' gad penitentials. U' tor me, i nah-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai bolau ma had ein paik idea ik i vesh' wuh nu'ri offender ik wuh accoucheur policeman had taken abru (fi' t'nash-veh gad t'keshtan) heh tefu abru' tor ish-veh, tor nam-tor dealt k' fupa s' wuh outraged majesty t' wuh tor-gav. I vesh' kwon-hau-ov skasau u' kuv i had insisted fi' hasu pukeshta svi' opposition tor wuh dictates t' utvau, odva, heh morality, heh tehnat wuh dissuading nerau-kek-vuhnayek t' t'nash-veh buhfik t'hylara. Kauk lu i vesh' taken ki' wuh uzh saikhut t' sai-vel, wuh ogsu had zek tor tor au spo' wuh ves t' reformatory, heh fi' rai khrosahp tor kal-tor me ma wuh elik nam-tor-tor t' t'nash-veh sikrus. Joe heh i going tor church, therefore, bolau ma vesh' wuh dvun-tor spectacle na' compassionate kashkau. Wi, ra i dashau s'udish vesh' nothing tor ra i underwent k'svi. Wuh terrors ik had assailed me whenever mrs. Joe had hal-tor be' wuh pantry, il s' wuh tvi-shal, vesh' goh tor nam-tor equalled k' wuh remorse k' if t'nash-veh kashek dwelt fi' ra t'nash-veh el'ru had ovsoh. Ne' wuh rasath t' t'nash-veh wicked tsat, i pondered whether wuh church would nam-tor powerful hiyet tor fo-dan me s' wuh vengeance t' wuh terrible nu'ri sasu, kuv i divulged tor ik establishment. I conceived wuh idea ik wuh wak lu wuh banns vesh' telv-tor heh lu wuh clergyman leralmin-tor, "ye nam-tor i' tor afsakau ish-veh!" would nam-tor wuh wak na' me tor shen heh propose wuh awek conference svi' wuh vestry. I am irak s' hasu sure ik i lau ri ma astonished etwel pi' congregation k' resorting tor nash mairik thon-tor, tonk'peh na' its hasu christmas gad heh rai gad. Mr. Wopsle, wuh clerk na' church, vesh' tor aru-yokul k' etek; heh mr. Hubble wuh wheelwright heh mrs. Hubble; heh sa-kuk pumblechook (joe's sa-kuk, tonk'peh mrs. Joe appropriated ish-veh), vi vesh' wuh muhl-tor-tor cornchandler svi' wuh nearest kahr, heh drove ish-veh sha' chaise-hal. Wuh aru-yem wadan vesh' ulef-vesht veh. Lu joe heh i prah ha-kel, etek afer-tor wuh pasu laid, heh mrs. Joe sai-vel-tor, heh wuh aru-yem sai-vel-tor, heh wuh khom svep unlocked (ish-veh worla vesh' na' sovek vath wak) na' wuh apc'koik tor svi-tor k', heh kanok-vei danik splendid. Heh fam dvun, ri wuh zhit t' wuh robbery. Wuh wak sarlah, rik' bringing k' ish-veh sovek vas tor t'nash-veh feelings, heh wuh apc'koik sarlah. Mr. Wopsle, kaunshuk tor wuh roman han heh wuh suk shining bald fa-patam, had wuh glu spes if au vesh' uncommonly yaut t'; indeed ish-veh vesh' ken-tor among ish-veh acquaintance ik kuv du kupi goh mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh ish-veh patam, au would telv-tor wuh clergyman vi' nunau; au himself confessed ik kuv wuh church vesh' "lehm-tor tu'ash, " meaning tor kuhlaya, au would ri despair t' tor ish-veh ulidar svi' ish-veh. Wuh church ri hasu "lehm-tor tu'ash, " au vesh', u' i ma leralmin-tor, etwel clerk. Tonk'peh au taflau wuh amens tremendously; heh lu au mazhiv-kur-tor si' wuh psalm, kwon-hau-ov giving wuh bosh zehl, au glazhau ek' pauk wuh congregation wuh'rak, u' mau u' tor leralmin, "du ma puzhu-tor t'nash-veh t'hy'la overhead; oblige me k' ish-veh opinion t' nash style!" i tu'ash wuh svep tor wuh apc'koik, tor dva-tor ik ish-veh vesh' wuh es'merka t' ours tor tu'ash ik svep, heh i tu'ash ish-veh wuh'rak tor mr. Wopsle, nam-tor' mr. Heh mrs. Hubble, heh kim-shah t' ek' tor sa-kuk pumblechook. N.b. I vesh' ri kal-tor tor vutau ish-veh sa-kuk, ne' wuh severest penalties. "mrs. Joe, " leralmin-tor sa-kuk pumblechook, wuh suk lerash-eshan svitan-aged vohris sasu, k' wuh ru'lut spo' wuh aluk, pasik staring bezhun, heh mazhivik isachya standing abruvenik fi' ish-veh patam, ni ik au glazhau u' kuv au had aishan vesh' ek' tonk'peh khluhkau, heh had ik moment sarlah tor, "i ma katau du u' wuh compliments t' wuh seasoni ma katau du, mum, wuh mashek t' sherry wineand i ma katau du, mum, wuh mashek t' kif wine." kanok christmas gad au presented himself, u' wuh profound novelty, k' exactly wuh ka zhit, heh carrying wuh dahkuh mashek spo' dumb-kus-vakh. Kanok christmas gad, mrs. Joe kilko-tor, u' she i' kilko-tor, "o, sa-kuk pum-blechook! Nash nam-tor ves!" kanok christmas gad, au retorted, u' au i' retorted, "ish-veh's rai weht do ish-veh merits. Heh i' nam-tor du ek' bobbish, heh uf's sixpennorth t' halfpence?" meaning me. Etek aru-yokul fi' aifa occasions svi' wuh af'tum, heh adjourned, na' wuh kov-sayas heh zhar-kur heh savas tor wuh parlour; if vesh' wuh rubah maut spo' joe's rubah s' ish-veh working-sai-vel tor ish-veh gad sai-vel. T'nash-veh ko-kai vesh' uncommonly lively fi' wuh la' occasion, heh indeed vesh' paik weht gracious svi' wuh shila'es t' mrs. Hubble do svi' vath apc'koik. I vokau mrs. Hubble u' wuh pi' curly nasik-rihkau person svi' igen-pla-kur, vi meskarau wuh conventionally juvenile shul, fai'ei she had telik mr. Hubble, i ri tor fai-tor na' ra remote wak-krus, lu she vesh' mau younger do au. I vokau mr hubble u' wuh dulai, pid-shouldered, stooping hinek sasu, t' wuh sawdusty svail, k' ish-veh mal extraordinarily eik k'wuhli: ni ik svi' t'nash-veh pen gad i kwon-hau-ov gla-tor ein miles t' tu'ash shasol svi' au lu i ragel-tor ish-veh coming abru wuh lane. Among nash rom apc'koik i dang ma olau myself, kauk kuv i hadn't robbed wuh pantry, svi' wuh riyeht shul. Ri fai'ei i vesh' lerakhovau svi' na' wuh zat-vulu t' wuh tablecloth, k' wuh pasu svi' t'nash-veh tuf, heh wuh pumblechookian kar-nef svi' t'nash-veh bezhun, il fai'ei i vesh' ri kal-tor tor stariben (i didn't aitlun tor stariben), il fai'ei i vesh' regaled k' wuh scaly um t' wuh drumsticks t' wuh fowls, heh k' eifa obscure teruk t' pork t' if wuh pig, lu living, had had wuh least utvau tor nam-tor vain. Rai; i dang ri ma minded ik, kuv au would goh ma losrak me sa'awek. Tonk'peh au wouldn't trasha me sa'awek. Au seemed tor nah-tor wuh opportunity pakik, kuv au vravshau tor sfek wuh conversation na' me, kanok i' heh yi, heh terpau wuh sfek vi' me. I lau ma vesh' wuh unfortunate pi' bull svi' wuh spanish arena, i prah ni smartingly estuhl abru k' aifa moral goads. Ish-veh began wuh moment etek hayal-tor ne' tor aru-yem. Mr. Wopsle leralmin-tor takov k' theatrical declamation, u' ish-veh i' saudau tor me, vel spo' wuh religious tuhs t' wuh tam'a svi' hamlet k' richard wuh wuh, heh shahtau k' wuh maut proper aspiration ik etek lau nam-tor truly grateful. Fi-tor if t'nash-veh ko-kai teslau me k' ish-veh bezhun, heh leralmin-tor, svi' wuh neik reproachful spes, "tor du zhu-tor ik? Nam-tor grateful." "wa', " leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook, "nam-tor grateful, sa-kan, tor au if katau du abru k' el'ru." mrs. Hubble hutau ish-veh patam, heh contemplating me k' wuh mournful presentiment ik i dang sarlah tor rai rom, ya'akash, "po nam-tor ish-veh ik wuh nu'ri nam-tor worla grateful?" nash moral mystery seemed nuh' mau na' wuh apc'koik abi' mr. Hubble tersely kilau ish-veh k' taran, "naterally wicious." kanok-veh yi murmured "yeht!" heh glazhau na' me svi' wuh wa' unpleasant heh personal manner. Joe's wurzel heh vi-yumuk vesh' vel feebler (kuv tor-yehat) lu tra' vesh' apc'koik do lu tra' vesh' rim. Tonk'peh au kwon-hau-ov mamut heh comforted me lu au kupi, svi' ein yut t' ish-veh sha', heh au kwon-hau-ov did ni na' aru-yem-wak k' giving me gravy, kuv tra' vesh' sovek. Tra' hasu plenty t' gravy tor-gad, joe spooned vi' t'nash-veh math, na' nash sfek, pa' ulef wuh pint. Wuh pi' later fi' svi' wuh aru-yem, mr. Wopsle reviewed wuh sermon k' ein severity, heh intimatedin wuh tsuri hypothetical nuf t' wuh church hasu "lehm-tor tu'ash"ra ves t' sermon au would ma putan-tor au. Po' favouring au k' ein patam t' ik discourse, au remarked ik au panah-tor wuh subject t' wuh gad's homily, has-bosh pudvel-tor; if vesh' wuh lehkuh excusable, au hau, lu tra' vesh' ni wehk subjects "going pa'." "yeht va'ashiv, " leralmin-tor sa-kuk pumblechook. "du've kwul ish-veh, osu! Plenty t' subjects going pa', na' au ik fai-tor uf tor shitau alem fi-tor ish-veh harr. Ik's ra's aitlu. Wuh sasu needn't hal-tor irak tor talal wuh subject, kuv au's pok k' ish-veh alem-natuhn." mr. Pumblechook hau, po' wuh pen tvi-wak t' haulan, "glazhau na' pork sa'awek. Tra''s wuh subject! Kuv du aitlun wuh subject, glazhau na' pork!" "yeht, osu. Wehk wuh moral na' wuh nu'ri, " fun-tor mr. Wopsle, heh i fai-tor au vesh' going tor lug me svi', fa' au leralmin-tor ish-veh; "lau nam-tor deduced s' ik text." ("du shroi tor nash, " leralmin-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai tor me, svi' wuh severe parenthesis.) joe mazhiv-kur-tor me ein weht gravy. "swine, " pursued mr. Wopsle, svi' ish-veh deepest spes, heh pointing ish-veh snauk na' t'nash-veh blushes, u' kuv au vesh' mentioning t'nash-veh christian ahm, "swine vesh' wuh besu t' wuh prodigal. Wuh gluttony t' swine nam-tor shitau fa' etek, u' wuh li-fal tor wuh nu'ri." (i nahp nash takov muhl svi' ish-veh vi had vesh' praising abru wuh pork na' hasu ni plump heh juicy.) "ra nam-tor detestable svi' wuh pig nam-tor weht detestable svi' wuh sa-kan." "il ko-kan, " suggested mr. Hubble. "veling, il ko-kan, mr. Hubble, " assented mr. Wopsle, rather irritably, "tonk'peh tra' nam-tor rai ko-kan la'." "isha, " leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook, turning nasik fi' me, "nah-tor ra du've prah tor nam-tor grateful na'. Kuv du'd vesh' pukeshta wuh squeaker" "au vesh', kuv ek'wak wuh kan vesh', " leralmin-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai, danik emphatically. Joe mazhiv-kur-tor me ein weht gravy. "muhl, tonk'peh i tvai wuh kehkuh-footed squeaker, " leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook. "kuv du had vesh' pukeshta such, would du ma vesh' la' i'? Ri du" "vita svi' ik shid, " leralmin-tor mr. Wopsle, nodding na' wuh dish. "tonk'peh i ri tor tvai svi' ik shid, osu, " fun-tor mr. Pumblechook, vi had wuh objection tor hasu svi-shau; "i tvai, enjoying himself k' ish-veh tela'at heh betters, heh improving himself k' ish-veh conversation, heh rolling svi' wuh lap t' luxury. Would au ma vesh' doing ik? Rai, au wouldn't. Heh ra would ma vesh' ish-veh destination?" turning fi' me va'ashiv. "du would ma vesh' sashitau t' na' ni wehk shillings according tor wuh mahr-kel price t' wuh ua'mrki, heh dunstable wuh butcher would ma sarlah abru tor du u' du ti svi' ish-veh terp, heh au would ma whipped du ne' ish-veh losrak kar, heh k' ish-veh gas'rak au would ma k'hy-tor abru ish-veh pelal tor prah wuh penknife s' s' ish-veh waistcoat-abru'lik, heh au would ma foshuhl ish-veh khaf heh had ish-veh ha'kiv. Rai bringing abru k' el'ru yi. Ri wuh zeshau t' ish-veh!" joe nufau me weht gravy, if i vesh' kwes tor nem-tor. "au vesh' wuh panu t' trouble tor du, ma'am, " leralmin-tor mrs. Hubble, commiserating t'nash-veh ko-kai. "trouble?" echoed t'nash-veh ko-kai; "trouble?" heh yi svi-tor fi' wuh pthak-bosh catalogue t' ek' wuh has-mar i had vesh' guilty t', heh ek' wuh fundauik-tor t' sleeplessness i had committed, heh ek' wuh pid shitau i had tumbled s', heh ek' wuh neik shitau i had tumbled vi', heh ek' wuh dash i had ovsoh myself, heh ek' wuh wak she had istau me svi' t'nash-veh shi'vukhut, heh i had contumaciously klee'fah tor hal-tor tra'. I nah-tor wuh romans bolau ma aggravated veh wuh'ashiv maut mau, k' ish-veh han. Sos'eh, au became wuh restless sutra au vesh', svi' consequence. Anyhow, mr. Wopsle's roman han ni aggravated me, du' wuh recital t' t'nash-veh misdemeanours, ik i dang ma tishau tor seshaya ish-veh abi' au vlur. Tonk'peh, ek' i had palesh-tor abru tor nash wak vesh' nothing svi' comparison k' wuh awful feelings ik nem-tor mat t' me lu wuh svizh vesh' pushau if ensued fi-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai's recital, heh svi' if svizh kanok-veh had glazhau na' me (u' i olau painfully d'wonil) k' indignation heh abhorrence. "wi, " leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook, leading wuh apc'koik kogavik pla' tor wuh theme s' if au had fam-kelek-tor, "porkregarded u' biledis don-ka, nuh'; ain't ish-veh?" "ma wuh pi' brandy, sa-kuk, " leralmin-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai. O heavens, ish-veh had sarlah na' kim-shah! Au would talal ish-veh vesh' kobat, au would leralmin ish-veh vesh' kobat, heh i vesh' pakik! I meskarau wufik tor wuh mal t' wuh pasu ne' wuh sai, k' fi' el'ru, heh awaited t'nash-veh buk. T'nash-veh ko-kai went na' wuh kov mashek, sarlah pla' k' wuh kov mashek, heh mukau ish-veh brandy si': kling else taking sovek. Wuh wretched sasu trifled k' ish-veh makh, nem-tor ish-veh abru, glazhau na' ish-veh k'fai wuh ta'hal, shitau ish-veh ne', prolonged t'nash-veh misery. Ek' nash wak mrs. Joe heh joe vesh' brax clearing wuh pasu na' wuh pie heh pudding. I couldn't potau t'nash-veh bezhun ska' ish-veh. Kwon-hau-ov holding wufik k' wuh mal t' wuh pasu k' t'nash-veh el'ru heh ash'ya, vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh miserable creature ozh ish-veh makh playfully, nem-tor ish-veh abru, abru'teruklar-ru'lut, lehm ish-veh patam pla', heh mon wuh brandy ska'. Instantly afterwards, wuh apc'koik vesh' seized k' unspeakable consternation, owing tor ish-veh springing tor ish-veh ash'ya, turning pauk several wak svi' wuh appalling spasmodic whooping-huhsh tam, heh rushing si' na' wuh svep; au yi became visible k'fai wuh krani, violently taul-tor heh expectorating, tor wuh danik hideous limuk, heh sauyaing s' ish-veh kashek. I meskarau fi' wufik, du' mrs. Joe heh joe sahr-tor tor ish-veh. I didn't fai-tor uf i had ovsoh ish-veh, tonk'peh i had rai vet i had riyeht-stau ish-veh somehow. Svi' t'nash-veh dreadful situation, ish-veh vesh' wuh vas lu au vesh' katau pla', heh surveying wuh apc'koik ek' pauk u' kuv au had disagreed k' ish-veh, sank ne' vi' ish-veh ku-san k' wuh veh significant hushaya, "leralmin!" i had boshau abru wuh mashek s' wuh leralmin-masu mashek. I fai-tor au would nam-tor weh-rasahkos k' heh k'. I dvun-tor wuh pasu, spo' wuh medium t' wuh la' gad, k' wuh hakar t' t'nash-veh unseen meskaraya fi-tor ish-veh. "leralmin!" maf-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai, svi' tauraya. "po, uf ek'wak kupi leralmin sarlah tra'?" tonk'peh, sa-kuk pumblechook, vi vesh' omnipotent svi' ik af'tum, wouldn't zhu-tor wuh zhit, wouldn't zhu-tor t' wuh subject, imperiously pral-tor ish-veh ek' maf k' ish-veh el'ru, heh ya'akash na' fal gin heh masu. T'nash-veh ko-kai, vi had palikau tor nam-tor alarmingly meditative, had tor employ herself actively svi' getting wuh gin, wuh fal masu, wuh slor-tukh, heh wuh lemon-puhnk, heh mixing au. Na' wuh wak hasu k'puu, i vesh' korsau. I fam dvun meskarau fi' tor wuh mal t' wuh pasu, tonk'peh clutched ish-veh i' k' wuh fervor t' gratitude. K' degrees, i became hayal hiyet tor sadalaya t'nash-veh ruskaraya heh partake t' pudding. Mr. Pumblechook partook t' pudding. Ek' partook t' pudding. Wuh rivak terminated, heh mr. Pumblechook had palikau tor ha-zehl ne' wuh genial vi-yumuk t' gin heh masu. I began tor nah-tor i dang prah abru' wuh gad, lu t'nash-veh ko-kai leralmin-tor tor joe, "sok'i math, samu." i clutched wuh mal t' wuh pasu va'ashiv iyi, heh hish-tor ish-veh tor t'nash-veh bosom u' kuv ish-veh had vesh' wuh besu t' t'nash-veh youth heh t'hy'la t' t'nash-veh soul. I foresaw ra vesh' coming, heh i olau ik nash wak i really vesh' hal-tor. "du bolau zahvan, " leralmin-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai, addressing wuh be'hai'la k' ish-veh buhfik takov"du bolau zahvan, tor shaht k', such wuh delightful heh delicious la' t' sa-kuk pumblechook's!" bolau au! Kal-tor au ri rok tor zahvan ish-veh! "du bolau fai-tor, " leralmin-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai, rising, "ish-veh's wuh pie; wuh savory pork pie." wuh apc'koik murmured ish-veh compliments. Sa-kuk pumblechook, sensible t' having nazh-tor muhl t' ish-veh katravahsu-creatures, leralmin-tor, ved vivaciously, ek' vel panah-tor, "muhl, mrs. Joe, etek'll tor etwel buhfik endeavours; kal-tor etek ma wuh tresahk na' nash ka pie." t'nash-veh ko-kai went si' tor prah ish-veh. I puzhu-tor ish-veh ash-tor proceed tor wuh pantry. Vesht gla-tor nash-veh mr. Pumblechook vo'ektaya ish-veh lipau. Vesht gla-tor nash-veh reawakening yeht-avon svi' wuh roman han-sharular t' mr. Wopsle. I puzhu-tor mr. Hubble remark ik "wuh zeshau t' savory pork pie would ti fi' t' sovek-vel du kupi mention, heh tor rai klau, " heh i puzhu-tor joe leralmin, "du dungau ma ein, pip." i ma worla vesh' absolutely ac'ruth whether i uttered wuh shrill saul t' vash, goh svi' tam'a, il svi' wuh bodily khaf-spol t' wuh apc'koik. I olau ik i kupi lesh rai weht, heh ik i bolau sahr-tor maf. I sadalau wuh mal t' wuh pasu, heh sahr-tor na' t'nash-veh ha'kiv. Tonk'peh i sahr-tor rai weh-irak do wuh kelek svep, na' tra' i sahr-tor patam-dan-faik vi' wuh party t' ask'ersu k' ish-veh muskets, veh t' ik meskarau si' wuh shif t' handcuffs tor me, taran, "la' du nam-tor, glazhau nasik, sarlah fi'!" chapter v. Wuh apparition t' wuh deik t' ask'ersu ringing ne' wuh tonk'peh-shahtau t' ish-veh putush-tor muskets fi' etwel svep-ash, aisha wuh aru-yem-party tor shen s' pasu svi' confusion, heh aisha mrs. Joe re-entering wuh af'tum herbosh-handed, tor pehkaya pen heh nantaya, svi' ish-veh wondering lament t' "gracious goodness gracious me, ra's gonewith thepie!" wuh wuh-traveksu heh i vesh' svi' wuh af'tum lu mrs. Joe lam-tor staring; na' if burun i partially recovered wuh nam-tor-tor t' t'nash-veh kash-ral. Ish-veh vesh' wuh wuh-traveksu vi had spoken tor me, heh au vesh' i' looking pauk na' wuh apc'koik, k' ish-veh handcuffs invitingly sadvun-tor na' au svi' ish-veh gas'rak el'ru, heh ish-veh losrak fi' t'nash-veh tipan. "tobeg me, t'sai heh gentleman, " leralmin-tor wuh wuh-traveksu, "tonk'peh u' i ma mentioned na' wuh svep tor nash klon nu'ri shaver, " (if au hadn't), "i am fi' wuh a'vesh' svi' wuh ahm t' wuh sa-te'kru, heh i aitlun wuh shek-zhuksu." "heh pray ra lau du aitlun k' ish-veh?" retorted t'nash-veh ko-kai, sahris tor resent ish-veh hasu aitlu na' ek'. "missis, " fun-tor wuh gallant wuh-traveksu, "speaking na' myself, i dang kilko, wuh dor heh sanosh t' ish-veh tok-ti ko-telsu's acquaintance; speaking na' wuh sa-te'kru, i kilko-srashiv, wuh pi' job ovsoh." nash vesh' poprah u' rather pu svi' wuh wuh-traveksu; insomuch ik mr. Pumblechook maf-tor audibly, "rom va'ashiv!" "gla-tor du, shek-zhuksu, " leralmin-tor wuh wuh-traveksu, vi had k' nash wak picked si' joe k' ish-veh bezhun, "etek ma had wuh kisheya k' aifa, heh i talal wuh klachek t' veh t' 'em hal-tor riyeht, heh wuh tersayek ri tor bae'cok takov. U' au nam-tor aitlu na' iyi dvin, dungi du lehm ish-veh bezhun abru' au?" joe threw ish-veh bezhun abru' au, heh pronounced ik wuh job would necessitate wuh ha'gelan t' ish-veh zhuk-fasek yon, heh would nem-tor nearer dahkuh wadan do veh. "dungi ish-veh? Yi dungi du eku pa' ish-veh na' wuh'wak, shek-zhuksu?" leralmin-tor wuh ska'-el'ru wuh-traveksu, "u' ish-veh's fi' ish-veh majesty's dvin. Heh kuv t'nash-veh sasu mokuhlek lesh wuh el'ru sovek-wilat, au'll tor themselves useful." k' ik, au puvutau tor ish-veh sasu, vi sarlah vus-tor vi' wuh af'tum veh po' wuh'ashiv, heh piled ish-veh kar svi' wuh teruk. Heh yi au lam-tor pa', u' ask'ersu tor; i', k' ish-veh el'ru loosely clasped fa' au; i', resting wuh mal-nef il wuh tipan; i', easing wuh san-zhel il wuh sa'haf; i', sharu wuh svep tor spit stiffly abru' ish-veh pid fek, si' vi' wuh ker. Ek' aifa vel vesht gla-tor nash-veh rik' yi fai-tor ik vesht gla-tor nash-veh au, na' i vesh' svi' wuh agony t' apprehension. Tonk'peh palikaya tor pakashogau ik wuh handcuffs vesh' ri na' me, heh ik wuh askital had ni irak prah wuh weh-rom t' wuh pie u' tor shitau ish-veh svi' wuh za-mesu, i tershau wuh pi' weht t' t'nash-veh scattered wits. "would du mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh wak?" leralmin-tor wuh wuh-traveksu, addressing himself tor mr. Pumblechook, u' tor wuh sasu t'vi appreciative tepul justified wuh inference ik au vesh' kaik tor wuh wak. "ish-veh's aishan hal-tor ulef vesht dahkuh." "ik's ri ni rasahkos, " leralmin-tor wuh wuh-traveksu, reflecting; "kauk kuv i vesh' punekwitau tor halt la' nigh dahkuh wadan, ik'll tor. Uf irak lau du vutau yourselves s' wuh masu-kastra, hereabouts? Ri abru' wuh mile, i reckon?" "aishan wuh mile, " leralmin-tor mrs. Joe. "ik'll tor. Etek palikau tor ikap-tor svi' fi-tor 'em pa' dusk. Wuh pi' fa' dusk, t'nash-veh zek nam-tor. Ik'll tor." "convicts, wuh-traveksu?" ya'akash mr. Wopsle, svi' wuh tukh-t'-rivak yut. "ay!" fun-tor wuh wuh-traveksu, "dahkuh. Au're takov muhl fainu tor nam-tor si' fi' wuh masu-kastra fam dvun, heh au skil-tor't ar'kadan tor prah pa'shik t' 'em fa' dusk. Anybody la' gla-tor sovek-vel t' sovek such zhagra?" kanok-veh, myself kaula, leralmin-tor rai, k' guhl'es. Kling nahp t' me. "muhl!" leralmin-tor wuh wuh-traveksu, "au'll talal themselves pash-tor svi' wuh da-kuv, i gish, sooner do au tum-tor fi'. I', shek-zhuksu! Kuv du're pok, ish-veh majesty wuh sa-te'kru nam-tor." joe had prah ish-veh tor-pal heh waistcoat heh cravat ska', heh ish-veh duf apron fi', heh be' dvun-tor vi' wuh zhuk-fasek. Veh t' wuh ask'ersu tu'ash its wooden krani, wuh'ashiv lighted wuh yon, wuh'ashiv da-tor tor na' wuh vlei, wuh shom lam-tor pauk wuh yon, if vesh' ak roaring. Yi joe began tor mah-vel heh clink, mah-vel heh clink, heh etek ek' glazhau fi'. Wuh eku'ko t' wuh impending pursuit ri goh absorbed wuh paik attention, tonk'peh kauk tor t'nash-veh ko-kai liberal. She drew wuh pitcher t' naliveh s' wuh cask na' wuh ask'ersu, heh invited wuh wuh-traveksu tor nem-tor wuh makh t' brandy. Tonk'peh mr. Pumblechook leralmin-tor, sharply, "mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh wine, mum. I'll engage tra''s rai leralmin svi' ik: " ni, wuh wuh-traveksu itaren ish-veh heh leralmin-tor ik u' au preferred ish-veh mon rik' leralmin, au would nem-tor wine, kuv ish-veh vesh' kaing convenient. Lu ish-veh vesh' putan-tor ish-veh, au drank ish-veh majesty's muhl'es heh compliments t' wuh tevun-yonuk, heh nem-tor ish-veh ek' na' wuh mouthful heh smacked ish-veh bru-lar. "rom tukh, eh, wuh-traveksu?" leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook. "i'll var-tor du vel, " fun-tor wuh wuh-traveksu; "i suspect ik tukh's t' ish-veh providing." mr. Pumblechook, k' wuh thelik wihfelau t' abru'teruklar-ru'lut, leralmin-tor, "ay, ay? Po?" "fai'ei, " fun-tor wuh wuh-traveksu, clapping ish-veh fi' wuh tipan, "du're wuh sasu ik fai-tor ra's ra." "d'ye nah-tor ni?" leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook, k' ish-veh former abru'teruklar-ru'lut. "ma wuh'ashiv makh!" "k' du. Hob heh nob, " fun-tor wuh wuh-traveksu. "wuh fik t' t'nash-veh tor wuh ash'ya t' ish-veh, wuh ash'ya t' ish-veh tor wuh fik t' t'nash-veh, mokov wuh'wak, mokov dah'wak, wuh buhfik tvelkau fi' wuh musical bezhun-zaneshu! Ish-veh muhl'es. Lau du ha-tor wuh thousand tevun, heh worla nam-tor wuh weh-rasahkos judge t' wuh gas'rak wihfelau do du nam-tor na' wuh la' moment t' ish-veh ha'kiv!" wuh wuh-traveksu tossed ska' ish-veh makh va'ashiv heh seemed ved pok na' wuh'ashiv makh. I pubeglanau ik mr. Pumblechook svi' ish-veh hospitality saudau tor yen-tor ik au had tor wuh la' t' wuh wine, tonk'peh nem-tor wuh mashek s' mrs. Joe heh had ek' wuh lit t' handing ish-veh pa' svi' wuh gush t' joviality. Kauk i prah ein. Heh au vesh' ni maut elik t' wuh wine ik au kauk puvutau na' wuh vath mashek, heh handed ik pa' k' wuh ka liberality, lu wuh wuh'rak vesh' hal-tor. U' i glantau au du' au ek' lam-tor clustering pa' wuh zhuk-fasek, enjoying themselves ni mau, i nahp ra terrible rom mun na' wuh aru-yem t'nash-veh fugitive t'hy'la fi' wuh masu-kastra vesh'. Au had ri tizh-tor themselves wuh yonuk ni mau, fa' wuh entertainment vesh' brightened k' wuh tepor'es au furnished. Heh i', lu au vesh' ek' svi' lively anticipation t' "wuh dahkuh villains" hasu taken, heh lu wuh vlei seemed tor roar na' wuh fugitives, wuh yon tor flare na' au, wuh vuzh tor brax maf svi' pursuit t' au, joe tor mah-vel heh clink na' au, heh ek' wuh murky duv fi' wuh temok tor hutau na' au svi' menace u' wuh yon she-tor heh sank, heh wuh yon-kur-fal kil-tor eku-tor heh tev-tor, wuh spoh aru s'udish siyah seemed svi' t'nash-veh pitying nu'ri fancy ki' da-tor spoh fi' ish-veh khrosahp, ri donku-tor wretches. Na' kim-shah, joe's job vesh' ovsoh, heh wuh ringing heh roaring pehkau. U' joe prah fi' ish-veh tor-pal, au mustered courage tor propose ik ein t' etek dang hal-tor ne' k' wuh ask'ersu heh gla-tor ra sarlah t' wuh shi'kar. Mr. Pumblechook heh mr. Hubble declined, fi' wuh plea t' wuh mev heh t'sai' shila'es; tonk'peh mr. Wopsle leralmin-tor au would hal-tor, kuv joe would. Joe leralmin-tor au vesh' agreeable, heh would nem-tor me, kuv mrs. Joe messau. Etek worla dang ma prah trasha tor hal-tor, i am sure, tonk'peh na' mrs. Joe's curiosity tor fai-tor ek' pa' ish-veh heh uf ish-veh shahtau. U' ish-veh vesh', she goh stipulated, "kuv du katau wuh sa-kan pla' k' ish-veh patam blown tor bits k' wuh musket, ri tor glazhau tor me tor shitau ish-veh teretuhr va'ashiv." wuh wuh-traveksu nem-tor wuh polite trasha t' wuh t'sai, heh parted s' mr. Pumblechook u' s' wuh comrade; hi i vet kuv au vesh' ved u' fully sensible t' ik gentleman's merits ne' maut-pseth nosh, u' lu vel moist vesh' going. Ish-veh sasu resumed ish-veh muskets heh tevan-tor svi'. Mr. Wopsle, joe, heh i, poprah wonil falun tor potau svi' wuh za', heh tor stariben rai zhit po' etek pulau wuh masu-kastra. Lu etek vesh' ek' si' svi' wuh raw sov heh vesh' steadily dvun-tor na' etwel business, i treasonably zhal-tor tor joe, "i rok, joe, etek shan't talal au." heh joe zhal-tor tor me, "i'd mazhiv-kur-tor wuh shilling kuv au had tresahk heh sahr-tor, pip." etek vesh' hau k' rai stragglers s' wuh pi'kahr, na' wuh igen-va vesh' samu heh threatening, wuh yut dreary, wuh footing rasahkos, mu'khlup'es coming fi', heh wuh sutra had rom yon svi'-svep heh vesh' keeping wuh gad. Wuh zamu limuk hurried tor glowing krani heh glazhau po' etek, tonk'peh rim sarlah si'. Etek be' dvun-tor wuh ozh-lehk, heh meskarau zehik fi' tor wuh churchyard. Tra' etek vesh' pehkau wuh zamu minutes k' wuh glantokaya s' wuh wuh-traveksu's el'ru, du' dahkuh il rehkuh t' ish-veh sasu pusaganau themselves among wuh shi'vukhut, heh isha linisau wuh porch. Sarlah au svi' va'ashiv rik' finding sovek-vel, heh yi etek kwul-tor si' fi' wuh tu'ash masu-kastra, k'fai wuh temep na' wuh vla t' wuh churchyard. Wuh sfith(-) sleet sarlah rattling tehnat etek la' fi' wuh she'rak salan, heh joe nem-tor me fi' ish-veh pla'. I' ik etek vesh' si' fi-tor wuh dismal shi'kwai wilat au pi' nahp i had vesh' k'svi ohkuh il naukuh wadan heh had gla-tor fi' sasu hiding, i panah-tor na' wuh wuh'rak wak, k' lo'uk dread, kuv etek dang sarlah fi-tor au, would t'nash-veh particular convict suppose ik ish-veh vesh' i vi had katau wuh ask'ersu tra'? Au had ya'akash me kuv i vesh' wuh deceiving imp, heh au had leralmin-tor i dang nam-tor wuh kei nu'ri hound kuv i hau wuh shi'kar tehnat ish-veh. Would au dva-tor ik i vesh' fi' imp heh hound svi' treacherous earnest, heh had pusvik-tor ish-veh? Ish-veh vesh' t' rai nam-tor-tor asking myself nash deshker i'. Tra' i vesh', fi' joe's pla', heh tra' vesh' joe ne'rak me, charging na' wuh ruk-tor spo' wuh shi'ka'ree, heh stimulating mr. Wopsle ri tor tumble fi' ish-veh roman han, heh tor potau abru k' etek. Wuh ask'ersu vesh' svi' khom t' etek, extending vi' wuh takov eik zehl k' wuh tvi-wak svi' sasu heh sasu. Etek vesh' taking wuh rivak i had palikau k', heh s' if i had satau svi' wuh mist. Either wuh mist vesh' ri si' va'ashiv wi, il wuh salan had dispelled ish-veh. Ne' wuh neik yon-kur glare t' tev-tor, wuh glaribek, heh wuh gibbet, heh wuh mound t' wuh kipof, heh wuh mesyutik gef t' wuh pilash, vesh' eiktra, hi ek' t' wuh watery ras-tukh kur. K' t'nash-veh khaf-spol thumping spo' wuh shek-zhuksu na' joe's sax'ksei tipan, i glazhau ek' pa' na' sovek glat t' wuh convicts. Kupi gla-tor nash-veh rim, i kupi zhu-tor rim. Mr. Wopsle had greatly alarmed me weht do wuh'wak, k' ish-veh blowing heh lerash eshan; tonk'peh i fai-tor wuh sounds k' nash wak, heh kupi dissociate au s' wuh vel t' pursuit. I prah wuh dreadful palikaya, lu i nahp i puzhu-tor wuh deik fam dvun going; tonk'peh ish-veh vesh' goh wuh sheep-kus-vakh. Wuh sheep pehkau svi' ish-veh eating heh glazhau timidly na' etek; heh wuh cattle, ish-veh patam da-tor s' wuh salan heh sleet, nantau angrily u' kuv au meskarau etek responsible na' fi' il'nai'ga; tonk'peh, kaula aifa vel, heh wuh ak'shem-hutau t' wuh dying gad svi' kanok wun-mor t' yar, tra' vesh' rai shaya svi' wuh bleak stillness t' wuh masu-kastra. Wuh ask'ersu vesh' dvun-tor fi' svi' wuh kharat t' wuh hinek kipof, heh etek vesh' dvun-tor fi' wuh pi' yut za' au, lu, ek' t' wuh sudden, etek ek' pehkau. Na' tra' had pulau etek fi' wuh rala t' wuh salan heh sov-masu, wuh wu saul. Ish-veh vesh' ashiv-tor. Ish-veh vesh' na' wuh ir na' wuh she'rak, tonk'peh ish-veh vesh' wu heh ral. Nay, tra' seemed tor nam-tor dahkuh il weht saul-tor ashenau teretuhr, kuv veh lau judge s' wuh confusion svi' wuh ralash. Tor nash daya wuh wuh-traveksu heh wuh nearest sasu vesh' speaking ne' ish-veh esh, lu joe heh vesht sarlah nash-veh abru. Po' wuh'ashiv moment's listening, joe (vi vesh' wuh rom judge) sep-wafikh, heh mr. Wopsle (vi vesh' wuh rasahkos judge) sep-wafikh. Wuh wuh-traveksu, wuh decisive sasu, ordered ik wuh ralash dang ri nam-tor kilko-tor, tonk'peh ik wuh rivak dang nam-tor rubai, heh ik ish-veh sasu dang tor na' ish-veh "na' wuh dahtau." ni etek vul-tor tor wuh gas'rak (wilat wuh she'rak vesh'), heh joe plesh-tor maf ni wonderfully, ik i had tor meskaraya fi' wufik tor potau t'nash-veh ku-san. Ish-veh vesh' wuh sahr-tor indeed i', heh ra joe puvutau, svi' wuh goh dahkuh zhit au stariben ek' wuh wak, "wuh winder." ne' kutra heh abru kutra, heh abru' temep, heh splashing vi' pamashok, heh breaking among dirik rushes: rai sasu tun-tor wilat au went. U' sarlah etek nearer tor wuh shouting, ish-veh became weht heh weht apparent ik ish-veh vesh' tor k' weht do veh spes. Sometimes, ish-veh seemed tor pehkaya altogether, heh yi wuh ask'ersu pehkau. Lu ish-veh shau si' va'ashiv, wuh ask'ersu tor na' ish-veh na' wuh greater tav do ek'wak, heh etek po' au. Po' wuh du', etek had ni sahr-tor ish-veh ne', ik etek kupi zhu-tor veh spes calling "riyeht-staya!" heh wuh'ashiv spes, "convicts! Runaways! Klashausu! Nash yut na' wuh runaway convicts!" yi fi' spes would seem tor nam-tor stifled svi' wuh struggle, heh yi would shaya si' va'ashiv. Heh lu ish-veh had sarlah tor nash, wuh ask'ersu sahr-tor spo' deer, heh joe nuh'. Wuh wuh-traveksu sahr-tor svi' wuh'rak, lu etek had sahr-tor wuh ralash ved ne', heh dahkuh t' ish-veh sasu sahr-tor svi' ikap-tor fi-tor ish-veh. Ish-veh krus vesh' cocked heh levelled lu etek ek' sahr-tor svi'. "la' nam-tor fi' sasu!" panted wuh wuh-traveksu, struggling na' wuh lanet t' wuh razh. "surrender, du dahkuh! Heh confound du na' dahkuh kwai beasts! Sarlah asunder!" masu vesh' splashing, heh vral vesh' hashan, heh oaths vesh' hasu sworn, heh salur vesh' hasu kwul-tor, lu ein weht sasu went ne' vi' wuh razh tor gol'nev wuh wuh-traveksu, heh zaseshau si', separately, t'nash-veh convict heh wuh vath veh. Fi' vesh' khafaya heh panting heh execrating heh struggling; tonk'peh veling i fai-tor au fi' directly. "kashek!" leralmin-tor t'nash-veh convict, psethau khaf s' ish-veh limuk k' ish-veh ragged sleeves, heh shaking torn isachya s' ish-veh ozh: "i nem-tor ish-veh! I mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh abru tor du! Kashek ik!" "ish-veh's ri mau tor nam-tor particular pa', " leralmin-tor wuh wuh-traveksu; "ish-veh'll tor du pi' rom, t'nash-veh sasu, hasu svi' wuh ka plight yourself. Handcuffs tra'!" "i ri tor gish ish-veh tor tor me sovek rom. I ri tor aitlun ish-veh tor tor me weht rom do ish-veh tor i', " leralmin-tor t'nash-veh convict, k' wuh greedy abru'teruklar-ru'lut. "i nem-tor ish-veh. Au fai-tor ish-veh. Ik's hiyet na' me." wuh vath convict vesh' livid tor glazhau na', heh, svi' haya tor wuh hinek bruised losrak vla t' ish-veh limuk, seemed tor nam-tor bruised heh torn ek' abru'. Au kupi ri ni mau u' prah ish-veh esh tor stariben, abi' au vesh' fi' separately handcuffed, tonk'peh gal-tor fi-tor wuh ask'ersu tor potau himself s' tevan-tor. "nem-tor beglanau, klashausu, au ar'kada tor riyeht-staya me, " vesh' ish-veh wuh'rak zhit. "ar'kada tor riyeht-staya ish-veh?" leralmin-tor t'nash-veh convict, disdainfully. "ar'kadan, heh ri tor ish-veh? I nem-tor ish-veh, heh giv' ish-veh abru; ik's ra i ovsoh. I ri goh prevented ish-veh getting ska' wuh masu-kastra, tonk'peh i zaseshau ish-veh la', zaseshau ish-veh nash irak fi' ish-veh yut pla'. Au's wuh gentleman, kuv du sanoi, nash villain. I', wuh hulks has prah its gentleman va'ashiv, k'fai me. Riyeht-staya ish-veh? Don t'nash-veh du', nuh', tor riyeht-staya ish-veh, lu i kupi tor weh-rasahkos heh zaseshau ish-veh pla'!" wuh vath veh fam dvun hushau, "au triedhe ar'kada-tomurder me. Bearbear toglantausu." "lookee la'!" leralmin-tor t'nash-veh convict tor wuh wuh-traveksu. "single-handed i prah pa'shik t' wuh prison-hali; i tor wuh dash heh i ovsoh ish-veh. I kupi ha' prah pa'shik t' aifa tevakh-samu flats likewiselook na' t'nash-veh mal: du skil-tor't talal mau shek-tukh fi' itif i hadn't tor wuh discovery ik au vesh' la'. Kal-tor ish-veh hal-tor elik? Kal-tor ish-veh pinkaunu k' wuh tvai u' i afer-tor si'? Kal-tor ish-veh tor wuh raul t' me afresh heh va'ashiv? Wuh'wak weht? Rai, rai, rai. Kuv i had tev-tor na' wuh lanet tra', " heh au tor wuh emphatic swing na' wuh razh k' ish-veh manacled el'ru, "i'd ma meskarau tor ish-veh k' ik grip, ik du dang ma vesh' safe tor talal ish-veh svi' t'nash-veh meskaraya." wuh vath fugitive, vi vesh' evidently svi' mairik horror t' ish-veh besu, ashiv-tor, "au ar'kada tor riyeht-staya me.
