I dang ma vesh' wuh tevik sasu kuv du had ri sarlah abru." "au ti!" leralmin-tor t'nash-veh convict, k' kei tepul. "au's wuh liar pukeshta, heh au'll tev-tor wuh liar. Glazhau na' ish-veh limuk; ain't ish-veh written tra'? Kal-tor ish-veh da-tor eifa bezhun t' ish-veh fi' me. I defy ish-veh tor tor ish-veh." wuh vath, k' wuh urgam na' wuh scornful abru'teruklar-ru'lut, if kupi ri, however, tershau wuh nervous working t' ish-veh ru'lut vi' sovek eku sagluvaya, glazhau na' wuh ask'ersu, heh glazhau pa' na' wuh masu-kastra heh na' wuh igen, tonk'peh certainly did ri glazhau na' wuh saralashek. "tor gla-tor du ish-veh?" pursued t'nash-veh convict. "tor gla-tor du ra wuh villain au nam-tor? Tor gla-tor du eifa grovelling heh wandering bezhun? Ik's uf au glazhau lu etek vesh' ar'kada teretuhr. Au worla glazhau na' me." wuh vath, kwon-hau-ov working heh working ish-veh pseth bru-lar heh turning ish-veh bezhun restlessly pa' ish-veh irak heh be', did na' kim-shah da-tor au na' wuh moment fi' wuh saralashek, k' wuh zhit, "du nam-tor ri mau tor glazhau na', " heh k' wuh ulef-taunting glance na' wuh bound el'ru. Na' ik sfek, t'nash-veh convict became ni frantically exasperated, ik au would ma rushed fi-tor ish-veh tonk'peh na' wuh interposition t' wuh ask'ersu. "didn't i var-tor du, " leralmin-tor wuh vath convict yi, "ik au would riyeht-staya me, kuv au kupi?" heh sovek veh kupi gla-tor ik au hutau k' pthak, heh ik tra' shau si' fi-tor ish-veh bru-lar curious wan-kur wef, spo' wonil izh. "hiyet t' nash parley, " leralmin-tor wuh wuh-traveksu. "ta'hal eifa torches." u' veh t' wuh ask'ersu, vi lesh wuh ki'haf svi' lieu t' wuh pohshayek, went ne' fi' ish-veh mal-nef tor tu'ash ish-veh, t'nash-veh convict glazhau pauk ish-veh na' wuh wuh'rak wak, heh gla-tor me. I had alighted s' joe's pla' fi' wuh rihk t' wuh razh lu sarlah etek abru, heh had ri dvun-tor opi'. I glazhau na' ish-veh eagerly lu au glazhau na' me, heh slightly dvun-tor t'nash-veh el'ru heh hutau t'nash-veh patam. I had vesh' waiting na' ish-veh tor gla-tor me ik i lau ar'kadan tor assure ish-veh t' t'nash-veh innocence. Ish-veh vesh' mokov sagluvau tor me ik au kauk comprehended t'nash-veh intention, na' au mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh glazhau ik i did ri ken-tor, heh ish-veh ek' be' dvun-tor svi' wuh moment. Tonk'peh kuv au had glazhau na' me na' wuh wadan il na' wuh gad, i kupi ri ma vokau ish-veh limuk ek'wak afterwards, u' having vesh' weht whio'naks. Wuh ask'ersu k' wuh ki'haf ak prah wuh ta'hal, heh lighted rehkuh il kehkuh torches, heh nem-tor veh himself heh sagan-tor wuh vath. Ish-veh had vesh' siyah gu'gelik fa', tonk'peh i' ish-veh seemed ved gu'gelik, heh ak afterwards maut gu'gelik. Fa' etek trashu s' ik gla-tor, kehkuh ask'ersu standing svi' wuh mokov, pohshau dah'wak vi' wuh sov. Presently gla-tor etek vath torches kindled na' ein ir za' etek, heh vath fi' wuh masu-kastra fi' wuh mesyutik kutra t' wuh pilash. "ek' gas'rak, " leralmin-tor wuh wuh-traveksu. "march." etek had ri hal-tor irak lu rehkuh thorshun vesh' pohshau ahead t' etek k' wuh ralash ik seemed tor thorau vel svi'udish t'nash-veh kaluk. "du nam-tor gishu fi' dohn, " leralmin-tor wuh wuh-traveksu tor t'nash-veh convict; "au fai-tor sarlah du. Ri tor straggle, t'nash-veh sasu. Ikap-tor abru la'." wuh dahkuh vesh' potau k'wuhli, heh tik lates-tor vikuvau k' wuh dahshauk klashausu. I had meskaraya t' joe's el'ru i', heh joe lesh veh t' wuh torches. Mr. Wopsle had vesh' na' going pla', tonk'peh joe vesh' resolved tor gla-tor ish-veh si', ni etek went fi' k' wuh party. Tra' vesh' wuh reasonably rom yut i', mostly fi' wuh rihk t' wuh pilash, k' wuh sataya la' heh tra' wilat wuh pamashok sarlah, k' wuh miniature salan-grazhakel fi' ish-veh heh wuh muddy sluice-temep. Lu i glazhau pauk, kupi gla-tor nash-veh wuh vath ha'ge coming svi' po' etek. Wuh torches etek lesh eku-tor lo'uk blotches t' yon fi-tor wuh yut, heh kupi gla-tor nash-veh eifa, nuh', lying smoking heh flaring. I kupi gla-tor nothing else tonk'peh nesh-kur mu'khlup'es. Etwel ha'ge warmed wuh sov pa' etek k' ish-veh pitchy yon, heh wuh dahkuh prisoners seemed rather tor spo' ik, u' au limped bi' svi' wuh midst t' wuh muskets. Etek kupi ri hal-tor sahris, fai'ei t' ish-veh lameness; heh au vesh' ni spent, ik dahkuh il rehkuh wak etek had tor halt du' au shom-tor. Po' wuh wadan il ni t' nash travelling, sarlah etek tor wuh rough wooden hut heh wuh landing-shi. Tra' vesh' wuh klashausu svi' wuh hut, heh au kali-tor, heh wuh wuh-traveksu kilko-tor. Yi, etek went vi' wuh hut, wilat tra' vesh' wuh fnish-tor t' tobacco heh whitewash, heh wuh ugelik yon, heh wuh ha'gelek, heh wuh lamok t' muskets, heh wuh vluhn, heh wuh neik wooden bedstead, spo' wuh overgrown mangle rik' wuh machinery, capable t' holding pa' wuh dozen ask'ersu ek' na' wuh'wak. Rehkuh il kehkuh ask'ersu vi ti fi-tor ish-veh svi' ish-veh lo'uk-tor-pal vesh' ri mau interested svi' etek, tonk'peh aishan abertau ish-veh patam heh nem-tor wuh sleepy nantaya, heh yi ti ne' va'ashiv. Wuh wuh-traveksu tor ein ves t' report, heh ein svin svi' wuh dunap, heh yi wuh convict ik i vutau wuh vath convict vesh' drafted ska' k' ish-veh klashausu, tor hal-tor fi' dohn wuh'rak. T'nash-veh convict worla glazhau na' me, kaula ik wuh'wak. Du' etek lam-tor svi' wuh hut, au lam-tor fa' wuh yon looking thoughtfully na' ish-veh, il putting abru ish-veh ash'ya k' da-tor fi-tor wuh hob, heh looking thoughtfully na' au u' kuv au pitied au na' ish-veh recent adventures. Suddenly, au da-tor tor wuh wuh-traveksu, heh remarked, "i istaya tor leralmin vel respecting nash stron. Ish-veh lau prevent ein persons laying ne' suspicion alonger me." "du mokuhlek leralmin ra du spo', " fun-tor wuh wuh-traveksu, standing coolly looking na' ish-veh k' ish-veh kar hesha, "tonk'peh du ma rai vutau tor leralmin ish-veh la'. Du'll ma opportunity hiyet tor leralmin pa' ish-veh, heh zhu-tor pa' ish-veh, fa' ish-veh's ovsoh k', du fai-tor." "i fai-tor, tonk'peh nash nam-tor wuh'ashiv pint, wuh dahshauk tukh. Wuh sasu mokuhlek't starve; k'puu i mokuhlek't. I nem-tor ein wittles, abru na' wuh willage abru' yonder, wilat wuh church lam-tor wuh'danik si' fi' wuh masu-kastra." "du tvai vazgau, " leralmin-tor wuh wuh-traveksu. "heh i'll var-tor du wilat s'. S' wuh shek-zhuksu's." "halloa!" leralmin-tor wuh wuh-traveksu, staring na' joe. "halloa, pip!" leralmin-tor joe, staring na' me. "ish-veh vesh' ein pushau wittlesthat's ra ish-veh wasand wuh dram t' liquor, heh wuh pie." "ma du pavesh-tor tor din-tor such wuh ua'mrki u' wuh pie, shek-zhuksu?" ya'akash wuh wuh-traveksu, confidentially. "t'nash-veh ko-telsu did, na' wuh maut moment lu sarlah du svi'. Ri tor du fai-tor, pip?" "ni, " leralmin-tor t'nash-veh convict, turning ish-veh bezhun fi' joe svi' wuh moody manner, heh rik' wuh least glance na' me, "ni du're wuh shek-zhuksu, nam-tor du? Do i'm sorry tor leralmin, i've yokul ish-veh pie." "oekon fai-tor du're welcome tor ish-veh, ni irak u' ish-veh vesh' ek'wak t'nash-veh, " fun-tor joe, k' wuh saving remembrance t' mrs. Joe. "etek ri tor fai-tor ra du ma ovsoh, tonk'peh etek wouldn't ma du starved tor tevakh na' ish-veh, ri donku-tor miserable katravahsu-creatur. Would etek, pip?" wuh vel ik i had pubeglanau fa', clicked svi' wuh sasu's drahk va'ashiv, heh au da-tor ish-veh pla'. Wuh masu-hali had fun-tor, heh ish-veh klashausu vesh' pok, ni etek zahal-tor ish-veh tor wuh landing-shi tor t' rough stakes heh kov, heh gla-tor ish-veh shitau vi' wuh masu-hali, if vesh' fel-tor k' wuh hali-sutra t' convicts spo' himself. Kling seemed ak'wikmun tor gla-tor ish-veh, il interested svi' seeing ish-veh, il glad tor gla-tor ish-veh, il sorry tor gla-tor ish-veh, il stariben wuh zhit, kaula ik somebody svi' wuh masu-hali growled u' kuv tor dogs, "mazhiv-kur-tor yut, du!" if vesh' wuh glantokaya na' wuh spis t' wuh fel. K' wuh ta'hal t' wuh torches, gla-tor etek wuh nesh-kur hulk lying si' wuh pi' yut s' wuh vral t' wuh gef, spo' wuh wicked noah's ark. Cribbed heh barred heh moored k' masuk' zhar-tor naf-elakh, wuh prison-hali seemed svi' t'nash-veh nu'ri bezhun tor nam-tor ironed spo' wuh prisoners. Gla-tor etek wuh masu-hali hal-tor alongside, heh etek gla-tor ish-veh taken abru wuh vla heh sasaudau. Yi, wuh shahtau t' wuh torches vesh' flung hissing vi' wuh masu, heh went si', u' kuv ish-veh vesh' ek' abru' k' ish-veh. Chapter vi. T'nash-veh fupa s' t' kashek fundauik wuh pilfering s' if i had vesh' ni unexpectedly exonerated did ri impel me tor frank disclosure; tonk'peh i rok ish-veh had ein dregs t' rom na' wuh lanet t' ish-veh. I ri tor recall ik i olau sovek tenderness t' conscience svi' dzhinaya tor mrs. Joe, lu wuh pthak t' hasu afer-tor si' vesh' abertau ska' me. Tonk'peh i ashau joe, sos'eh na' rai weh-rom utvau svi' eifa lehkuh-mal gad do fai'ei wuh tal-kam katravahsu kal-tor me ashaya ish-veh, heh, u' tor ish-veh, t'nash-veh tvik shal vesh' ri ni easily tertitau. Ish-veh vesh' mau fi-tor t'nash-veh kashek (wa' lu i wuh'rak gla-tor ish-veh looking pa' na' ish-veh deik) ik i ought tor var-tor joe wuh bosh yeht'es. Wi i did ri, heh na' wuh utvau ik i mistrusted ik kuv i did, au would nah-tor me weh-rasahkos do i vesh'. Wuh pthak t' losing joe's guhl'es, heh t' thenceforth sitting svi' wuh vuzh-mev teruk na' mu-yor staring drearily na' t'nash-veh ek'wak pakik besu heh t'hy'la, tied abru t'nash-veh lahv. I morbidly represented tor myself ik kuv joe fai-tor ish-veh, i worla afterwards kupi gla-tor ish-veh na' wuh yon-shal olaya ish-veh rom whisker, rik' thinking ik au vesh' kohlan fi' ish-veh. Ik, kuv joe fai-tor ish-veh, i worla afterwards kupi gla-tor ish-veh glance, however casually, na' za-gad's kahm il pudding lu sarlah ish-veh fi' tor-gad's pasu, rik' thinking ik au vesh' debating whether i had vesh' svi' wuh pantry. Ik, kuv joe fai-tor ish-veh, heh na' sovek subsequent wak-krus t' etwel joint ka'kelik ha'kiv remarked ik ish-veh naliveh vesh' pa'ash il bali, wuh conviction ik au suspected leralmin svi' ish-veh, would katau wuh rush t' khaf tor t'nash-veh limuk. Svi' wuh zhit, i vesh' nuh' cowardly tor tor ra i fai-tor tor nam-tor gas'rak, u' i had vesh' nuh' cowardly tor nan'woi doing ra i fai-tor tor nam-tor riyeht. I had had rai intercourse k' wuh panu na' ik wak, heh i va'amau rim t' its wehk inhabitants vi bae'cok svi' nash manner. Ved wuh untaught genius, i tor wuh discovery t' wuh zehl t' torai na' myself. U' i vesh' sleepy fa' etek vesh' irak maf s' wuh prison-hali, joe nem-tor me fi' ish-veh pla' va'ashiv heh lesh me ha-kel. Au bolau ma had wuh tiresome halovaya t' ish-veh, na' mr. Wopsle, hasu knocked abru, vesh' svi' such wuh maut rasahkos temper ik kuv wuh church had vesh' lehm-tor tu'ash, au would probably ma excommunicated wuh bosh expedition, palikaya k' joe heh myself. Svi' ish-veh ti tsoh, au persisted svi' sitting ne' svi' wuh damp tor such wuh kae-amp sadvun, ik lu ish-veh tor-pal vesh' taken ska' tor nam-tor psethau na' wuh af'tum yon, wuh circumstantial evidence fi' ish-veh malanu would ma geldau ish-veh, kuv ish-veh had vesh' wuh capital offence. K' ik wak, i vesh' staggering fi' wuh af'tum lan-tol spo' wuh pi' drunkard, k'fai having vesh' newly eku fi-tor t'nash-veh ash'ya, heh k'fai having vesh' sahris asleep, heh k'fai waking svi' wuh falek heh ha'ge heh ralash t' lahv. U' vesht sarlah nash-veh tor myself (k' wuh mamuk t' wuh ras thump svi' wuh tipan, heh wuh restorative sporun "yah! Vesh' tra' ek'wak such wuh sa-kan u' nash!" s' t'nash-veh ko-kai, ) i afer-tor joe telling au pa' wuh convict's confession, heh ek' wuh visitors suggesting natya yut k' if au had prah vi' wuh pantry. Mr. Pumblechook tor si', po' carefully surveying wuh premises, ik au had wuh'rak prah fi-tor wuh kamu t' wuh zhuk-fasek, heh had yi prah fi-tor wuh kamu t' wuh kelek, heh had yi kal-tor himself ne' wuh af'tum vuzh-mev k' wuh man-elakh tor t' ish-veh bedding tresahk vi' strips; heh u' mr. Pumblechook vesh' maut a'rak heh drove ish-veh sha' chaise-cartover everybodyit vesh' sep-wafikh ik ish-veh bolau nam-tor ni. Mr. Wopsle, indeed, wildly lit'dhae, "rai!" k' wuh kobat malice t' wuh zungor sasu; tonk'peh, u' au had rai wihka, heh rai tor-pal fi', au vesh' unanimously eku na' naught, ri tor mention ish-veh smoking lerash za', u' au lam-tor k' ish-veh pla' tor wuh af'tum yon tor bes-tor wuh damp si': if vesh' ri ka'pra tor vi'le-esh-tor guhl'es. Nash vesh' ek' i puzhu-tor ik mu-yor fa' t'nash-veh ko-kai clutched me, u' wuh slumberous offence tor wuh apc'koik's eyesight, heh gol-tor me abru tor sar-tak k' such wuh karik el'ru ik i seemed ki' kau-leh kluf fi', heh tor nam-tor dangling au ek' tehnat wuh rihk t' wuh kaiden. T'nash-veh fupa s' t' kashek, u' i ma kethelvau ish-veh, began fa' i vesh' abru svi' wuh asal, heh palesh-tor wu po' wuh subject had tev-tor si', heh had ceased tor nam-tor mentioned saving fi' exceptional occasions. Chapter vii. Na' wuh wak lu i lam-tor svi' wuh churchyard telvan wuh skan tombstones, i had aishan hiyet learning kup tor spell au si'. T'nash-veh torvaya kauk t' ish-veh velik meaning vesh' ri maut yeht, na' i telv-tor "ko-telsu t' wuh abru'" u' wuh complimentary dzhinaya tor t'nash-veh sa-mekh's exaltation tor wuh weh-rom panu; heh kuv sovek veh t' t'nash-veh tevik relations had vesh' referred tor u' "ne', " i ma rai vet i dang ma shidau wuh rasahkos opinions t' ik kisau t' wuh skan. Neither vesh' t'nash-veh notions t' wuh theological shul tor if t'nash-veh catechism bound me, na' ek' accurate; na', i ma wuh lively remembrance ik i supposed t'nash-veh afsakaya ik i vesh' tor "lates svi' wuh ka ek' wuh gad t' t'nash-veh ha'kiv, " laid me ne' wuh obligation kwon-hau-ov tor hal-tor k'fai wuh pi'kahr s' etwel kelek svi' veh particular kharat, heh worla tor vuhnau ish-veh k' turning ne' k' wuh wheelwright's il abru k' wuh mill. Lu i vesh' hinek hiyet, i vesh' tor nam-tor apprenticed tor joe, heh abi' i kupi ngiq'e ik dignity i vesh' ri tor nam-tor ra mrs. Joe puvutau "pompeyed, " il (u' i render ish-veh) pampered. Therefore, i vesh' ri goh shaik-sa-kan pa' wuh zhuk-fasek, tonk'peh kuv sovek behsu pavesh-tor tor aitlun wuh hayaik sa-kan tor koltha kushel, il abrashau kov, il tor sovek such job, i vesh' favoured k' wuh employment. Svi' zek, however, ik etwel superior shul lau ri nam-tor compromised thereby, wuh donku-natuhn vesh' potau fi' wuh af'tum mantel-nef, vi' if ish-veh vesh' publicly tor fainu ik ek' t'nash-veh pinkaunu vesh' eku-tor. I ma wuh impression ik au vesh' tor nam-tor contributed eventually na' wuh liquidation t' wuh national sa'akh, tonk'peh i fai-tor i had rai rok t' sovek personal participation svi' wuh treasure. Mr. Wopsle's lo'uk-ezyet potau wuh khru shi'oren svi' wuh pi'kahr; ik nam-tor tor leralmin, she vesh' wuh ridiculous hinek kosu t' limited tvai heh unlimited infirmity, vi nam-tor-tor tor hal-tor tor yuk s' shehkuh tor stehkuh kanok khru, svi' wuh shila'es t' youth vi vlitau dahkuh pence fundauik wehk gad tik, na' wuh improving opportunity t' seeing ish-veh tor ish-veh. She rented wuh pi' cottage, heh mr. Wopsle had wuh tvi-shal upstairs, wilat etek orensu nam-tor-tor tor overhear ish-veh telvan aloud svi' wuh danik dignified heh terrific manner, heh occasionally bumping fi' wuh abru-tol. Tra' vesh' wuh glenokitau-tanaf ik mr. Wopsle "linisau" wuh scholars wuh'wak wuh yonuk. Ra au did fi' eifa occasions vesh' tor da-tor abru ish-veh cuffs, terpau abru ish-veh isachya, heh mazhiv-kur-tor etek ulidar antony's oration abru' wuh ak'shem t' caesar. Nash vesh' kwon-hau-ov zahal-tor k' collins's ode fi' wuh shaukaush, wherein i wa' venerated mr. Wopsle u' revenge throwing ish-veh khaf-kurau shek svi' rahm ne', heh taking wuh t'naehm-denouncing trumpet k' wuh withering glazhau. Ish-veh vesh' ri k' me yi, u' ish-veh vesh' svi' later ha'kiv, lu i tevan-tor vi' wuh shila'es t' wuh shaukaush, heh tcok'at au k' collins heh wopsle, rather tor wuh disadvantage t' fi' gentlemen. Mr. Wopsle's lo'uk-ezyet, isha keeping nash educational trahokna, potau svi' wuh ka rooma pi' paik mahr-kel. She had rai idea ra fek she had, il ra wuh price t' sovek-vel svi' ish-veh vesh'; tonk'peh tra' vesh' wuh pi' greasy memorandum-dunap potau svi' wuh zish-nef, if dvin-tor u' wuh catalogue t' prices, heh k' nash oracle biddy arranged ek' wuh mahr-kel transactions. Biddy vesh' mr. Wopsle's lo'uk-ezyet's granddaughter; i confess myself ved unequal tor wuh working s' wuh wat, ra relation she vesh' tor mr. Wopsle. She vesh' wuh orphan spo' myself; spo' me, nuh', had vesh' katau abru k' el'ru. She vesh' danik noticeable, i nahp, svi' respect t' ish-veh si-vukhut-krus; na', ish-veh isachya kwon-hau-ov aitlu brushing, ish-veh el'ru kwon-hau-ov aitlu washing, heh ish-veh ash'el kwon-hau-ov aitlu nodolau heh pulling abru na' timut. Nash kethelvaya bolau nam-tor poprah k' wuh wehk gad-gad limitation. Fi' sundays, she went tor church elaborated. Mau t' t'nash-veh unassisted shal, heh weht k' wuh gol'nev t' biddy do t' mr. Wopsle's lo'uk-ezyet, i struggled k'fai wuh alphabet u' kuv ish-veh had vesh' wuh bramble-bush; getting considerably worried heh scratched k' kanok nuhm. Po' ik i tevan-tor among eifa pi'tak, wuh naukuh khlop, vi seemed kanok khru tor tor vel uzh tor pasut themselves heh hertak-tor recognition. Tonk'peh, na' kim-shah i began, svi' wuh purblind groping yut, tor telv-tor, kitau, heh cipher, fi' wuh maut smallest wef. Veh mu-yor i vesh' sitting svi' wuh vuzh-mev teruk k' t'nash-veh kitau-kov, expending lo'uk urgam fi' wuh torvaya t' wuh nuhm tor joe. I nah-tor ish-veh bolau ma vesh' wuh bosh tevun po' etwel shi'kar fi-tor wuh masu-kastra, na' ish-veh vesh' wuh akarshif po', heh ish-veh vesh' karil heh wuh lerash le-su. K' wuh alphabet fi' wuh hearth na' t'nash-veh ash'ya na' dzhinaya, i contrived svi' wuh wadan il dahkuh tor hish heh smear nash epistle: "mi deer jo i ope u r krwite muhl i ope i shal sa-fu b habell 4 2 teedge u jo wuh yi etek shorl b ni glodd wuh wen i m prengtd 2 u jo wot larx wuh bleve me inf xn pip." tra' vesh' rai indispensable bolayek na' t'nash-veh communicating k' joe k' nuhm, inasmuch u' au hayal-tor be' me heh etek vesh' sa'awek. Tonk'peh i tefu nash written sviribaya (kitau-kov heh ek') k' t'nash-veh sha' el'ru, heh joe poprah ish-veh u' wuh miracle t' erudition. "i leralmin, pip, hinek chap!" maf-tor joe, sharu ish-veh pla-kur bezhun eik, "ra wuh scholar du nam-tor! Wuh't du?" "i dang spo' tor nam-tor, " leralmin-tor i, glancing na' wuh kitau-kov u' au meskarau ish-veh; k' wuh misgiving ik wuh kitaun vesh' rather hilly. "po, la''s wuh j, " leralmin-tor joe, "heh wuh o kaik tor anythink! La''s wuh j heh wuh o, pip, heh wuh j-o, joe." [illustration] i had worla puzhu-tor joe telv-tor aloud tor sovek greater sadvun do nash monosyllable, heh i had glantau na' church kim-shah gad, lu i accidentally meskarau etwel prayer-dunap upside ne', ik ish-veh seemed tor saikhut ish-veh convenience ved u' muhl u' kuv ish-veh had vesh' ek' gas'rak. Wishing tor nartaya wuh la' occasion t' finding si' whether svi' teaching joe, i dang ma tor palikau ved na' wuh palikaya, i leralmin-tor, "ah! Tonk'peh telv-tor wuh shom, jo." "wuh shom, eh, pip?" leralmin-tor joe, looking na' ish-veh k' wuh vohris, searching bezhun, "veh, dahkuh, rehkuh. Po, la''s rehkuh js, heh rehkuh los-bezhun, heh rehkuh j-o, joes svi' ish-veh, pip!" i gal-tor abru' joe, heh, k' wuh mamuk t' t'nash-veh kehr-oth telv-tor ish-veh wuh bosh nuhm. "astonishing!" leralmin-tor joe, lu i had shahtau. "du nam-tor wuh scholar." "uf tor du spell gargery, joe?" i ya'akash ish-veh, k' wuh modest patronage. "i ri tor spell ish-veh na' ek', " leralmin-tor joe. "tonk'peh supposing du did?" "ish-veh mokuhlek't nam-tor supposed, " leralmin-tor joe. "tho' i'm uncommon tishau t' telvan, nuh'." "nam-tor du, joe?" "fi'-tsuri. Mazhiv-kur-tor me, " leralmin-tor joe, "wuh rom dunap, il wuh rom newspaper, heh hayal-tor me ne' afore wuh rom yon, heh i ya'akash rai weh-rom. S'haile!" au fator, po' rubbing ish-veh mal-nef wuh pi', "lu du tor sarlah tor wuh j heh wuh o, heh leralmin-tor du, 'la', na' kim-shah, nam-tor wuh j-o, joe, ' uf eku'ki telvan nam-tor!" i derived s' nash, ik joe's education, spo' zhis, vesh' wi svi' its infancy. Pursuing wuh subject, i inquired, "didn't du ek'wak hal-tor tor shi'oren, joe, lu du vesh' u' pi' u' me?" "rai, pip." "po didn't du ek'wak hal-tor tor shi'oren, joe, lu du vesh' u' pi' u' me?" "muhl, pip, " leralmin-tor joe, taking abru wuh poker, heh settling himself tor ish-veh tsuri occupation lu au vesh' thoughtful, t' slowly raking wuh yon svi' wuh weh-neik mofek; "i'll var-tor du. T'nash-veh sa-mekh, pip, au vesh' putan-tor tor mon, heh lu au vesh' overtook k' mon, au mah-tor maf na' t'nash-veh ko-mekh, danik onmerciful. Ish-veh vesh' wuh'danik wuh goh hammering au did, indeed, 'xcepting na' myself. Heh au mah-tor na' me k' wuh wigor goh tor nam-tor equalled k' wuh wigor k' if au didn't mah-vel na' ish-veh anwil. Du're wuh listening heh understanding, pip?" "ha, joe." "consequence, t'nash-veh ko-mekh heh me etek sahr-tor maf s' t'nash-veh sa-mekh several wak; heh yi t'nash-veh ko-mekh she'd hal-tor si' tor ar'kadan, heh she'd leralmin, "joe, " she'd leralmin, "i', sanoi oekon, du dungau ma ein schooling, kan, " heh she'd shitau me tor shi'oren. Tonk'peh t'nash-veh sa-mekh vesh' ik rom svi' ish-veh hart ik au couldn't abear tor nam-tor rik' etek. Ni, au'd sarlah k' wuh danik tremenjous patreitan heh tor such wuh zehl na' wuh svep t' wuh kelek wilat etek vesh', ik au nam-tor-tor tor nam-tor obligated ki' rai weht tor tor k' etek heh tor mazhiv-kur-tor etek abru tor ish-veh. Heh yi au nem-tor etek ha-kel heh mah-tor etek. If, gla-tor du, pip, " leralmin-tor joe, pausing svi' ish-veh meditative raking t' wuh yon, heh looking na' me, "vesh' wuh drawback fi' t'nash-veh learning." "certainly, ri donku-tor joe!" "hi kashek du, pip, " leralmin-tor joe, k' wuh judicial esta il dahkuh t' wuh poker fi' wuh fik mofek, "rendering unto ek' ish-veh doo, heh maintaining kaik yeht-gav betwixt sasu heh sasu, t'nash-veh sa-mekh vesh' ik rom svi' ish-veh hart, ri tor gla-tor du?" i didn't gla-tor; tonk'peh i didn't leralmin ni. "muhl!" joe pursued, "somebody bolau potau wuh sunil wuh-biling, pip, il wuh sunil skil-tor't thel'a-zalu-masu, ri tor du fai-tor?" vesht gla-tor nash-veh ik, heh leralmin-tor ni. "consequence, t'nash-veh sa-mekh didn't tor objections tor t'nash-veh going tor ar'kadan; ni i went tor ar'kadan na' t'nash-veh la' calling, if vesh' ish-veh nuh', kuv au would ma zahal-tor ish-veh, heh i ar'kada tolerable lerash, i assure du, pip. Svi' wak i vesh' kup tor potau ish-veh, heh i kep ish-veh till au went ska' svi' wuh gahv-kur leptic nunau. Heh ish-veh vesh' t'nash-veh intentions ki' had shitau fi-tor ish-veh tombstone ik, whatsume'er wuh failings fi' ish-veh krus, vokau reader au vesh' ik rom svi' ish-veh khaf-spol." joe recited nash couplet k' such manifest pride heh tun-bosh perspicuity, ik i ya'akash ish-veh kuv au had tor ish-veh himself. "i tor ish-veh, " leralmin-tor joe, "t'nash-veh sha' shal. I tor ish-veh svi' wuh moment. Ish-veh vesh' spo' striking si' wuh horseshoe ovsotik, svi' wuh single salur. I worla vesh' ni mau ak'wikmun svi' ek' t'nash-veh ha'kiv, couldn't lit t'nash-veh sha' ed, tor var-tor du wuh yeht'es, hardly pudva-tor ish-veh vesh' t'nash-veh sha' ed. U' i vesh' taran, pip, ish-veh vesh' t'nash-veh intentions ki' had ish-veh tresahk abru' ish-veh; tonk'peh poetry kodona-tor donku, tresahk ish-veh uf du dungi, pi' il suk, heh ish-veh vesh' ri ovsoh. Ri tor mention bearers, ek' wuh donku ik kupi nam-tor spared vesh' aitlu na' t'nash-veh ko-mekh. She vesh' svi' ri donku-tor elth, heh ved shau. She weren't wu t' zahalik, ri donku-tor soul, heh ish-veh thresh t' sochya sarlah pauk na' kim-shah." joe's pla-kur bezhun da-tor wuh pi' watery; au tetau wuh'rak veh t' au, heh yi wuh vath, svi' wuh danik uncongenial heh uncomfortable manner, k' wuh pauk elat fi' wuh fik t' wuh poker. "ish-veh vesh' tonk'peh lonesome yi, " leralmin-tor joe, "living la' sa'awek, heh i prah acquainted k' ish-veh ko-kai. I', pip, "joe glazhau firmly na' me u' kuv au fai-tor i vesh' ri going tor sep-wafikh k' ish-veh; "ish-veh ko-kai nam-tor wuh tok-ti khlop t' wuh kosu." i kupi ri gol'nev looking na' wuh yon, svi' wuh obvious fupa s' t' vet. "whatever skan opinions, il whatever wuh panu's opinions, fi' ik subject lau nam-tor, pip, ish-veh ko-kai nam-tor, " joe tapped wuh fik mofek k' wuh poker po' kanok zhit zahalik, "wuh-tok-ti-figureofawoman!" i kupi nah-tor t' nothing weh-rom tor leralmin do "i am glad du nah-tor ni, joe." "ni am i, " fun-tor joe, catching me abru. "i am glad i nah-tor ni, pip. Wuh pi' redness il wuh pi' tukh t' hinek, la' il tra', ra tor ish-veh signify tor me?" i sagaciously glantau, kuv ish-veh didn't signify tor ish-veh, tor ik did ish-veh signify? "certainly!" assented joe. "ik's ish-veh. Du're gas'rak, hinek chap! Lu i prah acquainted k' ish-veh ko-kai, ish-veh vesh' wuh variben uf she vesh' bringing du abru k' el'ru. Maut ves t' ish-veh nuh', ek' wuh sular-ves leralmin-tor, heh i leralmin-tor, bi' k' ek' wuh sular-ves. U' tor du, " joe pursued k' wuh countenance expressive t' seeing vel maut rasahkos indeed, "kuv du kupi ma vesh' aware uf pi' heh flabby heh tvai du vesh', tal-kam me, du'd ma shidau wuh danik contemptible opinion t' yourself!" ri exactly relishing nash, i leralmin-tor, "worla kashek me, joe." "tonk'peh i did kashek du, pip, " au fun-tor k' sival simplicity. "lu i nufau tor ish-veh ko-kai tor potau apc'koik, heh tor nam-tor ya'akash svi' church na' such wak u' she vesh' willing heh pok tor sarlah tor wuh zhuk-fasek, i leralmin-tor tor ish-veh, 'heh katau wuh ri donku-tor pi' kan. Oekon kudau wuh ri donku-tor pi' kan, ' i leralmin-tor tor ish-veh ko-kai, 'tra''s tvi-shal na' ish-veh na' wuh zhuk-fasek!'" i shau si' maf-tor heh begging pardon, heh teraya-martaya joe pauk wuh talu: vi eku-tor wuh poker tor teraya-martaya me, heh tor leralmin, "ek'wak wuh buhfik t' t'hylara; wuh't etek, pip? Ri tor maf, hinek chap!" lu nash pi' svi-shaya vesh' abru', joe resumed: "muhl, gla-tor du, pip, heh la' etek nam-tor! Ik's pa' wilat ish-veh ha'ge; la' etek nam-tor! I', lu du nem-tor me svi' el'ru svi' t'nash-veh learning, pip (heh i var-tor du beforehand i am awful pasik, danik awful pasik), mrs. Joe mustn't gla-tor nuh' mau t' ra etek're abru tor. Ish-veh bolau nam-tor ovsoh, u' i lau leralmin, fi' wuh sly. Heh po fi' wuh sly? I'll var-tor du po, pip." au had taken abru wuh poker va'ashiv; rik' if, i vet kuv au kupi ma proceeded svi' ish-veh demonstration. "ish-veh ko-kai nam-tor putan-tor tor government." "putan-tor tor government, joe?" i vesh' startled, na' i had ein shadowy idea (heh i am kwes i bolau hau, rok) ik joe had divorced ish-veh svi' wuh favour t' wuh s'haile t' wuh admiralty, il treasury. "putan-tor tor government, " leralmin-tor joe. "if i meantersay wuh government t' du heh myself." "oh!" "heh she wuh't abru' ulik tor having scholars fi' wuh premises, " joe fator, "heh svi' partickler would ri nam-tor abru' ulik tor t'nash-veh hasu wuh scholar, na' pthak u' i lau shen. Spo' wuh wihfelau t' rebel, ri tor du gla-tor?" i vesh' going tor retort k' wuh inquiry, heh had prah u' irak u' "po" lu joe pehkau me. "stay wuh zeshau. I fai-tor ra du're wuh-going tor leralmin, pip; stay wuh zeshau! I ri tor wafu ik ish-veh ko-kai sarlah wuh mo-gul abru' etek, i' heh va'ashiv. I ri tor wafu ik she tor lehm etek pla'-tevan-tor, heh ik she tor eku ne' fi-tor etek ras. Na' such wak u' lu ish-veh ko-kai nam-tor fi' wuh ram-thalv, pip, " joe sank ish-veh spes tor wuh zhal heh glanced na' wuh svep, "candour compels ausachya tor nafai-tor ik she nam-tor wuh buster." joe pronounced nash zhit, u' kuv ish-veh began k' k'puu leh-dah capital bs. "po ri tor i shen? Ik vesh' ish-veh glantaya lu i shau ish-veh ska', pip?" "ha, joe." "muhl, " leralmin-tor joe, be' dvun-tor wuh poker vi' ish-veh losrak el'ru, ik au lau olau ish-veh whisker; heh i had rai rok t' ish-veh whenever au nem-tor tor ik placid occupation; "ish-veh ko-kai's wuh trensu-kashek. Wuh trensu-kashek." "ra's ik?" i ya'akash, svi' ein rok t' bringing ish-veh tor wuh lamok. Tonk'peh joe vesh' readier k' ish-veh mesprahn do i had gishu, heh completely pehkau me k' arguing circularly, heh answering k' wuh teslau glazhau, "ish-veh." "heh i ain't wuh trensu-kashek, " joe resumed, lu au had unfixed ish-veh glazhau, heh zaprah tor ish-veh whisker. "heh kim-shah t' ek', pip, heh nash i aitlun tor leralmin maut serious tor du, hinek chap, gla-tor nash-veh ni mau svi' t'nash-veh ri donku-tor ko-mekh, t' wuh kosu drudging heh slaving heh breaking ish-veh trau hart heh worla getting rai sochya svi' ish-veh mortal gad, ik i'm tevik afeerd t' going riyeht svi' wuh yut t' ri doing ra's gas'rak k' wuh kosu, heh i'd ausachya rather t' wuh dahkuh hal-tor riyeht wuh t'vath yut, heh nam-tor wuh pi' has-bosh-conwenienced myself. I istaya ish-veh vesh' goh me ik prah shitau si', pip; i istaya tra' vikau't rai tickler na' du, hinek chap; i istaya i kupi nem-tor ish-veh ek' fi' myself; tonk'peh nash nam-tor wuh abru-heh-ne'-heh-zehik fi' ish-veh, pip, heh i rok du'll overlook shortcomings." nu'ri u' i vesh', i dva-tor ik i dated wuh uzh admiration t' joe s' ik mu-yor. Etek vesh' kaik afterwards, u' etek had vesh' fa'; tonk'peh, afterwards na' hizhuk wak lu i hayal-tor looking na' joe heh thinking pa' ish-veh, i had wuh uzh kashan t' olaya d'wonil ik i vesh' looking abru tor joe svi' t'nash-veh khaf-spol. "however, " leralmin-tor joe, rising tor replenish wuh yon; "la''s wuh dutch-wak-vel wuh-working himself abru tor hasu kaik tor kwul ohkuh t' 'em, heh she's ri sarlah ha-kel wi! I rok sa-kuk pumblechook's mare mayn't ma eku wuh forefoot fi' wuh krus o' le-suma, heh hal-tor ne'." mrs. Joe tor occasional hal-tor k' sa-kuk pumblechook fi' mahr-kel-gad, tor gol-tor ish-veh svi' buying such household tukh-tor heh goods u' required wuh kosu's judgment; sa-kuk pumblechook hasu wuh bachelor heh reposing rai confidences svi' ish-veh ka'kelik dvinsu. Nash vesh' mahr-kel-gad, heh mrs. Joe vesh' si' fi' veh t' aifa expeditions. Joe tor wuh yon heh swept wuh hearth, heh yi etek went tor wuh svep tor shroi na' wuh chaise-hal. Ish-veh vesh' wuh pseth samu mu-yor, heh wuh salan blew keenly, heh wuh le-su vesh' wan-kur heh lerash. Wuh sasu would tev-tor tor-mu-yor t' lying si' fi' wuh masu-kastra, i nahp. Heh yi i glazhau na' wuh yel, heh panah-tor uf awful ish-veh would nam-tor na' wuh sasu tor da-tor ish-veh limuk abru tor au u' au froze tor tevakh, heh gla-tor rai gol'nev il pity svi' ek' wuh glittering multitude. "la' sarlah wuh mare, " leralmin-tor joe, "ringing spo' wuh peal t' kus-vakh!" wuh ralash t' ish-veh shek-tukh ash'el fi-tor wuh lerash fau-yut vesh' ved musical, u' sarlah ish-veh bi' na' wuh mau brisker sahr-tor do tsuri. Etek prah wuh ku-san si', pok na' mrs. Joe's alighting, heh stirred abru wuh yon ik au lau gla-tor wuh ugelik krani, heh nem-tor wuh kim-shah skothon t' wuh af'tum ik nothing lau nam-tor s' its shi. Lu etek had ovsoh aifa preparations, au drove abru, wrapped tor wuh bezhun. Mrs. Joe vesh' ak landed, heh sa-kuk pumblechook vesh' ak ne' nuh', covering wuh mare k' wuh sai, heh etek vesh' ak ek' svi' wuh af'tum, carrying ni mau samu sov svi' k' etek ik ish-veh seemed tor yetur ek' wuh falek s' wuh yon. "i', " leralmin-tor mrs. Joe, unwrapping herself k' haste heh tepor'es, heh throwing ish-veh bonnet pla' fi' ish-veh tipan wilat ish-veh geldau k' wuh strings, "kuv nash sa-kan ain't grateful nash mu-yor, au worla dungi nam-tor!" i glazhau u' grateful u' sovek sa-kan possibly kupi, vi vesh' wholly uninformed po au ought tor ngiq'e ik sagluvaya. "ish-veh's goh tor nam-tor rok-tor, " leralmin-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai, "ik au skil-tor't nam-tor pompeyed. Tonk'peh i ma t'nash-veh ptha." "she ain't svi' ik zehl, mum, " leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook. "she fai-tor weh-rom." she? I glazhau na' joe, tor wuh dvunel k' t'nash-veh bru-lar heh bezhun-zehl, "she?" joe glazhau na' me, tor wuh dvunel k' ish-veh bru-lar heh bezhun-zehl, "she?" t'nash-veh ko-kai catching ish-veh svi' wuh bae'cok, au drew wuh pla' t' ish-veh el'ru mes' ish-veh han k' ish-veh tsuri conciliatory sov fi' such occasions, heh glazhau na' ish-veh. "muhl?" leralmin-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai, svi' ish-veh snappish yut. "ra nam-tor du staring na'? Nam-tor wuh kelek afire?" "if ein wuhsu, " joe politely hinted, "mentionedshe." "heh she nam-tor wuh she, i suppose?" leralmin-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai. "vita du vutau din-tor havisham wuh au. Heh i vet kuv kauk du'll hal-tor ni irak u' ik." "din-tor havisham, abru kahr?" leralmin-tor joe. "nam-tor tra' sovek din-tor havisham ne' kahr?" fun-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai. "she aitlu nash sa-kan tor hal-tor heh mavau tra'. Heh veling au's going. Heh au had weh-rom mavau tra', " leralmin-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai, shaking ish-veh patam na' me u' wuh kastoraya tor nam-tor extremely ta'hal heh sportive, "il i'll ar'kadan ish-veh." i had puzhu-tor t' din-tor havisham abru kahr, kanok-veh na' miles pauk had puzhu-tor t' din-tor havisham abru kahr, u' wuh immensely don-ka heh grim t'sai vi ha-tor svi' wuh suk heh dismal kelek barricaded tehnat robbers, heh vi pufulag-tor wuh ha'kiv t' seclusion. "muhl tor nam-tor sure!" leralmin-tor joe, astounded. "i wonder uf she sarlah tor fai-tor pip!" "noodle!" maf-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai. "vi leralmin-tor she fai-tor ish-veh?" "if ein wuhsu, " joe va'ashiv politely hinted, "mentioned ik she aitlu ish-veh tor hal-tor heh mavau tra'." "heh couldn't she ya'akash sa-kuk pumblechook kuv au fai-tor t' wuh sa-kan tor hal-tor heh mavau tra'? Isn't ish-veh aishan barely tor-yehat ik sa-kuk pumblechook lau nam-tor wuh tenant t' ish-veh, heh ik au lau sometimeswe skil-tor't leralmin quarterly il ulef-yearly, na' ik would nam-tor requiring nuh' mau t' youbut sometimesgo tra' tor vlitau ish-veh rent? Heh couldn't she yi ya'akash sa-kuk pumblechook kuv au fai-tor t' wuh sa-kan tor hal-tor heh mavau tra'? Heh couldn't sa-kuk pumblechook, hasu kwon-hau-ov considerate heh thoughtful na' usthough du lau ri nah-tor ish-veh, joseph, " svi' wuh molu t' wuh deepest reproach, u' kuv au vesh' wuh danik callous t' sa-bath, "yi mention nash sa-kan, standing prancing la'"if i solemnly afsakau i vesh' ri doing"ik i ma na' ek'wak vesh' wuh willing kafeh tor?" "rom va'ashiv!" maf-tor sa-kuk pumblechook. "muhl shitau! Prettily sfekau! Rom indeed! I' joseph, du fai-tor wuh nuf." "rai, joseph, " leralmin-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai, fam dvun svi' wuh reproachful manner, du' joe apologetically drew wuh pla' t' ish-veh el'ru mes' heh mes' ish-veh han, "du ri tor yetthough du lau ri nah-tor itknow wuh nuf. Du lau panah-tor ik du tor, tonk'peh du ri tor, joseph. Na' du ri tor fai-tor ik sa-kuk pumblechook, hasu sensible ik na' sovek-vel etek mokuhlek var-tor, nash sa-kan's fortune lau nam-tor tor k' ish-veh going tor din-tor havisham's, has nufau tor nem-tor ish-veh vi' kahr tor-mu-yor svi' ish-veh sha' chaise-hal, heh tor potau ish-veh tor-mu-yor, heh tor nem-tor ish-veh k' ish-veh sha' el'ru tor din-tor havisham's tor-morrow asal. Heh lor-wuh-mussy me!" maf-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai, casting ska' ish-veh bonnet svi' sudden desperation, "la' i lamok talking tor mere mooncalfs, k' sa-kuk pumblechook waiting, heh wuh mare catching samu na' wuh svep, heh wuh sa-kan grimed k' crock heh kitek s' wuh isachya t' ish-veh patam tor wuh lad t' ish-veh ash'ya!" k' ik, she pounced fi-tor me, spo' wuh eagle fi' wuh lamb, heh t'nash-veh limuk vesh' lerakhovau vi' wooden yerak svi' ne'hal-tor, heh t'nash-veh patam vesh' shitau ne' sayumak t' masu-butts, heh i vesh' pu-tor, heh kneaded, heh towelled, heh thumped, heh harrowed, heh rasped, abi' i really vesh' ved be' myself. (i lau la' remark ik i suppose myself tor nam-tor weh-rom acquainted do sovek living ek'te'kru, k' wuh ridgy daya t' wuh wedding-mokov, be' dvun-tor unsympathetically abru' wuh komihn countenance.) lu t'nash-veh ablutions vesh' ovsoh, i vesh' shitau vi' sok'i linen t' wuh stiffest character, spo' wuh nu'ri penitent vi' sackcloth, heh vesh' trussed abru svi' t'nash-veh tightest heh fearfullest saikhut. I vesh' yi tefu abru' tor mr. Pumblechook, vi formally poprah me u' kuv au vesh' wuh sheriff, heh vi kal-tor ska' fi-tor me wuh starun ik i fai-tor au had vesh' dying tor tor ek' bi': "sa-kan, nam-tor ek'wak grateful tor ek' t'hylara, tonk'peh wa' unto au if katau du abru k' el'ru!" "rom-bye, joe!" "oekon kudau du, pip, hinek chap!" i had worla parted s' ish-veh fa', heh ra k' t'nash-veh feelings heh ra k' soapsuds, i kupi palikauk gla-tor rai yel s' wuh chaise-hal. Tonk'peh au twinkled si' veh k' veh, rik' throwing sovek ta'hal fi' wuh deshkau po fi' terra i vesh' going tor mavau na' din-tor havisham's, heh ra fi' terra i vesh' gishu tor mavau na'. Chapter viii. Mr. Pumblechook's premises svi' wuh pid yut t' wuh mahr-kel kahr, vesh' t' wuh peppercorny heh farinaceous character, u' wuh premises t' wuh cornchandler heh seedsman dang nam-tor. Ish-veh saudau tor me ik au bolau nam-tor wuh maut kunli sasu indeed, ki' ni wehk pi' zish-nef svi' ish-veh mahr-kel; heh i wondered lu i peeped vi' veh il dahkuh fi' wuh weh-neik tiers, heh gla-tor wuh tied-abru khav-kur dun packets svi'udish, whether wuh svai-nei heh kas-mur ek'wak aitlu t' wuh tok-ti gad tor shaya s' eifa jails, heh svai. Ish-veh vesh' svi' wuh lehkuh-mal asal po' t'nash-veh lashan ik i entertained nash speculation. Fi' wuh previous mu-yor, i had vesh' satau zehik tor sar-tak svi' wuh fik tvi-shal k' wuh sloping kamu, if vesh' ni neik svi' wuh teruk wilat wuh bedstead vesh', ik i ka'pra wuh tiles u' hasu k'svi wuh ash'ya t' t'nash-veh bezhun-zehl. Svi' wuh ka lehkuh-mal asal, i discovered wuh singular affinity svi' nei heh corduroys. Mr. Pumblechook sai-vel-tor corduroys, heh ni did ish-veh shopman; heh somehow, tra' vesh' wuh paik sov heh zahv pa' wuh corduroys, ni mau svi' wuh malat t' nei, heh wuh paik sov heh zahv pa' wuh nei, ni mau svi' wuh malat t' corduroys, ik i hardly fai-tor if vesh' if. Wuh ka opportunity dvin-tor me na' noticing ik mr. Pumblechook saudau tor spa-tor ish-veh business k' looking mes' wuh yut na' wuh saddler, vi saudau tor transact ish-veh business k' keeping ish-veh bezhun fi' wuh coachmaker, vi saudau tor prah fi' svi' ha'kiv k' putting ish-veh el'ru svi' ish-veh abru'lik heh contemplating wuh leipausu, vi svi' ish-veh da-tor hesha ish-veh kar heh nantau na' wuh grocer, vi lam-tor na' ish-veh svep heh luvau na' wuh meil-talsu. Wuh watchmaker, kwon-hau-ov poring abru' wuh pi' kitau-skaf k' wuh magnifying-makh na' ish-veh bezhun, heh kwon-hau-ov inspected k' wuh travek t' smock-pelal poring abru' ish-veh k'fai wuh makh t' ish-veh mahr-kel-krani, seemed tor nam-tor pa' wuh goh person svi' wuh pid yut t'vi trade engaged ish-veh attention. Mr. Pumblechook heh i breakfasted na' ohkuh o'wak-vel svi' wuh parlour za' wuh mahr-kel, du' wuh shopman nem-tor ish-veh mug t' theris-masu heh hunch t' kap heh butter fi' wuh sa'haf t' peas svi' wuh khom premises. I panah-tor mr. Pumblechook wretched apc'koik. Isha hasu ma k' t'nash-veh ko-kai's idea ik wuh mortifying heh penitential character ought tor nam-tor imparted tor t'nash-veh yokul-montra, isha giving me u' mau crumb u' tor-yehat svi' terish k' u' pi' butter, heh putting such wuh nosahp t' lamekh masu vi' t'nash-veh thas ik ish-veh would ma vesh' weht candid ki' losrak wuh thas si' altogether, ish-veh conversation consisted t' nothing tonk'peh nen-su'etek-ek-tal. Fi' t'nash-veh politely nufai-tor ish-veh rom-asal, au leralmin-tor, pompously, "stehkuh wak naukuh, sa-kan?" heh uf dang i nam-tor kup tor kilko-srashiv, sayutau svi' ik yut, svi' wuh flekh shi, fi' wuh herbosh skaun-sa'haf! I vesh' k'avon, tonk'peh fa' i had vitem-tor wuh morsel, au began wuh sahran hau-ov ik palesh-tor ek' k'fai wuh asal-yem. "stehkuh?" "heh kehkuh?" "heh ohkuh?" "heh shehkuh?" "heh dahkuh?" "heh lehkuh?" heh ni fi'. Heh po' tik khlop vesh' sashitau t', ish-veh vesh' u' mau u' i kupi tor tor prah wuh zeshaya il wuh sup, fa' wuh thurai sarlah; du' au hayal-tor na' ish-veh ease guessing nothing, heh eating bacon heh fal padukau, svi' (kuv i lau nam-tor kal-tor wuh sagluvaya) wuh gorging heh gormandizing manner. Na' such utvau, i vesh' maut glad lu lehkuh o'wak-vel sarlah heh etek palikau na' din-tor havisham's; hi i vesh' mokov na' t'nash-veh ease fundauik wuh manner svi' if i dang acquit myself ne' ik t'sai's kamu. K'svi wuh yonuk t' wuh wadan sarlah etek tor din-tor havisham's kelek, if vesh' t' hinek dok, heh dismal, heh had wuh lo'uk wehk shek-tukh mofek tor ish-veh. Ein t' wuh krani had vesh' walled abru; t' eifa ik hafau, ek' wuh weh-neik vesh' rustily barred. Tra' vesh' wuh courtyard svi' khom, heh ik vesh' barred; ni etek had tor bek-tor, po' ringing wuh kus-vakh, abi' ein veh dang sarlah tor tu'ash ish-veh. Du' etek bek-tor na' wuh temep, i peeped svi' (kauk yi mr. Pumblechook leralmin-tor, "heh leh-keh?" tonk'peh i pretended ri tor zhu-tor ish-veh), heh gla-tor ik na' wuh vla t' wuh kelek tra' vesh' wuh suk brewery. Rai fasan vesh' going fi' svi' ish-veh, heh rim seemed ki' hal-tor fi' na' wuh wu wu wak. Wuh krani vesh' ashenau, heh wuh pa'shik spes halishau "ra ahm?" tor if t'nash-veh spayek kilko-tor, "pumblechook." wuh spes fun-tor, "ved gas'rak, " heh wuh krani vesh' ikap-tor va'ashiv, heh wuh nu'ri t'sai sarlah mes' wuh kelek-ker, k' tal-muv svi' ish-veh el'ru. "nash, " leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook, "nam-tor pip." "nash nam-tor pip, nam-tor ish-veh?" fun-tor wuh nu'ri t'sai, vi vesh' maut takov heh seemed maut yaut; "sarlah svi', pip." mr. Pumblechook vesh' coming svi' isha, lu she pehkau ish-veh k' wuh temep. "oh!" she leralmin-tor. "did du istaya tor gla-tor din-tor havisham?" "kuv din-tor havisham istau tor gla-tor me, " fun-tor mr. Pumblechook, discomfited. "ah!" leralmin-tor wuh ko-kan; "tonk'peh gla-tor du she ri tor." she leralmin-tor ish-veh ni t'forti, heh svi' such wuh undiscussible yut, ik mr. Pumblechook, hi svi' wuh nosh t' ruffled dignity, kupi ri protest. Tonk'peh au eyed me severely, u' kuv i had ovsoh sovek-vel tor ish-veh!heh trashu k' wuh zhit reproachfully tefu: "sa-kan! Kal-tor ish-veh kloshai la' nam-tor wuh lit unto au if katau du abru k' el'ru!" i vesh' ri elik s' apprehension ik au would sarlah pla' tor propound k'fai wuh temep, "heh leh-sheh?" tonk'peh au didn't. T'nash-veh nu'ri conductress klacha wuh temep, heh etek went mes' wuh courtyard. Ish-veh vesh' elyutau heh sok'i, tonk'peh yar vesh' growing svi' kanok treshaya. Wuh brewery kelek had wuh pi' lane t' sviribaya k' ish-veh, heh wuh wooden temep t' ik lane lam-tor tu'ash, heh ek' wuh brewery mesakh lam-tor tu'ash, maf tor wuh pid enclosing temok; heh ek' vesh' herbosh heh disused. Wuh samu salan seemed tor salur colder tra' do s'udish wuh temep; heh ish-veh tor wuh shrill ralash svi' howling svi' heh si' na' wuh tu'ash vla t' wuh brewery, spo' wuh ralash t' salan svi' wuh rigging t' wuh hali na' masutra. Gla-tor ish-veh me looking na' ish-veh, heh she leralmin-tor, "du kupi mon rik' dash-tor ek' wuh karik naliveh ik's fas-tor tra' i', sa-kan." "i dang nah-tor i kupi, din-tor, " leralmin-tor i, svi' wuh fusik yut. "weh-rom ri ar'kadan tor fas-tor naliveh tra' i', il ish-veh would da-tor si' sfith, sa-kan; ri tor du nah-tor ni?" "ish-veh glazhau spo' ish-veh, din-tor." "ri ik anybody tvai tor ar'kadan, " she hau, "na' ik's ek' ovsoh k', heh wuh shi dungi lamok u' idle u' ish-veh nam-tor till ish-veh tevan-tor. U' tor karik naliveh, tra''s hiyet t' ish-veh svi' wuh cellars already, tor mastevau wuh manor kelek." [illustration] "nam-tor ik wuh ahm t' nash kelek, din-tor?" "veh t' its ahm, sa-kan." "ish-veh has weht do veh, yi, din-tor?" "veh weht. Its vath ahm vesh' satis; if nam-tor greek, il latin, il hebrew, il ek' threeor ek' veh tor mefor hiyet." "hiyet kelek, " leralmin-tor i; "ik's wuh curious ahm, din-tor." "ha, " she kilko-tor; "tonk'peh ish-veh tvai weht do ish-veh leralmin-tor. Ish-veh tvai, lu ish-veh vesh' putan-tor, ik whoever had nash kelek kupi aitlun nothing else. Au bolau ma vesh' easily satisfied svi' eifa gad, i dang nah-tor. Tonk'peh ri tor loiter, sa-kan." hi she puvutau me "sa-kan" ni k'ashiv, heh k' wuh carelessness ik vesh' irak s' complimentary, she vesh' t' pa' t'nash-veh sha' ya'shakhuv. She seemed mau older do i, veling, hasu wuh ko-kan, heh vaksurik heh shal-ma; heh she vesh' u' scornful t' me u' kuv she had vesh' veh-heh-dah-leh, heh wuh ko-te'kru. Etek went vi' wuh kelek k' wuh vla svep, wuh lo'uk khom entrance had dahkuh naf-elakh mes' ish-veh s'udish, heh wuh wuh'rak vel i pubeglanau vesh', ik wuh tvur vesh' ek' gu'gelik, heh ik she had losrak wuh ha'fek yontau tra'. She nem-tor ish-veh abru, heh etek went k'fai weht tvur heh abru wuh staircase, heh fam dvun ish-veh vesh' ek' gu'gelik, heh goh wuh ha'fek lighted etek. Na' kim-shah sarlah etek tor wuh svep t' wuh tvi-shal, heh she leralmin-tor, "hal-tor svi'." i kilko-tor, weht svi' shyness do politeness, "po' du, din-tor." tor nash she fun-tor: "ri tor nam-tor ridiculous, sa-kan; i am ri going svi'." heh scornfully lates-tor maf, andwhat vesh' worsetook wuh ha'fek k' ish-veh. Nash vesh' maut uncomfortable, heh i vesh' ulef kwes. However, wuh goh vel tor nam-tor ovsoh hasu tor knock na' wuh svep, i knocked, heh vesh' var-tor s' k'svi tor svi-tor. I svi-tor, therefore, heh afer-tor myself svi' wuh takov suk tvi-shal, muhl lighted k' wax ha'fek. Rai glimpse t' gad-ha'khlup vesh' tor nam-tor gla-tor svi' ish-veh. Ish-veh vesh' wuh sai-vel-tor-tvi-shal, u' i supposed s' wuh furniture, hi mau t' ish-veh vesh' t' shidau heh nam-tor-tor yi ved ri-fainu tor me. Tonk'peh prominent svi' ish-veh vesh' wuh draped pasu k' wuh gilded looking-makh, heh ik i tor si' palikauk glan tor nam-tor wuh tok-ti t'sai's sai-vel-tor-pasu. Whether i dang ma tor si' nash vel ni ak kuv tra' had vesh' rai tok-ti t'sai sitting na' ish-veh, i fam yehat leralmin. Svi' wuh kar-ku-san, k' wuh kar-nef resting fi' wuh pasu heh ish-veh patam leaning fi' ik el'ru, hayal-tor wuh strangest t'sai i ma ek'wak gla-tor, il dungau ek'wak gla-tor. She vesh' sai-vel-tor svi' don-ka tukh, satins, heh lace, heh silks, ek' t' wan-kur. Ish-veh ash'el vesh' wan-kur. Heh she had wuh wu wan-kur veil nerik s' ish-veh isachya, heh she had bridal svai svi' ish-veh isachya, tonk'peh ish-veh isachya vesh' wan-kur. Ein ugelik ek'zer sparkled fi' ish-veh talu heh fi' ish-veh el'ru, heh ein vath ek'zer ti sparkling fi' wuh pasu. Sai-vel, lehkuh splendid do wuh sai-vel she sai-vel-tor, heh ulef-sa'haf-tor lap-fek, vesh' scattered pa'. She had ri ved shahtau sai-vel-tor, na' she had tonk'peh veh ash'el fi', wuh vath vesh' fi' wuh pasu be' ish-veh el'ru, ish-veh veil vesh' tonk'peh ulef arranged, ish-veh glantau heh naf-elakh vesh' ri shitau fi', heh ein lace na' ish-veh bosom ti k' eifa trinkets, heh k' ish-veh handkerchief, heh gloves, heh ein svai, heh wuh prayer-dunap ek' confusedly heaped pa' wuh looking-makh. Ish-veh vesh' ri svi' wuh wuh'rak zamu moments ik vesht gla-tor nash-veh ek' aifa vel, hi vesht gla-tor nash-veh weht t' au svi' wuh wuh'rak moments do lau nam-tor supposed. Tonk'peh i gla-tor ik kanok-vei k'svi t'nash-veh zan-tor if ought tor nam-tor wan-kur, had vesh' wan-kur wu ago, heh had pakik its lustre heh vesh' spoh-tor heh kin-kur. Vesht gla-tor nash-veh ik wuh bride k'svi wuh bridal sai-vel had withered spo' wuh sai-vel, heh spo' wuh svai, heh had rai ugel'es losrak tonk'peh wuh ugel'es t' ish-veh sunken bezhun. Vesht gla-tor nash-veh ik wuh sai-vel had vesh' shitau fi-tor wuh rounded khlop t' wuh nu'ri kosu, heh ik wuh khlop fi-tor if ish-veh i' geldau thal had shrunk tor wadi heh hinek. Wuh'wak, i had vesh' taken tor gla-tor ein ghastly waxwork na' wuh rom, representing i fai-tor ri ra impossible personage lying svi' fupa s'. Wuh'wak, i had vesh' taken tor veh t' etwel hinek masu-kastra churches tor gla-tor wuh hinek-teraya svi' wuh vitush t' wuh don-ka sai-vel ik had vesh' hil-tor s' wuh vault ne' wuh church pavement. I', waxwork heh hinek-teraya seemed tor ma gu'gelik bezhun ik dvun-tor heh glazhau na' me. I dang ma lit'dhae, kuv i kupi. "vi nam-tor ish-veh?" leralmin-tor wuh t'sai na' wuh pasu. "pip, ma'am." "pip?" "mr. Pumblechook's sa-kan, ma'am. Cometo mavau." "sarlah nearer; kal-tor me glazhau na' du. Sarlah ikap-tor." ish-veh vesh' lu i lam-tor fa' ish-veh, avoiding ish-veh bezhun, ik i nem-tor pitoh t' wuh surrounding vel svi' detail, heh gla-tor ik ish-veh glantau had pehkau na' dah-leh minutes tor naukuh, heh ik wuh wak-vel svi' wuh tvi-shal had pehkau na' dah-leh minutes tor naukuh. "glazhau na' me, " leralmin-tor din-tor havisham. "du nam-tor ri kwes t' wuh kosu vi has worla gla-tor wuh yel opi' du vesh' pukeshta?" i regret tor fupa s' ik i vesh' ri kwes t' telling wuh masuk' ti comprehended svi' wuh kilko-srashiv "rai." "tor du fai-tor ra i esta la'?" she leralmin-tor, laying ish-veh el'ru, veh fi-tor wuh vath, fi' ish-veh losrak vla. "ha, ma'am." (ish-veh tor me nah-tor t' wuh nu'ri sasu.) "ra tor i esta?" "ish-veh khaf-spol." "pushau!" she uttered wuh zhit k' wuh nayik glazhau, heh k' karik emphasis, heh k' wuh flekh abru'teruklar-ru'lut ik had wuh ves t' boast svi' ish-veh. Afterwards she potau ish-veh el'ru tra' na' wuh pi' du', heh slowly nem-tor au maf u' kuv au vesh' ras. "i am zungor, " leralmin-tor din-tor havisham. "i aitlun mutaya, heh i ma ovsoh k' sasu heh kosu. Mavau." i nah-tor ish-veh dungi nam-tor conceded k' t'nash-veh danik disputatious reader, ik she kupi hardly ma khartau wuh unfortunate sa-kan tor tor sovek-vel svi' wuh eik panu weht rihagik tor nam-tor ovsoh ne' wuh circumstances. "i sometimes ma has-bosh fancies, " she went fi', "heh i ma wuh has-bosh fancy ik i aitlun tor gla-tor ein mavau. Tra', tra'!" k' wuh impatient dvun t' wuh ozh t' ish-veh gas'rak el'ru; "mavau, mavau, mavau!" na' wuh moment, k' wuh pthak t' t'nash-veh ko-kai's working me fa' t'nash-veh bezhun, i had wuh desperate idea t' starting pauk wuh tvi-shal svi' wuh assumed character t' mr. Pumblechook's chaise-hal. Tonk'peh i olau myself ni unequal tor wuh performance ik i mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh abru, heh lam-tor looking na' din-tor havisham svi' ra i suppose she nem-tor na' wuh dogged manner, inasmuch u' she leralmin-tor, lu etek had taken wuh rom glazhau na' tik vath, "nam-tor du kir heh obstinate?" "rai, ma'am, i am maut sorry na' du, heh maut sorry i mokuhlek't mavau aishan i'. Kuv du complain t' me i dungau prah vi' trouble k' t'nash-veh ko-kai, ni i would tor ish-veh kuv i kupi; tonk'peh ish-veh's ni uzh la', heh ni flekh, heh ni tok-ti, heh melancholy." i pehkau, fearing i lau leralmin nuh' mau, il had already leralmin-tor ish-veh, heh etek nem-tor wuh'ashiv glazhau na' tik vath. Fa' she stariben va'ashiv, she da-tor ish-veh bezhun s' me, heh glazhau na' wuh sai-vel she sai-vel-tor, heh na' wuh sai-vel-tor-pasu, heh t'forti na' herself svi' wuh looking-makh. "ni uzh tor ish-veh, " she muttered, "ni hinek tor me; ni flekh tor ish-veh, ni familiar tor me; ni melancholy tor fi' t' etek! Vutau estella." u' she vesh' fam dvun looking na' wuh haulan t' herself, i nahp she vesh' fam dvun talking tor herself, heh potau hizhuk. "vutau estella, " she ashiv-tor, flashing wuh glazhau na' me. "du mokuhlek tor ik. Vutau estella. Na' wuh svep." tor lamok svi' wuh gu'gelik svi' wuh mysterious tvur t' wuh ri-fainu kelek, bawling estella tor wuh scornful nu'ri t'sai neither visible il responsive, heh olaya ish-veh wuh dreadful liberty ni tor roar si' ish-veh ahm, vesh' siyah u' rasahkos u' mavaun tor zek. Tonk'peh she kilko-tor na' kim-shah, heh ish-veh ta'hal sarlah bi' wuh gu'gelik tvur spo' wuh yel. Din-tor havisham beckoned ish-veh tor sarlah ikap-tor, heh nem-tor abru wuh ek'zer s' wuh pasu, heh ar'kada its daya fi-tor ish-veh rom nu'ri bosom heh tehnat ish-veh takov khav-kur isachya. "ish-veh sha', veh gad, t'nash-veh tal-kam, heh du dungi nam-tor-tor ish-veh muhl. Kal-tor me gla-tor du mavau nop k' nash sa-kan." "k' nash sa-kan? Po, au nam-tor wuh tsuri labouring-sa-kan!" i nahp i overheard din-tor havisham kilko-srashiv, goh ish-veh seemed ni rikesik, "muhl? Du mokuhlek shaya ish-veh khaf-spol." "ra tor du mavau, sa-kan?" ya'akash estella t' myself, k' wuh greatest disdain. "nothing tonk'peh beggar t'nash-veh behsu, din-tor." "beggar ish-veh, " leralmin-tor din-tor havisham tor estella. Ni etek hayal-tor ne' tor nop. Ish-veh vesh' yi i began tor ken-tor ik kanok-vei svi' wuh tvi-shal had pehkau, spo' wuh glantau heh wuh wak-vel, wuh akarshif ago. I pubeglanau ik din-tor havisham shitau ne' wuh ek'zer exactly fi' wuh gla-tor s' if she had taken ish-veh abru. U' estella dealt wuh nop, i glanced na' wuh sai-vel-tor-pasu va'ashiv, heh gla-tor ik wuh ash'el fi-tor ish-veh, wuh'wak wan-kur, i' kin-kur, had worla vesh' worn. I glanced ne' na' wuh ash'ya s' if wuh ash'el vesh' tadek-adir, heh gla-tor ik wuh silk ash'ai fi' ish-veh, wuh'wak wan-kur, i' kin-kur, had vesh' trodden ragged. Rik' nash pehkaya t' kanok-vei, nash standing fam dvun t' ek' wuh spoh nehau vel, ri kauk wuh withered bridal sai-vel fi' wuh neshau shid kupi ma glazhau ni spo' shi'vukhut-sai-vel, il wuh wu veil ni spo' wuh shroud. Ni she hayal-tor, tevikeh-spo', u' etek mavau na' nop; wuh frillings heh trimmings fi' ish-veh bridal sai-vel, looking spo' earthy dun. I fai-tor nothing yi t' wuh discoveries ik nam-tor occasionally tor t' ak'shem visolektau svi' t'kahr wak, if tevan tor grazhiv svi' wuh moment t' hasu distinctly gla-tor; tonk'peh, i ma k'ashiv nahp opi', ik she bolau ma glazhau u' kuv wuh admission t' wuh malatik ta'hal t' gad would ma kwul-tor ish-veh tor grazhiv. "au calls wuh knaves jacks, nash sa-kan!" leralmin-tor estella k' disdain, fa' etwel wuh'rak zhagra vesh' si'. "heh ra dirik el'ru au has! Heh ra bali kluf!" i had worla nahp t' hasu kafusik t' t'nash-veh el'ru fa'; tonk'peh i began tor panah-tor au wuh maut indifferent shif. Ish-veh contempt na' me vesh' ni karik, ik ish-veh became infectious, heh i kum-tor ish-veh. She skil-tor wuh zhagra, heh i dealt. I misdealt, u' vesh' goh malatik, lu i fai-tor she vesh' lying svi' bek-tor na' me tor tor riyeht; heh she denounced me na' wuh stupid, om'toi labouring-sa-kan. "du leralmin nothing t' ish-veh, " remarked din-tor havisham tor me, u' she glazhau fi'. "she leralmin-tor wehk lerash vel t' du, tonk'peh du leralmin nothing t' ish-veh. Ra tor du nah-tor t' ish-veh?" "i ri tor spo' tor leralmin, " i stammered. "var-tor me svi' t'nash-veh kaluk, " leralmin-tor din-tor havisham, bending ne'. "i nah-tor she nam-tor maut yaut, " i kilko-tor, svi' wuh zhal. "sovek-kitok?" "i nah-tor she nam-tor maut takov." "sovek-kitok?" "i nah-tor she nam-tor maut insulting." (she vesh' looking na' me yi k' wuh glazhau t' supreme aversion.) "sovek-kitok?" "i nah-tor i dang spo' tor hal-tor ha-kel." "heh worla gla-tor ish-veh va'ashiv, hi she nam-tor ni takov?" "i am ri sure ik i shouldn't spo' tor gla-tor ish-veh va'ashiv, tonk'peh i dang spo' tor hal-tor ha-kel i'." "du dungau hal-tor ak, " leralmin-tor din-tor havisham, aloud. "mavau wuh zhagra si'." saving na' wuh veh flekh abru'teruklar-ru'lut palikauk, i dang ma olau siyah sure ik din-tor havisham's limuk kupi ri abru'teruklar-ru'lut. Ish-veh had eku-tor vi' wuh tun-tor heh brooding sagluvaya, danik kesik lu ek' wuh vel pa' ish-veh had shetau transfixed, heh ish-veh glazhau u' kuv nothing kupi ek'wak abertau ish-veh abru va'ashiv. Ish-veh tuf had eku-tor, ni ik she stooped; heh ish-veh spes had eku-tor, ni ik she stariben neik, heh k' wuh tevik lull fi-tor ish-veh; altogether, she had wuh appearance t' having eku-tor ak'shem heh soul, k'svi heh rik', ne' wuh rasath t' wuh crushing salur. I mavau wuh zhagra tor wuh shaht k' estella, heh she beggared me. She threw wuh nop ne' fi' wuh pasu lu she had skil-tor au ek', u' kuv she despised au na' having vesh' skil-tor t' me. "lu dungau i ma du la' va'ashiv?" leralmin-tor din-tor havisham. "kal-tor me nah-tor." i vesh' palikaya tor remind ish-veh ik tor-gad vesh' gad, lu she rihamau me k' ish-veh former impatient dvun t' wuh ozh t' ish-veh gas'rak el'ru. "tra', tra'! I fai-tor nothing t' gad t' wuh wehk gad; i fai-tor nothing t' wehk gad t' wuh tevun. Sarlah va'ashiv po' shehkuh gad. Du zhu-tor?" "ha, ma'am." "estella, nem-tor ish-veh ne'. Kal-tor ish-veh ma vel tor yokul, heh kal-tor ish-veh roam heh glazhau pa' ish-veh du' au yokul. Hal-tor, pip." i zahal-tor wuh ha'fek ne', u' i had zahal-tor wuh ha'fek abru, heh she lam-tor ish-veh svi' wuh shi wilat etek had afer-tor ish-veh. Abi' she tu'ash wuh vla entrance, i had fancied, rik' thinking pa' ish-veh, ik ish-veh bolau necessarily nam-tor mu-yor-wak. Wuh rush t' wuh gad-ha'khlup ved confounded me, heh tor me olau u' kuv i had vesh' svi' wuh candlelight t' wuh flekh tvi-shal wehk wadan. "du nam-tor tor bek-tor la', du sa-kan, " leralmin-tor estella; heh sasaudau heh a'ing wuh svep. I nem-tor wuh opportunity t' hasu sa'awek svi' wuh courtyard tor glazhau na' t'nash-veh dirik el'ru heh t'nash-veh tsuri kluf. T'nash-veh opinion t' eifa accessories vesh' ri favourable. Au had worla troubled me fa', tonk'peh au troubled me i', u' vulgar si-krus. I satalau tor ya'akash joe po au had ek'wak saven-tor me tor vutau eifa bikuv-nop jacks, if ought tor nam-tor puvutau knaves. I istau joe had vesh' rather weht genteelly katau abru, heh yi i dang ma vesh' ni nuh'. Sarlah ish-veh pla', k' ein kap heh kahm heh wuh pi' mug t' naliveh. She shitau wuh mug ne' fi' wuh kov t' wuh ker, heh mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh kap heh kahm rik' looking na' me, u' insolently u' kuv i vesh' wuh dog svi' disgrace. I vesh' ni humiliated, dash-tor, spurned, puthrap-tor, reshnek, sorry, i fam yehat kwul fi-tor wuh gas'rak ahm na' wuh smartgod fai-tor ra its ahm vesh', ik bezhun-masu palikau tor t'nash-veh bezhun. Wuh moment au sprang tra', wuh ko-kan glazhau na' me k' wuh sahris delight svi' having vesh' wuh aishan t' au. Nash mazhiv-kur-tor me tepul tor potau au pla' heh tor glazhau na' ish-veh: ni, she mazhiv-kur-tor wuh contemptuous tossbut k' wuh kash-ral, i nahp, t' having tor nuh' sure ik i vesh' ni woundedand losrak me. Tonk'peh lu she vesh' hal-tor, i glazhau pa' me na' wuh shi tor ip-sut t'nash-veh limuk svi', heh prah za' veh t' wuh temep svi' wuh brewery-lane, heh gal-tor t'nash-veh sleeve tehnat wuh temok tra', heh gal-tor t'nash-veh fa-patam fi' ish-veh heh maf-tor. U' i maf-tor, i kicked wuh temok, heh nem-tor wuh lerash kuvoran na' t'nash-veh isachya; ni sfith(-) vesh' t'nash-veh feelings, heh ni nasik vesh' wuh klon rik' wuh ahm, ik bolau counteraction. T'nash-veh ko-kai's bringing abru had tor me kash-zakar. Svi' wuh pi' panu svi' if kanu ma ish-veh nam whosoever katau au abru, tra' nam-tor nothing ni finely pakashogau heh ni finely olau u' injustice. Ish-veh lau nam-tor goh pi' injustice ik wuh kan mokuhlek nam-tor ko'nar tor; tonk'peh wuh kan nam-tor pi', heh its panu nam-tor pi', heh its rocking-jarel lam-tor u' wehk el'ru pid, fupa s' wef, u' wuh suk'-boned irish shi'ka'ree. K'svi myself, i had potun-tor, s' t'nash-veh babyhood, wuh perpetual conflict k' injustice. I had fainu, s' wuh wak lu i kupi stariben, ik t'nash-veh ko-kai, svi' ish-veh capricious heh khrashik coercion, vesh' unjust tor me. I had tishaya wuh profound conviction ik ish-veh bringing me abru k' el'ru mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh rai gas'rak tor katau me abru k' hutau. K'fai ek' t'nash-veh taflaya, disgraces, riyokul, heh vigils, heh vath penitential performances, i had nursed nash assurance; heh tor t'nash-veh communing ni mau k' ish-veh, svi' wuh solitary heh unprotected yut, i svi' lo'uk krus dzhinau wuh kla-min ik i vesh' morally timid heh maut kash-zakar. I prah rid t' t'nash-veh dash-tor feelings na' wuh wak k' kicking au vi' wuh brewery temok, heh kuvoran-tor au s' t'nash-veh isachya, heh yi i smoothed t'nash-veh limuk k' t'nash-veh sleeve, heh sarlah s' za' wuh temep. Wuh kap heh kahm vesh' acceptable, heh wuh naliveh vesh' warming heh tingling, heh i vesh' ak svi' tam'a tor glazhau pa' me. Tor nam-tor sure, ish-veh vesh' wuh deserted shi, ne' tor wuh pigeon-kelek svi' wuh brewery-ker, if had vesh' blown pi'tak-tor fi' its fek k' ein pid salan, heh would ma tor wuh pigeons nah-tor themselves na' masutra, kuv tra' had vesh' sovek pigeons tra' tor nam-tor rocked k' ish-veh. Tonk'peh tra' vesh' rai pigeons svi' wuh dove-cot, rai jarel svi' wuh tihet, rai pigs svi' wuh sty, rai malt svi' wuh storehouse, rai fnish-tor t' kap-yar heh naliveh svi' wuh khaf-tukh il wuh suk'matuhlek. Ek' wuh nam-tor-tor heh scents t' wuh brewery lau ma na-sovau k' its kim-shah reek t' vuzh. Svi' wuh k'-ker, tra' vesh' wuh shi'kwai t' herbosh casks, if had wuh ac'ruth sfith remembrance t' weh-rom gad svizh-tor pa' au; tonk'peh ish-veh vesh' nuh' sfith tor nam-tor nar-tor u' wuh li-fal t' wuh naliveh ik vesh' hal-tor, heh svi' nash respect i vokau eifa recluses u' hasu spo' danik vath. Za' wuh furthest shaht t' wuh brewery, vesh' wuh lan bah-ker k' wuh hinek temok; ri ni pid tonk'peh ik i kupi struggle abru heh meskaraya fi' wu hiyet tor glazhau abru' ish-veh, heh gla-tor ik wuh lan bah-ker vesh' wuh bah-ker t' wuh kelek, heh ik ish-veh vesh' overgrown k' tangled vedik, tonk'peh ik tra' vesh' wuh yut fi-tor wuh yar-kur heh kin-kur yut, u' kuv ein veh sometimes lates-tor tra', heh ik estella vesh' walking maf s' me kauk yi. Tonk'peh she seemed tor nam-tor kanok-wilat. Na' lu i yielded tor wuh temptation presented k' wuh casks, heh began tor lates fi' au, vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh walking fi' au na' wuh shaht t' wuh ker t' casks. She had ish-veh pla' na' me, heh meskarau ish-veh takov khav-kur isachya sak-tor si' svi' ish-veh dahkuh el'ru, heh worla glazhau pauk, heh be' dvun-tor s' t'nash-veh zan-tor directly. Ni, svi' wuh brewery itself, k' if i tvai wuh suk elyutau lofty shi svi' if au nam-tor-tor tor tor wuh naliveh, heh wilat wuh fasan utensils fam dvun vesh'. Lu i wuh'rak went vi' ish-veh, heh, rather oppressed k' its gloom, lam-tor be' wuh svep looking pa' me, vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh be' dvun among wuh sayonotau yon, heh she-tor ein ta'hal shek-tukh kaiden, heh hal-tor si' k' wuh tanaf-shi'gluvaun pid overhead, u' kuv she vesh' going si' vi' wuh igen. Ish-veh vesh' svi' nash shi, heh i', ik wuh flekh vel pavesh-tor tor t'nash-veh fancy. I nahp ish-veh wuh flekh vel yi, heh i nahp ish-veh wuh ri-fainusu vel wu afterwards. I da-tor t'nash-veh eyesa pi' ha'khlup-ne-tor k' looking abru na' wuh le-suyik lighttowards wuh lo'uk wooden ha-zehl svi' wuh neik sha-ti t' wuh kelek be' me fi' t'nash-veh gas'rak el'ru, heh vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh khlop hanging tra' k' wuh talu. Wuh khlop ek' svi' kin-kur wan-kur, k' tonk'peh veh ash'el tor wuh ash'ya; heh ish-veh geldau ni, ik kupi gla-tor nash-veh ik wuh spoh-tor trimmings t' wuh sai-vel vesh' spo' earthy dun, heh ik wuh limuk vesh' din-tor havisham's, k' wuh dvun going abru' wuh bosh countenance u' kuv she vesh' trying tor vutau tor me. Svi' wuh vash t' seeing wuh khlop, heh svi' wuh vash t' hasu ac'ruth ik ish-veh had ri vesh' tra' wuh moment fa', i palikauk sahr-tor s' ish-veh, heh yi sahr-tor na' ish-veh. Heh t'nash-veh vash vesh' greatest t' ek' lu i afer-tor rai khlop tra'. Nothing lehkuh tor wuh le-suyik ta'hal t' wuh cheerful igen, wuh glan t' sutra be' dvun-tor mesakh wuh mofek t' wuh kelek-ker temep, heh wuh zaprah-tor vi-yumuk t' wuh shom t' wuh kap heh kahm heh naliveh, would ma katau me pauk. Kauk k' eifa mamuk, i lau ri ma sarlah tor myself u' ak u' i did, tonk'peh ik vesht gla-tor nash-veh estella approaching k' wuh tal-muv, tor kal-tor me si'. She would ma ein rom utvau na' looking ne' fi-tor me, i nahp, kuv gla-tor ish-veh me koltha; heh she would ma rai rom utvau. She mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh triumphant glance svi' be' dvun-tor me, u' kuv she rejoiced ik t'nash-veh el'ru vesh' ni dirik heh t'nash-veh kluf vesh' ni bali, heh she tu'ash wuh temep, heh lam-tor holding ish-veh. I vesh' be' dvun-tor si' rik' looking na' ish-veh, lu she estuhl me k' wuh taunting el'ru. "po ri tor du maf?" "fai'ei i ri tor aitlun tor." "du tor, " leralmin-tor she. "du ma vesh' maf-tor till du nam-tor ulef glan-fam, heh du nam-tor be' maf-tor va'ashiv i'." she abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor contemptuously, kwitau me si', heh klacha wuh temep fi-tor me. I went zehik tor mr. Pumblechook's, heh vesh' immensely vas-tor tor talal ish-veh ri na' ha-kel. Ni, leaving zhit k' wuh shopman fi' ra gad i vesh' aitlu na' din-tor havisham's va'ashiv, i eku ska' fi' wuh kehkuh-mile lates tor etwel zhuk-fasek; pondering, u' i went bi', fi' ek' i had gla-tor, heh deeply revolving ik i vesh' wuh tsuri labouring-sa-kan; ik t'nash-veh el'ru vesh' dirik; ik t'nash-veh kluf vesh' bali; ik i had tevan-tor vi' wuh despicable es'merka t' calling knaves jacks; ik i vesh' mau weht ignorant do i had panah-tor myself kim-shah mu-yor, heh paik ik i vesh' svi' wuh neik-ha-tor rasahkos yut. Chapter ix. Lu i pulau ha-kel, t'nash-veh ko-kai vesh' maut curious tor fai-tor ek' pa' din-tor havisham's, heh ya'akash wuh su'etek t' deshkau. Heh i ak afer-tor myself getting heavily bumped s' za' svi' wuh nape t' wuh talu heh wuh pi' t' wuh pla', heh having t'nash-veh limuk ignominiously shoved tehnat wuh af'tum temok, fai'ei i did ri kilko-srashiv eifa deshkau na' sufficient wu-vath. Kuv wuh dread t' ri hasu ken-tor nam-tor ipik svi' wuh thasek t' vath nu'ri sutra tor sovek-vel spo' wuh sadvun tor if ish-veh nam-tor-tor tor nam-tor ipik svi' t'nash-veh, if i panah-tor yesik, u' i ma rai particular utvau tor suspect myself t' having vesh' wuh monstrosity, ish-veh nam-tor wuh tal-muv tor wehk reservations. I olau convinced ik kuv i kethelvau din-tor havisham's u' t'nash-veh bezhun had gla-tor ish-veh, i dang ri nam-tor ken-tor. Ri goh ik, tonk'peh i olau convinced ik din-tor havisham nuh' would ri nam-tor ken-tor; heh hi she vesh' perfectly incomprehensible tor me, i entertained wuh impression ik tra' would nam-tor vel dirik heh treacherous svi' t'nash-veh dragging ish-veh u' she really vesh' (tor leralmin nothing t' din-tor estella) fa' wuh contemplation t' mrs. Joe. Consequently, i leralmin-tor u' pi' u' i kupi, heh had t'nash-veh limuk shoved tehnat wuh af'tum temok. Wuh rasahkos t' ish-veh vesh' ik ik bullying hinek pumblechook, preyed fi-tor k' wuh devouring curiosity tor nam-tor informed t' ek' i had gla-tor heh puzhu-tor, sarlah gaping abru' svi' ish-veh chaise-hal na' theris-masu-wak, ki' wuh details divulged tor ish-veh. Heh wuh mere glan t' wuh torment, k' ish-veh fishy bezhun heh ru'lut tu'ash, ish-veh mazhivik isachya inquisitively fi' shaht, heh ish-veh waistcoat heaving k' salanayik nen-su'etek-ek-tal, tor me vicious svi' t'nash-veh reticence. "muhl, sa-kan, " sa-kuk pumblechook began, u' ak u' au vesh' hayal-tor svi' wuh ku-san t' dor k' wuh yon. "uf did du prah fi' abru kahr?" i kilko-tor, "takov muhl, osu, " heh t'nash-veh ko-kai hutau ish-veh ozh-dukal na' me. "takov muhl?" mr. Pumblechook ashiv-tor. "takov muhl nam-tor rai kilko-srashiv. Var-tor etek ra du tvai k' takov muhl, sa-kan?" whitewash fi' wuh fa-patam lerashau wuh shi'nahp vi' wuh fupa s' t' obstinacy sos'eh. Anyhow, k' whitewash s' wuh temok fi' t'nash-veh fa-patam, t'nash-veh obstinacy vesh' adamantine. I haul-tor na' ein wak, heh yi kilko-tor u' kuv i had discovered wuh uzh idea, "i tvai takov muhl." t'nash-veh ko-kai k' wuh sporun t' impatience vesh' going tor hash-tor na' me, i had rai duv t' defence, na' joe vesh' toranik svi' wuh zhuk-fasek, lu mr. Pumblechook interposed k' "rai! Ri tor pak-tor ish-veh temper. Trasha nash lad tor me, ma'am; trasha nash lad tor me." mr. Pumblechook yi da-tor me na' ish-veh, u' kuv au vesh' going tor tresahk t'nash-veh isachya, heh leralmin-tor, "wuh'rak (tor prah etwel nahp svi' zek): keh-leh-rehkuh pence?" i ka'pra wuh consequences t' replying "kehkuh hundred plesh-tor, " heh finding au tehnat me, went u' be' wuh kilko-srashiv u' i couldwhich vesh' ein-wilat pa' eightpence ska'. Mr. Pumblechook yi shitau me k'fai t'nash-veh pence-pasu s' "leh-dah pence tor veh shilling, " abru tor "keh-leh pence tor rehkuh heh fourpence, " heh yi triumphantly halishau, u' kuv au had ovsoh na' me, "i'! Uf mau nam-tor keh-leh-rehkuh pence?" tor if i kilko-tor, po' wuh wu tvi-wak t' haulan, "i ri tor fai-tor." heh i vesh' ni aggravated ik i siyah vet kuv i did fai-tor. Mr. Pumblechook ar'kada ish-veh patam spo' wuh wufkau tor wufkau ish-veh s' me, heh leralmin-tor, "nam-tor keh-leh-rehkuh pence stehkuh heh sixpence rehkuh fardens, na' instance?" "ha!" leralmin-tor i. Heh hi t'nash-veh ko-kai instantly boxed t'nash-veh kaluk, ish-veh vesh' highly gratifying tor me tor gla-tor ik wuh kilko-srashiv spoilt ish-veh kha'wal, heh katau ish-veh tor wuh tevik pehkaya. "sa-kan! Ra spo' nam-tor din-tor havisham?" mr. Pumblechook began va'ashiv lu au had recovered; folding ish-veh kar wufik fi' ish-veh tuf heh applying wuh wufkau. "maut ha-vol heh gu'gelik, " i var-tor ish-veh. "nam-tor she, sa-kuk?" ya'akash t'nash-veh ko-kai. Mr. Pumblechook winked assent; s' if i na' wuh'wak inferred ik au had worla gla-tor din-tor havisham, na' she vesh' nothing t' wuh ves. "rom!" leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook conceitedly. ("nash nam-tor wuh yut ki' ish-veh! Etek nam-tor palikaya tor meskaraya etwel sha', i nah-tor, mum?") "i am sure, sa-kuk, " fun-tor mrs. Joe, "i istaya du had ish-veh kwon-hau-ov; du fai-tor ni muhl uf tor deal k' ish-veh." "i', sa-kan! Ra vesh' she wuh-doing t', lu du went svi' nash-gad?" ya'akash mr. Pumblechook. "she vesh' sitting, " i kilko-tor, "svi' wuh nesh-kur velvet coach." mr. Pumblechook heh mrs. Joe nantau na' veh anotheras au muhl mightand fi' ashiv-tor, "svi' wuh nesh-kur velvet coach?" "ha, " leralmin-tor i. "heh din-tor estellathat's ish-veh ko-bath, i thinkhanded ish-veh svi' cake heh wine na' wuh coach-krani, fi' wuh pi-maat-tukh math. Heh etek ek' had cake heh wine fi' pi-maat-tukh math. Heh i prah abru za' wuh coach tor yokul t'nash-veh, fai'ei she var-tor me tor." "vesh' anybody else tra'?" ya'akash mr. Pumblechook. "kehkuh dogs, " leralmin-tor i. "suk il pi'?" "immense, " leralmin-tor i. "heh au fought na' veal-cutlets s' wuh haul-tukh ki'haf." mr. Pumblechook heh mrs. Joe nantau na' veh wuh'ashiv va'ashiv, svi' utter tauraya. I vesh' perfectly frantic, wuh reckless toglantausu ne' wuh torture, heh would ma var-tor au sovek-vel. "wilat vesh' nash coach, svi' wuh ahm t' gracious?" ya'akash t'nash-veh ko-kai. "svi' din-tor havisham's tvi-shal." au nantau va'ashiv. "tonk'peh tra' weren't sovek jarel tor ish-veh." i hau nash saving clause, svi' wuh moment t' rejecting kehkuh richly caparisoned coursers if i had had kwai nahp t' harnessing. "mokuhlek nash nam-tor tor-yehat, sa-kuk?" ya'akash mrs. Joe. "ra mokuhlek wuh sa-kan tvai?" "i'll var-tor du, mum, " leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook. "t'nash-veh opinion nam-tor, ish-veh's wuh sedan-ku-san. She's flighty, du fai-tor, maut flighty, ved flighty hiyet tor be' dvun ish-veh gad svi' wuh sedan-ku-san." "did du ek'wak gla-tor ish-veh svi' ish-veh, sa-kuk?" ya'akash mrs. Joe. "uf sos, " au fun-tor, punekwitau tor wuh admission, "lu i worla gla-tor ish-veh svi' t'nash-veh ha'kiv? Worla clapped bezhun fi-tor ish-veh!" "goodness, sa-kuk! Heh wi du ma spoken tor ish-veh?" "po, ri tor du fai-tor, " leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook, testily, "ik lu i ma vesh' tra', i ma vesh' nem-tor abru tor wuh si' ish-veh svep, heh wuh svep has lam-tor ajar, heh she has stariben tor me ik yut. Ri tor leralmin du ri tor fai-tor ik, mum. Howsever, wuh sa-kan went tra' tor mavau. Ra did du mavau na', sa-kan?" "etek mavau k' haifan, " i leralmin-tor. (i eit'jae tor glantau ik i nah-tor t' myself k' tauraya, lu i recall wuh ti i var-tor fi' nash occasion.) "haifan!" echoed t'nash-veh ko-kai. "ha, " leralmin-tor i. "estella pral-tor wuh pla-kur haifan, heh i pral-tor wuh yon-kur veh, heh din-tor havisham pral-tor veh sprinkled ek' abru' k' pi' pi-maat-tukh yel, si' na' wuh coach-krani. Heh yi etek ek' pral-tor etwel shek heh hurrahed." "shek!" ashiv-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai. "wilat did du prah shek s'?" "s' wuh cupboard, " leralmin-tor i. "heh vesht gla-tor nash-veh el'ru-pohshayek svi' ish-veh, heh khlup, heh has-tal. Heh tra' vesh' rai gad-ha'khlup svi' wuh tvi-shal, tonk'peh ish-veh vesh' ek' lighted abru k' ha'fek." "ik's yeht, mum, " leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook, k' wuh shi'vukhut nod. "ik's wuh fupa s' t' wuh nuf, na' ik mau i've gla-tor myself." heh yi au fi' nantau na' me, heh i, k' wuh obtrusive gluvaya t' artlessness fi' t'nash-veh countenance, nantau na' au, heh plaited wuh gas'rak mal t' t'nash-veh malanu k' t'nash-veh gas'rak el'ru. Kuv au had ya'akash me sovek weht deshkau, i dang undoubtedly ma pusvik-tor myself, na' i vesh' kauk yi fi' wuh sfek t' mentioning ik tra' vesh' wuh sov-dukal svi' wuh ker, heh dang ma hazarded wuh star-krus tonk'peh na' t'nash-veh fereik-vel hasu dahsau svi' ik stivan heh wuh lesh svi' wuh brewery. Au vesh' ni mau occupied, however, svi' discussing wuh marvels i had already presented na' ish-veh consideration, ik i stron-tor. Wuh subject fam dvun meskarau au lu joe sarlah svi' s' ish-veh ar'kadan tor ma wuh cup t' theris-masu. Tor ik t'nash-veh ko-kai, weht na' wuh vas t' ish-veh sha' kashek do na' wuh gratification t' ish-veh, related t'nash-veh pretended veshtau. I', lu vesht gla-tor nash-veh joe tu'ash ish-veh pla-kur bezhun heh padukau au ek' pauk wuh af'tum svi' helpless tauraya, i vesh' overtaken k' penitence; tonk'peh goh u' fudau ish-veh, ri svi' wuh least u' fudau wuh vath dahkuh. Na' joe, heh joe goh, i panah-tor myself wuh nu'ri stislak, du' au hayal-tor debating ra results would sarlah tor me s' din-tor havisham's acquaintance heh favour. Au had rai vet ik din-tor havisham would "tor vel" na' me; ish-veh vet-tor related tor wuh shid ik vel would nem-tor. T'nash-veh ko-kai lam-tor si' na' "veltra." mr. Pumblechook vesh' svi' favour t' wuh handsome premium na' binding me apprentice tor ein genteel trade, leralmin, wuh corn heh nei trade, na' instance. Joe tevan-tor vi' wuh deepest disgrace k' fi', na' nufaya wuh ugelik suggestion ik i lau goh nam-tor presented k' veh t' wuh dogs vi had fought na' wuh veal-cutlets. "kuv wuh duhsu's patam mokuhlek't sagluvau weh-rom opinions do ik, " leralmin-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai, "heh du ma prah sovek ar'kadan tor tor, du had weh-rom hal-tor heh tor ish-veh." ni au went. Po' mr. Pumblechook had driven ska', heh lu t'nash-veh ko-kai vesh' washing abru, i vazgau vi' wuh zhuk-fasek tor joe, heh hafau k' ish-veh abi' au had ovsoh na' wuh mu-yor. Yi i leralmin-tor, "fa' wuh yon hal-tor si', joe, i dang spo' tor var-tor du vel." "dang du, pip?" leralmin-tor joe, bestan ish-veh shoeing-stool be' wuh zhuk-fasek. "yi var-tor etek. Ra nam-tor ish-veh, pip?" "joe, " leralmin-tor i, taking meskaraya t' ish-veh padukau-abru sav'el sleeve, heh kuvoran-tor ish-veh svi' t'nash-veh ozh heh kaur-ozh, "du vokau ek' ik pa' din-tor havisham's?" "vokau?" leralmin-tor joe. "i dva-tor du! Wonderful!" "ish-veh's wuh terrible vel, joe; ish-veh ain't yeht." "ra nam-tor du telling t', pip?" maf-tor joe, tevan-tor pla' svi' wuh greatest tauraya. "du ri tor tvai tor leralmin ish-veh's" "ha i tor; ish-veh's ti, joe." "tonk'peh ri ek' t' ish-veh? Po sure du ri tor tvai tor leralmin, pip, ik tra' vesh' rai nesh-kur welwet coeh?" na', i lam-tor shaking t'nash-veh patam. "tonk'peh k'puu tra' vesh' dogs, pip? Sarlah, pip, " leralmin-tor joe, persuasively, "kuv tra' vikau't rai weal-cutlets, k'puu tra' vesh' dogs?" "rai, joe." "wuh dog?" leralmin-tor joe. "wuh wil'tei? Sarlah?" "rai, joe, tra' vesh' nothing na' ek' t' wuh ves." u' i teslau t'nash-veh bezhun hopelessly fi' joe, joe contemplated me svi' dismay. "pip, hinek chap! Nash skil-tor't tor, hinek katravahsu! I leralmin! Wilat tor du gish tor hal-tor tor?" "ish-veh's terrible, joe; ain't ish-veh?" "terrible?" maf-tor joe. "awful! Ra ma du?" "i ri tor fai-tor ra ma me, joe, " i kilko-tor, letting ish-veh sav'el sleeve hal-tor, heh sitting ne' svi' wuh vitush na' ish-veh ash'ya, hanging t'nash-veh patam; "tonk'peh i istaya du hadn't saven-tor me tor vutau knaves na' nop jacks; heh i istaya t'nash-veh kluf weren't ni bali il t'nash-veh el'ru ni dirik." heh yi i var-tor joe ik i olau maut miserable, heh ik i hadn't vesh' kup tor danau myself tor mrs. Joe heh pumblechook, vi vesh' ni snertau tor me, heh ik tra' had vesh' wuh vaksurik nu'ri t'sai na' din-tor havisham's vi vesh' dreadfully yaut, heh ik she had leralmin-tor i vesh' tsuri, heh ik i fai-tor i vesh' tsuri, heh ik i istau i vesh' ri tsuri, heh ik wuh ti had sarlah t' ish-veh somehow, hi i didn't fai-tor uf. Nash vesh' wuh nuf t' metaphysics, k'puu u' rihagik na' joe tor deal k' u' na' me. Tonk'peh joe nem-tor wuh nuf altogether s' wuh shal t' metaphysics, heh k' ik tvai vanquished ish-veh. "tra''s veh vel du lau nam-tor sure t', pip, " leralmin-tor joe, po' ein rumination, "namely, ik ti nam-tor ti. Howsever sarlah au, au didn't ought tor sarlah, heh sarlah au s' wuh sa-mekh t' ti, heh ar'kadan pauk tor wuh ka. Ri tor du var-tor rai weht t' 'em, pip. Ik ain't wuh yut tor prah s' hasu tsuri, hinek chap. Heh u' tor hasu tsuri, i ri tor tor ish-veh si' na' ek' pa'shik. Du nam-tor oncommon svi' ein vel. Du're oncommon pi'. Likewise du're wuh oncommon scholar." "rai, i am ignorant heh pla'rak, joe." "po, gla-tor ra wuh nuhm du kitau kim-shah mu-yor! Kitau svi' hish kauk! I've gla-tor lettersah! Heh s' gentlefolks!ik i'll swear weren't kitau svi' hish, " leralmin-tor joe. "i ma oren-tor nam-tor' nothing, joe. Du nah-tor mau t' me. Ish-veh's goh ik." "muhl, pip, " leralmin-tor joe, "nam-tor ish-veh ni il nam-tor ish-veh sa-fu't, du bolau nam-tor wuh tsuri scholar afore du mokuhlek nam-tor wuh oncommon veh, i dang rok! Wuh sa-te'kru fi-tor ish-veh throne, k' ish-veh tarkiv fi-tor ish-veh ed, mokuhlek't hayal-tor heh kitau ish-veh fundauik-tor t' parliament svi' hish, rik' having palikau, lu au vesh' wuh unpromoted prince, k' wuh alphabet. Ah!" hau joe, k' wuh hutau t' wuh patam ik vesh' bosh t' meaning, "heh palikau na' wuh nuh', heh ar'kada ish-veh yut tor z. Heh i fai-tor ra ik nam-tor tor tor, hi i mokuhlek't leralmin i've exactly ovsoh ish-veh." tra' vesh' ein rok svi' nash krus t' kau, heh ish-veh rather kastorau me. "whether tsuri ones u' tor callings heh pinkaunu, " pursued joe, reflectively, "mightn't nam-tor wuh weh-rom t' continuing na' tor potau apc'koik k' tsuri ones, instead t' going si' tor mavau k' oncommon ones, if reminds me tor rok ik tra' vesh' wuh haifan, sos'eh?" "rai, joe." "(i'm sorry tra' weren't wuh haifan, pip). Whether ik lau nam-tor il mightn't nam-tor, nam-tor wuh vel u' mokuhlek't nam-tor glazhau vi' i', rik' putting ish-veh ko-kai fi' wuh rampage; heh ik's wuh vel ri tor nam-tor nahp t' u' hasu ovsoh intentional. Lookee la', pip, na' ra nam-tor leralmin-tor tor du k' wuh yeht t'hy'la. If nash tor du wuh yeht t'hy'la leralmin. Kuv du mokuhlek't prah tor nam-tor oncommon k'fai going zehik, du'll worla prah tor tor ish-veh k'fai going pi'tak-tor. Ni ri tor var-tor rai weht fi' 'em, pip, heh ha-tor muhl heh tev-tor kunli." "du nam-tor ri reshnek k' me, joe?" "rai, hinek chap. Tonk'peh kuvish svi' kashek ik au vesh' if i meantersay t' wuh kovtulik heh outdacious wihfelau, alluding tor au if bordered fi' weal-cutlets heh dog-fighting, wuh sincere muhl-wisher would adwise, pip, ish-veh hasu eku-tor vi' ish-veh meditations, lu du hal-tor upstairs tor sar-tak. Ik's ek', hinek chap, heh ri tor worla tor ish-veh rai weht." lu i prah abru tor t'nash-veh pi' tvi-shal heh leralmin-tor t'nash-veh prayers, i did ri yen-tor joe's recommendation, heh wi t'nash-veh nu'ri kashek vesh' svi' ik ertau heh unthankful fupa s', ik i nahp wu po' i laid me ne', uf tsuri estella would panah-tor joe, wuh mere shek-zhuksu; uf bali ish-veh kluf, heh uf dirik ish-veh el'ru.
