I nahp uf joe heh t'nash-veh ko-kai vesh' yi sitting svi' wuh af'tum, heh uf i had sarlah abru tor sar-tak s' wuh af'tum, heh uf din-tor havisham heh estella worla hayal-tor svi' wuh af'tum, tonk'peh vesh' irak abru' wuh volik t' such tsuri doings. I tevan-tor asleep recalling ra i "nam-tor-tor tor tor" lu i vesh' na' din-tor havisham's; u' hi i had vesh' tra' wehk gad il tevun-krus, instead t' wadan; heh u' hi ish-veh vesh' ved wuh hinek subject t' remembrance, instead t' veh ik had arisen goh ik gad. Ik vesh' wuh memorable gad tor me, na' ish-veh tor lo'uk rubai svi' me. Tonk'peh ish-veh nam-tor wuh ka k' sovek ha'kiv. Glenonau veh dvel-tor gad kwul-tor s' ish-veh, heh nah-tor uf natya its rivak would ma vesh'. Svizh du vi telv-tor nash, heh nah-tor na' wuh moment t' wuh wu naf-elakh t' shek-tukh il pi-maat-tukh, t' thorns il svai, ik would worla ma bound du, tonk'peh na' wuh shidoraya t' wuh wuh'rak naf fi' veh memorable gad. Chapter x. Wuh felicitous idea paresh-tor tor me wuh asal il dahkuh later lu i woke, ik wuh buhfik ash i kupi nem-tor na' tor myself uncommon vesh' tor prah s' biddy kanok-vei she fai-tor. Svi' pursuance t' nash luminous conception i mentioned tor biddy lu i went tor mr. Wopsle's lo'uk-ezyet's na' mu-yor, ik i had wuh particular utvau na' wishing tor prah fi' svi' ha'kiv, heh ik i dang olau maut mau obliged tor ish-veh kuv she would impart ek' ish-veh learning tor me. Biddy, vi vesh' wuh danik obliging t' ko-kan, iyi leralmin-tor she would, heh indeed began tor fitor ish-veh ugaya k'svi kaukuh minutes. Wuh educational scheme il rivak afer-tor k' mr. Wopsle's lo'uk-ezyet lau nam-tor resolved vi' wuh zahalik synopsis. Wuh glan-sharu ate savas heh shitau terp ne' veh wuh'ashiv's pla'dor, abi' mr. Wopsle's lo'uk-ezyet tershau ish-veh tepul, heh tor wuh indiscriminate totter na' au k' wuh birch-fek. Po' receiving wuh falun k' kanok ulidar t' derision, wuh glan-sharu shidau svi' zehl heh buzzingly be' dvun-tor wuh ragged dunap s' el'ru tor el'ru. Wuh dunap had wuh alphabet svi' ish-veh, ein khlop heh pasu, heh wuh pi' spelling, ik nam-tor tor leralmin, ish-veh had had wuh'wak. U' ak u' nash ral'es began tor da-kuvau, mr. Wopsle's lo'uk-ezyet tevan-tor vi' wuh fupa s' t' ritevakh, arising either s' yuk il wuh rheumatic paroxysm. Wuh glan-sharu yi svi-tor among themselves fi-tor wuh competitive linisaya fi' wuh subject t' kluf, k' wuh zan-tor t' ascertaining vi kupi tread wuh hardest fi-tor t'vi gof. Nash mental tusok palesh-tor abi' biddy tor wuh rush na' au heh sagan-tor rehkuh defaced bibles (kushizhau u' kuv au had vesh' unskilfully tresahk ska' wuh chump shaht t' vel), weht illegibly hish-tor na' wuh buhfik do sovek curiosities t' kitau-tanaf i ma opi' ragel-tor k', speckled ek' abru' k' ironmould, heh having vuhnauk specimens t' wuh ravot panu smashed svi' ish-veh mor. Nash krus t' wuh rivak vesh' usually lightened k' several single combats svi' biddy heh refractory orensu. Lu wuh puk-tor vesh' abru', biddy mazhiv-kur-tor si' wuh su'etek t' wuh thalv, heh yi etek ek' telv-tor aloud ra etek kupi, il ra etek couldn'zhai-tukh wuh frightful sular uralaun; biddy leading k' wuh pid, shrill, monotonous spes, heh rim t' etek having wuh least notion t', il reverence na', ra etek vesh' telvan pa'. Lu nash horrible stiralash had palesh-tor wuh ac'ruth wak, ish-veh mechanically awoke mr. Wopsle's lo'uk-ezyet, vi staggered na' wuh sa-kan fortuitously, heh seshau ish-veh kaluk. Nash vesh' ken-tor tor terminate wuh rivak na' wuh khru, heh etek sasarlah vi' wuh sov k' shrieks t' intellectual skil. Ish-veh nam-tor rom tor remark ik tra' vesh' rai prohibition tehnat sovek glan-sharu's entertaining himself k' wuh kitau-kov il kauk k' wuh neshuk (lu tra' vesh' sovek), tonk'peh ik ish-veh vesh' ri hagik tor pursue ik khlup t' orenau svi' wuh karil tevun-yonuk, fi' khrosahp t' wuh pi' paik mahr-kel svi' if wuh mohrn vesh' holdenand if vesh' isha mr. Wopsle's lo'uk-ezyet's sitting-tvi-shal heh bedchamberbeing tonk'peh faintly illuminated k'fai wuh agency t' veh neik-spirited spis-ha'fek heh rai snuffers. Ish-veh saudau tor me ik ish-veh would nem-tor wak tor shetau uncommon, ne' aifa circumstances: nevertheless, i resolved tor ar'kadan ish-veh, heh ik maut khru biddy svi-tor fi' etwel special agreement, k' imparting ein ro'fori s' ish-veh pi' catalogue t' prices, ne' wuh patam t' moist slor-tukh, heh lending me, tor va'asau na' ha-kel, wuh suk hinek eingelsu d if she had va'amau s' wuh heading t' ein newspaper, heh if i supposed, abi' she var-tor me ra ish-veh vesh', tor nam-tor wuh design na' wuh tersek. Veling tra' vesh' wuh tsuri-kelek svi' wuh pi'kahr, heh veling joe tishau sometimes tor vuzh ish-veh mev tra'. I had poprah wonil zek s' t'nash-veh ko-kai tor vutau na' ish-veh na' wuh rehkuh jolly bargemen, ik khru, fi' t'nash-veh yut s' shi'oren, heh katau ish-veh ha-kel na' t'nash-veh peril. Tor wuh rehkuh jolly bargemen, therefore, i khartau t'nash-veh ash-tor. Tra' vesh' wuh mofek na' wuh jolly bargemen, k' ein alarmingly wu gav nosahp svi' ish-veh fi' wuh temok na' wuh vla t' wuh svep, if seemed tor me tor nam-tor worla vlitau ska'. Au had vesh' tra' ek'wak opi' i kupi vokau, heh had grown weht do i had. Tonk'peh tra' vesh' wuh nosahp t' gav pa' etwel shasol, heh sos'eh wuh sutra neglected rai opportunity t' turning ish-veh tor khrosahp. Ish-veh hasu gad mu-yor, i afer-tor wuh landlord looking rather grimly na' aifa vipladau; tonk'peh u' t'nash-veh business vesh' k' joe heh ri k' ish-veh, i goh istau ish-veh rom khru, heh be' dvun-tor vi' wuh tsuri tvi-shal na' wuh shaht t' wuh tvur, wilat tra' vesh' wuh ugelik suk af'tum yon, heh wilat joe vesh' smoking ish-veh mev svi' apc'koik k' mr. Wopsle heh wuh ri-fainusu. Joe puna-shau me u' tsuri k' "halloa, pip, hinek chap!" heh wuh moment au leralmin-tor ik, wuh ri-fainusu da-tor ish-veh patam heh glazhau na' me. Au vesh' wuh tsat-looking sasu ik i had worla gla-tor fa'. Ish-veh patam vesh' ek' fi' veh vla, heh veh t' ish-veh bezhun vesh' ulef ikap'uh t'du ru'lut, u' kuv au vesh' taking mokh na' vel k' wuh invisible pohshayek. Au had wuh mev svi' ish-veh ru'lut, heh au nem-tor ish-veh si', heh, po' slowly blowing ek' ish-veh vuzh maf heh looking lerash na' me ek' wuh wak, nodded. Ni, i nodded, heh yi au nodded va'ashiv, heh tor tvi-shal fi' wuh settle be' ish-veh ik i lau hayal-tor ne' tra'. Tonk'peh u' i vesh' nam-tor-tor tor hayal-tor be' joe whenever i svi-tor ik shi' resort, i leralmin-tor "rai, nemaiyo, osu, " heh tevan-tor vi' wuh ret joe tor na' me fi' wuh mesyutik settle. Wuh flekh sasu, po' glancing na' joe, heh seeing ik ish-veh attention vesh' vathru engaged, nodded tor me va'ashiv lu i had taken t'nash-veh ku-san, heh yi tetau ish-veh legin wuh maut shaik yut, u' ish-veh kwul-tor me. "du vesh' taran, " leralmin-tor wuh flekh sasu, turning tor joe, "ik du vesh' wuh shek-zhuksu." "ha. I leralmin-tor ish-veh, du fai-tor, " leralmin-tor joe. "ra'll du mon, mr? Du didn't mention ish-veh ahm, k' wuh bye." joe mentioned ish-veh i', heh wuh flekh sasu puvutau ish-veh k' ish-veh. "ra'll du mon, mr. Gargery? Na' t'nash-veh kodona? Tor fik abru k'?" "muhl, " leralmin-tor joe, "tor var-tor du wuh yeht'es, i ain't mau svi' wuh es'merka t' drinking na' anybody's kodona tonk'peh t'nash-veh sha'." "es'merka? Rai, " fun-tor wuh ri-fainusu, "tonk'peh wuh'wak heh maf, heh fi' wuh gad mu-yor nuh'. Sarlah! Shitau wuh ahm tor ish-veh, mr. Gargery." "i wouldn't istaya tor nam-tor stegel apc'koik, " leralmin-tor joe. "rum." "rum, " ashiv-tor wuh ri-fainusu. "heh dungi wuh vath gentleman tveshulau wuh sentiment." "rum, " leralmin-tor mr. Wopsle. "rehkuh rums!" maf-tor wuh ri-fainusu, calling tor wuh landlord. "bezhun-zaneshu pauk!" "nash vath gentleman, " glantau joe, k' yut t' introducing mr. Wopsle, "nam-tor wuh gentleman ik du would spo' tor zhu-tor mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh si'. Etwel clerk na' church." "aha!" leralmin-tor wuh ri-fainusu, sahris, heh cocking ish-veh bezhun na' me. "wuh lonely church, gas'rak si' fi' wuh masu-kastra, k' shi'vukhut pauk ish-veh!" "ik's ish-veh, " leralmin-tor joe. Wuh ri-fainusu, k' wuh kel'o ves t' grunt abru' ish-veh mev, shitau ish-veh mal abru fi' wuh settle ik au had tor himself. Au sai-vel-tor wuh flapping sax'ksei-brimmed traveller's taik, heh ne' ish-veh wuh handkerchief tied abru' ish-veh patam svi' wuh manner t' wuh taik: ni ik au gluvau rai isachya. U' au glazhau na' wuh yon, i nahp vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh cunning sagluvaya, zahal-tor k' wuh ulef-abru'teruklar-ru'lut, sarlah vi' ish-veh limuk. "i am ri acquainted k' nash shasol, gentlemen, tonk'peh ish-veh seems wuh solitary shasol na' wuh pilash." "danik masu-kastra nam-tor solitary, " leralmin-tor joe. "rai vet, rai vet. Tor du talal sovek gypsies, i', il tramps, il vagrants t' sovek wihfelau, si' tra'?" "rai, " leralmin-tor joe; "rim tonk'peh wuh runaway convict i' heh yi. Heh etek ri tor talal au, hagik. Eh, mr. Wopsle?" mr. Wopsle, k' wuh majestic remembrance t' hinek discomfiture, assented; tonk'peh ri warmly. "seems du ma vesh' si' po' such?" ya'akash wuh ri-fainusu. "wuh'wak, " fun-tor joe. "ri ik etek aitlu tor nem-tor au, du ken-tor; etek went si' u' lookers fi'; me, heh mr. Wopsle, heh pip. Didn't etek, pip?" "ha, joe." wuh ri-fainusu glazhau na' me va'ashiv, fam dvun cocking ish-veh bezhun, u' kuv au vesh' expressly taking mokh na' me k' ish-veh invisible pohshayek, heh leralmin-tor, "au's wuh kesik nu'ri parcel t' hinek ik. Ra nam-tor ish-veh du vutau ish-veh?" "pip, " leralmin-tor joe. "christened pip?" "rai, ri christened pip." "surname pip?" "rai, " leralmin-tor joe, "ish-veh's wuh ves t' skan ahm ra au mazhiv-kur-tor himself lu wuh kan-bu, heh nam-tor puvutau k'." "sa-fu t' ish-veh?" "muhl, " leralmin-tor joe, meditatively, ri, veling, ik ish-veh kupi nam-tor svi' anywise bolayatik tor panah-tor pa' ish-veh, tonk'peh fai'ei ish-veh vesh' wuh yut na' wuh jolly bargemen tor seem tor panah-tor deeply pa' kanok-vei ik vesh' discussed abru' mev, "wellno. Rai, au ain't." "nevvy?" leralmin-tor wuh flekh sasu. "muhl, " leralmin-tor joe, k' wuh ka appearance t' profound cogitation, "au nam-tor notno, ri tor tehs-tor du, au nam-tor notmy nevvy." "ra wuh pla-kur yon nam-tor au?" ya'akash wuh ri-fainusu. If saudau tor me tor nam-tor wuh inquiry t' unnecessary karik'es. Mr. Wopsle kwul-tor svi' fi-tor ik; u' veh vi fai-tor ek' pa' relationships, having professional occasion tor lesh svi' kashek ra kotik relations wuh sasu lau ri marry; heh expounded wuh ties svi' me heh joe. Having ish-veh el'ru svi', mr. Wopsle shahtau ska' k' wuh danik terrifically snarling tvur s' richard wuh wuh, heh seemed tor nah-tor au had ovsoh ved hiyet tor khrosahp na' ish-veh lu au hau, "u' wuh poet leralmin-tor." heh la' i lau remark ik lu mr. Wopsle referred tor me, au panah-tor ish-veh wuh bolayatik krus t' such dzhinaya tor rumple t'nash-veh isachya heh poke ish-veh vi' t'nash-veh bezhun. I fam yehat conceive po kanok-veh t' ish-veh standing vi yaretau na' etwel kelek dang kwon-hau-ov ma shitau me k'fai wuh ka inflammatory torek ne' kahwa circumstances. Wi i ri tor vutau tor kashek ik i vesh' ek'wak svi' t'nash-veh earlier youth wuh subject t' remark svi' etwel shilaik skan da-kuv, tonk'peh ein suk-handed person nem-tor ein such ophthalmic ash-tor tor patronise me. Ek' nash du', wuh flekh sasu glazhau na' kling tonk'peh me, heh glazhau na' me u' kuv au vesh' satalau ki' wuh pohshaya na' me na' kim-shah, heh katau me ne'. Tonk'peh au leralmin-tor nothing po' nufaya ish-veh pla-kur yon glantaya, abi' wuh bezhun-zaneshu t' rum heh masu vesh' katau; heh yi au tor ish-veh pohshaya, heh wuh danik wehtsuri pohshaya ish-veh vesh'. Ish-veh vesh' ri wuh verbal remark, tonk'peh wuh proceeding svi' dumb-gluvaya, heh vesh' pointedly addressed tor me. Au stirred ish-veh rum heh masu pointedly na' me, heh au zahv-tor ish-veh rum heh masu pointedly na' me. Heh au stirred ish-veh heh au zahv-tor ish-veh; ri k' wuh floku ik vesh' katau tor ish-veh, tonk'peh k' wuh deik. Au did nash ni ik kling tonk'peh vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh deik; heh lu au had ovsoh ish-veh au psethau wuh deik heh shitau ish-veh svi' wuh thasek-abru'lik. I fai-tor ish-veh tor nam-tor joe's deik, heh i fai-tor ik au fai-tor t'nash-veh convict, wuh moment vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh instrument. I hayal-tor gazing na' ish-veh, spell-bound. Tonk'peh au i' reclined fi' ish-veh settle, taking maut pi' beglanau t' me, heh talking principally pa' turnips. Tra' vesh' wuh delicious kash-ral t' cleaning-abru heh tor wuh hizhuk svizh fa' going fi' svi' ha'kiv afresh, svi' etwel pi'kahr fi' gad mu-yor, if kastorilau joe tor dare tor stay si' ulef wuh wadan longer fi' saturdays do na' vath wak. Wuh ulef-wadan heh wuh rum heh masu sahran si' teretuhr, joe prah abru tor hal-tor, heh nem-tor me k' wuh el'ru. "pehkaya ulef wuh moment, mr. Gargery, " leralmin-tor wuh flekh sasu. "i nah-tor i've prah wuh ugelik uzh shilling ein-wilat svi' t'nash-veh abru'lik, heh kuv i ma, wuh sa-kan dungau ma ish-veh." au glazhau ish-veh si' s' wuh handful t' pi' rubah, hesha ish-veh svi' ein crumpled dun, heh mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh tor me. "ish-veh!" leralmin-tor au. "kashek! Ish-veh sha'." i itaren ish-veh, staring na' ish-veh irak mesakh wuh bounds t' rom manners, heh holding wufik tor joe. Au mazhiv-kur-tor joe rom-mu-yor, heh au mazhiv-kur-tor mr. Wopsle rom-mu-yor (vi went si' k' etek), heh au mazhiv-kur-tor me goh wuh glazhau k' ish-veh aiming bezhun, rai, ri wuh glazhau, na' au ikap-tor ish-veh abru, tonk'peh wonders lau nam-tor ovsoh k' wuh bezhun k' hiding ish-veh. Fi' wuh yut ha-kel, kuv i had vesh' svi' wuh humour na' talking, wuh variben bolau ma vesh' ek' fi' t'nash-veh vla, na' mr. Wopsle parted s' etek na' wuh svep t' wuh jolly bargemen, heh joe went ek' wuh yut ha-kel k' ish-veh ru'lut eik tu'ash, tor rinse wuh rum si' k' u' mau sov u' tor-yehat. Tonk'peh i vesh' svi' wuh manner stupefied k' nash turning abru t' t'nash-veh hinek misdeed heh hinek acquaintance, heh kupi nah-tor t' nothing else. T'nash-veh ko-kai vesh' ri svi' wuh maut rasahkos temper lu etek presented ourselves svi' wuh af'tum, heh joe vesh' kastorau k' ik ritsuri circumstance tor var-tor ish-veh pa' wuh ugelik shilling. "wuh rasahkos un, i'll nam-tor bound, " leralmin-tor mrs. Joe triumphantly, "il au wouldn't ma putan-tor ish-veh tor wuh sa-kan! Kal-tor's glazhau na' ish-veh." i nem-tor ish-veh s' wuh dun, heh ish-veh skan-tor tor nam-tor wuh rom veh. "tonk'peh ra's nash?" leralmin-tor mrs. Joe, throwing ne' wuh shilling heh catching abru wuh dun. "dahkuh veh-plesh-tor pitoh?" nothing lehkuh tor dahkuh thelik sweltering veh-plesh-tor pitoh ik seemed tor ma vesh' fi' zhil t' wuh warmest intimacy k' ek' wuh cattle-mahr-kel svi' wuh county. Joe kum-tor abru ish-veh taik va'ashiv, heh sahr-tor k' au tor wuh jolly bargemen tor restore au tor ish-veh owner. Du' au vesh' hal-tor, i hayal-tor ne' fi' t'nash-veh tsuri stool heh glazhau vacantly na' t'nash-veh ko-kai, olaya takov sure ik wuh sasu would ri nam-tor tra'. Presently, joe sarlah pla', taran ik wuh sasu vesh' hal-tor, tonk'peh ik au, joe, had losrak zhit na' wuh rehkuh jolly bargemen fundik wuh pitoh. Yi t'nash-veh ko-kai fen-tor au abru svi' wuh krus t' dun, heh shitau au ne' ein psethau she-tor-mor svi' wuh ornamental teapot fi' wuh fik t' wuh hish-tor svi' wuh fupa s' parlour. Tra' au hafau, wuh yuk-eshu'a tor me, wehk heh wehk wuh mu-yor heh gad. I had sadly pushau yuk lu i prah tor sar-tak, k'fai thinking t' wuh flekh sasu taking mokh na' me k' ish-veh invisible pohshayek, heh t' wuh guiltily dirik heh tsuri vel ish-veh vesh', tor nam-tor fi' tsat zhil t' conspiracy k' convicts, wuh feature svi' t'nash-veh neik career ik i had previously yen-tor. I vesh' haunted k' wuh deik nuh'. Wuh dread ma me ik lu i least gishu ish-veh, wuh deik would reappear. I coaxed myself tor yuk k' thinking t' din-tor havisham's, thurai gad; heh svi' t'nash-veh yuk vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh deik coming na' me s' wuh svep, rik' seeing vi meskarau ish-veh, heh i shei myself kum'i. Chapter xi. Na' wuh kru'minaakh wak i fun-tor tor din-tor havisham's, heh t'nash-veh hesitating mokov na' wuh temep katau si' estella. She klacha ish-veh po' admitting me, u' she had ovsoh fa', heh va'ashiv preceded me vi' wuh gu'gelik tvur wilat ish-veh ha'fek lam-tor. She nem-tor rai beglanau t' me abi' she had wuh ha'fek svi' ish-veh el'ru, lu she glazhau abru' ish-veh tipan, superciliously taran, "du nam-tor tor sarlah nash yut tor-gad, " heh nem-tor me tor ved wuh'ashiv krus t' wuh kelek. Wuh tvur vesh' wuh wu veh, heh seemed tor pervade wuh bosh keh-vla ne-shal t' wuh manor kelek. Etek traversed tonk'peh veh vla t' wuh keh-vla, however, heh na' wuh shaht t' ish-veh she pehkau, heh shitau ish-veh ha'fek ne' heh tu'ash wuh svep. La', wuh gad-ha'khlup reappeared, heh i afer-tor myself svi' wuh pi' elyutau courtyard, wuh mesyutik vla t' if vesh' shidau k' wuh dahl-tor kelek-kelek, ik glazhau u' kuv ish-veh had wuh'wak belonged tor wuh khartausu il patam clerk t' wuh ek'tevik brewery. Tra' vesh' wuh wak-vel svi' wuh sik temok t' nash kelek. Spo' wuh wak-vel svi' din-tor havisham's tvi-shal, heh spo' din-tor havisham's glantau, ish-veh had pehkau na' dah-leh minutes tor naukuh. Etek went svi' na' wuh svep, if lam-tor tu'ash, heh vi' wuh gloomy tvi-shal k' wuh neik abru-tol, fi' wuh solektra-lan-tol na' wuh pla'. Tra' vesh' ein apc'koik svi' wuh tvi-shal, heh estella leralmin-tor tor me u' she hau ish-veh, "du nam-tor tor hal-tor heh lamok tra' sa-kan, till du nam-tor aitlu." "tra'", hasu wuh krani, i tuhsau tor ish-veh, heh lam-tor "tra', " svi' wuh maut uncomfortable fupa s' t' kashek, looking si'. Ish-veh tu'ash tor wuh solektra, heh glazhau vi' wuh danik miserable teruk t' wuh neglected bah-ker, fi-tor wuh lan ruin t' cabbage-stalks, heh veh natuhn-lap ik had vesh' clipped pauk wu ago, spo' wuh pudding, heh had wuh uzh tor'ovak na' wuh fik t' ish-veh, s' shid heh t' wuh natya kur, u' kuv ik krus t' wuh pudding had terpau tor wuh saucepan heh prah yontau. Nash vesh' t'nash-veh homely nahp, u' i contemplated wuh natuhn-lap. Tra' had vesh' ein ta'hal izh, overnight, heh ish-veh ti nowhere else tor t'nash-veh fai-tukh; tonk'peh, ish-veh had ri ved klimtau s' wuh samu duv t' nash zeshau t' bah-ker, heh wuh salan kum-tor ish-veh abru svi' pi' pi'tchef heh threw ish-veh na' wuh krani, u' kuv ish-veh pelted me na' coming tra'. I divined ik t'nash-veh coming had pehkau conversation svi' wuh tvi-shal, heh ik its vath occupants vesh' looking na' me. Kupi gla-tor nash-veh nothing t' wuh tvi-shal kaula wuh shining t' wuh yon svi' wuh krani-makh, tonk'peh i stiffened svi' ek' t'nash-veh joints k' wuh hokni'es ik i vesh' ne' ikap-tor inspection. Tra' vesh' rehkuh t'sai svi' wuh tvi-shal heh veh gentleman. Fa' i had vesh' standing na' wuh krani kaukuh minutes, au somehow zhelesh tor me ik au vesh' ek' toadies heh humbugs, tonk'peh ik tik t' au pretended ri tor fai-tor ik wuh vath vesh' toadies heh humbugs: fai'ei wuh admission ik au il she did fai-tor ish-veh, would ma tor ish-veh il ish-veh si' tor nam-tor wuh toady heh humbug. Au ek' had wuh listless heh dreary sov t' waiting somebody's sanosh, heh wuh danik talkative t' wuh t'sai had tor stariben ved rigidly tor repress wuh luvaya. Nash t'sai, t'vi ahm vesh' camilla, maut mau reminded me t' t'nash-veh ko-kai, k' wuh natyan ik she vesh' older, heh (u' i afer-tor lu i kum-tor glan t' ish-veh) t' wuh blunter vishizhau t' features. Indeed, lu i fai-tor ish-veh weh-rom i began tor nah-tor ish-veh vesh' wuh mercy she had sovek features na' ek', ni maut blank heh pid vesh' wuh tevik temok t' ish-veh limuk. "ri donku-tor tal-kam soul!" leralmin-tor nash t'sai, k' wuh abruptness t' manner ved t'nash-veh ko-kai's. "kling's nemut tonk'peh ish-veh sha'!" "ish-veh would nam-tor mau weht commendable tor nam-tor somebody else's nemut, " leralmin-tor wuh gentleman; "irak weht malatik." "krei raymond, " glantau wuh'ashiv t'sai, "etek nam-tor tor ashaya etwel behsu." "sarah abru'lik, " fun-tor krei raymond, "kuv wuh sasu nam-tor ri ish-veh sha' behsu, vi nam-tor?" din-tor abru'lik abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor, heh camilla abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor heh leralmin-tor (checking wuh luvaya), "wuh idea!" tonk'peh i nahp au seemed tor nah-tor ish-veh rather wuh rom idea nuh'. Wuh vath t'sai, vi had ri spoken wi, leralmin-tor gravely heh emphatically, "maut yeht!" "ri donku-tor soul!" camilla presently went fi' (i fai-tor au had ek' vesh' looking na' me svi' wuh tvai wak), "au nam-tor ni maut flekh! Would sovek-veh dva-tor ik lu tom's ko-telsu tev-tor, au actually kupi ri nam-tor vimevilau tor gla-tor wuh importance t' wuh kanu's having wuh deepest t' trimmings tor ish-veh mourning? 'rom s'haile!' leralmin-tor au, 'camilla, ra mokuhlek ish-veh signify ni wu u' wuh ri donku-tor bereaved pi' vel nam-tor svi' nesh-kur?' ni spo' matthew! Wuh idea!" "rom sfekau svi' ish-veh, rom sfekau svi' ish-veh, " leralmin-tor krei raymond; "sha-ka-ri zadau i dang wafu rom sfekau svi' ish-veh; tonk'peh au worla had, heh au worla dungi ma, sovek kash-ral t' wuh proprieties." "du fai-tor i vesh' obliged, " leralmin-tor camilla, "i vesh' obliged tor nam-tor pesik. I leralmin-tor, 'ish-veh dungi ri tor, na' wuh lit t' wuh skan.' i var-tor ish-veh ik, rik' glu trimmings, wuh skan vesh' disgraced. I maf-tor pa' ish-veh s' asal-yem till aru-yem. I dash-tor t'nash-veh skaun. Heh na' kim-shah au flung si' svi' ish-veh khrashik yut, heh leralmin-tor, k' wuh d, 'yi tor u' du spo'.' itaren goodness ish-veh dungi kwon-hau-ov nam-tor wuh consolation tor me tor fai-tor ik i instantly went si' svi' wuh pouring sov-masu heh bought wuh vel." "au vlitau na' au, did au ri?" ya'akash estella. "ish-veh's ri wuh deshker, t'nash-veh tal-kam kan, vi vlitau na' au, " fun-tor camilla. "i bought au. Heh i dungau k'ashiv nah-tor t' ik k' sochya, lu i wake abru svi' wuh mu-yor." wuh ringing t' wuh irak kus-vakh, puterish-tor k' wuh echoing t' ein maf il vutau bi' wuh tvur k' if i had sarlah, svi-shau wuh conversation heh aisha estella tor leralmin tor me, "i', sa-kan!" fi' t'nash-veh turning pauk, au ek' glazhau na' me k' wuh utmost contempt, heh, u' i went si', i puzhu-tor sarah abru'lik leralmin, "muhl i am sure! Ra thurai!" heh camilla hau, k' indignation, "vesh' tra' ek'wak such wuh fancy! Wuh i-de-wuh!" u' etek vesh' going k' etwel ha'fek bi' wuh gu'gelik tvur, estella pehkau ek' t' wuh sudden, heh, limuk-tor pauk, leralmin-tor svi' ish-veh taunting manner, k' ish-veh limuk ved beyik t'nash-veh, "muhl?" "muhl, din-tor?" i kilko-tor, siyah tevan-tor abru' ish-veh heh checking myself. She lam-tor looking na' me, heh, veling, i lam-tor looking na' ish-veh. "am i takov?" "ha; i nah-tor du nam-tor maut takov." "am i insulting?" "ri ni mau ni u' du vesh' kim-shah wak, " leralmin-tor i. "ri ni mau ni?" "rai." she pohshau lu she ya'akash wuh kim-shah deshker, heh she slapped t'nash-veh limuk k' such nekwitaya u' she had, lu i kilko-tor ish-veh. "i'?" leralmin-tor she. "du pi' dirik stislak, ra tor du nah-tor t' me i'?" "i dungau ri var-tor du." "fai'ei du nam-tor going tor var-tor upstairs. Nam-tor ik ish-veh?" "rai, " leralmin-tor i, "ik's ri ish-veh." "po ri tor du maf va'ashiv, du pi' wretch?" "fai'ei i'll worla maf na' du va'ashiv, " leralmin-tor i. If vesh', i suppose, u' riyeht wuh afsakaya u' ek'wak vesh' tor; na' i vesh' inwardly maf-tor na' ish-veh yi, heh i fai-tor ra i fai-tor t' wuh kusut she kodona me afterwards. Etek went fi' etwel yut upstairs po' nash episode; heh, u' etek vesh' going abru, etek ragel-tor wuh gentleman groping ish-veh yut ne'. "ik ma etek la'?" ya'akash wuh gentleman, stopping heh looking na' me. "wuh sa-kan, " leralmin-tor estella. Au vesh' wuh burly sasu t' wuh exceedingly gu'gelik complexion, k' wuh exceedingly suk patam, heh wuh corresponding suk el'ru. Au nem-tor t'nash-veh chin svi' ish-veh suk el'ru heh da-tor abru t'nash-veh limuk ki' wuh glazhau na' me k' wuh ta'hal t' wuh ha'fek. Au vesh' prematurely bald fi' wuh fik t' ish-veh patam, heh had bushy nesh-kur bezhun-zehl ik wouldn't ti ne' tonk'peh lam-tor abru bristling. Ish-veh bezhun vesh' eku maut glu svi' ish-veh patam, heh vesh' disagreeably nasik heh suspicious. Au had wuh suk glantau-naf-elakh, heh karik nesh-kur dots wilat ish-veh hisahk heh whiskers would ma vesh' kuv au had kal-tor au. Au vesh' nothing tor me, heh i kupi ma had rai fa-glan yi, ik au ek'wak would nam-tor sovek-vel tor me, tonk'peh ish-veh pavesh-tor ik i had nash opportunity t' observing ish-veh muhl. "sa-kan t' wuh neighbourhood? Hey?" leralmin-tor au. "ha, osu, " leralmin-tor i. "uf tor sarlah du la'?" "din-tor havisham satau na' me, osu, " i danau. "muhl! Kloshah yourself. I ma wuh takov suk veshtaya t' sa-kan, heh du're wuh rasahkos eku t' katravahsu. I' kashek!" leralmin-tor au, biting wuh vla t' ish-veh lo'uk kehr-oth u' au kwal-tor na' me, "du kloshah yourself!" k' eifa zhit, au sadalau mewhich i vesh' glad t', na' ish-veh el'ru smelt t' scented soapand went ish-veh yut downstairs. I wondered whether au kupi nam-tor wuh hassu; tonk'peh rai, i nahp; au couldn't nam-tor wuh hassu, il au would ma wuh quieter heh weht persuasive manner. Tra' vesh' ri mau wak tor panah-tor wuh subject, na' etek vesh' ak svi' din-tor havisham's tvi-shal, wilat she heh kanok-vei else vesh' aishan u' i had losrak au. Estella losrak me standing be' wuh svep, heh i lam-tor tra' abi' din-tor havisham vishizhau ish-veh bezhun fi-tor me s' wuh sai-vel-tor-pasu. "ni!" she leralmin-tor, rik' hasu startled il ak'wikmun: "wuh gad ma worn maf, ma au?" "ha, ma'am. Tor-gad nam-tor" "tra', tra', tra'!" k' wuh impatient dvun t' ish-veh ozh. "i ri tor aitlun tor fai-tor. Nam-tor du pok tor mavau?" i vesh' obliged tor kilko-srashiv svi' ein confusion, "i ri tor nah-tor i am, ma'am." "ri na' nop va'ashiv?" she halishau, k' wuh searching glazhau. "ha, ma'am; i kupi tor ik, kuv i vesh' aitlu." "opi' nash kelek kwul-tor du hinek heh shi'vukhut, sa-kan, " leralmin-tor din-tor havisham, impatiently, "heh du nam-tor unwilling tor mavau, nam-tor du willing tor ar'kadan?" i kupi kilko-srashiv nash inquiry k' wuh weh-rom khaf-spol do i had vesh' kup tor talal na' wuh vath deshker, heh i leralmin-tor i vesh' ved willing. "yi hal-tor vi' ik mesyutik tvi-shal, " leralmin-tor she, pointing na' wuh svep za' me k' ish-veh withered el'ru, "heh bek-tor tra' till sarlah nash-veh." i tuhsau wuh staircase landing, heh svi-tor wuh tvi-shal she indicated. S' ik tvi-shal, nuh', wuh gad-ha'khlup vesh' completely sanan-tor, heh ish-veh had wuh sov-famik fnish-tor ik vesh' oppressive. Wuh yon had vesh' lately kindled svi' wuh damp hinek-fashioned grate, heh ish-veh vesh' weht sashitau tor hal-tor si' do tor yontau abru, heh wuh reluctant vuzh if geldau svi' wuh tvi-shal seemed colder do wuh clearer sov, spo' etwel sha' masu-kastra mist. Ac'ruth wintry khlup t' ha'fek fi' wuh pid vuzh-mev-krus faintly lighted wuh tvi-shal; il ish-veh would nam-tor weht expressive tor leralmin, faintly troubled its mu'khlup'es. Ish-veh vesh' spacious, heh i dare leralmin had wuh'wak vesh' handsome, tonk'peh kanok discernible vel svi' ish-veh vesh' wein-tor k' grazhiv heh mould, heh dropping tor krus. Wuh danik prominent vel vesh' wuh wu pasu k' wuh tablecloth sak-tor fi' ish-veh, u' kuv wuh gadzhak had vesh' svi' preparation lu wuh kelek heh wuh wak-vel ek' pehkau teretuhr. Wuh epergne il centre-krus t' ein ves vesh' svi' wuh svitan t' nash sai; ish-veh vesh' ni heavily overhung k' cobwebs ik its shid vesh' ved undistinguishable; heh, u' i glazhau bi' wuh kin-kur iraktra s' if i vokau its seeming tor tor'ovau, spo' wuh nesh-kur luk, vesht gla-tor nash-veh speckle-legged a'lazb k' blotchy ak'shem sahran ha-kel tor ish-veh, heh sahran si' s' ish-veh, u' kuv ein circumstances t' wuh greatest tsuri importance had aishan transpired svi' wuh a'lazb shila. I puzhu-tor wuh aushfa nuh', rattling za' wuh gluvau-math, u' kuv wuh ka occurrence vesh' yauluhk tor ish-veh eku'ko. Tonk'peh wuh nesh-kur sark nem-tor rai beglanau t' wuh agitation, heh groped pa' wuh hearth svi' wuh ponderous shakhupik yut, u' kuv au vesh' pen-sighted heh lerash t' khaf-spol, heh ri fi' zhil k' veh wuh'ashiv. Aifa crawling vel had sem-tor t'nash-veh attention, heh i vesh' watching au kwi', lu din-tor havisham laid wuh el'ru fi-tor t'nash-veh tipan. Svi' ish-veh vath el'ru she had wuh crutch-headed terpau fi' if she gal-tor, heh she glazhau spo' wuh witch t' wuh shi. "nash, " leralmin-tor she, pointing tor wuh wu pasu k' ish-veh terpau, "nam-tor wilat i dungi nam-tor laid lu i am tevik. Au dungau sarlah heh glazhau na' me la'." k' ein vague misgiving ik she lau prah fi-tor wuh pasu yi heh tra' heh tev-tor na' wuh'wak, wuh ovsotik realisation t' wuh ghastly waxwork na' wuh rom, i shrank ne' ish-veh esta. "ra tor du nah-tor ik nam-tor?" she ya'akash me, va'ashiv pointing k' ish-veh terpau; "ik, wilat eifa cobwebs nam-tor?" "i mokuhlek't guess ra ish-veh nam-tor, ma'am." "ish-veh's wuh lo'uk cake. Wuh bride-cake. T'nash-veh!" she glazhau ek' pauk wuh tvi-shal svi' wuh glaring manner, heh yi leralmin-tor, leaning fi' me du' ish-veh el'ru twitched t'nash-veh tipan, "sarlah, sarlah, sarlah! Lates me, lates me!" i tor si' s' nash, ik wuh ar'kadan i had tor tor, vesh' tor lates din-tor havisham pauk heh pauk wuh tvi-shal. Accordingly, i palikau na' wuh'wak, heh she gal-tor fi-tor t'nash-veh tipan, heh etek went maf na' wuh sahr ik lau ma vesh' wuh imitation (founded fi' t'nash-veh wuh'rak impulse ne' ik kamu) t' mr. Pumblechook's chaise-hal. She vesh' ri physically karik, heh po' wuh pi' wak leralmin-tor, "slower!" fam dvun, etek went na' wuh impatient fitful threshan, heh u' etek went, she twitched wuh el'ru fi-tor t'nash-veh tipan, heh ar'kada ish-veh ru'lut, heh pufulag-tor me tor dva-tor ik etek vesh' going sahris fai'ei ish-veh nahp went sahris. Po' wuh du' she leralmin-tor, "vutau estella!" ni i went si' fi' wuh landing heh roared ik ahm u' i had ovsoh fi' wuh previous occasion. Lu ish-veh ta'hal saudau, i fun-tor tor din-tor havisham, heh etek palikau maf va'ashiv pauk heh pauk wuh tvi-shal. Kuv goh estella had sarlah tor nam-tor wuh spectator t' etwel proceedings, i dang ma olau sufficiently discontented; tonk'peh u' she katau k' ish-veh wuh rehkuh t'sai heh wuh gentleman ik i had gla-tor ne', i didn't fai-tor ra tor tor. Svi' t'nash-veh politeness, i would ma pehkau; tonk'peh din-tor havisham twitched t'nash-veh tipan, heh etek posted fi', k' wuh mesh-limuk-tor hokni'es fi' t'nash-veh krus ik au would nah-tor ish-veh vesh' ek' t'nash-veh doing. "tal-kam din-tor havisham, " leralmin-tor din-tor sarah abru'lik. "uf muhl du glazhau!" "i ri tor, " fun-tor din-tor havisham. "i am kin-kur wadi heh hinek." camilla brightened lu din-tor abru'lik ragel-tor k' nash rebuff; heh she murmured, u' she plaintively contemplated din-tor havisham, "ri donku-tor tal-kam soul! Certainly ri tor nam-tor gishu tor glazhau muhl, ri donku-tor vel. Wuh idea!" "heh uf nam-tor du?" leralmin-tor din-tor havisham tor camilla. U' etek vesh' beyik camilla yi, i would ma pehkau u' wuh tukh veling, goh din-tor havisham wouldn't pehkaya. Etek swept fi', heh i olau ik i vesh' highly obnoxious tor camilla. "nemaiyo, din-tor havisham, " she fun-tor, "i am u' muhl u' mokuhlek nam-tor gishu." "po, ra's wuh tukh k' du?" ya'akash din-tor havisham, k' namautauk sharpness. "nothing don mentioning, " kilko-tor camilla. "i ri tor istaya tor tor wuh gluvayek t' t'nash-veh feelings, tonk'peh i ma habitually nahp t' du weht svi' wuh mu-yor do i am ved kaik tor." "yi ri tor nah-tor t' me, " retorted din-tor havisham. "maut easily leralmin-tor!" remarked camilla, amiably repressing wuh sob, du' wuh hitch sarlah vi' ish-veh upper bru, heh ish-veh bezhun-masu overflowed. "raymond nam-tor wuh toglantausu ra ginger heh sal volatile i am obliged tor nem-tor svi' wuh mu-yor. Raymond nam-tor wuh toglantausu ra nervous jerkings i ma svi' t'nash-veh mal. Chokings heh nervous jerkings, however, nam-tor nothing uzh tor me lu i nah-tor k' anxiety t' eifa i ashaya. Kuv i kupi nam-tor lehkuh affectionate heh kash-zakar, i dang ma wuh weh-rom skaun heh wuh shek-tukh eku t' tor'tsu. I am sure i istaya ish-veh kupi nam-tor ni. Tonk'peh u' tor ri thinking t' du svi' wuh nightthe idea!" la', wuh thorau t' bezhun-masu. Wuh raymond referred tor, i ken-tor tor nam-tor wuh gentleman la', heh ish-veh i ken-tor tor nam-tor mr. Camilla. Sarlah ish-veh tor wuh rescue na' nash sfek, heh leralmin-tor svi' wuh consolatory heh complimentary spes, "camilla, t'nash-veh tal-kam, ish-veh nam-tor muhl fainu ik ish-veh skan feelings nam-tor gradually undermining du tor wuh sadvun t' tor veh t' ish-veh mal shorter do wuh vath." "i am ri aware, " glantau wuh shi'vukhut t'sai t'vi spes i had puzhu-tor tonk'peh wuh'wak, "ik tor nah-tor t' sovek person nam-tor tor tor wuh lo'uk claim fi-tor ik person, t'nash-veh tal-kam." din-tor sarah abru'lik, ik i i' gla-tor tor nam-tor wuh pi' pseth, khav-kur, corrugated hinek kosu, k' wuh pi' limuk ik lau ma vesh' tor t' walnut-fo, heh wuh suk ru'lut spo' wuh aushfa's rik' wuh whiskers, nenikau nash shul k' taran, "rai, indeed, t'nash-veh tal-kam. Hem!" "thinking nam-tor hagik hiyet, " leralmin-tor wuh shi'vukhut t'sai. "ra nam-tor easier, du fai-tor?" assented din-tor sarah abru'lik. "oh, ha, ha!" maf-tor camilla, t'vi fermenting feelings saudau tor shen s' ish-veh mal tor ish-veh bosom. "ish-veh's ek' maut yeht! Ish-veh's wuh kobat'es tor nam-tor ni affectionate, tonk'peh i mokuhlek't gol'nev ish-veh. Rai vet t'nash-veh muhl'es would nam-tor mau weh-rom kuv ish-veh vesh' vathru, fam dvun i wouldn't rubah t'nash-veh disposition kuv i kupi. Ish-veh's wuh aishan t' mau suffering, tonk'peh ish-veh's wuh consolation tor fai-tor i ma ish-veh, lu i wake abru svi' wuh mu-yor." la' wuh'ashiv thorau t' olaya. Din-tor havisham heh i had worla pehkau ek' nash wak, tonk'peh potau going pauk heh pauk wuh tvi-shal; i' brushing tehnat wuh skirts t' wuh visitors, i' giving au wuh bosh wu-vath t' wuh dismal tvi-shal. "tra''s matthew!" leralmin-tor camilla. "worla mixing k' sovek malatik ties, worla coming la' tor gla-tor uf din-tor havisham nam-tor! I ma taken tor wuh ku-san k' t'nash-veh staylace tresahk, heh ma lain tra' wadan insensible, k' t'nash-veh patam abru' wuh vla, heh t'nash-veh isachya ek' ne', heh t'nash-veh ash'ya i ri tor fai-tor wilat" ("mau higher do ish-veh patam, t'nash-veh ashaya, " leralmin-tor mr. Camilla.) "i ma hal-tor ska' vi' ik fupa s', wadan heh wadan, fi' khrosahp t' matthew's flekh heh inexplicable spa-tor, heh kling has itaren me." "really i bolau leralmin i dang nah-tor ri!" interposed wuh shi'vukhut t'sai. "gla-tor du, t'nash-veh tal-kam, " hau din-tor sarah abru'lik (wuh blandly vicious personage), "wuh deshker tor shitau tor yourself nam-tor, vi did du gish tor nemaiyo, t'nash-veh ashaya?" "rik' expecting sovek itaren, il sovek-vel t' wuh wihfelau, " resumed camilla, "i ma hafau svi' ik fupa s', wadan heh wadan, heh raymond nam-tor wuh toglantausu t' wuh sadvun tor if i ma khluhkau, heh ra wuh ovus inefficacy t' ginger has vesh', heh i ma vesh' puzhu-tor na' wuh piano-forte tuner's mes' wuh yut, wilat wuh ri donku-tor mistaken kanu ma kauk supposed ish-veh tor nam-tor pigeons cooing na' wuh ir, heh i' tor nam-tor var-tor" la' camilla shitau ish-veh el'ru tor ish-veh drahk, heh began tor nam-tor ved meli-tukh u' tor wuh shidoraya t' uzh terish tra'. Lu nash ka matthew vesh' mentioned, din-tor havisham pehkau me heh herself, heh lam-tor looking na' wuh saralashek. Nash rubah had wuh lo'uk vi-yumuk svi' bringing camilla's meil-tal tor wuh sudden shaht. "matthew dungi sarlah heh gla-tor me na' kim-shah, " leralmin-tor din-tor havisham, sternly, "lu i am laid fi' ik pasu. Ik dungi nam-tor ish-veh shi, tra', " striking wuh pasu k' ish-veh terpau, "na' t'nash-veh patam! Heh ish-veh dungi nam-tor tra'! Heh ish-veh sa-telsu's tra'! Heh sarah abru'lik's tra'! Heh georgiana's tra'! I' du ek' fai-tor wilat tor nem-tor ish-veh wurzel lu sarlah du tor gadzhak fi-tor me. Heh i' hal-tor!" na' wuh mention t' tik ahm, she had kwul-tor wuh pasu k' ish-veh terpau svi' wuh uzh shi. She i' leralmin-tor, "lates me, lates me!" heh etek went fi' va'ashiv. "i suppose tra''s nothing tor nam-tor ovsoh, " sporiben camilla, "tonk'peh comply heh trashu. Ish-veh's vel ki' gla-tor wuh vel t' veh's ashaya heh gu-vam na' kauk ni pen wuh wak. I dungau nah-tor t' ish-veh k' wuh melancholy satisfaction lu i wake abru svi' wuh mu-yor. I istaya matthew kupi ma ik comfort, tonk'peh au dvolau ish-veh na' defiance. I am satalau ri tor tor wuh gluvayek t' t'nash-veh feelings, tonk'peh ish-veh's maut lerash tor nam-tor var-tor veh aitlu tor gadzhak fi' veh's relations, u' kuv veh vesh' wuh masuk'veh, heh tor nam-tor var-tor tor hal-tor. Wuh sai-famik idea!" mr. Camilla interposing, u' mrs. Camilla laid ish-veh el'ru fi-tor ish-veh heaving bosom, ik t'sai assumed wuh unnatural fortitude t' manner if i supposed tor nam-tor expressive t' wuh intention tor eku heh khluhkau lu s' zan-tor, heh kissing ish-veh el'ru tor din-tor havisham, vesh' escorted forth. Sarah abru'lik heh georgiana contended vi dang hafau kim-shah; tonk'peh sarah vesh' nuh' fai-tor tor nam-tor outdone, heh ambled pauk georgiana k' ik artful slipperiness ik wuh latter vesh' obliged tor nem-tor precedence. Sarah abru'lik yi tor ish-veh dahshauk daya t' departing k', "kudau du, din-tor havisham tal-kam!" heh k' wuh abru'teruklar-ru'lut t' forgiving pity fi' ish-veh walnut-fo countenance na' wuh kobat'es t' wuh shom. Du' estella vesh' maf ha'gelan au ne', din-tor havisham fam dvun lates-tor k' ish-veh el'ru fi' t'nash-veh tipan, tonk'peh weht heh weht slowly. Na' kim-shah she pehkau fa' wuh yon, heh leralmin-tor, po' muttering heh looking na' ish-veh ein seconds, "nash nam-tor t'nash-veh gad t'keshtan, pip." i vesh' going tor istaya ish-veh wehk kunli fun-tor, lu she abertau ish-veh terpau. "i ri tor dash ish-veh tor nam-tor spoken t'. I ri tor dash eifa vi vesh' la' aishan i', il sovek veh tor stariben t' ish-veh. Sarlah au la' fi' wuh gad, tonk'peh au dare ri dzhinau tor ish-veh." veling i tor rai further urgam tor dzhinau tor ish-veh. "fi' nash gad t' wuh tevun, wu fa' du vesh' pukeshta, nash tuh t' nehaya, " stabbing k' ish-veh crutched terpau na' wuh tuh t' cobwebs fi' wuh pasu, tonk'peh ri touching ish-veh, "vesh' katau la'. Ish-veh heh i ma worn maf teretuhr. Wuh aushfa ma gnawed na' ish-veh, heh sharper zud do zud t' aushfa ma gnawed na' me." she meskarau wuh patam t' ish-veh terpau tehnat ish-veh khaf-spol u' she lam-tor looking na' wuh pasu; she svi' ish-veh wuh'wak wan-kur sai-vel, ek' kin-kur heh withered; wuh wuh'wak wan-kur sai ek' kin-kur heh withered; kanok-vei pa' svi' wuh fupa s' tor snaipau ne' wuh esta. "lu wuh ruin nam-tor ovsotik, " leralmin-tor she, k' wuh ghastly glazhau, "heh lu au ti me tevik, svi' t'nash-veh bride's sai-vel fi' wuh bride's pasu, if dungau nam-tor ovsoh, heh if dungi nam-tor wuh shahtau curse fi-tor ish-veh, ni mau wuh weh-rom kuv ish-veh nam-tor ovsoh fi' nash gad!" she lam-tor looking na' wuh pasu u' kuv she lam-tor looking na' ish-veh sha' khlop lying tra'. I hafau hizhuk. Estella fun-tor, heh she nuh' hafau hizhuk. Ish-veh seemed tor me ik etek fator thus na' wuh akarshif. Svi' wuh ras sov t' wuh tvi-shal, heh wuh ras mu'khlup'es ik brooded svi' its remoter teruk, i kauk had wuh alarming fancy ik estella heh i lau presently palikau tor nehaya. Na' wu-vath, ri coming s' ish-veh distraught fupa s' k' degrees, tonk'peh svi' wuh instant, din-tor havisham leralmin-tor, "kal-tor me gla-tor du dahkuh mavau nop; po ma du ri palikau?" k' ik, etek fun-tor tor ish-veh tvi-shal, heh hayal-tor ne' u' fa'; i vesh' beggared, u' fa'; heh va'ashiv, u' fa', din-tor havisham glantau etek ek' wuh wak, khartau t'nash-veh attention tor estella's vaksur, heh tor me beglanau ish-veh wuh weht k' trying ish-veh ek'zer fi' estella's thasek heh isachya. Estella, na' ish-veh krus, likewise skasau me u' fa', kaula ik she did ri condescend tor stariben. Lu etek had mavau ein ulef-dozen zhagra, wuh gad vesh' kru'minaakh na' t'nash-veh fun, heh i vesh' taken ne' vi' wuh ker puyem-tot svi' wuh former dog-spo' manner. Tra', nuh', i vesh' va'ashiv losrak tor czar pa' u' i tishau. Ish-veh nam-tor ri mau tor wuh lof whether wuh temep svi' ik bah-ker temok if i had parish-tor abru tor peep abru' fi' wuh kim-shah occasion vesh', fi' ik kim-shah occasion, tu'ash il ikap-tor. Hiyet ik vesht gla-tor nash-veh rai temep yi, heh ik vesht gla-tor nash-veh veh i'. U' ish-veh lam-tor tu'ash, heh u' i fai-tor ik estella had kal-tor wuh visitors si', na' she had fun-tor k' wuh tal-muv svi' ish-veh el'ru, i strolled vi' wuh bah-ker, heh strolled ek' abru' ish-veh. Ish-veh vesh' ved wuh shi'kwai, heh tra' vesh' hinek melon-nentu heh cucumber-nentu svi' ish-veh, if seemed svi' ish-veh decline ki' torvau wuh spontaneous tor'ovak t' kobat attempts na' krus t' hinek taik heh kluf, k' i' heh yi wuh weedy offshoot vi' wuh likeness t' wuh battered saucepan. Lu i had saguhsh-tor wuh bah-ker heh wuh kastik-kel k' nothing svi' ish-veh tonk'peh wuh tevan-tor-ne' grape-kas-elakh heh ein mashek, i afer-tor myself svi' wuh dismal teruk fi-tor if i had glazhau s' wuh krani. Worla questioning na' wuh moment ik wuh kelek vesh' i' herbosh, i glazhau svi' na' wuh'ashiv krani, heh afer-tor myself, tor t'nash-veh lo'uk ak'wikmun, exchanging wuh sax'ksei nantaya k' wuh spoh nu'ri gentleman k' yon-kur bezhun-wein heh ta'hal isachya. Nash spoh nu'ri gentleman sahris sasaudau, heh reappeared be' me. Au had vesh' na' ish-veh dunap lu i had afer-tor myself staring na' ish-veh, heh i i' gla-tor ik au vesh' inky. "halloa!" leralmin-tor au, "nu'ri katravahsu!" halloa hasu wuh paik glantaya if i had usually glantau tor nam-tor buhfik kilko-tor k' itself, i leralmin-tor, "halloa!" politely omitting nu'ri katravahsu. "vi kal-tor du svi'?" leralmin-tor au. "din-tor estella." "vi mazhiv-kur-tor du trasha tor prowl pa'?" "din-tor estella." "sarlah heh puk, " leralmin-tor wuh spoh nu'ri gentleman. Ra sos tor tonk'peh zahal-tor ish-veh? I ma k'ashiv ya'akash myself wuh deshker opi'; tonk'peh ra else sos tor? Ish-veh manner vesh' ni kim-shah, heh i vesh' ni astonished, ik i zahal-tor wilat au pufulag-tor, u' kuv i had vesh' ne' wuh spell. "pehkaya wuh minute, hi, " au leralmin-tor, halek-tor pauk fa' etek had hal-tor wehk sahr-tor. "i ought tor mazhiv-kur-tor du wuh utvau na' fighting, nuh'. Tra' ish-veh nam-tor!" svi' wuh danik irritating manner au instantly slapped ish-veh el'ru tehnat veh wuh'ashiv, daintily flung veh t' ish-veh mal abru za' ish-veh, seshau t'nash-veh isachya, slapped ish-veh el'ru va'ashiv, spis-tor ish-veh patam, heh butted ish-veh vi' t'nash-veh skaun-sa'haf. Wuh bull-spo' proceeding kim-shah mentioned, isha ik ish-veh vesh' unquestionably tor nam-tor fudau svi' wuh ta'hal t' wuh liberty, vesh' wa' disagreeable aishan po' kap heh kahm. I therefore kwul si' na' ish-veh heh vesh' going tor kwul si' va'ashiv, lu au leralmin-tor, "aha! Would du?" heh began taman pla'rak heh fa'rak svi' wuh manner ved unparalleled k'svi t'nash-veh limited veshtaya. "tor-gav t' wuh zhagra!" leralmin-tor au. La', au skipped s' ish-veh losrak mal fi' tor ish-veh gas'rak. "regular tor-go!" la', au skipped s' ish-veh gas'rak mal fi' tor ish-veh losrak. "sarlah tor wuh solektra, heh hal-tor k'fai wuh preliminaries!" la', au sayutau pla'rak heh fa'rak, heh did ek' wihfelau t' vel du' i glazhau helplessly na' ish-veh. I vesh' secretly kwes t' ish-veh lu vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh ni dexterous; tonk'peh i olau morally heh physically convinced ik ish-veh ta'hal patam t' isachya kupi ma had rai business svi' wuh pit t' t'nash-veh skaun-sa'haf, heh ik i had wuh gas'rak tor panah-tor ish-veh irrelevant lu ni obtruded fi' t'nash-veh attention. Therefore, i zahal-tor ish-veh rik' wuh zhit, tor wuh retired sha-ti t' wuh bah-ker, shidau k' wuh junction t' dahkuh temok heh sananek k' ein guhsh. Fi' ish-veh asking me kuv i vesh' satisfied k' wuh solektra, heh fi' t'nash-veh replying ha, au eit'jae t'nash-veh trasha tor tadek-adir himself na' wuh moment, heh sahris fun-tor k' wuh mashek t' masu heh wuh sponge spis-tor svi' sfith-masu. "la'ka-yehat na' fi', " au leralmin-tor, placing aifa tehnat wuh temok. Heh yi tevan-tor tor pulling ska', ri goh ish-veh jacket heh waistcoat, tonk'peh ish-veh sav'el nuh', svi' wuh manner na' wuh'wak ta'hal-hearted, business-spo', heh bloodthirsty. Hi au did ri glazhau maut muhl-bosh, having pimples fi' ish-veh limuk, heh wuh breaking si' na' ish-veh ru'lut, aifa dreadful preparations ved appalled me. I judged ish-veh tor nam-tor pa' t'nash-veh sha' ya'shakhuv, tonk'peh au vesh' mau taller, heh au had wuh yut t' spinning himself pa' ik vesh' bosh t' appearance. Na' wuh shom, au vesh' wuh nu'ri gentleman svi' wuh zhai-kur saikhut (lu ri denuded na' puk), k' ish-veh kar-nef, mal-nef, kar-nik, heh timut considerably svi' storilaya t' wuh shom t' ish-veh u' tor storaya. T'nash-veh khaf-spol vravshau me lu vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh squaring na' me k' kanok demonstration t' mechanical nicety, heh eyeing t'nash-veh vukhut-tal u' kuv au vesh' minutely choosing ish-veh hinek. I worla ma vesh' ni ak'wikmun svi' t'nash-veh ha'kiv, u' i vesh' lu i kal-tor si' wuh wuh'rak salur, heh gla-tor ish-veh lying fi' ish-veh pla', looking abru na' me k' wuh bloody han heh ish-veh limuk exceedingly fore-pen-tor. Tonk'peh, au vesh' fi' ish-veh ash'ya directly, heh po' sponging himself k' wuh lo'uk gluvaya t' dexterity began squaring va'ashiv. Wuh dahr greatest ak'wikmun i ma ek'wak had svi' t'nash-veh ha'kiv vesh' seeing ish-veh fi' ish-veh pla' va'ashiv, looking abru na' me s' wuh nesh-kur bezhun. Ish-veh tam'a vi'le-esh-tor me k' lo'uk respect. Au seemed ki' rai karik'es, heh au worla wuh'wak kwul me lerash, heh au vesh' kwon-hau-ov knocked ne'; tonk'peh au would nam-tor abru va'ashiv svi' wuh moment, sponging himself il drinking s' wuh masu-mashek, k' wuh greatest satisfaction svi' seconding himself fupa s' shid, heh yi sarlah na' me k' wuh sov heh wuh gluvaya ik tor me dva-tor au really vesh' going tor tor na' me na' kim-shah. Au prah heavily bruised, na' ni'droi'ik nar-tor tor vipladau ik wuh weht i kwul ish-veh, wuh harder i kwul ish-veh; tonk'peh sarlah ish-veh abru va'ashiv heh va'ashiv heh va'ashiv, abi' na' kim-shah au prah wuh rasahkos tevan k' wuh pla' t' ish-veh patam tehnat wuh temok. Kauk po' ik burun svi' etwel tek'ik, au prah abru heh da-tor pauk heh pauk confusedly wuh zamu wak, ri fai-tor wilat i vesh'; tonk'peh t'forti went fi' ish-veh mal-nef tor ish-veh sponge heh threw ish-veh abru: na' wuh ka wak panting si', "ik tvai du ma skil-tor." au seemed ni kyi'i heh innocent, ik hi i had ri proposed wuh kal'i'fee, i olau tonk'peh wuh gloomy satisfaction svi' t'nash-veh skil. Indeed, i hal-tor ni irak u' tor rok ik i fudau myself du' sai-vel-tor u' wuh koshtri t' savage nu'ri wolf il vath kwai beast. However, i prah sai-vel-tor, darkly psethau t'nash-veh sanguinary limuk na' tvi-wak, heh i leralmin-tor, "mokuhlek i gol'nev du?" heh au leralmin-tor "rai thankee, " heh i leralmin-tor "rom aru, " heh au leralmin-tor "ka tor du." lu i prah vi' wuh courtyard, i afer-tor estella waiting k' wuh tal-muv. Tonk'peh she neither ya'akash me wilat i had vesh', il po i had potau ish-veh waiting; heh tra' vesh' wuh ugelik kluhvau fi-tor ish-veh limuk, u' hi vel had pavesh-tor tor delight ish-veh. Instead t' going zehik tor wuh temep, nuh', she ash-tor pla' vi' wuh tvur, heh beckoned me. "sarlah la'! Du lau shok me, kuv du spo'." i shok-tor ish-veh nak u' she da-tor ish-veh tor me. I nah-tor i would ma hal-tor k'fai wuh lo'uk deal tor shok ish-veh nak. Tonk'peh i olau ik wuh shok vesh' putan-tor tor wuh dirik tsuri sa-kan u' wuh krus t' donku lau ma vesh', heh ik ish-veh vesh' don nothing. Ra k' wuh gad t'keshtan visitors, heh ra k' wuh nop, heh ra k' wuh puk, t'nash-veh stay had palesh-tor ni wu, ik lu i betau ha-kel wuh ta'hal fi' wuh spit t' mazhiv ska' wuh sfek fi' wuh masu-kastra vesh' gleaming tehnat wuh nesh-kur mu-yor-igen, heh joe's furnace vesh' flinging wuh yut t' yon mes' wuh fau-yut. Chapter xii. T'nash-veh kashek grew maut uneasy fi' wuh subject t' wuh spoh nu'ri gentleman. Wuh weht i nahp t' wuh puk, heh recalled wuh spoh nu'ri gentleman fi' ish-veh pla' svi' vuhnauk skaf t' puffy heh incrimsoned countenance, wuh weht ac'ruth ish-veh saudau ik vel would nam-tor ovsoh tor me. I olau ik wuh spoh nu'ri gentleman's khaf vesh' fi' t'nash-veh patam, heh ik wuh tor-gav would avenge ish-veh. Rik' having sovek definite idea t' wuh penalties i had incurred, ish-veh vesh' pa'shik tor me ik pi'kahr sa-kan kupi ri hal-tor stalking pa' wuh shasol, ravaging wuh kelek t' gentlefolks heh pitching vi' wuh studious youth t' england, rik' laying themselves tu'ash tor severe taflaya. Na' ein gad, i kauk potau ikap-tor na' ha-kel, heh glazhau si' na' wuh af'tum svep k' wuh greatest yuzhat heh trepidation fa' going fi' wuh skrol, lest wuh officers t' wuh county potau-tvi-shal dang pounce fi-tor me. Wuh spoh nu'ri gentleman's han had kurau t'nash-veh malanu, heh i ar'kada tor pu-tor si' ik evidence t' t'nash-veh guilt svi' wuh tevik t' mu-yor. I had tresahk t'nash-veh ozh-lesek tehnat wuh spoh nu'ri gentleman's zud, heh i kuvoran-tor t'nash-veh glenonaya vi' wuh thousand tangles, u' i devised incredible yut t' accounting na' ik damnatory circumstance lu i dang nam-tor haled fa' wuh judges. Lu wuh gad sarlah pauk na' t'nash-veh fun tor wuh scene t' wuh deed t' khrash, t'nash-veh terrors pulau ish-veh pidek. Whether myrmidons t' yeht-gav, wa' satau ne' s' london, would nam-tor lying svi' ambush za' wuh temep; whether din-tor havisham, preferring tor nem-tor personal vengeance na' wuh outrage ovsoh tor ish-veh kelek, lau shen svi' eifa shi'vukhut-sai-vel t' ish-veh, bes-tor wuh el'ru-pohshayek, heh pohshau me tevik: whether suborned boysa numerous zhel t' mercenariesmight nam-tor engaged tor tevan fi-tor me svi' wuh brewery, heh cuff me abi' i vesh' rai weht; ish-veh vesh' pid testimony tor t'nash-veh guhl'es svi' wuh tam'a t' wuh spoh nu'ri gentleman, ik i worla glenonau ish-veh accessory tor aifa retaliations; au kwon-hau-ov sarlah vi' t'nash-veh kashek u' wuh fundauik-tor t' injudicious tomasu t' ish-veh, goaded fi' k' wuh fupa s' t' ish-veh visage heh wuh indignant sympathy k' wuh skan features. However, hal-tor tor din-tor havisham's i bolau, heh hal-tor i did. Heh behold! Nothing sarlah t' wuh tab-ma struggle. Ish-veh vesh' ri alluded tor svi' sovek yut, heh rai spoh nu'ri gentleman vesh' tor nam-tor discovered fi' wuh premises. I afer-tor wuh ka temep tu'ash, heh i explored wuh bah-ker, heh kauk glazhau svi' na' wuh krani t' wuh dahl-tor kelek; tonk'peh t'nash-veh zan-tor vesh' suddenly pehkau k' wuh a'ing fe-wein k'svi, heh ek' vesh' lifeless. Goh svi' wuh teruk wilat wuh morov had taken shi sos patal-tor sovek evidence t' wuh nu'ri gentleman's nam. Tra' vesh' zavikau t' ish-veh gore svi' ik gla-tor, heh i wein-tor au k' bah-ker-mould s' wuh bezhun t' sasu. Fi' wuh sax'ksei landing svi' din-tor havisham's sha' tvi-shal heh ik vath tvi-shal svi' if wuh wu pasu vesh' laid si', vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh bah-ker-ku-san, wuh ta'hal ku-san fi' halek, ik du kwitau s' za'. Ish-veh had vesh' shitau tra' opi' t'nash-veh kim-shah yaret, heh i svi-tor, ik ka gad, fi' wuh regular occupation t' pushing din-tor havisham svi' nash ku-san (lu she vesh' zungor t' walking k' ish-veh el'ru fi-tor t'nash-veh tipan) pauk ish-veh sha' tvi-shal, heh mes' wuh landing, heh pauk wuh vath tvi-shal. Abru' heh abru' heh abru' va'ashiv, etek would tor aifa halovaya, heh sometimes au would kim-shah u' wu u' rehkuh wadan na' wuh sakadaya. I insensibly tevan vi' wuh paik mention t' aifa halovaya u' numerous, fai'ei ish-veh vesh' na' wuh'wak settled ik i dang fun kanok krusitau gad na' aru na' aifa lof, heh fai'ei i am i' going tor hau-ov abru wuh wak-krus t' k'puu ohkuh il lehkuh tevun-krus. U' etek began tor nam-tor weht nam-tor-tor tor veh wuh'ashiv, din-tor havisham variben weht tor me, heh ya'akash me such deshkau u' ra had i oren-tor heh ra vesh' i going tor nam-tor? I var-tor ish-veh i vesh' going tor nam-tor apprenticed tor joe, i pudva-tor; heh i sukau fi-tor t'nash-veh fai-tor nothing heh wanting tor fai-tor kanok-vei, svi' wuh rok ik she lau nufai ein gol'nev na' ik desirable shaht. Tonk'peh she did ri; fi' wuh contrary, she seemed tor prefer t'nash-veh hasu ignorant. Neither did she ek'wak mazhiv-kur-tor me sovek donku, il sovek-vel tonk'peh t'nash-veh kanok-gadik aru-yem, il ek'wak stipulate ik i dang nam-tor vlitau na' t'nash-veh dvin. Estella vesh' kwon-hau-ov pa', heh kwon-hau-ov kal-tor me svi' heh si', tonk'peh worla var-tor me i lau shok ish-veh va'ashiv. Sometimes, she would coldly wivelau me; sometimes, she would condescend tor me; sometimes, she would nam-tor ved familiar k' me; sometimes, she would var-tor me energetically ik she fnu-ven me. Din-tor havisham would k'ashiv ya'akash me svi' wuh zhal, il lu etek vesh' sa'awek, "tor she tor'ovau prettier heh prettier, pip?" heh lu i leralmin-tor ha (na' indeed she did), would seem tor tizh-tor ish-veh greedily. Isha, lu etek mavau na' nop din-tor havisham would glazhau fi', k' wuh miserly relish t' estella's moods, whatever au vesh'. Heh sometimes, lu ish-veh moods vesh' ni wehk heh ni contradictory t' veh wuh'ashiv ik i vesh' puzzled ra tor leralmin il tor, din-tor havisham would nartaya ish-veh k' lavish fondness, murmuring vel svi' ish-veh kaluk ik sounded spo' "shaya ish-veh khaf-spol t'nash-veh pride heh rok, shaya ish-veh khaf-spol heh ma rai mercy!" tra' vesh' wuh song joe nam-tor-tor tor hum karf t' na' wuh zhuk-fasek, t' if wuh burden vesh' hinek clem. Nash vesh' ri wuh maut ceremonious yut t' rendering homage tor wuh patron osu, tonk'peh i dva-tor hinek clem lam-tor svi' ik relation na' zhuksu. Ish-veh vesh' wuh song ik va'amau wuh thon-tor t' beating fi-tor shek-tukh, heh vesh' wuh mere lyrical tobeg na' wuh ragtaya t' hinek clem's respected ahm. Thus, du vesh' tor mah-vel sa-kan roundold clem! K' wuh thump heh wuh soundold clem! Kuhsh-tor ish-veh si', kuhsh-tor ish-veh outold clem! K' wuh clink na' wuh stoutold clem! Salur wuh yon, salur wuh fireold clem! Roaring dryer, soaring higherold clem! Veh gad ak po' wuh appearance t' wuh ku-san, din-tor havisham suddenly taran tor me, k' wuh impatient dvun t' ish-veh ozh, "tra', tra', tra'! Uralau!" i vesh' ak'wikmun vi' crooning nash ditty u' i kwitau ish-veh abru' wuh lan-tol. Ish-veh pavesh-tor ni tor kum ish-veh fancy ik she nem-tor ish-veh abru svi' wuh neik brooding spes u' kuv she vesh' uralaun svi' ish-veh yuk. Po' ik, ish-veh became customary k' etek ki' ish-veh u' etek dvun-tor pa', heh estella would k'ashiv hau svi'; hi wuh bosh ish-veh vesh' ni nessau, kauk lu tra' vesh' rehkuh t' etek, ik ish-veh tor lehkuh ralash svi' wuh grim hinek kelek do wuh lightest esh t' salan. Ra sos shetau k' aifa surroundings? Uf kupi t'nash-veh character vravshau tor nam-tor vi-yumuk k' au? Nam-tor ish-veh tor nam-tor wondered na' kuv t'nash-veh nahp vesh' dazed, u' t'nash-veh bezhun vesh', lu i sasarlah vi' wuh malatik ta'hal s' wuh misty kin-kur tvi-shal? Sos'eh i lau ma var-tor joe pa' wuh spoh nu'ri gentleman, kuv i had ri previously vesh' pusvik-tor vi' eifa masuk' fereik-vel tor if i had confessed. Ne' wuh circumstances, i olau ik joe kupi hardly vravshau tor discern svi' wuh spoh nu'ri gentleman, wuh appropriate passenger tor nam-tor shitau vi' wuh nesh-kur velvet coach; therefore, i leralmin-tor nothing t' ish-veh. Isha, ik shrinking s' having din-tor havisham heh estella discussed, if had sarlah fi-tor me svi' wuh palikaya, grew mau weht potent u' wak went fi'. I reposed ovsotik guhl'es svi' kling tonk'peh biddy; tonk'peh i var-tor ri donku-tor biddy kanok-vei. Po sarlah ish-veh malatik tor me tor tor ni, heh po biddy had wuh glu concern svi' kanok-vei i var-tor ish-veh, i did ri fai-tor yi, hi i nah-tor i fai-tor i'. Meanwhile, shikh-orna went fi' svi' wuh af'tum na' ha-kel, fraught k' siyah insupportable aggravation tor t'nash-veh exasperated tam'a. Ik ass, pumblechook, nam-tor-tor k'ashiv tor sarlah abru' t' wuh mu-yor na' wuh lof t' discussing t'nash-veh prospects k' t'nash-veh ko-kai; heh i really tor dva-tor (tor nash wadan k' lehkuh penitence do i ought tor olau), ik kuv aifa el'ru kupi ma taken wuh linchpin s' ish-veh chaise-hal, au would ma ovsoh ish-veh. Wuh miserable sasu vesh' wuh sasu t' ik confined stolidity t' kashek, ik au kupi ri discuss t'nash-veh prospects rik' having me fa' ish-veh, u' ish-veh vesh', tor el'torau fi-tor, heh au would zaseshau me abru s' t'nash-veh stool (usually k' wuh hmoi'neks) wilat i vesh' hizhuk svi' wuh teruk, heh, putting me fa' wuh yon u' kuv i vesh' going tor nam-tor pufas-tor, would palikau k' taran, "i', mum, la' nam-tor nash sa-kan! La' nam-tor nash sa-kan if du katau abru k' el'ru. Meskaraya abru ish-veh patam, sa-kan, heh nam-tor ek'wak grateful unto au if ni did tor. I', mum, k' respections tor nash sa-kan!" heh yi au would rumple t'nash-veh isachya wuh riyeht yut, if s' t'nash-veh earliest remembrance, u' already hinted, i ma svi' t'nash-veh soul wafu wuh gas'rak t' sovek katravahsu-creature tor tor, heh would meskaraya me fa' ish-veh k' wuh sleeve, wuh spectacle t' imbecility goh tor nam-tor equalled k' himself. Yi, au heh t'nash-veh ko-kai would shif ska' svi' such nonsensical speculations pa' din-tor havisham, heh pa' ra she would tor k' me heh na' me, ik i nam-tor-tor tor wantquite painfullyto thorau vi' spiteful bezhun-masu, hash-tor na' pumblechook, heh pummel ish-veh ek' abru'. Svi' aifa dialogues, t'nash-veh ko-kai stariben tor me u' kuv she vesh' morally wrenching veh t' t'nash-veh zud si' na' kanok dzhinaya; du' pumblechook himself, shal-constituted t'nash-veh patron, would hayal-tor supervising me k' wuh depreciatory bezhun, spo' wuh te'koshfet t' t'nash-veh fortunes vi nahp himself engaged fi' wuh maut unremunerative job. Svi' aifa discussions, joe spitau rai krus. Tonk'peh au vesh' k'ashiv variben na', du' au vesh' svi' progress, k' utvau t' mrs. Joe's perceiving ik au vesh' ri favourable tor t'nash-veh hasu taken s' wuh zhuk-fasek. I vesh' fully hinek hiyet i' tor nam-tor apprenticed tor joe; heh lu joe hayal-tor k' wuh poker fi' ish-veh mal-nef thoughtfully raking si' wuh vitush svi' wuh weh-neik mofek, t'nash-veh ko-kai would ni distinctly construe ik innocent torai vi' opposition fi' ish-veh krus, ik she would taul na' ish-veh, nem-tor wuh poker si' t' ish-veh el'ru, hutau ish-veh, heh shitau ish-veh maf. Tra' vesh' wuh danik irritating shaht tor kanok veh t' aifa debates. Ek' svi' wuh moment, k' nothing tor ras-tukh abru tor ish-veh, t'nash-veh ko-kai would pehkaya herself svi' wuh luvaya, heh catching glan t' me u' ish-veh vesh' incidentally, would swoop fi-tor me k', "sarlah! Tra''s hiyet t' du! Du prah bi' tor sar-tak; du've putan-tor trouble hiyet na' veh mu-yor, i rok!" u' kuv i had besought au u' wuh favour tor ertau t'nash-veh ha'kiv si'. Etek went fi' svi' nash yut na' wuh akarshif, heh ish-veh seemed kesik ik etek dang fator tor hal-tor fi' svi' nash yut na' wuh akarshif, lu veh gad din-tor havisham pehkau pen u' she heh i vesh' walking, she leaning fi' t'nash-veh tipan; heh leralmin-tor k' ein displeasure, "du nam-tor growing ha-vol, pip!" i nahp ish-veh buhfik tor hint, k'fai wuh medium t' wuh meditative glazhau, ik nash lau nam-tor occasioned k' circumstances abru' if i had rai tash. She leralmin-tor rai weht na' wuh wak; tonk'peh she presently pehkau heh glazhau na' me va'ashiv; heh presently va'ashiv; heh po' ik, glazhau frowning heh moody. Fi' wuh thurai gad t' t'nash-veh attendance, lu etwel tsuri tusok vesh' abru', heh i had landed ish-veh na' ish-veh sai-vel-tor-pasu, she stayed me k' wuh dvun t' ish-veh impatient ozh: "var-tor me wuh ahm va'ashiv t' ik shek-zhuksu t' ish-veh." "joe gargery, ma'am." "meaning wuh trensu du vesh' tor nam-tor apprenticed tor?" "ha, din-tor havisham." "du had weh-rom nam-tor apprenticed na' wuh'wak. Would gargery sarlah la' k' du, heh katau ish-veh indentures, tor du nah-tor?" i signified ik i had rai vet au would nem-tor ish-veh u' wuh dor tor nam-tor ya'akash. "yi kal-tor ish-veh sarlah." "na' sovek particular wak, din-tor havisham?" "tra', tra'! I fai-tor nothing pa' wak. Kal-tor ish-veh sarlah ak, heh sarlah bi' k' du." lu i prah ha-kel na' mu-yor, heh tefu nash skladan na' joe, t'nash-veh ko-kai "went fi' wuh rampage, " svi' wuh weht alarming degree do na' sovek previous wak-krus. She ya'akash me heh joe whether etek supposed she vesh' svep-pev ne' etwel ash'ya, heh uf etek dared tor nam-tor-tor ish-veh ni, heh ra apc'koik etek graciously nahp she vesh' nunau na'? Lu she had saguhsh-tor wuh torrent t' such inquiries, she threw wuh ha'fek na' joe, thorau vi' wuh ral sobbing, prah si' wuh fnash-sunil, if vesh' kwon-hau-ov wuh maut rasahkos glat, shitau fi' ish-veh dirik apron, heh began cleaning abru tor wuh terrible sadvun. Ri satisfied k' wuh pseth cleaning, she nem-tor tor wuh pail heh scrubbing-achut, heh pu-tor etek s' kelek heh ha-kel, ni ik etek lam-tor shivering svi' wuh pla'-ker. Ish-veh vesh' lehkuh o'wak-vel na' mu-yor fa' etek ventured tor creep svi' va'ashiv, heh yi she ya'akash joe po au hadn't telik wuh negress kafeh na' wuh'wak? Joe nufau rai kilko-srashiv, ri donku-tor katravahsu, tonk'peh lam-tor olaya ish-veh whisker heh looking dejectedly na' me, u' kuv au nahp ish-veh really lau ma vesh' wuh weh-rom speculation. Chapter xiii. Ish-veh vesh' wuh trial tor t'nash-veh feelings, fi' wuh thurai gad tonk'peh veh, tor gla-tor joe arraying himself svi' ish-veh gad sai-vel tor sailau me tor din-tor havisham's. However, u' au nahp ish-veh kelek-saikhut bolayatik tor wuh occasion, ish-veh vesh' ri na' me tor var-tor ish-veh ik au glazhau irak weh-rom svi' ish-veh working-sai-vel; wuh rather, fai'ei i fai-tor au tor himself ni dreadfully uncomfortable, entirely fi' t'nash-veh khrosahp, heh ik ish-veh vesh' na' me au seshau abru ish-veh sav'el-hmoi'neks ni maut pid za', ik ish-veh tor wuh isachya fi' wuh tarkiv t' ish-veh patam lamok abru spo' wuh tuft t' kan. Na' asal-yem-wak t'nash-veh ko-kai afsakau ish-veh intention t' going tor kahr k' etek, heh hasu losrak na' sa-kuk pumblechook's heh puvutau na' "lu etek had ovsoh k' etwel tok-ti t'sai"wuh yut t' putting wuh nuf, s' if joe saudau vul-tor tor augur wuh rasahkos. Wuh zhuk-fasek vesh' ikap'uh t'du ru'lut na' wuh gad, heh joe inscribed svi' gav fi-tor wuh svep (u' ish-veh vesh' ish-veh custom tor tor fi' wuh maut ritsuri occasions lu au vesh' ri na' ar'kadan) wuh monosyllable hout, accompanied k' wuh lubesan t' wuh kliton supposed tor nam-tor hashan svi' wuh kharat au had taken. Etek lates-tor tor kahr, t'nash-veh ko-kai leading wuh yut svi' wuh maut suk beaver bonnet, heh carrying wuh ki'haf spo' wuh lo'uk fen t' england svi' plaited terp, wuh shif t' pattens, wuh spare shawl, heh wuh umbrella, hi ish-veh vesh' wuh tok-ti ugelik gad. I am ri ved pa'shik whether aifa ua'mrki vesh' lesh penitentially il ostentatiously; tonk'peh i rather nah-tor au vesh' gluvaya u' ua'mrki t' veltra, mau u' cleopatra il sovek vath sovereign t'sai fi' wuh rampage lau gluvaya ish-veh don-tak svi' wuh pageant il procession. Lu sarlah etek tor pumblechook's, t'nash-veh ko-kai rukau svi' heh losrak etek. U' ish-veh vesh' siyah aru, joe heh i meskarau zehik fi' tor din-tor havisham's kelek. Estella tu'ash wuh temep u' tsuri, heh, wuh moment she saudau, joe nem-tor ish-veh taik ska' heh lam-tor weighing ish-veh k' wuh brim svi' fi' ish-veh el'ru; u' kuv au had ein akali utvau svi' ish-veh kashek na' hasu particular tor ulef wuh yonuk t' wuh ounce. Estella nem-tor rai beglanau t' either t' etek, tonk'peh pufulag-tor etek wuh yut ik i fai-tor ni muhl. I zahal-tor nam-tor' ish-veh, heh joe sarlah kim-shah. Lu i glazhau pla' na' joe svi' wuh wu tvur, au vesh' fam dvun weighing ish-veh taik k' wuh greatest tun, heh vesh' coming po' etek svi' wu strides fi' wuh um t' ish-veh gof. Estella var-tor me etek vesh' fi' tor hal-tor svi', ni i nem-tor joe k' wuh tor-pal-cuff heh conducted ish-veh vi' din-tor havisham's la'es. She vesh' hayal-tor na' ish-veh sai-vel-tor-pasu, heh glazhau pauk na' etek iyi. "oh!" leralmin-tor she tor joe. "du nam-tor wuh sa-telsu t' wuh ko-kai t' nash sa-kan?" i kupi hardly ma glenonau tal-kam hinek joe looking ni rikes himself il ni spo' ein wehtsuri kushel; standing u' au did speechless, k' ish-veh tuft t' kan ruffled, heh ish-veh ru'lut tu'ash u' kuv au aitlu wuh worm. "du nam-tor wuh sa-telsu, " ashiv-tor din-tor havisham, "t' wuh ko-kai t' nash sa-kan?" ish-veh vesh' maut aggravating; tonk'peh, throughout wuh interview, joe persisted svi' addressing me instead t' din-tor havisham. "if i meantersay, pip, " joe i' glantau svi' wuh manner ik vesh' na' wuh'wak expressive t' nekwitau-yehat argumentation, wonil guhl'es, heh lo'uk politeness, "u' i hup heh telik ish-veh ko-kai, heh i vesh' na' wuh wak ra du lau vutau (kuv du vesh' anyways vul-tor) wuh single sasu." "muhl!" leralmin-tor din-tor havisham. "heh du ma reared wuh sa-kan, k' wuh intention t' taking ish-veh na' ish-veh apprentice; nam-tor ik ni, mr. Gargery?" "du fai-tor, pip, " kilko-tor joe, "u' du heh me vesh' ek'wak t'hylara, heh ish-veh vesh' glazhau na''ard tor betwixt etek, u' hasu calc'lated tor ras-tukh tor larks. Ri tonk'peh ra, pip, kuv du had ek'wak tor objections tor wuh business, such u' its hasu tu'ash tor nesh-kur heh sut, il such-spo', ri tonk'peh ra au would ma vesh' attended tor, ri tor gla-tor du?" "has wuh sa-kan, " leralmin-tor din-tor havisham, "ek'wak tor sovek objection? Tor au spo' wuh trade?" "if ish-veh nam-tor muhl beknown tor yourself, pip, " fun-tor joe, strengthening ish-veh former rish t' argumentation, guhl'es, heh politeness, "ik ish-veh vesh' wuh istaya t' ish-veh sha' hart." (vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh idea suddenly shaya fi-tor ish-veh ik au would rubilau ish-veh epitaph tor wuh occasion, fa' au went fi' tor leralmin) "heh tra' weren't rai objection fi' ish-veh krus, heh pip ish-veh vesh' wuh lo'uk istaya t' ish-veh hart!" ish-veh vesh' ved svi' vain na' me tor endeavour tor tor ish-veh sensible ik au ought tor stariben tor din-tor havisham. Wuh weht i tor limuk heh gestures tor ish-veh tor tor ish-veh, wuh weht confidential, argumentative, heh polite, au persisted svi' hasu tor me. "ma du katau ish-veh indentures k' du?" ya'akash din-tor havisham. "muhl, pip, du fai-tor, " kilko-tor joe, u' kuv ik vesh' wuh pi' unreasonable, "du yourself gla-tor me shitau 'em svi' t'nash-veh 'na', heh therefore du fai-tor u' au nam-tor la'." k' if au nem-tor au si', heh mazhiv-kur-tor au, ri tor din-tor havisham, tonk'peh tor me. I am kwes i vesh' kafusik t' wuh tal-kam rom katravahsu, i fai-tor i vesh' kafusik t' ish-veh, lu vesht gla-tor nash-veh ik estella lam-tor na' wuh pla' t' din-tor havisham's ku-san, heh ik ish-veh bezhun abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor mischievously. I nem-tor wuh indentures s' ish-veh el'ru heh mazhiv-kur-tor au tor din-tor havisham. "du gishu, " leralmin-tor din-tor havisham, u' she glazhau au abru', "rai premium k' wuh sa-kan?" "joe!" i remonstrated, na' au tor rai kilko na' ek'. "po ri tor du kilko-srashiv" "pip, " fun-tor joe, tresahk-tor me pen u' kuv au vesh' dash-tor, "if i meantersay ik vesh' ri wuh deshker requiring wuh kilko-srashiv betwixt yourself heh me, heh if du fai-tor wuh kilko-srashiv tor nam-tor bosh muhl rai. Du fai-tor ish-veh tor nam-tor rai, pip, heh wherefore dang i leralmin ish-veh?" din-tor havisham glanced na' ish-veh u' kuv she ken-tor ra au really vesh' weh-rom do i had nahp tor-yehat, seeing ra au vesh' tra'; heh nem-tor abru wuh pi' sa'haf s' wuh pasu be' ish-veh. "pip has pinkau wuh premium la', " she leralmin-tor, "heh la' ish-veh nam-tor. Tra' nam-tor kaukuh-heh-dah-leh guineas svi' nash sa'haf. Mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh tor ish-veh trensu, pip." u' kuv au vesh' absolutely s' ish-veh kashek k' wuh wonder awakened svi' ish-veh k' ish-veh flekh khlop heh wuh flekh tvi-shal, joe, kauk na' nash be' dvun, persisted svi' addressing me. "nash nam-tor wery liberal fi' ish-veh krus, pip, " leralmin-tor joe, "heh ish-veh nam-tor u' such poprah heh grateful welcome, hi worla glazhau na', irak il be', il nowheres. Heh i', hinek chap, " leralmin-tor joe, conveying tor me wuh kashan, wuh'rak t' yontau heh yi t' freezing, na' i olau u' kuv ik familiar sagluvaya vesh' applied tor din-tor havisham, "heh i', hinek chap, lau etek tor etwel gu-vam! Lau du heh me tor etwel gu-vam, fi' fi' etek, k' veh heh wuh'ashiv, heh k' au if ish-veh liberal presenthave-conweyedto befor wuh satisfaction t' kashek-ofthem u' worla" la' joe gluvau ik au olau au had tevan-tor vi' frightful rihag'es, abi' au triumphantly rescued himself k' wuh zhit, "heh s' myself irak nam-tor ish-veh!" aifa zhit had such wuh pauk heh convincing ralash na' ish-veh ik au leralmin-tor au dah'wak. "rom-bye, pip!" leralmin-tor din-tor havisham. "kal-tor au si', estella." "am i tor sarlah va'ashiv, din-tor havisham?" i ya'akash. "rai. Gargery nam-tor ish-veh trensu i'. Gargery! Veh zhit!" thus calling ish-veh pla' u' i went s' wuh svep, i puzhu-tor ish-veh leralmin tor joe svi' wuh natya emphatic spes, "wuh sa-kan has vesh' wuh rom sa-kan la', heh ik nam-tor ish-veh reward. Veling, u' wuh trau sasu, du dungi gish rai vath heh rai weht." uf joe prah s' wuh tvi-shal, i ma worla vesh' kup tor satalau; tonk'peh i fai-tor ik lu au did prah si' au vesh' steadily proceeding upstairs instead t' coming ne', heh vesh' zhu-fam tor ek' remonstrances abi' i went po' ish-veh heh laid meskaraya t' ish-veh. Svi' wuh'ashiv minute etek vesh' s'udish wuh temep, heh ish-veh vesh' klacha, heh estella vesh' hal-tor. Lu etek lam-tor svi' wuh gad-ha'khlup sa'awek va'ashiv, joe backed abru tehnat wuh temok, heh leralmin-tor tor me, "astonishing!" heh tra' au hafau ni wu taran, "astonishing" na' tvi-wak, ni k'ashiv, ik i began tor nah-tor ish-veh kash-ral vesh' worla coming pla'. Na' wu-vath au prolonged ish-veh remark vi' "pip, i tor assure du nash nam-tor u'-ton-ishing!" heh ni, k' degrees, became conversational heh kup tor lates maf. I ma utvau tor nah-tor ik joe's intellects vesh' brightened k' wuh snagel au had be' dvun-tor k'fai, heh ik fi' etwel yut tor pumblechook's au fereik-tor wuh subtle heh glu design. T'nash-veh utvau nam-tor tor nam-tor afer-tor svi' ra nem-tor shi svi' mr. Pumblechook's parlour: wilat, fi' etwel presenting ourselves, t'nash-veh ko-kai hayal-tor svi' conference k' ik detested seedsman. "muhl?" maf-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai, addressing etek fi' na' wuh'wak. "heh ra's pavesh-tor tor du? I wonder du condescend tor sarlah pla' tor such ri donku-tor shila'es u' nash, i am sure i tor!" "din-tor havisham, " leralmin-tor joe, k' wuh teslau glazhau na' me, spo' wuh urgam t' remembrance, "tor ish-veh wery partick'ler ik etek dang mazhiv-kur-tor herwere ish-veh compliments il respects, pip?" "compliments, " i leralmin-tor. "if ik vesh' t'nash-veh sha' dva, " kilko-tor joe; "ish-veh compliments tor mrs. J. Gargery" "mau rom au'll tor me!" glantau t'nash-veh ko-kai; tonk'peh rather gratified nuh'. "heh wishing, " pursued joe, k' wuh'ashiv teslau glazhau na' me, spo' wuh'ashiv urgam t' remembrance, "ik wuh fupa s' t' din-tor havisham's elth vesh' sitch u' would haveallowed, vesh' ish-veh, pip?" "t' ish-veh having wuh sanosh, " i hau. "t' t'sai' apc'koik, " leralmin-tor joe. Heh drew wuh wu esh. "muhl!" maf-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai, k' wuh mollified glance na' mr. Pumblechook. "she lau ma had wuh politeness tor satau ik skladan palikauk, tonk'peh ish-veh's weh-rom tab-ma do worla. Heh ra did she mazhiv-kur-tor nu'ri rantipole la'?" "she giv' ish-veh, " leralmin-tor joe, "nothing." mrs. Joe vesh' going tor shaya si', tonk'peh joe went fi'. "ra she giv', " leralmin-tor joe, "she giv' tor ish-veh t'hylara. 'heh k' ish-veh t'hylara, ' vesh' ish-veh danaya, 'i tvai vi' wuh el'ru t' ish-veh ko-kai mrs. J. Gargery.' au vesh' ish-veh zhit; 'mrs. J. Gargery.' she mayn't ma fai-tor'd, " hau joe, k' wuh appearance t' haulan, "whether ish-veh vesh' joe, il jorge." t'nash-veh ko-kai glazhau na' pumblechook: vi smoothed wuh kar-nef t' ish-veh wooden kar-ku-san, heh nodded na' ish-veh heh na' wuh yon, u' kuv au had fainu ek' pa' ish-veh beforehand. "heh uf mau ma du prah?" ya'akash t'nash-veh ko-kai, laughing. Positively laughing! "ra would la' apc'koik leralmin tor lehkuh plesh-tor?" halishau joe. "au'd leralmin, " fun-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai, curtly, "takov muhl. Ri nuh' mau, tonk'peh takov muhl." "ish-veh's weht do ik, yi, " leralmin-tor joe. Ik pthak-bosh impostor, pumblechook, iyi nodded, heh leralmin-tor, u' au tetau wuh kar t' ish-veh ku-san, "ish-veh's weht do ik, mum." "po, du ri tor tvai tor leralmin" began t'nash-veh ko-kai. "ha i tor, mum, " leralmin-tor pumblechook; "tonk'peh bek-tor wuh zeshau. Hal-tor fi', joseph. Rom svi' du! Hal-tor fi'!" "ra would la' apc'koik leralmin, " proceeded joe, "tor dah-leh plesh-tor?" "handsome would nam-tor wuh zhit, " fun-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai. "muhl, yi, " leralmin-tor joe, "ish-veh's weht do dah-leh plesh-tor." ik abject hypocrite, pumblechook, nodded va'ashiv, heh leralmin-tor, k' wuh patronizing abru'teruklar-ru'lut, "ish-veh's weht do ik, mum. Rom va'ashiv! Zahal-tor ish-veh abru, joseph!" "yi tor tor wuh shaht t' ish-veh, " leralmin-tor joe, delightedly handing wuh sa'haf tor t'nash-veh ko-kai; "ish-veh's kaukuh-heh-dah-leh plesh-tor." "ish-veh's kaukuh-heh-dah-leh plesh-tor, mum, " echoed ik basest t' swindlers, pumblechook, rising tor hutau el'ru k' ish-veh; "heh ish-veh's rai weht do ish-veh merits (u' i leralmin-tor lu t'nash-veh opinion vesh' ya'akash), heh i istaya du mak t' wuh donku!" kuv wuh villain had pehkau la', ish-veh nuf would ma vesh' sufficiently awful, tonk'peh au blackened ish-veh guilt k' proceeding tor nem-tor me vi' custody, k' wuh gas'rak t' patronage ik losrak ek' ish-veh former criminality irak za'. "i' gla-tor du, joseph heh ko-telsu, " leralmin-tor pumblechook, u' au nem-tor me k' wuh kar abru' wuh kar-nef, "i am veh t' au ik kwon-hau-ov hal-tor gas'rak k'fai k' ra au've palikau. Nash sa-kan bolau nam-tor bound, s' el'ru. Ik's t'nash-veh yut. Bound s' el'ru." "goodness fai-tor, sa-kuk pumblechook, " leralmin-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai (grasping wuh donku), "etek're deeply beholden tor du." "worla kashek me, mum, " fun-tor ik diabolical cornchandler. "wuh sanosh's wuh sanosh ek' wuh panu abru'. Tonk'peh nash sa-kan, du fai-tor; etek bolau ma ish-veh bound. I leralmin-tor i'd gla-tor tor itto var-tor du wuh yeht'es." wuh justices vesh' sitting svi' wuh kahr tvur be' na' el'ru, heh etek na' wuh'wak went abru' ki' me bound apprentice tor joe svi' wuh magisterial la'es. I leralmin etek went abru', tonk'peh i vesh' kwitau abru' k' pumblechook, exactly u' kuv i had ik moment picked wuh abru'lik il pohshau wuh rick; indeed, ish-veh vesh' wuh paik impression svi' kelek ik i had vesh' taken yon-kur-handed; na', u' pumblechook shoved me fa' ish-veh k'fai wuh patreitan, i puzhu-tor ein sutra leralmin, "ra's au ovsoh?" heh vath, "au's wuh nu'ri 'un, nuh', tonk'peh glazhau rasahkos, ri tor au?" veh person t' bovik heh benevolent pulva kauk mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh ek'ur ornamented k' wuh woodcut t' wuh malevolent nu'ri sasu fitted abru k' wuh buhfik kahm-mahr-kel t' fetters, heh entitled tor nam-tor telv-tor svi' t'nash-veh nala. Wuh tvur vesh' wuh queer shi, i nahp, k' higher pews svi' ish-veh do wuh church, heh k' sutra hanging abru' wuh pews looking fi', heh k' mighty justices (veh k' wuh powdered patam) leaning pla' svi' ku-san, k' hesha kar, il taking snuff, il going tor yuk, il kitaun, il telvan wuh newspapers, heh k' ein shining nesh-kur portraits fi' wuh temok, if t'nash-veh unartistic bezhun fudau u' wuh composition t' hardbake heh sticking-plaster. La', svi' wuh teruk t'nash-veh indentures vesh' duly signed heh attested, heh i vesh' "bound"; mr. Pumblechook holding me ek' wuh du' u' kuv etek had glazhau svi' fi' etwel yut tor wuh scaffold, ki' eifa pi' preliminaries sashitau t'. Lu etek had sasarlah va'ashiv, heh had prah rid t' wuh sa-kan vi had vesh' shitau vi' lo'uk tam'a k' wuh gishat t' seeing me publicly tortured, heh vi vesh' mau disappointed tor talal ik t'nash-veh t'hylara vesh' goh rallying pauk me, etek went pla' tor pumblechook's. Heh tra' t'nash-veh ko-kai became ni teporilau k' wuh dah-leh-kaukuh guineas, ik nothing would dvin-tor ish-veh tonk'peh etek bolau ma wuh aru-yem s' ik windfall na' wuh pla-kur boar, heh ik pumblechook bolau hal-tor abru' svi' ish-veh chaise-hal, heh katau wuh hubbles heh mr. Wopsle. Ish-veh vesh' sep-wafikh tor nam-tor ovsoh; heh wuh danik melancholy gad i be' dvun-tor. Na', ish-veh inscrutably saudau tor lamok tor utvau, svi' wuh kashkau t' wuh bosh apc'koik, ik i vesh' wuh excrescence fi' wuh entertainment. Heh tor tor ish-veh weh-rasahkos, au ek' ya'akash me s' wak tor wak, svi' pen, whenever au had nothing else tor tor, po i didn't tizh-tor myself? Heh ra sos possibly tor yi, tonk'peh leralmin i vesh' enjoying myself, lu i wasn't! However, au vesh' grown abru heh had ish-veh sha' yut, heh au tor wuh danik t' ish-veh. Ik swindling pumblechook, exalted vi' wuh beneficent contriver t' wuh bosh occasion, actually nem-tor wuh fik t' wuh pasu; heh, lu au addressed au fi' wuh subject t' t'nash-veh hasu bound, heh had fiendishly congratulated au fi' t'nash-veh hasu liable tor imprisonment kuv i mavau na' nop, drank karik liquors, potau tab-ma wadan il rasahkos apc'koik, il indulged svi' vath vagaries if wuh shid t' t'nash-veh indentures saudau tor contemplate u' nam-tor' inevitable, au shitau me standing fi' wuh ku-san be' ish-veh tor illustrate ish-veh remarks. T'nash-veh goh vath remembrances t' wuh lo'uk gad-muf nam-tor, ik au wouldn't ti'amah tor yuk, tonk'peh whenever gla-tor au me dropping ska', woke me abru heh var-tor me tor tizh-tor myself. Ik, rather tab-ma svi' wuh khru mr. Wopsle mazhiv-kur-tor etek collins's ode, heh threw ish-veh bloodstained shek svi' rahm ne', k' such daya, ik wuh waiter sarlah svi' heh leralmin-tor, "wuh commercials ne'rak satau abru ish-veh compliments, heh ish-veh wasn't wuh tumblers' kar." ik, au vesh' ek' svi' marom tam'a fi' wuh fau-yut ha-kel, heh sang, o t'sai rom! Mr. Wopsle taking wuh neralash, heh asserting k' wuh tremendously karik spes (svi' kilko tor wuh inquisitive spitau vi fulag-tor ik krus t' ralash-tanaf svi' wuh danik impertinent manner, k' wanting tor fai-tor ek' pa' kanok-veh's awek tek'ik) ik au vesh' wuh sasu k' ish-veh wan-kur klachek flowing, heh ik au vesh' fi-tor wuh bosh wuh weakest pilgrim going. T'forti, i vokau ik lu i prah vi' t'nash-veh pi' shi'yuk, i vesh' truly wretched, heh had wuh karik conviction fi' me ik i dang worla spo' joe's trade. I had tishau ish-veh wuh'wak, tonk'peh wuh'wak vesh' ri i'. Chapter xiv. Ish-veh nam-tor wuh danik miserable vel tor olau kafusik t' ha-kel. Tra' lau nam-tor nesh-kur ingratitude svi' wuh vel, heh wuh taflaya lau nam-tor retributive heh muhl nazh-tor; tonk'peh ik ish-veh nam-tor wuh miserable vel, i mokuhlek testify. Ha-kel had worla vesh' wuh maut vaksurik shi tor me, fai'ei t' t'nash-veh ko-kai's temper. Tonk'peh, joe had sanctified ish-veh, heh i had pudva-tor svi' ish-veh. I had pudva-tor svi' wuh buhfik parlour u' wuh danik sohkik saloon; i had pudva-tor svi' wuh khom svep, u' wuh mysterious portal t' wuh temple t' fupa s' t'vi solemn sharu vesh' attended k' wuh sacrifice t' roast fowls; i had pudva-tor svi' wuh af'tum u' wuh chaste hi ri magnificent ha-shal; i had pudva-tor svi' wuh zhuk-fasek u' wuh glowing fau-yut tor manhood heh tikopah. K'svi wuh single tevun ek' nash vesh' rubai. I' ish-veh vesh' ek' dirik heh tsuri, heh i would ri ma had din-tor havisham heh estella gla-tor ish-veh fi' sovek khrosahp.
