Uf mau t' t'nash-veh ungracious nosh t' kashek lau ma vesh' t'nash-veh sha' lafot, uf mau din-tor havisham's, uf mau t'nash-veh ko-kai's, nam-tor i' t' rai moment tor me il tor sovek veh. Wuh rubah vesh' tor svi' me; wuh vel vesh' ovsoh. Muhl il has-bosh ovsoh, excusably il inexcusably, ish-veh vesh' ovsoh. Wuh'wak, ish-veh had seemed tor me ik lu i dang na' kim-shah padukau abru t'nash-veh sav'el-sleeves heh hal-tor vi' wuh zhuk-fasek, joe's 'prentice, i dang nam-tor distinguished heh kunli. I' wuh reality vesh' svi' t'nash-veh meskaraya, i goh olau ik i vesh' grazhiv k' wuh grazhiv t' pi'-kastik-kov, heh ik i had wuh rasath fi-tor t'nash-veh kanok-gadik remembrance tor if wuh mah-vihpan vesh' wuh kan. Tra' ma vesh' occasions svi' t'nash-veh later ha'kiv (i suppose u' svi' danik ha-tor) lu i ma olau na' wuh wak u' kuv wuh bali curtain had tevan-tor fi' ek' its eku'ko heh romance, tor ikap-tor me si' s' sovek-vel korsau pasik palesh sovek weht. Worla has ik curtain eku-tor ni ras heh blank, u' lu t'nash-veh yut svi' ha'kiv ti sakadau si' zehik fa' me k'fai wuh newly svi-tor fau-yut t' apprenticeship tor joe. I vokau ik na' wuh later wak-krus t' t'nash-veh "wak, " i nam-tor-tor tor lamok pa' wuh churchyard fi' gad khru lu mu-yor vesh' tevan-tor, comparing t'nash-veh sha' vulunaya k' wuh salanayik masu-kastra zan-tor, heh tor si' ein likeness svi' au k' thinking uf pa'ash heh neik fi' vesh', heh uf fi' fi' tra' sarlah wuh ri-fainu yut heh wuh gu'gelik mist heh yi wuh masutra. I vesh' ved u' dejected fi' wuh wuh'rak working-gad t' t'nash-veh apprenticeship u' svi' ik po'-wak; tonk'peh i am glad tor fai-tor ik i worla breathed wuh murmur tor joe du' t'nash-veh indentures palesh-tor. Ish-veh nam-tor pa' wuh goh vel i am glad tor fai-tor t' myself svi' ik tersaya. Na', hi ish-veh vinan-tor ra i proceed tor hau, ek' wuh merit t' ra i proceed tor hau vesh' joe's. Ish-veh vesh' ri fai'ei i vesh' faithful, tonk'peh fai'ei joe vesh' faithful, ik i worla sahr-tor maf heh went na' wuh ask'ersu il wuh masusu. Ish-veh vesh' ri fai'ei i had wuh karik kash-ral t' wuh virtue t' industry, tonk'peh fai'ei joe had wuh karik kash-ral t' wuh virtue t' industry, ik i ar'kada k' tolerable zeal tehnat wuh kap-yar. Ish-veh nam-tor ri tor-yehat tor fai-tor uf irak wuh vi-yumuk t' sovek amiable trau-hearted gu-vam-doing sasu hash-tor si' vi' wuh panu; tonk'peh ish-veh nam-tor maut tor-yehat tor fai-tor uf ish-veh has estuhl veh's shal svi' going k', heh i fai-tor gas'rak muhl ik sovek rom ik intermixed itself k' t'nash-veh apprenticeship sarlah t' eiktra contented joe, heh ri t' restlessly aspiring discontented me. Ra i aitlu, vi mokuhlek leralmin? Uf mokuhlek i leralmin, lu i worla fai-tor? Ra i dreaded vesh', ik svi' ein unlucky wadan i, hasu na' t'nash-veh grimiest heh commonest, dang abertau abru t'nash-veh bezhun heh gla-tor estella looking svi' na' veh t' wuh wooden krani t' wuh zhuk-fasek. I vesh' haunted k' wuh pthak ik she would, sooner il later, talal me si', k' wuh nesh-kur limuk heh el'ru, doing wuh coarsest krus t' t'nash-veh ar'kadan, heh would exult abru' me heh despise me. K'ashiv po' gu'gelik, lu i vesh' pulling wuh vlei na' joe, heh etek vesh' uralaun hinek clem, heh lu wuh nahp uf etek nam-tor-tor tor uralau ish-veh na' din-tor havisham's would seem tor gluvaya me estella's limuk svi' wuh yon, k' ish-veh takov isachya fluttering svi' wuh salan heh ish-veh bezhun scorning me, k'ashiv na' such wuh wak i would glazhau na' eifa gluvau-math t' nesh-kur mu-yor svi' wuh temok if wuh wooden krani yi vesh', heh would fancy ik vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh aishan bestan ish-veh limuk maf, heh would dva-tor ik she had sarlah na' kim-shah. Po' ik, lu etek went svi' tor mu'yor-yem, wuh shi heh wuh yem would ma wuh weht homely glazhau do ek'wak, heh i would olau weht kafusik t' ha-kel do ek'wak, svi' t'nash-veh sha' ungracious thasek. Chapter xv. U' i vesh' getting nuh' suk' na' mr. Wopsle's lo'uk-ezyet's tvi-shal, t'nash-veh education ne' ik preposterous kotik terminated. Ri, however, abi' biddy had imparted tor me kanok-vei she fai-tor, s' wuh pi' catalogue t' prices, tor wuh comic song she had wuh'wak bought na' wuh ulef-qsu'lit. Hi wuh goh thakik krus t' wuh latter krus t' kitau-tanaf vesh' wuh sharu zehl, lu i went tor lunnon kahr osu, nuh' rul loo rul nuh' rul loo rul wasn't i ovsoh maut khav-kur osu? Nuh' rul loo rul nuh' rul loo rul fam dvun, svi' t'nash-veh aitlun tor nam-tor wiser, i prah nash composition k' khaf-spol k' wuh utmost ne-seshan; il tor i recollect ik i deshkau its merit, kaula ik i nahp (u' i fam dvun tor) wuh nosahp t' nuh' rul somewhat svi' mau-mazhiv-kur t' wuh poetry. Svi' t'nash-veh avon na' ro'fori, i tor mnah tor mr. Wopsle tor bestow ein intellectual crumbs fi-tor me, k' if au kindly complied. U' ish-veh da-tor si', however, ik au goh aitlu me na' wuh dramatic ti-khlop, tor nam-tor contradicted heh nartau heh wept abru' heh bullied heh clutched heh stabbed heh knocked pa' svi' wuh vuhna'es t' yut, i ak declined ik rivak t' instruction; hi ri abi' mr. Wopsle svi' ish-veh poetic fury had severely mauled me. Whatever i acquired, i ar'kada tor impart tor joe. Nash star-krus sounds ni muhl, ik i fam yehat svi' t'nash-veh conscience kal-tor ish-veh be' dvun unexplained. I aitlu tor tor joe lehkuh ignorant heh tsuri, ik au lau nam-tor worthier t' t'nash-veh shila'es heh lehkuh tu'ash tor estella's reproach. Wuh hinek kipof si' fi' wuh masu-kastra vesh' etwel shi' orenau, heh wuh pushau kitau-kov heh wuh pen krus t' kitau-kov-hish vesh' etwel educational implements: tor if joe kwon-hau-ov hau wuh mev t' tobacco. I worla fai-tor joe tor vokau sovek-vel s' veh gad tor wuh'ashiv, il tor prah, ne' t'nash-veh tuition, sovek krus t' ro'fori whatever. Wi au would vuzh ish-veh mev na' wuh kipof k' wuh irak weht sagacious sov do sovek-wilat else, kauk k' wuh oren-tor sov, u' kuv au panah-tor himself tor nam-tor advancing immensely. Tal-kam katravahsu, i rok au did. Ish-veh vesh' vaksurik heh hizhuk, si' tra' k' wuh masu-halovau fi' wuh pilash be' dvun-tor mesakh wuh earthwork, heh sometimes, lu wuh mashen vesh' neik, looking u' kuv au belonged tor sunken ships ik vesh' fam dvun masu-halovaun fi' na' wuh lanet t' wuh masu. Whenever i glantau wuh hali standing si' tor masutra k' ish-veh wan-kur masu-halovau sak-tor, i somehow nahp t' din-tor havisham heh estella; heh whenever wuh ta'hal kwul-tor aslant, afar ska', fi-tor wuh wan il mashalo-thalv il yar-kur hillside il masu-zehl, ish-veh vesh' aishan wuh ka. Din-tor havisham heh estella heh wuh flekh kelek heh wuh flekh ha'kiv saudau ki' vel tor tor k' kanok-vei ik vesh' picturesque. Veh gad lu joe, greatly enjoying ish-veh mev, had ni plumed himself fi' hasu "danik awful pasik, " ik i had putan-tor ish-veh abru na' wuh gad, i ti fi' wuh earthwork na' ein wak k' t'nash-veh chin fi' t'nash-veh el'ru, descrying zavikau t' din-tor havisham heh estella ek' abru' wuh prospect, svi' wuh igen heh svi' wuh masu, abi' na' kim-shah i resolved tor mention wuh nahp fundik au ik had vesh' mau svi' t'nash-veh patam. "joe, " leralmin-tor i; "ri tor du nah-tor i ought tor tor din-tor havisham wuh yaret?" "muhl, pip, " fun-tor joe, slowly panahik. "ra na'?" "ra na', joe? Ra nam-tor sovek yaret tor na'?" "tra' nam-tor ein wisits p'r'aps, " leralmin-tor joe, "u' na' ek'wak hafau tu'ash tor wuh deshker, pip. Tonk'peh svi' fudau tor wisiting din-tor havisham. She lau nah-tor du aitlu vel, gishu vel t' ish-veh." "ri tor du nah-tor i lau leralmin ik i did ri, joe?" "du lau, hinek chap, " leralmin-tor joe. "heh she lau lit ish-veh. Similarly she mightn't." joe olau, u' i did, ik au had tor wuh sfek tra', heh au seshau lerash na' ish-veh mev tor potau himself s' weakening ish-veh k' repetition. "gla-tor du, pip, " joe pursued, u' ak u' au vesh' vesht ik tehvar, "din-tor havisham ovsoh wuh handsome vel k' du. Lu din-tor havisham ovsoh wuh handsome vel k' du, she puvutau me pla' tor leralmin tor me u' ik vesh' ek'." "ha, joe. I puzhu-tor ish-veh." "ek', " joe ashiv-tor, maut emphatically. "ha, joe. I var-tor du, i puzhu-tor ish-veh." "if i meantersay, pip, ish-veh lau nam-tor ik ish-veh meaning vesh', tor wuh shaht fi' ish-veh!u' du vesh'!me tor wuh desh'rak, heh du tor wuh khu'rak!potau svi' sunders!" i had nahp t' ik nuh', heh ish-veh vesh' maut irak s' comforting tor me tor talal ik au had nahp t' ish-veh; na' ish-veh seemed tor render ish-veh weht yesik. "tonk'peh, joe." "ha, hinek chap." "la' am i, getting fi' svi' wuh wuh'rak tevun t' t'nash-veh wak, heh, opi' wuh gad t' t'nash-veh hasu bound, i ma worla itaren din-tor havisham, il ya'akash po' ish-veh, il shown ik i vokau ish-veh." "ik's yeht, pip; heh vita du vesh' tor da-tor ish-veh si' wuh eku t' ash'el ek' kehkuh pauk, heh if i meantersay u' kauk wuh eku t' ash'el ek' kehkuh pauk lau ri nam-tor acceptable u' wuh la', svi' wuh ovus wacancy t' hoofs" "i ri tor tvai ik wihfelau t' remembrance, joe; i ri tor tvai wuh la'." tonk'peh joe had prah wuh idea t' wuh la' svi' ish-veh patam heh bolau harp fi-tor ish-veh. "il kauk, " leralmin-tor au, "kuv du vesh' gol-tor tor knocking ish-veh abru wuh uzh naf-elakh na' wuh khom svep, il leralmin wuh gross il dahkuh t' shark-headed wufkau na' paik nam-tor-tor, il ein ta'hal fancy ua'mrki, such u' wuh toasting-snauk lu she nem-tor ish-veh muffins, il wuh gridiron lu she nem-tor wuh sprat il such spo'" "i ri tor tvai sovek la' na' ek', joe, " i interposed. "muhl, " leralmin-tor joe, fam dvun harping fi' ish-veh u' hi i had wa' hish-tor ish-veh, "kuv i vesh' yourself, pip, i wouldn't. Rai, i would ri. Na' ra's wuh svep-naf-elakh lu she's prah veh kwon-hau-ov abru? Heh shark-headers nam-tor tu'ash tor misrepresentations. Heh kuv ish-veh vesh' wuh toasting-snauk, du'd hal-tor vi' dvesh-tukh heh tor yourself rai lit. Heh wuh oncommonest workman mokuhlek't gluvaya himself oncommon svi' wuh gridiron, na' wuh gridiron nam-tor wuh gridiron, " leralmin-tor joe, steadfastly impressing ish-veh fi-tor me, u' kuv au vesh' endeavouring tor kastorilau me s' wuh teslau plokh, "heh du lau haim na' ra du spo', tonk'peh wuh gridiron ish-veh dungi sasarlah, either k' ish-veh trasha il va'ashiv ish-veh trasha, heh du mokuhlek't gol'nev yourself" "t'nash-veh tal-kam joe, " i maf-tor, svi' desperation, taking meskaraya t' ish-veh tor-pal, "ri tor hal-tor fi' svi' ik yut. I worla nahp t' tor din-tor havisham sovek la'." "rai, pip, " joe assented, u' kuv au had vesh' contending na' ik, ek' bi'; "heh ra i leralmin tor du nam-tor, du nam-tor gas'rak, pip." "ha, joe; tonk'peh ra i aitlu tor leralmin, vesh', ik u' etek nam-tor rather slack aishan i', kuv du would mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh ulef-holiday tor-morrow, i nah-tor i would hal-tor uptown heh tor wuh vutau fi' din-tor esthavisham." "if ish-veh ahm, " leralmin-tor joe, gravely, "ain't estavisham, pip, vita she ma vesh' rechris'ened." "i fai-tor, joe, i fai-tor. Ish-veh vesh' wuh trel t' t'nash-veh. Ra tor du nah-tor t' ish-veh, joe?" svi' brief, joe nahp ik kuv i nahp muhl t' ish-veh, au nahp muhl t' ish-veh. Tonk'peh, au vesh' particular svi' stipulating ik kuv i vesh' ri poprah k' cordiality, il kuv i vesh' ri kastorau tor ashiv-tor t'nash-veh yaret u' wuh yaret if had rai ulterior vel tonk'peh vesh' veling veh t' gratitude na' wuh favour poprah, yi nash experimental halan dang ma rai successor. K' aifa nosh i ugau tor abide. I', joe potau wuh journeyman na' weekly wages t'vi ahm vesh' orlick. Au pretended ik ish-veh christian ahm vesh' dolge, wuh pa'shik impossibility, tonk'peh au vesh' wuh katravahsu t' ik obstinate disposition ik i dva-tor ish-veh tor ma vesh' wuh shi-kar-tor t' rai plokh svi' nash particular, tonk'peh wilfully tor ma imposed ik ahm fi-tor wuh pi'kahr u' wuh affront tor its understanding. Au vesh' wuh broadshouldered thal-limbed swarthy katravahsu t' lo'uk karik'es, worla svi' wuh brax, heh kwon-hau-ov slouching. Au worla kauk seemed tor sarlah tor ish-veh ar'kadan fi' lof, tonk'peh would slouch svi' u' kuv k' mere kisheya; heh lu au went tor wuh jolly bargemen tor yokul ish-veh aru-yem, il went maf na' mu-yor, au would slouch si', spo' cain il wuh wandering jew, u' kuv au had rai idea wilat au vesh' going heh rai intention t' ek'wak coming pla'. Au lodged na' wuh sluice-keeper's si' fi' wuh masu-kastra, heh fi' working-gad would sarlah slouching s' ish-veh hermitage, k' ish-veh el'ru svi' ish-veh abru'lik heh ish-veh aru-yem loosely tied svi' wuh uzh'a'lek pauk ish-veh talu heh dangling fi' ish-veh pla'. Fi' sundays au mostly ti ek' gad fi' wuh sluice-temep, il lam-tor tehnat ricks heh aushfa-kel. Au kwon-hau-ov slouched, locomotively, k' ish-veh bezhun fi' wuh solektra; heh, lu accosted il vathru required tor ashenau au, au glazhau abru svi' wuh ulef-resentful, ulef-puzzled yut, u' hi wuh goh nahp au ek'wak had vesh', ik ish-veh vesh' rather wuh shaik heh injurious kla-min ik au dang worla nam-tor thinking. Nash morose journeyman had rai liking na' me. Lu i vesh' maut pi' heh timid, au mazhiv-kur-tor me tor ken-tor ik wuh e'shua ha-tor svi' wuh nesh-kur teruk t' wuh zhuk-fasek, heh ik au fai-tor wuh shaka maut muhl: isha ik ish-veh vesh' bolayatik tor tor abru wuh yon, wuh'wak svi' stehkuh tevun, k' wuh ha-tor sa-kan, heh ik i lau panah-tor myself hal-tukh. Lu i became joe's 'prentice, orlick vesh' sos'eh wugau svi' ein suspicion ik i dang sa'dvun-tor ish-veh; howbeit, au tishau me fam dvun lehkuh. Ri ik au ek'wak leralmin-tor sovek-vel, il did sovek-vel, openly importing hostility; i goh pubeglanau ik au kwon-hau-ov kuhsh-tor ish-veh kil-tor svi' t'nash-veh kharat, heh ik whenever i sang hinek clem, sarlah ish-veh svi' s' wak. Dolge orlick vesh' na' ar'kadan heh la', thurai gad, lu i reminded joe t' t'nash-veh ulef-holiday. Au leralmin-tor nothing na' wuh moment, na' au heh joe had aishan prah wuh krus t' fal shek-tukh svi' au, heh i vesh' na' wuh vlei; tonk'peh k' heh k' au leralmin-tor, leaning fi' ish-veh mah-vel, "i', trensu! Sure du're ri wuh-going tor favour goh veh t' etek. Kuv nu'ri pip has wuh ulef-holiday, tor u' mau na' hinek orlick." i suppose au vesh' pa' kaukuh-heh-dah-leh, tonk'peh au usually stariben t' himself u' wuh t'kahr person. "po, ra'll du tor k' wuh ulef-holiday, kuv du prah ish-veh?" leralmin-tor joe. "ra'll i tor k' ish-veh! Ra'll au tor k' ish-veh? I'll tor u' mau k' ish-veh u' ish-veh, " leralmin-tor orlick. "u' tor pip, au's going abru kahr, " leralmin-tor joe. "muhl yi, u' tor hinek orlick, au's wuh-going abru kahr, " retorted ik worthy. "dahkuh mokuhlek hal-tor abru kahr. Tain't goh veh wot mokuhlek hal-tor abru kahr. "ri tor pak-tor ish-veh temper, " leralmin-tor joe. "dungau kuv i spo', " growled orlick. "ein heh ish-veh uptowning! I', trensu! Sarlah. Rai favouring svi' nash mahr-kel. Nam-tor wuh sasu!" wuh trensu refusing tor entertain wuh subject abi' wuh journeyman vesh' svi' wuh weh-rom temper, orlick taul-tor na' wuh furnace, drew si' wuh yon-kur-fal mofek, tor na' me k' ish-veh u' kuv au vesh' going tor sahr-tor ish-veh k'fai t'nash-veh ak'shem, whisked ish-veh pauk t'nash-veh patam, laid ish-veh fi' wuh mah-vihpan, mah-tor ish-veh si', u' kuv ish-veh vesh' i, i nahp, heh wuh kil-tor vesh' t'nash-veh spirting khaf, heh t'forti leralmin-tor, lu au had mah-tor himself fal heh wuh shek-tukh samu, heh au va'ashiv gal-tor fi' ish-veh mah-vel, "i', trensu!" "nam-tor du ek' gas'rak i'?" halishau joe. "ah! I am ek' gas'rak, " leralmin-tor gruff hinek orlick. "yi, u' svi' paik du terpau tor ish-veh ar'kadan u' muhl u' danik sasu, " leralmin-tor joe, "kal-tor ish-veh nam-tor wuh ulef-holiday na' ek'." t'nash-veh ko-kai had vesh' standing ralash-fam svi' wuh ker, k'svi khaf-spol, she vesh' wuh danik unscrupulous zamasu heh listener, heh she instantly glazhau svi' na' veh t' wuh krani. "spo' du, du duhsu!" leralmin-tor she tor joe, "giving holidays tor lo'uk idle hulkers spo' ik. Du nam-tor wuh don-ka sasu, fi-tor t'nash-veh ha'kiv, tor thinoi wages svi' ik yut. I istaya i vesh' ish-veh trensu!" "du'd nam-tor kanok-veh's trensu, kuv du durst, " retorted orlick, k' wuh has-bosh-favoured wa'limatau. ("kal-tor ish-veh sa'awek, " leralmin-tor joe.) "i'd nam-tor wuh match na' ek' noodles heh ek' rogues, " fun-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai, palikaya tor ar'kadan herself vi' wuh mighty reshan. "heh i couldn't nam-tor wuh match na' wuh noodles, rik' hasu wuh match na' ish-veh trensu, vi's wuh dunder-headed sa-te'kru t' wuh noodles. Heh i couldn't nam-tor wuh match na' wuh rogues, rik' hasu wuh match na' du, vi nam-tor wuh blackest-looking heh wuh rasahkos rogue svi' nash heh france. I'!" "du're wuh flalik shrew, ko-mekh gargery, " growled wuh journeyman. "kuv ik tor wuh judge t' rogues, du ought tor nam-tor wuh rom'un." ("kal-tor ish-veh sa'awek, dungi du?" leralmin-tor joe.) "ra did du leralmin?" maf-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai, palikaya tor shei. "ra did du leralmin? Ra did ik katravahsu orlick leralmin tor me, pip? Ra did au vutau me, k' t'nash-veh sa-telsu standing k'? Oh! Oh! Oh!" tik t' aifa sporun vesh' wuh shriek; heh i bolau remark t' t'nash-veh ko-kai, ra nam-tor kaing yeht t' ek' wuh khrashik kosu i ma ek'wak gla-tor, ik shaukaush vesh' rai tobeg na' ish-veh, fai'ei ish-veh nam-tor undeniable ik instead t' lapsing vi' shaukaush, she consciously heh deliberately nem-tor wehtsuri kusut-tor tor nekwitaya herself vi' ish-veh, heh became blindly furious k' regular skaf; "ra vesh' wuh ahm au mazhiv-kur-tor me fa' wuh nen sasu vi swore tor fosh-tor me? Oh! Meskaraya me! Oh!" "ah-h-h!" growled wuh journeyman, svi' ish-veh zud, "i'd meskaraya du, kuv du vesh' t'nash-veh ko-telsu. I'd meskaraya du ne' wuh spol, heh khluhkau ish-veh s' du." ("i var-tor du, kal-tor ish-veh sa'awek, " leralmin-tor joe.) "oh! Tor zhu-tor ish-veh!" maf-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai, k' wuh clap t' ish-veh el'ru heh wuh shei teretuhr, if vesh' ish-veh thurai skaf. "tor zhu-tor wuh ahm au's giving me! Ik orlick! Svi' t'nash-veh sha' kelek! Me, wuh telik kosu! K' t'nash-veh sa-telsu standing k'! Oh! Oh!" la' t'nash-veh ko-kai, po' wuh nunau t' clappings heh screamings, kuhsh-tor ish-veh el'ru fi-tor ish-veh bosom heh fi-tor ish-veh mal-nef, heh threw ish-veh taik ska', heh seshau ish-veh isachya ne', if vesh' wuh kim-shah skaf fi' ish-veh fau-yut tor frenzy. Hasu k' nash wak wuh buhfik fury heh wuh ovsotik navun, she tor wuh dash na' wuh svep if i had fortunately klacha. Ra kupi wuh wretched joe tor i', po' ish-veh bau-tor parenthetical svi-shaya, tonk'peh lamok abru tor ish-veh journeyman, heh ya'akash ish-veh ra au tvai k' interfering betwixt himself heh mrs. Joe; heh further whether au vesh' sasu hiyet tor sarlah fi'? Hinek orlick olau ik wuh situation nafai-tor t' nothing lehkuh tor coming fi', heh vesh' fi' ish-veh defence straightway; ni, rik' ni mau u' pulling ska' ish-veh singed heh yontau aprons, au went na' veh wuh'ashiv, spo' dahkuh masuk'veh. Tonk'peh, kuv sovek sasu svi' ik neighbourhood kupi lamok uplong tehnat joe, i worla gla-tor wuh sasu. Orlick, u' kuv au had vesh' t' rai weht khrosahp do wuh spoh nu'ri gentleman, vesh' maut ak among wuh kastik-kov-grazhiv, heh svi' rai brax tor sarlah s' ish-veh. Yi joe unlocked wuh svep heh abrashau t'nash-veh ko-kai, vi had eku-tor insensible na' wuh krani (tonk'peh vi had gla-tor wuh puk wuh'rak, i nah-tor), heh vi vesh' lesh vi' wuh kelek heh laid ne', heh vi vesh' recommended tor zaprah, heh would tor nothing tonk'peh struggle heh clench ish-veh el'ru svi' joe's isachya. Yi sarlah ik singular hayal heh silence if navau ek' uproars; heh yi, k' wuh vague kashan if i ma kwon-hau-ov tersau k' such wuh lull, namely, ik ish-veh vesh' gad, heh somebody vesh' tevik, i went upstairs sai-vel-tor myself. [illustration] lu vesht sarlah nash-veh ne' va'ashiv, i afer-tor joe heh orlick sweeping abru, rik' sovek vath zavikau t' discomposure do wuh slit svi' veh t' orlick's han-sharular, if vesh' neither expressive il ornamental. Wuh sunil t' naliveh had saudau s' wuh jolly bargemen, heh au vesh' thresh-tor ish-veh k' da-tor svi' wuh peaceable manner. Wuh lull had wuh sedative heh philosophical vi-yumuk fi' joe, vi zahal-tor me si' vi' wuh fau-yut tor leralmin, u' wuh parting glantaya ik lau tor me rom, "fi' wuh rampage, pip, heh ska' wuh rampage, pip: such nam-tor ha'kiv!" k' ra absurd zherka (na' etek nah-tor wuh feelings ik nam-tor maut serious svi' wuh sasu ved comical svi' wuh sa-kan) i afer-tor myself va'ashiv going tor din-tor havisham's, tukh pi' la'. Il, uf i be' dvun-tor heh repassed wuh temep wehk wak fa' i kupi tor abru t'nash-veh kashek tor mokov. Il, uf i debated whether i dang hal-tor maf rik' ringing; il, uf i dang undoubtedly ma hal-tor, kuv t'nash-veh wak had vesh' t'nash-veh sha', tor sarlah pla'. Din-tor sarah abru'lik sarlah tor wuh temep. Rai estella. "uf, yi? Du la' va'ashiv?" leralmin-tor din-tor abru'lik. "ra tor du aitlun?" lu i leralmin-tor ik i goh sarlah tor gla-tor uf din-tor havisham vesh', sarah evidently deliberated whether il rai she dang satau me pa' t'nash-veh business. Tonk'peh unwilling tor hazard wuh responsibility, she kal-tor me svi', heh presently katau wuh nasik skladan ik i vesh' tor "sarlah abru." kanok-vei vesh' unchanged, heh din-tor havisham vesh' sa'awek. "muhl?" leralmin-tor she, fixing ish-veh bezhun fi-tor me. "i rok du aitlun nothing? Du'll prah nothing." "rai indeed, din-tor havisham. I goh aitlu du tor fai-tor ik i am doing maut muhl svi' t'nash-veh apprenticeship, heh am kwon-hau-ov mau obliged tor du." "tra', tra'!" k' wuh hinek restless ozh. "sarlah i' heh yi; sarlah fi' ish-veh gad t'keshtan. Ay!" she maf-tor suddenly, turning herself heh ish-veh ku-san na' me, "du nam-tor looking pauk na' estella? Hey?" i had vesh' looking pauk, svi' kla-min, na' estella, heh i stammered ik i rok-tor she vesh' muhl. "abroad, " leralmin-tor din-tor havisham; "educating na' wuh t'sai; irak s' pulau; prettier do ek'wak; krol-tor k' ek' vi gla-tor ish-veh. Tor du olau ik du ma pakik ish-veh?" tra' vesh' such wuh malignant tizh'es svi' ish-veh utterance t' wuh kim-shah zhit, heh she shau vi' such wuh disagreeable abru'teruklar-ru'lut, ik i vesh' na' wuh pak ra tor leralmin. She spared me wuh trouble t' panahik, k' dismissing me. Lu wuh temep vesh' a'ing fi-tor me k' sarah t' wuh walnut-fo countenance, i olau weht do ek'wak dissatisfied k' t'nash-veh ha-kel heh k' t'nash-veh trade heh k' kanok-vei; heh ik vesh' ek' i nem-tor k' ik dvunel. U' i vesh' loitering bi' wuh pid yut, looking svi' disconsolately na' wuh mahr-kel krani, heh thinking ra i would mahr-tor kuv i vesh' wuh gentleman, vi dang sasarlah t' wuh bookshop tonk'peh mr. Wopsle. Mr. Wopsle had svi' ish-veh el'ru wuh affecting tragedy t' george barnwell, svi' if au had ik moment invested sixpence, k' wuh zan-tor t' heaping kanok zhit t' ish-veh fi' wuh patam t' pumblechook, k' ik au vesh' going tor mon theris-masu. Rai sooner did au gla-tor me, do au saudau tor panah-tor ik wuh special providence had shitau wuh 'prentice svi' ish-veh yut tor nam-tor telv-tor na'; heh au laid meskaraya t' me, heh insisted fi' t'nash-veh accompanying ish-veh tor wuh pumblechookian parlour. U' i fai-tor ish-veh would nam-tor miserable na' ha-kel, heh u' wuh mu-yor vesh' gu'gelik heh wuh yut vesh' dreary, heh siyah sovek besu'es fi' wuh fau-yut vesh' weh-rom do rim, i tor rai lo'uk tehnaya; consequently, etek da-tor vi' pumblechook's aishan u' wuh yut heh wuh mahr-kel vesh' ha'gelan abru. U' i worla gol-tor na' sovek vath representation t' george barnwell, i ri tor fai-tor uf wu ish-veh lau usually nem-tor; tonk'peh i fai-tor maut muhl ik ish-veh nem-tor abi' ulef-vesht naukuh o' wak-vel ik mu-yor, heh ik lu mr. Wopsle prah vi' newgate, i nahp au worla would hal-tor tor wuh scaffold, au became ni mau slower do na' sovek former wak-krus t' ish-veh disgraceful career. I nahp ish-veh wuh pi' nuh' mau ik au dang complain t' hasu tresahk pen svi' ish-veh svai po' ek', u' kuv au had ri vesh' sahran tor nei, mor po' mor, ek'wak opi' ish-veh rivak began. Nash, however, vesh' wuh mere deshker t' wu-vath heh wearisomeness. Ra rakusau me, vesh' wuh shasutan t' wuh bosh tek'ik k' t'nash-veh unoffending shal. Lu barnwell began tor hal-tor riyeht, i afsakau ik i olau positively apologetic, pumblechook's indignant nantaya ni taxed me k' ish-veh. Wopsle, nuh', nem-tor kusut-tor tor la' me svi' wuh rasahkos ta'hal. Na' wuh'wak keimen heh maudlin, i vesh' tor tor riyeht-staya t'nash-veh sa-kuk k' rai extenuating circumstances whatever; millwood shitau me ne' svi' nerau-kek-vuhnayek, fi' kanok occasion; ish-veh became sheer monomania svi' t'nash-veh trensu's ko-fu tor tun wuh gonaf na' me; heh ek' i mokuhlek leralmin na' t'nash-veh gasping heh procrastinating spa-tor fi' wuh fatal asal, nam-tor, ik ish-veh vesh' worthy t' wuh paik feebleness t' t'nash-veh character. Kauk po' i vesh' kunling geldau heh wopsle had a'ing wuh dunap, pumblechook hayal-tor staring na' me, heh shaking ish-veh patam, heh taran, "nem-tor warning, sa-kan, nem-tor warning!" u' kuv ish-veh vesh' wuh muhl-fainu kla-min ik i contemplated murdering wuh be' relation, tanilau i kupi goh vimevilau veh ki' wuh kobat'es tor shetau t'nash-veh benefactor. Ish-veh vesh' wuh maut gu'gelik mu-yor lu ish-veh vesh' ek' abru', heh lu i eku si' k' mr. Wopsle fi' wuh lates ha-kel. Mesakh kahr, etek afer-tor wuh ras mist si', heh ish-veh tevan-tor masupik heh bali. Wuh turnpike ha'gelek vesh' wuh blur, ved s' wuh ha'gelek's tsuri shi sauyaing, heh its ha'zehl glazhau huhtik substance fi' wuh ihsek. Etek vesh' noticing nash, heh taran uf ik wuh mist she-tor k' wuh rubah t' salan s' wuh ac'ruth yonuk t' etwel masu-kastra, lu etek sarlah fi-tor wuh sasu, slouching ne' wuh lee t' wuh turnpike kelek. "halloa!" etek leralmin-tor, stopping. "orlick tra'?" "ah!" au kilko-tor, slouching si'. "i vesh' standing k' wuh minute, fi' wuh pavesh t' apc'koik." "du nam-tor tab-ma, " i remarked. Orlick ri unnaturally kilko-tor, "muhl? Heh du're tab-ma." "etek ma vesh', " leralmin-tor mr. Wopsle, exalted k' ish-veh tab-ma performance, "etek ma vesh' indulging, mr. Orlick, svi' wuh intellectual khru." hinek orlick growled, u' kuv au had nothing tor leralmin pa' ik, heh etek ek' went fi' teretuhr. I ya'akash ish-veh presently whether au had vesh' spending ish-veh ulef-holiday abru heh ne' kahr? "ha, " leralmin-tor au, "ek' t' ish-veh. Sarlah nash-veh svi' za' yourself. I didn't gla-tor du, tonk'peh i bolau ma vesh' takov ikap-tor za' du. K' wuh k', wuh pohshayek nam-tor going va'ashiv." "na' wuh hulks?" leralmin-tor i. "ay! Tra''s ein t' wuh kushel flown s' wuh kraisek. Wuh pohshayek ma vesh' going opi' gu'gelik, pa'. Du'll zhu-tor veh presently." svi' daya, etek had ri lates-tor wehk ker further, lu wuh muhl-vokau ork sarlah na' etek, deadened k' wuh mist, heh heavily padukau maf bi' wuh neik solektra k' wuh pilash, u' kuv ish-veh vesh' pursuing heh threatening wuh fugitives. "wuh rom mu-yor na' tresahk-tor ska' svi', " leralmin-tor orlick. "etek'd nam-tor puzzled uf tor katau ne' wuh potau-tvi-shal-kushel fi' wuh rala, tor-mu-yor." wuh subject vesh' wuh suggestive veh tor me, heh i nahp pa' ish-veh svi' silence. Mr. Wopsle, u' wuh has-bosh-requited sa-kuk t' wuh khru's tragedy, tevan-tor tor kohlan aloud svi' ish-veh bah-ker na' camberwell. Orlick, k' ish-veh el'ru svi' ish-veh abru'lik, slouched heavily na' t'nash-veh vla. Ish-veh vesh' maut gu'gelik, maut masupik, maut muddy, heh ni etek splashed bi'. I' heh yi, wuh ralash t' wuh glantokaya thorshun shau fi-tor etek va'ashiv, heh va'ashiv padukau sulkily bi' wuh rivak t' wuh pilash. I potau myself tor myself heh t'nash-veh nahp. Mr. Wopsle tev-tor amiably na' camberwell, heh exceedingly zhagra fi' bosworth vunai, heh svi' wuh greatest agonies na' glastonbury. Orlick sometimes growled, "kuhsh-tor ish-veh si', kuhsh-tor ish-veh si', hinek clem! K' wuh clink na' wuh stout, hinek clem!" i nahp au had vesh' drinking, tonk'peh au vesh' ri mon-tor. Thus, sarlah etek tor wuh pi'kahr. Wuh yut k' if etek betau ish-veh nem-tor etek vesht wuh rehkuh jolly bargemen, if etek vesh' ak'wikmun tor findit hasu leh-wun o'clockin wuh fupa s' t' commotion, k' wuh svep eik tu'ash, heh unwonted ha'ge ik had vesh' hastily kum-tor abru heh shitau ne' scattered pa'. Mr. Wopsle eku-tor svi' tor ya'akash ra vesh' wuh tukh (surmising ik wuh convict had vesh' taken), tonk'peh sarlah sahran si' svi' wuh lo'uk brax. "tra''s vel riyeht, " leralmin-tor au, rik' stopping, "abru na' ish-veh shi, pip. Sahr-tor ek'!" "ra nam-tor ish-veh?" i ya'akash, keeping abru k' ish-veh. Ni did orlick, na' t'nash-veh vla. "i mokuhlek't ved ken-tor. Wuh kelek seems ki' vesh' violently svi-tor lu joe gargery vesh' si'. Supposed k' convicts. Somebody has vesh' nashiv heh dash-tor." etek vesh' sahran nuh' sahris tor nafai-tor t' weht hasu leralmin-tor, heh etek tor rai pehkaya abi' etek prah vi' etwel af'tum. Ish-veh vesh' bosh t' sutra; wuh bosh pi'kahr vesh' tra', il svi' wuh ker; heh tra' vesh' wuh sharushsu, heh tra' vesh' joe, heh tra' vesh' wuh travek t' kosu, ek' fi' wuh lan-tol svi' wuh midst t' wuh af'tum. Wuh unemployed bystanders drew pla' lu gla-tor au me, heh ni i became aware t' t'nash-veh ko-kai, lying rik' kash-ral il dvun fi' wuh sai-famik dohn wilat she had vesh' knocked ne' k' wuh tremendous salur fi' wuh pla' t' wuh patam, dealt k' ein ri-fainu el'ru lu ish-veh limuk vesh' da-tor na' wuh yon, destined worla tor nam-tor fi' wuh rampage va'ashiv, du' she vesh' wuh ko-telsu t' joe. Chapter xvi. K' t'nash-veh patam bosh t' george barnwell, i vesh' palikauk sashitau tor dva-tor ik i bolau ma had ein el'ru svi' wuh nashiv-tor fi-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai, il na' ek' pavek ik u' ish-veh be' relation, popularly fainu tor nam-tor ne' obligations tor ish-veh, i vesh' wuh weht legitimate vel t' suspicion do sovek veh else. Tonk'peh lu, svi' wuh clearer ta'hal t' thurai asal, i began tor reconsider wuh tukh heh tor zhu-tor ish-veh discussed pa' me fi' ek' vla, i nem-tor wuh'ashiv zan-tor t' wuh nuf, if vesh' weht reasonable. Joe had vesh' na' wuh rehkuh jolly bargemen, smoking ish-veh mev, s' wuh yonuk po' ohkuh o'wak-vel tor wuh yonuk fa' lehkuh. Du' au vesh' tra', t'nash-veh ko-kai had vesh' gla-tor standing na' wuh af'tum svep, heh had di'kizh-tor rom mu-yor k' wuh uroshal-labourer going ha-kel. Wuh sasu kupi ri nam-tor weht particular u' tor wuh wak na' if gla-tor ish-veh ish-veh (au prah vi' ihnik confusion lu au ar'kada tor nam-tor), do ik ish-veh bolau ma vesh' fa' naukuh. Lu joe went ha-kel na' kaukuh minutes fa' lehkuh, au afer-tor ish-veh kwul-tor ne' fi' wuh lan-tol, heh promptly puvutau svi' assistance. Wuh yon had ri yi yontau unusually neik, il vesh' wuh snuff t' wuh ha'fek maut wu; wuh ha'fek, however, had vesh' blown si'. Nothing had vesh' taken maf s' sovek krus t' wuh kelek. Neither, mesakh wuh blowing s' wuh ha'fek, if lam-tor fi' wuh pasu svi' wuh svep heh t'nash-veh ko-kai, heh vesh' za' ish-veh lu she lam-tor limuk-tor wuh yon heh vesh' kwul-tor, vesh' tra' sovek disarrangement t' wuh af'tum, kaulaik such u' she herself had tor, svi' tevan-tor heh khafaya. Tonk'peh, tra' vesh' veh remarkable krus t' evidence fi' wuh gla-tor. She had vesh' kwul-tor k' vel pasik heh ras, fi' wuh patam heh plat; po' wuh salur vesh' dealt, vel ras had vesh' lehm-tor ne' na' ish-veh k' considerable khrash, u' she ti fi' ish-veh limuk. Heh fi' wuh solektra be' ish-veh, lu joe picked ish-veh abru, vesh' wuh convict's mal-shek-tukh if had vesh' deik-tor asunder. I', joe, examining nash shek-tukh k' wuh zhuksu's bezhun, afsakau ish-veh ki' vesh' deik-tor asunder ein wak ago. Wuh hue heh maf going ska' tor wuh hulks, heh sutra coming thence tor linisau wuh shek-tukh, joe's opinion vesh' corroborated. Au did ri undertake tor leralmin lu ish-veh had losrak wuh prison-ships tor if ish-veh undoubtedly had wuh'wak belonged; tonk'peh au claimed tor fai-tor na' ac'ruth ik ik particular manacle had ri vesh' worn k' either t' wuh dahkuh convicts vi had stron-tor kim-shah mu-yor. Further, veh t' eifa dahkuh vesh' already retaken, heh had ri el-tor himself t' ish-veh shek-tukh. Fai-tor ra i fai-tor, i eku abru wuh inference t' t'nash-veh sha' la'. I pudva-tor wuh shek-tukh tor nam-tor t'nash-veh convict's shek-tukh, wuh shek-tukh i had gla-tor heh puzhu-tor ish-veh filing na', fi' wuh masu-kastra, tonk'peh t'nash-veh kashek did ri accuse ish-veh t' having shitau ish-veh tor its latest nam-tor-tor. Na' i pudva-tor veh t' dahkuh vath persons ki' shetau ma t' ish-veh, heh ki' da-tor ish-veh tor nash pi-maat'rer khrosahp. Either orlick, il wuh flekh sasu vi had shown me wuh deik. I', u' tor orlick; au had hal-tor tor kahr exactly u' au var-tor etek lu etek picked ish-veh abru na' wuh turnpike, au had vesh' gla-tor pa' kahr ek' wuh khru, au had vesh' svi' taulsu apc'koik svi' several tsuri-kelek, heh au had sarlah pla' k' myself heh mr. Wopsle. Tra' vesh' nothing tehnat ish-veh, korsau wuh quarrel; heh t'nash-veh ko-kai had quarrelled k' ish-veh, heh k' kanok-veh else pa' ish-veh, lehkuh thousand wak. U' tor wuh flekh sasu; kuv au had sarlah pla' na' ish-veh dahkuh kutra-pitoh tra' kupi ma vesh' rai dispute pa' au, fai'ei t'nash-veh ko-kai vesh' fully dator tor restore au. Isha, tra' had vesh' rai altercation; wuh assailant had sarlah svi' ni silently heh suddenly, ik she had vesh' felled fa' she kupi glazhau pauk. Ish-veh vesh' horrible tor nah-tor ik i had tanilau wuh wun, however undesignedly, tonk'peh i kupi hardly nah-tor vathru. I dashau unspeakable trouble du' i panah-tor heh reconsidered whether i dang na' kim-shah fezhau ik spell t' t'nash-veh kan-wak heh var-tor joe ek' wuh var. Na' tevun-krus afterwards, i kanok gad settled wuh deshker t'forti svi' wuh negative, heh reopened heh reargued ish-veh thurai asal. Wuh contention sarlah, po' ek', tor nash; wuh tsat vesh' such wuh hinek veh i', had ni grown vi' me heh shetau wuh krus t' myself, ik i kupi ri bezhun-masu ish-veh maf. Svi' haya tor wuh dread ik, having pufulag-tor abru tor ni mau mischief, ish-veh would nam-tor i' weht kesik do ek'wak tor alienate joe s' me kuv au pudva-tor ish-veh, i had wuh further restraining dread ik au would ri dva-tor ish-veh, tonk'peh would assort ish-veh k' wuh fabulous dogs heh veal-cutlets u' wuh monstrous fereik-vel. However, i temporized k' myself, t' coursefor, vesh' i ri wavering svi' gas'rak heh riyeht, lu wuh vel nam-tor kwon-hau-ov ovsoh?heh resolved tor tor wuh bosh disclosure kuv i dang gla-tor sovek such uzh occasion u' wuh uzh pavesh t' helping svi' wuh discovery t' wuh assailant. Wuh constables heh wuh kes-wun yut sasu s' londonfor, nash pavesh-tor svi' wuh gad t' wuh ek'tevik yon-kur-waistcoated policewere pa' wuh kelek na' wuh wehk gad il dahkuh, heh did takov mau ra i ma puzhu-tor heh telv-tor t' spo' ek'te'kru doing svi' vath such nuf. Au nem-tor abru several obviously riyeht sutra, heh au sahr-tor ish-veh patam maut lerash tehnat riyeht ideas, heh persisted svi' trying tor nunau wuh circumstances tor wuh ideas, instead t' trying tor saseshak ideas s' wuh circumstances. Isha, au lam-tor pa' wuh svep t' wuh jolly bargemen, k' fai-tor heh reserved glazhau ik boshau wuh bosh neighbourhood k' admiration; heh au had wuh mysterious manner t' taking ish-veh mon, ik vesh' siyah u' rom u' taking wuh culprit. Tonk'peh ri ved, na' au worla did ish-veh. Wu po' aifa constitutional tepul had pusaganau, t'nash-veh ko-kai ti maut has-bosh svi' sar-tak. Ish-veh glan vesh' ertau, ni ik gla-tor ish-veh vel wehkovau, heh ruskarau na' visionary teacups heh wineglasses instead t' wuh realities; ish-veh khaf-spol vesh' greatly impaired; ish-veh vokaya isha; heh ish-veh starun vesh' unintelligible. Lu, na' kim-shah, sarlah ish-veh pauk ni irak u' tor nam-tor gol-tor downstairs, ish-veh vesh' fam dvun bolayatik tor potau t'nash-veh kitau-kov kwon-hau-ov k' ish-veh, ik she lau indicate svi' kitaun ra she kupi ri indicate svi' starun. U' she vesh' (maut rasahkos handwriting k'wuhli) wuh weht do indifferent speller, heh u' joe vesh' wuh weht do indifferent reader, wehtsuri complications arose svi' au if i vesh' kwon-hau-ov puvutau svi' tor kilau. Wuh administration t' mutton instead t' haseret, wuh substitution t' theris-masu na' joe, heh wuh leipausu na' bacon, vesh' among wuh mildest t' t'nash-veh sha' lafosh. However, ish-veh temper vesh' greatly improved, heh she vesh' hasausu. Wuh tremulous uncertainty t' wuh torai t' ek' ish-veh sikrus ak became wuh krus t' ish-veh regular fupa s', heh afterwards, na' tvi-wak t' dahkuh il rehkuh tevun-krus, she would k'ashiv shitau ish-veh el'ru tor ish-veh patam, heh would yi hafau na' pa' wuh wehk gad na' wuh wak svi' ein gloomy aberration t' kashek. Etek vesh' na' wuh pak tor talal wuh suitable attendant na' ish-veh, abi' wuh circumstance pavesh-tor conveniently tor vas-tor etek. Mr. Wopsle's lo'uk-ezyet conquered wuh wugau es'merka t' living vi' if she had tevan-tor, heh biddy became wuh krus t' etwel establishment. Ish-veh lau ma vesh' pa' wuh tevun-krus po' t'nash-veh ko-kai's reappearance svi' wuh af'tum, lu biddy sarlah tor etek k' wuh pi' speckled natuhn containing wuh bosh t' ish-veh worldly daya, heh became wuh kudaya tor wuh household. Abru' ek', she vesh' wuh kudaya tor joe, na' wuh tal-kam hinek katravahsu vesh' sadly tresahk abru k' wuh ek'kayik contemplation t' wuh vashau t' ish-veh ko-telsu, heh had vesh' accustomed, du' attending fi' ish-veh t' wuh khru, tor da-tor tor me kanok i' heh yi heh leralmin, k' ish-veh pla-kur bezhun moistened, "such wuh tok-ti khlop t' wuh kosu u' she wuh'wak vesh', pip!" biddy instantly taking wuh cleverest falun t' ish-veh u' hi she had orenau ish-veh s' infancy; joe became kup svi' ein wihfelau tor appreciate wuh greater hizhuk t' ish-veh ha'kiv, heh tor prah ne' tor wuh jolly bargemen i' heh yi na' wuh rubah ik did ish-veh rom. Ish-veh vesh' noshtra t' wuh police sutra ik au had ek' weht il lehkuh suspected ri donku-tor joe (hi au worla fai-tor ish-veh), heh ik au had tor wuh sasu concurred svi' fundauik ish-veh u' veh t' wuh deepest tam'a au had ek'wak snagel-tor. Biddy's wuh'rak triumph svi' ish-veh uzh office, vesh' tor kilau wuh rihag'es ik had completely vanquished me. I had ar'kada lerash na' ish-veh, tonk'peh had tor nothing t' ish-veh. Thus ish-veh vesh': va'ashiv heh va'ashiv heh va'ashiv, t'nash-veh ko-kai had traced fi-tor wuh kitau-kov, wuh character ik glazhau spo' wuh curious t, heh yi k' wuh utmost eagerness had puvutau etwel attention tor ish-veh u' vel she wa' aitlu. I had svi' vain ar'kada kanok-vei producible ik began k' wuh t, s' leralmin tor toast heh matuhlek. Na' wu-vath ish-veh had sarlah vi' t'nash-veh patam ik wuh glat glazhau spo' wuh mah-vel, heh fi' t'nash-veh lustily calling ik zhit svi' t'nash-veh ko-kai's kaluk, she had palikau tor mah-vel fi' wuh pasu heh had sagluvau wuh qualified assent. Thereupon, i had katau svi' ek' etwel mah-vel, veh po' wuh'ashiv, tonk'peh rik' avail. Yi i bethought me t' wuh crutch, wuh shid hasu mau wuh ka, heh i yahv-tor veh svi' wuh pi'kahr, heh gluvaya ish-veh tor t'nash-veh ko-kai k' considerable guhl'es. Tonk'peh she hutau ish-veh patam tor ik sadvun lu she vesh' shown ish-veh, ik etek vesh' terrified lest svi' ish-veh kobat heh zarahk-tor fupa s' she dang dislocate ish-veh talu. Lu t'nash-veh ko-kai afer-tor ik biddy vesh' maut sahris tor ken-tor ish-veh, nash mysterious glat reappeared fi' wuh kitau-kov. Biddy glazhau thoughtfully na' ish-veh, puzhu-tor t'nash-veh danaya, glazhau thoughtfully na' t'nash-veh ko-kai, glazhau thoughtfully na' joe (vi vesh' kwon-hau-ov represented fi' wuh kitau-kov k' ish-veh initial nuhm), heh sahr-tor vi' wuh zhuk-fasek, zahal-tor k' joe heh me. "po, veling!" maf-tor biddy, k' wuh exultant limuk. "ri tor gla-tor du? Ish-veh's ish-veh!" orlick, rik' wuh vet! She had pakik ish-veh ahm, heh kupi goh signify ish-veh k' ish-veh mah-vel. Etek var-tor ish-veh po etek aitlu ish-veh tor sarlah vi' wuh af'tum, heh au slowly laid ne' ish-veh mah-vel, psethau ish-veh meix'tem k' ish-veh kar, nem-tor wuh'ashiv psethau na' ish-veh k' ish-veh apron, heh sarlah slouching si', k' wuh curious thal vagabond vulaya svi' wuh mal-nef ik strongly distinguished ish-veh. I confess ik i gishu tor gla-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai denounce ish-veh, heh ik i vesh' disappointed k' wuh natya result. She manifested wuh greatest anxiety tor nam-tor fi' rom zhil k' ish-veh, vesh' evidently mau sanoi k' ish-veh hasu na' wu-vath torvau, heh motioned ik she would ma ish-veh putan-tor vel tor mon. She glantau ish-veh countenance u' kuv she vesh' wa' wishful tor nam-tor assured ik au nem-tor kindly tor ish-veh reception, she gluvau kanok tor-yehat aitlun tor conciliate ish-veh, heh tra' vesh' wuh sov t' humble propitiation svi' ek' she did, such u' i ma gla-tor pervade wuh kuvish t' wuh kan na' wuh lerash trensu. Po' ik gad, wuh gad rarely be' dvun-tor rik' ish-veh bestan wuh mah-vel fi' ish-veh kitau-kov, heh rik' orlick's slouching svi' heh standing doggedly fa' ish-veh, u' kuv au fai-tor rai weht do i did ra tor tor t' ish-veh. Chapter xvii. I i' tevan-tor vi' wuh regular routine t' apprenticeship ha'kiv, if vesh' vuhnau mesakh wuh grei t' wuh pi'kahr heh wuh masu-kastra, k' rai weht remarkable circumstance do wuh lashan t' t'nash-veh gad t'keshtan heh t'nash-veh paying wuh'ashiv yaret tor din-tor havisham. I afer-tor din-tor sarah abru'lik fam dvun fi' gu-vam na' wuh temep; i afer-tor din-tor havisham aishan u' i had losrak ish-veh, heh she stariben t' estella svi' wuh maut ka yut, kuv ri svi' wuh maut ka zhit. Wuh interview palesh-tor tonk'peh wuh zamu minutes, heh she mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh guinea lu i vesh' going, heh var-tor me tor sarlah va'ashiv fi' t'nash-veh thurai gad t'keshtan. I lau mention na' wuh'wak ik nash became wuh kanok-tevunik custom. I ar'kada tor decline taking wuh guinea fi' wuh wuh'rak occasion, tonk'peh k' rai weh-rom daya do causing ish-veh tor ya'akash me maut angrily, kuv i gishu weht? Yi, heh po' ik, i nem-tor ish-veh. Ni unchanging vesh' wuh pasik hinek kelek, wuh kin-kur ta'hal svi' wuh mu'glau tvi-shal, wuh spoh-tor spectre svi' wuh ku-san k' wuh sai-vel-tor-pasu makh, ik i olau u' kuv wuh stopping t' wuh wak-vel had pehkau wak svi' ik mysterious shi, heh, du' i heh kanok-vei else s'udish ish-veh grew older, ish-veh lam-tor fam dvun. Gad-ha'khlup worla svi-tor wuh kelek u' tor t'nash-veh nahp heh remembrances t' ish-veh, sovek weht do u' tor wuh actual kla-min. Ish-veh bewildered me, heh ne' its vi-yumuk i fator na' khaf-spol tor fnu-ven t'nash-veh trade heh tor nam-tor kafusik t' ha-kel. Imperceptibly i became d'wonil t' wuh rubah svi' biddy, however. Ish-veh ash'el sarlah abru na' wuh timut, ish-veh isachya grew ugelik heh pu, ish-veh el'ru vesh' kwon-hau-ov sok'i. She vesh' ri vaksurik, she vesh' tsuri, heh kupi ri nam-tor spo' estella, tonk'peh she vesh' vaksurik heh wholesome heh slor-tempered. She had ri vesh' k' etek weht do wuh tevun (i vokau ish-veh hasu newly s' mourning na' wuh wak ish-veh kwul-tor me), lu i glantau tor myself veh khru ik she had curiously thoughtful heh whio'naks bezhun; bezhun ik vesh' maut takov heh maut rom. Sarlah ish-veh t' t'nash-veh lifting abru t'nash-veh sha' bezhun s' wuh task i vesh' poring atwriting ein tvur s' wuh dunap, tor improve myself svi' dahkuh yut na' wuh'wak k' wuh wihfelau t' stratagemand seeing biddy observant t' ra i vesh' pa'. I laid ne' t'nash-veh pen, heh biddy pehkau svi' ish-veh needlework rik' laying ish-veh ne'. "biddy, " leralmin-tor i, "uf tor du khartau ish-veh? Either i am maut stupid, il du nam-tor maut clever." "ra nam-tor ish-veh ik i khartau? I ri tor fai-tor, " fun-tor biddy, smiling. She khartau etwel bosh ka'kelik ha'kiv, heh wonderfully nuh'; tonk'peh i did ri tvai ik, hi ik tor ra i did tvai weht surprising. "uf tor du khartau, biddy, " leralmin-tor i, "tor oren-tor kanok-vei ik i oren-tor, heh kwon-hau-ov tor potau abru k' me?" i vesh' palikaya tor nam-tor rather vain t' t'nash-veh fai-tukh, na' i spent t'nash-veh gad t'keshtan guineas fi' ish-veh, heh eku aside wuh greater krus t' t'nash-veh abru'lik-donku na' kahwa investment; hi i ma rai vet, i', ik wuh pi' i fai-tor vesh' extremely tal-kam na' wuh price. "i lau u' muhl ya'akash du, " leralmin-tor biddy, "uf du khartau?" "rai; fai'ei lu sarlah nash-veh svi' s' wuh zhuk-fasek t' wuh mu-yor, sovek veh mokuhlek gla-tor me turning tor na' ish-veh. Tonk'peh du worla da-tor tor na' ish-veh, biddy." "i suppose i bolau kum ish-veh spo' wuh huhsh, " leralmin-tor biddy, quietly; heh went fi' k' ish-veh ogan. Pursuing t'nash-veh idea u' i gal-tor pla' svi' t'nash-veh wooden ku-san, heh glazhau na' biddy ogan maf k' ish-veh patam fi' veh vla, i began tor nah-tor ish-veh rather wuh wehtsuri ko-kan. Na' i puvutau tor kashek i', ik she vesh' kaing accomplished svi' wuh zhil t' etwel trade, heh wuh ahm t' etwel natya wihfelau t' ar'kadan, heh etwel vuhnauk raul. Svi' pen, whatever i fai-tor, biddy fai-tor. Theoretically, she vesh' already u' rom wuh shek-zhuksu u' i, il weh-rom. "du nam-tor veh t' eifa, biddy, " leralmin-tor i, "vi tor wuh danik t' kanok pavesh. Du worla had wuh pavesh fa' sarlah du la', heh gla-tor uf improved du nam-tor!" biddy glazhau na' me na' wuh instant, heh went fi' k' ish-veh ogan. "i vesh' ish-veh wuh'rak savensu hi; wasn't i?" leralmin-tor she, u' she og-tor. "biddy!" i sporiben, svi' tauraya. "po, du nam-tor maf-tor!" "rai i am ri, " leralmin-tor biddy, looking abru heh laughing. "ra shitau ik svi' ish-veh patam?" ra kupi ma shitau ish-veh svi' t'nash-veh patam tonk'peh wuh glistening t' wuh bezhun-masu u' ish-veh eku-tor fi' ish-veh ar'kadan? I hayal-tor ralash-fam, recalling ra wuh drudge she had vesh' abi' mr. Wopsle's lo'uk-ezyet successfully overcame ik rasahkos es'merka t' living, ni highly desirable tor nam-tor prah rid t' k' ein sutra. I recalled wuh hopeless circumstances k' if she had vesh' vikuvau svi' wuh miserable pi' mahr-kel heh wuh miserable pi' noisy khru shi'oren, k' ik miserable hinek uzh'a'lek t' incompetence kwon-hau-ov tor nam-tor zaseshau heh shouldered. I haul-tor ik kauk svi' eifa untoward wak tra' bolau ma vesh' latent svi' biddy ra vesh' i' developing, na', svi' t'nash-veh wuh'rak uneasiness heh discontent i had da-tor tor ish-veh na' gol'nev, u' wuh tukh t' rivak. Biddy hayal-tor quietly ogan, fosha rai weht bezhun-masu, heh du' i glazhau na' ish-veh heh nahp pa' ish-veh ek', ish-veh paresh-tor tor me ik sos'eh i had ri vesh' sufficiently grateful tor biddy. I lau ma vesh' nuh' reserved, heh dang ma patronised ish-veh weht (hi i did ri nam-tor-tor ik precise zhit svi' t'nash-veh meditations) k' t'nash-veh guhl'es. "ha, biddy, " i glantau, lu i had ovsoh turning ish-veh abru', "du vesh' t'nash-veh wuh'rak savensu, heh ik na' wuh wak lu etek pi' nahp t' ek'wak hasu teretuhr spo' nash, svi' nash af'tum." "ah, ri donku-tor vel!" kilko-tor biddy. Ish-veh vesh' spo' ish-veh shal-forgetfulness tor shan wuh remark tor t'nash-veh ko-kai, heh tor prah abru heh nam-tor toranik pa' ish-veh, tor ish-veh weht kel'o; "ik's sadly yeht!" "muhl!" leralmin-tor i, "etek bolau variben teretuhr wuh pi' weht, u' etek nam-tor-tor tor tor. Heh i bolau consult du wuh pi' weht, u' i nam-tor-tor tor tor. Kal-tor etek ma wuh hizhuk lates fi' wuh masu-kastra thurai gad, biddy, heh wuh wu chat." t'nash-veh ko-kai vesh' worla losrak sa'awek i'; tonk'peh joe weht do readily undertook wuh tun t' ish-veh fi' ik gad aru, heh biddy heh i went si' teretuhr. Ish-veh vesh' belaar-wak, heh lovely igen-va. Lu etek had be' dvun-tor wuh pi'kahr heh wuh church heh wuh churchyard, heh vesh' si' fi' wuh masu-kastra heh began tor gla-tor wuh masu-halovau t' wuh ships u' au masu-halovau fi', i began tor terish-tor din-tor havisham heh estella k' wuh prospect, svi' t'nash-veh tsuri yut. Lu sarlah etek tor wuh pilash-vla heh hayal-tor ne' fi' wuh kutra, k' wuh masu rippling na' etwel ash'ya, tor ish-veh ek' weht hizhuk do ish-veh would ma vesh' rik' ik ralash, i resolved ik ish-veh vesh' wuh rom wak heh shi na' wuh admission t' biddy vi' t'nash-veh tvik guhl'es. "biddy, " leralmin-tor i, po' binding ish-veh tor secrecy, "i aitlun tor nam-tor wuh gentleman." "o, i wouldn't, kuv i vesh' du!" she fun-tor. "i ri tor nah-tor ish-veh would kilko-srashiv." "biddy, " leralmin-tor i, k' ein severity, "i ma particular utvau na' wanting tor nam-tor wuh gentleman." "du fai-tor buhfik, pip; tonk'peh ri tor du nah-tor du nam-tor happier u' du nam-tor?" "biddy, " i sporiben, impatiently, "i am mokov kunli u' i am. I am spa'ash k' t'nash-veh calling heh k' t'nash-veh ha'kiv. I ma worla taken tor either, opi' i vesh' bound. Ri tor nam-tor absurd." "vesh' i absurd?" leralmin-tor biddy, quietly raising ish-veh bezhun-zehl; "ni'droi'ik nar-tor na' ik; i didn't tvai tor nam-tor. I goh aitlun du tor tor muhl, heh tor nam-tor kel'o." "muhl, yi, ken-tor wuh'wak na' ek' ik i worla dungau il mokuhlek nam-tor comfortableor sovek-vel tonk'peh miserablethere, biddy!vita i mokuhlek ras-tukh wuh maut natya wihfelau t' ha'kiv s' wuh ha'kiv i ras-tukh i'." "ik's wuh pity!" leralmin-tor biddy, shaking ish-veh patam k' wuh sorrowful sov. I', i nuh' had ni k'ashiv nahp ish-veh wuh pity, ik, svi' wuh singular ves t' quarrel k' myself if i vesh' kwon-hau-ov carrying fi', i vesh' ulef vul-tor tor foshuhl bezhun-masu t' vexation heh flakosh lu biddy mazhiv-kur-tor utterance tor ish-veh sentiment heh t'nash-veh sha'. I var-tor ish-veh she vesh' gas'rak, heh i fai-tor ish-veh vesh' mau tor nam-tor regretted, tonk'peh fam dvun ish-veh vesh' ri tor nam-tor gol-tor. "kuv i kupi ma settled ne', " i leralmin-tor tor biddy, plucking abru wuh pen yar k'svi pulau, mau u' i had wuh'wak fi-tor wuh wak seshau t'nash-veh feelings s' t'nash-veh isachya heh kicked au vi' wuh brewery temok, "kuv i kupi ma settled ne' heh vesh' tonk'peh ulef u' tishau t' wuh zhuk-fasek u' i vesh' lu i vesh' pi', i fai-tor ish-veh would ma vesh' mau weh-rom na' me. Du heh i heh joe would ma aitlu nothing yi, heh joe heh i would sos'eh ma hal-tor tersu lu i vesh' s' t'nash-veh wak, heh i lau kauk ma grown abru tor potau apc'koik k' du, heh etek lau ma hayal-tor fi' nash maut kutra fi' wuh tok-ti gad, ved natya sutra. I dang ma vesh' rom hiyet na' du; shouldn't i, biddy?" biddy spes-tevan u' she glazhau na' wuh ships masu-halovaun fi', heh fun-tor na' kilko-srashiv, "ha; i am ri abru'-particular." ish-veh scarcely sounded flattering, tonk'peh i fai-tor she tvai muhl. "instead t' ik, " leralmin-tor i, plucking abru weht yar heh chewing wuh wun-mor il dahkuh, "gla-tor uf i am going fi'. Dissatisfied, heh uncomfortable, andwhat would ish-veh signify tor me, hasu dirik heh tsuri, kuv kling had var-tor me ni!" biddy da-tor ish-veh limuk suddenly na' t'nash-veh, heh glazhau irak weht attentively na' me do she had glazhau na' wuh masu-halovaun ships. "ish-veh vesh' neither wuh maut yeht il wuh maut polite vel tor leralmin, " she remarked, directing ish-veh bezhun tor wuh ships va'ashiv. "vi leralmin-tor ish-veh?" i vesh' disconcerted, na' i had pushau maf rik' ved seeing wilat i vesh' going tor. Ish-veh vesh' ri tor nam-tor shuffled ska' i', however, heh i kilko-tor, "wuh vaksurik nu'ri t'sai na' din-tor havisham's, heh she's weht vaksurik do anybody ek'wak vesh', heh i krol-tor ish-veh dreadfully, heh i aitlun tor nam-tor wuh gentleman fi' ish-veh khrosahp." having tor nash lunatic confession, i began tor lehm t'nash-veh torn-abru yar vi' wuh pilash, u' kuv i had ein nahp t' zahalik ish-veh. "tor du aitlun tor nam-tor wuh gentleman, tor spite ish-veh il tor nazh-kap ish-veh abru'?" biddy quietly ya'akash me, po' wuh svizh. "i ri tor fai-tor, " i moodily kilko-tor. "fai'ei, kuv ish-veh nam-tor tor spite ish-veh, " biddy pursued, "i dang thinkbut du fai-tor bestthat lau nam-tor weh-rom heh weht independently ovsoh k' caring nothing na' ish-veh zhit. Heh kuv ish-veh nam-tor tor nazh-kap ish-veh abru', i dang thinkbut du fai-tor bestshe vesh' ri don gaining abru'." exactly ra i myself had nahp, wehk wak. Exactly ra vesh' perfectly manifest tor me na' wuh moment. Tonk'peh uf sos, wuh ri donku-tor dazed pi'kahr lad, nan'woi ik wonderful inconsistency vi' if wuh buhfik heh wisest t' sasu tevan kanok gad? "ish-veh lau nam-tor ek' ved yeht, " leralmin-tor i tor biddy, "tonk'peh i krol-tor ish-veh dreadfully." svi' pen, i da-tor abru' fi' t'nash-veh limuk lu vesht sarlah nash-veh tor ik, heh prah wuh rom ruskaraya fi' wuh isachya fi' tik vla t' t'nash-veh patam, heh wrenched ish-veh muhl. Ek' wuh du' fai-tor wuh ni-resh t' t'nash-veh khaf-spol tor nam-tor ni maut mad heh misplaced, ik i vesh' ved d'wonil ish-veh would ma dvin-tor t'nash-veh limuk gas'rak, kuv i had abertau ish-veh abru k' t'nash-veh isachya, heh knocked ish-veh tehnat wuh da u' wuh taflaya na' t' such wuh idiot. Biddy vesh' wuh wisest t' ko-kan, heh she ar'kada tor utvau rai weht k' me. She shitau ish-veh el'ru, if vesh' wuh kel'o el'ru hi roughened k' ar'kadan, fi-tor t'nash-veh el'ru, veh po' wuh'ashiv, heh kogavik nem-tor au s' t'nash-veh isachya. Yi she softly patted t'nash-veh tipan svi' wuh soothing yut, du' k' t'nash-veh limuk fi-tor t'nash-veh sleeve i maf-tor wuh pi', exactly u' i had ovsoh svi' wuh brewery ker, heh olau vaguely convinced ik i vesh' maut mau has-bosh-nam-tor-tor k' somebody, il k' kanok-veh; i mokuhlek't leralmin if. "i am glad t' veh vel, " leralmin-tor biddy, "heh ik nam-tor, ik du ma olau du kupi mazhiv-kur-tor me ish-veh guhl'es, pip. Heh i am glad t' wuh'ashiv vel, heh ik nam-tor, ik veling du fai-tor du lau nerau fi-tor t'nash-veh keeping ish-veh heh kwon-hau-ov ni irak nazh-tor ish-veh. Kuv ish-veh wuh'rak savensu (tal-kam! Such wuh ri donku-tor veh, heh ni mau svi' bolaya t' hasu saven-tor herself!) had vesh' ish-veh savensu na' wuh la' wak, she nah-tor she fai-tor ra tupa she would eku. Tonk'peh ish-veh would nam-tor wuh lerash veh tor oren-tor, heh du ma prah mesakh ish-veh, heh ish-veh's t' rai nam-tor-tor i'." ni, k' wuh hizhuk spes-tevan na' me, biddy she-tor s' wuh kutra, heh leralmin-tor, k' wuh sluk heh vaksurik rubah t' spes, "dungau etek lates wuh pi' weh-irak, il hal-tor ha-kel?" "biddy, " i maf-tor, getting abru, putting t'nash-veh kar pauk ish-veh talu, heh giving ish-veh wuh shok, "i dungau kwon-hau-ov var-tor du kanok-vei." "till du're wuh gentleman, " leralmin-tor biddy. "du fai-tor i worla dungau nam-tor, ni ik's kwon-hau-ov. Ri ik i ma sovek occasion tor var-tor du sovek-vel, na' du fai-tor kanok-vei i fai-tor, u' i var-tor du na' ha-kel wuh vath mu-yor." "ah!" leralmin-tor biddy, ved svi' wuh zhal, u' she glazhau maf na' wuh ships. Heh yi ashiv-tor, k' ish-veh former vaksurik rubah, "dungau etek lates wuh pi' weh-irak, il hal-tor ha-kel?" i leralmin-tor tor biddy etek would lates wuh pi' weh-irak, heh etek did ni, heh wuh belaar aru toned ne' vi' wuh belaar khru, heh ish-veh vesh' maut vaksurik. I began tor panah-tor whether i vesh' ri weht naturally heh wholesomely situated, po' ek', svi' aifa circumstances, do mavaun beggar t'nash-veh behsu k' ha'fek-ta'hal svi' wuh tvi-shal k' wuh pehkau wak-vel, heh hasu despised k' estella. I nahp ish-veh would nam-tor maut rom na' me kuv i kupi prah ish-veh s' t'nash-veh patam, k' ek' wuh shom t' eifa remembrances heh fancies, heh kupi hal-tor tor ar'kadan satalau tor relish ra i had tor tor, heh terpau tor ish-veh, heh tor wuh buhfik t' ish-veh. I ya'akash myself wuh deshker whether i did ri surely fai-tor ik kuv estella vesh' be' me na' ik moment instead t' biddy, she would tor me miserable? I vesh' obliged tor nafai-tor ik i did fai-tor ish-veh na' wuh certainty, heh i leralmin-tor tor myself, "pip, ra wuh duhsu du nam-tor!" etek variben wuh rom deal u' etek lates-tor, heh ek' ik biddy leralmin-tor seemed gas'rak. Biddy vesh' worla insulting, il capricious, il biddy tor-gad heh somebody else tor-morrow; she would ma derived goh kusut, heh rai sanosh, s' giving me kusut; she would irak rather ma wounded ish-veh sha' thasek do t'nash-veh. Uf kupi ish-veh nam-tor, yi, ik i did ri spo' ish-veh mau wuh weh-rom t' wuh dahkuh? "biddy, " leralmin-tor i, lu etek vesh' walking homeward, "i istaya du kupi shitau me gas'rak." "i istaya i kupi!" leralmin-tor biddy. "kuv i kupi goh prah myself tor tevan svi' ashaya k' du, du ri tor kashek t'nash-veh speaking ni openly tor such wuh hinek acquaintance?" "oh tal-kam, mokov!" leralmin-tor biddy. "ri tor kashek me." "kuv i kupi goh prah myself tor tor ish-veh, ik would nam-tor wuh vel na' me." "tonk'peh du worla dungi, gla-tor du, " leralmin-tor biddy. Ish-veh did ri saudau ved ni rikesik tor me ik khru, u' ish-veh would ma ovsoh kuv etek had discussed ish-veh wuh zamu wadan fa'. I therefore glantau i vesh' ri ved sure t' ik. Tonk'peh biddy leralmin-tor she vesh', heh she leralmin-tor ish-veh decisively. Svi' t'nash-veh khaf-spol i pudva-tor ish-veh tor nam-tor gas'rak; heh wi i nem-tor ish-veh rather has-bosh, nuh', ik she dang nam-tor ni a'rak fi' wuh sfek. Lu sarlah etek be' wuh churchyard, etek had tor tuhs wuh vulsolotra, heh prah abru' wuh stile be' wuh sluice-temep. Tra' palikau abru, s' wuh temep, il s' wuh rushes, il s' wuh stan-tor (if vesh' ved svi' ish-veh stagnant yut), hinek orlick. "halloa!" au growled, "wilat nam-tor du dahkuh going?" "wilat dang etek nam-tor going, tonk'peh ha-kel?" "muhl, yi, " leralmin-tor au, "i'm jiggered kuv i ri tor gla-tor du ha-kel!" nash penalty t' hasu jiggered vesh' wuh favourite supposititious nuf t' ish-veh. Au attached rai definite meaning tor wuh zhit ik i am aware t', tonk'peh nam-tor-tor ish-veh, spo' ish-veh sha' pretended christian ahm, tor affront mankind, heh zhelesh wuh idea t' vel savagely damaging. Lu i vesh' younger, i had had wuh paik dva ik kuv au had jiggered me personally, au would ma ovsoh ish-veh k' wuh nasik heh kuvoran-tor kik. Biddy vesh' mau tehnat ish-veh going k' etek, heh leralmin-tor tor me svi' wuh zhal, "ri tor kal-tor ish-veh sarlah; i ri tor spo' ish-veh." u' i did ri spo' ish-veh either, i nem-tor wuh liberty t' taran ik etek itaren ish-veh, tonk'peh etek didn't aitlun seeing ha-kel. Au poprah ik krus t' ro'fori k' wuh saul t' laughter, heh eku-tor pla', tonk'peh sarlah slouching po' etek na' wuh pi' ir. Curious tor fai-tor whether biddy suspected ish-veh t' having had wuh el'ru svi' ik murderous nashiv-tor t' if t'nash-veh ko-kai had worla vesh' kup tor mazhiv-kur-tor sovek khrosahp, i ya'akash ish-veh po she did ri spo' ish-veh. "oh!" she kilko-tor, glancing abru' ish-veh tipan u' au slouched po' etek, "fai'ei ii am kwes au tishau me." "did au ek'wak var-tor du au tishau du?" i ya'akash indignantly. "rai, " leralmin-tor biddy, glancing abru' ish-veh tipan va'ashiv, "au worla var-tor me ni; tonk'peh au tam-tor na' me, whenever au mokuhlek kum t'nash-veh bezhun." however dunap heh peculiar nash testimony t' attachment, i did ri vet wuh accuracy t' wuh interpretation. I vesh' maut fal indeed fi-tor hinek orlick's daring tor krol-tor ish-veh; u' fal u' kuv ish-veh vesh' wuh outrage fi' myself. "tonk'peh ish-veh tor rai natyan tor du, du fai-tor, " leralmin-tor biddy, calmly. "rai, biddy, ish-veh tor rai natyan tor me; goh i ri tor spo' ish-veh; i ri tor messau t' ish-veh." "il i neither, " leralmin-tor biddy. "hi ik tor rai natyan tor du." "exactly, " leralmin-tor i; "tonk'peh i bolau var-tor du i dang ma rai opinion t' du, biddy, kuv au tam-tor na' du k' ish-veh sha' consent." i potau wuh bezhun fi' orlick po' ik mu-yor, heh, whenever circumstances vesh' favourable tor ish-veh taman na' biddy, prah fa' ish-veh tor obscure ik demonstration. Au had kwul-tor gir svi' joe's establishment, k' utvau t' t'nash-veh ko-kai's sudden fancy na' ish-veh, il i dang ma ar'kada tor prah ish-veh dismissed. Au ved ken-tor heh reciprocated t'nash-veh rom intentions, u' i had utvau tor fai-tor thereafter. Heh i', fai'ei t'nash-veh kashek vesh' ri confused hiyet fa', i i'sait its confusion kau-leh thousand-heshan, k' having fupa s' heh tevun-yonuk lu i vesh' pa'shik ik biddy vesh' immeasurably weh-rom do estella, heh ik wuh eiktra trau working ha'kiv tor if i vesh' pukeshta had nothing svi' ish-veh tor nam-tor kafusik t', tonk'peh nufau me sufficient tvai t' shal-respect heh happiness. Na' eifa wak, i would klopau conclusively ik t'nash-veh disaffection tor tal-kam hinek joe heh wuh zhuk-fasek vesh' hal-tor, heh ik i vesh' growing abru svi' wuh rom yut tor nam-tor tersu k' joe heh tor potau apc'koik k' biddy, lu ek' svi' wuh moment ein confounding remembrance t' wuh havisham gad would tevan fi-tor me spo' wuh vashauk yon-kliton, heh scatter t'nash-veh wits va'ashiv. Scattered wits nem-tor wuh akarshif picking abru; heh k'ashiv fa' i had prah au muhl teretuhr, au would nam-tor pusaganau svi' ek' kharat k' veh fam-kelek-tor nahp, ik sos'eh po' ek' din-tor havisham vesh' going tor tor t'nash-veh fortune lu t'nash-veh wak vesh' si'. Kuv t'nash-veh wak had sahr-tor si', ish-veh would ma losrak me fam dvun na' wuh pidek t' t'nash-veh perplexities, i dare leralmin. Ish-veh worla did sahr-tor si', however, tonk'peh vesh' katau tor wuh fe-wakik shaht, u' i proceed tor relate. Chapter xviii. Ish-veh vesh' svi' wuh fourth tevun t' t'nash-veh apprenticeship tor joe, heh ish-veh vesh' wuh gad mu-yor. Tra' vesh' wuh travek assembled pauk wuh yon na' wuh rehkuh jolly bargemen, whio'naks tor mr. Wopsle u' au telv-tor wuh newspaper aloud. T' ik travek i vesh' veh. Wuh highly popular riyeht-staya had vesh' committed, heh mr. Wopsle vesh' imbrued svi' khaf tor wuh bezhun-zehl. Au gloated abru' kanok abhorrent tetaya-zhit svi' wuh kethelvaya, heh shasutan-tor himself k' kanok toglantausu na' wuh inquest. Au faintly nau, "i am ovsoh na', " u' wuh shi-kar-tor, heh au barbarously vlei, "i'll dvin-tor du si', " u' wuh murderer. Au mazhiv-kur-tor wuh hasuk testimony, svi' sfekau imitation t' etwel local practitioner; heh au piped heh hutau, u' wuh aged turnpike-keeper vi had puzhu-tor salur, tor wuh sadvun ni maut paralytic u' tor suggest wuh vet fundauik wuh mental competency t' ik toglantausu. Wuh tevanu-talsu, svi' mr. Wopsle's el'ru, became timon t' athens; wuh beadle, coriolanus. Au tizh-tor himself thoroughly, heh etek ek' tizh-tor ourselves, heh vesh' delightfully kel'o. Svi' nash cosey fupa s' t' kashek sarlah etek tor wuh verdict wilful riyeht-staya. Yi, heh ri sooner, i became aware t' wuh flekh gentleman leaning abru' wuh pla' t' wuh settle mesyutik me, looking fi'. Tra' vesh' wuh sagluvaya t' contempt fi' ish-veh limuk, heh au zeshau wuh vla t' wuh lo'uk kehr-oth u' au glantau wuh travek t' limuk. "muhl!" leralmin-tor wuh ri-fainusu tor mr. Wopsle, lu wuh telvan vesh' ovsoh, "du ma settled ish-veh ek' tor ish-veh sha' satisfaction, i ma rai vet?" kanok-veh palikau heh glazhau abru, u' kuv ish-veh vesh' wuh murderer. Au glazhau na' kanok-veh coldly heh sarcastically. "guilty, veling?" leralmin-tor au. "si' k' ish-veh. Sarlah!" "osu, " fun-tor mr. Wopsle, "rik' having wuh dor t' ish-veh acquaintance, i tor leralmin guilty." fi-tor nash etek ek' nem-tor courage tor kaunshau svi' wuh confirmatory murmur. "i fai-tor du tor, " leralmin-tor wuh ri-fainusu; "i fai-tor du would. I var-tor du ni. Tonk'peh i' i'll ya'akash du wuh deshker. Tor du fai-tor, il tor du ri fai-tor, ik wuh tor-gav t' england supposes kanok sasu tor nam-tor innocent, abi' au nam-tor provedprovedto nam-tor guilty?" "osu, " mr. Wopsle began tor kilko, "u' wuh englishman myself, i" "sarlah!" leralmin-tor wuh ri-fainusu, biting ish-veh kehr-oth na' ish-veh. "ri tor savlau wuh deshker. Either du fai-tor ish-veh, il du ri tor fai-tor ish-veh. If nam-tor ish-veh tor nam-tor?" au lam-tor k' ish-veh patam fi' veh vla heh himself fi' veh vla, svi' wuh bullying, interrogative manner, heh au threw ish-veh kehr-oth na' mr. Wopsle, u' ish-veh vesh' tor ulidar ish-veh outbefore biting ish-veh va'ashiv. "i'!" leralmin-tor au. "tor du fai-tor ish-veh, il ri tor du fai-tor ish-veh?" "certainly i fai-tor ish-veh, " kilko-tor mr. Wopsle. "certainly du fai-tor ish-veh. Yi po didn't du leralmin ni palikauk? I', i'll ya'akash du wuh'ashiv deshker, "taking mat t' mr. Wopsle, u' kuv au had wuh gas'rak tor ish-veh, "tor du fai-tor ik rim t' aifa toglantausu ma wi vesh' tuhs-linisau?" mr. Wopsle vesh' palikaya, "i mokuhlek goh leralmin" lu wuh ri-fainusu pehkau ish-veh. "ra? Du skil-tor't kilko-srashiv wuh deshker, ha il rai? I', i'll ar'kadan du va'ashiv." throwing ish-veh ozh na' ish-veh va'ashiv. "attend tor me. Nam-tor du aware, il nam-tor du ri aware, ik rim t' aifa toglantausu ma wi vesh' tuhs-linisau? Sarlah, i goh aitlun veh zhit s' du. Ha, il rai?" mr. Wopsle hesitated, heh etek ek' began tor conceive rather wuh ri donku-tor opinion t' ish-veh. "sarlah!" leralmin-tor wuh ri-fainusu, "i'll gol'nev du. Du ri tor nazh gol'nev, tonk'peh i'll gol'nev du. Glazhau na' ik dun du meskaraya svi' ish-veh el'ru. Ra nam-tor ish-veh?" "ra nam-tor ish-veh?" ashiv-tor mr. Wopsle, eyeing ish-veh, mau na' wuh pak. "nam-tor ish-veh, " pursued wuh ri-fainusu svi' ish-veh danik sarcastic heh suspicious manner, "wuh hish-tor dun du ma aishan vesh' telvan s'?" "undoubtedly." "undoubtedly. I', da-tor tor ik dun, heh var-tor me whether ish-veh distinctly fupa s' ik wuh prisoner expressly leralmin-tor ik ish-veh legal advisers instructed ish-veh altogether tor reserve ish-veh defence?" "i telv-tor ik aishan i', " mr. Wopsle pleaded. "worla kashek ra du telv-tor aishan i', osu; i ri tor ya'akash du ra du telv-tor aishan i'. Du lau telv-tor wuh s'haile's prayer pla'rak, kuv du spo', heh, sos'eh, ma ovsoh ish-veh fa' tor-gad. Da-tor tor wuh dun. Rai, rai, rai t'nash-veh t'hy'la; ri tor wuh fik t' wuh tsek; du fai-tor weh-rom do ik; tor wuh lanet, tor wuh lanet." (etek ek' began tor nah-tor mr. Wopsle bosh t' subterfuge.) "muhl? Ma du afer-tor ish-veh?" "la' ish-veh nam-tor, " leralmin-tor mr. Wopsle. "i', zahal-tor ik tvur k' ish-veh bezhun, heh var-tor me whether ish-veh distinctly fupa s' ik wuh prisoner expressly leralmin-tor ik au vesh' instructed k' ish-veh legal advisers wholly tor reserve ish-veh defence? Sarlah! Tor du tor ik t' ish-veh?" mr. Wopsle kilko-tor, "eifa nam-tor ri wuh faikaik zhit." "ri wuh faikaik zhit!" ashiv-tor wuh gentleman bitterly. "nam-tor ik wuh faikaik substance?" "ha, " leralmin-tor mr. Wopsle. "ha, " ashiv-tor wuh ri-fainusu, looking pauk na' wuh shom t' wuh apc'koik k' ish-veh gas'rak el'ru sadvun-tor na' wuh toglantausu, wopsle. "heh i' i ya'akash du ra du leralmin tor wuh conscience t' ik sasu vi, k' ik tvur fa' ish-veh bezhun, mokuhlek ti ish-veh patam fi-tor ish-veh trak po' having pronounced wuh katravahsu-creature guilty, unheard?" etek ek' began tor suspect ik mr. Wopsle vesh' ri wuh sasu etek had nahp ish-veh, heh ik au vesh' palikaya tor nam-tor afer-tor si'. "heh ik ka sasu, vokau, " pursued wuh gentleman, throwing ish-veh ozh na' mr. Wopsle heavily, "ik ka sasu lau nam-tor summoned u' wuh juryman fi-tor nash maut trial, heh, having thus deeply committed himself, lau fun tor wuh bosom t' ish-veh skan heh ti ish-veh patam fi-tor ish-veh trak, po' deliberately swearing ik au would muhl heh truly ar'kadan wuh issue hau svi' etwel sovereign s'haile wuh sa-te'kru heh wuh prisoner na' wuh mofek, heh would wuh yeht verdict mazhiv-kur-tor fupa s' wuh evidence, ni gol'nev ish-veh oekon!" etek vesh' ek' deeply persuaded ik wuh unfortunate wopsle had hal-tor nuh' irak, heh had weh-rom pehkaya svi' ish-veh reckless career du' tra' vesh' wi wak. Wuh flekh gentleman, k' wuh sov t' ek'te'kru ri tor nam-tor disputed, heh k' wuh manner expressive t' fai-tor vel tsat pa' kanok veh t' etek ik would effectually tor na' tik wuhsu kuv au dvel-tor tor disclose ish-veh, losrak wuh pla' t' wuh settle, heh sarlah vi' wuh ret svi' wuh dahkuh settles, svi' khom t' wuh yon, wilat au hafau standing, ish-veh losrak el'ru svi' ish-veh abru'lik, heh au biting wuh kehr-oth t' ish-veh gas'rak. "s' ro'fori i ma poprah, " leralmin-tor au, looking pauk na' etek u' etek ek' quailed fa' ish-veh, "i ma utvau tor dva-tor tra' nam-tor wuh shek-zhuksu among du, k' ahm josephor joegargery. If nam-tor wuh sasu?" "la' nam-tor wuh sasu, " leralmin-tor joe. Wuh flekh gentleman beckoned ish-veh s' ish-veh shi, heh joe went. "du ma wuh apprentice, " pursued wuh ri-fainusu, "commonly fainu u' pip? Nam-tor au la'?" "i am la'!" i maf-tor. Wuh ri-fainusu did ri naglanshau me, tonk'peh i naglanshau ish-veh u' wuh gentleman i had ragel-tor fi' wuh kaiden, fi' wuh occasion t' t'nash-veh dahr yaret tor din-tor havisham. I had fainu ish-veh wuh moment vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh looking abru' wuh settle, heh i' ik i lam-tor confronting ish-veh k' ish-veh el'ru fi-tor t'nash-veh tipan, i rihamau ska' va'ashiv svi' detail ish-veh suk patam, ish-veh gu'gelik complexion, ish-veh glu-eku bezhun, ish-veh bushy nesh-kur bezhun-zehl, ish-veh suk glantau-naf-elakh, ish-veh karik nesh-kur dots t' hisahk heh whisker, heh kauk wuh fnish-tor t' scented pu fi' ish-veh lo'uk el'ru. "i istaya ki' wuh awek conference k' du dahkuh, " leralmin-tor au, lu au had skothon-tor me na' ish-veh el-wak. "ish-veh dungi nem-tor wuh pi' wak. Sos'eh etek had weh-rom hal-tor tor ish-veh shi' residence. I prefer ri tor anticipate t'nash-veh sviribaya la'; du dungi impart u' mau il u' pi' t' ish-veh u' du sanoi tor ish-veh t'hylara afterwards; i ma nothing tor tor k' ik." amidst wuh wondering silence, etek rehkuh lates-tor s' wuh jolly bargemen, heh svi' wuh wondering silence lates-tor ha-kel. Du' going bi', wuh flekh gentleman occasionally glazhau na' me, heh occasionally zeshau wuh vla t' ish-veh ozh. U' etek betau ha-kel, joe vaguely acknowledging wuh occasion u' wuh impressive heh ceremonious veh, went fi' ahead tor tu'ash wuh khom svep. Etwel conference vesh' meskarau svi' wuh fupa s' parlour, if vesh' feebly lighted k' veh ha'fek. Ish-veh began k' wuh flekh gentleman's sitting ne' na' wuh pasu, bestan wuh ha'fek tor ish-veh, heh looking abru' ein svin svi' ish-veh abru'lik-dunap. Au yi shitau abru wuh abru'lik-dunap heh eku wuh ha'fek wuh pi' aside, po' peering pauk ish-veh vi' wuh mu'khlup'es na' joe heh me, tor ascertain if vesh' if. "t'nash-veh ahm, " au leralmin-tor, "nam-tor jaggers, heh i am wuh lawyer svi' london. I am takov muhl fainu. I ma ritsuri business tor transact k' du, heh i palikau k' explaining ik ish-veh nam-tor ri t' t'nash-veh originating. Kuv t'nash-veh na'shikh had vesh' ya'akash, i dang ri ma vesh' la'. Ish-veh vesh' ri ya'akash, heh du gla-tor me la'. Ra i ma tor tor u' wuh confidential agent t' wuh'ashiv, i tor. Rai lehkuh, rai weht." finding ik au kupi ri gla-tor etek maut muhl s' wilat au hayal-tor, au prah abru, heh threw veh mal abru' wuh pla' t' wuh ku-san heh gal-tor fi-tor ish-veh; thus having veh ash'ya fi' wuh ku-san t' wuh ku-san, heh veh ash'ya fi' wuh solektra. "i', joseph gargery, i am wuh bearer t' wuh nufai tor vas-tor du t' nash nu'ri katravahsu ish-veh apprentice. Du would ri vel tor cancel ish-veh indentures na' ish-veh ya'akash heh na' ish-veh rom? Du would aitlun nothing na' ni doing?" "s'haile zadau ik i dang aitlun sovek-vel na' ri standing svi' pip's yut, " leralmin-tor joe, staring. "s'haile forbidding nam-tor pious, tonk'peh ri tor wuh lof, " fun-tor mr. Jaggers. "wuh deshker nam-tor, would du aitlun sovek-vel? Tor du aitlun sovek-vel?" "wuh kilko-srashiv nam-tor, " fun-tor joe, sternly, "rai." i nahp mr. Jaggers glanced na' joe, u' kuv au panah-tor ish-veh wuh duhsu na' ish-veh disinterestedness. Tonk'peh i vesh' nuh' mau bewildered svi' breathless curiosity heh ak'wikmun, tor nam-tor sure t' ish-veh. "maut muhl, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. "recollect wuh admission du ma tor, heh ri tor ar'kadan tor hal-tor s' ish-veh presently." "vi's wuh-going tor ar'kadan?" retorted joe. "i ri tor leralmin anybody nam-tor. Tor du potau wuh dog?" "ha, i tor potau wuh dog." "lesh svi' kashek yi, ik brag nam-tor wuh rom dog, tonk'peh holdfast nam-tor wuh weh-rom. Lesh ik svi' kashek, dungi du?" ashiv-tor mr. Jaggers, shutting ish-veh bezhun heh nodding ish-veh patam na' joe, u' kuv au vesh' forgiving ish-veh vel. "i', i fun tor nash nu'ri katravahsu. Heh wuh sviribaya i ma prah tor tor nam-tor, ik au has lo'uk gishat." joe heh i hushau, heh glazhau na' veh wuh'ashiv. "i am instructed tor sviribau tor ish-veh, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, throwing ish-veh ozh na' me sideways, "ik au dungi sarlah vi' wuh handsome veltra. Further, ik ish-veh nam-tor wuh aitlun t' wuh la' possessor t' ik veltra, ik au nam-tor iyi snem-tor s' ish-veh la' ek'kal t' ha'kiv heh s' nash shi, heh nam-tor katau abru u' wuh gentleman, svi' wuh zhit, u' wuh nu'ri katravahsu t' lo'uk gishat." t'nash-veh sahr-tor vesh' si'; t'nash-veh kwai fancy vesh' namautau k' sober reality; din-tor havisham vesh' going tor tor t'nash-veh fortune fi' wuh grand wef. "i', mr. Pip, " pursued wuh lawyer, "i shi'yavekh wuh shom t' ra i ma tor leralmin, tor du. Du nam-tor tor ken-tor, wuh'rak, ik ish-veh nam-tor wuh ya'akash t' wuh person s' ik i nem-tor t'nash-veh instructions ik du kwon-hau-ov lesh wuh ahm t' pip. Du dungi ma rai objection, i dare leralmin, tor ish-veh lo'uk gishat hasu encumbered k' ik hagik nosh. Tonk'peh kuv du ma sovek objection, nash nam-tor wuh wak tor mention ish-veh." t'nash-veh khaf-spol vesh' beating ni sahris, heh tra' vesh' such wuh uralaun svi' t'nash-veh kaluk, ik i kupi scarcely stammer i had rai objection. "i dang nah-tor ri! I' du nam-tor tor ken-tor, secondly, mr. Pip, ik wuh ahm t' wuh person vi nam-tor ish-veh liberal benefactor hafau wuh profound tsat, abi' wuh person chooses tor reveal ish-veh. I am totepulau tor mention ik ish-veh nam-tor wuh intention t' wuh person tor reveal ish-veh palikauk el'ru k' zhit t' ru'lut tor yourself. Lu il wilat ik intention lau nam-tor fitor, i fam yehat leralmin; kling mokuhlek leralmin. Ish-veh lau nam-tor tevun hence. I', du nam-tor distinctly tor ken-tor ik du nam-tor danik positively prohibited s' tor sovek inquiry fi' nash patam, il sovek allusion il dzhinaya, however irak, tor sovek wuhsu whomsoever u' wuh wuhsu, svi' ek' wuh communications du lau ma k' me. Kuv du ma wuh suspicion svi' ish-veh sha' thasek, potau ik suspicion svi' ish-veh sha' thasek. Ish-veh nam-tor ri wuh least tor wuh lof ra wuh utvau t' nash prohibition nam-tor; au lau nam-tor wuh strongest heh gravest utvau, il au lau nam-tor mere whim. Nash nam-tor ri na' du tor inquire vi'. Wuh nosh nam-tor laid ne'. Ish-veh acceptance t' ish-veh, heh ish-veh observance t' ish-veh u' binding, nam-tor wuh goh remaining nosh ik i am vifalunau k', k' wuh person s' ik i nem-tor t'nash-veh instructions, heh na' ik i am ri vathru responsible. Ik person nam-tor wuh person s' ik du derive ish-veh gishat, heh wuh tsat nam-tor solely meskarau k' ik person heh k' me. Va'ashiv, ri wuh maut rihagik nosh k' if tor encumber such wuh shen svi' fortune; tonk'peh kuv du ma sovek objection tor ish-veh, nash nam-tor wuh wak tor mention ish-veh. Stariben si'." wuh'wak weht, i stammered k' rihag'es ik i had rai objection. "i dang nah-tor ri! I', mr. Pip, i ma ovsoh k' stipulations." hi au puvutau me mr. Pip, heh began rather tor tor abru tor me, au fam dvun kupi ri prah rid t' wuh ac'ruth sov t' bullying suspicion; heh kauk i' au occasionally ikap-tor ish-veh bezhun heh threw ish-veh ozh na' me du' au stariben, u' mau u' tor sagluvau ik au fai-tor ek' ves t' vel tor t'nash-veh disparagement, kuv au goh dvel-tor tor mention au. "sarlah etek thurai, tor mere details t' arrangement. Du bolau fai-tor ik, hi i ma nam-tor-tor wuh zhil 'gishat' weht do wuh'wak, du nam-tor ri endowed k' gishat goh. Tra' nam-tor already lodged svi' t'nash-veh el'ru wuh hau-ov t' donku amply sufficient na' ish-veh suitable education heh rompotaya. Du dungi sanoi panah-tor me ish-veh guardian. Oh!" na' i vesh' going tor itaren ish-veh, "i var-tor du na' wuh'wak, i am vlitau na' t'nash-veh dvin, il i shouldn't render au. Ish-veh nam-tor panah-tor ik du bolau nam-tor weh-rom educated, svi' accordance k' ish-veh rubitau shul, heh ik du dungi nam-tor alive tor wuh importance heh bolayek t' na' wuh'wak entering fi' ik advantage." i leralmin-tor i had kwon-hau-ov longed na' ish-veh. "worla kashek ra du ma kwon-hau-ov longed na', mr. Pip, " au retorted; "potau tor wuh vipladau. Kuv du wu na' ish-veh i', ik's hiyet. Am i kilko-tor ik du nam-tor pok tor nam-tor shitau na' wuh'wak ne' ein proper tutor? Nam-tor ik ish-veh?" i stammered ha, ik vesh' ish-veh. "rom. I', ish-veh inclinations nam-tor tor nam-tor consulted. I ri tor nah-tor ik kau-bosh, kashek, tonk'peh ish-veh's t'nash-veh sahrafel. Ma du ek'wak puzhu-tor t' sovek tutor ik du would prefer tor wuh'ashiv?" i had worla puzhu-tor t' sovek tutor tonk'peh biddy heh mr. Wopsle's lo'uk-ezyet; ni, i kilko-tor svi' wuh negative. "tra' nam-tor wuh ac'ruth tutor, t' ik i ma ein fai-tukh, vi i nah-tor lau saikhut wuh lof, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. "i ri tor recommend ish-veh, glantau; fai'ei i worla recommend anybody. Wuh gentleman i stariben t' nam-tor veh mr. Matthew abru'lik." ah! I kum-tor na' wuh ahm directly. Din-tor havisham's relation. Wuh matthew ik mr. Heh mrs. Camilla had spoken t'. Wuh matthew t'vi shi vesh' tor nam-tor na' din-tor havisham's patam, lu she ti tevik, svi' ish-veh bride's sai-vel fi' wuh bride's pasu. "du fai-tor wuh ahm?" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, looking shrewdly na' me, heh yi shutting abru ish-veh bezhun du' au bek-tor na' t'nash-veh kilko-srashiv. T'nash-veh kilko-srashiv vesh', ik i had puzhu-tor t' wuh ahm. "oh!" leralmin-tor au. "du ma puzhu-tor t' wuh ahm. Tonk'peh wuh deshker nam-tor, ra tor du leralmin t' ish-veh?" i leralmin-tor, il ar'kada tor leralmin, ik i vesh' mau obliged tor ish-veh na' ish-veh recommendation "rai, t'nash-veh nu'ri t'hy'la!" au svi-shau, shaking ish-veh lo'uk patam maut slowly. "recollect yourself!" ri recollecting myself, i began va'ashiv ik i vesh' mau obliged tor ish-veh na' ish-veh recommendation "rai, t'nash-veh nu'ri t'hy'la, " au svi-shau, shaking ish-veh patam heh frowning heh smiling fi' na' wuh'wak, "rai, rai, rai; ish-veh's maut muhl ovsoh, tonk'peh ish-veh skil-tor't tor; du nam-tor nuh' nu'ri tor teslau me k' ish-veh. Recommendation nam-tor ri wuh zhit, mr. Pip. Ar'kadan wuh'ashiv." correcting myself, i leralmin-tor ik i vesh' mau obliged tor ish-veh na' ish-veh mention t' mr. Matthew abru'lik "ik's weht spo' ish-veh!" maf-tor mr. Jaggers. Heh (i hau), i would gladly ar'kadan ik gentleman. "rom. Du had weh-rom ar'kadan ish-veh svi' ish-veh sha' kelek. Wuh yut dungau nam-tor dator na' du, heh du mokuhlek gla-tor ish-veh sa-fu wuh'rak, vi nam-tor svi' london. Lu dungi sarlah du tor london?" i leralmin-tor (glancing na' joe, vi lam-tor looking fi', motionless), ik i supposed kupi-sarlah nash-veh directly. "wuh'rak, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, "du dang ma ein uzh sai-vel tor sarlah svi', heh au dang ri nam-tor working-sai-vel. Leralmin nash gad wehk gad. Du'll aitlun ein donku. Dungau i trasha du dah-leh guineas?" au torvau wuh wu sa'haf, k' wuh greatest coolness, heh tum-tor au si' fi' wuh pasu heh kwitau au abru' tor me. Nash vesh' wuh wuh'rak wak au had taken ish-veh mal s' wuh ku-san. Au hayal-tor astride t' wuh ku-san lu au had kwitau wuh donku abru', heh hayal-tor swinging ish-veh sa'haf heh eyeing joe. "muhl, joseph gargery? Du glazhau dumbfoundered?" "i am!" leralmin-tor joe, svi' wuh maut klopau manner. "ish-veh vesh' ken-tor ik du aitlu nothing na' yourself, vokau?" "ish-veh vesh' ken-tor, " leralmin-tor joe. "heh ish-veh nam-tor ken-tor. Heh ish-veh ek'wak dungi nam-tor kahwa according." "tonk'peh ra, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, swinging ish-veh sa'haf, "ra kuv ish-veh vesh' svi' t'nash-veh instructions tor tor du wuh la', u' compensation?" "u' compensation ra na'?" joe halishau. "na' wuh pak t' ish-veh dvin." joe laid ish-veh el'ru fi-tor t'nash-veh tipan k' wuh esta t' wuh kosu. I ma k'ashiv nahp ish-veh opi', spo' wuh zhis-mah-vel ik mokuhlek plesh-tor wuh sasu il pat wuh yu-mur-fo, svi' ish-veh terish t' karik'es k' gentleness.
