"pip nam-tor ik hearty welcome, " leralmin-tor joe, "tor hal-tor elik k' ish-veh dvin, tor dor heh fortun', u' rai zhit mokuhlek var-tor ish-veh. Tonk'peh kuv du nah-tor u' donku mokuhlek tor compensation tor me na' wuh pak t' wuh pi' childwhat sarlah tor wuh forgeand ek'wak wuh buhfik t' t'hylara!" o tal-kam rom joe, ik i vesh' ni pok tor trasha heh ni unthankful tor, i gla-tor du va'ashiv, k' ish-veh muscular shek-zhuksu's kar fa' ish-veh bezhun, heh ish-veh sax'ksei tuf heaving, heh ish-veh spes dying maf. O tal-kam rom faithful sival joe, i olau wuh loving tremble t' ish-veh el'ru fi-tor t'nash-veh kar, u' solemnly nash gad u' kuv ish-veh had vesh' wuh rustle t' wuh ha'su's rala! Tonk'peh i kastorau joe na' wuh wak. I vesh' pakik svi' wuh mazes t' t'nash-veh fa-wak fortunes, heh kupi ri retrace wuh k'-yut etek had trodden teretuhr. I eit'jae joe tor nam-tor comforted, na' (u' au leralmin-tor) etek had ek'wak vesh' wuh buhfik t' t'hylara, heh (u' i leralmin-tor) etek ek'wak would nam-tor ni. Joe scooped ish-veh bezhun k' ish-veh dahl-tor kar-nik, u' kuv au vesh' keh'sei fi' gouging himself, tonk'peh leralmin-tor ri wuh'ashiv zhit. Mr. Jaggers had glazhau fi' na' nash, u' veh vi naglanshau svi' joe wuh pi'kahr idiot, heh svi' me ish-veh keeper. Lu ish-veh vesh' abru', au leralmin-tor, weighing svi' ish-veh el'ru wuh sa'haf au had ceased tor swing: "i', joseph gargery, i vikau du nash nam-tor ish-veh kim-shah pavesh. Rai ulef thon-tor k' me. Kuv du tvai tor nem-tor wuh la' ik i ma ish-veh svi' falun tor tor du, stariben si', heh du dungau ma ish-veh. Kuv fi' wuh contrary du tvai tor leralmin" la', tor ish-veh lo'uk tauraya, au vesh' pehkau k' joe's suddenly working pauk ish-veh k' kanok demonstration t' wuh tevan-tor pugilistic lof. "if i meantersay, " maf-tor joe, "ik kuv sarlah du vi' t'nash-veh shi bull-baiting heh badgering me, sasarlah! If i meantersay u' sech kuv du're wuh sasu, sarlah fi'! If i meantersay ik ra i leralmin, i meantersay heh lamok il tevan k'!" i drew joe maf, heh au iyi became placable; goh fupa s' tor me, svi' wuh obliging manner heh u' wuh polite expostulatory beglanau tor sovek veh ik ish-veh lau pavesh-tor tor concern, ik au vesh' ri wuh-going tor nam-tor bull-baited heh badgered svi' ish-veh sha' shi. Mr. Jaggers had risen lu joe demonstrated, heh had backed be' wuh svep. Rik' evincing sovek inclination tor sarlah svi' va'ashiv, au tra' tefu ish-veh valedictory remarks. Au vesh' aifa. "muhl, mr. Pip, i nah-tor wuh sooner du trasha hereas du nam-tor tor nam-tor wuh gentlemanthe weh-rom. Kal-tor ish-veh lamok na' nash gad wehk gad, heh du dungau poprah t'nash-veh hish-tor shi'yavekh svi' wuh meantime. Du mokuhlek nem-tor wuh hackney-coach na' wuh skaf-coach office svi' london, heh sarlah zehik tor me. Ken-tor, ik i sagluvau rai opinion, veh yut il vath, fi' wuh sahrafel i undertake. I am vlitau na' undertaking ish-veh, heh i tor ni. I', ken-tor ik, t'forti. Ken-tor ik!" au vesh' throwing ish-veh ozh na' fi' t' etek, heh i nah-tor would ma hal-tor fi', tonk'peh na' ish-veh seeming tor nah-tor joe tehvar-bosh, heh going ska'. Vel sarlah vi' t'nash-veh patam if vimevilau me tor sahr-tor po' ish-veh, u' au vesh' going ne' tor wuh jolly bargemen, wilat au had losrak wuh hired carriage. "i eit'jae ish-veh pardon, mr. Jaggers." "halloa!" leralmin-tor au, limuk-tor pauk, "ra's wuh tukh?" "i istaya tor nam-tor ved gas'rak, mr. Jaggers, heh tor potau tor ish-veh kharat; ni i nahp i had weh-rom ya'akash. Would tra' nam-tor sovek objection tor t'nash-veh taking trasha t' sovek veh i fai-tor, pa' la', fa' i hal-tor maf?" "rai, " leralmin-tor au, looking u' kuv au hardly ken-tor me. "i ri tor tvai svi' wuh pi'kahr goh, tonk'peh abru kahr?" "rai, " leralmin-tor au. "rai objection." i itaren ish-veh heh sahr-tor ha-kel va'ashiv, heh tra' i afer-tor ik joe had already klacha wuh khom svep heh vacated wuh fupa s' parlour, heh vesh' hayal-tor k' wuh af'tum yon k' wuh el'ru fi' tik mal-nef, gazing intently na' wuh yontau kastik-kov. I nuh' hayal-tor ne' fa' wuh yon heh gazed na' wuh kastik-kov, heh nothing vesh' leralmin-tor na' wuh akarshif. T'nash-veh ko-kai vesh' svi' ish-veh cushioned ku-san svi' ish-veh teruk, heh biddy hayal-tor na' ish-veh og-lum-ar'kadan fa' wuh yon, heh joe hayal-tor thurai biddy, heh i hayal-tor thurai joe svi' wuh teruk mesyutik t'nash-veh ko-kai. Wuh weht i glazhau vi' wuh glowing kastik-kov, wuh weht incapable i became t' looking na' joe; wuh longer wuh silence palesh-tor, wuh weht unable i olau tor stariben. Na' wu-vath i prah si', "joe, ma du var-tor biddy?" "rai, pip, " fun-tor joe, fam dvun looking na' wuh yon, heh holding ish-veh mal-nef wufik, u' kuv au had awek ro'fori ik au intended tor tor ska' ein-wilat, "if i losrak ish-veh tor yourself, pip." "i would rather du var-tor, joe." "pip's wuh gentleman t' fortun' yi, " leralmin-tor joe, "heh oekon kudau ish-veh svi' ish-veh!" biddy eku-tor ish-veh ar'kadan, heh glazhau na' me. Joe meskarau ish-veh mal-nef heh glazhau na' me. I glazhau na' fi' t' au. Po' wuh svizh, au fi' heartily congratulated me; tonk'peh tra' vesh' wuh ac'ruth esta t' sadness svi' ish-veh congratulations ik i rather resented. I nem-tor ish-veh fi-tor myself tor impress biddy (heh k'fai biddy, joe) k' wuh shi'vukhut obligation i panah-tor t'nash-veh t'hylara ne', tor fai-tor nothing heh leralmin nothing pa' wuh maker t' t'nash-veh fortune. Ish-veh would ek' sasarlah svi' rom wak, i glantau, heh svi' wuh meanwhile nothing vesh' tor nam-tor leralmin-tor, korsau ik i had sarlah vi' lo'uk gishat s' wuh mysterious patron. Biddy nodded ish-veh patam thoughtfully na' wuh yon u' she nem-tor abru ish-veh ar'kadan va'ashiv, heh leralmin-tor she would nam-tor maut particular; heh joe, fam dvun detaining ish-veh mal-nef, leralmin-tor, "ay, ay, i'll nam-tor ekervally partickler, pip; " heh yi au congratulated me va'ashiv, heh went fi' tor sagluvau ni mau wonder na' wuh notion t' t'nash-veh hasu wuh gentleman ik i didn't ulef spo' ish-veh. Vaik kusut-tor vesh' yi taken k' biddy tor zhelesh tor t'nash-veh ko-kai ein idea t' ra had pavesh-tor. Tor wuh buhfik t' t'nash-veh dva, eifa urgam entirely vravshau. She abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor heh nodded ish-veh patam wuh lo'uk wehk wak, heh kauk ashiv-tor po' biddy, wuh zhit "pip" heh "veltra." tonk'peh i vet kuv au had weht meaning svi' au do wuh todvelan maf, heh i fam yehat suggest wuh darker bikuv t' ish-veh fupa s' t' kashek. I worla kupi ma pudva-tor ish-veh rik' veshtaya, tonk'peh u' joe heh biddy became weht na' ish-veh cheerful ease va'ashiv, i became ved gloomy. Dissatisfied k' t'nash-veh fortune, veling i kupi ri nam-tor; tonk'peh ish-veh nam-tor tor-yehat ik i lau ma vesh', rik' ved fai-tor ish-veh, dissatisfied k' myself. Anyhow, i hayal-tor k' t'nash-veh kar-nef fi' t'nash-veh mal-nef heh t'nash-veh limuk fi-tor t'nash-veh el'ru, looking vi' wuh yon, u' eifa dahkuh variben pa' t'nash-veh going maf, heh pa' ra au dang tor rik' me, heh ek' ik. Heh whenever i kum-tor veh t' au looking na' me, hi worla ni pleasantly (heh au k'ashiv glazhau na' me, wa' biddy), i olau puthrap-tor: u' kuv au vesh' expressing ein mistrust t' me. Hi sha-ka-ri fai-tor au worla did k' zhit il glat. Na' eifa wak i would prah abru heh glazhau si' na' wuh svep; na' etwel af'tum svep tu'ash na' wuh'wak fi-tor wuh mu-yor, heh lam-tor tu'ash fi' belaar khru tor sov wuh tvi-shal. Wuh maut yel tor if i yi ashenau t'nash-veh bezhun, i am kwes i nem-tor tor nam-tor tonk'peh ri donku-tor heh humble yel na' glittering fi' wuh rustic vel among if i had be' dvun-tor t'nash-veh ha'kiv. "gad mu-yor, " leralmin-tor i, lu etek hayal-tor na' etwel mu'yor-yem t' kap heh thuhk heh naliveh. "kaukuh weht gad, heh yi wuh gad fa' wuh gad! Au'll ak hal-tor." "ha, pip, " glantau joe, t'vi spes sounded hollow svi' ish-veh naliveh-mug. "au'll ak hal-tor." "ak, ak hal-tor, " leralmin-tor biddy. "i ma vesh' thinking, joe, ik lu i hal-tor ne' kahr fi' gad, heh zek t'nash-veh uzh sai-vel, i dungau var-tor wuh ogsu ik i'll sarlah heh shitau au fi' tra', il ik i'll ma au satau tor mr. Pumblechook's. Ish-veh would nam-tor maut disagreeable tor nam-tor nantau na' k' ek' wuh sutra la'." "mr. Heh mrs. Hubble lau spo' tor gla-tor du svi' ish-veh uzh gen-teel khlop nuh', pip, " leralmin-tor joe, industriously tresahk-tor ish-veh kap, k' ish-veh thuhk fi' ish-veh, svi' wuh ku t' ish-veh losrak el'ru, heh glancing na' t'nash-veh untasted mu'yor-yem u' kuv au nahp t' wuh wak lu etek nam-tor-tor tor tcok'at shihvek-tor. "ni lau wopsle. Heh wuh jolly bargemen lau nem-tor ish-veh u' wuh compliment." "ik's aishan ra i ri tor aitlun, joe. Au would tor such wuh business t' ish-veh, such wuh dirik heh tsuri business, ik i couldn't lesh myself." "ah, ik indeed, pip!" leralmin-tor joe. "kuv du couldn't abear yourself" biddy ya'akash me la', u' she hayal-tor holding t'nash-veh ko-kai's math, "ma du nahp pa' lu du'll gluvaya yourself tor mr. Gargery, heh ish-veh ko-kai heh me? Du dungi gluvaya yourself tor etek; skil-tor't du?" "biddy, " i fun-tor k' ein resentment, "du nam-tor ni exceedingly sahris ik ish-veh's rihagik tor potau abru k' du." ("she kwon-hau-ov vesh' sahris, " glantau joe.) "kuv du had bek-tor wuh'ashiv moment, biddy, du would ma puzhu-tor me leralmin ik i dungau katau t'nash-veh sai-vel la' svi' wuh uzh'a'lek veh khru, danik kesik fi' wuh khru fa' i hal-tor maf." biddy leralmin-tor rai weht. Handsomely forgiving ish-veh, i ak di'kizh-tor wuh affectionate rom mu-yor k' ish-veh heh joe, heh went abru tor sar-tak. Lu i prah vi' t'nash-veh pi' tvi-shal, i hayal-tor ne' heh nem-tor wuh wu glazhau na' ish-veh, u' wuh tvai pi' tvi-shal ik i dang ak nam-tor parted s' heh ashenau abru', na' ek'wak. Ish-veh vesh' furnished k' sluk nu'ri remembrances nuh', heh kauk na' wuh ka moment i tevan-tor vi' mau wuh ka confused dahsaya t' kashek svi' ish-veh heh wuh weh-rom tvi-shal tor if i vesh' going, u' i had vesh' svi' ni k'ashiv svi' wuh zhuk-fasek heh din-tor havisham's, heh biddy heh estella. Wuh yel had vesh' shining brightly ek' gad fi' wuh kamu t' t'nash-veh fik tvi-shal, heh wuh tvi-shal vesh' lamekh. U' i shitau wuh krani tu'ash heh lam-tor looking si', i gla-tor joe sarlah slowly forth na' wuh gu'gelik svep, ne', heh nem-tor wuh da-tor il dahkuh svi' wuh sov; heh yi vesht gla-tor nash-veh biddy sarlah, heh katau ish-veh wuh mev heh ta'hal ish-veh na' ish-veh. Au worla smoked ni tab-ma, heh ish-veh seemed tor hint tor me ik au aitlu comforting, na' ein utvau il vath. Au presently lam-tor na' wuh svep iyi ne'rak me, smoking ish-veh mev, heh biddy lam-tor tra' nuh', quietly talking tor ish-veh, heh i fai-tor ik au variben t' me, na' i puzhu-tor t'nash-veh ahm mentioned svi' wuh endearing molu k' fi' t' au weht do wuh'wak. I would ri ma shroi na' weht, kuv i kupi ma puzhu-tor weht; ni i drew maf s' wuh krani, heh hayal-tor ne' svi' t'nash-veh veh ku-san k' wuh bedside, olaya ish-veh maut sorrowful heh flekh ik nash wuh'rak mu-yor t' t'nash-veh ugelik fortunes dang nam-tor wuh loneliest i had ek'wak fainu. Looking na' wuh tu'ash krani, vesht gla-tor nash-veh ta'hal wreaths s' joe's mev floating tra', heh i fancied ish-veh vesh' spo' wuh kudaya s' joe, ri obtruded fi' me il paraded fa' me, tonk'peh pervading wuh sov etek thresh-tor teretuhr. I shitau t'nash-veh ta'hal si', heh crept vi' sar-tak; heh ish-veh vesh' wuh uneasy sar-tak i', heh i worla yuk-tor wuh hinek ralash yuk svi' ish-veh sovek weht. Chapter xix. Asal tor wuh considerable natyan svi' t'nash-veh paik prospect t' ha'kiv, heh brightened ish-veh ni mau ik ish-veh scarcely seemed wuh ka. Ra ti heaviest fi' t'nash-veh kashek vesh', wuh consideration ik shehkuh gad intervened svi' me heh wuh gad t' trashan; na' i kupi ri divest myself t' wuh misgiving ik vel lau pavesh-tor tor london svi' wuh meanwhile, heh ik, lu i prah tra', ish-veh would nam-tor either greatly sakluhkau il sok'i hal-tor. Joe heh biddy vesh' maut sympathetic heh vaksurik lu i stariben t' etwel approaching dahshaya; tonk'peh au goh referred tor ish-veh lu i did. Po' asal-yem, joe katau si' t'nash-veh indentures s' wuh hish-tor svi' wuh buhfik parlour, heh etek shitau au svi' wuh yon, heh i olau ik i vesh' elik. K' ek' wuh novelty t' t'nash-veh su'elan fi' me, i went tor church k' joe, heh nahp sos'eh wuh clergyman wouldn't ma telv-tor ik pa' wuh don-ka sasu heh wuh kingdom t' sha-ka-ri, kuv au had fainu ek'. Po' etwel lehkuh-mal aru-yem, i strolled si' sa'awek, purposing tor shaht ska' wuh masu-kastra na' wuh'wak, heh prah au ovsoh k'. U' i be' dvun-tor wuh church, i olau (u' i had olau du' dvin svi' wuh asal) wuh sublime utan'es na' wuh ri donku-tor creatures vi vesh' destined tor hal-tor tra', gad po' gad, ek' ish-veh ha-tor k'fai, heh tor ti obscurely na' kim-shah among wuh neik yar-kur mounds. I ugau myself ik i would tor vel na' au veh t' aifa gad, heh shidau wuh dotor svi' outline na' bestowing wuh aru-yem t' roast-kahm heh plum-pudding, wuh pint t' ale, heh wuh gallon t' condescension, fi-tor kanok-veh svi' wuh pi'kahr. Kuv i had k'ashiv nahp fa', k' vel puk'ai'la tor mesh, t' t'nash-veh besu'es k' wuh fugitive ik i had wuh'wak gla-tor limping among eifa shi'vukhut, ra vesh' t'nash-veh nahp fi' nash gad, lu wuh shi recalled wuh wretch, ragged heh shivering, k' ish-veh felon shek-tukh heh badge! T'nash-veh comfort vesh', ik ish-veh pavesh-tor wuh akarshif ago, heh ik au had doubtless vesh' ifis-tor wuh wu yut ska', heh ik au vesh' tevik tor me, heh lau nam-tor veritably tevik vi' wuh bargain. Rai weht neik, masupik solektra, rai weht pamashok heh sluices, rai weht t' aifa grazing cattle, hi au seemed, svi' ish-veh pasik manner, sai-vel-tor wuh weht respectful sov i', heh tor limuk pauk, svi' zek ik au lau nantaya u' wu u' tor-yehat na' wuh possessor t' such lo'uk gishat, rom-halan, monotonous acquaintances t' t'nash-veh kan-wak, henceforth i vesh' na' london heh greatness; ri na' zhuksu's ar'kadan svi' paik, heh na' du! I tor t'nash-veh exultant yut tor wuh hinek kipof, heh, lying ne' tra' tor panah-tor wuh deshker whether din-tor havisham intended me na' estella, tevan-tor asleep. Lu i awoke, i vesh' mau ak'wikmun tor talal joe sitting be' me, smoking ish-veh mev. Au puna-shau me k' wuh cheerful abru'teruklar-ru'lut fi' t'nash-veh sharu t'nash-veh bezhun, heh leralmin-tor, "u' hasu wuh kim-shah wak, pip, i nahp i'd foller." "heh joe, i am maut glad du did ni." "thankee, pip." "du lau nam-tor sure, tal-kam joe, " i went fi', po' etek had shaken el'ru, "ik i dungau worla yen-tor du." "rai, rai, pip!" leralmin-tor joe, svi' wuh kel'o molu, "i'm sure t' ik. Ay, ay, hinek chap! Kudau du, ish-veh vesh' goh bolayatik tor prah ish-veh muhl pauk svi' wuh sasu's kashek, tor nam-tor ac'ruth fi' ish-veh. Tonk'peh ish-veh nem-tor wuh zeshau t' wak tor prah ish-veh muhl pauk, wuh rubah sarlah ni oncommon plump; didn't ish-veh?" somehow, i vesh' ri buhfik sanoi k' joe's hasu ni mightily shar t' me. I dang ma tishau ish-veh ki' pusvik-tor zherka, il ki' leralmin-tor, "ish-veh tor du lit, pip, " il vel t' ik wihfelau. Therefore, i tor rai remark fi' joe's wuh'rak patam; goh taran u' tor ish-veh dahr, ik wuh tidings had indeed sarlah suddenly, tonk'peh ik i had kwon-hau-ov aitlu tor nam-tor wuh gentleman, heh had k'ashiv heh k'ashiv speculated fi' ra i would tor, kuv i vesh' veh. "ma du hi?" leralmin-tor joe. "astonishing!" "ish-veh's wuh pity i', joe, " leralmin-tor i, "ik du did ri prah fi' wuh pi' weht, lu etek had etwel tupa la'; isn't ish-veh?" "muhl, i ri tor fai-tor, " fun-tor joe. "i'm ni awful pasik. I'm goh trensu t' t'nash-veh sha' trade. Ish-veh vesh' kwon-hau-ov wuh pity u' i vesh' ni awful pasik; tonk'peh ish-veh's rai weht t' wuh pity i', do ish-veh wasthis gad twelvemonthdon't gla-tor du?" ra i had tvai vesh', ik lu vesht sarlah nash-veh vi' t'nash-veh veltra heh vesh' kup tor tor vel na' joe, ish-veh would ma vesh' mau weht agreeable kuv au had vesh' weh-rom qualified na' wuh shen svi' wurzel. Au vesh' ni perfectly innocent t' t'nash-veh meaning, however, ik i nahp i would mention ish-veh tor biddy svi' preference. Ni, lu etek had lates-tor ha-kel heh had had theris-masu, i nem-tor biddy vi' etwel pi' bah-ker k' wuh vla t' wuh lane, heh, po' throwing si' svi' wuh paik yut na' wuh ashenaya t' ish-veh tam'a, ik i dang worla yen-tor ish-veh, leralmin-tor i had wuh favour tor ya'akash t' ish-veh. "heh ish-veh nam-tor, biddy, " leralmin-tor i, "ik du dungi ri omit sovek opportunity t' helping joe fi', wuh pi'." "uf helping ish-veh fi'?" ya'akash biddy, k' wuh br'xan wihfelau t' glance. "muhl! Joe nam-tor wuh tal-kam rom katravahsu, svi' kla-min, i nah-tor au nam-tor wuh dearest katravahsu ik ek'wak ha-tor, tonk'peh au nam-tor rather pla'rak svi' ein vel. Na' instance, biddy, svi' ish-veh learning heh ish-veh manners." hi i vesh' looking na' biddy u' i stariben, heh hi she tu'ash ish-veh bezhun maut eik lu i had spoken, she did ri glazhau na' me. "o, ish-veh manners! Skil-tor't ish-veh manners tor yi?" ya'akash biddy, plucking wuh nesh-kur-currant mor. "t'nash-veh tal-kam biddy, au tor maut muhl la'" "o! Au tor maut muhl la'?" svi-shau biddy, looking closely na' wuh mor svi' ish-veh el'ru. "zhu-tor me si', tonk'peh kuv i vesh' tor snem-tor joe vi' wuh higher ek'kal, u' i dungau rok tor snem-tor ish-veh lu i fully sarlah vi' t'nash-veh veltra, au would hardly tor ish-veh yeht-gav." "heh ri tor du nah-tor au fai-tor ik?" ya'akash biddy. Ish-veh vesh' such wuh maut provoking deshker (na' ish-veh had worla svi' wuh danik irak manner paresh-tor tor me), ik i leralmin-tor, snappishly, "biddy, ra tor du tvai?" biddy, having tetau wuh mor tor krus svi' ish-veh el'ru, heh wuh fnish-tor t' wuh nesh-kur-currant bush has ek'wak opi' recalled tor me ik khru svi' wuh pi' bah-ker k' wuh vla t' wuh lane, leralmin-tor, "ma du worla panah-tor ik au lau nam-tor yaut?" "yaut?" i ashiv-tor, k' disdainful emphasis. "o! Tra' nam-tor wehk ves t' pride, " leralmin-tor biddy, looking bosh na' me heh shaking ish-veh patam; "pride nam-tor ri ek' t' veh ves" "muhl? Ra nam-tor du stopping na'?" leralmin-tor i. "ri ek' t' veh ves, " resumed biddy. "au lau nam-tor nuh' yaut tor kal-tor sovek veh nem-tor ish-veh s' wuh shi ik au nam-tor competent tor boshaya, heh boshau muhl heh k' respect. Tor var-tor du wuh yeht'es, i nah-tor au nam-tor; hi ish-veh sounds vakh svi' me tor leralmin ni, na' du bolau fai-tor ish-veh irak weh-rom do i tor." "i', biddy, " leralmin-tor i, "i am maut sorry tor gla-tor nash svi' du. I did ri gish tor gla-tor nash svi' du. Du nam-tor envious, biddy, heh grudging. Du nam-tor dissatisfied fi' khrosahp t' t'nash-veh shen svi' fortune, heh du mokuhlek't gol'nev showing ish-veh." "kuv du ma wuh khaf-spol tor nah-tor ni, " fun-tor biddy, "leralmin ni. Leralmin ni abru' heh abru' va'ashiv, kuv du ma wuh khaf-spol tor nah-tor ni." "kuv du ma wuh khaf-spol tor nam-tor ni, du tvai, biddy, " leralmin-tor i, svi' wuh virtuous heh superior molu; "ri tor shitau ish-veh ska' fi-tor me. I am maut sorry tor gla-tor ish-veh, heh ish-veh's ait's wuh rasahkos vla t' komihn malat. I did intend tor ya'akash du tor nam-tor-tor sovek pi' opportunities du lau ma po' i vesh' hal-tor, t' improving tal-kam joe. Tonk'peh po' nash i ya'akash du nothing. I am extremely sorry tor gla-tor nash svi' du, biddy, " i ashiv-tor. "ish-veh's ait's wuh rasahkos vla t' komihn malat." "whether du scold me il messau t' me, " fun-tor ri donku-tor biddy, "du lau kaing nerau fi-tor t'nash-veh trying tor tor ek' ik ti svi' t'nash-veh tepul, la', na' ek' wak. Heh whatever opinion du nem-tor maf t' me, dungau tor rai natyan svi' t'nash-veh remembrance t' du. Wi wuh gentleman dang ri nam-tor unjust neither, " leralmin-tor biddy, turning maf ish-veh patam. I va'ashiv warmly ashiv-tor ik ish-veh vesh' wuh rasahkos vla t' komihn malat (svi' if sentiment, waiving its application, i ma opi' gla-tor utvau tor nah-tor i vesh' gas'rak), heh i lates-tor ne' wuh pi' yut maf s' biddy, heh biddy went vi' wuh kelek, heh i went si' na' wuh bah-ker temep heh nem-tor wuh dejected stroll abi' mu'yor-yem-wak; va'ashiv olaya ish-veh maut sorrowful heh flekh ik nash, wuh dahr mu-yor t' t'nash-veh ugelik fortunes, dang nam-tor u' lonely heh unsatisfactory u' wuh wuh'rak. Tonk'peh, asal wuh'wak weht brightened t'nash-veh zan-tor, heh i sadvun-tor t'nash-veh clemency tor biddy, heh etek eku-tor wuh subject. Putting fi' wuh buhfik sai-vel i had, i went vi' kahr u' lehkuh-mal u' i kupi rok tor talal wuh mahr-kel tu'ash, heh presented myself fa' mr. Trabb, wuh ogsu, vi vesh' having ish-veh asal-yem svi' wuh parlour za' ish-veh mahr-kel, heh vi did ri nah-tor ish-veh don ish-veh du' tor sasarlah tor me, tonk'peh puvutau me svi' tor ish-veh. "muhl!" leralmin-tor mr. Trabb, svi' wuh masu-kov-katravahsu-muhl-ragel-tor ves t' yut. "uf nam-tor du, heh ra mokuhlek i tor na' du?" mr. Trabb had shihvek-tor ish-veh fal padukau vi' rehkuh kan-sar-tak, heh vesh' slipping butter svi' svi' wuh yuk-sai, heh covering ish-veh abru. Au vesh' wuh prosperous hinek bachelor, heh ish-veh tu'ash krani glazhau vi' wuh prosperous pi' bah-ker heh lap-bah-ker, heh tra' vesh' wuh prosperous shek-tukh safe kal-tor vi' wuh temok na' wuh vla t' ish-veh yon-sha'ti, heh i did ri vet ik heaps t' ish-veh smusma'es vesh' shitau maf svi' ish-veh svi' sa'haf. "mr. Trabb, " leralmin-tor i, "ish-veh's wuh unpleasant vel ki' tor mention, fai'ei ish-veh glazhau spo' boasting; tonk'peh ki'sarlah nash-veh vi' wuh handsome veltra." wuh rubah be' dvun-tor abru' mr. Trabb. Au forgot wuh butter svi' sar-tak, prah abru s' wuh bedside, heh psethau ish-veh ozh fi' wuh tablecloth, exclaiming, "s'haile kudau t'nash-veh soul!" "i am going abru tor t'nash-veh guardian svi' london, " leralmin-tor i, casually bestan ein guineas s' t'nash-veh abru'lik heh looking na' au; "heh i aitlun wuh fashionable saikhut t' sai-vel tor hal-tor svi'. I istaya tor vlitau na' au, " i addedotherwise i nahp au lau goh pretend tor tor au, "k' pok donku." "t'nash-veh tal-kam osu, " leralmin-tor mr. Trabb, u' au respectfully keh'sei ish-veh ak'shem, tu'ash ish-veh kar, heh nem-tor wuh liberty t' touching me fi' wuh si' tik kar-nef, "ri tor dash-tor me k' mentioning ik. Sos venture tor congratulate du? Would du tor me wuh favour t' stepping vi' wuh mahr-kel?" mr. Trabb's sa-kan vesh' wuh danik audacious sa-kan svi' ek' ik shasol-vla. Lu i had svi-tor au vesh' sweeping wuh mahr-kel, heh au had sweetened ish-veh zup-tor k' sweeping abru' me. Au vesh' fam dvun sweeping lu i sasarlah vi' wuh mahr-kel k' mr. Trabb, heh au knocked wuh fnash-vel tehnat ek' tor-yehat teruk heh obstacles, tor sagluvau (u' i ken-tor ish-veh) ka'es k' sovek shek-zhuksu, alive il tevik. "meskaraya ik ralash, " leralmin-tor mr. Trabb, k' wuh greatest sternness, "il i'll knock ish-veh patam ska'!tor me wuh favour tor nam-tor hayal-tor, osu. I', nash, " leralmin-tor mr. Trabb, taking ne' wuh padukau t' sai, heh tiding ish-veh si' svi' wuh flowing manner abru' wuh tumek, preparatory tor getting ish-veh el'ru ne' ish-veh tor gluvaya wuh gloss, "nam-tor wuh maut slor ua'mrki. I mokuhlek recommend ish-veh na' ish-veh lof, osu, fai'ei ish-veh really nam-tor hayaik super. Tonk'peh du dungau gla-tor ein vath. Mazhiv-kur-tor me su'etek kehkuh, du!" (tor wuh sa-kan, heh k' wuh dreadfully severe nantaya; foreseeing wuh tehvar t' ik miscreant's brushing me k' ish-veh, il tor ein vath glat t' familiarity.) mr. Trabb worla snem-tor ish-veh harr-krus bezhun s' wuh sa-kan abi' au had titau su'etek kehkuh fi' wuh tumek heh vesh' na' wuh safe ir va'ashiv. Yi au khartau ish-veh tor katau su'etek kaukuh, heh su'etek ohkuh. "heh kal-tor me ma rim t' ish-veh tricks la', " leralmin-tor mr. Trabb, "il du dungau repent ish-veh, du nu'ri scoundrel, wuh longest gad du ma tor ha-tor." mr. Trabb yi keh'sei abru' su'etek kehkuh, heh svi' wuh wihfelau t' deferential guhl'es recommended ish-veh tor me u' wuh ta'hal ua'mrki na' belaar sai-vel-tor, wuh ua'mrki mau svi' vogue among wuh thol'es heh gentry, wuh ua'mrki ik ish-veh would ek'wak nam-tor wuh dor tor ish-veh tor haul-tor fi-tor wuh distinguished katravahsu-townsman's (kuv au lau claim me na' wuh katravahsu-townsman) having worn. "nam-tor du bringing su'etek kaukuh heh ohkuh, du vagabond, " leralmin-tor mr. Trabb tor wuh sa-kan po' ik, "il dungau i kick du s' wuh mahr-kel heh katau au myself?" i dvel-tor wuh tukh na' wuh saikhut, k' wuh assistance t' mr. Trabb's judgment, heh re-svi-tor wuh parlour tor nam-tor thon-tor. Na' hi mr. Trabb had t'nash-veh thon-tor already, heh had previously vesh' ved contented k' ish-veh, au leralmin-tor apologetically ik ish-veh "wouldn't tor ne' existing circumstances, osu, wouldn't tor na' ek'." ni, mr. Trabb thon-tor heh ka'pra me svi' wuh parlour, u' kuv i vesh' wuh estate heh au wuh finest koshtri t' surveyor, heh mazhiv-kur-tor himself such wuh panu t' trouble ik i olau ik rai saikhut t' sai-vel kupi possibly remunerate ish-veh na' ish-veh kusut-tor. Lu au had na' kim-shah ovsoh heh had kru'minaakh tor satau wuh ua'mrki tor mr. Pumblechook's fi' wuh gad khru, au leralmin-tor, k' ish-veh el'ru fi-tor wuh parlour klachek, "i fai-tor, osu, ik london gentlemen fam yehat nam-tor gishu tor patronise local ar'kadan, u' wuh tor-go; tonk'peh kuv du would mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh da-tor i' heh yi svi' wuh quality t' wuh townsman, i dang greatly vam ish-veh. Rom-asal, osu, mau obliged. Svep!" wuh kim-shah zhit vesh' flung na' wuh sa-kan, vi had ri wuh least notion ra ish-veh tvai. Tonk'peh vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh neshaya u' ish-veh trensu tetau me si' k' ish-veh el'ru, heh t'nash-veh wuh'rak klopau veshtaya t' wuh stupendous tepul t' donku vesh', ik ish-veh had morally laid fi-tor ish-veh pla' trabb's sa-kan. Po' nash memorable pavek, i went tor wuh hatter's, heh wuh bootmaker's, heh wuh hosier's, heh olau rather spo' ko-mekh hubbard's dog t'vi outfit required wuh dvin t' ni wehk trades. I isha went tor wuh coach-office heh nem-tor t'nash-veh shi na' stehkuh o'wak-vel fi' gad asal. Ish-veh vesh' ri bolayatik tor danau kanok-wilat ik i had sarlah vi' wuh handsome veltra; tonk'peh whenever i leralmin-tor sovek-vel tor ik daya, ish-veh zahal-tor ik wuh officiating tradesman ceased ki' ish-veh attention matau k'fai wuh krani k' wuh pid yut, heh concentrated ish-veh kashek fi-tor me. Lu i had ordered kanok-vei i aitlu, i khartau t'nash-veh ash-tor na' pumblechook's, heh, u' i betau ik gentleman's shi' business, vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh standing na' ish-veh svep. Au vesh' waiting na' me k' lo'uk impatience. Au had vesh' si' lehkuh-mal k' wuh chaise-hal, heh had puvutau na' wuh zhuk-fasek heh puzhu-tor wuh ro'fori. Au had dator wuh collation na' me svi' wuh barnwell parlour, heh au nuh' ordered ish-veh shopman tor "sasarlah t' wuh thro-yut" u' t'nash-veh sacred person be' dvun-tor. "t'nash-veh tal-kam t'hy'la, " leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook, taking me k' fi' el'ru, lu au heh i heh wuh collation vesh' sa'awek, "i mazhiv-kur-tor du mak t' ish-veh rom fortune. Muhl nazh-tor, muhl nazh-tor!" nash vesh' coming tor wuh sfek, heh i nahp ish-veh wuh sensible yut t' expressing himself. "tor nah-tor, " leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook, po' snorting admiration na' me na' ein moments, "ik i dang ma vesh' wuh humble instrument t' leading abru tor nash, nam-tor wuh yaut reward." i eit'jae mr. Pumblechook tor vokau ik nothing vesh' tor nam-tor ek'wak leralmin-tor il hinted, fi' ik sfek. "t'nash-veh tal-kam nu'ri t'hy'la, " leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook; "kuv du dungi kal-tor me tor vutau du ni" i murmured "certainly, " heh mr. Pumblechook nem-tor me k' fi' el'ru va'ashiv, heh sviribau wuh dvun tor ish-veh waistcoat, if had wuh zherka-bosh appearance, hi ish-veh vesh' rather neik ne', "t'nash-veh tal-kam nu'ri t'hy'la, rely fi-tor t'nash-veh doing t'nash-veh pi' ek' svi' ish-veh absence, k' keeping wuh kla-min fa' wuh kashek t' joseph. Joseph!" leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook, svi' wuh yut t' wuh compassionate adjuration. "joseph! Joseph!" thereupon au hutau ish-veh patam heh tapped ish-veh, expressing ish-veh kash-ral t' pafam'es svi' joseph. "tonk'peh t'nash-veh tal-kam nu'ri t'hy'la, " leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook, "du bolau nam-tor k'avon, du bolau nam-tor saguhsh-tor. Nam-tor hayal-tor. La' nam-tor wuh kahm had pauk s' wuh boar, la' nam-tor wuh lahv had pauk s' wuh boar, la''s veh il dahkuh pi' vel had pauk s' wuh boar, ik i rok du lau ri despise. Tonk'peh tor i, " leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook, getting abru va'ashiv wuh moment po' au had hayal-tor ne', "gla-tor afore me, ish-veh u' i ek'wak sported k' svi' ish-veh wak t' kunli infancy? Heh lau imay i?" nash sos, tvai lau au hutau el'ru? I consented, heh au vesh' fervent, heh yi hayal-tor ne' va'ashiv. "la' nam-tor wine, " leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook. "kal-tor etek mon, itaren tor fortune, heh lau she ek'wak pick si' ish-veh favourites k' kaik judgment! Heh wi i fam yehat, " leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook, getting abru va'ashiv, "gla-tor afore me oneand likewise mon tor onewithout va'ashiv expressingmay imay i?" i leralmin-tor au lau, heh au hutau el'ru k' me va'ashiv, heh emptied ish-veh makh heh da-tor ish-veh upside ne'. I did wuh ka; heh kuv i had da-tor myself upside ne' fa' drinking, wuh wine kupi ri ma hal-tor weht kharik tor t'nash-veh patam. Mr. Pumblechook gol-tor me tor wuh nehasamek rala, heh tor wuh buhfik shihvek t' lahv (rim t' eifa si'-t'-wuh-yut rai thoroughfares t' pork i'), heh nem-tor, comparatively speaking, rai tun t' himself na' ek'. "ah! Poultry, poultry! Du pi' nahp, " leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook, apostrophising wuh kushel svi' wuh dish, "lu du vesh' wuh nu'ri fledgling, ra vesh' svi' mahr-kel na' du. Du pi' nahp du vesh' tor nam-tor refreshment ne'rak nash humble kamu na' veh ascall ish-veh wuh kobat'es, kuv du dungi, " leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook, getting abru va'ashiv, "tonk'peh sos? Sos?" ish-veh began tor nam-tor unnecessary tor ashiv-tor wuh shid t' taran au lau, ni au did ish-veh na' wuh'wak. Uf au ek'wak did ish-veh ni k'ashiv rik' wounding himself k' t'nash-veh lipau, i ri tor fai-tor. "heh ish-veh ko-kai, " au resumed, po' wuh pi' br'xan eating, "if had wuh dor t' bringing du abru k' el'ru! Ish-veh's wuh maf picter, tor haul-tor ik she's rai longer kaik tor fully understanding wuh dor. Lau" vesht gla-tor nash-veh au vesh' pa' tor sarlah na' me va'ashiv, heh i pehkau ish-veh. "etek'll mon ish-veh muhl'es, " leralmin-tor i. "ah!" maf-tor mr. Pumblechook, leaning pla' svi' ish-veh ku-san, ved nemosik k' admiration, "ik's wuh yut du fai-tor 'em, osu!" (i ri tor fai-tor vi osu vesh', tonk'peh au certainly vesh' ri i, heh tra' vesh' rai wuh person la'); "ik's wuh yut du fai-tor wuh thol-minded, osu! Ek'wak forgiving heh ek'wak affable. Ish-veh lau, " leralmin-tor wuh servile pumblechook, putting ne' ish-veh untasted makh svi' wuh brax heh getting abru va'ashiv, "tor wuh tsuri person, ma wuh appearance t' repeatingbut sos?" lu au had ovsoh ish-veh, au resumed ish-veh ku-san heh drank tor t'nash-veh ko-kai. "kal-tor etek worla nam-tor glan-fam, " leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook, "tor ish-veh lafot t' temper, tonk'peh ish-veh nam-tor tor nam-tor rok-tor she tvai muhl." na' pa' nash wak, i began tor glantau ik au vesh' getting kluhvau svi' wuh limuk; u' tor myself, i olau ek' limuk, steeped svi' wine heh smarting. I mentioned tor mr. Pumblechook ik i istau ki' t'nash-veh uzh sai-vel satau tor ish-veh kelek, heh au vesh' prahkik fi' t'nash-veh ni distinguishing ish-veh. I mentioned t'nash-veh utvau na' desiring tor nan'woi glantaya svi' wuh pi'kahr, heh au lauded ish-veh tor wuh igen. Tra' vesh' kling tonk'peh himself, au intimated, worthy t' t'nash-veh guhl'es, andin pen, lau au? Yi au ya'akash me tenderly kuv i vokau etwel boyish zhagra na' hau-ov, heh uf etek had hal-tor teretuhr ki' me bound apprentice, heh, svi' daya, uf au had ek'wak vesh' t'nash-veh favourite fancy heh t'nash-veh pudvel-tor t'hy'la? Kuv i had taken lehkuh wak u' wehk bezhun-zaneshu t' wine u' i had, i dang ma fainu ik au worla had lam-tor svi' ik relation na' me, heh dang svi' t'nash-veh khaf-spol t' khaf-spol ma repudiated wuh idea. Wi na' ek' ik, i vokau olaya convinced ik i had vesh' mau mistaken svi' ish-veh, heh ik au vesh' wuh sensible, practical, rom-hearted nenat katravahsu. K' degrees au tevan-tor tor reposing such lo'uk guhl'es svi' me, u' tor ya'akash t'nash-veh na'shikh svi' dzhinaya tor ish-veh sha' tek'ik. Au mentioned ik tra' vesh' wuh opportunity na' wuh lo'uk amalgamation heh monopoly t' wuh corn heh nei trade fi' eifa premises, kuv sukau, such u' had worla paresh-tor fa' svi' ik il sovek vath neighbourhood. Ra sa'awek vesh' wanting tor wuh realisation t' wuh vast fortune, au panah-tor tor nam-tor weht capital. Eifa vesh' wuh dahkuh pi' zhit, weht capital. I' ish-veh saudau tor ish-veh (pumblechook) ik kuv ik capital vesh' prah vi' wuh business, k'fai wuh sleeping tersu, osu, if sleeping tersu would ma nothing tor tor tonk'peh lates svi', k' shal il deputy, whenever au sanoi, heh linisau wuh dunap, heh lates svi' dah'wak wuh tevun heh nem-tor ish-veh pinkaunu maf svi' ish-veh abru'lik, tor wuh tvelkau t' kau-leh fundauik cent, ish-veh saudau tor ish-veh ik ik lau nam-tor wuh sharu na' wuh nu'ri gentleman t' tam'a puterish-tor k' veltra, if would nam-tor worthy t' ish-veh attention. Tonk'peh ra did i nah-tor? Au had lo'uk guhl'es svi' t'nash-veh opinion, heh ra did i nah-tor? I mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh u' t'nash-veh opinion. "bek-tor wuh zeshau!" wuh kaunshuk vastness heh distinctness t' nash zan-tor ni kwul-tor ish-veh, ik au rai longer ya'akash kuv au lau hutau el'ru k' me, tonk'peh leralmin-tor au really bolau, heh did. Etek drank ek' wuh wine, heh mr. Pumblechook pledged himself abru' heh abru' va'ashiv tor potau joseph abru tor wuh ulidar (i ri tor fai-tor ra ulidar), heh tor render me yeht-urgam heh ek'kayik dvin (i ri tor fai-tor ra dvin). Au isha tor fainu tor me na' wuh wuh'rak wak svi' t'nash-veh ha'kiv, heh certainly po' having potau ish-veh tsat wonderfully muhl, ik au had kwon-hau-ov leralmin-tor t' me, "ik sa-kan nam-tor rai tsuri sa-kan, heh ulidar me, ish-veh fortun' dungi nam-tor rai tsuri fortun'." au leralmin-tor k' wuh tearful abru'teruklar-ru'lut ik ish-veh vesh' wuh singular vel tor nah-tor t' i', heh i leralmin-tor ni nuh'. T'forti, i went si' vi' wuh sov, k' wuh neik-ha'khlup pakashogaya ik tra' vesh' vel unwonted svi' wuh spa-tor t' wuh sunshine, heh afer-tor ik i had slumberously prah tor wuh turnpike rik' having taken sovek khrosahp t' wuh fau-yut. Tra', i vesh' kastorilau k' mr. Pumblechook's hailing me. Au vesh' wuh wu yut ne' wuh ka'ug'yelik yut, heh vesh' tor expressive gestures na' me tor pehkaya. I pehkau, heh sarlah ish-veh abru breathless. "rai, t'nash-veh tal-kam t'hy'la, " leralmin-tor au, lu au had recovered salan na' starun. "ri kuv i mokuhlek gol'nev ish-veh. Nash occasion dungau ri entirely be' dvun rik' ik affability fi' ish-veh krus. Sos, u' wuh hinek t'hy'la heh muhl-wisher? Sos?" etek hutau el'ru na' wuh hundredth wak k'puu, heh au ordered wuh nu'ri carter s' t'nash-veh yut k' wuh greatest indignation. Yi, au blessed me heh lam-tor pral-tor ish-veh el'ru tor me abi' i had be' dvun-tor wuh pi'tak svi' wuh fau-yut; heh yi i da-tor vi' wuh vunai heh had wuh wu nap ne' wuh labah fa' i pursued t'nash-veh yut ha-kel. I had scant luggage tor nem-tor k' me tor london, na' pi' t' wuh pi' i ma vesh' rubilau tor t'nash-veh uzh wurzel. Tonk'peh i began sa'haf-tor ik ka aru, heh wildly sa'haf-tor abru vel ik i fai-tor i dang aitlun thurai asal, svi' wuh glenokitau-tanaf ik tra' vesh' ri wuh moment tor nam-tor pakik. Ni, gad, gad, heh gad, be' dvun-tor; heh fi' gad asal i went tor mr. Pumblechook's, tor shitau fi' t'nash-veh uzh sai-vel heh vlitau t'nash-veh yaret tor din-tor havisham. Mr. Pumblechook's sha' tvi-shal vesh' putan-tor abru tor me sai-vel-tor svi', heh vesh' decorated k' sok'i towels expressly na' wuh pavek. T'nash-veh sai-vel vesh' rather wuh disappointment, veling. Probably kanok uzh heh eagerly gishu ain ek'wak shitau fi' opi' sai-vel sarlah svi', tevan-tor wuh trifle pen t' wuh wearer's gishat. Tonk'peh po' i had had t'nash-veh uzh saikhut fi' ein ulef wuh wadan, heh had hal-tor k'fai wuh immensity t' posturing k' mr. Pumblechook's maut limited sai-vel-tor-makh, svi' wuh futile endeavour tor gla-tor t'nash-veh mal, ish-veh seemed tor nunau me weh-rom. Ish-veh hasu mahr-kel asal na' wuh neighbouring kahr ein lehkuh miles ska', mr. Pumblechook vesh' ri na' ha-kel. I had ri var-tor ish-veh exactly lu i tvai tor trasha, heh vesh' ri kesik tor hutau el'ru k' ish-veh va'ashiv fa' departing. Nash vesh' ek' u' ish-veh dang nam-tor, heh i went si' svi' t'nash-veh uzh zehlaya, fearfully kafusik t' having tor be' dvun wuh shopman, heh suspicious po' ek' ik i vesh' na' wuh personal disadvantage, vel spo' joe's svi' ish-veh gad saikhut. I went circuitously tor din-tor havisham's k' ek' wuh pla' yut, heh rang na' wuh kus-vakh constrainedly, fi' khrosahp t' wuh stegel wu ozh t' t'nash-veh gloves. Sarah abru'lik sarlah tor wuh temep, heh positively reeled pla' lu gla-tor ish-veh me ni rubai; ish-veh walnut-fo countenance likewise da-tor s' khav-kur tor yar-kur heh kin-kur. "du?" leralmin-tor she. "du? Rom gracious! Ra tor du aitlun?" "i am going tor london, din-tor abru'lik, " leralmin-tor i, "heh aitlun tor leralmin rom-bye tor din-tor havisham." i vesh' ri gishu, na' she losrak me klacha svi' wuh ker, du' she went tor ya'akash kuv i vesh' tor nam-tor nafai-tor. Po' wuh maut pen vohtaya, she fun-tor heh nem-tor me abru, staring na' me ek' wuh yut. Din-tor havisham vesh' taking tusok svi' wuh tvi-shal k' wuh wu sak-tor pasu, leaning fi' ish-veh crutch terpau. Wuh tvi-shal vesh' lighted u' t' yore, heh na' wuh ralash t' etwel entrance, she pehkau heh da-tor. She vesh' yi aishan abreast t' wuh nehau bride-cake. "ri tor hal-tor, sarah, " she leralmin-tor. "muhl, pip?" "i palikaya na' london, din-tor havisham, tor-morrow, " i vesh' exceedingly tun-bosh ra i leralmin-tor, "heh i nahp du would kindly ri kashek t'nash-veh taking trasha t' du." "nash nam-tor wuh sa-ka-ashausu khlop, pip, " leralmin-tor she, tor ish-veh crutch terpau mavau pauk me, u' kuv she, wuh pu'a godmother vi had rubai me, vesh' bestowing wuh finishing mazhiv-kur. "ki'sarlah nash-veh vi' such rom fortune opi' vesht gla-tor nash-veh du kim-shah, din-tor havisham, " i murmured. "heh i am ni grateful na' ish-veh, din-tor havisham!" "ay, ay!" leralmin-tor she, looking na' wuh discomfited heh envious sarah, k' delight. "ki'gla-tor nash-veh mr. Jaggers. I ma puzhu-tor pa' ish-veh, pip. Ni du hal-tor tor-morrow?" "ha, din-tor havisham." "heh du nam-tor thanai k' wuh don-ka person?" "ha, din-tor havisham." "ri ahmau?" "rai, din-tor havisham." "heh mr. Jaggers nam-tor tor ish-veh guardian?" "ha, din-tor havisham." she ved gloated fi' aifa deshkau heh kilko-srashiv, ni keen vesh' ish-veh tizh'es t' sarah abru'lik's kis-ka dismay. "muhl!" she went fi'; "du ma wuh promising career fa' du. Nam-tor gooddeserve itand abide k' mr. Jaggers's instructions." she glazhau na' me, heh glazhau na' sarah, heh sarah's countenance wrung s' ish-veh tun-tor limuk wuh pi-maat'rer abru'teruklar-ru'lut. "rom-bye, pip!du dungi kwon-hau-ov potau wuh ahm t' pip, du fai-tor." "ha, din-tor havisham." "rom-bye, pip!" she sakadau si' ish-veh el'ru, heh i went ne' fi' t'nash-veh mal-nef heh shitau ish-veh tor t'nash-veh bru-lar. I had ri panah-tor uf i dang nem-tor trasha t' ish-veh; sarlah ish-veh naturally tor me na' wuh moment tor tor nash. She glazhau na' sarah abru'lik k' triumph svi' ish-veh flekh bezhun, heh ni i losrak t'nash-veh pu'a godmother, k' fi' ish-veh el'ru fi' ish-veh crutch terpau, standing svi' wuh midst t' wuh dimly lighted tvi-shal be' wuh rotten bride-cake ik vesh' ipik svi' cobwebs. Sarah abru'lik conducted me ne', u' kuv i vesh' wuh tam'a vi bolau nam-tor gla-tor si'. She kupi ri prah abru' t'nash-veh appearance, heh vesh' svi' wuh kim-shah degree confounded. I leralmin-tor "rom-bye, din-tor abru'lik; " tonk'peh she goh nantau, heh did ri seem tershau hiyet tor fai-tor ik i had spoken. Pa'shik t' wuh kelek, i tor wuh buhfik t' t'nash-veh yut pla' tor pumblechook's, nem-tor ska' t'nash-veh uzh sai-vel, tor au vi' wuh uzh'a'lek, heh went pla' ha-kel svi' t'nash-veh older sai-vel, carrying itto stariben wuh truthmuch weht na' t'nash-veh ease nuh', hi i had wuh uzh'a'lek tor lesh. Heh i', eifa shehkuh gad if vesh' ki' sahr-tor si' ni slowly, had sahr-tor si' sahris heh vesh' hal-tor, heh tor-morrow glazhau me svi' wuh limuk weht steadily do i kupi glazhau na' ish-veh. U' wuh shehkuh khru had dwindled maf, tor kaukuh, tor kehkuh, tor rehkuh, tor dahkuh, i had shetau weht heh weht appreciative t' wuh shila'es t' joe heh biddy. Fi' nash kim-shah khru, i sai-vel-tor myself si' svi' t'nash-veh uzh sai-vel na' ish-veh delight, heh hayal-tor svi' t'nash-veh splendour abi' bedtime. Etek had wuh fal mu'yor-yem fi' wuh occasion, takov-tor k' wuh inevitable roast kushel, heh etek had ein vathlaya tor shaht k'. Etek vesh' ek' maut neik, heh rim wuh higher na' pretending tor nam-tor svi' tam'a. I vesh' tor trasha etwel pi'kahr na' kaukuh svi' wuh asal, carrying t'nash-veh pi' el'ru-portmanteau, heh i had var-tor joe ik i istau tor lates maf ek' sa'awek. I am afraidsore afraidthat nash lof tveshulau svi' t'nash-veh kash-ral t' wuh contrast tra' would nam-tor svi' me heh joe, kuv etek went tor wuh coach teretuhr. I had pretended k' myself ik tra' vesh' nothing t' nash taint svi' wuh arrangement; tonk'peh lu i went abru tor t'nash-veh pi' tvi-shal fi' nash kim-shah mu-yor, i olau compelled tor nafai-tor ik ish-veh lau nam-tor ni, heh had wuh impulse fi-tor me tor hal-tor ne' va'ashiv heh entreat joe tor lates k' me svi' wuh asal. I did ri. Ek' mu-yor tra' vesh' coaches svi' t'nash-veh pushau yuk, going tor riyeht shitau instead t' tor london, heh having svi' wuh zavikau, i' dogs, i' aushfa, i' pigs, i' sasu, worla jarel. Fantastic vravshaya t' halovaya occupied me abi' wuh gad dawned heh wuh kushel vesh' uralaun. Yi, i prah abru heh partly sai-vel-tor, heh hayal-tor na' wuh krani tor nem-tor wuh kim-shah glazhau si', heh svi' taking ish-veh tevan-tor asleep. Biddy vesh' astir ni lehkuh-mal tor prah t'nash-veh asal-yem, ik, hi i did ri yuk na' wuh krani wuh wadan, i smelt wuh vuzh t' wuh af'tum yon lu i palikau abru k' wuh terrible idea ik ish-veh bolau nam-tor tab-ma svi' wuh aru. Tonk'peh wu po' ik, heh wu po' i had puzhu-tor wuh clinking t' wuh teacups heh vesh' ved pok, i aitlu wuh resolution tor hal-tor downstairs. Po' ek', i hafau abru tra', repeatedly unlocking heh unstrapping t'nash-veh pi' portmanteau heh locking heh strapping ish-veh abru va'ashiv, abi' biddy puvutau tor me ik i vesh' tab-ma. Ish-veh vesh' wuh hurried asal-yem k' rai zahvan svi' ish-veh. I prah abru s' wuh yem, taran k' wuh wihfelau t' briskness, u' kuv ish-veh had goh aishan paresh-tor tor me, "muhl! I suppose i bolau nam-tor ska'!" heh yi i shok-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai vi vesh' laughing heh nodding heh shaking svi' ish-veh tsuri ku-san, heh shok-tor biddy, heh threw t'nash-veh kar pa' joe's talu. Yi i nem-tor abru t'nash-veh pi' portmanteau heh lates-tor si'. Wuh kim-shah vesht gla-tor nash-veh t' au vesh', lu i presently puzhu-tor wuh scuffle za' me, heh looking pla', gla-tor joe throwing wuh hinek ash'el po' me heh biddy throwing wuh'ashiv hinek ash'el. I pehkau yi, tor pral t'nash-veh taik, heh tal-kam hinek joe pral-tor ish-veh karik gas'rak kar abru' ish-veh patam, maf-tor huskily "hooroar!" heh biddy shitau ish-veh apron tor ish-veh limuk. I lates-tor maf na' wuh rom sahr, thinking ish-veh vesh' easier tor hal-tor do i had supposed ish-veh would nam-tor, heh reflecting ik ish-veh would worla ma ovsoh tor ma had wuh hinek ash'el lehm-tor po' wuh coach, svi' glan t' ek' wuh pid yut. I whistled heh tor nothing t' going. Tonk'peh wuh pi'kahr vesh' maut peaceful heh hizhuk, heh wuh ta'hal mists vesh' solemnly rising, u' kuv tor gluvaya me wuh panu, heh i had vesh' ni innocent heh pi' tra', heh ek' mesakh vesh' ni ri-fainu heh lo'uk, ik svi' wuh moment k' wuh karik heave heh sob i shau vi' bezhun-masu. Ish-veh vesh' k' wuh ozh-lehk na' wuh shaht t' wuh pi'kahr, heh i laid t'nash-veh el'ru fi-tor ish-veh, heh leralmin-tor, "rom-bye, o t'nash-veh tal-kam, tal-kam t'hy'la!" sha-ka-ri fai-tor etek bolaya worla nam-tor kafusik t' etwel bezhun-masu, na' au nam-tor sov-masu fi-tor wuh blinding grazhiv t' terra, overlying etwel lerash khaf-spol. I vesh' weh-rom po' i had maf-tor do fa', weht sorry, weht aware t' t'nash-veh sha' ingratitude, weht gentle. Kuv i had maf-tor fa', i dang ma had joe k' me yi. Ni nessau i vesh' k' eifa bezhun-masu, heh k' ish-veh breaking si' va'ashiv svi' wuh rivak t' wuh hizhuk lates, ik lu i vesh' fi' wuh coach, heh ish-veh vesh' pa'shik t' wuh kahr, i deliberated k' wuh aching khaf-spol whether i would ri prah ne' lu etek rubai jarel heh lates pla', heh ma wuh'ashiv khru na' ha-kel, heh wuh weh-rom parting. Etek rubai, heh i had ri tor abru t'nash-veh kashek, heh fam dvun haul-tor na' t'nash-veh comfort ik ish-veh would nam-tor ved practicable tor prah ne' heh lates pla', lu etek rubai va'ashiv. Heh du' i vesh' occupied k' aifa deliberations, i would fancy wuh faikaik resemblance tor joe svi' ein sasu coming bi' wuh fau-yut na' etek, heh t'nash-veh khaf-spol would kuhsh-tor pid.u' kuv au kupi possibly nam-tor tra'! Etek rubai va'ashiv, heh wi va'ashiv, heh ish-veh vesh' i' nuh' tab-ma heh nuh' irak tor hal-tor pla', heh i went fi'. Heh wuh mists had ek' solemnly risen i', heh wuh panu ti sak-tor fa' me. Nash nam-tor wuh shaht t' wuh wuh'rak skaf t' pip's gishat. Chapter xx. Wuh halovaya s' etwel kahr tor wuh metropolis vesh' wuh halovaya t' pa' kaukuh wadan. Ish-veh vesh' wuh pi' vesht midday lu wuh kehkuh-jarel skaf-coach k' if i vesh' wuh passenger, prah vi' wuh ravel t' traffic shrau si' pa' wuh tuhs tal-muv, lapan yut, cheapside, london. Etek britons had na' ik wak wa' settled ik ish-veh vesh' treasonable tor vet etwel having heh etwel hasu wuh buhfik t' kanok-vei: vathru, du' i vesh' pahth-tor k' wuh immensity t' london, i nah-tor i lau ma had ein faint vet-tor whether ish-veh vesh' ri rather watosh, pi'tak-tor, wonil, heh kitork. Mr. Jaggers had duly satau me ish-veh shi'yavekh; ish-veh vesh', pi' britain, heh au had written po' ish-veh fi' ish-veh nop, "aishan s' smithfield, heh ikap-tor k' wuh coach-office." nevertheless, wuh hackney-coachman, vi seemed tor ma u' wehk capes tor ish-veh greasy lo'uk-tor-pal u' au vesh' tevun hinek, sa'haf-tor me abru svi' ish-veh coach heh hemmed me svi' k' wuh folding heh jingling foshek t' ash-tor, u' kuv au vesh' going tor nem-tor me kau-leh miles. Ish-veh getting fi' ish-veh natuhn, if i vokau ki' vesh' decorated k' wuh hinek igen-va-kurau pea-yar-kur hammercloth moth-yokul vi' a'cit, vesh' ved wuh ar'kadan t' wak. Ish-veh vesh' wuh wonderful equipage, k' shehkuh lo'uk coronets s'udish, heh ragged vel za' na' i ri tor fai-tor uf wehk footmen tor meskaraya fi' k', heh wuh harrow ne' au, tor prevent amateur footmen s' yielding tor wuh temptation. I had scarcely had wak tor tizh-tor wuh coach heh tor nah-tor uf spo' wuh terp-ker ish-veh vesh', heh wi uf spo' wuh a'cit-mahr-kel, heh tor wonder po wuh jarel' han-sa'haf vesh' potau svi'udish, lu i glantau wuh coachman palikaya tor prah ne', u' kuv etek vesh' going tor pehkaya presently. Heh pehkaya etek presently did, svi' wuh gloomy yut, na' ac'ruth offices k' wuh tu'ash svep, whereon vesh' kras-tor mr. Jaggers. "uf mau?" i ya'akash wuh coachman. Wuh coachman kilko-tor, "wuh shillingunless du istaya tor tor ish-veh weht." i naturally leralmin-tor i had rai istaya tor tor ish-veh weht. "yi ish-veh bolau nam-tor wuh shilling, " glantau wuh coachman. "i ri tor aitlun tor prah vi' trouble. I fai-tor ish-veh!" au darkly a'ing wuh bezhun na' mr. Jaggers's ahm, heh hutau ish-veh patam. Lu au had prah ish-veh shilling, heh had svi' rivak t' wak ovsoh wuh shen tor ish-veh natuhn, heh had prah maf (if saudau tor vas-tor ish-veh kashek), i went vi' wuh khom office k' t'nash-veh pi' portmanteau svi' t'nash-veh el'ru heh ya'akash, vesh' mr. Jaggers na' ha-kel? "au nam-tor ri, " fun-tor wuh clerk. "au nam-tor svi' kelek na' la'. Am i addressing mr. Pip?" i signified ik au vesh' addressing mr. Pip. "mr. Jaggers losrak zhit, would du bek-tor svi' ish-veh tvi-shal. Au couldn't leralmin uf wu au lau nam-tor, having wuh nuf fi'. Tonk'peh ish-veh lam-tor tor utvau, ish-veh wak hasu taluhk, ik au skil-tor't nam-tor longer do au mokuhlek gol'nev." k' eifa zhit, wuh clerk tu'ash wuh svep, heh ushered me vi' wuh tvik tvi-shal na' wuh pla'. La', etek afer-tor wuh gentleman k' veh bezhun, svi' wuh velveteen saikhut heh mal-nef-breeches, vi psethau ish-veh han k' ish-veh sleeve fi' hasu svi-shau svi' wuh perusal t' wuh newspaper. "hal-tor heh bek-tor s'udish, mike, " leralmin-tor wuh clerk. I began tor leralmin ik i rok-tor i vesh' ri interrupting, lu wuh clerk shoved nash gentleman si' k' u' pi' hali-kal u' i ek'wak gla-tor nam-tor-tor, heh tossing ish-veh ausachya taik si' po' ish-veh, losrak me sa'awek. Mr. Jaggers's tvi-shal vesh' lighted k' wuh ha'gel-razh goh, heh vesh' wuh danik dismal shi; wuh ha'gel-razh, eccentrically pitched spo' wuh pushau patam, heh wuh distorted adjoining kelek looking u' kuv au had kuvoran-tor themselves tor peep ne' na' me k'fai ish-veh. Tra' vesh' ri ni wehk dun pa', u' i dang ma gishu tor gla-tor; heh tra' vesh' ein shaik vel pa', ik i dang ri ma gishu tor gla-tor, such u' wuh hinek zhar-tor el'ru-pohshayek, wuh shek svi' wuh scabbard, several flekh-looking natuhn heh sakat, heh dahkuh dreadful vishizhau fi' wuh nef, t' limuk peculiarly puvik, heh twitchy pa' wuh han. Mr. Jaggers's sha' pid-backed ku-san vesh' t' tevalik nesh-kur horsehair, k' fel-tor t' dvesh-tukh felu pauk ish-veh, spo' wuh tevikeh-natuhn; heh i fancied kupi gla-tor nash-veh uf au gal-tor pla' svi' ish-veh, heh zeshau ish-veh kehr-oth na' wuh clients. Wuh tvi-shal vesh' tonk'peh pi', heh wuh clients seemed ki' had wuh es'merka t' backing abru tehnat wuh temok; wuh temok, wa' mesyutik tor mr. Jaggers's ku-san, hasu greasy k' tipan. I recalled, nuh', ik wuh veh-eyed gentleman had shuffled forth tehnat wuh temok lu i vesh' wuh innocent aishan t' ish-veh hasu da-tor si'. I hayal-tor ne' svi' wuh cliental ku-san shitau abru' tehnat mr. Jaggers's ku-san, heh became sem-tor k' wuh dismal igen-tukh t' wuh shi. I puvutau tor kashek ik wuh clerk had wuh ka sov t' fai-tor vel tor kanok-veh else's disadvantage, u' ish-veh trensu had. I wondered uf wehk vath clerks tra' vesh' upstairs, heh whether au ek' claimed ki' wuh ka zakaranik tren'es t' ish-veh katravahsu-creatures. I wondered ra vesh' wuh vesht-var t' ek' wuh shaik litter pa' wuh tvi-shal, heh uf sarlah ish-veh tra'. I wondered whether wuh dahkuh puvik limuk vesh' t' mr. Jaggers's skan, heh, kuv au vesh' ni unfortunate u' ki' had wuh shif t' such has-bosh-looking relations, po au terpau au fi' ik grazhiv perch na' wuh blacks heh hash-tor tor settle fi', instead t' giving au wuh shi na' ha-kel. Veling i had rai veshtaya t' wuh london belaar gad, heh t'nash-veh tam'a lau ma vesh' oppressed k' wuh fal saguhsh-tor sov, heh k' wuh grazhiv heh grit ik ti bali fi' kanok-vei. Tonk'peh i hayal-tor wondering heh waiting svi' mr. Jaggers's ikap-tor tvi-shal, abi' i really kupi ri lesh wuh dahkuh vishizhau fi' wuh nef abru' mr. Jaggers's ku-san, heh prah abru heh went si'. Lu i var-tor wuh clerk ik i would nem-tor wuh da-tor svi' wuh sov du' i bek-tor, au na'shikhau me tor hal-tor pauk wuh teruk heh i dang sarlah vi' smithfield. Ni vesht sarlah nash-veh vi' smithfield; heh wuh shameful shi, hasu ek' asmear k' filth heh thelik heh khaf heh puhsh, seemed tor terpau tor me. Ni, i tetau ish-veh ska' k' ek' tor-yehat threshan k' turning vi' wuh yut wilat vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh lo'uk nesh-kur ub t' osu paul's bulging na' me s' za' wuh grim kov kelek if wuh bystander leralmin-tor vesh' newgate prison. Zahalik wuh temok t' wuh potau-tvi-shal, i afer-tor wuh roadway wein-tor k' terp tor deaden wuh ralash t' be' dvun-tor hali; heh s' nash, heh s' wuh nosahp t' sutra standing pa' smelling strongly t' tam'a heh naliveh, i inferred ik wuh trials vesh' fi'. Du' i glazhau pa' me la', wuh exceedingly kitork heh partially mon-tor minister t' yeht-gav ya'akash me kuv i would spo' tor ash svi' heh zhu-tor wuh trial il ni: informing me ik au kupi mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh khom shi na' ulef wuh tarkiv, whence i dang a'fic wuh bosh zan-tor t' wuh s'haile chief yeht-gav svi' ish-veh wig heh pelal, mentioning ik awful personage spo' waxwork, heh presently nufaya ish-veh na' wuh netakidau price t' leh-oh-pence. U' i declined wuh mnah fi' wuh plea t' wuh latva, au vesh' ni rom u' tor nem-tor me vi' wuh ker heh gluvaya me wilat wuh geld-stau-nentu vesh' potau, heh isha wilat sutra vesh' publicly whipped, heh yi au gluvau me wuh debtors' svep, s' if culprits sarlah tor nam-tor geldau; heightening wuh eku'ko t' ik dreadful portal k' giving me tor ken-tor ik "kehkuh fi' 'em" would sasarlah na' ik svep wuh gad po' tor-morrow na' ohkuh svi' wuh asal, tor nam-tor pustau svi' wuh zehl. Nash vesh' horrible, heh mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh sickening idea t' london; wuh weht ni u' wuh s'haile chief yeht-gav's proprietor sai-vel-tor (s' ish-veh taik ne' tor ish-veh kluf heh abru va'ashiv tor ish-veh abru'lik-handkerchief inclusive) mildewed sai-vel if had evidently ri belonged tor ish-veh originally, heh if i nem-tor ish-veh vi' t'nash-veh patam au had bought cheap t' wuh tostausu. Ne' aifa circumstances i nahp myself muhl rid t' ish-veh na' wuh shilling. I eku-tor vi' wuh office tor ya'akash kuv mr. Jaggers had sarlah svi' wi, heh i afer-tor au had ri, heh i strolled si' va'ashiv. Nash wak, i tor wuh tour t' pi' britain, heh da-tor vi' bartholomew ikap-tor; heh i' i became aware ik vath sutra vesh' waiting pa' na' mr. Jaggers, u' muhl u' i. Tra' vesh' dahkuh sasu t' tsat appearance lounging svi' bartholomew ikap-tor, heh thoughtfully fitting ish-veh ash'ya vi' wuh treshaya t' wuh pavement u' au variben teretuhr, veh t' ik leralmin-tor tor wuh vath lu au wuh'rak be' dvun-tor me, ik "jaggers would tor ish-veh kuv ish-veh vesh' tor nam-tor ovsoh." tra' vesh' wuh knot t' rehkuh sasu heh dahkuh kosu standing na' wuh teruk, heh veh t' wuh kosu vesh' maf-tor fi' ish-veh kitork shawl, heh wuh vath comforted ish-veh k' taran, u' she seshau ish-veh sha' shawl abru' ish-veh tipan, "jaggers nam-tor na' ish-veh, 'melia, heh ra weht kupi du ma?" tra' vesh' wuh yon-kur-eyed pi' jew vi sarlah vi' wuh ikap-tor du' i vesh' loitering tra', svi' apc'koik k' wuh dahr pi' jew ik au satau fi-tor wuh skrol; heh du' wuh skladasu vesh' hal-tor, i remarked nash jew, vi vesh' t' wuh highly tepor-yehat temperament, performing wuh jig t' anxiety ne' wuh ha'gelek-lehk heh accompanying himself, svi' wuh ves t' frenzy, k' wuh zhit, "o jaggerth, jaggerth, jaggerth! Ek' otherth ith cag-maggerth, mazhiv-kur-tor me jaggerth!" aifa testimonies tor wuh popularity t' t'nash-veh guardian tor wuh glu impression fi' me, heh i krol-tor heh wondered weht do ek'wak. Na' wu-vath, u' i vesh' looking si' na' wuh shek-tukh temep t' bartholomew ikap-tor vi' pi' britain, vesht gla-tor nash-veh mr. Jaggers coming mes' wuh fau-yut na' me. Ek' wuh vath vi vesh' waiting gla-tor ish-veh na' wuh ka wak, heh tra' vesh' ved wuh rush na' ish-veh. Mr. Jaggers, putting wuh el'ru fi' t'nash-veh tipan heh walking me fi' na' ish-veh vla rik' taran sovek-vel tor me, addressed himself tor ish-veh zahelsu. Wuh'rak, au nem-tor wuh dahkuh tsat sasu. "i', i ma nothing tor leralmin tor du, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, throwing ish-veh ozh na' au. "i aitlun tor fai-tor rai weht do i fai-tor. U' tor wuh result, ish-veh's wuh toss-abru. I var-tor du s' wuh wuh'rak ish-veh vesh' wuh toss-abru. Ma du vlitau wemmick?" "etek tor wuh donku abru nash asal, osu, " leralmin-tor veh t' wuh sasu, submissively, du' wuh vath perused mr. Jaggers's limuk. "i ri tor ya'akash du lu du tor ish-veh abru, il wilat, il whether du tor ish-veh abru na' ek'. Has wemmick prah ish-veh?" "ha, osu, " leralmin-tor fi' wuh sasu teretuhr. "maut muhl; yi du lau hal-tor. I', i skil-tor't ma ish-veh!" leralmin-tor mr jaggers, pral-tor ish-veh el'ru na' au tor shitau au za' ish-veh. "kuv du leralmin wuh zhit tor me, i'll lehm abru wuh nuf." "etek nahp, mr. Jaggers" veh t' wuh sasu began, pulling ska' ish-veh taik. "ik's ra i var-tor du ri tor tor, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. "du nahp! I nah-tor na' du; ik's hiyet na' du. Kuv i aitlun du, i fai-tor wilat tor talal du; i ri tor aitlun du tor talal me. I' i skil-tor't ma ish-veh. I skil-tor't zhu-tor wuh zhit." wuh dahkuh sasu glazhau na' veh wuh'ashiv u' mr. Jaggers pral-tor au za' va'ashiv, heh humbly tevan-tor pla' heh vesh' puzhu-tor rai weht. "heh i' du!" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, suddenly stopping, heh turning fi' wuh dahkuh kosu k' wuh shawls, s' ik wuh rehkuh sasu had meekly dahshau, "oh! Amelia, nam-tor ish-veh?" "ha, mr. Jaggers." "heh tor du vokau, " retorted mr. Jaggers, "ik tonk'peh na' me du wouldn't nam-tor la' heh couldn't nam-tor la'?" "o ha, osu!" sporiben fi' kosu teretuhr. "s'haile kudau du, osu, muhl etek fai-tor ik!" "yi po, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, "tor sarlah du la'?" "t'nash-veh dun, osu!" wuh maf-tor kosu pleaded. "i', i var-tor du ra!" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. "wuh'wak na' ek'. Kuv du ri tor fai-tor ik ish-veh dun's svi' rom el'ru, i fai-tor ish-veh. Heh kuv sarlah du la' bothering pa' ish-veh dun, i'll tor wuh li-fal t' fi' ish-veh dun heh du, heh kal-tor ish-veh trel k'fai t'nash-veh ozh. Ma du vlitau wemmick?" "o ha, osu! Kanok farden." "maut muhl. Yi du ma ovsoh ek' du ma prah tor tor. Leralmin wuh'ashiv wordone single wordand wemmick dungau mazhiv-kur-tor du ish-veh donku pla'." nash terrible nan aisha wuh dahkuh kosu tor tevan ska' iyi. Rai veh hafau i' tonk'peh wuh tepor-yehat jew, vi had already ashenau wuh skirts t' mr. Jaggers's tor-pal tor ish-veh bru-lar several wak. "i ri tor fai-tor nash sasu!" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, svi' wuh ka devastating ish-veh: "ra tor nash katravahsu aitlun?" "ma thear mithter jaggerth. Hown sa-kai tor habraham latharuth?" "vi's au?" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. "kal-tor hal-tor t' t'nash-veh tor-pal." wuh suitor, kissing wuh hem t' wuh ain va'ashiv fa' relinquishing ish-veh, kilko-tor, "habraham latharuth, fi' thuthpithion t' math." "du're nuh' tab-ma, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. "i am abru' wuh yut." "vai sa-mekh, mithter jaggerth!" maf-tor t'nash-veh tepor-yehat acquaintance, turning wan-kur, "ri tor thay du're va'ashiv habraham latharuth!" "i am, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, "heh tra''s wuh shaht t' ish-veh. Prah s' wuh yut." "mithter jaggerth! Ulef wuh moment! T'nash-veh hown cuthen'th hal-tor tor mithter wemmick na' thith prethent minute, tor hoffer ish-veh hany termth. Mithter jaggerth! Ulef wuh yonuk t' wuh moment! Kuv du'd ma wuh condethenthun tor nam-tor bought ska' s' wuh t'vath thideat hany thuperior prithe!donku rai vel!mithter jaggerthmithter!" t'nash-veh guardian threw ish-veh supplicant ska' k' supreme indifference, heh losrak ish-veh taman fi' wuh pavement u' kuv ish-veh vesh' yon-kur fal. Rik' further svi-shaya, etek pulau wuh khom office, wilat etek afer-tor wuh clerk heh wuh sasu svi' velveteen k' wuh ausachya taik. "la''s mike, " leralmin-tor wuh clerk, getting ne' s' ish-veh stool, heh approaching mr. Jaggers confidentially. "oh!" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, turning tor wuh sasu, vi vesh' pulling wuh klachek t' isachya svi' wuh svitan t' ish-veh fa-patam, spo' wuh bull svi' cock kushel pulling na' wuh kus-vakh-man-elakh; "ish-veh sasu sarlah fi' nash aru. Muhl?" "muhl, mas'r jaggers, " fun-tor mike, svi' wuh spes t' wuh sufferer s' wuh constitutional samu; "arter wuh deal o' trouble, i've afer-tor veh, osu, u' lau tor." "ra nam-tor au dator tor swear?" "muhl, mas'r jaggers, " leralmin-tor mike, psethau ish-veh han fi' ish-veh ausachya taik nash wak; "svi' wuh paik yut, anythink." mr. Jaggers suddenly became danik irate. "i', i vikau du fa', " leralmin-tor au, throwing ish-veh kehr-oth na' wuh terrified client, "ik kuv du ek'wak presumed tor variben svi' ik yut la', i'd tor wuh li-fal t' du. Du infernal scoundrel, uf dare du var-tor me ik?" wuh client glazhau pahth-tor, tonk'peh bewildered nuh', u' kuv au vesh' unconscious ra au had ovsoh. "spooney!" leralmin-tor wuh clerk, svi' wuh neik spes, giving ish-veh wuh stir k' ish-veh kar-nef. "mos patam! Bolaya du leralmin ish-veh limuk tor limuk?" "i', i ya'akash du, du blundering booby, " leralmin-tor t'nash-veh guardian, maut sternly, "wuh'wak weht heh na' wuh kim-shah wak, ra wuh sasu du ma katau la' nam-tor dator tor swear?" mike glazhau lerash na' t'nash-veh guardian, u' kuv au vesh' trying tor oren-tor wuh tupa s' ish-veh limuk, heh slowly kilko-tor, "ayther tor character, il tor having vesh' svi' ish-veh apc'koik heh worla losrak ish-veh ek' wuh mu-yor svi' deshker." "i', nam-tor tun-bosh. Svi' ra wurzel t' ha'kiv nam-tor nash sasu?" mike glazhau na' ish-veh taik, heh glazhau na' wuh lan-tol, heh glazhau na' wuh abru-tol, heh glazhau na' wuh clerk, heh kauk glazhau na' me, fa' palikaya tor kilko svi' wuh nervous manner, "etek've sai-vel-tor ish-veh abru spo'" lu t'nash-veh guardian blustered si', "ra? Du dungi, dungi du?" ("spooney!" hau wuh clerk va'ashiv, k' wuh'ashiv stir.) po' ein helpless casting pa', mike brightened heh began va'ashiv: "au nam-tor sai-vel-tor spo' wuh 'spectable pieman. Wuh wihfelau t' wuh pastry-fas-tor." "nam-tor au la'?" ya'akash t'nash-veh guardian. "i losrak ish-veh, " leralmin-tor mike, "wuh setting fi' ein svep-ashef pauk wuh teruk." "nem-tor ish-veh vesht ik krani, heh kal-tor me gla-tor ish-veh." wuh krani indicated vesh' wuh office krani. Etek ek' rehkuh went tor ish-veh, za' wuh raf-elakh glan-fam, heh presently gla-tor wuh client hal-tor k' svi' wuh ur'kif manner, k' wuh murderous-looking ha-vol wuhsu, svi' wuh pen saikhut t' wan-kur linen heh wuh dun taik. Nash guileless confectioner vesh' ri k' sovek tvai sober, heh had wuh nesh-kur bezhun svi' wuh yar-kur skaf t' recovery, if vesh' kras-tor abru'. "var-tor ish-veh tor nem-tor ish-veh toglantausu maf directly, " leralmin-tor t'nash-veh guardian tor wuh clerk, svi' mairik spa'ash, "heh ya'akash ish-veh ra au tvai k' bringing such wuh katravahsu u' ik." t'nash-veh guardian yi nem-tor me vi' ish-veh sha' tvi-shal, heh du' au lunched, standing, s' wuh sandwich-natuhn heh wuh abru'lik-mashek t' sherry (au seemed tor bully ish-veh maut sandwich u' au ate ish-veh), informed me ra arrangements au had tor na' me. I vesh' tor hal-tor tor "barnard's ha-shal, " tor nu'ri mr. Abru'lik's tvi-shal, wilat wuh sar-tak had vesh' satau svi' na' t'nash-veh accommodation; i vesh' tor hafau k' nu'ri mr. Abru'lik abi' gad; fi' gad i vesh' tor hal-tor k' ish-veh tor ish-veh sa-mekh's kelek fi' wuh yaret, ik i lau ar'kadan uf i tishau ish-veh. Isha, i vesh' var-tor ra t'nash-veh allowance vesh' tor nam-tor, ish-veh vesh' wuh maut liberal veh, heh had handed tor me s' veh t' t'nash-veh guardian's zish-nef, wuh nop t' ac'ruth tradesmen k' ik i vesh' tor deal na' ek' ves t' sai-vel, heh such vath vel u' i kupi svi' utvau aitlun. "du dungi talal ish-veh lit rom, mr. Pip, " leralmin-tor t'nash-veh guardian, t'vi mashek t' sherry smelt spo' wuh bosh caskful, u' au hastily uzhau himself, "tonk'peh i dungau k' nash tvai nam-tor kup tor rihamau ish-veh dun, heh tor seshaya du abru kuv i talal du outrunning wuh constable. Veling du'll hal-tor riyeht somehow, tonk'peh ik's rai lafot t' t'nash-veh." po' i had pondered wuh pi' abru' nash encouraging sentiment, i ya'akash mr. Jaggers kuv i kupi satau na' wuh coach? Au leralmin-tor ish-veh vesh' ri don du', i vesh' ni be' t'nash-veh destination; wemmick dang lates pauk k' me, kuv i sanoi. I yi afer-tor ik wemmick vesh' wuh clerk svi' wuh thurai tvi-shal. Wuh'ashiv clerk vesh' rung ne' s' upstairs tor nem-tor ish-veh shi du' au vesh' si', heh i accompanied ish-veh vi' wuh yut, po' shaking el'ru k' t'nash-veh guardian. Etek afer-tor wuh uzh eku t' sutra svizh-tor s'udish, tonk'peh wemmick tor wuh yut ekhlami k' taran coolly wi decisively, "i var-tor du ish-veh's rai nam-tor-tor; au skil-tor't ma wuh zhit tor leralmin tor veh t' du; " heh etek ak prah pa'shik t' au, heh went fi' vla k' vla. Chapter xxi. Casting t'nash-veh bezhun fi' mr. Wemmick u' etek went bi', tor gla-tor ra au vesh' spo' svi' wuh ta'hal t' gad, i afer-tor ish-veh tor nam-tor wuh pseth sasu, rather pen svi' stature, k' wuh keh-vla wooden limuk, t'vi sagluvaya seemed ki' vesh' imperfectly chipped si' k' wuh pasik-rihkau chisel. Tra' vesh' ein ulidar svi' ish-veh ik lau ma vesh' dimples, kuv wuh tukh had vesh' softer heh wuh instrument finer, tonk'peh if, u' ish-veh vesh', vesh' goh dints. Wuh chisel had tor rehkuh il kehkuh t' aifa attempts na' embellishment abru' ish-veh han, tonk'peh had putan-tor au abru rik' wuh urgam tor mos au ska'. I judged ish-veh tor nam-tor wuh bachelor s' wuh shrau nosh t' ish-veh linen, heh au saudau ki' potun-tor wuh rom wehk bereavements; na' au sai-vel-tor k'puu kehkuh mourning mokov, isha wuh brooch representing wuh t'sai heh wuh weeping willow na' wuh braq k' wuh urn fi' ish-veh. I pubeglanau, nuh', ik several mokov heh fen-tor geldau na' ish-veh glantau-naf-elakh, u' kuv au vesh' ved laden k' remembrances t' trashu t'hylara. Au had glittering bezhun, pi', keen, heh nesh-kur, heh wonil eik mottled bru-lar. Au had had au, tor wuh buhfik t' t'nash-veh dva, s' keh-leh tor kau-leh tevun. "ni du vesh' worla svi' london fa'?" leralmin-tor mr. Wemmick tor me. "rai, " leralmin-tor i. "i vesh' uzh la' wuh'wak, " leralmin-tor mr. Wemmick. "rum tor nah-tor t' i'!" "du nam-tor muhl acquainted k' ish-veh i'?" "po, ha, " leralmin-tor mr. Wemmick. "i fai-tor wuh dvun-tor t' ish-veh." "nam-tor ish-veh wuh maut wicked shi?" i ya'akash, weht na' wuh sake t' taran vel do na' ro'fori. "du lau prah kravau, robbed, heh riyeht-stau svi' london. Tonk'peh tra' nam-tor plenty t' sutra sovek-wilat, vi'll tor ik na' du." "kuv tra' nam-tor rasahkos khaf svi' du heh au, " leralmin-tor i, tor soften ish-veh ska' wuh pi'. "o! I ri tor fai-tor pa' rasahkos khaf, " fun-tor mr. Wemmick; "tra''s ri mau rasahkos khaf pa'. Au'll tor ish-veh, kuv tra''s sovek-vel tor nam-tor panavau ish-veh." "ik tor ish-veh weh-rasahkos." "du nah-tor ni?" fun-tor mr. Wemmick. "mau pa' wuh ka, i dang leralmin." au sai-vel-tor ish-veh taik fi' wuh pla' t' ish-veh patam, heh glazhau zehik fa' ish-veh: walking svi' wuh shal-tuhlau yut u' kuv tra' vesh' nothing svi' wuh yut tor claim ish-veh attention. Ish-veh ru'lut vesh' such wuh lehk-office t' wuh ru'lut ik au had wuh mechanical appearance t' smiling. Etek had prah tor wuh fik t' holborn kunel fa' i fai-tor ik ish-veh vesh' goh wuh mechanical appearance, heh ik au vesh' ri smiling na' ek'. "tor du fai-tor wilat mr. Matthew abru'lik ha-tor?" i ya'akash mr. Wemmick. "ha, " leralmin-tor au, nodding svi' wuh kharat. "na' hammersmith, tev'rak t' london." "nam-tor ik irak?" "muhl! Leralmin kaukuh miles." "tor du fai-tor ish-veh?" "po, du're wuh regular tuhs-examiner!" leralmin-tor mr. Wemmick, looking na' me k' wuh approving sov. "ha, i fai-tor ish-veh. I fai-tor ish-veh!" tra' vesh' wuh sov t' toleration il depreciation pa' ish-veh utterance t' aifa zhit ik rather depressed me; heh i vesh' fam dvun looking sideways na' ish-veh vihpan t' wuh limuk svi' psthan t' sovek encouraging pitoh tor wuh text, lu au leralmin-tor la' etek vesh' na' barnard's ha-shal. T'nash-veh neik-shal vesh' ri alleviated k' wuh announcement, na', i had supposed ik establishment tor nam-tor wuh hotel potau k' mr. Barnard, tor if wuh pla-kur boar svi' etwel kahr vesh' wuh mere tsuri-kelek. Whereas i i' afer-tor barnard tor nam-tor wuh savukhutik tam'a, il wuh glenokitau-tanaf, heh ish-veh ha-shal wuh dingiest tershaya t' shabby kelek ek'wak lerakhovau teretuhr svi' wuh lan teruk u' wuh muhd na' tom-aushfa. Etek svi-tor nash haven k'fai wuh wicket-temep, heh vesh' disgorged k' wuh introductory tvur vi' wuh melancholy pi' keh-vla ik glazhau tor me spo' wuh pa'ash burying-solektra. I nahp ish-veh had wuh danik dismal lap svi' ish-veh, heh wuh danik dismal sparrows, heh wuh danik dismal aushfa, heh wuh danik dismal kelek (svi' su'etek ulef wuh dozen il ni), ik i had ek'wak gla-tor. I nahp wuh krani t' wuh dvolau t' tvi-shal vi' if eifa kelek vesh' dahsau vesh' svi' kanok skaf t' dilapidated glan-fam heh curtain, crippled svai-sunil, treshau makh, grazhiv nehaya, heh miserable makeshift; du' tor kal-tor, tor kal-tor, tor kal-tor, glared na' me s' herbosh tvi-shal, u' kuv rai uzh wretches ek'wak sarlah tra', heh wuh vengeance t' wuh soul t' barnard vesh' hasu slowly appeased k' wuh gradual suicide t' wuh la' occupants heh ish-veh unholy interment ne' wuh krus-kov. Wuh frowzy mourning t' soot heh vuzh attired nash forlorn fereikan t' barnard, heh ish-veh had strewn vitush fi' its patam, heh vesh' undergoing penance heh humiliation u' wuh mere grazhiv-razh. Thus irak t'nash-veh kash-ral t' glan; du' pseth nehaya heh masupik nehaya heh ek' wuh ralash-fam nehau ik nehaya svi' neglected kamu heh cellar, nehaya t' rat heh aushfa heh bug heh coaching-stables be' na' el'ru besidesaddressed themselves faintly tor t'nash-veh kash-ral t' fnish-tor, heh nau, "ar'kadan barnard's rish." ni imperfect vesh' nash realisation t' wuh wuh'rak t' t'nash-veh lo'uk gishat, ik i glazhau svi' dismay na' mr. Wemmick. "ah!" leralmin-tor au, mistaking me; "wuh retirement reminds du t' wuh shasol. Ni ish-veh tor me." au pufulag-tor me vi' wuh teruk heh conducted me abru wuh hash t' kaiden, if saudau tor me tor nam-tor slowly collapsing vi' sawdust, ni ish-veh t' eifa gad wuh upper lodgers would glazhau si' na' ish-veh svep heh talal themselves rik' wuh tvai t' coming ne', tor wuh eku t' tvi-shal fi' wuh fik lan-tol. Mr. Abru'lik, jun, vesh' kras-tor fi' wuh svep, heh tra' vesh' wuh label fi' wuh nuhm-natuhn, "fun shortly." "au hardly nahp du'd sarlah ni ak, " mr. Wemmick danau. "du ri tor aitlun me sovek weht?" "rai, nemaiyo, " leralmin-tor i. "u' i potau wuh cash, " mr. Wemmick glantau, "etek dungau danik kesik ragel-tor takov k'ashiv. Rom gad." "rom gad." i shitau si' t'nash-veh el'ru, heh mr. Wemmick palikauk glazhau na' ish-veh u' kuv au nahp i aitlu vel. Yi au glazhau na' me, heh leralmin-tor, correcting himself, "tor nam-tor sure! Ha. Du're svi' wuh es'merka t' shaking el'ru?" i vesh' rather confused, thinking ish-veh bolau nam-tor s' wuh london fashion, tonk'peh leralmin-tor ha. "i ma prah ni s' ish-veh!" leralmin-tor mr. Wemmick, "kaula na' kim-shah. Maut glad, i'm sure, tor tor ish-veh acquaintance. Rom gad!" lu etek had shaken el'ru heh au vesh' hal-tor, i tu'ash wuh staircase krani heh had nearly beheaded myself, na', wuh zehl had nehau maf, heh ish-veh sarlah ne' spo' wuh guillotine. Kunling ish-veh vesh' ni sahris ik i had ri shitau t'nash-veh patam si'. Po' nash stron, i vesh' content tor nem-tor wuh ihsekweik zan-tor t' wuh ha-shal k'fai wuh krani's encrusting kitek, heh tor lamok dolefully looking si', taran tor myself ik london vesh' decidedly overrated. Mr. Abru'lik, junior's, idea t' shortly vesh' ri t'nash-veh, na' i had nearly maddened myself k' looking si' na' ulef wuh wadan, heh had written t'nash-veh ahm k' t'nash-veh ozh several wak svi' wuh kitek t' kanok pane svi' wuh krani, fa' i puzhu-tor footsteps fi' wuh kaiden. Gradually tra' arose fa' me wuh taik, patam, neckcloth, waistcoat, malanu, kluf, t' wuh kisau t' shila'es t' pa' t'nash-veh sha' standing. Au had wuh dun-sa'haf ne' tik kar heh wuh pottle t' strawberries svi' veh el'ru, heh vesh' s' esh. "mr. Pip?" leralmin-tor au. "mr. Abru'lik?" leralmin-tor i. "tal-kam me!" au sporiben. "i am extremely sorry; tonk'peh i fai-tor tra' vesh' wuh coach s' ish-veh krus t' wuh shasol na' midday, heh i nahp du would sarlah k' ish-veh. Wuh kla-min nam-tor, i ma vesh' si' fi' ish-veh khrosahp, ri ik ik nam-tor sovek tobeg, na' i nahp, coming s' wuh shasol, du lau spo' wuh pi' savas po' aru-yem, heh i went tor covent bah-ker mahr-kel tor prah ish-veh rom." na' wuh utvau ik i had, i olau u' kuv t'nash-veh bezhun would palikaya s' t'nash-veh patam. I nafai ish-veh attention incoherently, heh began tor nah-tor nash vesh' wuh sahr-tor. "tal-kam me!" leralmin-tor mr. Abru'lik, junior. "nash svep terpau ni!" u' au vesh' sahris tor khlup t' ish-veh savas k' wrestling k' wuh svep du' wuh dun-sa'haf vesh' ne' ish-veh kar, i eit'jae ish-veh tor kal-tor me tor meskaraya au. Au relinquished au k' wuh agreeable abru'teruklar-ru'lut, heh combated k' wuh svep u' kuv ish-veh vesh' wuh kwai beast. Ish-veh yielded ni suddenly na' kim-shah, ik au staggered pla' fi-tor me, heh i staggered pla' fi-tor wuh mesyutik svep, heh etek fi' abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor. Tonk'peh fam dvun i olau u' kuv t'nash-veh bezhun bolau palikaya s' t'nash-veh patam, heh u' kuv nash bolau nam-tor wuh sahr-tor. "pray sarlah svi', " leralmin-tor mr. Abru'lik, junior. "kal-tor me tor ras-tukh wuh yut. I am rather sai-famik la', tonk'peh i rok du'll nam-tor kup tor tor si' tolerably muhl till gad. T'nash-veh sa-mekh nahp du would prah fi' weht agreeably k'fai tor-morrow k' me do k' ish-veh, heh lau spo' tor nem-tor wuh lates pa' london. I am sure i dungau nam-tor maut kunli tor gluvaya london tor du. U' tor etwel pasu, du skil-tor't talal ik rasahkos, i rok, na' ish-veh dungi nam-tor tanilau s' etwel mon-kelek la', heh (ish-veh nam-tor goh gas'rak i dang hau) na' ish-veh kodona, such hasu mr. Jaggers's kharat. U' tor etwel lodging, ish-veh's ri k' sovek tvai splendid, fai'ei i ma t'nash-veh sha' kap tor pinkau, heh t'nash-veh sa-mekh hasn't sovek-vel tor mazhiv-kur-tor me, heh i shouldn't nam-tor willing tor nem-tor ish-veh, kuv au had. Nash nam-tor etwel sitting-tvi-shal, aishan such ku-san heh pasu heh la'y heh ni forth, gla-tor du, u' au kupi spare s' ha-kel. Du mustn't mazhiv-kur-tor me lit na' wuh tablecloth heh floku heh castors, fai'ei sarlah au na' du s' wuh mon-kelek. Nash nam-tor t'nash-veh pi' shi'yuk; rather musty, tonk'peh barnard's nam-tor musty. Nash nam-tor ish-veh shi'yuk; wuh furniture's hired na' wuh occasion, tonk'peh i sahrafel ish-veh dungi kilko-srashiv wuh lof; kuv du dang aitlun sovek-vel, i'll hal-tor heh zaprah ish-veh. Wuh tvi-shal nam-tor retired, heh etek dungau nam-tor sa'awek teretuhr, tonk'peh etek shan't puk, i dare leralmin. Tonk'peh tal-kam me, i eit'jae ish-veh pardon, du're holding wuh savas ek' nash wak. Pray kal-tor me nem-tor aifa sa'haf s' du. I am ved kafusik." u' i lam-tor mesyutik tor mr. Abru'lik, junior, delivering ish-veh wuh sa'haf, veh, dahkuh, vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh starting appearance sarlah vi' ish-veh sha' bezhun ik i fai-tor tor nam-tor svi' t'nash-veh, heh au leralmin-tor, tevan-tor pla', "s'haile kudau me, du're wuh prowling sa-kan!" "heh du, " leralmin-tor i, "nam-tor wuh spoh nu'ri gentleman!" chapter xxii. Wuh spoh nu'ri gentleman heh i lam-tor contemplating veh wuh'ashiv svi' barnard's ha-shal, abi' etek fi' thorau si' laughing. "wuh idea t' its hasu du!" leralmin-tor au. "wuh idea t' its hasu du!" leralmin-tor i. Heh yi etek contemplated veh wuh'ashiv afresh, heh abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor va'ashiv. "muhl!" leralmin-tor wuh spoh nu'ri gentleman, reaching si' ish-veh el'ru rom-humouredly, "ish-veh's ek' abru' i', i rok, heh ish-veh dungi nam-tor magnanimous svi' du kuv du'll forgive me na' having knocked du pa' ni." i derived s' nash starun ik mr. Herbert abru'lik (na' herbert vesh' wuh spoh nu'ri gentleman's ahm) fam dvun rather confounded ish-veh intention k' ish-veh execution. Tonk'peh i tor wuh modest kilko, heh etek hutau el'ru warmly. "du hadn't sarlah vi' ish-veh rom fortune na' ik wak?" leralmin-tor herbert abru'lik. "rai, " leralmin-tor i. "rai, " au acquiesced: "i puzhu-tor ish-veh had pavesh-tor maut lately. I vesh' rather fi' wuh lookout na' rom fortune yi." "indeed?" "ha. Din-tor havisham had satau na' me, tor gla-tor kuv she kupi nem-tor wuh fancy tor me. Tonk'peh she couldn't, na' ek' pavek, she didn't." i nahp ish-veh polite tor remark ik i vesh' ak'wikmun tor zhu-tor ik. "rasahkos zahvan, " leralmin-tor herbert, laughing, "tonk'peh wuh kla-min. Ha, she had satau na' me fi' wuh trial yaret, heh kuv i had sasarlah t' ish-veh successfully, i suppose i dang ma vesh' tanilau na'; sos'eh i dang ma vesh' ra-du-lau-puvutau ish-veh tor estella." "ra's ik?" i ya'akash, k' sudden ne-seshan. Au vesh' arranging ish-veh savas svi' math du' etek variben, if dahsau ish-veh attention, heh vesh' wuh aishan t' ish-veh having tor nash lapse t' wuh zhit. "affianced, " au danau, fam dvun toranik k' wuh savas. "betrothed. Engaged. Ra's-ish-veh-ahmau. Sovek zhit t' ik wihfelau." "uf did du lesh ish-veh disappointment?" i ya'akash. "pooh!" leralmin-tor au, "i didn't tun mau na' ish-veh. She's wuh tartar." "din-tor havisham?" "i ri tor leralmin rai tor ik, tonk'peh i tvai estella. Ik ko-kan's lerash heh haughty heh capricious tor wuh kim-shah degree, heh has vesh' katau abru k' din-tor havisham tor wreak revenge fi' ek' wuh sa guv." "ra relation nam-tor she tor din-tor havisham?" "rim, " leralmin-tor au. "goh thanai." "po dang she wreak revenge fi' ek' wuh sa guv? Ra revenge?" "s'haile, mr. Pip!" leralmin-tor au. "ri tor du fai-tor?" "rai, " leralmin-tor i. "tal-kam me! Ish-veh's ved wuh var, heh dungau nam-tor korsau till aru-yem-wak. Heh i' kal-tor me nem-tor wuh liberty t' asking du wuh deshker. Uf did sarlah du tra', ik gad?" i var-tor ish-veh, heh au vesh' whio'naks abi' i had shahtau, heh yi thorau si' laughing va'ashiv, heh ya'akash me kuv i vesh' sival afterwards? I didn't ya'akash ish-veh kuv au vesh', na' t'nash-veh conviction fi' ik sfek vesh' perfectly afer-tor. "mr. Jaggers nam-tor ish-veh guardian, i ken-tor?" au went fi'. "ha." "du fai-tor au nam-tor din-tor havisham's sasu t' business heh solicitor, heh has ish-veh guhl'es lu kling else has?" nash vesh' bringing me (i olau) na' tehvar-bosh solektra. I kilko-tor k' wuh constraint i tor rai attempt tor pasut, ik i had gla-tor mr. Jaggers svi' din-tor havisham's kelek fi' wuh maut gad t' etwel morov, tonk'peh worla na' sovek vath wak, heh ik i pudva-tor au had rai recollection t' having ek'wak gla-tor me tra'. "au vesh' ni obliging u' tor suggest t'nash-veh sa-mekh na' ish-veh tutor, heh au puvutau fi' t'nash-veh sa-mekh tor propose ish-veh. Veling au fai-tor pa' t'nash-veh sa-mekh s' ish-veh tersaya k' din-tor havisham. T'nash-veh sa-mekh nam-tor din-tor havisham's krei; ri ik ik implies familiar intercourse svi' au, na' au nam-tor wuh rasahkos courtier heh dungi ri propitiate ish-veh." herbert abru'lik had wuh frank heh hagik yut k' ish-veh ik vesh' maut taking. I had worla gla-tor sovek veh yi, heh i ma worla gla-tor sovek veh opi', vi weht strongly sagluvau tor me, svi' kanok glazhau heh molu, wuh malatik incapacity tor tor sovek-vel tsat heh tvai. Tra' vesh' vel wonderfully hopeful pa' ish-veh paik sov, heh vel ik na' wuh ka wak zhal-tor tor me au would worla nam-tor maut successful il don-ka. I ri tor fai-tor uf nash vesh'. I became imbued k' wuh notion fi' ik wuh'rak occasion fa' etek hayal-tor ne' tor aru-yem, tonk'peh i fam yehat mesprah k' ra tvai. Au vesh' fam dvun wuh spoh nu'ri gentleman, heh had wuh ac'ruth conquered languor pa' ish-veh svi' wuh midst t' ish-veh tam'a heh briskness, ik did ri seem indicative t' malatik karik'es. Au had ri wuh handsome limuk, tonk'peh ish-veh vesh' weh-rom do handsome: hasu extremely amiable heh cheerful. Ish-veh khlop vesh' wuh pi' ungainly, u' svi' wuh gad lu t'nash-veh ozh-lesek had taken such liberties k' ish-veh, tonk'peh ish-veh glazhau u' kuv ish-veh would kwon-hau-ov nam-tor ta'hal heh nu'ri. Whether mr.
