Trabb's local ar'kadan would ma hayal-tor weht gracefully fi' ish-veh do fi' me, lau nam-tor wuh deshker; tonk'peh i am d'wonil ik au lesh ska' ish-veh rather hinek sai-vel mau weh-rom do i lesh ska' t'nash-veh uzh saikhut. U' au vesh' ni communicative, i olau ik reserve fi' t'nash-veh krus would nam-tor wuh rasahkos fun unsuited tor etwel tevun. I therefore var-tor ish-veh t'nash-veh pi' var, heh laid hishel fi' t'nash-veh hasu zadik tor inquire vi t'nash-veh benefactor vesh'. I further mentioned ik u' i had vesh' katau abru wuh shek-zhuksu svi' wuh shasol shi, heh fai-tor maut pi' t' wuh yut t' politeness, i would nem-tor ish-veh u' wuh lo'uk kindness svi' ish-veh kuv au would mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh hint whenever gla-tor ish-veh me na' wuh pak il going riyeht. "k' sanosh, " leralmin-tor au, "hi i venture tor prophesy ik du'll aitlun maut zamu hints. I dare leralmin etek dungau nam-tor k'ashiv teretuhr, heh i dang spo' tor sahaisau sovek needless restraint svi' etek. Dungi du tor me wuh favour tor palikau na' wuh'wak tor vutau me k' t'nash-veh christian ahm, herbert?" i itaren ish-veh heh leralmin-tor i would. I informed ish-veh svi' di'kizh ik t'nash-veh christian ahm vesh' philip. "i ri tor nem-tor tor philip, " leralmin-tor au, smiling, "na' ish-veh sounds spo' wuh moral sa-kan s' wuh spelling-dunap, vi vesh' ni kas'el ik au tevan-tor vi' wuh muzh, il ni thelik ik au couldn't gla-tor s' ish-veh bezhun, il ni avaricious ik au klacha abru ish-veh cake till wuh aushfa ate ish-veh, il ni satalau tor hal-tor wuh kushel's-nesting ik au prah himself yokul k' bears vi ha-tor handy svi' wuh neighbourhood. I var-tor du ra i dang spo'. Etek nam-tor ni harmonious, heh du ma vesh' wuh shek-zhuksu, would du kashek ish-veh?" "i shouldn't kashek sovek-vel ik du propose, " i kilko-tor, "tonk'peh i ri tor ken-tor du." "would du kashek handel na' wuh familiar ahm? Tra''s wuh sem-rik-tor krus t' ralash-tanaf k' handel, puvutau wuh harmonious shek-zhuksu." "i dang spo' ish-veh maut mau." "yi, t'nash-veh tal-kam handel, " leralmin-tor au, turning pauk u' wuh svep tu'ash, "la' nam-tor wuh aru-yem, heh i bolau eit'jae t' du tor nem-tor wuh fik t' wuh pasu, fai'ei wuh aru-yem nam-tor t' ish-veh providing." nash i would ri zhu-tor t', ni au nem-tor wuh fik, heh i limuk-tor ish-veh. Ish-veh vesh' wuh nice pi' aru-yem, seemed tor me yi wuh maut s'haile mayor's gadzhak, heh ish-veh acquired hayaik relish s' hasu yokul ne' eifa independent circumstances, k' rai hinek sutra k', heh k' london ek' pa' etek. Nash va'ashiv vesh' heightened k' wuh ac'ruth gypsy character ik eku wuh banquet ska'; na' du' wuh pasu vesh', u' mr. Pumblechook lau ma leralmin-tor, wuh lap t' luxury, hasu entirely furnished forth s' wuh mon-kelek, wuh circumjacent shal t' sitting-tvi-shal vesh' t' wuh comparatively pastureless heh shifty character; imposing fi' wuh waiter wuh wandering es'merka t' putting wuh wein-tor fi' wuh lan-tol (wilat au tevan-tor abru' au), wuh klimtau butter svi' wuh kar-ku-san, wuh kap fi' wuh bookshelves, wuh thuhk svi' wuh kastik-kov-scuttle, heh wuh kan-tor kushel vi' t'nash-veh sar-tak svi' wuh thurai tvi-shal, wilat i afer-tor mau t' its parsley heh butter svi' wuh fupa s' t' congelation lu i retired na' wuh mu-yor. Ek' nash tor wuh gadzhak delightful, heh lu wuh waiter vesh' ri tra' tor glantau me, t'nash-veh sanosh vesh' rik' rish-mokev. Etek had tor ein progress svi' wuh aru-yem, lu i reminded herbert t' ish-veh ugaya tor var-tor me pa' din-tor havisham. "yeht, " au kilko-tor. "i'll redeem ish-veh na' wuh'wak. Kal-tor me ragtau wuh ong, handel, k' mentioning ik svi' london ish-veh nam-tor ri wuh custom tor shitau wuh lipau svi' wuh ru'lut, na' pthak t' kisheya, heh ik du' wuh snauk nam-tor reserved na' ik nam-tor-tor, ish-veh nam-tor ri shitau further svi' do bolayatik. Ish-veh nam-tor scarcely don mentioning, goh ish-veh's u' muhl tor tor u' vath sutra tor. Isha, wuh floku nam-tor ri paik nam-tor-tor abru'-el'ru, tonk'peh ne'. Nash has dahkuh advantages. Du prah na' ish-veh ru'lut weh-rom (if po' ek' nam-tor wuh vel), heh du korsau wuh rom deal t' wuh attitude t' sharu oysters, fi' wuh krus t' wuh gas'rak kar-nef." au nufau aifa friendly suggestions svi' such wuh lively yut, ik etek fi' abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor heh i scarcely blushed. "i', " au pursued, "fundik din-tor havisham. Din-tor havisham, du bolau fai-tor, vesh' wuh spoilt kan. Ish-veh ko-mekh tev-tor lu she vesh' wuh kan-bu, heh ish-veh sa-mekh wafu ish-veh nothing. Ish-veh sa-mekh vesh' wuh shasol gentleman ne' svi' ish-veh krus t' wuh panu, heh vesh' wuh brewer. I ri tor fai-tor po ish-veh dang nam-tor wuh treshaya vel tor nam-tor wuh brewer; tonk'peh ish-veh nam-tor indisputable ik du' du fam yehat possibly nam-tor genteel heh leipau, du lau nam-tor u' genteel u' worla vesh' heh fas-tor. Gla-tor du ish-veh kanok gad." "wi wuh gentleman lau ri potau wuh tsuri-kelek; lau au?" leralmin-tor i. "ri fi' sovek khrosahp, " fun-tor herbert; "tonk'peh wuh tsuri-kelek lau potau wuh gentleman. Muhl! Mr. Havisham vesh' maut don-ka heh maut yaut. Ni vesh' ish-veh ko-fu." "din-tor havisham vesh' wuh goh kan?" i hazarded. "pehkaya wuh moment, vesht sarlah nash-veh tor ik. Rai, she vesh' ri wuh goh kan; she had wuh ulef-sa-kai. Ish-veh sa-mekh privately telik againhis fas-tor, i rather nah-tor." "i nahp au vesh' yaut, " leralmin-tor i. "t'nash-veh rom handel, ni au vesh'. Au telik ish-veh dahr ko-telsu privately, fai'ei au vesh' yaut, heh svi' rivak t' wak she tev-tor. Lu she vesh' tevik, i apprehend au wuh'rak var-tor ish-veh ko-fu ra au had ovsoh, heh yi wuh sa-fu became wuh krus t' wuh skan, residing svi' wuh kelek du nam-tor acquainted k'. U' wuh sa-fu grew wuh nu'ri sasu, au da-tor si' riotous, madonik, undutiful, altogether rasahkos. Na' kim-shah ish-veh sa-mekh disinherited ish-veh; tonk'peh au softened lu au vesh' dying, heh losrak ish-veh muhl ska', hi ri nearly ni muhl ska' u' din-tor havisham. Nem-tor wuh'ashiv makh t' wine, heh tobeg t'nash-veh mentioning ik shila'es u' wuh ak'shem tor ri gish veh tor nam-tor ni strictly conscientious svi' emptying veh's makh, u' tor da-tor ish-veh lanet abru'le k' wuh rim fi' veh's han." i had vesh' doing nash, svi' wuh mau-mazhiv-kur t' attention tor ish-veh recital. I itaren ish-veh, heh apologised. Au leralmin-tor, "mokov, " heh resumed. "din-tor havisham vesh' i' wuh heiress, heh du lau suppose vesh' glazhau po' u' wuh lo'uk match. Ish-veh ulef-sa-kai had i' ample tvai va'ashiv, tonk'peh ra k' sa'akh heh ra k' uzh ni-resh thinoi au danik fearfully va'ashiv. Tra' vesh' stronger natyan svi' ish-veh heh ish-veh do tra' had vesh' svi' ish-veh heh ish-veh sa-mekh, heh ish-veh nam-tor suspected ik au tishaya wuh glu heh mortal grudge tehnat ish-veh u' having vi-yumuk wuh sa-mekh's reshan. I', sarlah nash-veh tor wuh pi-maat'rer krus t' wuh var, goh breaking ska', t'nash-veh tal-kam handel, tor remark ik wuh aru-yem-ru'lut-sai dungi ri hal-tor vi' wuh tumbler." po i vesh' trying tor sa'haf t'nash-veh vi' t'nash-veh tumbler, i am wholly unable tor leralmin. I goh fai-tor ik i afer-tor myself, k' wuh perseverance worthy t' wuh mau weh-rom aishan, tor wuh danik strenuous pideshan tor lerakhovau ish-veh k'svi eifa grei. Va'ashiv i itaren ish-veh heh apologised, heh va'ashiv au leralmin-tor svi' wuh cheerfullest manner, "mokov, i am sure!" heh resumed. "tra' saudau fi-tor wuh scenesay na' wuh ne-koshtri, il wuh tsuri rin'k'n, il sovek-wilat else du likea ac'ruth sasu, vi tor ashaya tor din-tor havisham. I worla gla-tor ish-veh (na' nash pavesh-tor kaukuh-heh-dah-leh tevun ago, fa' du heh i vesh', handel), tonk'peh i ma puzhu-tor t'nash-veh sa-mekh mention ik au vesh' wuh showy sasu, heh wuh ves t' sasu na' wuh lof. Tonk'peh ik au vesh' ri tor nam-tor, rik' ignorance il prejudice, mistaken na' wuh gentleman, t'nash-veh sa-mekh danik strongly asseverates; fai'ei ish-veh nam-tor wuh dvatai t' ish-veh ik rai sasu vi vesh' ri wuh yeht gentleman na' khaf-spol ek'wak vesh', opi' wuh panu began, wuh yeht gentleman svi' manner. Au leralmin-tor, rai varnish mokuhlek ip-sut wuh kap-yar t' wuh lapan; heh ik wuh weht varnish du shitau fi', wuh weht wuh kap-yar dungi sagluvau itself. Muhl! Nash sasu pursued din-tor havisham closely, heh professed tor nam-tor vaikau tor ish-veh. I dva-tor she had ri shown mau susceptibility abru tor ik wak; tonk'peh ek' wuh susceptibility she ma certainly sasarlah yi, heh she passionately ashau ish-veh. Tra' nam-tor rai vet ik she perfectly idolized ish-veh. Au practised fi' ish-veh affection svi' ik systematic yut, ik au prah lo'uk hau-ov t' donku s' ish-veh, heh au vimevilau ish-veh tor mahr-tor ish-veh sa-kai si' t' wuh thresh svi' wuh brewery (if had vesh' kobat losrak ish-veh k' ish-veh sa-mekh) na' wuh immense price, fi' wuh plea ik lu au vesh' ish-veh sa-telsu au bolau meskaraya heh khartau ish-veh ek'. Ish-veh guardian vesh' ri na' ik wak svi' din-tor havisham's counsels, heh she vesh' nuh' haughty heh nuh' mau svi' ashaya tor nam-tor na'shikhau k' sovek veh. Ish-veh relations vesh' ri donku-tor heh scheming, k' wuh kaulauf t' t'nash-veh sa-mekh; au vesh' ri donku-tor hiyet, tonk'peh ri wak-serving il kis-ka. Wuh goh independent veh ekhlami, au vikau ish-veh ik she vesh' doing nuh' mau na' nash sasu, heh vesh' placing herself nuh' unreservedly svi' ish-veh tepul. She nem-tor wuh wuh'rak opportunity t' angrily ordering t'nash-veh sa-mekh s' wuh kelek, svi' ish-veh la'es, heh t'nash-veh sa-mekh has worla gla-tor ish-veh opi'." i nahp t' ish-veh having leralmin-tor, "matthew dungi sarlah heh gla-tor me na' kim-shah lu i am laid tevik fi-tor ik pasu; " heh i ya'akash herbert whether ish-veh sa-mekh vesh' ni inveterate tehnat ish-veh? "ish-veh's ri ik, " leralmin-tor au, "tonk'peh she vifalunau ish-veh, svi' wuh la'es t' ish-veh intended sa-telsu, k' hasu disappointed svi' wuh rok t' fawning fi-tor ish-veh na' ish-veh sha' advancement, heh, kuv au vesh' tor hal-tor tor ish-veh i', ish-veh would glazhau trueeven tor himand kauk tor ish-veh. Tor fun tor wuh sasu heh tor wuh shaht t' ish-veh. Wuh kal'i'farr gad vesh' teslau, wuh wedding sai-vel vesh' bought, wuh wedding tour vesh' dotoran si', wuh wedding be'hai'la vesh' invited. Wuh gad sarlah, tonk'peh ri wuh bridegroom. Au kitau ish-veh wuh nuhm" "if she poprah, " i kwul-tor svi', "lu she vesh' sai-vel-tor na' ish-veh kal'i'farr? Na' dah-leh minutes tor naukuh?" "na' wuh wadan heh minute, " leralmin-tor herbert, nodding, "na' if she afterwards pehkau ek' wuh wak-vel. Ra vesh' svi' ish-veh, further do ik ish-veh danik heartlessly shau wuh kal'i'farr ska', i mokuhlek't var-tor du, fai'ei i ri tor fai-tor. Lu she recovered s' wuh rasahkos has-mar ik she had, she laid wuh bosh shi thinoi, u' du ma gla-tor ish-veh, heh she has worla opi' glazhau fi-tor wuh ta'hal t' gad." "nam-tor ik ek' wuh var?" i ya'akash, po' panahik ish-veh. "ek' i fai-tor t' ish-veh; heh indeed i goh fai-tor ni mau, k'fai piecing ish-veh si' na' myself; na' t'nash-veh sa-mekh kwon-hau-ov nan'woi ish-veh, heh, kauk lu din-tor havisham invited me tor hal-tor tra', var-tor me rai weht t' ish-veh do ish-veh vesh' absolutely requisite i dang ken-tor. Tonk'peh i ma yen-tor veh vel. Ish-veh has vesh' supposed ik wuh sasu tor ik she mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh misplaced guhl'es bae'cok throughout svi' concert k' ish-veh ulef-sa-kai; ik ish-veh vesh' wuh conspiracy svi' au; heh ik au thresh-tor wuh pinkaunu." "i wonder au didn't marry ish-veh heh prah ek' wuh veltra, " leralmin-tor i. "au lau ma vesh' telik already, heh ish-veh pi-maat'rer mortification lau ma vesh' wuh krus t' ish-veh ulef-sa-kai's scheme, " leralmin-tor herbert. "kashek! I ri tor fai-tor ik." "ra became t' wuh dahkuh sasu?" i ya'akash, po' va'ashiv panahik wuh subject. "au tevan-tor vi' deeper mesh heh degradationif tra' mokuhlek nam-tor deeperand ruin." "nam-tor au alive i'?" "i ri tor fai-tor." "du leralmin-tor aishan i' ik estella vesh' ri related tor din-tor havisham, tonk'peh thanai. Lu thanai?" herbert shrugged ish-veh tipan. "tra' has kwon-hau-ov vesh' wuh estella, opi' i ma puzhu-tor t' wuh din-tor havisham. I fai-tor rai weht. Heh i', handel, " leralmin-tor au, t'forti throwing ska' wuh var u' ish-veh vesh', "tra' nam-tor wuh perfectly tu'ash understanding svi' etek. Ek' ik i fai-tor pa' din-tor havisham, du fai-tor." "heh ek' ik i fai-tor, " i retorted, "du fai-tor." "i fully dva-tor ish-veh. Ni tra' mokuhlek nam-tor rai kuhlaya il perplexity svi' du heh me. Heh u' tor wuh nosh fi' if du meskaraya ish-veh advancement svi' ha'kiv, namely, ik du nam-tor ri tor inquire il discuss tor ik du owe ish-veh, du lau nam-tor maut sure ik ish-veh dungi worla nam-tor visnuhpau fi-tor, il kauk betau, k' me, il k' sovek veh t' me." svi' yeht'es, au leralmin-tor nash k' ni mau delicacy, ik i olau wuh subject ovsoh k', kauk hi i dang nam-tor ne' ish-veh sa-mekh's kamu na' tevun heh tevun tor sarlah. Wi au leralmin-tor ish-veh k' ni mau meaning, nuh', ik i olau au u' perfectly ken-tor din-tor havisham tor nam-tor t'nash-veh benefactress, u' i ken-tor wuh kla-min myself. Ish-veh had ri paresh-tor tor me fa', ik au had pufulag-tor abru tor wuh theme na' wuh lof t' clearing ish-veh s' etwel yut; tonk'peh etek vesh' ni mau wuh lighter heh easier na' having broached ish-veh, ik i i' pakashogau nash tor nam-tor wuh nuf. Etek vesh' maut sa-ka-ashausu heh sociable, heh i ya'akash ish-veh, svi' wuh rivak t' conversation, ra au vesh'? Au kilko-tor, "wuh capitalist, wuh insurer t' ships." i suppose gla-tor ish-veh me glancing pa' wuh tvi-shal svi' psthan t' ein tokens t' shipping, il capital, na' au hau, "svi' wuh kahr." i had grand ideas t' wuh don-tak heh importance t' insurers t' ships svi' wuh kahr, heh i began tor nah-tor k' teshan t' having laid wuh nu'ri insurer fi' ish-veh pla', blackened ish-veh enterprising bezhun, heh tresahk ish-veh responsible patam tu'ash. Tonk'peh va'ashiv tra' sarlah fi-tor me, na' t'nash-veh vas, ik shaik impression ik herbert abru'lik would worla nam-tor maut successful il don-ka. "i dungau ri shom satisfied k' goh employing t'nash-veh capital svi' insuring ships. I dungau mahr-tor abru ein rom ha'kiv assurance thresh-tor, heh tresahk vi' wuh kharat. I dungau isha tor wuh pi' svi' wuh mining yut. Rim t' aifa vel dungi snertau k' t'nash-veh chartering wuh zamu thousand tons fi' t'nash-veh sha' khrosahp. I nah-tor i dungau trade, " leralmin-tor au, leaning pla' svi' ish-veh ku-san, "tor wuh she'rak indies, na' silks, shawls, bar-kas, kur-tor, ta'bek, heh taluhk lapan. Ish-veh's wuh eku'ki trade." "heh wuh pinkaunu nam-tor suk?" leralmin-tor i. "tremendous!" leralmin-tor au. I wavered va'ashiv, heh began tor nah-tor la' vesh' greater gishat do t'nash-veh sha'. [illustration] "i nah-tor i dungau trade, isha, " leralmin-tor au, putting ish-veh kaur-ozh svi' ish-veh san-tor-pal abru'lik, "tor wuh tev'rak indies, na' slor-tukh, tobacco, heh rum. Isha tor ceylon, wa' na' elephants' tusks." "du dungi aitlun wuh rom wehk ships, " leralmin-tor i. "wuh buhfik halitra, " leralmin-tor au. Ved overpowered k' wuh magnificence t' aifa transactions, i ya'akash ish-veh wilat wuh ships au insured mostly traded tor na' la'? "i haven't palikau insuring wi, " au kilko-tor. "i am looking pa' me." somehow, ik pursuit seemed weht svi' keeping k' barnard's ha-shal. I leralmin-tor (svi' wuh molu t' conviction), "ah-h!" "ha. I am svi' wuh counting-kelek, heh looking pa' me." "nam-tor wuh counting-kelek profitable?" i ya'akash. "todo du tvai tor wuh nu'ri katravahsu vi's svi' ish-veh?" au ya'akash, svi' kilko. "ha; tor du." "po, n-rai; ri tor me." au leralmin-tor nash k' wuh sov t' veh carefully reckoning abru heh striking wuh vo'ektaya. "ri directly profitable. Ik nam-tor, ish-veh doesn't vlitau me sovek-vel, heh i ma tokeep myself." nash certainly had ri wuh profitable appearance, heh i hutau t'nash-veh patam u' kuv i would imply ik ish-veh would nam-tor rihagik tor ti k' mau accumulative capital s' such wuh shu-pal t' income. "tonk'peh wuh vel nam-tor, " leralmin-tor herbert abru'lik, "ik du glazhau pa' du. Ik's wuh grand vel. Du nam-tor svi' wuh counting-kelek, du fai-tor, heh du glazhau pa' du." ish-veh kwul-tor me u' wuh singular implication ik du couldn't nam-tor s' wuh counting-kelek, du fai-tor, heh glazhau pa' du; tonk'peh i silently deferred tor ish-veh veshtaya. "yi wuh wak sarlah, " leralmin-tor herbert, "lu gla-tor du ish-veh sharu. Heh du hal-tor svi', heh du swoop fi-tor ish-veh heh du tor ish-veh capital, heh yi tra' du nam-tor! Lu du ma wuh'wak tor ish-veh capital, du ma nothing tor tor tonk'peh employ ish-veh." nash vesh' maut spo' ish-veh yut t' conducting ik snagel svi' wuh bah-ker; maut spo'. Ish-veh manner t' kuvish ish-veh poverty, nuh', exactly corresponded tor ish-veh manner t' kuvish ik defeat. Ish-veh seemed tor me ik au nem-tor ek' salur heh buffets i' k' aishan wuh ka sov u' au had taken t'nash-veh yi. Ish-veh vesh' evident ik au had nothing pa' ish-veh tonk'peh wuh eiktra necessaries, na' kanok-vei ik i remarked fi-tor da-tor si' ki' vesh' satau svi' fi' t'nash-veh khrosahp s' wuh mon-kelek il ein-wilat else. Wi, having already tor ish-veh fortune svi' ish-veh sha' kashek, au vesh' ni unassuming k' ish-veh ik i olau ved grateful tor ish-veh na' ri hasu puffed abru. Ish-veh vesh' wuh vaksurik haya tor ish-veh naturally vaksurik yut, heh etek prah fi' famously. Svi' wuh khru etek went si' na' wuh lates svi' wuh yut, heh went ulef-price tor wuh theatre; heh thurai gad etek went tor church na' westminster abbey, heh svi' wuh aru etek lates-tor svi' wuh shi'sochya; heh i wondered vi shod ek' wuh jarel tra', heh istau joe did. Fi' wuh moderate computation, ish-veh vesh' wehk tevun-krus, ik gad, opi' i had losrak joe heh biddy. Wuh ret interposed svi' myself heh au partook t' ik sa'ovaya, heh etwel masu-kastra vesh' sovek ir ska'. Ik i kupi ma vesh' na' etwel hinek church svi' t'nash-veh hinek church-going sai-vel, fi' wuh maut kim-shah gad ik ek'wak vesh', seemed wuh terish t' impossibilities, geographical heh shilaik, solar heh lunar. Wi svi' wuh london yut ni crowded k' sutra heh ni brilliantly lighted svi' wuh dusk t' khru, tra' vesh' depressing hints t' reproaches na' ik i had shitau wuh ri donku-tor hinek af'tum na' ha-kel ni irak maf; heh svi' wuh tevik t' mu-yor, wuh footsteps t' ein incapable impostor t' wuh porter mooning pa' barnard's ha-shal, ne' pretence t' watching ish-veh, tevan-tor hollow fi' t'nash-veh khaf-spol. Fi' wuh gad asal na' wuh yonuk fa' naukuh, herbert went tor wuh counting-kelek tor report himself, tor glazhau pa' ish-veh, nuh', i suppose, heh i spitau ish-veh apc'koik. Au vesh' tor sarlah maf svi' wuh wadan il dahkuh tor attend me tor hammersmith, heh i vesh' tor bek-tor pa' na' ish-veh. Ish-veh saudau tor me ik wuh yu-mur s' if nu'ri insurers vesh' hatched vesh' incubated svi' grazhiv heh falek, spo' wuh yu-mur t' ostriches, judging s' wuh shitau tor if eifa incipient masuk'veh teslau fi' wuh gad asal. Il did wuh counting-kelek wilat herbert gol-tor, gluvaya svi' t'nash-veh bezhun u' na' ek' wuh rom shi'igen-glantaya; hasu wuh pla' dahr lan-tol abru wuh ker, t' wuh grimy la'es svi' ek' particulars, heh k' wuh glazhau vi' wuh'ashiv pla' dahr lan-tol, rather do wuh glazhau si'. I bek-tor pa' abi' ish-veh vesh' aru, heh i went fi-tor 'rubah, heh vesht gla-tor nash-veh fluey sasu sitting tra' ne' wuh dun pa' shipping, ik i nem-tor tor nam-tor lo'uk merchants, hi i couldn't ken-tor po au dang ek' nam-tor s' tam'a. Lu herbert sarlah, etek went heh had khi-gad-yem na' wuh u'thet kelek if i yi ved venerated, tonk'peh i' dva-tor ki' vesh' wuh danik abject superstition svi' europe, heh wilat i kupi ri gol'nev noticing, kauk yi, ik tra' vesh' mau weht gravy fi' wuh tablecloths heh lipau heh waiters' sai-vel, do svi' wuh steaks. Nash collation sashitau t' na' wuh moderate price (panahik wuh elmin, if vesh' ri vifalunau na'), etek went pla' tor barnard's ha-shal heh prah t'nash-veh pi' portmanteau, heh yi nem-tor coach na' hammersmith. Etek lasha tra' na' dahkuh il rehkuh o'wak-vel svi' wuh aru, heh had maut pi' yut tor lates tor mr. Abru'lik's kelek. Lifting wuh kuhr t' wuh temep, etek be' dvun-tor kharik vi' wuh pi' bah-ker overlooking wuh pilash, wilat mr. Abru'lik's kanu vesh' mavaun pa'. Heh vita i tehs-tor myself fi' wuh sfek wilat t'nash-veh eku'ko il prepossessions nam-tor certainly ri concerned, vesht gla-tor nash-veh ik mr. Heh mrs. Abru'lik's kanu vesh' ri growing abru il hasu katau abru, tonk'peh vesh' tumbling abru. Mrs. Abru'lik vesh' sitting fi' wuh bah-ker ku-san ne' wuh lap, telvan, k' ish-veh mal fi-tor wuh'ashiv bah-ker ku-san; heh mrs. Abru'lik's dahkuh nurse-maids vesh' looking pa' au du' wuh kanu mavau. "mamma, " leralmin-tor herbert, "nash nam-tor nu'ri mr. Pip." fi-tor if mrs. Abru'lik poprah me k' wuh appearance t' amiable dignity. "trensu alick heh din-tor jane, " maf-tor veh t' wuh nurses tor dahkuh t' wuh kanu, "kuv du hal-tor wuh bouncing abru tehnat au bushes du'll tevan abru' vi' wuh pilash heh nam-tor drownded, heh ra'll ish-veh pa leralmin yi?" na' wuh ka wak nash nurse abrashau mrs. Abru'lik's handkerchief, heh leralmin-tor, "kuv ik ri tor tor shehkuh wak du've eku-tor ish-veh, mum!" fi-tor if mrs. Abru'lik abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor heh leralmin-tor, "nemaiyo, flopson, " heh settling herself svi' veh ku-san goh, resumed ish-veh dunap. Ish-veh countenance iyi assumed wuh knitted heh intent sagluvaya u' kuv she had vesh' telvan na' wuh wehk gad, tonk'peh fa' she kupi ma telv-tor ulef wuh dozen zehl, she teslau ish-veh bezhun fi-tor me, heh leralmin-tor, "i rok ish-veh mamma nam-tor ved muhl?" nash ri-gishu inquiry shitau me vi' such wuh rihag'es ik i began taran svi' wuh absurdest yut ik kuv tra' had vesh' sovek such person i had rai vet she would ma vesh' ved muhl heh would ma vesh' maut mau obliged heh would ma satau ish-veh compliments, lu wuh nurse sarlah tor t'nash-veh rescue. "muhl!" she maf-tor, picking abru wuh abru'lik-handkerchief, "kuv ik ri tor tor stehkuh wak! Ra nam-tor du wuh-doing t' nash aru, mum!" mrs. Abru'lik poprah ish-veh veltra, palikauk k' wuh glazhau t' unutterable ak'wikmun u' kuv she had worla gla-tor ish-veh fa', heh yi k' wuh abru'teruklar-ru'lut t' recognition, heh leralmin-tor, "nemaiyo, flopson, " heh forgot me, heh went fi' telvan. I afer-tor, i' i had el-wak tor tum-tor au, ik tra' vesh' rai fewer do shehkuh pi' abru'lik la', svi' vuhnauk skaf t' tumbling abru. I had scarcely lasha na' wuh ovus lu wuh seventh vesh' puzhu-tor, u' svi' wuh shal t' sov, wailing dolefully. "kuv tra' ain't kan-bu!" leralmin-tor flopson, appearing tor nah-tor ish-veh danik surprising. "tor haste abru, millers." millers, vi vesh' wuh vath nurse, retired vi' wuh kelek, heh k' degrees wuh kan's wailing vesh' hushed heh pehkau, u' kuv ish-veh vesh' wuh nu'ri ventriloquist k' vel svi' its ru'lut. Mrs. Abru'lik telv-tor ek' wuh wak, heh i vesh' curious tor fai-tor ra wuh dunap kupi nam-tor. Etek vesh' waiting, i supposed, na' mr. Abru'lik tor sasarlah tor etek; na' sovek tav etek bek-tor tra', heh ni i had wuh opportunity t' observing wuh remarkable skan stivan ik whenever sovek t' wuh kanu fam-kelek-tor be' mrs. Abru'lik svi' ish-veh mavau, au kwon-hau-ov hal-tor themselves abru heh tumbled abru' ish-veh, kwon-hau-ov maut mau tor ish-veh momentary astonishment, heh ish-veh sha' weht enduring lamentation. I vesh' na' wuh pak tor khrosahp na' nash surprising circumstance, heh kupi ri gol'nev giving t'nash-veh kashek tor speculations pa' ish-veh, abi' k' heh k' millers sarlah ne' k' wuh kan-bu, if kan-bu vesh' handed tor flopson, if flopson vesh' handing ish-veh tor mrs. Abru'lik, lu she nuh' went fairly patam dan-faik abru' mrs. Abru'lik, kan-bu heh ek', heh vesh' kum-tor k' herbert heh myself. "gracious me, flopson!" leralmin-tor mrs. Abru'lik, looking ska' ish-veh dunap na' wuh moment, "kanok-veh's tumbling!" "gracious du, indeed, mum!" fun-tor flopson, maut yon-kur svi' wuh limuk; "ra ma du prah tra'?" "i prah la', flopson?" ya'akash mrs. Abru'lik. "po, kuv ish-veh ain't ish-veh footstool!" maf-tor flopson. "heh kuv du potau ish-veh ne' ish-veh skirts spo' ik, vi's tor gol'nev tumbling? La'! Nem-tor wuh kan-bu, mum, heh mazhiv-kur-tor me ish-veh dunap." mrs. Abru'lik bae'cok fi' wuh na'shikh, heh inexpertly tam-tor wuh kan-bu wuh pi' svi' ish-veh lap, du' wuh vath kanu mavau pa' ish-veh. Nash had palesh-tor tonk'peh wuh maut pen wak, lu mrs. Abru'lik issued summary zek ik au vesh' ek' tor nam-tor taken vi' wuh kelek na' wuh nap. Thus i tor wuh dahr discovery fi' ik wuh'rak occasion, ik wuh nurture t' wuh pi' abru'lik consisted t' alternately tumbling abru heh lying ne'. Ne' aifa circumstances, lu flopson heh millers had prah wuh kanu vi' wuh kelek, spo' wuh pi' treit t' sheep, heh mr. Abru'lik sasarlah t' ish-veh tor tor t'nash-veh acquaintance, i vesh' ri mau ak'wikmun tor talal ik mr. Abru'lik vesh' wuh gentleman k' wuh rather perplexed sagluvaya t' limuk, heh k' ish-veh maut zhai-kur isachya disordered fi' ish-veh patam, u' kuv au didn't ved gla-tor ish-veh yut tor putting sovek-vel zehik. Chapter xxiii. Mr. Abru'lik leralmin-tor au vesh' glad tor gla-tor me, heh au rok-tor i vesh' ri sorry tor gla-tor ish-veh. "na', i really am ri, " au hau, k' ish-veh sa-fu's abru'teruklar-ru'lut, "wuh alarming personage." au vesh' wuh nu'ri-looking sasu, svi' spite t' ish-veh perplexities heh ish-veh maut zhai-kur isachya, heh ish-veh manner seemed ved malatik. I nam-tor-tor wuh zhit malatik, svi' wuh kash-ral t' its hasu unaffected; tra' vesh' vel comic svi' ish-veh distraught yut, u' hi ish-veh would ma vesh' downright ludicrous tonk'peh na' ish-veh sha' pakashogaya ik ish-veh vesh' maut be' hasu ni. Lu au had variben k' me wuh pi', au leralmin-tor tor mrs. Abru'lik, k' wuh rather anxious contraction t' ish-veh bezhun-zehl, if vesh' nesh-kur heh handsome, "belinda, i rok du ma welcomed mr. Pip?" heh she glazhau abru s' ish-veh dunap, heh leralmin-tor, "ha." she yi abru'teruklar-ru'lut fi-tor me svi' wuh tadek-adir fupa s' t' kashek, heh ya'akash me kuv i tishau wuh zahvan t' zhar-kur-svai masu? U' wuh deshker had rai kuvish, be' il remote, fi' sovek foregone il subsequent transaction, i panah-tor ish-veh ki' vesh' lehm-tor si', spo' ish-veh previous betau, svi' paik conversational condescension. I afer-tor si' k'svi wuh zamu wadan, heh lau mention na' wuh'wak, ik mrs. Abru'lik vesh' wuh goh ko-fu t' wuh ac'ruth ved ur'kif tevik kenelsu, vi had fereik-tor na' himself wuh conviction ik ish-veh tevik sa-mekh would ma vesh' tor wuh baronet tonk'peh na' somebody's satalau opposition arising s' entirely personal dvubolek, i yen-tor t'vi, kuv i ek'wak fai-tor, wuh sovereign's, wuh nenat minister's, wuh s'haile chancellor's, wuh archbishop t' canterbury's, anybody's, heh had tacked himself fi' tor wuh thol t' wuh terra svi' gas'rak t' nash ved supposititious kla-min. I dva-tor au had vesh' knighted himself na' storming wuh eingelsu zhit-isan na' wuh sfek t' wuh pen, svi' wuh desperate shi'yavekh engrossed fi' vellum, fi' wuh occasion t' wuh laying t' wuh wuh'rak kov t' ein kelek il vath, heh na' handing ein royal personage either wuh trowel il wuh mortar. Nam-tor ik u' ish-veh lau, au had khartau mrs. Abru'lik tor nam-tor katau abru s' ish-veh cradle u' veh vi svi' wuh malat t' vel bolau marry wuh title, heh vi vesh' tor nam-tor klashau s' wuh prai t' plebeian ka'kelik fai-tukh. Ni successful wuh glantau heh ward had vesh' afer-tor abru' wuh nu'ri t'sai k' nash judicious parent, ik she had grown abru highly ornamental, tonk'peh perfectly helpless heh nam-tor-fam. K' ish-veh character thus kunling shidau, svi' wuh wuh'rak svai t' ish-veh youth she had snagel-tor mr. Abru'lik: vi vesh' isha svi' wuh wuh'rak svai t' youth, heh ri ved klopau whether tor mount tor wuh woolsack, il tor kamu himself svi' k' wuh mitre. U' ish-veh doing wuh veh il wuh vath vesh' wuh mere deshker t' wak, au heh mrs. Abru'lik had taken wak k' wuh forelock (lu, tor judge s' its wu-vath, ish-veh would seem ki' aitlu tresahk-tor), heh had telik rik' wuh fai-tukh t' wuh judicious parent. Wuh judicious parent, having nothing tor bestow il withhold tonk'peh ish-veh kudaya, had handsomely settled ik dower fi-tor au po' wuh pen struggle, heh had informed mr. Abru'lik ik ish-veh ko-telsu vesh' "wuh treasure na' wuh prince." mr. Abru'lik had invested wuh prince's treasure svi' wuh yut t' wuh panu ek'wak opi', heh ish-veh vesh' supposed ki' katau ish-veh svi' tonk'peh indifferent eku'ko. Fam dvun, mrs. Abru'lik vesh' svi' paik wuh vel t' wuh queer wihfelau t' respectful pity, fai'ei she had ri telik wuh title; du' mr. Abru'lik vesh' wuh vel t' wuh queer wihfelau t' forgiving reproach, fai'ei au had worla prah veh. Mr. Abru'lik nem-tor me vi' wuh kelek heh gluvau me t'nash-veh tvi-shal: if vesh' wuh vaksurik veh, heh ni furnished u' ik i kupi nam-tor-tor ish-veh k' comfort na' t'nash-veh sha' awek sitting-tvi-shal. Au yi knocked na' wuh svep t' dahkuh vath kahwa tvi-shal, heh puragtau me tor ish-veh occupants, k' ahm drummle heh startop. Drummle, wuh hinek-looking nu'ri sasu t' wuh ras zek t' te'koshif, vesh' whistling. Startop, younger svi' tevun heh appearance, vesh' telvan heh holding ish-veh patam, u' kuv au nahp himself svi' tehvar t' exploding ish-veh k' nuh' karik wuh falun t' fai-tukh. Fi' mr. Heh mrs. Abru'lik had such wuh noticeable sov t' hasu svi' somebody else's el'ru, ik i wondered vi really vesh' svi' mat t' wuh kelek heh kal-tor au ha-tor tra', abi' i afer-tor nash ri-fainu tepul tor nam-tor wuh dvinsu. Ish-veh vesh' wuh mos yut t' going fi', sos'eh, svi' respect t' saving trouble; tonk'peh ish-veh had wuh appearance t' hasu kodonuhk, na' wuh dvinsu olau ish-veh wuh gu-vam au owed tor themselves tor nam-tor nice svi' ish-veh eating heh drinking, heh tor potau wuh deal t' apc'koik downstairs. Au kal-tor wuh maut liberal pasu tor mr. Heh mrs. Abru'lik, wi ish-veh kwon-hau-ov saudau tor me ik k' irak wuh buhfik krus t' wuh kelek ki' boarded svi' would ma vesh' wuh af'tum, kwon-hau-ov supposing wuh boarder capable t' shal-defence, na', fa' i had vesh' tra' wuh wehk gad, wuh neighbouring t'sai k' ik wuh skan vesh' personally unacquainted, kitau svi' tor leralmin ik she had gla-tor millers slapping wuh kan-bu. Nash greatly flakosh mrs. Abru'lik, vi thorau vi' bezhun-masu fi' receiving wuh pitoh, heh leralmin-tor ik ish-veh vesh' wuh wehtsuri vel ik wuh behsu couldn't kashek ish-veh sha' business. K' degrees i oren-tor, heh chiefly s' herbert, ik mr. Abru'lik had vesh' educated na' harrow heh na' cambridge, wilat au had distinguished himself; tonk'peh ik lu au had had wuh happiness t' marrying mrs. Abru'lik maut lehkuh-mal svi' ha'kiv, au had impaired ish-veh prospects heh taken abru wuh calling t' wuh grazhayek. Po' grinding wuh su'etek t' pasik wun-mor, t' ik ish-veh vesh' remarkable ik ish-veh sa-mekh, lu influential, vesh' kwon-hau-ov going tor gol'nev ish-veh tor preferment, tonk'peh kwon-hau-ov forgot tor tor ish-veh lu wuh wun-mor had losrak wuh grindstone, au had wearied t' ik ri donku-tor ar'kadan heh had sarlah tor london. La', po' gradually failing svi' loftier rok-tor, au had "telv-tor" k' taulsu vi had fam-tor opportunities il neglected au, heh had refurbished taulsu vath na' special occasions, heh had da-tor ish-veh acquirements tor wuh khrosahp t' literary compilation heh yehtan, heh fi' such tvai, hau tor ein maut moderate awek resources, fam dvun rompotau wuh kelek vesht gla-tor nash-veh. Mr. Heh mrs. Abru'lik had wuh toady behsu; wuh kir'an t'sai t' ik highly sympathetic malat ik she sep-wafikh k' kanok-veh, blessed kanok-veh, heh foshuhl abru'teruklar-ru'lut heh bezhun-masu fi' kanok-veh, fupa s' circumstances. Nash t'sai's ahm vesh' mrs. Coiler, heh i had wuh dor t' taking ish-veh ne' tor aru-yem fi' wuh gad t' t'nash-veh installation. She mazhiv-kur-tor me tor ken-tor fi' wuh kaiden, ik ish-veh vesh' wuh salur tor tal-kam mrs. Abru'lik ik tal-kam mr. Abru'lik dang nam-tor ne' wuh bolayek t' receiving gentlemen tor telv-tor k' ish-veh. Ik did ri sadvun-tor tor me, she var-tor me svi' wuh gush t' ashaya heh guhl'es (na' ik wak, i had fainu ish-veh vel lehkuh tor kaukuh minutes); kuv au vesh' ek' spo' me, ish-veh would nam-tor ved wuh'ashiv vel. "tonk'peh tal-kam mrs. Abru'lik, " leralmin-tor mrs. Coiler, "po' ish-veh lehkuh-mal disappointment (ri ik tal-kam mr. Abru'lik vesh' tor tenai svi' ik), requires ni mau luxury heh sohk'es" "ha, ma'am, " i leralmin-tor, tor pehkaya ish-veh, na' i vesh' kwes she vesh' going tor maf. "heh she nam-tor t' ni aristocratic wuh disposition" "ha, ma'am, " i leralmin-tor va'ashiv, k' wuh ka vel u' fa'. "ik ish-veh nam-tor lerash, " leralmin-tor mrs. Coiler, "ki' tal-kam mr. Abru'lik's wak heh attention matau s' tal-kam mrs. Abru'lik." i kupi ri gol'nev thinking ik ish-veh lau nam-tor harder kuv wuh butcher's wak heh attention vesh' matau s' tal-kam mrs. Abru'lik; tonk'peh i leralmin-tor nothing, heh indeed had hiyet tor tor svi' keeping wuh fusik glantau fi-tor t'nash-veh apc'koik manners. Sarlah ish-veh tor t'nash-veh fai-tukh, k'fai ra be' dvun-tor svi' mrs. Abru'lik heh drummle du' i vesh' whio'naks tor t'nash-veh lipau heh snauk, floku, bezhun-zaneshu, heh vath instruments t' shal-vashaya, ik drummle, t'vi christian ahm vesh' bentley, vesh' actually wuh thurai heir tonk'peh veh tor wuh baronetcy. Ish-veh further saudau ik wuh dunap i had gla-tor mrs. Abru'lik telvan svi' wuh bah-ker vesh' ek' pa' titles, heh ik she fai-tor wuh faikaik kinuf na' if ish-veh grandpapa would ma sarlah vi' wuh dunap, kuv au ek'wak had sarlah na' ek'. Drummle didn't leralmin mau, tonk'peh svi' ish-veh limited yut (au kwul-tor me u' wuh sulky ves t' katravahsu) au stariben u' veh t' wuh todvel-tor, heh naglanshau mrs. Abru'lik u' wuh kosu heh wuh ko-kai. Kling tonk'peh themselves heh mrs. Coiler wuh toady behsu gluvau sovek eku'ko svi' nash krus t' wuh conversation, heh ish-veh saudau tor me ik ish-veh vesh' kusut-tor tor herbert; tonk'peh ish-veh ugau tor kim-shah wuh akarshif, lu wuh thalv sarlah svi' k' wuh announcement t' wuh ka'kelik affliction. Ish-veh vesh', svi' daya, ik wuh fas-tor had mislaid wuh kahm. Tor t'nash-veh unutterable tauraya, i i', na' wuh wuh'rak wak, gla-tor mr. Abru'lik vas-tor ish-veh kashek k' going k'fai wuh performance ik kwul-tor me u' maut wehtsuri, tonk'peh if tor rai impression fi' anybody else, heh k' if i ak became u' familiar u' wuh shom. Au laid ne' wuh skrin-lipau heh snauk, hasu engaged svi' skrin, na' wuh moment, shitau ish-veh dahkuh el'ru vi' ish-veh ertau isachya, heh saudau tor tor wuh wehtsuri urgam tor abertau himself abru k' ish-veh. Lu au had ovsoh nash, heh had ri abertau himself abru na' ek', au quietly went fi' k' ra au vesh' pa'. Mrs. Coiler yi rubai wuh subject heh began tor snuhkrol-tor me. I tishau ish-veh na' wuh zamu moments, tonk'peh she snuhkrol-tor me ni maut grossly ik wuh sanosh vesh' ak abru'. She had wuh serpentine yut t' coming ikap-tor na' me lu she pretended tor nam-tor vitally interested svi' wuh t'hylara heh localities i had losrak, if vesh' altogether snaky heh snauk-tongued; heh lu she tor wuh occasional rukaya fi-tor startop (vi leralmin-tor maut pi' tor ish-veh), il fi-tor drummle (vi leralmin-tor lehkuh), i rather envied au na' hasu fi' wuh mesyutik vla t' wuh pasu. Po' aru-yem wuh kanu vesh' puragtau, heh mrs. Coiler tor krol-tor tuhskaya fi' ish-veh bezhun, han, heh mal, wuh sagacious yut t' improving ish-veh kashkau. Tra' vesh' kehkuh pi' ko-kan, heh dahkuh pi' sa-kan, isha wuh kan-bu vi lau ma vesh' either, heh wuh kan-bu's thurai successor vi vesh' u' wi neither. Au vesh' katau svi' k' flopson heh millers, mau u' hi eifa dahkuh non-kadvin-tor officers had vesh' recruiting ein-wilat na' kanu heh had enlisted aifa, du' mrs. Abru'lik glazhau na' wuh nu'ri thol ik ought ki' vesh' u' kuv she rather nahp she had had wuh sanosh t' inspecting au fa', tonk'peh didn't ved fai-tor ra tor tor t' au. "la'! Mazhiv-kur-tor me ish-veh snauk, mum, heh nem-tor wuh kan-bu, " leralmin-tor flopson. "ri tor nem-tor ish-veh ik yut, il du'll prah its patam ne' wuh pasu." thus na'shikhau, mrs. Abru'lik nem-tor ish-veh wuh vath yut, heh prah its patam fi-tor wuh pasu; if vesh' tor'pra tor ek' la' k' wuh prodigious kwul-kolaya. "tal-kam, tal-kam! Mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh me pla', mum, " leralmin-tor flopson; "heh din-tor jane, sarlah heh tam tor kan-bu, tor!" veh t' wuh pi' ko-kan, wuh mere mite vi seemed ki' prematurely taken fi-tor herself ein falun t' wuh vath, ash-tor s' ish-veh shi k' me, heh tam-tor tor heh s' wuh kan-bu abi' ish-veh losrak ska' maf-tor, heh abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor. Yi, ek' wuh kanu abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor, heh mr. Abru'lik (vi svi' wuh meantime had dah'wak endeavoured tor abertau himself abru k' wuh isachya) abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor, heh etek ek' abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor heh vesh' glad. Flopson, k' dint t' doubling wuh kan-bu na' wuh joints spo' wuh dutch su-leitri, yi prah ish-veh safely vi' mrs. Abru'lik's lap, heh mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh wuh kov-sayas-kap tor mavau k'; na' wuh ka wak recommending mrs. Abru'lik tor nem-tor beglanau ik wuh el'rek t' ik instrument vesh' ri kesik tor sep-wafikh k' its bezhun, heh sharply charging din-tor jane tor glazhau po' wuh ka. Yi, wuh dahkuh nurses losrak wuh tvi-shal, heh had wuh lively scuffle fi' wuh staircase k' wuh dissipated thalv vi had bek-tor na' aru-yem, heh vi had clearly pakik ulef ish-veh gonaf na' wuh gaming-pasu. I vesh' tor maut uneasy svi' t'nash-veh kashek k' mrs. Abru'lik's tevan-tor vi' wuh discussion k' drummle respecting dahkuh baronetcies, du' she ate wuh shihvek-tor zhar-kur steeped svi' slor-tukh heh wine, heh, forgetting ek' pa' wuh kan-bu fi' ish-veh lap, vi did danik appalling vel k' wuh kov-sayas-kap. Na' wu-vath pi' jane, perceiving its nu'ri shi'nahp tor nam-tor imperilled, softly losrak ish-veh shi, heh k' wehk pi' artifices coaxed wuh tehvar-bosh wun maf. Mrs. Abru'lik finishing ish-veh zhar-kur na' pa' wuh ka wak, heh ri approving t' nash, leralmin-tor tor jane, "du naughty kan, uf dare du? Hal-tor heh hayal-tor ne' nash instant!" "mamma tal-kam, " lisped wuh pi' ko-kan, "kan-bu ood ma shitau hith eyeth si'." "uf dare du var-tor me ni?" retorted mrs. Abru'lik. "hal-tor heh hayal-tor ne' svi' ish-veh ku-san nash moment!" mrs. Abru'lik's dignity vesh' ni crushing, ik i olau ved abashed, u' kuv i myself had ovsoh vel tor kastorilau ish-veh. "belinda, " remonstrated mr. Abru'lik, s' wuh vath shaht t' wuh pasu, "uf mokuhlek du nam-tor ni unreasonable? Jane goh snertau na' wuh protection t' kan-bu." "i dungi ri kal-tor anybody tor snertau, " leralmin-tor mrs. Abru'lik. "i am ak'wikmun, matthew, ik du dang sashavau me tor wuh affront t' interference." "rom oekon!" maf-tor mr. Abru'lik, svi' wuh outbreak t' desolate desperation. "nam-tor kan-bu tor nam-tor kov-sayas-crackered vi' ish-veh braq, heh nam-tor kling tor korsau au?" "i dungi ri nam-tor snertau k' k' jane, " leralmin-tor mrs. Abru'lik, k' wuh majestic glance na' ik innocent pi' offender. "i rok i fai-tor t'nash-veh ri donku-tor grandpapa's shul. Jane, indeed!" mr. Abru'lik prah ish-veh el'ru svi' ish-veh isachya va'ashiv, heh nash wak really did abertau himself ein inches s' ish-veh ku-san. "zhu-tor nash!" au helplessly sporiben tor wuh meilak. "kan-bu nam-tor tor nam-tor kov-sayas-crackered tevik, na' sutra's ri donku-tor grandpapa's shul!" yi au kal-tor himself ne' va'ashiv, heh became ralash-fam. Etek ek' glazhau awkwardly na' wuh tablecloth du' nash vesh' going fi'. Wuh svizh navau, du' if wuh trau heh irrepressible kan-bu tor wuh weizehl t' leaps heh kushel na' pi' jane, vi saudau tor me tor nam-tor wuh goh kisau t' wuh skan (irrespective t' dvinsu) k' ik ish-veh had sovek klopau acquaintance. "mr. Drummle, " leralmin-tor mrs. Abru'lik, "dungi du mokov na' flopson? Jane, du undutiful pi' vel, hal-tor heh ti ne'. I', kan-bu ashal-veh, sarlah k' ma!" wuh kan-bu vesh' wuh soul t' dor, heh protested k' ek' its lau. Ish-veh dahtau itself abru wuh riyeht yut abru' mrs. Abru'lik's kar, gluvau wuh shif t' knitted ash'el heh dimpled mal-nik tor wuh apc'koik svi' lieu t' its mos limuk, heh vesh' fitor svi' wuh k'lek fupa s' t' mutiny. Heh ish-veh nazh-tor its sfek po' ek', na' vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh k'fai wuh krani k'svi wuh zamu minutes, hasu nursed k' pi' jane. Ish-veh pavesh-tor ik wuh vath kaukuh kanu vesh' losrak za' na' wuh aru-yem-pasu, k'fai flopson's having ein awek engagement, heh ish-veh ri hasu anybody else's business. I thus became aware t' wuh mutual relations svi' au heh mr. Abru'lik, if vesh' exemplified svi' wuh zahalik manner. Mr. Abru'lik, k' wuh tsuri perplexity t' ish-veh limuk heightened heh ish-veh isachya rumpled, glazhau na' au na' ein minutes, u' kuv au couldn't tor si' uf sarlah au tor nam-tor boarding heh lodging svi' ik establishment, heh po au hadn't vesh' billeted k' malat fi' somebody else. Yi, svi' wuh irak missionary yut au ya'akash au ac'ruth deshkau, u' po pi' joe had ik razh svi' ish-veh frill, vi leralmin-tor, pa, flopson vesh' going tor nodolau ish-veh lu she had wak, heh uf pi' fanny sarlah k' ik whitlow, vi leralmin-tor, pa, millers vesh' going tor poultice ish-veh lu she didn't yen-tor. Yi, au klimtau vi' parental tenderness, heh mazhiv-kur-tor au wuh shilling apiece heh var-tor au tor hal-tor heh mavau; heh yi u' au went si', k' veh maut karik urgam tor abertau himself abru k' wuh isachya au dismissed wuh hopeless subject. Svi' wuh khru tra' vesh' rowing fi' wuh pilash. U' drummle heh startop had tik wuh masu-hali, i resolved tor eku abru t'nash-veh, heh tor tresahk au fi' si'. I vesh' takov rom na' danik tusok svi' if shasol sa-kan nam-tor adepts, tonk'peh u' i vesh' d'wonil t' wanting sohk'es t' style na' wuh thames, ri tor leralmin na' vath mashau, i na' wuh'wak engaged tor shi myself ne' wuh tuition t' wuh skilsu t' wuh prize-wherry vi plied na' etwel kaiden, heh tor ik i vesh' puragtau k' t'nash-veh uzh puk'ai'la. Nash practical ek'te'kru confused me maut mau k' taran i had wuh kar t' wuh shek-zhuksu. Kuv au kupi ma fainu uf nearly wuh compliment pakik ish-veh ish-veh glan-sharu, i vet kuv au would ma vlitau ish-veh. Tra' vesh' wuh mu'yor-yem-tray po' etek prah ha-kel na' mu-yor, heh i nah-tor etek dang ek' ma tizh-tor ourselves, tonk'peh na' wuh rather disagreeable ka'kelik occurrence. Mr. Abru'lik vesh' svi' rom tam'a, lu wuh housemaid sarlah svi', heh leralmin-tor, "kuv du sanoi, osu, i dang istaya tor stariben tor du." "stariben tor ish-veh trensu?" leralmin-tor mrs. Abru'lik, t'vi dignity vesh' kastorilau va'ashiv. "uf mokuhlek du nah-tor t' such wuh vel? Hal-tor heh stariben tor flopson. Il stariben tor kahm ein vath wak." "begging ish-veh pardon, ma'am, " fun-tor wuh housemaid, "i dang istaya tor stariben na' wuh'wak, heh tor stariben tor trensu." hereupon, mr. Abru'lik went s' wuh tvi-shal, heh etek tor wuh buhfik t' ourselves abi' sarlah ish-veh pla'. "nash nam-tor wuh takov vel, belinda!" leralmin-tor mr. Abru'lik, returning k' wuh countenance expressive t' tushat heh despair. "la''s wuh fas-tor lying insensibly mon-tor fi' wuh af'tum lan-tol, k' wuh suk uzh'a'lek t' sluk butter tor abru svi' wuh cupboard pok tor makau na' elmin!" mrs. Abru'lik instantly gluvau mau amiable zherka, heh leralmin-tor, "nash nam-tor ik odious sophia's doing!" "ra tor du tvai, belinda?" halishau mr. Abru'lik. "sophia has var-tor du, " leralmin-tor mrs. Abru'lik. "did i ri gla-tor ish-veh k' t'nash-veh sha' bezhun heh zhu-tor ish-veh k' t'nash-veh sha' kaluk, sarlah vi' wuh tvi-shal aishan i' heh ya'akash tor stariben tor du?" "tonk'peh has she ri taken me downstairs, belinda, " fun-tor mr. Abru'lik, "heh shown me wuh kosu, heh wuh uzh'a'lek nuh'?" "heh tor du fosh-tor ish-veh, matthew, " leralmin-tor mrs. Abru'lik, "na' tor mischief?" mr. Abru'lik uttered wuh dismal groan. "am i, grandpapa's granddaughter, tor nam-tor nothing svi' wuh kelek?" leralmin-tor mrs. Abru'lik. "isha, wuh fas-tor has kwon-hau-ov vesh' wuh maut nice respectful kosu, heh leralmin-tor svi' wuh danik malatik manner lu sarlah ish-veh tor glazhau po' wuh situation, ik she olau i vesh' pukeshta tor nam-tor wuh duchess." tra' vesh' wuh ku-san wilat mr. Abru'lik lam-tor, heh au eku-tor fi-tor ish-veh svi' wuh attitude t' wuh dying gladiator. Fam dvun svi' ik attitude au leralmin-tor, k' wuh hollow spes, "rom mu-yor, mr. Pip, " lu i deemed ish-veh advisable tor hal-tor tor sar-tak heh trasha ish-veh. Chapter xxiv. Po' dahkuh il rehkuh gad, lu i had afer-tor myself svi' t'nash-veh tvi-shal heh had hal-tor pla'rak heh fa'rak tor london several wak, heh had ordered ek' i aitlu t' t'nash-veh tradesmen, mr. Abru'lik heh i had wuh wu variben teretuhr. Au fai-tor weht t' t'nash-veh intended career do i fai-tor myself, na' au referred tor ish-veh having vesh' var-tor k' mr. Jaggers ik i vesh' ri designed na' sovek ha'yigal, heh ik i dang nam-tor muhl hiyet educated na' t'nash-veh buk kuv i kupi "meskaraya t'nash-veh sha'" k' wuh bov t' nu'ri sasu svi' prosperous circumstances. I acquiesced, veling, fai-tor nothing tor wuh contrary. Au na'shikhau t'nash-veh attending ac'ruth shitau svi' london, na' wuh prai t' such mere rudiments u' i aitlu, heh t'nash-veh investing ish-veh k' wuh nam-tor-lof t' explainer heh khartausu t' ek' t'nash-veh orenau. Au rok-tor ik k' kash-tok assistance i dang ragel-tor k' pi' tor discourage me, heh dang ak nam-tor kup tor mazhiv-kur-tor k' sovek mamuk tonk'peh ish-veh. K'fai ish-veh yut t' taran nash, heh mau weht tor kahwa lof, au shitau himself fi' confidential zhil k' me svi' wuh admirable manner; heh i lau fupa s' na' wuh'wak ik au vesh' kwon-hau-ov ni zealous heh dorli svi' fulfilling ish-veh lerakhovau k' me, ik au tor me zealous heh dorli svi' fulfilling t'nash-veh k' ish-veh. Kuv au had shown indifference u' wuh trensu, i ma rai vet i dang ma fun-tor wuh compliment u' wuh glan-sharu; au mazhiv-kur-tor me rai such tobeg, heh tik t' etek did wuh vath yeht-gav. Il did i ek'wak fudau ish-veh u' having sovek-vel ludicrous pa' himor sovek-vel tonk'peh ra vesh' serious, trau, heh goodin ish-veh tutor sviribaya k' me. Lu aifa sfekau vesh' settled, heh ni irak fitor u' ik i had palikau tor ar'kadan svi' earnest, ish-veh paresh-tor tor me ik kuv i kupi retain t'nash-veh shi'yuk svi' barnard's ha-shal, t'nash-veh ha'kiv would nam-tor agreeably vuhnau, du' t'nash-veh manners would nam-tor rim wuh weh-rasahkos na' herbert's shila'es. Mr. Abru'lik did ri vel tor nash arrangement, tonk'peh urged ik fa' sovek ash kupi possibly nam-tor taken svi' ish-veh, ish-veh bolau nam-tor submitted tor t'nash-veh guardian. I olau ik nash delicacy arose s' wuh consideration ik wuh dotor would korsau herbert ein kodona, ni i went ska' tor pi' britain heh imparted t'nash-veh istaya tor mr. Jaggers. "kuv i kupi mahr-tor wuh furniture i' hired na' me, " leralmin-tor i, "heh veh il dahkuh vath pi' vel, i dang nam-tor ved na' ha-kel tra'." "hal-tor ish-veh!" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, k' wuh pen abru'teruklar-ru'lut. "i var-tor du du'd prah fi'. Muhl! Uf mau tor du aitlun?" i leralmin-tor i didn't fai-tor uf mau. "sarlah!" retorted mr. Jaggers. "uf mau? Kau-leh plesh-tor?" "o, ri nearly ni mau." "kaukuh plesh-tor?" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. Nash vesh' such wuh lo'uk tevan, ik i leralmin-tor svi' discomfiture, "o, weht do ik." "weht do ik, eh!" retorted mr. Jaggers, lying svi' bek-tor na' me, k' ish-veh el'ru svi' ish-veh abru'lik, ish-veh patam fi' veh vla, heh ish-veh bezhun fi' wuh temok za' me; "uf mau weht?" "ish-veh nam-tor ni rihagik tor teslau wuh hau-ov, " leralmin-tor i, hesitating. "sarlah!" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. "kal-tor's prah na' ish-veh. Dah'wak kaukuh; dungi ik tor? Rehkuh wak kaukuh; dungi ik tor? Kehkuh wak kaukuh; dungi ik tor?" i leralmin-tor i nahp ik would tor handsomely. "kehkuh wak kaukuh dungi tor handsomely, dungi ish-veh?" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, knitting ish-veh meix'tem. "i', ra tor du tor t' kehkuh wak kaukuh?" "ra tor i tor t' ish-veh?" "ah!" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers; "uf mau?" "i suppose du tor ish-veh dah-leh plesh-tor, " leralmin-tor i, smiling. "worla kashek ra i tor ish-veh, t'nash-veh t'hy'la, " glantau mr. Jaggers, k' wuh fai-tor heh contradictory toss t' ish-veh patam. "i aitlun tor fai-tor ra du tor ish-veh." "dah-leh plesh-tor, veling." "wemmick!" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, sharu ish-veh office svep. "nem-tor mr. Pip's written zek, heh vlitau ish-veh dah-leh plesh-tor." nash strongly pu'ulidau yut t' doing business tor wuh strongly pu'ulidau impression fi' me, heh ik ri t' wuh agreeable ves. Mr. Jaggers worla abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor; tonk'peh au sai-vel-tor lo'uk ugelik creaking kluf, heh, svi' poising himself fi' aifa kluf, k' ish-veh suk patam keh'sei ne' heh ish-veh bezhun-zehl terau, awaiting wuh kilko-srashiv, au sometimes aisha wuh kluf tor creak, u' kuv au abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor svi' wuh pseth heh suspicious yut. U' au pavesh-tor tor hal-tor si' i', heh u' wemmick vesh' brax heh talkative, i leralmin-tor tor wemmick ik i hardly fai-tor ra tor tor t' mr. Jaggers's manner. "var-tor ish-veh ik, heh au'll nem-tor ish-veh u' wuh compliment, " kilko-tor wemmick; "au ri tor tvai ik du dang fai-tor ra tor tor t' ish-veh. Oh!" na' i glazhau ak'wikmun, "ish-veh's ri personal; ish-veh's professional: goh professional." wemmick vesh' na' ish-veh kitau-skaf, lunchingand crunchingon wuh pseth lerash kreila; krus t' if au threw s' wak tor wak vi' ish-veh slit t' wuh ru'lut, u' kuv au vesh' posting au. "kwon-hau-ov seems tor me, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "u' kuv au had eku wuh sasu-pash heh vesh' watching ish-veh. Suddenlyclickyou're kum-tor!" rik' remarking ik sasu-pash-tor vesh' ri among wuh amenities t' ha'kiv, i leralmin-tor i supposed au vesh' maut skilful? "glu, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "u' australia." pointing k' ish-veh pen na' wuh office lan-tol, tor sagluvau ik australia vesh' ken-tor, na' wuh lof t' wuh khlop, tor nam-tor symmetrically fi' wuh mesyutik gla-tor t' wuh ek'tra-dukal. "kuv tra' vesh' sovek-vel deeper, " hau wemmick, bringing ish-veh pen tor dun, "au'd nam-tor ish-veh." yi, i leralmin-tor i supposed au had wuh tok-ti business, heh wemmick leralmin-tor, "ca-pi-tal!" yi i ya'akash kuv tra' vesh' wehk clerks? Tor if au kilko-tor, "etek ri tor sahr-tor mau vi' clerks, fai'ei tra''s goh veh jaggers, heh sutra skil-tor't ma ish-veh na' dahr el'ru. Tra' nam-tor goh kehkuh t' etek. Would du spo' tor gla-tor 'em? Du nam-tor veh t' etek, u' i lau leralmin." i nar-tor wuh nufai. Lu mr. Wemmick had shitau ek' wuh kreila vi' wuh lehk, heh had vlitau me t'nash-veh donku s' wuh cash-natuhn svi' wuh safe, wuh tal-muv t' if safe au potau ein-wilat ne' ish-veh pla' heh torvau s' ish-veh tor-pal-hmoi'neks spo' wuh shek-tukh-pigtail, etek went upstairs. Wuh kelek vesh' gu'gelik heh shabby, heh wuh greasy tipan ik had losrak ish-veh ulidar svi' mr. Jaggers's tvi-shal seemed ki' vesh' shuffling abru heh ne' wuh staircase na' tevun. Svi' wuh khom wuh'rak lan-tol, wuh clerk vi glazhau vel svi' wuh publican heh wuh rat-catchera suk spoh, puffed, puvik manwas attentively engaged k' rehkuh il kehkuh sutra t' shabby appearance, ik au skasau u' unceremoniously u' kanok-veh seemed tor nam-tor skasau vi contributed tor mr. Jaggers's coffers. "getting evidence teretuhr, " leralmin-tor mr. Wemmick, u' etek sasarlah, "na' wuh bailey." svi' wuh tvi-shal abru' ik, wuh pi' flabby terrier t' wuh clerk k' dangling isachya (ish-veh cropping seemed ki' vesh' yen-tor lu au vesh' wuh wil'tei) vesh' similarly engaged k' wuh sasu k' kobat bezhun, ik mr. Wemmick presented tor me u' wuh smelter vi potau ish-veh sunil kwon-hau-ov boiling, heh vi would klimtau me sovek-vel i sanoi, heh vi vesh' svi' wuh mauyik wan-kur-wadashaya, u' kuv au had vesh' trying ish-veh tanaf fi' himself. Svi' wuh pla' tvi-shal, wuh pid-shouldered sasu k' wuh limuk-sut tied abru svi' kitork flannel, vi vesh' sai-vel-tor svi' hinek nesh-kur sai-vel ik spitau wuh appearance t' having vesh' waxed, vesh' stooping abru' ish-veh ar'kadan t' tor rom va'asau t' wuh pitoh t' wuh vath dahkuh gentlemen, na' mr. Jaggers's sha' nam-tor-tor. Nash vesh' ek' wuh establishment. Lu etek went downstairs va'ashiv, wemmick pufulag-tor me vi' t'nash-veh guardian's tvi-shal, heh leralmin-tor, "nash du've gla-tor already." "pray, " leralmin-tor i, u' wuh dahkuh odious vishizhau k' wuh twitchy leer fi-tor au kum-tor t'nash-veh glan va'ashiv, "t'vi likenesses nam-tor eifa?" "aifa?" leralmin-tor wemmick, getting fi-tor wuh ku-san, heh blowing wuh grazhiv ska' wuh horrible patam fa' bringing au ne'. "aifa nam-tor dahkuh u'thet ones. Khinik clients t' ours ik prah etek wuh panu t' lit. Nash chap (po du bolau ma sarlah ne' svi' wuh mu-yor heh vesh' peeping vi' wuh inkstand, tor prah nash blot fi-tor ish-veh bezhun-zehl, du hinek rascal!) riyeht-stau ish-veh trensu, heh, panahik ik au wasn't katau abru tor evidence, didn't dotor ish-veh badly." "nam-tor ish-veh spo' ish-veh?" i ya'akash, recoiling s' wuh brute, u' wemmick spat fi-tor ish-veh bezhun-zehl heh mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh wuh tetaya k' ish-veh sleeve. "spo' ish-veh? Ish-veh's himself, du fai-tor. Wuh vishizhau vesh' tor svi' newgate, directly po' au vesh' taken ne'. Du had wuh particular fancy na' me, hadn't du, hinek artful?" leralmin-tor wemmick. Au yi danau nash affectionate apostrophe, k' touching ish-veh brooch representing wuh t'sai heh wuh weeping willow na' wuh braq k' wuh urn fi-tor ish-veh, heh taran, "had ish-veh tor na' me, sagluvau!" "nam-tor wuh t'sai anybody?" leralmin-tor i. "rai, " fun-tor wemmick. "goh ish-veh zhagra. (du tishau ish-veh zeshau t' zhagra, didn't du?) rai; deuce wuh zeshau t' wuh t'sai svi' wuh nuf, mr. Pip, kaula veh, heh she wasn't t' nash slender t'sai-spo' wihfelau, heh du wouldn't ma kum-tor ish-veh looking po' nash urn, vita tra' vesh' vel tor mon svi' ish-veh." wemmick's attention hasu thus khartau tor ish-veh brooch, au shitau ne' wuh vishizhau, heh polished wuh brooch k' ish-veh abru'lik-handkerchief. "did ik vath creature sarlah tor wuh ka shaht?" i ya'akash. "au has wuh ka glazhau." "du're gas'rak, " leralmin-tor wemmick; "ish-veh's wuh genuine glazhau. Mau u' kuv veh nostril vesh' kum-tor abru k' wuh jarel-isachya heh wuh pi' aluk-kik. Ha, au sarlah tor wuh ka shaht; ved wuh malatik shaht la', i assure du. Au zhuk-fas-tor dungi, nash wun-mor did, kuv au didn't isha shitau wuh supposed testators tor yuk nuh'. Du vesh' wuh gentlemanly pi'tchol, hi" (mr. Wemmick vesh' va'ashiv apostrophising), "heh du leralmin-tor du kupi kitau greek. Yah, bounceable! Ra wuh liar du vesh'! I worla ragel-tor such wuh liar u' du!" fa' putting ish-veh tab-ma t'hy'la fi' ish-veh nef va'ashiv, wemmick estuhl wuh largest t' ish-veh mourning mokov heh leralmin-tor, "satau si' tor mahr-tor ish-veh na' me, goh wuh gad fa'." du' au vesh' putting abru wuh vath vishizhau heh coming ne' s' wuh ku-san, wuh nahp tuhsau t'nash-veh kashek ik ek' ish-veh personal ek'zeru vesh' derived s' spo' shu-pal. U' au had shown rai diffidence fi' wuh subject, i ventured fi' wuh liberty t' asking ish-veh wuh deshker, lu au lam-tor fa' me, dusting ish-veh el'ru. "o ha, " au fun-tor, "aifa nam-tor ek' mazhiv-kur t' ik ves. Veh katau wuh'ashiv, gla-tor du; ik's wuh yut t' ish-veh. I kwon-hau-ov nem-tor 'em. Au're curiosities. Heh au're veltra. Au lau ri nam-tor don mau, tonk'peh, po' ek', au're veltra heh leshanik. Ish-veh ri tor signify tor du k' ish-veh maut-ugelik lookout, tonk'peh u' tor myself, t'nash-veh guiding-yel kwon-hau-ov nam-tor, 'prah meskaraya t' leshanik veltra'." lu i had rendered homage tor nash ta'hal, au went fi' tor leralmin, svi' wuh friendly manner: "kuv na' sovek shaik wak lu du ma nothing weh-rom tor tor, du wouldn't kashek coming abru' tor gla-tor me na' walworth, i kupi nufai du wuh sar-tak, heh i dang panah-tor ish-veh wuh dor. I ma ri mau tor gluvaya du; tonk'peh such dahkuh il rehkuh curiosities u' i ma prah du lau spo' tor glazhau abru'; heh i am tishau t' wuh zeshau t' bah-ker heh wuh belaar-kelek." i leralmin-tor i dang nam-tor delighted tor nar-tor ish-veh hospitality. "thankee, " leralmin-tor au; "yi etek'll panah-tor ik ish-veh's tor sarlah ska', lu convenient tor du. Ma du aru-yokul k' mr. Jaggers wi?" "ri wi." "muhl, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "au'll mazhiv-kur-tor du wine, heh rom wine. I'll mazhiv-kur-tor du punch, heh ri rasahkos punch. Heh i' i'll var-tor du vel. Lu du hal-tor tor aru-yokul k' mr. Jaggers, glazhau na' ish-veh housekeeper." "dungau gla-tor nash-veh vel maut uncommon?" "muhl, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "du'll gla-tor wuh kwai beast fnau-tor. Ri ni maut uncommon, du'll var-tor me. I kilko, ik nerau fi' wuh tveshik wildness t' wuh beast, heh wuh nosahp t' taming. Ish-veh skil-tor't weh-neik ish-veh opinion t' mr. Jaggers's tepul. Potau ish-veh bezhun fi' ish-veh." i var-tor ish-veh i would tor ni, k' ek' wuh eku'ko heh curiosity ik ish-veh preparation awakened. U' i vesh' taking t'nash-veh trashan, au ya'akash me kuv i would spo' tor vaikau kaukuh minutes tor seeing mr. Jaggers "na' ish-veh?" na' several utvau, heh ri least fai'ei i didn't clearly fai-tor ra mr. Jaggers would nam-tor afer-tor tor nam-tor "na', " i kilko-tor svi' wuh affirmative. Etek taul-tor vi' wuh kahr, heh sarlah abru svi' wuh crowded police-kelek, wilat wuh khaf-relation (svi' wuh murderous kash-ral) t' wuh tevik, k' wuh fanciful zahvan svi' brooches, vesh' standing na' wuh mofek, uncomfortably chewing vel; du' t'nash-veh guardian had wuh kosu ne' linisaya il tuhs-linisaya, i ri tor fai-tor if, heh vesh' striking ish-veh, heh wuh wu-ku-san, heh kanok-veh la', k' teshan. Kuv anybody, t' whatsoever degree, leralmin-tor wuh zhit ik au didn't messau t', au instantly required tor ma ish-veh "taken ne'." kuv anybody wouldn't tor wuh admission, au leralmin-tor, "i'll ma ish-veh s' du!" heh kuv anybody tor wuh admission, au leralmin-tor, "i' i ma prah du!" wuh magistrates shivered ne' wuh single zeshaya t' ish-veh ozh. Pi'tak heh pi'tak-takers geldau svi' dread rapture fi' ish-veh zhit, heh shrank lu wuh isachya t' ish-veh bezhun-zehl da-tor svi' ish-veh kharat. If vla au vesh' fi' i couldn't tor si', na' au seemed tor me tor nam-tor grinding wuh bosh shi svi' wuh mill; i goh fai-tor ik lu i vazgau si' fi' tiptoe, au vesh' ri fi' wuh vla t' wuh wu-ku-san; na', au vesh' tor wuh mal t' wuh hinek gentleman vi presided, ved convulsive ne' wuh pasu, k' ish-veh denunciations t' ish-veh spa-tor u' wuh representative t' british tor-gav heh yeht-gav svi' ik ku-san ik gad. Chapter xxv. Bentley drummle, vi vesh' ni sulky wuh katravahsu ik au kauk nem-tor abru wuh dunap u' kuv its kitausu had ovsoh ish-veh wuh dash, did ri nem-tor abru wuh acquaintance svi' wuh weht agreeable tam'a. Ras svi' khlop, dvun, heh comprehension, svi' wuh sluggish complexion t' ish-veh limuk, heh svi' wuh suk, awkward lahv ik seemed tor loll pa' svi' ish-veh ru'lut u' au himself lolled pa' svi' wuh tvi-shal, au vesh' idle, yaut, niggardly, reserved, heh suspicious. Sarlah ish-veh t' don-ka sutra ne' svi' somersetshire, vi had nursed nash terish t' qualities abi' au tor wuh discovery ik ish-veh vesh' aishan t' ya'shakhuv heh wuh blockhead. Thus, bentley drummle had sarlah tor mr. Abru'lik lu au vesh' wuh patam taller do ik gentleman, heh ulef wuh dozen patam thicker do danik gentlemen. Startop had vesh' spoilt k' wuh kobat ko-mekh heh potau na' ha-kel lu au ought ki' vesh' na' shi'oren, tonk'peh au vesh' devotedly attached tor ish-veh, heh krol-tor ish-veh mesakh thon-tor. Au had wuh kosu's delicacy t' feature, heh vesh'"u' du lau gla-tor, hi du worla gla-tor ish-veh, " leralmin-tor herbert tor me"exactly spo' ish-veh ko-mekh." ish-veh vesh' tonk'peh malatik ik i dang nem-tor tor ish-veh mau weht kindly do tor drummle, heh ik, kauk svi' wuh earliest khru t' etwel boating, au heh i dang seshaya homeward abreast t' veh wuh'ashiv, conversing s' masu-hali tor masu-hali, du' bentley drummle sarlah abru svi' etwel wake sa'awek, ne' wuh overhanging kutra heh among wuh rushes. Au would kwon-hau-ov creep svi'-gef spo' ein uncomfortable amphibious creature, kauk lu wuh mashen would ma satau ish-veh sahris fi-tor ish-veh yut; heh i kwon-hau-ov nah-tor t' ish-veh u' coming po' etek svi' wuh gu'gelik il k' wuh pla'-masu, lu etwel sha' dahkuh masu-hali vesh' breaking wuh tev-tor il wuh moonlight svi' mid-pilash. Herbert vesh' t'nash-veh intimate besu heh t'hy'la. I presented ish-veh k' wuh ulef-thresh svi' t'nash-veh masu-hali, if vesh' wuh occasion t' ish-veh k'ashiv coming ne' tor hammersmith; heh t'nash-veh mat t' wuh ulef-thresh svi' ish-veh tvi-shal k'ashiv nem-tor me abru tor london. Etek nam-tor-tor tor lates svi' wuh dahkuh shitau na' ek' wadan. I ma wuh affection na' wuh fau-yut wi (hi ish-veh nam-tor ri ni vaksurik wuh fau-yut u' ish-veh vesh' yi), shidau svi' wuh impressibility t' untried youth heh rok. Lu i had vesh' svi' mr. Abru'lik's skan wuh tevun-krus il dahkuh, mr. Heh mrs. Camilla da-tor abru. Camilla vesh' mr. Abru'lik's ko-kai. Georgiana, ik i had gla-tor na' din-tor havisham's fi' wuh ka occasion, isha da-tor abru. She vesh' wuh krei, wuh indigestive single kosu, vi puvutau ish-veh stegel'es odva, heh ish-veh nehasamek ashaya. Aifa sutra fnu-ven me k' wuh hatred t' cupidity heh disappointment. U' wuh tukh veling, au fawned fi-tor me svi' t'nash-veh smusma'es k' wuh basest meanness. Na' mr. Abru'lik, u' wuh grown-abru kan-bu k' rai notion t' ish-veh sha' eku'ko, au gluvau wuh complacent forbearance i had puzhu-tor au sagluvau. Mrs. Abru'lik au meskarau svi' contempt; tonk'peh au kal-tor wuh ri donku-tor soul ki' vesh' heavily disappointed svi' ha'kiv, fai'ei ik foshuhl wuh kobat haul-tor ta'hal fi-tor themselves. Aifa vesh' wuh surroundings among if i settled ne', heh applied myself tor t'nash-veh education. I ak contracted kodonuhk es'merka, heh began tor spend wuh nosahp t' donku ik k'svi wuh zamu pen tevun-krus i dang ma nahp siyah fabulous; tonk'peh k'fai rom heh ek'rasah i terpau tor t'nash-veh dunap. Tra' vesh' rai vath merit svi' nash, do t'nash-veh having kash-ral hiyet tor olau t'nash-veh deficiencies. Svi' mr. Abru'lik heh herbert i prah fi' sahris; heh, k' veh il wuh vath kwon-hau-ov na' t'nash-veh kar-nef tor mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh palikaya i aitlu, heh pa'shik klotaya s' t'nash-veh fau-yut, i bolau ma vesh' u' lo'uk wuh dolt u' drummle kuv i had ovsoh lehkuh. I had ri gla-tor mr. Wemmick na' ein wehk gad, lu i nahp i would kitau ish-veh wuh pitoh heh propose tor hal-tor ha-kel k' ish-veh fi' wuh ac'ruth khru. Au kilko-tor ik ish-veh would mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh mau sanosh, heh ik au would gish me na' wuh office na' shehkuh o'wak-vel. Thither i went, heh tra' i afer-tor ish-veh, putting wuh tal-muv t' ish-veh safe ne' ish-veh pla' u' wuh wak-vel kwul-tor. "did du nah-tor t' walking ne' tor walworth?" leralmin-tor au. "certainly, " leralmin-tor i, "kuv du messau." "maut mau, " vesh' wemmick's kilko, "na' i ma had t'nash-veh mal ne' wuh kitau-skaf ek' gad, heh dungau nam-tor glad tor sakadaya au. I', i'll var-tor du ra i ma prah na' mu'yor-yem, mr. Pip. I ma prah wuh stewed steak, if nam-tor t' ha-kel preparation, heh wuh samu roast kushel, if nam-tor s' wuh fas-tor's-mahr-kel. I nah-tor ish-veh's sival, fai'ei wuh trensu t' wuh mahr-kel vesh' wuh juryman svi' ein nuf t' ours wuh vath gad, heh etek kal-tor ish-veh ne' hagik. I reminded ish-veh t' ish-veh lu i bought wuh kushel, heh i leralmin-tor, "pick etek si' wuh rom veh, hinek briton, fai'ei kuv etek had pudvel-tor tor potau du svi' wuh natuhn wuh'ashiv gad il dahkuh, etek kupi easily ma ovsoh ish-veh." au leralmin-tor tor ik, "kal-tor me tor du wuh la' t' wuh buhfik kushel svi' wuh mahr-kel." i kal-tor ish-veh, t' rivak. U' irak u' ish-veh hal-tor, ish-veh's veltra heh leshanik. Du ri tor vel tor wuh aged parent, i rok?" i really nahp au vesh' fam dvun speaking t' wuh kushel, abi' au hau, "fai'ei i ma prah wuh aged parent na' t'nash-veh shi." i yi leralmin-tor ra politeness required. "ni, du haven't aru-yokul k' mr. Jaggers wi?" au pursued, u' etek lates-tor bi'. "ri wi." "au var-tor me ni nash aru lu au puzhu-tor du vesh' coming. I gish du'll ma wuh k'waw'zhe tor-morrow. Au's going tor ya'akash ish-veh pals, nuh'. Rehkuh t' 'em; ain't tra'?" hi i vesh' ri svi' wuh es'merka t' counting drummle u' veh t' t'nash-veh intimate katravah, i kilko-tor, "ha." "muhl, au's going tor ya'akash wuh bosh gang, "i hardly olau complimented k' wuh zhit, "heh whatever au mazhiv-kur-tor du, au'll mazhiv-kur-tor du rom. Ri tor glazhau fa'rak tor vuhna'es, tonk'peh du'll ma marom'es. Heh tra''s wuh'ashiv rum vel svi' ish-veh kelek, " proceeded wemmick, po' wuh moment's svizh, u' kuv wuh remark zahal-tor fi' wuh housekeeper ken-tor; "au worla kal-tor wuh svep il krani nam-tor terau na' mu-yor." "nam-tor au worla robbed?" "ik's ish-veh!" fun-tor wemmick. "au leralmin-tor, heh mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh si' publicly, "i aitlun tor gla-tor wuh sasu vi'll rob me." s'haile kudau du, i ma puzhu-tor ish-veh, wuh hundred wak, kuv i ma puzhu-tor ish-veh wuh'wak, leralmin tor regular cracksmen svi' etwel khom office, "du fai-tor wilat i ha-tor; i', rai terk nam-tor ek'wak drawn tra'; po ri tor du tor wuh shad-kisheya t' business k' me? Sarlah; mokuhlek't i tempt du?" ri wuh sasu t' au, osu, would nam-tor vakh hiyet tor ar'kadan ish-veh fi', na' ashaya il donku." "au dread ish-veh ni mau?" leralmin-tor i. "dread ish-veh, " leralmin-tor wemmick. "i dva-tor du au dread ish-veh. Ri tonk'peh ra au's artful, kauk svi' ish-veh defiance t' au. Rai haul-tukh, osu. Britannia mokev, kanok floku." "ni au wouldn't ma mau, " i glantau, "kauk kuv au" "ah! Tonk'peh au would ma mau, " leralmin-tor wemmick, tresahk-tor me pen, "heh au fai-tor ish-veh. Au'd ma ish-veh ha-tor, heh wuh ha-tor t' nosahp t' 'em. Au'd ma ek' au kupi prah. Heh ish-veh's impossible tor leralmin ra au couldn't prah, kuv au mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh kashek tor ish-veh." i vesh' tevan-tor vi' meditation fi' t'nash-veh guardian's greatness, lu wemmick remarked: "u' tor wuh k'torr math, ik's goh ish-veh malatik gluder, du fai-tor. Wuh pilash's its malatik gluder, heh au's ish-veh malatik gluder. Glazhau na' ish-veh glantau-naf-elakh. Ik's yeht hiyet." "ish-veh's maut masuk', " leralmin-tor i. "masuk'?" ashiv-tor wemmick. "i nah-tor ni. Heh ish-veh glantau nam-tor wuh pi-maat-tukh repeater, heh don wuh hundred plesh-tor kuv ish-veh's don wuh qsu'lit. Mr. Pip, tra' nam-tor pa' stehkuh hundred pi'tak svi' nash kahr vi fai-tor ek' pa' ik glantau; tra''s ri wuh sasu, wuh kosu, il wuh kan, ekhlami, vi wouldn't shasutan-tor wuh smallest naf svi' ik naf-elakh, heh eku ish-veh u' kuv ish-veh vesh' yon-kur fal, kuv inveigled vi' touching ish-veh." palikauk k' such discourse, heh afterwards k' conversation t' wuh weht paik malat, did mr. Wemmick heh i beguile wuh wak heh wuh fau-yut, abi' au mazhiv-kur-tor me tor ken-tor ik etek had lasha svi' wuh kahkrus t' walworth. Ish-veh saudau tor nam-tor wuh tershaya t' pla' lanes, ruk-tor, heh pi' bah-ker, heh tor la' wuh pulva t' wuh rather pasik retirement. Wemmick's kelek vesh' wuh pi' wooden cottage svi' wuh midst t' besau t' bah-ker, heh wuh fik t' ish-veh vesh' tresahk si' heh kras-tor spo' wuh kipof mounted k' pohshayek. "t'nash-veh sha' doing, " leralmin-tor wemmick. "glazhau takov; ri tor ish-veh?" i highly commended ish-veh, i nah-tor ish-veh vesh' wuh smallest kelek i ek'wak gla-tor; k' wuh queerest gothic krani (k' irak wuh greater krus t' au sham), heh wuh gothic svep siyah nuh' pi' tor prah svi' na'. "ik's wuh yeht haifan-zeh, gla-tor du, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "heh fi' sundays i sahr-tor abru wuh yeht haifan. Yi glazhau la'. Po' i ma tuhsau nash mesut, i abertau ish-veh upsoand tresahk ska' wuh sviribaya." wuh mesut vesh' wuh plank, heh ish-veh tuhsau wuh chasm pa' kehkuh ash'ya eik heh dahkuh glu. Tonk'peh ish-veh vesh' maut vaksurik tor gla-tor wuh pride k' if au abertau ish-veh abru heh tor ish-veh sahris; smiling u' au did ni, k' wuh relish heh ri goh mechanically. "na' naukuh o'wak-vel kanok mu-yor, greenwich wak, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "wuh pohshayek yon. Tra' au nam-tor, gla-tor du! Heh lu du zhu-tor ish-veh hal-tor, i nah-tor du'll leralmin au's wuh stinger." wuh krus t' ordnance referred tor, vesh' mounted svi' wuh dahshauk klomak, torvau t' nentu-vis-ar'kadan. Ish-veh vesh' protected s' wuh igen-va k' wuh ingenious pi' tarpaulin contrivance svi' wuh malat t' wuh umbrella. "yi, na' wuh pla', " leralmin-tor wemmick, "s' glan, ni u' ri tor rashertau wuh idea t' fortifications, na' ish-veh's wuh dvatai k' me, kuv du ma wuh idea, lesh ish-veh si' heh potau ish-veh abru, i ri tor fai-tor whether ik's ish-veh opinion" i leralmin-tor, decidedly. "na' wuh pla', tra''s wuh pig, heh tra' nam-tor fowls heh rabbits; yi, i knock teretuhr t'nash-veh sha' pi' nentu, gla-tor du, heh tor'ovau cucumbers; heh du'll judge na' mu'yor-yem ra wihfelau t' wuh yarmok i mokuhlek ashenau. Ni, osu, " leralmin-tor wemmick, smiling va'ashiv, tonk'peh seriously nuh', u' au hutau ish-veh patam, "kuv du mokuhlek suppose wuh pi' shi besieged, ish-veh would meskaraya si' wuh e'shua t' wuh wak svi' sfek t' provisions." yi, au conducted me tor wuh bower pa' wuh dozen ker ska', tonk'peh if vesh' betau k' such ingenious kuvoran-tor t' yut ik ish-veh nem-tor ved wuh wu wak tor prah na'; heh svi' nash retreat etwel bezhun-zaneshu vesh' already eku forth. Etwel punch vesh' cooling svi' wuh ornamental suk'muzh, fi' t'vi rihkal wuh bower vesh' ashenau. Nash krus t' masu (k' wuh vikuvtra svi' wuh svitan if lau ma vesh' wuh yarmok na' mu'yor-yem) vesh' t' wuh raf-kuvik shid, heh au had torvau wuh mashulek svi' ish-veh, if, lu du eku wuh pi' mill going heh nem-tor wuh kem s' wuh mev, mavau tor ik powerful sadvun ik ish-veh tor wuh pla' t' ish-veh el'ru ved masupik. "i am t'nash-veh sha' mishek, heh t'nash-veh sha' carpenter, heh t'nash-veh sha' plumber, heh t'nash-veh sha' bahsu, heh t'nash-veh sha' jack t' ek' trades, " leralmin-tor wemmick, svi' acknowledging t'nash-veh compliments. "muhl; ish-veh's wuh rom vel, du fai-tor. Ish-veh brushes wuh newgate cobwebs maf, heh sanoi wuh aged. Du wouldn't kashek hasu na' wuh'wak puragtau tor wuh aged, would du? Ish-veh wouldn't shitau du si'?" i sagluvau wuh readiness i olau, heh etek went vi' wuh castle. Tra' etek afer-tor, sitting k' wuh yon, wuh maut hinek sasu svi' wuh flannel tor-pal: sok'i, cheerful, kel'o, heh muhl palutunau, tonk'peh intensely zhu-fam. "muhl aged parent, " leralmin-tor wemmick, shaking el'ru k' ish-veh svi' wuh cordial heh jocose yut, "uf am du?" "ek' gas'rak, john; ek' gas'rak!" kilko-tor wuh hinek sasu. "la''s mr. Pip, aged parent, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "heh i istaya du kupi zhu-tor ish-veh ahm. Nod maf na' ish-veh, mr. Pip; ik's ra au tishau. Nod maf na' ish-veh, kuv du sanoi, spo' winking!" "nash nam-tor wuh tok-ti shi' t'nash-veh sa-fu's, osu, " maf-tor wuh hinek sasu, du' i nodded u' lerash u' i possibly kupi. "nash nam-tor wuh takov sanosh-solektra, osu. Nash gla-tor heh aifa vaksurik ar'kada fi-tor ish-veh ought tor nam-tor potau teretuhr k' wuh shashol, po' t'nash-veh sa-fu's wak, na' wuh sutra's tizh'es." "du're u' yaut t' ish-veh u' punch; ain't du, aged?" leralmin-tor wemmick, contemplating wuh hinek sasu, k' ish-veh lerash limuk really softened; "tra''s wuh nod na' du; " giving ish-veh wuh tremendous veh; "tra''s wuh'ashiv na' du; " giving ish-veh wuh fam dvun weht tremendous veh; "du spo' ik, ri tor du? Kuv du're ri zungor, mr. Pipthough i fai-tor ish-veh's tiring tor strangerswill du um ish-veh veh weht? Du mokuhlek't nah-tor uf ish-veh sanoi ish-veh." i tipped ish-veh several weht, heh au vesh' svi' lo'uk tam'a. Etek losrak ish-veh bestirring himself tor yem-tor wuh fowls, heh etek hayal-tor ne' tor etwel punch svi' wuh arbour; wilat wemmick var-tor me, u' au smoked wuh mev, ik ish-veh had taken ish-veh wuh rom wehk tevun tor katau wuh veltra abru tor its la' ralash t' perfection. "nam-tor ish-veh ish-veh sha', mr. Wemmick?" "o ha, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "i ma prah meskaraya t' ish-veh, wuh zeshau na' wuh wak. Ish-veh's wuh freehold, k' george!" "nam-tor ish-veh indeed? I rok mr. Jaggers krol-tor ish-veh?" "worla gla-tor ish-veh, " leralmin-tor wemmick. "worla puzhu-tor t' ish-veh. Worla gla-tor wuh aged. Worla puzhu-tor t' ish-veh. Rai; wuh office nam-tor veh vel, heh awek ha'kiv nam-tor wuh'ashiv. Lu i hal-tor vi' wuh office, i trasha wuh castle za' me, heh lu sarlah nash-veh vi' wuh castle, i trasha wuh office za' me. Kuv ish-veh's ri svi' sovek yut disagreeable tor du, du'll oblige me k' doing wuh ka. I ri tor istaya ish-veh professionally spoken pa'." veling i olau t'nash-veh rom odva involved svi' wuh observance t' ish-veh ya'akash. Wuh punch hasu maut nice, etek hayal-tor tra' drinking ish-veh heh talking, abi' ish-veh vesh' siyah naukuh o'wak-vel. "getting be' pohshayek-yon, " leralmin-tor wemmick yi, u' au laid ne' ish-veh mev; "ish-veh's wuh aged's skasau." proceeding vi' wuh castle va'ashiv, etek afer-tor wuh aged heating wuh poker, k' expectant bezhun, u' wuh preliminary tor wuh performance t' nash lo'uk nightly hali-kal. Wemmick lam-tor k' ish-veh glantau svi' ish-veh el'ru abi' wuh moment vesh' sarlah na' ish-veh tor nem-tor wuh yon-kur-fal poker s' wuh aged, heh teslau tor wuh kipof. Au nem-tor ish-veh, heh went si', heh presently wuh stinger went ska' k' wuh bang ik hutau wuh amp pi' natuhn t' wuh cottage u' kuv ish-veh bolau tevan tor krus, heh tor kanok makh heh teacup svi' ish-veh mokov. Fi-tor nash, wuh agedwho i dva-tor would ma vesh' blown si' t' ish-veh kar-ku-san tonk'peh na' holding fi' k' wuh elbowscried si' exultingly, "au's pohshau! I heerd ish-veh!" heh i nodded na' wuh hinek gentleman abi' ish-veh nam-tor rai khlop t' starun tor afsakau ik i absolutely kupi ri gla-tor ish-veh. Wuh tvi-wak svi' ik wak heh mu'yor-yem wemmick vaikau tor showing me ish-veh tershaya t' curiosities. Au vesh' mostly t' wuh felonious character; comprising wuh pen k' if wuh u'thet forgery had vesh' committed, wuh distinguished hohl-vel il dahkuh, ein klachek t' isachya, heh several manuscript confessions written ne' condemnation, fi-tor if mr. Wemmick eku particular tala u' hasu, tor nam-tor-tor ish-veh sha' zhit, "kanok veh t' 'em ti, osu." aifa vesh' agreeably pusaganau among pi' specimens t' china heh makh, vuhnauk pu trifles tor k' wuh proprietor t' wuh museum, heh ein tobacco-stoppers skrim-tor k' wuh aged. Au vesh' ek' gluvaya svi' ik tvi-shal t' wuh castle vi' if i had vesh' wuh'rak inducted, heh if dvin-tor, ri goh u' wuh paik sitting-tvi-shal tonk'peh u' wuh af'tum nuh', kuv i lau judge s' wuh saucepan fi' wuh hob, heh wuh brazen bijou abru' wuh yon-sha'ti designed na' wuh suspension t' wuh roasting-jack. Tra' vesh' wuh pu pi' ko-kan svi' attendance, vi glazhau po' wuh aged svi' wuh gad. Lu she had laid wuh mu'yor-yem-sai, wuh mesut vesh' ne-tor tor mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh tvai t' ruk-tor, heh she withdrew na' wuh mu-yor. Wuh mu'yor-yem vesh' marom; heh hi wuh castle vesh' rather subject tor pseth-nehaya insomuch ik ish-veh zahv-tor spo' wuh rasahkos kov-sayas, heh hi wuh pig lau ma vesh' weh-irak ska', i vesh' heartily sanoi k' t'nash-veh bosh entertainment. Il vesh' tra' sovek drawback fi' t'nash-veh pi' turret shi'yuk, mesakh tra' hasu such wuh maut wonil abru-tol svi' me heh wuh haifan-zeh, ik lu i ti ne' fi' t'nash-veh pla' svi' sar-tak, ish-veh seemed u' kuv i had tor vo'ektaya ik fek fi' t'nash-veh fa-patam ek' mu-yor. Wemmick vesh' abru lehkuh-mal svi' wuh asal, heh i am kwes i puzhu-tor ish-veh cleaning t'nash-veh kluf. Po' ik, au tevan-tor tor bahan, heh vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh s' t'nash-veh gothic krani pretending tor employ wuh aged, heh nodding na' ish-veh svi' wuh danik vaikau manner. Etwel asal-yem vesh' u' rom u' wuh mu'yor-yem, heh na' ulef-vesht ohkuh precisely etek palikau na' pi' britain. K' degrees, wemmick prah dryer heh harder u' etek went bi', heh ish-veh ru'lut tightened vi' wuh lehk-office va'ashiv. Na' kim-shah, lu etek prah tor ish-veh shi' business heh au seshau si' ish-veh tal-muv s' ish-veh tor-pal-hmoi'neks, au glazhau u' unconscious t' ish-veh walworth veltra u' kuv wuh castle heh wuh drawbridge heh wuh arbour heh wuh suk'muzh heh wuh mashulek heh wuh aged, had ek' vesh' blown vi' ret teretuhr k' wuh kim-shah khrasaya t' wuh stinger. Chapter xxvi. Ish-veh tevan-tor si' u' wemmick had var-tor me ish-veh would, ik i had wuh lehkuh-mal opportunity t' comparing t'nash-veh guardian's establishment k' ik t' ish-veh cashier heh clerk. T'nash-veh guardian vesh' svi' ish-veh tvi-shal, washing ish-veh el'ru k' ish-veh scented pu, lu i went vi' wuh office s' walworth; heh au puvutau me tor ish-veh, heh mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh k'waw'zhe na' myself heh t'hylara if wemmick had dator me tor poprah. "rai hali-kal, " au stipulated, "heh rai aru-yem sai-vel, heh leralmin tor-morrow." i ya'akash ish-veh wilat etek dang sarlah tor (na' i had rai idea wilat au ha-tor), heh i dva-tor ish-veh vesh' svi' ish-veh paik objection tor tor sovek-vel spo' wuh admission, ik au kilko-tor, "sarlah la', heh i'll nem-tor du ha-kel k' me." i nartaya nash opportunity t' remarking ik au pu-tor ish-veh clients ska', u' kuv au vesh' wuh sharushsu il wuh zud-hassu. Au had wuh tsorayek svi' ish-veh tvi-shal, fitted abru na' wuh lof, if smelt t' wuh scented pu spo' wuh perfumer's mahr-kel. Ish-veh had wuh unusually suk jack-towel fi' wuh roller svi'udish wuh svep, heh au would pu-tor ish-veh el'ru, heh psethau au heh pseth au ek' abru' nash towel, whenever sarlah ish-veh svi' s' wuh police kelek il dismissed wuh client s' ish-veh tvi-shal. Lu i heh t'nash-veh t'hylara teslau tor ish-veh na' shehkuh o'wak-vel thurai gad, au seemed ki' vesh' engaged fi' wuh nuf t' wuh darker complexion do tsuri, na' etek afer-tor ish-veh k' ish-veh patam butted vi' nash tsorayek, ri goh washing ish-veh el'ru, tonk'peh laving ish-veh limuk heh gargling ish-veh drahk. Heh kauk lu au had ovsoh ek' ik, heh had hal-tor ek' pauk wuh jack-towel, au nem-tor si' ish-veh penknife heh theshau wuh nuf s' ish-veh felu fa' au shitau ish-veh tor-pal fi'. Tra' vesh' ein sutra slinking pa' u' tsuri lu etek be' dvun-tor si' vi' wuh yut, vi vesh' evidently anxious tor stariben k' ish-veh; tonk'peh tra' vesh' vel ni conclusive svi' wuh pau t' scented pu if vikuvau ish-veh la'es, ik au mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh abru na' ik gad. U' etek lates-tor bi' na'tev'rak, au vesh' naglanshau ek'wak heh va'ashiv k' ein limuk svi' wuh patreitan t' wuh yut, heh whenever ik pavesh-tor au variben louder tor me; tonk'peh au worla vathru naglanshau anybody, il nem-tor beglanau ik anybody naglanshau ish-veh. Au conducted etek tor gerrard yut, soho, tor wuh kelek fi' wuh khu'rak vla t' ik yut. Rather wuh stately kelek t' its ves, tonk'peh dolefully svi' aitlun t' krasan, heh k' kitork krani. Au nem-tor si' ish-veh tal-muv heh tu'ash wuh svep, heh etek ek' went vi' wuh kov tvur, sai-famik, gloomy, heh pi' nam-tor-tor. Ni, abru wuh gu'gelik khav-kur staircase vi' wuh weizehl t' rehkuh gu'gelik khav-kur tvi-shal fi' wuh wuh'rak lan-tol. Tra' vesh' skrim-tor garlands fi' wuh panelled temok, heh u' au lam-tor ekhlami giving etek welcome, i fai-tor ra ves t' pakuv i nahp au glazhau spo'. Aru-yem vesh' laid svi' wuh buhfik t' aifa tvi-shal; wuh dahr vesh' ish-veh sai-vel-tor-tvi-shal; wuh wuh, ish-veh shi'yuk. Au var-tor etek ik au meskarau wuh bosh kelek, tonk'peh rarely nam-tor-tor weht t' ish-veh do gla-tor etek. Wuh pasu vesh' comfortably laidno haul-tukh svi' wuh dvin, t' courseand na' wuh vla t' ish-veh ku-san vesh' wuh capacious dumb-waiter, k' wuh vuhna'es t' mashek heh decanters fi' ish-veh, heh kehkuh dishes t' savas na' dessert. I pubeglanau throughout, ik au potau kanok-vei ne' ish-veh sha' el'ru, heh sagan-tor kanok-vei himself.
