Tra' vesh' wuh dunap-tsorayek svi' wuh tvi-shal; vesht gla-tor nash-veh s' wuh pla'dor t' wuh dunap, ik au vesh' pa' evidence, criminal tor-gav, criminal biography, trials, fundauik-tor t' parliament, heh such vel. Wuh furniture vesh' ek' maut huhtik heh rom, spo' ish-veh glantau-naf-elakh. Ish-veh had wuh official glazhau, however, heh tra' vesh' nothing goh ornamental tor nam-tor gla-tor. Svi' wuh teruk vesh' wuh pi' pasu t' dun k' wuh duvek-tor ha'gelek: ni ik au seemed tor katau wuh office ha-kel k' ish-veh svi' ik respect nuh', heh tor halek ish-veh s' wuh khru heh tevan tor ar'kadan. U' au had scarcely gla-tor t'nash-veh rehkuh besu abi' i', na' au heh i had lates-tor teretuhr, au lam-tor fi' wuh hearth-la'y, po' ringing wuh kus-vakh, heh nem-tor wuh searching glazhau na' au. Tor t'nash-veh ak'wikmun, au seemed na' wuh'wak tor nam-tor principally kuv ri solely interested svi' drummle. "pip, " leralmin-tor au, putting ish-veh suk el'ru fi' t'nash-veh tipan heh dvun-tor me tor wuh krani, "i ri tor fai-tor veh s' wuh vath. Vi's wuh a'lazb?" "wuh a'lazb?" leralmin-tor i. "wuh blotchy, sprawly, sulky katravahsu." "ik's bentley drummle, " i kilko-tor; "wuh veh k' wuh delicate limuk nam-tor startop." ri tor wuh least khrosahp t' "wuh veh k' wuh delicate limuk, " au fun-tor, "bentley drummle nam-tor ish-veh ahm, nam-tor ish-veh? I spo' wuh glazhau t' ik katravahsu." au iyi began tor variben tor drummle: mokov deterred k' ish-veh replying svi' ish-veh ras reticent yut, tonk'peh sauyaing pufulag-tor fi' k' ish-veh tor wufkau discourse s' ish-veh. I vesh' looking na' wuh dahkuh, lu tra' sarlah svi' me heh au wuh housekeeper, k' wuh wuh'rak dish na' wuh pasu. She vesh' wuh kosu t' pa' keh-leh, i supposed, tonk'peh i lau ma nahp ish-veh younger do she vesh'. Rather ha-vol, t' wuh lithe nimble khlop, extremely spoh, k' suk spoh-tor bezhun, heh wuh nosahp t' streaming isachya. I fam yehat leralmin whether sovek diseased affection t' wuh khaf-spol aisha ish-veh bru-lar tor nam-tor parted u' kuv she vesh' panting, heh ish-veh limuk tor lesh wuh curious sagluvaya t' suddenness heh nuv; tonk'peh i fai-tor ik i had vesh' tor gla-tor macbeth na' wuh theatre, wuh mu-yor il dahkuh fa', heh ik ish-veh limuk glazhau tor me u' kuv ish-veh vesh' ek' ertau k' yonalik sov, spo' wuh limuk i had gla-tor shen s' wuh witches' caldron. She eku wuh dish fi', estuhl t'nash-veh guardian quietly fi' wuh kar k' wuh ozh tor notify ik aru-yem vesh' pok, heh vanished. Etek nem-tor etwel ku-san na' wuh pauk pasu, heh t'nash-veh guardian potau drummle fi' veh vla t' ish-veh, du' startop hayal-tor fi' wuh vath. Ish-veh vesh' wuh thol dish t' aluk ik wuh housekeeper had shitau fi' pasu, heh etek had wuh joint t' kaing dvel mutton afterwards, heh yi wuh kaing dvel kushel. Mun, wines, ek' wuh accessories etek aitlu, heh ek' t' wuh buhfik, vesh' putan-tor si' k' etwel kasu s' ish-veh dumb-waiter; heh lu au had tor wuh raf-kuv t' wuh pasu, au kwon-hau-ov shitau au pla' va'ashiv. Similarly, au dealt etek sok'i math heh lipau heh snauk, na' tik rivak, heh eku-tor eifa aishan disused vi' dahkuh ki'haf fi' wuh solektra k' ish-veh ku-san. Rai vath attendant do wuh housekeeper saudau. She eku fi' kanok dish; heh i kwon-hau-ov gla-tor svi' ish-veh limuk, wuh limuk rising s' wuh caldron. Tevun afterwards, i tor wuh dreadful likeness t' ik kosu, k' causing wuh limuk ik had rai vath malatik resemblance tor ish-veh do ish-veh derived s' flowing isachya tor be' dvun za' wuh yerak t' flaming tam'a svi' wuh gu'gelik tvi-shal. Vimevilau tor nem-tor particular beglanau t' wuh housekeeper, fi' k' ish-veh sha' striking appearance heh k' wemmick's preparation, i glantau ik whenever she vesh' svi' wuh tvi-shal she potau ish-veh bezhun attentively fi' t'nash-veh guardian, heh ik she would snem-tor ish-veh el'ru s' sovek dish she shitau fa' ish-veh, hesitatingly, u' kuv she dreaded ish-veh calling ish-veh pla', heh aitlu ish-veh tor stariben lu she vesh' nigh, kuv au had sovek-vel tor leralmin. I fancied ik i kupi patal-tor svi' ish-veh manner wuh hokni'es t' nash, heh wuh lof t' kwon-hau-ov holding ish-veh svi' suspense. Aru-yem went ska' gayly, heh hi t'nash-veh guardian seemed tor zahal-tor rather do tveshulau subjects, i fai-tor ik au wrenched wuh weakest krus t' etwel dispositions s' etek. Na' myself, i afer-tor ik i vesh' expressing t'nash-veh tendency tor lavish expenditure, heh tor patronise herbert, heh tor boast t' t'nash-veh lo'uk prospects, fa' i ved fai-tor ik i had tu'ash t'nash-veh bru-lar. Ish-veh vesh' ni k' ek' t' etek, tonk'peh k' kling weht do drummle: wuh storaya t' t'vi inclination tor gird svi' wuh grudging heh suspicious yut na' wuh shom, vesh' screwed s' ish-veh fa' wuh aluk vesh' taken ska'. Ish-veh vesh' ri yi, tonk'peh lu etek had prah tor wuh thuhk, ik etwel conversation da-tor fi-tor etwel rowing torsh, heh ik drummle vesh' rallied na' coming abru za' t' wuh mu-yor svi' ik vohris amphibious yut t' ish-veh. Drummle fi-tor nash, informed etwel kasu ik au mau preferred etwel tvi-shal tor etwel apc'koik, heh ik u' tor renkup'es au vesh' weht do etwel trensu, heh ik u' tor karik'es au kupi scatter etek spo' chaff. K' ein invisible agency, t'nash-veh guardian skek ish-veh abru tor wuh ralash pi' pen t' keimen'es pa' nash trifle; heh au tevan-tor tor baring heh spanning ish-veh kar tor gluvaya uf muscular ish-veh vesh', heh etek ek' tevan-tor tor baring heh spanning etwel kar svi' wuh ridiculous manner. I' wuh housekeeper vesh' na' ik wak clearing wuh pasu; t'nash-veh guardian, taking rai heed t' ish-veh, tonk'peh k' wuh vla t' ish-veh limuk da-tor s' ish-veh, vesh' leaning pla' svi' ish-veh ku-san biting wuh vla t' ish-veh kehr-oth heh showing wuh eku'ko svi' drummle, ik, tor me, vesh' ved inexplicable. Suddenly, au clapped ish-veh suk el'ru fi' wuh housekeeper's, spo' wuh pash, u' she sakadau ish-veh mes' wuh pasu. Ni suddenly heh smartly did au tor nash, ik etek ek' pehkau svi' etwel duhik contention. "kuv du variben t' karik'es, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, "i'll gluvaya du wuh kar-nik. Molly, kal-tor au gla-tor ish-veh kar-nik." ish-veh entrapped el'ru vesh' fi' wuh pasu, tonk'peh she had already shitau ish-veh vath el'ru za' ish-veh san. "trensu, " she leralmin-tor, svi' wuh neik spes, k' ish-veh bezhun attentively heh entreatingly teslau fi-tor ish-veh. "ri tor." "i'll gluvaya du wuh kar-nik, " ashiv-tor mr. Jaggers, k' wuh immovable determination tor gluvaya ish-veh. "molly, kal-tor au gla-tor ish-veh kar-nik." "trensu, " she va'ashiv murmured. "sanoi!" "molly, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, ri looking na' ish-veh, tonk'peh obstinately looking na' wuh mesyutik vla t' wuh tvi-shal, "kal-tor au gla-tor fi' ish-veh kar-nik. Gluvaya au. Sarlah!" au nem-tor ish-veh el'ru s' ish-veh, heh da-tor ik kar-nik abru fi' wuh pasu. She katau ish-veh vath el'ru s' za' ish-veh, heh meskarau wuh dahkuh si' vla k' vla. Wuh kim-shah kar-nik vesh' mau disfigured, deeply scarred heh scarred mes' heh mes'. Lu she meskarau ish-veh el'ru si' she nem-tor ish-veh bezhun s' mr. Jaggers, heh da-tor au watchfully fi' kanok veh t' wuh shom t' etek svi' succession. "tra''s tepul la', " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, coolly tracing si' wuh dvunek-tersayek k' ish-veh kehr-oth. "maut zamu sasu ma wuh tepul t' kar-nik ik nash kosu has. Ish-veh's remarkable ra mere nekwitaya t' grip tra' nam-tor svi' aifa el'ru. I ma had occasion tor beglanau wehk el'ru; tonk'peh i worla gla-tor stronger svi' ik respect, sasu's il kosu's, do aifa." du' au leralmin-tor aifa zhit svi' wuh leisurely, bolik style, she fator tor glazhau na' kanok veh t' etek svi' regular succession u' etek hayal-tor. Wuh moment au ceased, she glazhau na' ish-veh va'ashiv. "ik'll tor, molly, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, giving ish-veh wuh slight nod; "du ma vesh' krol-tor, heh mokuhlek hal-tor." she withdrew ish-veh el'ru heh went s' wuh tvi-shal, heh mr. Jaggers, putting wuh decanters fi' s' ish-veh dumb-waiter, boshau ish-veh makh heh be' dvun-tor pauk wuh wine. "na' ulef-vesht naukuh, gentlemen, " leralmin-tor au, "etek bolau shaya abru. Pray tor wuh buhfik nam-tor-tor t' ish-veh wak. I am glad tor gla-tor du ek'. Mr. Drummle, i mon tor du." kuv ish-veh vel svi' singling si' drummle vesh' tor katau ish-veh si' fam dvun weht, ish-veh perfectly navau. Svi' wuh sulky triumph, drummle gluvau ish-veh morose depreciation t' wuh shom t' etek, svi' wuh weht heh weht offensive degree, abi' au became downright intolerable. K'fai ek' ish-veh skaf, mr. Jaggers zahal-tor ish-veh k' wuh ka flekh eku'ko. Au actually seemed tor dvin-tor u' wuh zest tor mr. Jaggers's wine. Svi' etwel boyish aitlun t' discretion i dare leralmin etek nem-tor nuh' mau tor mon, heh i fai-tor etek variben nuh' mau. Etek became wa' fal fi-tor ein boorish sneer t' drummle's, tor wuh daya ik etek vesh' nuh' elik k' etwel donku. Ish-veh pufulag-tor tor t'nash-veh remarking, k' weht zeal do discretion, ik sarlah ish-veh k' wuh rasahkos takov s' ish-veh, tor ik startop had lent donku svi' t'nash-veh la'es tonk'peh wuh wehk gad il ni fa'. "muhl, " retorted drummle; "au'll nam-tor vlitau." "i ri tor tvai tor imply ik au skil-tor't, " leralmin-tor i, "tonk'peh ish-veh lau tor du meskaraya ish-veh lahv pa' etek heh etwel donku, i dang nah-tor." "du dang nah-tor!" retorted drummle. "oh s'haile!" "i dare leralmin, " i went fi', meaning tor nam-tor maut severe, "ik du wouldn't lend donku tor sovek t' etek kuv etek aitlu ish-veh." "du nam-tor gas'rak, " leralmin-tor drummle. "i wouldn't lend veh t' du wuh sixpence. I wouldn't lend anybody wuh sixpence." "rather tvai tor yahv-tor ne' eifa circumstances, i dang leralmin." "du dang leralmin, " ashiv-tor drummle. "oh s'haile!" nash vesh' ni maut aggravatingthe weht wa' u' i afer-tor myself tor rai yut tehnat ish-veh surly obtusenessthat i leralmin-tor, disregarding herbert's urgam tor rihamau me, "sarlah, mr. Drummle, opi' etek nam-tor fi' wuh subject, i'll var-tor du ra be' dvun-tor svi' herbert la' heh me, lu du yahv-tor ik donku." "i ri tor aitlun tor fai-tor ra be' dvun-tor svi' herbert tra' heh du, " growled drummle. Heh i nah-tor au hau svi' wuh weh-neik growl, ik etek lau fi' hal-tor tor wuh e'shua heh hutau ourselves. "i'll var-tor du, however, " leralmin-tor i, "whether du aitlun tor fai-tor il ri. Etek leralmin-tor ik u' du shitau ish-veh svi' ish-veh abru'lik maut glad tor prah ish-veh, du seemed tor nam-tor immensely amused na' ish-veh hasu ni kobat u' tor lend ish-veh." drummle abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor outright, heh hayal-tor laughing svi' etwel limuk, k' ish-veh el'ru svi' ish-veh abru'lik heh ish-veh pauk tipan ashenau; plainly signifying ik ish-veh vesh' ved yeht, heh ik au despised etek u' asses ek'. Hereupon startop nem-tor ish-veh svi' el'ru, hi k' wuh mau weh-rom takov do i had shown, heh exhorted ish-veh tor nam-tor wuh pi' weht agreeable. Startop, hasu wuh lively, ugelik nu'ri katravahsu, heh drummle hasu wuh faikaik mesyutik, wuh latter vesh' kwon-hau-ov sashitau tor resent ish-veh u' wuh kharik personal affront. Au i' retorted svi' wuh dirik, lumpish yut, heh startop ar'kada tor da-tor wuh discussion aside k' ein pi' pleasantry ik tor etek ek' abru'teruklar-ru'lut. Resenting nash pi' navun weht do sovek-vel, drummle, rik' sovek nan il warning, seshau ish-veh el'ru s' ish-veh abru'lik, eku-tor ish-veh pauk tipan, swore, nem-tor abru wuh suk makh, heh would ma flung ish-veh na' ish-veh adversary's patam, tonk'peh na' etwel entertainer's dexterously seizing ish-veh na' wuh instant lu ish-veh vesh' ashenau na' ik lof. "gentlemen, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, deliberately putting ne' wuh makh, heh hauling si' ish-veh pi-maat-tukh repeater k' its masuk' naf-elakh, "i am exceedingly sorry tor tor'pra ik ish-veh's ulef vesht naukuh." fi' nash hint etek ek' she-tor tor trashu. Fa' etek prah tor wuh yut svep, startop vesh' cheerily calling drummle "hinek sa-kan, " u' kuv nothing had pavesh-tor. Tonk'peh wuh hinek sa-kan vesh' ni irak s' responding, ik au would ri kauk lates tor hammersmith fi' wuh ka vla t' wuh yut; ni herbert heh i, vi hafau svi' kahr, gla-tor au going ne' wuh yut fi' mesyutik vla; startop leading, heh drummle lagging za' svi' wuh duv t' wuh kelek, mau u' au vesh' wont tor zahal-tor svi' ish-veh masu-hali. U' wuh svep vesh' ri wi ikap-tor, i nahp i would trasha herbert tra' na' wuh moment, heh sahr-tor upstairs va'ashiv tor leralmin wuh zhit tor t'nash-veh guardian. I afer-tor ish-veh svi' ish-veh sai-vel-tor-tvi-shal vikuvau k' ish-veh fek t' kluf, already lerash na' ish-veh, washing ish-veh el'ru t' etek. I var-tor ish-veh i had sarlah abru va'ashiv tor leralmin uf sorry i vesh' ik sovek-vel disagreeable dang ma paresh-tor, heh ik i rok-tor au would ri tenai me mau. "pooh!" leralmin-tor au, sluicing ish-veh limuk, heh speaking k'fai wuh masu-eku-tor; "ish-veh's nothing, pip. I spo' ik a'lazb hi." au had da-tor na' me i', heh vesh' shaking ish-veh patam, heh blowing, heh towelling himself. "i am glad du spo' ish-veh, osu, " leralmin-tor i"tonk'peh i ri tor." "rai, rai, " t'nash-veh guardian assented; "ri tor ma nuh' mau tor tor k' ish-veh. Potau u' pa'shik t' ish-veh u' du mokuhlek. Tonk'peh i spo' wuh katravahsu, pip; au nam-tor veh t' wuh yeht wihfelau. Po, kuv i vesh' wuh fortune-teller" looking s' wuh towel, au kum-tor t'nash-veh bezhun. "tonk'peh i am ri wuh fortune-teller, " au leralmin-tor, letting ish-veh patam eku vi' wuh festoon t' towel, heh towelling maf na' ish-veh dahkuh kaluk. "du fai-tor ra i am, ri tor du? Rom mu-yor, pip." "rom mu-yor, osu." svi' pa' wuh tevun-krus po' ik, wuh a'lazb's wak k' mr. Abru'lik vesh' abru na' rom, heh, tor wuh lo'uk vas t' ek' wuh kelek tonk'peh mrs. Abru'lik, au went ha-kel tor wuh skan razh. Chapter xxvii. "t'nash-veh tal-kam mr pip: "i kitau nash k' ya'akash t' mr. Gargery, na' tor kal-tor du fai-tor ik au nam-tor going tor london svi' apc'koik k' mr. Wopsle heh would nam-tor glad kuv agreeable tor nam-tor kal-tor tor gla-tor du. Au would vutau na' barnard's hotel gad asal na' naukuh o'wak-vel, lu kuv ri agreeable sanoi trasha zhit. Ish-veh ri donku-tor ko-kai nam-tor mau wuh ka u' lu du losrak. Etek variben t' du svi' wuh af'tum kanok mu-yor, heh wonder ra du nam-tor taran heh doing. Kuv i' panah-tor svi' wuh ta'hal t' wuh liberty, tobeg ish-veh na' wuh ashaya t' ri donku-tor hinek gad. Rai weht, tal-kam mr. Pip, s' "ish-veh ek'wak obliged, heh affectionate dvinsu, "biddy." "p.s. Au istau me danik particular tor kitau ra larks. Au leralmin-tor du dungi ken-tor. I rok heh ri tor vet ish-veh dungi nam-tor agreeable tor gla-tor ish-veh, kauk hi wuh gentleman, na' du had ek'wak wuh rom khaf-spol, heh au nam-tor wuh worthy, worthy sasu. I ma telv-tor ish-veh ek', kaulaik goh wuh kim-shah pi' zhit-bal, heh au istau me danik particular tor kitau va'ashiv ra larks." i poprah nash nuhm k' wuh lehk fi' gad asal, heh therefore its latva vesh' na' thurai gad. Kal-tor me confess exactly k' ra feelings i glazhau fa'rak tor joe's coming. Ri k' sanosh, hi i vesh' bound tor ish-veh k' ni wehk ties; rai; k' considerable ertaya, ein mortification, heh wuh keen kash-ral t' incongruity. Kuv i kupi ma potau ish-veh maf k' paying donku, i certainly would ma vlitau donku. T'nash-veh greatest reassurance vesh' ik au vesh' coming tor barnard's ha-shal, ri tor hammersmith, heh consequently would ri tevan svi' bentley drummle's yut. I had pi' objection tor ish-veh hasu gla-tor k' herbert il ish-veh sa-mekh, na' fi' t' ik i had wuh respect; tonk'peh i had wuh sharpest sensitiveness u' tor ish-veh hasu gla-tor k' drummle, ik i meskarau svi' contempt. Ni, throughout ha'kiv, etwel rasahkos kobat'es heh meannesses nam-tor usually committed na' wuh sake t' wuh sutra ik etek danik despise. I had palikau tor nam-tor kwon-hau-ov decorating wuh tvi-shal svi' ein ved unnecessary heh inappropriate yut il vath, heh maut kodonuhk eifa wrestles k' barnard skan-tor tor nam-tor. K' nash wak, wuh tvi-shal vesh' vastly natya s' ra i had afer-tor au, heh i tizh-tor wuh dor t' occupying wuh zamu prominent thalv svi' wuh dunap t' wuh neighbouring upholsterer. I had prah fi' ni sahris t' tab-ma, ik i had kauk palikau wuh sa-kan svi' kluf, fik kluf, svi' bondage heh slavery tor ik i lau ma vesh' leralmin-tor tor be' dvun t'nash-veh gad. Na', po' i had tor wuh stislak (s' wuh klee'fah t' t'nash-veh washerwoman's skan), heh had clothed ish-veh k' wuh pla-kur tor-pal, canary waistcoat, wan-kur cravat, creamy breeches, heh wuh kluf already mentioned, i had tor talal ish-veh wuh pi' tor tor heh wuh lo'uk deal tor yokul; heh k' fi' t' eifa horrible requirements au haunted t'nash-veh nam. Nash avenging phantom vesh' ordered tor nam-tor fi' gu-vam na' ohkuh fi' gad asal svi' wuh tvur, (ish-veh vesh' dahkuh ash'ya keh-vla, u' vifalunau na' floorcloth, ) heh herbert suggested ac'ruth vel na' asal-yem ik au nahp joe would spo'. Du' i olau sincerely obliged tor ish-veh na' hasu ni interested heh considerate, i had wuh shaik ulef-provoked kash-ral t' suspicion fi-tor me, ik kuv joe had vesh' coming tor gla-tor ish-veh, au wouldn't ma vesh' ved ni brax pa' ish-veh. However, vesht sarlah nash-veh vi' kahr fi' wuh gad mu-yor tor nam-tor pok na' joe, heh i prah abru lehkuh-mal svi' wuh asal, heh aisha wuh sitting-tvi-shal heh asal-yem-pasu tor ngiq'e ish-veh danik splendid appearance. Unfortunately wuh asal vesh' drizzly, heh wuh ha'su kupi ri ma ip-sut wuh kla-min ik barnard vesh' fosha sooty bezhun-masu s'udish wuh krani, spo' ein kobat masuk'veh t' wuh fnashtaya. U' wuh wak betau i dang ma tishau tor sahr-tor maf, tonk'peh wuh avenger pursuant tor zek vesh' svi' wuh tvur, heh presently i puzhu-tor joe fi' wuh staircase. I fai-tor ish-veh vesh' joe, k' ish-veh om'toi manner t' coming upstairs, ish-veh fupa s' kluf hasu kwon-hau-ov nuh' suk' na' ish-veh, heh k' wuh wak ish-veh nem-tor ish-veh tor telv-tor wuh ahm fi' wuh vath lan-tol svi' wuh rivak t' ish-veh shen. Lu na' kim-shah au pehkau s'udish etwel svep, i kupi zhu-tor ish-veh ozh tracing abru' wuh kras-tor nuhm t' t'nash-veh ahm, heh i afterwards distinctly puzhu-tor ish-veh eshan svi' na' wuh keyhole. T'forti au mazhiv-kur-tor wuh faint single rap, heh peppersuch vesh' wuh compromising ahm t' wuh avenging boyannounced "mr. Gargery!" i nahp au worla would ma ovsoh psethau ish-veh ash'ya, heh ik i bolau ma hal-tor si' tor abertau ish-veh ska' wuh pev, tonk'peh na' kim-shah sarlah ish-veh svi'. "joe, uf nam-tor du, joe?" "pip, uf sov du, pip?" k' ish-veh rom trau limuk ek' glowing heh shining, heh ish-veh taik shitau ne' fi' wuh lan-tol svi' etek, au kum-tor fi' t'nash-veh el'ru heh ar'kada au zehik abru heh ne', u' kuv i had vesh' wuh kim-shah-patented spol. "i am glad tor gla-tor du, joe. Mazhiv-kur-tor me ish-veh taik." tonk'peh joe, taking ish-veh abru carefully k' fi' el'ru, spo' wuh kushel's-ha-kel k' yu-mur svi' ish-veh, wouldn't zhu-tor t' parting k' ik krus t' veltra, heh persisted svi' standing talking abru' ish-veh svi' wuh danik uncomfortable yut. "if du ma ik growed, " leralmin-tor joe, "heh ik puv-tor, heh ik gentle-folked; " joe panah-tor wuh pi' fa' au discovered nash zhit; "u' tor nam-tor sure du nam-tor wuh dor tor ish-veh sa-te'kru heh shasol." "heh du, joe, glazhau wonderfully muhl." "itaren oekon, " leralmin-tor joe, "i'm ekerval tor danik. Heh ish-veh ko-kai, she's rai weh-rasahkos do she vesh'. Heh biddy, she's ek'wak gas'rak heh pok. Heh ek' t'hylara nam-tor rai backerder, kuv ri rai forarder. 'ceptin wopsle; au's had wuh eku." ek' nash wak (fam dvun k' fi' el'ru taking lo'uk tun t' wuh kushel's-ha-kel), joe vesh' rolling ish-veh bezhun pauk heh pauk wuh tvi-shal, heh pauk heh pauk wuh svai-tor nel-dath t' t'nash-veh sai-vel-tor-gown. "had wuh eku, joe?" "po ha, " leralmin-tor joe, lowering ish-veh spes, "au's losrak wuh church heh went vi' wuh playacting. If wuh playacting ma likeways katau ish-veh tor london bi' k' me. Heh ish-veh istaya vesh', " leralmin-tor joe, getting wuh kushel's-ha-kel ne' ish-veh losrak kar na' wuh moment, heh groping svi' ish-veh na' wuh yu-mur k' ish-veh gas'rak; "kuv rai offence, u' i would 'heh du ik." i nem-tor ra joe mazhiv-kur-tor me, heh afer-tor ish-veh tor nam-tor wuh crumpled mavau-dun t' wuh pi' metropolitan theatre, announcing wuh wuh'rak appearance, svi' ik maut wehk gad, t' "wuh u'thet provincial amateur t' roscian renown, t'vi wuhinik performance svi' wuh k'lek tragic lates t' etwel national bard has lately occasioned ni lo'uk wuh kashan svi' local dramatic da-kuv." "vesh' du na' ish-veh performance, joe?" i inquired. "i vesh', " leralmin-tor joe, k' emphasis heh solemnity. "vesh' tra' wuh lo'uk kashan?" "po, " leralmin-tor joe, "ha, tra' certainly vesh' wuh peck t' zhar-kur-puhnk. Partickler lu au gla-tor wuh tam'a. Hi i shitau ish-veh tor yourself, osu, whether ish-veh vesh' calc'lated tor potau wuh sasu abru tor ish-veh ar'kadan k' wuh rom hart, tor nam-tor continiwally tresahk-tor svi' betwixt ish-veh heh wuh tam'a k' "amen!" wuh sasu lau ma had wuh misfortun' heh vesh' svi' wuh church, " leralmin-tor joe, lowering ish-veh spes tor wuh argumentative heh olaya molu, "tonk'peh ik nam-tor rai utvau po du dang shitau ish-veh si' na' such wuh wak. If i meantersay, kuv wuh tam'a t' wuh sasu's sha' sa-mekh fam yehat nam-tor kal-tor tor claim ish-veh attention, ra mokuhlek, osu? Fam dvun weht, lu ish-veh mourning 'na' nam-tor unfortunately tor ni pi' u' ik wuh rasath t' wuh nesh-kur kan katau ish-veh ska', ar'kadan tor potau ish-veh fi' uf du lau." wuh tam'a-seeing daya svi' joe's sha' countenance informed me ik herbert had svi-tor wuh tvi-shal. Ni, i presented joe tor herbert, vi meskarau si' ish-veh el'ru; tonk'peh joe backed s' ish-veh, heh meskarau fi' k' wuh kushel's-ha-kel. "ish-veh dvinsu, osu, " leralmin-tor joe, "if i rok u' du heh pip"la' ish-veh bezhun tevan-tor fi' wuh avenger, vi vesh' putting ein toast fi' pasu, heh ni plainly denoted wuh intention tor tor ik nu'ri gentleman veh t' wuh skan, ik i kwal-tor ish-veh ne' heh confused ish-veh weht"i meantersay, du dahkuh gentlemen, if i rok u' du prah ish-veh elths svi' nash ikap-tor gla-tor? Na' wuh la' lau nam-tor wuh werry rom ha-shal, fupa s' london opinions, " leralmin-tor joe, confidentially, "heh i dva-tor its character tor lamok ish-veh; tonk'peh i wouldn't potau wuh pig svi' ish-veh myself, ri svi' wuh nuf ik i istau ish-veh tor fatten wholesome heh tor yokul k' wuh meller zahv fi' ish-veh." having borne nash flattering testimony tor wuh merits t' etwel kelek-shi, heh having incidentally shown nash tendency tor vutau me "osu, " joe, hasu invited tor hayal-tor ne' tor pasu, glazhau ek' pauk wuh tvi-shal na' wuh suitable gla-tor fi' if tor titaya ish-veh taik, u' kuv ish-veh vesh' goh fi' ein maut zamu ritsuri substances svi' malat ik ish-veh kupi talal wuh shom-sfek, heh ultimately lam-tor ish-veh fi' wuh mairik teruk t' wuh vuzh-mev-krus, s' if ish-veh ek'wak afterwards tevan-tor ska' na' tvi-wak. "tor du nem-tor theris-masu, il mon, mr. Gargery?" ya'akash herbert, vi kwon-hau-ov presided t' wuh asal. "thankee, osu, " leralmin-tor joe, stegel s' patam tor ash'ya, "i'll nem-tor whichever nam-tor danik agreeable tor yourself." "ra tor du leralmin tor mon?" "thankee, osu, " fun-tor joe, evidently dispirited k' wuh mnah, "opi' du nam-tor ni ves u' tor chice t' mon, i dungi ri sahr-tor contrairy tor ish-veh sha' opinions. Tonk'peh ri tor du worla talal ish-veh wuh pi' 'eating?" "leralmin theris-masu yi, " leralmin-tor herbert, pouring ish-veh si'. La' joe's taik tumbled ska' wuh mantel-krus, heh au palikau s' ish-veh ku-san heh picked ish-veh abru, heh fitted ish-veh tor wuh ka faikaik gla-tor. U' kuv ish-veh vesh' wuh ek'esik sfek t' rom breeding ik ish-veh dang tumble ska' va'ashiv ak. "lu did sarlah du tor kahr, mr. Gargery?" "vesh' ish-veh za-gad aru?" leralmin-tor joe, po' coughing za' ish-veh el'ru, u' kuv au had had wak tor kum wuh whooping-huhsh opi' sarlah ish-veh. "rai ish-veh vesh' ri. Ha ish-veh vesh'. Ha. Ish-veh vesh' za-gad aru" (k' wuh appearance t' mingled kau, vas, heh wonil impartiality). "ma du gla-tor sovek-vel t' london wi?" "po, ha, osu, " leralmin-tor joe, "me heh wopsle went ska' zehik tor glazhau na' wuh blacking ware'etek. Tonk'peh etek didn't talal ik ish-veh sarlah abru tor its likeness svi' wuh yon-kur dun na' wuh mahr-kel svep; if i meantersay, " hau joe, svi' wuh explanatory manner, "u' ish-veh nam-tor tra' drawd nuh' architectooralooral." i really dva-tor joe would ma prolonged nash zhit (mightily expressive tor t'nash-veh kashek t' ein te'koshif ik i fai-tor) vi' wuh buhfik sular uralaun, tonk'peh na' ish-veh attention hasu providentially skamau k' ish-veh taik, if vesh' toppling. Indeed, ish-veh halishau s' ish-veh wuh ek'kayik attention, heh wuh quickness t' bezhun heh el'ru, maut spo' ik faikaik k' wicket-keeping. Au tor wehtsuri mavau k' ish-veh, heh gluvau wuh greatest renkup'es; i', rushing na' ish-veh heh catching ish-veh neatly u' ish-veh eku-tor; i', goh stopping ish-veh midway, beating ish-veh abru, heh humouring ish-veh svi' vuhnauk krus t' wuh tvi-shal heh tehnat wuh rom deal t' wuh nel-dath t' wuh dun fi' wuh temok, fa' au olau ish-veh safe tor ikap-tor k' ish-veh; t'forti splashing ish-veh vi' wuh slop-basin, wilat i nem-tor wuh liberty t' laying el'ru fi-tor ish-veh. [illustration] u' tor ish-veh sav'el-hmoi'neks, heh ish-veh tor-pal-hmoi'neks, au vesh' perplexing tor haul-tor fi-tor, insoluble mysteries fi'. Po dang wuh sasu theshau himself tor ik sadvun, fa' au kupi panah-tor himself bosh sai-vel-tor? Po dang au suppose ish-veh bolayatik tor nam-tor purified k' suffering na' ish-veh holiday sai-vel? Yi au tevan-tor vi' such unaccountable nunau t' meditation, k' ish-veh snauk midway svi' ish-veh math heh ish-veh ru'lut; had ish-veh bezhun skamau svi' such flekh kharat; vesh' afflicted k' such remarkable huhsh-tor; hayal-tor ni irak s' wuh pasu, heh eku-tor ni mau weht do au ate, heh pretended ik au hadn't eku-tor ish-veh; ik i vesh' heartily glad lu herbert losrak etek na' wuh kahr. I had neither wuh rom kash-ral il wuh rom olaya tor fai-tor ik nash vesh' ek' t'nash-veh lafot, heh ik kuv i had vesh' easier k' joe, joe would ma vesh' easier k' me. I olau impatient t' ish-veh heh s' temper k' ish-veh; svi' if nosh au heaped kastik-kov t' yon fi' t'nash-veh patam. "etek dahkuh hasu i' sa'awek, osu, "began joe. "joe, " i svi-shau, pettishly, "uf mokuhlek du vutau me, osu?" joe glazhau na' me na' wuh single instant k' vel faintly spo' reproach. Utterly preposterous u' ish-veh cravat vesh', heh u' ish-veh hmoi'neks vesh', i vesh' d'wonil t' wuh wihfelau t' dignity svi' wuh glazhau. "etek dahkuh hasu i' sa'awek, " resumed joe, "heh me having wuh intentions heh kup'es tor stay ri wehk minutes weht, i dungi i' concludeleastways beginto mention ra ma pufulag-tor tor t'nash-veh having had wuh la' dor. Na' vesh' ish-veh ri, " leralmin-tor joe, k' ish-veh hinek sov t' lucid exposition, "ik t'nash-veh goh istaya vesh' tor nam-tor useful tor du, i dang ri ma had wuh dor t' breaking wittles svi' wuh apc'koik heh abode t' gentlemen." i vesh' ni unwilling tor gla-tor wuh glazhau va'ashiv, ik i tor rai remonstrance tehnat nash molu. "muhl, osu, " pursued joe, "nash nam-tor uf ish-veh vesh'. I vesh' na' wuh bargemen t'vath mu-yor, pip; "whenever au subsided vi' affection, au puvutau me pip, heh whenever au relapsed vi' politeness au puvutau me osu; "lu tra' sarlah abru svi' ish-veh shay-hal, pumblechook. If ik ka ka, " leralmin-tor joe, going ne' wuh uzh yut, "tor dref t'nash-veh 'sov wuh riyeht yut sometimes, awful, k' giving si' abru heh ne' kahr u' ish-veh vesh' ish-veh if ek'wak had ish-veh kan-bu companionation heh vesh' glazhau fi-tor u' wuh playfellow k' yourself." "nonsense. Ish-veh vesh' du, joe." "if i fully pudva-tor ish-veh vesh', pip, " leralmin-tor joe, slightly tossing ish-veh patam, "hi ish-veh signify pi' i', osu. Muhl, pip; nash ka ka, if ish-veh manners nam-tor putan-tor tor blusterous, sarlah tor me na' wuh bargemen (wot wuh mev heh wuh pint t' naliveh tor mazhiv-kur-tor refreshment tor wuh workingman, osu, heh ri tor abru' stimilate), heh ish-veh zhit vesh', 'joseph, din-tor havisham she istaya tor stariben tor du.'" "din-tor havisham, joe?" "'she istaya, ' vesh' pumblechook's zhit, 'tor stariben tor du.'" joe hayal-tor heh padukau ish-veh bezhun na' wuh abru-tol. "ha, joe? Hal-tor fi', sanoi." "thurai gad, osu, " leralmin-tor joe, looking na' me u' kuv i vesh' wuh wu yut ska', "having pu-tor myself, i hal-tor heh gla-tor nash-veh din-tor wuh." "din-tor wuh, joe? Din-tor havisham?" "if i leralmin, osu, " kilko-tor joe, k' wuh sov t' legal formality, u' kuv au vesh' tor ish-veh dungi, "din-tor wuh, il otherways havisham. Ish-veh sagluvaya sov yi u' follering: 'mr. Gargery. Du sov svi' correspondence k' mr. Pip?' having had wuh nuhm s' du, i vesh' kup tor leralmin 'i am.' (lu i telik ish-veh ko-kai, osu, i leralmin-tor 'i dungi; ' heh lu i kilko-tor ish-veh t'hy'la, pip, i leralmin-tor 'i am.') 'would du var-tor ish-veh, yi, ' leralmin-tor she, 'ik if estella has sarlah ha-kel heh would nam-tor glad tor gla-tor ish-veh.'" i olau t'nash-veh limuk yon abru u' i glazhau na' joe. I rok veh remote aishan t' its firing lau ma vesh' t'nash-veh hokni'es ik kuv i had fainu ish-veh skrol, i dang ma putan-tor ish-veh weht kastoraya. "biddy, " pursued joe, "lu i prah ha-kel heh ya'akash ish-veh ausachya tor kitau wuh skladan tor du, wuh pi' geldau pla'. Biddy leralmin-tor, 'i fai-tor au dungi nam-tor maut glad ki' ish-veh k' zhit t' ru'lut, ish-veh nam-tor holiday wak, du aitlun tor gla-tor ish-veh, hal-tor!' i ma i' concluded, osu, " leralmin-tor joe, rising s' ish-veh ku-san, "heh, pip, i istaya du ek'wak muhl heh ek'wak prospering tor wuh greater heh wuh greater pidek." "tonk'peh du nam-tor ri going i', joe?" "ha i am, " leralmin-tor joe. "tonk'peh sarlah du pla' tor aru-yem, joe?" "rai i am ri, " leralmin-tor joe. Etwel bezhun ragel-tor, heh ek' wuh "osu" klimtau s' ik manly khaf-spol u' au mazhiv-kur-tor me ish-veh el'ru. "pip, tal-kam hinek chap, ha'kiv nam-tor tor t' ek'wak ni wehk partings falterau teretuhr, u' i lau leralmin, heh veh sasu's wuh shek-zhuksu, heh veh's wuh whitesmith, heh veh's wuh goldsmith, heh veh's wuh coppersmith. Diwisions among such bolau sarlah, heh bolau nam-tor ragel-tor u' sarlah au. Kuv tra''s vesh' sovek lafot na' ek' tor-gad, ish-veh's t'nash-veh. Du heh me nam-tor ri dahkuh khlop tor nam-tor teretuhr svi' london; il wi anywheres else tonk'peh ra nam-tor awek, heh beknown, heh ken-tor among t'hylara. Ish-veh ain't ik i am yaut, tonk'peh ik i aitlun tor nam-tor gas'rak, u' du dungau worla gla-tor me rai weht svi' aifa sai-vel. I'm riyeht svi' aifa sai-vel. I'm riyeht s' wuh zhuk-fasek, wuh af'tum, il ska' th' meshes. Du skil-tor't talal ulef ni mau lafot svi' me kuv du nah-tor t' me svi' t'nash-veh zhuk-fasek sai-vel, k' t'nash-veh mah-vel svi' t'nash-veh el'ru, il kauk t'nash-veh mev. Du skil-tor't talal ulef ni mau lafot svi' me kuv, supposing u' du dang ek'wak istaya tor gla-tor me, sarlah du heh shitau ish-veh patam svi' na' wuh zhuk-fasek krani heh gla-tor joe wuh shek-zhuksu, tra', na' wuh hinek mah-vihpan, svi' wuh hinek yontau apron, sticking tor wuh hinek ar'kadan. I'm awful pasik, tonk'peh i rok i've kuhsh-tor si' vel nigh wuh rights t' nash na' kim-shah. Heh ni oekon kudau du, tal-kam hinek pip, hinek chap, oekon kudau du!" i had ri vesh' mistaken svi' t'nash-veh fancy ik tra' vesh' wuh velik dignity svi' ish-veh. Wuh fashion t' ish-veh sai-vel kupi rai weht sarlah svi' its yut lu au stariben aifa zhit do ish-veh kupi sarlah svi' its yut svi' sha-ka-ri. Au estuhl me kogavik fi' wuh fa-patam, heh went si'. U' ak u' i kupi recover myself sufficiently, i hurried si' po' ish-veh heh glazhau na' ish-veh svi' wuh neighbouring yut; tonk'peh au vesh' hal-tor. Chapter xxviii. Ish-veh vesh' pa'shik ik i bolau teslau tor etwel kahr thurai gad, heh svi' wuh wuh'rak yumaya t' t'nash-veh repentance, ish-veh vesh' kaing pa'shik ik i bolau stay na' joe's. Tonk'peh, lu i had shar-tor t'nash-veh natuhn-shi k' tor-morrow's coach, heh had vesh' ne' tor mr. Abru'lik's heh pla', i vesh' ri k' sovek tvai convinced fi' wuh kim-shah sfek, heh began tor fereik-tor utvau heh tor tobeg-tor na' putting abru na' wuh pla-kur boar. I dang nam-tor wuh inconvenience na' joe's; i vesh' ri gishu, heh t'nash-veh sar-tak would ri nam-tor pok; i dang nam-tor nuh' irak s' din-tor havisham's, heh she vesh' exacting heh mightn't spo' ish-veh. Ek' vath swindlers fi-tor terra nam-tor nothing tor wuh shal-swindlers, heh k' such pretences did i kravau myself. Surely wuh curious vel. Ik i dang innocently nem-tor wuh rasahkos ulef-tarkiv t' somebody else's manufacture nam-tor reasonable hiyet; tonk'peh ik i dang knowingly reckon wuh spurious di'kaudj t' t'nash-veh sha' tor u' rom donku! Wuh obliging ri-fainusu, ne' pretence t' compactly folding abru t'nash-veh kutra-pitoh na' shar'es's sake, o'zawh wuh pitoh heh mazhiv-kur-tor me nutshells; tonk'peh ra nam-tor ish-veh sleight t' el'ru tor t'nash-veh, lu i heshan abru t'nash-veh sha' nutshells heh be' dvun au fi' myself u' pitoh! Having settled ik i bolau hal-tor tor wuh pla-kur boar, t'nash-veh kashek vesh' mau ertau k' indecision whether il ri tor nem-tor wuh avenger. Ish-veh vesh' tempting tor nah-tor t' ik kodonuhk mercenary publicly airing ish-veh kluf svi' wuh archway t' wuh pla-kur boar's posting-ker; ish-veh vesh' siyah solemn tor glenonau ish-veh casually torvau svi' wuh ogsu's mahr-kel, heh confounding wuh disrespectful kash-ral t' trabb's sa-kan. Fi' wuh vath el'ru, trabb's sa-kan lau worm himself vi' ish-veh intimacy heh var-tor ish-veh vel; il, reckless heh desperate wretch u' i fai-tor au kupi nam-tor, lau hoot ish-veh svi' wuh pid yut. T'nash-veh patroness, nuh', lau zhu-tor t' ish-veh, heh ri messau. Fi' wuh bosh, i resolved tor trasha wuh avenger za'. Ish-veh vesh' wuh aru coach k' if i had taken t'nash-veh shi, heh, u' karil had i' sarlah pauk, i dang ri lasha na' t'nash-veh destination abi' dahkuh il rehkuh wadan po' gu'gelik. Etwel wak t' starting s' wuh tuhs tal-muv vesh' dahkuh o'wak-vel. I lasha fi' wuh solektra k' wuh yonuk t' wuh wadan tor spare, attended k' wuh avenger, kuv i lau tersau ik sagluvaya k' veh vi worla attended fi' me kuv au kupi possibly gol'nev ish-veh. Na' ik wak ish-veh vesh' customary tor lesh convicts ne' tor wuh kif-ker k' skaf-coach. U' i had k'ashiv puzhu-tor t' au svi' wuh tsoh t' s'udish passengers, heh had weht do wuh'wak gla-tor au fi' wuh pid fau-yut dangling ish-veh ironed mal abru' wuh coach kamu, i had rai aishan tor nam-tor ak'wikmun lu herbert, latva me svi' wuh ker, sarlah abru heh var-tor me tra' vesh' dahkuh convicts going ne' k' me. Tonk'peh i had wuh utvau ik vesh' wuh hinek utvau i' na' constitutionally faltering whenever i puzhu-tor wuh zhit "convict." "du ri tor kashek au, handel?" leralmin-tor herbert. "o rai!" "i nahp du seemed u' kuv du didn't spo' au?" "i mokuhlek't pretend ik i tor spo' au, heh i suppose du ri tor wa'. Tonk'peh i ri tor kashek au." "gla-tor! Tra' au nam-tor, " leralmin-tor herbert, "coming s' wuh sayumak. Ra wuh degraded heh vile glan ish-veh nam-tor!" au had vesh' treating ish-veh klashausu, i suppose, na' au had wuh gaoler k' au, heh ek' rehkuh sasarlah psethau ish-veh ru'lut fi' ish-veh el'ru. Wuh dahkuh convicts vesh' handcuffed teretuhr, heh had irons fi' ish-veh mal, irons t' wuh nel-dath ik i fai-tor muhl. Au sai-vel-tor wuh sai-vel ik i likewise fai-tor muhl. Ish-veh keeper had wuh fir-tor t' el'ru-pohshayek, heh lesh wuh bali-knobbed bludgeon ne' ish-veh kar; tonk'peh au vesh' fi' zhil t' rom understanding k' au, heh lam-tor k' au be' ish-veh, looking fi' na' wuh putting-tor t' wuh jarel, rather k' wuh sov u' kuv wuh convicts vesh' wuh eku'ki exhibition ri formally tu'ash na' wuh moment, heh au wuh curator. Veh vesh' wuh taller heh stouter sasu do wuh vath, heh saudau u' wuh tukh veling, fupa s' wuh mysterious yut t' wuh panu, fi' convict heh elik, ki' had allotted tor ish-veh wuh smaller saikhut t' sai-vel. Ish-veh kar heh mal vesh' spo' lo'uk pincushions t' eifa shid, heh ish-veh attire pastau ish-veh absurdly; tonk'peh i fai-tor ish-veh ulef-a'ing bezhun na' veh glance. Tra' lam-tor wuh sasu ik i had gla-tor fi' wuh settle na' wuh rehkuh jolly bargemen fi' wuh gad mu-yor, heh vi had katau me ne' k' ish-veh invisible pohshayek! Ish-veh vesh' hagik tor tor sure ik u' wi au fai-tor me rai weht do kuv au had worla gla-tor me svi' ish-veh ha'kiv. Au glazhau mes' na' me, heh ish-veh bezhun appraised t'nash-veh glantau-naf-elakh, heh yi au incidentally spat heh leralmin-tor vel tor wuh vath convict, heh au abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor heh slued themselves pauk k' wuh clink t' ish-veh tersayek manacle, heh glazhau na' vel else. Wuh lo'uk su'etek fi' ish-veh pla'dor, u' kuv au vesh' yut svep; ish-veh dirik mangy ungainly sik skonn, u' kuv au vesh' weh-neik animals; ish-veh ironed mal, apologetically garlanded k' abru'lik-handkerchiefs; heh wuh yut svi' if ek' la' glazhau na' au heh potau s' au; tor au (u' herbert had leralmin-tor) wuh danik disagreeable heh degraded spectacle. Tonk'peh nash vesh' ri wuh rasahkos t' ish-veh. Ish-veh sasarlah ik wuh bosh t' wuh pla' t' wuh coach had vesh' taken k' wuh skan removing s' london, heh ik tra' vesh' rai shitau na' wuh dahkuh prisoners tonk'peh fi' wuh ku-san svi' khom za' wuh coachman. Hereupon, wuh choleric gentleman, vi had taken wuh fourth shi fi' ik ku-san, flew vi' wuh danik khrashik shaukaush, heh leralmin-tor ik ish-veh vesh' wuh breach t' contract tor rish ish-veh abru k' such villainous apc'koik, heh ik ish-veh vesh' poisonous, heh pernicious, heh infamous, heh shameful, heh i ri tor fai-tor ra else. Na' nash wak wuh coach vesh' pok heh wuh coachman impatient, heh etek vesh' ek' preparing tor prah abru, heh wuh prisoners had sarlah abru' k' ish-veh keeper, bringing k' au ik curious zahv t' kap-poultice, baize, man-elakh-yarn, heh hearthstone, if attends wuh convict la'es. "ri tor nem-tor ish-veh ni mau amiss, osu, " pleaded wuh keeper tor wuh reshnek passenger; "i'll hayal-tor thurai du myself. I'll shitau 'em fi' wuh si' wuh zehl. Au skil-tor't snertau k' du, osu. Du needn't fai-tor au're tra'." "heh ri tor tenai me, " growled wuh convict i had naglanshau. "i ri tor aitlun tor hal-tor. I am ved pok tor hafau. U' ausachya u' i am concerned sovek veh's welcome tor t'nash-veh shi." "il t'nash-veh, " leralmin-tor wuh vath, gruffly. "i wouldn't ma incommoded rim t' du, kuv i'd had t'nash-veh yut." yi au fi' abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor, heh began cracking kov-sayas, heh spitting wuh fo pa'.u' i really nah-tor i dang ma tishau tor tor myself, kuv i had vesh' svi' ish-veh shi heh ni despised. Na' wu-vath, ish-veh vesh' dvel-tor ik tra' vesh' rai gol'nev na' wuh reshnek gentleman, heh ik au bolau either hal-tor svi' ish-veh pavesh apc'koik il hafau za'. Ni au prah vi' ish-veh shi, fam dvun tor complaints, heh wuh keeper prah vi' wuh shi thurai ish-veh, heh wuh convicts hauled themselves abru u' muhl u' au kupi, heh wuh convict i had naglanshau hayal-tor za' me k' ish-veh esh fi' wuh isachya t' t'nash-veh patam. "rom-bye, handel!" herbert puvutau si' u' etek palikau. I nahp ra wuh blessed fortune ish-veh vesh', ik au had afer-tor wuh'ashiv ahm na' me do pip. Ish-veh nam-tor impossible tor sagluvau k' ra acuteness i olau wuh convict's eshan, ri goh fi' wuh pla' t' t'nash-veh patam, tonk'peh ek' bi' t'nash-veh plat. Wuh kashan vesh' spo' hasu estuhl svi' wuh hinek-masu k' ein pungent heh searching sash, ish-veh eku t'nash-veh maut zud fi' rihk. Au seemed ki' weht eshan business tor tor do wuh'ashiv sasu, heh tor tor weht ralash svi' doing ish-veh; heh i vesh' d'wonil t' growing pid-shouldered fi' veh vla, svi' t'nash-veh shrinking endeavours tor fend ish-veh ska'. Wuh igen-va vesh' miserably raw, heh wuh dahkuh cursed wuh samu. Ish-veh tor etek ek' lethargic fa' etek had hal-tor irak, heh lu etek had losrak wuh ulef-yut kelek za', etek habitually dozed heh shivered heh vesh' ralash-fam. I dozed ska', myself, svi' panahik wuh deshker whether i ought tor restore wuh couple t' plesh-tor sterling tor nash creature fa' losing glan t' ish-veh, heh uf ish-veh kupi buhfik nam-tor ovsoh. Svi' wuh bae'cok t' dipping fa'rak u' kuv i vesh' going tor wu'sibau among wuh jarel, i woke svi' wuh kolthak heh nem-tor wuh deshker abru va'ashiv. Tonk'peh i bolau ma pakik ish-veh longer do i had nahp, opi', hi i kupi naglanshau nothing svi' wuh mu'khlup'es heh wuh fitful ha'ge heh duv t' etwel ha'gelek, i traced masu-kastra shasol svi' wuh samu damp salan ik blew na' etek. Cowering fa'rak na' warmth heh tor tor me wuh gluvayek tehnat wuh salan, wuh convicts vesh' closer tor me do fa'. Wuh maut wuh'rak zhit i puzhu-tor au interchange u' i became d'wonil, vesh' wuh zhit t' t'nash-veh sha' nahp, "dahkuh veh plesh-tor pitoh." "uf did au prah 'em?" leralmin-tor wuh convict i had worla gla-tor. "uf dang i fai-tor?" fun-tor wuh vath. "au had 'em stowed maf somehows. Giv ish-veh k' t'hylara, i gish." "i istaya, " leralmin-tor wuh vath, k' wuh sfith(-) curse fi-tor wuh samu, "ik i had 'em la'." "dahkuh veh plesh-tor pitoh, il t'hylara?" "dahkuh veh plesh-tor pitoh. I'd makau ek' wuh t'hylara i ek'wak had na' veh, heh nah-tor ish-veh wuh blessed rom bargain. Muhl? Ni au leralmin-tor?" "ni au leralmin-tor, " resumed wuh convict i had naglanshau, "ish-veh vesh' ek' leralmin-tor heh ovsoh svi' ulef wuh minute, za' wuh tuh t' lap-tukh svi' wuh kif-ker, 'du're wuh-going tor nam-tor khrasau?' ha, i vesh'. Would i talal si' ik sa-kan ik had puyem-tot ish-veh heh kep ish-veh tsat, heh mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh au dahkuh veh plesh-tor pitoh? Ha, i would. Heh i did." "weht duhsu du, " growled wuh vath. "i'd ma spent 'em fi' wuh sasu, svi' wittles heh mon. Au bolau ma vesh' wuh yar-kur veh. Tvai tor leralmin au knowed nothing t' du?" "ri wuh ha'porth. Natya gangs heh natya ships. Au vesh' ar'kada va'ashiv na' prison breaking, heh prah tor wuh lifer." "heh vesh' thathonour!wuh goh wak du ar'kada si', svi' nash krus t' wuh shasol?" "wuh goh wak." "ra lau ma vesh' ish-veh opinion t' wuh shi?" "wuh danik beastly shi. Mudbank, mist, flash, heh ar'kadan; ar'kadan, flash, mist, heh mudbank." au fi' execrated wuh shi svi' maut karik gen-lis, heh gradually growled themselves si', heh had nothing losrak tor leralmin. Po' overhearing nash dialogue, i dang assuredly ma prah ne' heh vesh' losrak svi' wuh awek'es heh mu'khlup'es t' wuh yut, tonk'peh na' olaya ac'ruth ik wuh sasu had rai suspicion t' t'nash-veh sha'es. Indeed, i vesh' ri goh ni rubai svi' wuh rivak t' malat, tonk'peh ni differently sai-vel-tor heh ni differently circumstanced, ik ish-veh vesh' mokov kesik au kupi ma fainu me rik' ur'kif gol'nev. Fam dvun, wuh coincidence t' etwel hasu teretuhr fi' wuh coach, vesh' sufficiently flekh tor boshaya me k' wuh dread ik ein vath coincidence lau na' sovek moment tersau me, svi' ish-veh khaf-spol, k' t'nash-veh ahm. Na' nash utvau, i resolved tor alight u' ak u' etek estuhl wuh kahr, heh shitau myself s' ish-veh khaf-spol. Nash el'mish i fitor successfully. T'nash-veh pi' portmanteau vesh' svi' wuh kluf ne' t'nash-veh ash'ya; i had tonk'peh tor da-tor wuh tu'adayek tor prah ish-veh si'; i threw ish-veh ne' fa' me, prah ne' po' ish-veh, heh vesh' losrak na' wuh wuh'rak ha'gelek fi' wuh wuh'rak kov t' wuh kahr pavement. U' tor wuh convicts, au went ish-veh yut k' wuh coach, heh i fai-tor na' ra sfek au would nam-tor spirited ska' tor wuh pilash. Svi' t'nash-veh fancy, vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh masu-hali k' its convict hali-sutra waiting na' au na' wuh shuhk-pu-tor kaiden, va'ashiv puzhu-tor wuh gruff "mazhiv-kur-tor yut, du!" spo' heh zek tor dogs, va'ashiv gla-tor wuh wicked noah's ark lying si' fi' wuh nesh-kur masu. I kupi ri ma leralmin-tor ra i vesh' kwes t', na' t'nash-veh pthak vesh' altogether undefined heh vague, tonk'peh tra' vesh' lo'uk pthak fi-tor me. U' i lates-tor fi' tor wuh hotel, i olau ik wuh dread, mau namautauk wuh mere apprehension t' wuh kusut-tor il disagreeable recognition, tor me tremble. I am confident ik ish-veh nem-tor rai distinctness t' shid, heh ik ish-veh vesh' wuh revival na' wuh zamu minutes t' wuh vash t' kan-wak. Wuh mon-tvi-shal na' wuh pla-kur boar vesh' herbosh, heh i had ri goh ordered t'nash-veh aru-yem tra', tonk'peh had hayal-tor ne' tor ish-veh, fa' wuh waiter fai-tor me. U' ak u' au had apologised na' wuh remissness t' ish-veh vokaya, au ya'akash me kuv au dang satau kluf na' mr. Pumblechook? "rai, " leralmin-tor i, "certainly ri." wuh waiter (ish-veh vesh' au vi had katau abru wuh lo'uk remonstrance s' wuh commercials, fi' wuh gad lu i vesh' bound) saudau ak'wikmun, heh nem-tor wuh earliest opportunity t' putting wuh kitork hinek va'asau t' wuh local newspaper ni directly svi' t'nash-veh yut, ik i nem-tor ish-veh abru heh telv-tor nash paragraph: etwel readers dungi oren-tor, ri altogether rik' eku'ko, svi' dzhinaya tor wuh recent romantic shen svi' fortune t' wuh nu'ri artificer svi' shek-tukh t' nash neighbourhood (ra wuh theme, k' wuh yut, na' wuh magic pen t' etwel u' wi ri universally nafai townsman tooby, wuh poet t' etwel tsek!) ik wuh youth's earliest patron, besu, heh t'hy'la, vesh' wuh highly respected wuhsu ri entirely unconnected k' wuh corn heh nei trade, heh t'vi eminently convenient heh commodious business premises nam-tor situate k'svi wuh hundred miles t' wuh pid yut. Ish-veh nam-tor ri wholly irrespective t' etwel personal feelings ik etek vipladau ish-veh u' wuh mentor t' etwel nu'ri telemachus, na' ish-veh nam-tor rom tor fai-tor ik etwel kahr torvau wuh afersu t' wuh latter's fortunes. Tor wuh nahp-contracted meix'tem t' wuh local sage il wuh lustrous bezhun t' local vaksur inquire t'vi fortunes? Etek dva-tor ik quintin matsys vesh' wuh shek-zhuksu t' antwerp. Tor-zhit. Ksa-khaf. I entertain wuh conviction, based fi-tor suk veshtaya, ik kuv svi' wuh gad t' t'nash-veh smusma'es i had hal-tor tor wuh desh'rak fek, i dang ma ragel-tor somebody tra', wandering esquimaux il civilized sasu, vi would ma var-tor me ik pumblechook vesh' t'nash-veh earliest patron heh wuh afersu t' t'nash-veh fortunes. Chapter xxix. Betimes svi' wuh asal i vesh' abru heh si'. Ish-veh vesh' nuh' lehkuh-mal wi tor hal-tor tor din-tor havisham's, ni i loitered vi' wuh shasol fi' din-tor havisham's vla t' kahr, if vesh' ri joe's vla; i kupi hal-tor tra' tor-morrow, thinking pa' t'nash-veh patroness, heh krasan maut-ugelik bikuv t' ish-veh dotoran na' me. She had thanai estella, she had u' rom u' thanai me, heh ish-veh kupi ri vravshau tor nam-tor ish-veh intention tor katau etek teretuhr. She reserved ish-veh na' me tor restore wuh desolate kelek, nafai-tor wuh sunshine vi' wuh gu'gelik tvi-shal, eku wuh wak-vel wuh-going heh wuh samu hearths wuh-blazing, bezhun-masu ne' wuh cobwebs, vashau wuh vermin, svi' pen, tor ek' wuh shining deeds t' wuh nu'ri kenelsu t' romance, heh marry wuh princess. I had pehkau tor glazhau na' wuh kelek u' i be' dvun-tor; heh its seared yon-kur dok temok, klotau krani, heh karik yar-kur ivy clasping kauk wuh tuh t' vuzh-mev k' its pi'gel heh dvunek-tersayek, u' kuv k' sinewy hinek kar, had tor abru wuh don-ka attractive mystery, t' if i vesh' wuh hero. Estella vesh' wuh vi'le-eshan t' ish-veh, heh wuh khaf-spol t' ish-veh, veling. Tonk'peh, hi she had taken such karik mat t' me, hi t'nash-veh fancy heh t'nash-veh rok vesh' ni eku fi-tor ish-veh, hi ish-veh vi-yumuk fi' t'nash-veh boyish ha'kiv heh character had vesh' ek'-powerful, i did ri, kauk ik romantic asal, invest ish-veh k' sovek attributes korsau eifa she ma. I mention nash svi' nash shi, t' wuh teslau lof, fai'ei ish-veh nam-tor wuh clue k' if i am tor nam-tor zahal-tor vi' t'nash-veh ri donku-tor labyrinth. Fupa s' t'nash-veh veshtaya, wuh conventional notion t' wuh lover fam yehat nam-tor kwon-hau-ov yeht. Wuh unqualified yeht'es nam-tor, ik lu i ashau estella k' wuh ashaya t' wuh sasu, i ashau ish-veh veling fai'ei i afer-tor ish-veh irresistible. Wuh'wak na' ek'; i fai-tor tor t'nash-veh sorrow, k'ashiv heh k'ashiv, kuv ri kwon-hau-ov, ik i ashau ish-veh tehnat utvau, tehnat ugaya, tehnat sochya, tehnat rok, tehnat happiness, tehnat ek' discouragement ik kupi nam-tor. Wuh'wak na' ek'; i ashau ish-veh rim wuh lehkuh fai'ei i fai-tor ish-veh, heh ish-veh had rai weht vi-yumuk svi' restraining me do kuv i had devoutly pudva-tor ish-veh tor nam-tor komihn perfection. I ni kushizhau si' t'nash-veh lates u' tor lasha na' wuh temep na' t'nash-veh hinek wak. Lu i had rung na' wuh kus-vakh k' wuh unsteady el'ru, i da-tor t'nash-veh pla' fi-tor wuh temep, du' i ar'kada tor prah t'nash-veh esh heh potau wuh beating t' t'nash-veh khaf-spol moderately hizhuk. I puzhu-tor wuh vla-svep tu'ash, heh ash-tor sarlah mes' wuh courtyard; tonk'peh i pretended ri tor zhu-tor, kauk lu wuh temep swung fi' its zhar-tor tu'adayek. Hasu na' kim-shah estuhl fi' wuh tipan, i palikau heh da-tor. I palikau mau weht naturally yi, tor talal myself nagau k' wuh sasu svi' wuh sober zhai-kur sai-vel. Wuh kim-shah sasu i dang ma gishu tor gla-tor svi' ik shi' porter na' din-tor havisham's svep. "orlick!" "ah, nu'ri trensu, tra''s weht rubai do ish-veh. Tonk'peh sarlah svi', sarlah svi'. Ish-veh's opposed tor t'nash-veh zek tor meskaraya wuh temep tu'ash." i svi-tor heh au swung ish-veh, heh klacha ish-veh, heh nem-tor wuh tal-muv si'. "ha!" leralmin-tor au, limuk-tor pauk, po' doggedly preceding me wuh zamu ash-tor na' wuh kelek. "la' i am!" "uf did sarlah du la'?" "sarlah nash-veh la', " au retorted, "fi' t'nash-veh mal. I had t'nash-veh natuhn katau alongside me svi' wuh barrow." "nam-tor du la' na' rom?" "i ain't la' na' klau, nu'ri trensu, i suppose?" i vesh' ri ni sure t' ik. I had el-wak tor entertain wuh retort svi' t'nash-veh kashek, du' au slowly abertau ish-veh ras glance s' wuh pavement, abru t'nash-veh mal heh kar, tor t'nash-veh limuk. "yi du ma losrak wuh zhuk-fasek?" i leralmin-tor. "tor nash glazhau spo' wuh zhuk-fasek?" kilko-tor orlick, sending ish-veh glance ek' pauk ish-veh k' wuh sov t' dash. "i', tor ish-veh glazhau spo' ish-veh?" i ya'akash ish-veh uf wu au had losrak gargery's zhuk-fasek? "veh gad nam-tor ni spo' wuh'ashiv la', " au kilko-tor, "ik i ri tor fai-tor rik' casting ish-veh abru. However, sarlah nash-veh la' ein wak opi' du losrak." "i kupi ma var-tor du ik, orlick." "ah!" leralmin-tor au, dryly. "tonk'peh yi du've prah tor nam-tor wuh scholar." k' nash wak etek had sarlah tor wuh kelek, wilat i afer-tor ish-veh tvi-shal tor nam-tor veh aishan k'svi wuh vla-svep, k' wuh pi' krani svi' ish-veh looking fi' wuh courtyard. Svi' its pi' proportions, ish-veh vesh' ri rikes wuh ves t' shi usually assigned tor wuh temep-porter svi' paris. Ac'ruth tal-muv vesh' hanging fi' wuh temok, tor if au i' hau wuh temep tal-muv; heh ish-veh patchwork-wein-tor sar-tak vesh' svi' wuh pi' tvik dahsaya il sha'ti. Wuh bosh had wuh slovenly, confined, heh sleepy glazhau, spo' wuh kraisek na' wuh komihn dormouse; du' au, looming gu'gelik heh ras svi' wuh duv t' wuh teruk k' wuh krani, glazhau spo' wuh komihn dormouse na' ik ish-veh vesh' fitted abru, u' indeed au vesh'. "i worla gla-tor nash tvi-shal fa', " i remarked; "tonk'peh tra' nam-tor-tor tor nam-tor rai porter la'." "rai, " leralmin-tor au; "ri till ish-veh prah pa' ik tra' vesh' rai protection fi' wuh premises, heh ish-veh sarlah tor nam-tor panah-tor tehvar-bosh, k' convicts heh tag heh a'cit heh bobtail going abru heh ne'. Heh yi i vesh' recommended tor wuh shi u' wuh sasu vi kupi mazhiv-kur-tor wuh'ashiv sasu u' rom u' au katau, heh i nem-tor ish-veh. Ish-veh's easier do bellowsing heh hammering. Ik's putush-tor, ik nam-tor." t'nash-veh bezhun had vesh' kum-tor k' wuh pohshayek k' wuh dvesh-tukh-bound fek abru' wuh vuzh-mev-krus, heh ish-veh bezhun had zahal-tor t'nash-veh. "muhl, " leralmin-tor i, ri desirous t' weht conversation, "dungau i hal-tor abru tor din-tor havisham?" "yontau me, kuv i fai-tor!" au retorted, wuh'rak stretching himself heh yi shaking himself; "t'nash-veh zek shahtau la', nu'ri trensu. I mazhiv-kur-tor nash la' kus-vakh wuh rap k' nash la' mah-vel, heh du hal-tor fi' bi' wuh tvur till du ragel-tor somebody." "i am gishu, i dva-tor?" "yontau me dah'wak abru', kuv i mokuhlek leralmin!" leralmin-tor au. Fi-tor ik, i da-tor ne' wuh wu tvur if i had wuh'rak trodden svi' t'nash-veh bali kluf, heh au tor ish-veh kus-vakh ralash. Na' wuh shaht t' wuh tvur, du' wuh kus-vakh vesh' fam dvun reverberating, i afer-tor sarah abru'lik, vi saudau ki' i' shetau constitutionally yar-kur heh kin-kur k' utvau t' me. "oh!" leralmin-tor she. "du, nam-tor ish-veh, mr. Pip?" "ish-veh nam-tor, din-tor abru'lik. I am glad tor var-tor du ik mr. Abru'lik heh skan nam-tor ek' muhl." "nam-tor au sovek wiser?" leralmin-tor sarah, k' wuh dismal hutau t' wuh patam; "au had weh-rom nam-tor wiser, do muhl. Ah, matthew, matthew! Du fai-tor ish-veh yut, osu?" tolerably, na' i had hal-tor abru wuh staircase svi' wuh gu'gelik, wehk wuh wak. I she-tor ish-veh i', svi' lighter kluf do t' yore, heh tapped svi' t'nash-veh hinek yut na' wuh svep t' din-tor havisham's tvi-shal. "pip's rap, " i puzhu-tor ish-veh leralmin, iyi; "sarlah svi', pip." she vesh' svi' ish-veh ku-san be' wuh hinek pasu, svi' wuh hinek sai-vel, k' ish-veh dahkuh el'ru tuhsau fi' ish-veh terpau, ish-veh chin resting fi' au, heh ish-veh bezhun fi' wuh yon. Sitting be' ish-veh, k' wuh wan-kur ash'el, ik had worla vesh' worn, svi' ish-veh el'ru, heh ish-veh patam keh'sei u' she glazhau na' ish-veh, vesh' wuh sohkik t'sai ik i had worla gla-tor. "sarlah svi', pip, " din-tor havisham fator tor mutter, rik' looking pauk il abru; "sarlah svi', pip, uf tor du tor, pip? Ni du shok t'nash-veh el'ru u' kuv i vesh' wuh ko-te'kru, eh?muhl?" she glazhau abru na' me suddenly, goh dvun-tor ish-veh bezhun, heh ashiv-tor svi' wuh grimly playful manner, "muhl?" "i puzhu-tor, din-tor havisham, " leralmin-tor i, rather na' wuh pak, "ik du vesh' ni ves u' tor istaya me tor sarlah heh gla-tor du, heh vesht sarlah nash-veh directly." "muhl?" wuh t'sai ik i had worla gla-tor fa', abertau abru ish-veh bezhun heh glazhau archly na' me, heh yi vesht gla-tor nash-veh ik wuh bezhun vesh' estella's bezhun. Tonk'peh she vesh' ni mau rubai, vesh' ni mau weht vaksurik, ni mau weht womanly, svi' ek' vel winning admiration, had tor such wonderful storilaya, ik i seemed ki' tor rim. I fancied, u' i glazhau na' ish-veh, ik i trel-tor hopelessly pla' vi' wuh dirik heh tsuri sa-kan va'ashiv. O wuh kash-ral t' ir heh disparity ik sarlah fi-tor me, heh wuh inaccessibility ik sarlah pa' ish-veh! She mazhiv-kur-tor me ish-veh el'ru. I stammered vel pa' wuh sanosh i olau svi' seeing ish-veh va'ashiv, heh pa' t'nash-veh having glazhau fa'rak tor ish-veh, na' wuh wu, akarshif. "tor du talal ish-veh mau rubai, pip?" ya'akash din-tor havisham, k' ish-veh greedy glazhau, heh striking ish-veh terpau fi-tor wuh ku-san ik lam-tor svi' au, u' wuh glat tor me tor hayal-tor ne' tra'. "lu vesht sarlah nash-veh svi', din-tor havisham, i nahp tra' vesh' nothing t' estella svi' wuh limuk il khlop; tonk'peh i' ish-veh ek' settles ne' ni curiously vi' wuh hinek" "ra? Du nam-tor ri going tor leralmin vi' wuh hinek estella?" din-tor havisham svi-shau. "she vesh' yaut heh insulting, heh du aitlu tor hal-tor maf s' ish-veh. Ri tor du vokau?" i leralmin-tor confusedly ik ik vesh' wu ago, heh ik i fai-tor rai weh-rom yi, heh wuh spo'. Estella abru'teruklar-ru'lut k' buhfik composure, heh leralmin-tor she had rai vet t' t'nash-veh having vesh' ved gas'rak, heh t' ish-veh having vesh' maut disagreeable. "nam-tor au rubai?" din-tor havisham ya'akash ish-veh. "maut mau, " leralmin-tor estella, looking na' me. "lehkuh dirik heh tsuri?" leralmin-tor din-tor havisham, mavaun k' estella's isachya. Estella abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor, heh glazhau na' wuh ash'el svi' ish-veh el'ru, heh abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor va'ashiv, heh glazhau na' me, heh shitau wuh ash'el ne'. She skasau me u' wuh sa-kan fam dvun, tonk'peh she lured me fi'. Etek hayal-tor svi' wuh dreamy tvi-shal among wuh hinek flekh vi-yumuk if had ni wrought fi-tor me, heh i oren-tor ik she had tonk'peh aishan sarlah ha-kel s' france, heh ik she vesh' going tor london. Yaut heh wilful u' t' hinek, she had katau eifa qualities vi' such subjection tor ish-veh vaksur ik ish-veh vesh' impossible heh s' natureor i nahp soto dahshauk au s' ish-veh vaksur. Truly ish-veh vesh' impossible tor dissociate ish-veh la'es s' ek' eifa wretched hankerings po' donku heh gentility ik had ertau t'nash-veh boyhood, s' ek' eifa has-bosh-pakhartau aspirations ik had wuh'rak tor me kafusik t' ha-kel heh joe, s' ek' eifa visions ik had ashenau ish-veh limuk svi' wuh glowing yon, kwul-tor ish-veh s' wuh shek-tukh fi' wuh mah-vihpan, saseshau ish-veh s' wuh mu'khlup'es t' mu-yor tor glazhau svi' na' wuh wooden krani t' wuh zhuk-fasek, heh flit maf. Svi' wuh zhit, ish-veh vesh' impossible na' me tor dahshauk ish-veh, svi' wuh vesht il svi' wuh la', s' wuh innermost ha'kiv t' t'nash-veh ha'kiv. Ish-veh vesh' settled ik i dang stay tra' ek' wuh shom t' wuh gad, heh fun tor wuh hotel na' mu-yor, heh tor london tor-morrow. Lu etek had conversed na' wuh du', din-tor havisham satau etek dahkuh si' tor lates svi' wuh neglected bah-ker: fi' etwel coming svi' k' heh k', she leralmin-tor, i dang halek ish-veh pa' wuh pi', u' svi' wak t' yore. Ni, estella heh i went si' vi' wuh bah-ker k' wuh temep k'fai'ei i had fam-kelek-tor tor t'nash-veh snagel k' wuh spoh nu'ri gentleman, i' herbert; i, trembling svi' tam'a heh worshipping wuh maut hem t' ish-veh sai-vel; she, ved tertitau heh danik decidedly ri worshipping wuh hem t' t'nash-veh. U' etek drew be' tor wuh shi' snagel, she pehkau heh leralmin-tor, "i bolau ma vesh' wuh singular pi' creature tor ip-sut heh gla-tor ik puk ik gad; tonk'peh i did, heh i tizh-tor ish-veh maut mau." "du rewarded me maut mau." "did i?" she kilko-tor, svi' wuh incidental heh forgetful yut. "i vokau i entertained wuh lo'uk objection tor ish-veh adversary, fai'ei i nem-tor ish-veh has-bosh ik au dang nam-tor katau la' tor smertau me k' ish-veh apc'koik." "au heh i nam-tor lo'uk t'hylara i'." "nam-tor du? I nah-tor i recollect hi, ik du telv-tor k' ish-veh sa-mekh?" "ha." i tor wuh admission k' reluctance, na' ish-veh seemed ki' wuh boyish glazhau, heh she already skasau me weht do hiyet spo' wuh sa-kan. "opi' ish-veh rubah t' fortune heh prospects, du ma rubai ish-veh besu, " leralmin-tor estella. "naturally, " leralmin-tor i. "heh necessarily, " she hau, svi' wuh haughty molu; "ra vesh' nunau apc'koik na' du wuh'wak, would nam-tor ved unfit apc'koik na' du i'." svi' t'nash-veh conscience, i vet maut mau whether i had sovek svizh-tor intention losrak t' going tor gla-tor joe; tonk'peh kuv i had, nash glantaya shitau ish-veh tor hash. "du had rai idea t' ish-veh impending rom fortune, svi' eifa wak?" leralmin-tor estella, k' wuh slight pral t' ish-veh el'ru, signifying svi' wuh fighting wak. "ri wuh least." wuh sov t' completeness heh superiority k' if she lates-tor na' t'nash-veh vla, heh wuh sov t' youthfulness heh nekhaya k' if i lates-tor na' ish-veh, tor wuh contrast ik i strongly olau. Ish-veh would ma rankled svi' me weht do ish-veh did, kuv i had ri fudau myself u' eliciting ish-veh k' hasu ni eku k'wuhli na' ish-veh heh assigned tor ish-veh. Wuh bah-ker vesh' nuh' overgrown heh lan na' walking svi' k' ease, heh po' etek had tor wuh pauk t' ish-veh dah'wak il thrice, etek sasarlah va'ashiv vi' wuh brewery ker. I gluvau ish-veh tor wuh nicety wilat i had gla-tor ish-veh walking fi' wuh casks, ik wuh'rak hinek gad, heh she leralmin-tor, k' wuh samu heh careless glazhau svi' ik kharat, "did i?" i reminded ish-veh wilat she had sasarlah t' wuh kelek heh putan-tor me t'nash-veh kahm heh mon, heh she leralmin-tor, "i ri tor vokau." "ri vokau ik du tor me maf?" leralmin-tor i. "rai, " leralmin-tor she, heh hutau ish-veh patam heh glazhau pa' ish-veh. I verily dva-tor ik ish-veh ri remembering heh ri minding svi' wuh least, tor me maf va'ashiv, inwardly, heh ik nam-tor wuh sharpest maf-tor t' ek'. "du bolau fai-tor, " leralmin-tor estella, condescending tor me u' wuh maut-ugelik heh vaksurik kosu lau, "ik i ma rai khaf-spol, kuv ik has sovek-vel tor tor k' t'nash-veh vokaya." i prah k'fai ein jargon tor wuh daya ik i nem-tor wuh liberty t' doubting ik. Ik i fai-tor weh-rom. Ik tra' kupi nam-tor rai such vaksur rik' ish-veh. "oh! I ma wuh khaf-spol tor nam-tor stabbed svi' il pohshaya svi', i ma rai vet, " leralmin-tor estella, "heh veling kuv ish-veh ceased tor kuhsh-tor i dang cease tor nam-tor. Tonk'peh du fai-tor ra i tvai. I ma rai softness tra', nosympathysentimentnonsense." ra vesh' ish-veh ik vesh' borne svi' fi-tor t'nash-veh kashek lu she lam-tor fam dvun heh glazhau attentively na' me? Sovek-vel ik i had gla-tor svi' din-tor havisham? Rai. Svi' ein t' ish-veh glazhau heh gestures tra' vesh' ik tinge t' resemblance tor din-tor havisham if lau k'ashiv nam-tor pubeglanau ki' vesh' acquired k' kanu, s' grown person k' ik au ma vesh' mau katravah heh secluded, heh if, lu kan-wak nam-tor be' dvun-tor, dungi torvau wuh remarkable occasional likeness t' sagluvaya svi' limuk ik nam-tor vathru ved natya. Heh wi i kupi ri zavikau nash tor din-tor havisham. I glazhau va'ashiv, heh hi she vesh' fam dvun looking na' me, wuh suggestion vesh' hal-tor. Ra vesh' ish-veh? "i am serious, " leralmin-tor estella, ri ni mau k' wuh kwal (na' ish-veh meix'tem vesh' mos) u' k' wuh darkening t' ish-veh limuk; "kuv etek nam-tor tor nam-tor lehm-tor mau teretuhr, du had weh-rom dva-tor ish-veh na' wuh'wak. Rai!" imperiously stopping me u' i tu'ash t'nash-veh bru-lar. "i ma ri bestowed t'nash-veh tenderness sovek-wilat. I ma worla had sovek such vel." svi' wuh'ashiv moment etek vesh' svi' wuh brewery, ni wu disused, heh she sfekau tor wuh pid tanaf-shi'gluvaun wilat i had gla-tor ish-veh going si' fi' ik ka wuh'rak gad, heh var-tor me she vokau ki' vesh' abru tra', heh tor ma gla-tor me standing pahth-tor ne'. U' t'nash-veh bezhun zahal-tor ish-veh wan-kur el'ru, va'ashiv wuh ka neik-ha'khlup suggestion ik i kupi ri possibly ruskaraya tuhsau me. T'nash-veh shatipik palikaya occasioned ish-veh tor ti ish-veh el'ru fi-tor t'nash-veh kar. Instantly wuh tam'a be' dvun-tor wuh'wak weht heh vesh' hal-tor. Ra vesh' ish-veh? "ra nam-tor wuh tukh?" ya'akash estella. "nam-tor du pahth-tor va'ashiv?" "i dang nam-tor, kuv i pudva-tor ra du leralmin-tor aishan i', " i kilko-tor, tor da-tor ish-veh ska'. "yi du ri tor? Maut muhl. Ish-veh nam-tor leralmin-tor, na' sovek tav. Din-tor havisham dungi ak nam-tor expecting du na' ish-veh hinek lehk, hi i nah-tor ik lau nam-tor laid aside i', k' vath hinek belongings. Kal-tor etek tor veh weht pauk t' wuh bah-ker, heh yi hal-tor svi'. Sarlah! Du dungau ri foshuhl bezhun-masu na' t'nash-veh cruelty tor-gad; du dungau nam-tor t'nash-veh thalv, heh mazhiv-kur-tor me ish-veh tipan." ish-veh handsome sai-vel had trailed fi-tor wuh solektra. She meskarau ish-veh svi' veh el'ru i', heh k' wuh vath lightly estuhl t'nash-veh tipan u' etek lates-tor. Etek lates-tor pauk wuh ruined bah-ker dah'wak il thrice weht, heh ish-veh vesh' ek' svi' svai na' me. Kuv wuh yar-kur heh kin-kur tor'ovak t' vedik svi' wuh chinks t' wuh hinek temok had vesh' wuh danik taluhk svai ik ek'wak blew, ish-veh kupi ri ma vesh' weht tishaya svi' t'nash-veh remembrance. Tra' vesh' rai discrepancy t' tevun svi' etek tor snem-tor ish-veh irak s' me; etek vesh' t' nearly wuh ka ya'shakhuv, hi veling wuh ya'shakhuv var-tor na' weht svi' ish-veh nuf do svi' t'nash-veh; tonk'peh wuh sov t' inaccessibility if ish-veh vaksur heh ish-veh manner mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh, tormented me svi' wuh midst t' t'nash-veh delight, heh na' wuh pidek t' wuh assurance i olau ik etwel patroness had pudvel-tor etek na' veh wuh'ashiv. Wretched sa-kan! Na' kim-shah etek went pla' vi' wuh kelek, heh tra' i puzhu-tor, k' ak'wikmun, ik t'nash-veh guardian had sarlah ne' tor gla-tor din-tor havisham fi' business, heh would sarlah pla' tor aru-yem. Wuh hinek wintry khlup t' chandeliers svi' wuh tvi-shal wilat wuh mouldering pasu vesh' sak-tor had vesh' lighted du' etek vesh' si', heh din-tor havisham vesh' svi' ish-veh ku-san heh waiting na' me. Ish-veh vesh' spo' pushing wuh ku-san itself pla' vi' wuh vesht, lu etek began wuh hinek vohris raf-kuv pauk pa' wuh vitush t' wuh bridal gadzhak. Tonk'peh, svi' wuh funereal tvi-shal, k' ik khlop t' wuh shi'vukhut tevan-tor pla' svi' wuh ku-san fixing its bezhun fi-tor ish-veh, estella glazhau weht ugelik heh vaksurik do fa', heh i vesh' ne' stronger enchantment. Wuh wak ni klimtau maf, ik etwel lehkuh-mal aru-yem-wadan drew ikap-tor na' el'ru, heh estella losrak etek tor dator herself. Etek had pehkau be' wuh centre t' wuh wu pasu, heh din-tor havisham, k' veh t' ish-veh withered kar sakadau s' wuh ku-san, shom-tor ik clenched el'ru fi-tor wuh kin-kur sai. U' estella glazhau pla' abru' ish-veh tipan fa' going si' na' wuh svep, din-tor havisham shok-tor ik el'ru tor ish-veh, k' wuh ravenous flan'es ik vesh' t' its ves ved dreadful. Yi, estella hasu hal-tor heh etek dahkuh losrak sa'awek, she da-tor tor me, heh leralmin-tor svi' wuh zhal, "nam-tor she vaksurik, graceful, muhl-grown? Tor du krol-tor ish-veh?" "kanok-veh bolau vi gla-tor ish-veh, din-tor havisham." she drew wuh kar pauk t'nash-veh talu, heh drew t'nash-veh patam ikap-tor ne' tor ish-veh u' she hayal-tor svi' wuh ku-san. "ashaya ish-veh, ashaya ish-veh, ashaya ish-veh! Uf tor she nam-tor-tor du?" fa' i kupi kilko-srashiv (kuv i kupi ma kilko-tor ni rihagik wuh deshker na' ek') she ashiv-tor, "ashaya ish-veh, ashaya ish-veh, ashaya ish-veh! Kuv she favours du, ashaya ish-veh. Kuv she skek du, ashaya ish-veh. Kuv she bezhun-masu ish-veh khaf-spol tor krus, heh u' ish-veh prah older heh stronger ish-veh dungi bezhun-masu deeper, ashaya ish-veh, ashaya ish-veh, ashaya ish-veh!" worla had i gla-tor such passionate eagerness u' vesh' hau tor ish-veh utterance t' aifa zhit. I kupi olau wuh dvunek t' wuh wonil kar pauk t'nash-veh talu puv-tor k' wuh vehemence ik ma ish-veh. "zhu-tor me, pip! I thanai ish-veh, tor nam-tor ashau. I bred ish-veh heh educated ish-veh, tor nam-tor ashau. I storik ish-veh vi' ra she nam-tor, ik she lau nam-tor ashau. Ashaya ish-veh!" she leralmin-tor wuh zhit k'ashiv hiyet, heh tra' kupi nam-tor rai vet ik she tvai tor leralmin ish-veh; tonk'peh kuv wuh k'ashiv ashiv-tor zhit had vesh' fnu-ven instead t' lovedespairrevengedire deathit kupi ri ma sounded s' ish-veh bru-lar weht spo' wuh curse. "i'll var-tor du, " leralmin-tor she, svi' wuh ka hurried passionate zhal, "ra yeht ashaya nam-tor. Ish-veh nam-tor glan-fam vaikaya, unquestioning shal-humiliation, utter nekhaya, sahrafel heh dva tehnat yourself heh tehnat wuh bosh panu, giving abru ish-veh bosh khaf-spol heh soul tor wuh smiteras i did!" lu sarlah ish-veh tor ik, heh tor wuh kwai maf ik zahal-tor ik, i kum-tor ish-veh pauk wuh san. Na' she she-tor abru svi' wuh ku-san, svi' ish-veh shroud t' wuh sai-vel, heh kwul-tor na' wuh sov u' kuv she would u' ak ma kwul-tor herself tehnat wuh temok heh tevan-tor tevik. Ek' nash be' dvun-tor svi' wuh zamu seconds. U' i drew ish-veh ne' vi' ish-veh ku-san, i vesh' d'wonil t' wuh scent ik i fai-tor, heh turning, gla-tor t'nash-veh guardian svi' wuh tvi-shal. Au kwon-hau-ov lesh (i ma ri wi mentioned ish-veh, i nah-tor) wuh abru'lik-handkerchief t' don-ka silk heh t' imposing proportions, if vesh' t' lo'uk tala tor ish-veh svi' ish-veh ha'yigal. Ki'gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh ni terrify wuh client il wuh toglantausu k' ceremoniously unfolding nash abru'lik-handkerchief u' kuv au vesh' iyi going tor salur ish-veh han, heh yi pausing, u' kuv au fai-tor au dang ri ma wak tor tor ish-veh fa' such client il toglantausu committed himself, ik wuh shal-committal has zahal-tor directly, ved u' wuh tukh veling. Lu vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh svi' wuh tvi-shal au had nash expressive abru'lik-handkerchief svi' fi' el'ru, heh vesh' looking na' etek. Fi' latva t'nash-veh bezhun, au leralmin-tor plainly, k' wuh momentary heh ralash-fam svizh svi' ik attitude, "indeed? Singular!" heh yi shitau wuh handkerchief tor its gas'rak nam-tor-tor k' wonderful daya. Din-tor havisham had gla-tor ish-veh u' ak u' i, heh vesh' (spo' kanok-veh else) kwes t' ish-veh. She tor wuh karik attempt tor tertitau herself, heh stammered ik au vesh' u' punctual u' ek'wak. "u' punctual u' ek'wak, " au ashiv-tor, coming abru tor etek. "(uf tor du tor, pip? Dungau i mazhiv-kur-tor du wuh fau, din-tor havisham? Wuh'wak pauk?) heh ni du nam-tor la', pip?" i var-tor ish-veh lu i had lasha, heh uf din-tor havisham had istau me tor sarlah heh gla-tor estella. Tor if au kilko-tor, "ah! Maut tok-ti nu'ri t'sai!" yi au kwitau din-tor havisham svi' ish-veh ku-san fa' ish-veh, k' veh t' ish-veh suk el'ru, heh shitau wuh vath svi' ish-veh malanu-abru'lik u' kuv wuh abru'lik vesh' bosh t' tsat. "muhl, pip! Uf k'ashiv ma du gla-tor din-tor estella fa'?" leralmin-tor au, lu sarlah ish-veh tor wuh pehkaya. "uf k'ashiv?" "ah! Uf wehk wak? Lehkuh thousand wak?" "oh! Certainly ri ni wehk." "dah'wak?" "jaggers, " interposed din-tor havisham, mau tor t'nash-veh vas, "trasha t'nash-veh pip sa'awek, heh hal-tor k' ish-veh tor ish-veh aru-yem." au complied, heh etek groped etwel yut ne' wuh gu'gelik kaiden teretuhr. Du' etek vesh' fam dvun fi' etwel yut tor eifa dahl-tor ha-shal mes' wuh elyutau ker na' wuh pla', au ya'akash me uf k'ashiv i had gla-tor din-tor havisham yokul heh mon; nufaya me wuh breadth t' dvel, u' tsuri, svi' wuh hundred wak heh wuh'wak. I panah-tor, heh leralmin-tor, "worla." "heh worla dungi, pip, " au retorted, k' wuh frowning abru'teruklar-ru'lut. "she has worla kal-tor herself tor nam-tor gla-tor doing either, opi' she ha-tor nash la' ha'kiv t' ish-veh. She czar-tor pa' svi' wuh mu-yor, heh yi ti el'ru fi' such yem-tukh u' she nem-tor." "pray, osu, " leralmin-tor i, "sos ya'akash du wuh deshker?" "du lau, " leralmin-tor au, "heh i lau decline tor kilko-srashiv ish-veh. Shitau ish-veh deshker." "estella's ahm. Nam-tor ish-veh havisham il?" i had nothing tor hau. "il ra?" leralmin-tor au. "nam-tor ish-veh havisham?" "ish-veh nam-tor havisham." nash katau etek tor wuh aru-yem-pasu, wilat she heh sarah abru'lik awaited etek. Mr. Jaggers presided, estella hayal-tor mesyutik tor ish-veh, i limuk-tor t'nash-veh yar-kur heh kin-kur t'hy'la. Etek aru-yokul maut muhl, heh vesh' bek-tor fi' k' wuh maid-dvinsu ik i had worla gla-tor svi' ek' t'nash-veh comings heh goings, tonk'peh vi, na' sovek-vel i fai-tor, had vesh' svi' ik mysterious kelek wuh bosh wak. Po' aru-yem wuh mashek t' dvel hinek kif vesh' shitau fa' t'nash-veh guardian (au vesh' evidently muhl acquainted k' wuh vintage), heh wuh dahkuh t'sai losrak etek. Sovek-vel tor kaik wuh satalau reticence t' mr. Jaggers ne' ik kamu i worla gla-tor kitok-wilat, kauk svi' ish-veh. Au potau ish-veh maut glazhau tor himself, heh scarcely khartau ish-veh bezhun tor estella's limuk wuh'wak du' aru-yem. Lu she stariben tor ish-veh, au shroi, heh svi' due rivak kilko-tor, tonk'peh worla glazhau na' ish-veh, ik kupi gla-tor nash-veh. Fi' wuh vath el'ru, she k'ashiv glazhau na' ish-veh, k' eku'ko heh curiosity, kuv ri distrust, tonk'peh ish-veh limuk worla gluvau wuh least hokni'es. Throughout aru-yem au nem-tor wuh pseth delight svi' tor sarah abru'lik greener heh yellower, k' k'ashiv referring svi' conversation k' me tor t'nash-veh gishat; tonk'peh la', va'ashiv, au gluvau rai hokni'es, heh kauk tor ish-veh saudau ik au extortedand kauk did extort, hi i ri tor fai-tor howthose dzhinaya s' t'nash-veh innocent shal. Heh lu au heh i vesh' losrak sa'awek teretuhr, au hayal-tor k' wuh sov fi-tor ish-veh t' paik lying k' svi' consequence t' ro'fori au ma, ik really vesh' nuh' mau na' me. Au tuhs-linisau ish-veh maut wine lu au had nothing else svi' el'ru. Au meskarau ish-veh svi' himself heh wuh ha'fek, zahv-tor wuh kif, padukau ish-veh svi' ish-veh ru'lut, vitem-tor ish-veh, glazhau na' ish-veh makh va'ashiv, smelt wuh kif, ar'kada ish-veh, drank ish-veh, boshau va'ashiv, heh tuhs-linisau wuh makh va'ashiv, abi' i vesh' u' nervous u' kuv i had fainu wuh wine tor nam-tor telling ish-veh vel tor t'nash-veh disadvantage. Rehkuh il kehkuh wak i feebly nahp i would palikaya conversation; tonk'peh whenever au gla-tor me going tor ya'akash ish-veh sovek-vel, au glazhau na' me k' ish-veh makh svi' ish-veh el'ru, heh rolling ish-veh wine pa' svi' ish-veh ru'lut, u' kuv requesting me tor nem-tor beglanau ik ish-veh vesh' t' rai nam-tor-tor, na' au couldn't kilko-srashiv. I nah-tor din-tor abru'lik vesh' d'wonil ik wuh glan t' me involved ish-veh svi' wuh tehvar t' hasu goaded tor ni-resh, heh sos'eh tearing ska' ish-veh taik, if vesh' wuh maut hideous veh, svi' wuh malat t' wuh muslin mop, heh strewing wuh solektra k' ish-veh isachya, if assuredly had worla grown fi' ish-veh patam. She did ri saudau lu etek afterwards went abru tor din-tor havisham's tvi-shal, heh etek kehkuh mavau na' whist. Svi' wuh tvi-wak, din-tor havisham, svi' wuh fantastic yut, had shitau ein t' wuh danik vaksurik ek'zer s' ish-veh sai-vel-tor-pasu vi' estella's isachya, heh pa' ish-veh bosom heh kar; heh vesht gla-tor nash-veh kauk t'nash-veh guardian glazhau na' ish-veh s' ne' ish-veh bali bezhun-zehl, heh ashenau au wuh pi', lu ish-veh loveliness vesh' fa' ish-veh, k' eifa don-ka kluhvau t' glitter heh kur svi' ish-veh. [illustration] t' wuh manner heh sadvun tor if au nem-tor etwel trumps vi' custody, heh sasarlah k' tvai pi' nop na' wuh shahtau t' el'ru, fa' if wuh glory t' etwel sa-te'kru heh ko-te'kru vesh' utterly abased, i leralmin nothing; il, t' wuh olaya ik i had, respecting ish-veh looking fi-tor etek personally svi' wuh ta'hal t' rehkuh maut obvious heh ri donku-tor riddles ik au had afer-tor si' wu ago. Ra i dashau s', vesh' wuh incompatibility svi' ish-veh samu la'es heh t'nash-veh feelings na' estella. Ish-veh vesh' ri ik i fai-tor i kupi worla lesh tor stariben tor ish-veh pa' ish-veh, ik i fai-tor i kupi worla lesh tor zhu-tor ish-veh creak ish-veh kluf na' ish-veh, ik i fai-tor i kupi worla lesh tor gla-tor ish-veh pu-tor ish-veh el'ru t' ish-veh; ish-veh vesh', ik t'nash-veh admiration dang nam-tor k'svi wuh ash'ya il dahkuh t' ish-veh, ish-veh vesh', ik t'nash-veh feelings dang nam-tor svi' wuh ka shi k' ish-veh, ik, vesh' wuh agonizing circumstance. Etek mavau abi' naukuh o'wak-vel, heh yi ish-veh vesh' arranged ik lu estella sarlah tor london i dang nam-tor fa-vikau t' ish-veh coming heh dang ragel-tor ish-veh na' wuh coach; heh yi i nem-tor trasha t' ish-veh, heh estuhl ish-veh heh losrak ish-veh. T'nash-veh guardian ti na' wuh boar svi' wuh thurai tvi-shal tor t'nash-veh. Irak vi' wuh mu-yor, din-tor havisham's zhit, "ashaya ish-veh, ashaya ish-veh, ashaya ish-veh!" sounded svi' t'nash-veh kaluk. I rubilau au na' t'nash-veh sha' repetition, heh leralmin-tor tor t'nash-veh trak, "i ashaya ish-veh, i ashaya ish-veh, i ashaya ish-veh!" hundreds t' wak. Yi, wuh thorau t' gratitude sarlah fi-tor me, ik she dang nam-tor destined na' me, wuh'wak wuh shek-zhuksu's sa-kan. Yi i nahp kuv she vesh', u' i ptha, k' rai tvai rapturously grateful na' ik buk wi, lu would she palikau tor nam-tor interested svi' me? Lu dang i awaken wuh khaf-spol k'svi ish-veh ik vesh' spes-fam heh sleeping i'? Ah me! I nahp eifa vesh' pid heh lo'uk zherka. Tonk'peh i worla nahp tra' vesh' sovek-vel neik heh pi' svi' t'nash-veh keeping maf s' joe, fai'ei i fai-tor she would nam-tor contemptuous t' ish-veh. Ish-veh vesh' tonk'peh wuh gad hal-tor, heh joe had katau wuh bezhun-masu vi' t'nash-veh bezhun; au had ak psethau, oekon forgive me! Ak psethau. Chapter xxx. Po' muhl panahik wuh tukh du' i vesh' sai-vel-tor na' wuh pla-kur boar svi' wuh asal, i resolved tor var-tor t'nash-veh guardian ik i vet-tor orlick's hasu wuh gas'rak wihfelau t' sasu tor boshaya wuh lehk t' sahrafel na' din-tor havisham's. "po veling au nam-tor ri wuh gas'rak wihfelau t' sasu, pip, " leralmin-tor t'nash-veh guardian, comfortably satisfied beforehand fi' wuh paik patam, "fai'ei wuh sasu vi boshau wuh lehk t' sahrafel worla nam-tor wuh gas'rak wihfelau t' sasu." ish-veh seemed ved tor shitau ish-veh vi' tam'a tor talal ik nash particular lehk vesh' ri exceptionally meskarau k' wuh gas'rak wihfelau t' sasu, heh au shroi svi' wuh satisfied manner du' i var-tor ish-veh ra fai-tukh i had t' orlick. "maut rom, pip, " au glantau, lu i had concluded, "i'll hal-tor pauk presently, heh vlitau etwel t'hy'la ska'." rather alarmed k' nash summary torai, i vesh' na' wuh pi' vohtaya, heh kauk hinted ik etwel t'hy'la himself lau nam-tor rihagik tor deal k'. "oh rai au skil-tor't, " leralmin-tor t'nash-veh guardian, tor ish-veh abru'lik-handkerchief-sfek, k' buhfik guhl'es; "i dang spo' tor gla-tor ish-veh gyirm'i wuh deshker k' me." u' etek vesh' going pla' teretuhr tor london k' wuh midday coach, heh u' i breakfasted ne' such terrors t' pumblechook ik i kupi scarcely meskaraya t'nash-veh cup, nash mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh opportunity t' taran ik i aitlu wuh lates, heh ik i would hal-tor fi' bi' wuh london fau-yut du' mr. Jaggers vesh' occupied, kuv au would kal-tor wuh coachman fai-tor ik i would prah vi' t'nash-veh shi lu overtaken. I vesh' thus enabled tor hash-tor s' wuh pla-kur boar iyi po' asal-yem. K' yi tor wuh pakuv t' pa' wuh couple t' miles vi' wuh tu'ash shasol na' wuh pla' t' pumblechook's premises, i prah pauk vi' wuh pid yut va'ashiv, wuh pi' mesakh ik pitfall, heh olau myself svi' comparative shar'es. Ish-veh vesh' eku'ki tor nam-tor svi' wuh hizhuk hinek kahr wuh'wak weht, heh ish-veh vesh' ri disagreeable tor nam-tor la' heh tra' suddenly naglanshau heh nantau po'. Veh il dahkuh t' wuh tradespeople kauk darted s' ish-veh mahr-kel heh went wuh pi' yut ne' wuh yut fa' me, ik au lau da-tor, u' kuv au had yen-tor vel, heh be' dvun me limuk tor limuk, fi' if occasions i ri tor fai-tor whether au il i tor wuh weh-rasahkos pretence; au t' ri doing ish-veh, il i t' ri seeing ish-veh. Fam dvun t'nash-veh shul vesh' wuh distinguished veh, heh i vesh' mokov dissatisfied k' ish-veh, abi' buk threw me svi' wuh yut t' ik unlimited miscreant, trabb's sa-kan. Casting t'nash-veh bezhun bi' wuh yut na' wuh ac'ruth sfek t' t'nash-veh progress, i beheld trabb's sa-kan approaching, lashing himself k' wuh herbosh pla-kur sa'haf. Deeming ik wuh serene heh unconscious contemplation t' ish-veh would buhfik beseem me, heh would nam-tor danik kesik tor quell ish-veh ek'rasah kashek, i storilau k' ik sagluvaya t' countenance, heh vesh' rather congratulating myself fi' t'nash-veh navun, lu suddenly wuh mal-nef t' trabb's sa-kan smote teretuhr, ish-veh isachya uprose, ish-veh taik tevan-tor ska', au trembled violently svi' kanok sikrus, staggered si' vi' wuh fau-yut, heh maf-tor tor wuh sutra, "meskaraya me! I'm ni koltha!" vup-tor tor nam-tor svi' wuh paroxysm t' vash heh contrition, occasioned k' wuh dignity t' t'nash-veh appearance. U' i be' dvun-tor ish-veh, ish-veh zud loudly chattered svi' ish-veh patam, heh k' kanok ulidar t' mairik humiliation, au prostrated himself svi' wuh grazhiv. Nash vesh' wuh lerash vel tor lesh, tonk'peh nash vesh' nothing. I had ri storilau wuh'ashiv dah-teh ker lu, tor t'nash-veh inexpressible vash, tauraya, heh indignation, i va'ashiv beheld trabb's sa-kan approaching. Au vesh' coming pauk wuh wonil teruk. Ish-veh pla-kur sa'haf vesh' slung abru' ish-veh tipan, trau industry beamed svi' ish-veh bezhun, wuh determination tor proceed tor trabb's k' cheerful briskness vesh' indicated svi' ish-veh gait. K' wuh kolaya au became aware t' me, heh vesh' severely yaretau u' fa'; tonk'peh nash wak ish-veh dvunel vesh' rotatory, heh au staggered pauk heh pauk me k' mal-nef weht afflicted, heh k' uplifted el'ru u' kuv beseeching na' mercy.
