Ish-veh sufferings vesh' hailed k' wuh greatest mak k' wuh knot t' spectators, heh i olau utterly confounded. I had ri prah u' mau further ne' wuh yut u' wuh lehk-office, lu i va'ashiv beheld trabb's sa-kan shooting pauk k' wuh pla' yut. Nash wak, au vesh' entirely rubai. Au sai-vel-tor wuh pla-kur sa'haf svi' wuh manner t' t'nash-veh lo'uk-tor-pal, heh vesh' strutting bi' wuh pavement na' me fi' wuh mesyutik vla t' wuh yut, attended k' wuh apc'koik t' delighted nu'ri t'hylara tor ik au s' wak tor wak sporiben, k' wuh pral t' ish-veh el'ru, "ri tor fai-tor yah!" zhit fam yehat fupa s' wuh nosahp t' aggravation heh dash wreaked fi-tor me k' trabb's sa-kan, lu be' dvun-tor abreast t' me, au seshau abru ish-veh sav'el-hmoi'neks, twined ish-veh vla-isachya, terpau wuh kar akimbo, heh smirked extravagantly k', wriggling ish-veh kar-nef heh ak'shem, heh drawling tor ish-veh attendants, "ri tor fai-tor yah, ri tor fai-tor yah, 'pon t'nash-veh soul ri tor fai-tor yah!" wuh disgrace attendant fi' ish-veh iyi afterwards taking tor crowing heh pursuing me mes' wuh mesut k' kushel, u' s' wuh exceedingly dejected kushel vi had fainu me lu i vesh' wuh shek-zhuksu, culminated wuh disgrace k' if i losrak wuh kahr, heh vesh', ni tor stariben, sadakh k' ish-veh vi' wuh tu'ash shasol. [illustration] tonk'peh vita i had taken wuh ha'kiv t' trabb's sa-kan fi' ik occasion, i really ri tor kauk i' gla-tor ra i kupi ma ovsoh korsau palesh-tor. Ki' struggled k' ish-veh svi' wuh yut, il ki' faikaik sovek weh-neik recompense s' ish-veh do ish-veh khaf-spol's buhfik khaf, would ma vesh' futile heh degrading. Moreover, au vesh' wuh sa-kan ik rai sasu kupi dash-tor; wuh invulnerable heh dodging serpent vi, lu chased vi' wuh teruk, flew si' va'ashiv svi' ish-veh captor's mal, scornfully yelping. I kitau, however, tor mr. Trabb k' thurai gad's lehk, tor leralmin ik mr. Pip bolau decline tor deal further k' veh vi kupi ni irak yen-tor ra au owed tor wuh buhfik eku'ko t' shila'es, u' tor employ wuh sa-kan vi teporilau loathing svi' kanok respectable kashek. Wuh coach, k' mr. Jaggers svi'udish, sarlah abru svi' due wak, heh i nem-tor t'nash-veh natuhn-ku-san va'ashiv, heh lasha svi' london safe, tonk'peh ri ralash, na' t'nash-veh khaf-spol vesh' hal-tor. U' ak u' i lasha, i satau wuh penitential codfish heh subok t' oysters tor joe (u' reparation na' ri having hal-tor myself), heh yi went fi' tor barnard's ha-shal. I afer-tor herbert dining fi' samu kahm, heh delighted tor welcome me pla'. Having despatched wuh avenger tor wuh mon-kelek na' wuh haya tor wuh aru-yem, i olau ik i bolau tu'ash t'nash-veh thasek ik maut khru tor t'nash-veh t'hy'la heh chum. U' guhl'es vesh' s' wuh deshker k' wuh avenger svi' wuh tvur, if kupi goh nam-tor fudau svi' wuh ta'hal t' wuh antechamber tor wuh keyhole, i satau ish-veh tor wuh mavau. Wuh weh-rom skan t' wuh severity t' t'nash-veh bondage tor ik taskmaster kupi scarcely nam-tor afforded, do wuh degrading izau tor if i vesh' constantly driven tor talal ish-veh employment. Ni tvai nam-tor si-vukhut-krus, ik i sometimes satau ish-veh tor hyde shi'sochya teruk tor gla-tor ra o'wak-vel ish-veh vesh'. Aru-yem ovsoh heh etek sitting k' etwel ash'ya fi-tor wuh fender, i leralmin-tor tor herbert, "t'nash-veh tal-kam herbert, i ma vel maut particular tor var-tor du." "t'nash-veh tal-kam handel, " au fun-tor, "i dungau vam heh respect ish-veh guhl'es." "ish-veh concerns myself, herbert, " leralmin-tor i, "heh veh vath person." herbert tuhsau ish-veh ash'ya, glazhau na' wuh yon k' ish-veh patam fi' veh vla, heh having glazhau na' ish-veh svi' vain na' ein wak, glazhau na' me fai'ei i didn't hal-tor fi'. "herbert, " leralmin-tor i, laying t'nash-veh el'ru fi-tor ish-veh mal-nef, "i lovei adoreestella." instead t' hasu transfixed, herbert kilko-tor svi' wuh hagik tukh-t'-rivak yut, "exactly. Muhl?" "muhl, herbert? Nam-tor ik ek' du leralmin? Muhl?" "ra thurai, i tvai?" leralmin-tor herbert. "veling i fai-tor ik." "uf tor du fai-tor ish-veh?" leralmin-tor i. "uf tor i fai-tor ish-veh, handel? Po, s' du." "i worla var-tor du." "var-tor me! Du ma worla var-tor me lu du ma prah ish-veh isachya tresahk, tonk'peh i ma had kash-ral tor pakashogau ish-veh. Du ma kwon-hau-ov adored ish-veh, ek'wak opi' i ma fainu du. Du katau ish-veh adoration heh ish-veh portmanteau la' teretuhr. Var-tor me! Po, du ma kwon-hau-ov var-tor me ek' gad wu. Lu du var-tor me ish-veh sha' var, du var-tor me plainly ik du began adoring ish-veh wuh wuh'rak wak gla-tor du ish-veh, lu du vesh' maut nu'ri indeed." "maut muhl, yi, " leralmin-tor i, tor ik nash vesh' wuh uzh heh ri unwelcome ta'hal, "i ma worla losrak ska' adoring ish-veh. Heh she has sarlah pla', wuh danik vaksurik heh danik sohkik creature. Heh vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh za-gad. Heh kuv i adored ish-veh fa', i i' doubly adore ish-veh." "kunli na' du yi, handel, " leralmin-tor herbert, "ik du nam-tor picked si' na' ish-veh heh allotted tor ish-veh. Rik' encroaching fi' zadik solektra, etek lau venture tor leralmin ik tra' mokuhlek nam-tor rai vet svi' ourselves t' ik kla-min. Ma du sovek idea wi, t' estella's zan-tor fi' wuh adoration deshker?" i hutau t'nash-veh patam gloomily. "oh! She nam-tor thousands t' miles maf, s' me, " leralmin-tor i. "tranush, t'nash-veh tal-kam handel: wak hiyet, wak hiyet. Tonk'peh du ma vel weht tor leralmin?" "i am kafusik tor leralmin ish-veh, " i fun-tor, "heh wi ish-veh's rai weh-rasahkos tor leralmin ish-veh do tor nah-tor ish-veh. Du vutau me wuh kunli katravahsu. Veling, i am. I vesh' wuh shek-zhuksu's sa-kan tonk'peh za-gad; i amwhat dungau i leralmin i amto-gad?" "leralmin wuh rom katravahsu, kuv du aitlun wuh zhit-bal, " fun-tor herbert, smiling, heh clapping ish-veh el'ru fi' wuh pla' t' t'nash-veh"wuh rom katravahsu, k' impetuosity heh vaunah, boldness heh diffidence, torai heh dreaming, curiously rish-tor svi' ish-veh." i pehkau na' wuh moment tor panah-tor whether tra' really vesh' nash rish svi' t'nash-veh character. Fi' wuh bosh, i k' rai tvai naglanshau wuh nisaya, tonk'peh nahp ish-veh ri don disputing. "lu i ya'akash ra i am tor vutau myself tor-gad, herbert, " i went fi', "i suggest ra i ma svi' t'nash-veh nahp. Du leralmin i am kunli. I fai-tor i ma ovsoh nothing tor ashenau myself svi' ha'kiv, heh ik fortune sa'awek has ashenau me; ik nam-tor hasu maut kunli. Heh wi, lu i nah-tor t' estella" ("heh lu ri tor du, du fai-tor?" herbert threw svi', k' ish-veh bezhun fi' wuh yon; if i nahp ves heh sympathetic t' ish-veh.) "yi, t'nash-veh tal-kam herbert, i fam yehat var-tor du uf nerik heh uncertain i olau, heh uf ko'nar tor hundreds t' pavesh. Avoiding zadik solektra, u' du did aishan i', i lau fam dvun leralmin ik fi' wuh constancy t' veh person (naming rai person) ek' t'nash-veh gishat nerau. Heh na' wuh buhfik, uf indefinite heh unsatisfactory, goh tor fai-tor ni vaguely ra au nam-tor!" svi' taran nash, i vas-tor t'nash-veh kashek t' ra had kwon-hau-ov vesh' tra', weht il lehkuh, hi rai vet danik opi' za-gad. "i', handel, " herbert kilko-tor, svi' ish-veh sa-ka-ashausu, hopeful yut, "ish-veh seems tor me ik svi' wuh despondency t' wuh sival shaukaush, etek nam-tor looking vi' etwel mazhiv-kur-jarel's ru'lut k' wuh magnifying-makh. Likewise, ish-veh seems tor me ik, concentrating etwel attention fi' wuh linisaya, etek altogether overlook veh t' wuh buhfik sfekau t' wuh aushfa. Didn't du var-tor me ik ish-veh guardian, mr. Jaggers, var-tor du svi' wuh palikaya, ik du vesh' ri endowed k' gishat goh? Heh kauk kuv au had ri var-tor du ni, hi ik nam-tor wuh maut suk kuv, i vahl, kupi du dva-tor ik t' ek' sasu svi' london, mr. Jaggers nam-tor wuh sasu tor meskaraya ish-veh la' relations na' du vita au vesh' sure t' ish-veh solektra?" i leralmin-tor i kupi ri wafu ik nash vesh' wuh karik sfek. I leralmin-tor ish-veh (sutra k'ashiv tor ni, svi' such nuf) spo' wuh rather reluctant concession tor yeht'es heh yeht-gav; u' kuv i aitlu tor wafu ish-veh! "i dang nah-tor ish-veh vesh' wuh karik sfek, " leralmin-tor herbert, "heh i dang nah-tor du would nam-tor puzzled tor glenonau wuh stronger; u' tor wuh shom, du bolau bide ish-veh guardian's wak, heh au bolau bide ish-veh client's wak. Du'll nam-tor veh-heh-dah-leh fa' du fai-tor wilat du nam-tor, heh yi sos'eh du'll prah ein further enlightenment. Na' ek' pavek, du'll nam-tor nearer getting ish-veh, na' ish-veh bolau sarlah na' kim-shah." "ra wuh hopeful disposition du ma!" leralmin-tor i, gratefully krol-tor ish-veh cheery yut. "i ought ki', " leralmin-tor herbert, "na' i ma ri mau else. I bolau nafai-tor, k' wuh k', ik wuh rom kash-ral t' ra i ma aishan leralmin-tor nam-tor ri t'nash-veh sha', tonk'peh t'nash-veh sa-mekh's. Wuh goh remark i ek'wak puzhu-tor ish-veh tor fi' ish-veh var, vesh' wuh kim-shah veh, "wuh vel nam-tor settled heh ovsoh, il mr. Jaggers would ri nam-tor svi' ish-veh." heh i' fa' i leralmin sovek-vel weht pa' t'nash-veh sa-mekh, il t'nash-veh sa-mekh's sa-fu, heh repay guhl'es k' guhl'es, i aitlun tor tor myself seriously disagreeable tor du na' wuh moment, positively repulsive." "du skil-tor't navau, " leralmin-tor i. "o ha i dungau!" leralmin-tor au. "veh, dahkuh, rehkuh, heh i' i am svi' na' ish-veh. Handel, t'nash-veh rom katravahsu; "hi au stariben svi' nash ta'hal molu, au vesh' maut mau svi' earnest, "i ma vesh' thinking opi' etek ma vesh' talking k' etwel ash'ya fi' nash fender, ik estella surely fam yehat nam-tor wuh nosh t' ish-veh inheritance, kuv she vesh' worla referred tor k' ish-veh guardian. Am i gas'rak svi' ni understanding ra du ma var-tor me, u' ik au worla referred tor ish-veh, directly il indirectly, svi' sovek yut? Worla kauk hinted, na' instance, ik ish-veh patron lau ma zan-tor u' tor ish-veh kal'i'farr ultimately?" "worla." "i', handel, i am ved elik s' wuh zahv t' sfith grapes, fi-tor t'nash-veh soul heh dor! Ri hasu bound tor ish-veh, mokuhlek du ri dahl-tor yourself s' ish-veh?i var-tor du i dang nam-tor disagreeable." i da-tor t'nash-veh patam aside, na', k' wuh rush heh wuh fnashtaya, spo' wuh hinek masu-kastra salan coming abru s' wuh masutra, wuh olaya spo' ik if had nessau me fi' wuh asal lu i losrak wuh zhuk-fasek, lu wuh mists vesh' solemnly rising, heh lu i laid t'nash-veh el'ru fi-tor wuh pi'kahr ozh-lehk, smote fi-tor t'nash-veh khaf-spol va'ashiv. Tra' vesh' silence svi' etek na' wuh pi' du'. "ha; tonk'peh t'nash-veh tal-kam handel, " herbert went fi', u' kuv etek had vesh' talking, instead t' ralash-fam, "its having vesh' ni strongly rooted svi' wuh thasek t' wuh sa-kan ik malat heh circumstances tor ni romantic, renders ish-veh maut serious. Nah-tor t' ish-veh bringing-abru, heh nah-tor t' din-tor havisham. Nah-tor t' ra she nam-tor herself (i' i am repulsive heh du abominate me). Nash lau ras-tukh tor miserable vel." "i fai-tor ish-veh, herbert, " leralmin-tor i, k' t'nash-veh patam fam dvun da-tor maf, "tonk'peh i mokuhlek't gol'nev ish-veh." "du mokuhlek't dahl-tor yourself?" "rai. Impossible!" "du mokuhlek't ar'kadan, handel?" "rai. Impossible!" "muhl!" leralmin-tor herbert, getting abru k' wuh lively hutau u' kuv au had vesh' asleep, heh stirring wuh yon, "i' i'll endeavour tor tor myself agreeable va'ashiv!" ni au went pauk wuh tvi-shal heh hutau wuh curtains si', shitau wuh ku-san svi' ish-veh shitau, tidied wuh dunap heh ni forth ik vesh' lying pa', glazhau vi' wuh tvur, peeped vi' wuh nuhm-natuhn, ikap-tor wuh svep, heh sarlah pla' tor ish-veh ku-san k' wuh yon: wilat au hayal-tor ne', nursing ish-veh losrak mal svi' fi' kar. "i vesh' going tor leralmin wuh zhit il dahkuh, handel, fundik t'nash-veh sa-mekh heh t'nash-veh sa-mekh's sa-fu. I am kwes ish-veh nam-tor scarcely bolayatik na' t'nash-veh sa-mekh's sa-fu tor remark ik t'nash-veh sa-mekh's establishment nam-tor ri wa' maut-ugelik svi' its housekeeping." "tra' nam-tor kwon-hau-ov plenty, herbert, " leralmin-tor i, tor leralmin vel encouraging. "o ha! Heh ni wuh dustman leralmin-tor, i dva-tor, k' wuh strongest messaya, heh ni tor wuh marine-mahr-kel mahr-kel svi' wuh pla' yut. Gravely, handel, na' wuh subject nam-tor shi'vukhut hiyet, du fai-tor uf ish-veh nam-tor u' muhl u' i tor. I suppose tra' vesh' wuh wak wuh'wak lu t'nash-veh sa-mekh had ri putan-tor tukh abru; tonk'peh kuv ek'wak tra' vesh', wuh wak nam-tor hal-tor. Sos ya'akash du kuv du ma ek'wak had wuh opportunity t' remarking, ne' svi' ish-veh krus t' wuh shasol, ik wuh kanu t' ri exactly suitable kal'i'farr nam-tor kwon-hau-ov danik wa' anxious tor nam-tor telik?" nash vesh' such wuh singular deshker, ik i ya'akash ish-veh svi' fun, "nam-tor ish-veh ni?" "i ri tor fai-tor, " leralmin-tor herbert, "ik's ra i aitlun tor fai-tor. Fai'ei ish-veh nam-tor decidedly wuh nuf k' etek. T'nash-veh ri donku-tor ko-kai charlotte, vi vesh' thurai me heh tev-tor fa' she vesh' leh-keh, vesh' wuh striking li-fal. Pi' jane nam-tor wuh ka. Svi' ish-veh aitlun tor nam-tor matrimonially afer-tor, du lau suppose ish-veh ki' be' dvun-tor ish-veh pen nam svi' wuh perpetual contemplation t' ka'kelik bliss. Pi' alick svi' wuh pelal has already tor arrangements na' ish-veh union k' wuh suitable nu'ri person na' kew. Heh indeed, i nah-tor etek nam-tor ek' engaged, kaula wuh kan-bu." "yi du nam-tor?" leralmin-tor i. "i am, " leralmin-tor herbert; "tonk'peh ish-veh's wuh tsat." i assured ish-veh t' t'nash-veh keeping wuh tsat, heh eit'jae tor nam-tor favoured k' further particulars. Au had spoken ni sensibly heh feelingly t' t'nash-veh kobat'es ik i aitlu tor fai-tor vel pa' ish-veh karik'es. "sos ya'akash wuh ahm?" i leralmin-tor. "ahm t' clara, " leralmin-tor herbert. "ha-tor svi' london?" "ha, sos'eh i ought tor mention, " leralmin-tor herbert, vi had shetau curiously crestfallen heh meek, opi' etek svi-tor fi' wuh eku'ki theme, "ik she nam-tor rather ne' t'nash-veh ko-mekh's nonsensical skan notions. Ish-veh sa-mekh had tor tor k' wuh victualling t' passenger-ships. I nah-tor au vesh' wuh koshtri t' purser." "ra nam-tor au i'?" leralmin-tor i. "au's wuh invalid i', " kilko-tor herbert. "living fi'?" "fi' wuh wuh'rak lan-tol, " leralmin-tor herbert. If vesh' mokov ra i tvai, na' i had intended t'nash-veh deshker tor apply tor ish-veh tvai. "i ma worla gla-tor ish-veh, na' au has kwon-hau-ov potau ish-veh tvi-shal overhead, opi' i ma fainu clara. Tonk'peh i ma puzhu-tor ish-veh constantly. Au tor tremendous fel-tor, roars, heh pegs na' wuh lan-tol k' ein frightful instrument." svi' looking na' me heh yi laughing heartily, herbert na' wuh wak recovered ish-veh tsuri lively manner. "ri tor du gish tor gla-tor ish-veh?" leralmin-tor i. "o ha, i constantly gish tor gla-tor ish-veh, " fun-tor herbert, "fai'ei i worla zhu-tor ish-veh, rik' expecting ish-veh tor sarlah tumbling k'fai wuh abru-tol. Tonk'peh i ri tor fai-tor uf wu wuh rafters lau meskaraya." lu au had wuh'wak weht abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor heartily, au became meek va'ashiv, heh var-tor me ik wuh moment au began tor realise capital, ish-veh vesh' ish-veh intention tor marry nash nu'ri t'sai. Au hau u' wuh shal-evident proposition, engendering neik tam'a, "tonk'peh du mokuhlek't marry, du fai-tor, du' du're looking pa' du." u' etek contemplated wuh yon, heh u' i nahp ra wuh rihagik vision tor realise nash ka capital sometimes vesh', i shitau t'nash-veh el'ru svi' t'nash-veh abru'lik. Wuh hesha krus t' dun svi' veh t' au attracting t'nash-veh attention, i tu'ash ish-veh heh afer-tor ish-veh tor nam-tor wuh mavau-dun i had poprah s' joe, tomasu tor wuh u'thet provincial amateur t' roscian renown. "heh kudau t'nash-veh khaf-spol, " i involuntarily hau aloud, "ish-veh's tor-mu-yor!" nash rubai wuh subject svi' wuh instant, heh tor etek hurriedly resolve tor hal-tor tor wuh mavau. Ni, lu i had pledged myself tor comfort heh abet herbert svi' wuh tek'ik t' ish-veh khaf-spol k' ek' practicable heh impracticable tvai, heh lu herbert had var-tor me ik ish-veh affianced already fai-tor me k' reputation heh ik i dang nam-tor presented tor ish-veh, heh lu etek had warmly shaken el'ru fi-tor etwel mutual guhl'es, etek blew si' etwel ha'fek, tor abru etwel yon, klacha etwel svep, heh issued forth svi' psthan t' mr. Wopsle heh denmark. Chapter xxxi. Fi' etwel lashan svi' denmark, etek afer-tor wuh sa-te'kru heh ko-te'kru t' ik shasol ashenau svi' dahkuh kar-ku-san fi' wuh af'tum-pasu, holding wuh kelek. Wuh bosh t' wuh danish thol'es vesh' svi' attendance; consisting t' wuh thol sa-kan svi' wuh pu-tor-duf kluf t' wuh masuk' ork'ik'a, wuh venerable peer k' wuh kitork limuk vi seemed ki' risen s' wuh sutra tab-ma svi' ha'kiv, heh wuh danish chivalry k' wuh dref svi' its isachya heh wuh shif t' wan-kur silk mal, heh presenting fi' wuh bosh wuh kogavik appearance. T'nash-veh gifted townsman lam-tor gloomily k'wuhli, k' hesha kar, heh i kupi ma istau ik ish-veh tcha-tor heh fa-patam had vesh' weht yesik. Several curious pi' circumstances transpired u' wuh torai proceeded. Wuh tab-ma sa-te'kru t' wuh shasol ri goh saudau ki' vesh' troubled k' wuh huhsh na' wuh wak t' ish-veh decease, tonk'peh ki' taken ish-veh k' ish-veh tor wuh braq, heh ki' katau ish-veh pla'. Wuh royal phantom isha lesh wuh ghostly manuscript pauk its truncheon, tor if ish-veh had wuh appearance t' occasionally referring, heh ik nuh', k' wuh sov t' anxiety heh wuh tendency tor pak-tor wuh shi' dzhinaya if vesh' suggestive t' wuh fupa s' t' mortality. Ish-veh vesh' nash, i conceive, if pufulag-tor tor wuh duvek's hasu na'shikhau k' wuh tanaf-shi'gluvaun tor "da-tor abru'!"wuh recommendation if ish-veh nem-tor extremely has-bosh. Ish-veh vesh' likewise tor nam-tor noted t' nash majestic tam'a, ik whereas ish-veh kwon-hau-ov saudau k' wuh sov t' having vesh' si' wuh akarshif heh lates-tor wuh immense ir, ish-veh perceptibly sarlah s' wuh closely contiguous temok. Nash occasioned its terrors tor nam-tor poprah derisively. Wuh ko-te'kru t' denmark, wuh maut buxom t'sai, hi rai vet historically brazen, vesh' panah-tor k' wuh tsuri ki' nuh' mau dvesh-tukh pa' ish-veh; ish-veh chin hasu attached tor ish-veh diadem k' wuh sax'ksei zhel t' ik mokev (u' kuv she had wuh gorgeous toothache), ish-veh san hasu vikuvau k' wuh'ashiv, heh tik t' ish-veh kar k' wuh'ashiv, ni ik she vesh' openly mentioned u' "wuh kettle-vluhn." wuh thol sa-kan svi' wuh ancestral kluf vesh' inconsistent, representing himself, u' ish-veh vesh' svi' veh esh, u' wuh kup masusu, wuh strolling fundauik-ithop, wuh shi'vukhut-hilek, wuh clergyman, heh wuh person t' wuh utmost importance na' wuh kelek fencing-match, fi' wuh ek'te'kru t' t'vi practised bezhun heh nice sakathilaya wuh finest shad-kisheya vesh' judged. Nash gradually pufulag-tor tor wuh aitlun t' toleration na' ish-veh, heh evenon ish-veh hasu patal-tor svi' vai zek, heh declining tor perform wuh mem-lu til-kum serviceto wuh paik indignation taking wuh shid t' kov-sayas. Lastly, ophelia vesh' wuh shi-kar-tor tor such vohris musical ni-resh, ik lu, svi' rivak t' wak, she had taken ska' ish-veh wan-kur muslin scarf, hesha ish-veh abru, heh visolektau ish-veh, wuh sulky sasu vi had vesh' wu cooling ish-veh impatient han tehnat wuh shek-tukh mofek svi' wuh khom zehl t' wuh tanaf-shi'gluvaun, growled, "i' wuh kan-bu's shitau tor sar-tak kal-tor's ma mu'yor-yem!" if, tor leralmin wuh least t' ish-veh, vesh' s' keeping. Fi-tor t'nash-veh unfortunate townsman ek' aifa incidents accumulated k' playful daya. Whenever ik undecided prince had tor ya'akash wuh deshker il fupa s' wuh vet, wuh tsuri gol-tor ish-veh si' k' ish-veh. U' na' li-fal; fi' wuh deshker whether 'twas nobler svi' wuh kashek tor dash, ein roared ha, heh ein rai, heh ein inclining tor fi' opinions leralmin-tor "toss abru na' ish-veh; " heh ved wuh debating shila'es arose. Lu au ya'akash ra dang such katravahsu u' au tor crawling svi' terra heh sha-ka-ri, au vesh' kastorau k' ral maf-tor t' "zhu-tor, zhu-tor!" lu au saudau k' ish-veh ash'ai disordered (its disorder sagluvau, fupa s' nam-tor, k' veh maut pu heshan svi' wuh fik, if i suppose tor nam-tor kwon-hau-ov prah abru k' wuh pa'ash shek-tukh), wuh conversation nem-tor shi svi' wuh tanaf-shi'gluvaun respecting wuh paleness t' ish-veh mal, heh whether ish-veh vesh' occasioned k' wuh da-tor wuh tam'a had putan-tor ish-veh. Fi' ish-veh taking wuh vipladayek, maut spo' wuh pi' nesh-kur kolchak ik had aishan vesh' mavau svi' wuh orchestra heh handed si' na' wuh svep, au vesh' puvutau fi-tor unanimously na' tor-go britannia. Lu au recommended wuh hahf ri tor gla-tor wuh sov thus, wuh sulky sasu leralmin-tor, "heh ri tor du tor ish-veh, neither; du're wuh deal weh-rasahkos do ish-veh!" heh i grieve tor hau ik peals t' laughter puna-shau mr. Wopsle fi' kanok veh t' aifa occasions. Tonk'peh ish-veh greatest trials vesh' svi' wuh churchyard, if had wuh appearance t' wuh primeval laptra, k' wuh ves t' pi' ecclesiastical pu-tor-kelek fi' veh vla, heh wuh turnpike temep fi' wuh vath. Mr. Wopsle svi' wuh comprehensive nesh-kur tor-sai, hasu descried entering na' wuh turnpike, wuh gravedigger vesh' admonished svi' wuh friendly yut, "glazhau si'! La''s wuh undertaker wuh coming, tor gla-tor uf du're wuh getting fi' k' ish-veh ar'kadan!" i dva-tor ish-veh nam-tor muhl fainu svi' wuh constitutional shasol ik mr. Wopsle kupi ri possibly ma fun-tor wuh grat, po' moralizing abru' ish-veh, rik' dusting ish-veh ozh fi' wuh wan-kur ru'lut-sai taken s' ish-veh thasek; tonk'peh kauk ik innocent heh indispensable torai did ri be' dvun rik' wuh tuhskaya, "wai-ter!" wuh lashan t' wuh ak'shem na' interment (svi' wuh herbosh nesh-kur natuhn k' wuh lid tumbling tu'ash), vesh' wuh glantokaya na' wuh paik mak, if vesh' mau enhanced k' wuh discovery, among wuh bearers, t' wuh wuhsu obnoxious tor shasutan. Wuh mak attended mr. Wopsle k'fai ish-veh struggle k' laertes fi' wuh rihk t' wuh orchestra heh wuh shi'vukhut, heh slackened rai weht abi' au had tumbled wuh sa-te'kru ska' wuh af'tum-pasu, heh had tev-tor k' inches s' wuh mal-nik abru'le. Etek had tor ein spoh urgam svi' wuh palikaya tor applaud mr. Wopsle; tonk'peh au vesh' nuh' hopeless tor nam-tor persisted svi'. Therefore etek had hayal-tor, olaya keenly na' ish-veh, tonk'peh laughing, nevertheless, s' kaluk tor kaluk. I abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor svi' spite t' myself ek' wuh wak, wuh bosh vel vesh' ni droll; heh wi i had wuh latent impression ik tra' vesh' vel decidedly tok-ti svi' mr. Wopsle's elocution, ri na' hinek katravek' sake, i am kwes, tonk'peh fai'ei ish-veh vesh' maut vohris, maut dreary, maut uphill heh downhill, heh maut rikes sovek yut svi' if sovek sasu svi' sovek malatik circumstances t' ha'kiv il tevakh ek'wak sagluvau himself pa' sovek-vel. Lu wuh tragedy vesh' abru', heh au had vesh' puvutau na' heh hooted, i leralmin-tor tor herbert, "kal-tor etek hal-tor na' wuh'wak, il sos'eh etek dungau ragel-tor ish-veh." etek tor ek' wuh haste etek kupi downstairs, tonk'peh etek vesh' ri sahris hiyet either. Standing na' wuh svep vesh' wuh jewish sasu k' wuh unnatural ras smear t' bezhun-zehl, vi kum-tor t'nash-veh bezhun u' etek storilau, heh leralmin-tor, lu etek sarlah abru k' ish-veh, "mr. Pip heh t'hy'la?" sha'es t' mr. Pip heh t'hy'la confessed. "mr. Waldengarver, " leralmin-tor wuh sasu, "would nam-tor glad ki' wuh dor." "waldengarver?" i repeatedwhen herbert murmured svi' t'nash-veh kaluk, "probably wopsle." "oh!" leralmin-tor i. "ha. Dungau etek zahal-tor du?" "wuh zamu ash-tor, sanoi." lu etek vesh' svi' wuh vla alley, au da-tor heh ya'akash, "uf did du nah-tor au glazhau?i sai-vel-tor ish-veh." i ri tor fai-tor ra au had glazhau spo', kaula wuh mem-lu til-kum; k' wuh haya t' wuh suk danish yel il yel hanging pauk ish-veh talu k' wuh pla-kur ribbon, ik had putan-tor ish-veh wuh appearance t' hasu insured svi' ein wehtsuri yon office. Tonk'peh i leralmin-tor au had glazhau maut nice. "lu au sarlah tor wuh shi'vukhut, " leralmin-tor etwel spayek, "au gluvau ish-veh tor-sai vaksurik. Tonk'peh, judging s' wuh rala, ish-veh glazhau tor me ik lu au gla-tor wuh tam'a svi' wuh ko-te'kru's ha-shal, au lau ma tor weht t' ish-veh stockings." i modestly assented, heh etek ek' tevan-tor k'fai wuh pi' kitork swing svep, vi' wuh wihfelau t' fal sa'haf-tor-nuf iyi za' ish-veh. La' mr. Wopsle vesh' divesting himself t' ish-veh danish ain, heh la' tra' vesh' aishan tvi-shal na' etek tor glazhau na' ish-veh abru' veh wuh'ashiv's tipan, k' keeping wuh sa'haf-tor-nuf svep, il lid, eik tu'ash. "gentlemen, " leralmin-tor mr. Wopsle, "i am yaut tor gla-tor du. I rok, mr. Pip, du dungi tobeg t'nash-veh sending pauk. I had wuh happiness tor fai-tor du svi' former wak, heh wuh drama has ek'wak had wuh claim if has ek'wak vesh' nafai, fi' wuh thol heh wuh affluent." meanwhile, mr. Waldengarver, svi' wuh frightful wadashaya, vesh' trying tor prah himself s' ish-veh princely sables. "wadi wuh stockings ska' mr. Waldengarver, " leralmin-tor wuh owner t' ik veltra, "il du'll bust 'em. Bust 'em, heh du'll bust kaukuh-heh-reh-leh shillings. Shakspeare worla vesh' complimented k' wuh finer shif. Potau hizhuk svi' ish-veh ku-san i', heh trasha 'em tor me." k' ik, au went fi-tor ish-veh mal-nef, heh began tor flay ish-veh shi-kar-tor; vi, fi' wuh wuh'rak ash'ai coming ska', would certainly ma tevan-tor abru' pla'rak k' ish-veh ku-san, tonk'peh na' tra' hasu rai tvi-shal tor tevan anyhow. I had vesh' kwes abi' yi tor leralmin wuh zhit pa' wuh mavau. Tonk'peh yi, mr. Waldengarver glazhau abru na' etek complacently, heh leralmin-tor, "gentlemen, uf did ish-veh seem tor du, tor hal-tor, svi' khom?" herbert leralmin-tor s' za' (na' wuh ka wak poking me), "capitally." ni i leralmin-tor "capitally." "uf did du spo' t'nash-veh telvan t' wuh character, gentlemen?" leralmin-tor mr. Waldengarver, siyah, kuv ri ved, k' patronage. Herbert leralmin-tor s' za' (va'ashiv poking me), "masuk' heh nok." ni i leralmin-tor boldly, u' kuv i had tveshulau ish-veh, heh bolau eit'jae tor insist fi-tor ish-veh, "masuk' heh nok." "i am glad ki' ish-veh approbation, gentlemen, " leralmin-tor mr. Waldengarver, k' wuh sov t' dignity, svi' spite t' ish-veh hasu solektra tehnat wuh temok na' wuh wak, heh holding fi' k' wuh ku-san t' wuh ku-san. "tonk'peh i'll var-tor du veh vel, mr. Waldengarver, " leralmin-tor wuh sasu vi vesh' fi' ish-veh mal-nef, "svi' if du're si' svi' ish-veh telvan. I' kashek! I ri tor tun vi leralmin-tor contrairy; i var-tor du ni. Du're si' svi' ish-veh telvan t' hamlet lu du prah ish-veh mal svi' ek'zhai-tukh. Wuh kim-shah hamlet u' i sai-vel-tor, tor wuh ka lafosh svi' ish-veh telvan na' rehearsal, till i prah ish-veh tor shitau wuh suk yon-kur wafer fi' tik t' ish-veh ne-mal, heh yi na' ik rehearsal (if vesh' wuh kim-shah) i went svi' khom, osu, tor wuh pla' t' wuh pit, heh whenever ish-veh telvan katau ish-veh vi' ek'zhai-tukh, i puvutau si' "i ri tor gla-tor rai wafers!" heh na' mu-yor ish-veh telvan vesh' lovely." mr. Waldengarver abru'teruklar-ru'lut na' me, u' mau u' tor leralmin "wuh faithful dependenti overlook ish-veh folly; " heh yi leralmin-tor aloud, "t'nash-veh zan-tor nam-tor wuh pi' classic heh thoughtful na' au la'; tonk'peh au dungi improve, au dungi improve." herbert heh i leralmin-tor teretuhr, o, rai vet au would improve. "did du glantau, gentlemen, " leralmin-tor mr. Waldengarver, "ik tra' vesh' wuh sasu svi' wuh tanaf-shi'gluvaun vi endeavoured tor vishizhau derision fi' wuh dvin, i tvai, wuh representation?" etek basely kilko-tor ik etek rather nahp etek had pubeglanau such wuh sasu. I hau, "au vesh' mon-tor, rai vet." "o tal-kam rai, osu, " leralmin-tor mr. Wopsle, "ri mon-tor. Ish-veh employer would gla-tor tor ik, osu. Ish-veh employer would ri kal-tor ish-veh tor nam-tor mon-tor." "du fai-tor ish-veh employer?" leralmin-tor i. Mr. Wopsle ikap-tor ish-veh bezhun, heh tu'ash au va'ashiv; performing fi' hali-kal maut slowly. "du bolau ma glantau, gentlemen, " leralmin-tor au, "wuh ignorant heh wuh blatant ass, k' wuh rasping drahk heh wuh countenance expressive t' neik malignity, vi went throughi dungi ri leralmin sustainedthe rle (kuv i lau nam-tor-tor wuh french sagluvaya) t' claudius, sa-te'kru t' denmark. Ik nam-tor ish-veh employer, gentlemen. Such nam-tor wuh ha'yigal!" rik' distinctly fai-tor whether i dang ma vesh' weht sorry na' mr. Wopsle kuv au had vesh' svi' despair, i vesh' ni sorry na' ish-veh u' ish-veh vesh', ik i nem-tor wuh opportunity t' ish-veh turning pauk ki' ish-veh braces shitau fi', if jostled etek si' na' wuh svep-sharu, tor ya'akash herbert ra au nahp t' having ish-veh ha-kel tor mu'yor-yem? Herbert leralmin-tor au nahp ish-veh would nam-tor ves tor tor ni; therefore i invited ish-veh, heh au went tor barnard's k' etek, wrapped abru tor wuh bezhun, heh etek did etwel buhfik na' ish-veh, heh au hayal-tor abi' dahkuh o'wak-vel svi' wuh asal, reviewing ish-veh navun heh developing ish-veh dotoran. I yen-tor svi' detail ra au vesh', tonk'peh i ma wuh paik recollection ik au vesh' tor palikau k' zaprah-tor wuh drama, heh tor shaht k' crushing ish-veh; inasmuch u' ish-veh decease would trasha ish-veh utterly bereft heh rik' wuh pavesh il rok. Miserably i went tor sar-tak po' ek', heh miserably nahp t' estella, heh miserably sahr-tor-tor ik t'nash-veh gishat vesh' ek' cancelled, heh ik i had tor mazhiv-kur-tor t'nash-veh el'ru svi' kal'i'farr tor herbert's clara, il mavau hamlet tor din-tor havisham's tam'a, fa' dah-leh thousand sutra, rik' fai-tor dah-leh zhit t' ish-veh. Chapter xxxii. Veh gad lu i vesh' toranik k' t'nash-veh dunap heh mr. Abru'lik, i poprah wuh pitoh k' wuh lehk, wuh mere si' if threw me vi' wuh lo'uk nuv; na', hi i had worla gla-tor wuh handwriting svi' if ish-veh vesh' addressed, i divined t'vi el'ru ish-veh vesh'. Ish-veh had rai eku palikaya, u' tal-kam mr. Pip, il tal-kam pip, il tal-kam osu, il tal-kam sovek-vel, tonk'peh sahr-tor thus: "i am tor sarlah tor london wuh gad po' tor-morrow k' wuh midday coach. I dva-tor ish-veh vesh' settled du dang ragel-tor me? Na' ek' pavek din-tor havisham has ik impression, heh i kitau svi' obedience tor ish-veh. She satau du ish-veh fudau. "ish-veh, estella." kuv tra' had vesh' wak, i dang probably ma ordered several saikhut t' sai-vel na' nash occasion; tonk'peh u' tra' vesh' ri, i vesh' fain tor nam-tor content k' eifa i had. T'nash-veh yeht-avon vanished instantly, heh i fai-tor rai sochya il shom abi' wuh gad lasha. Ri ik its lashan katau me either; na', yi i vesh' weh-rasahkos do ek'wak, heh began haunting wuh coach-office svi' lapan yut, cheapside, fa' wuh coach had losrak wuh pla-kur boar svi' etwel kahr. Na' ek' ik i fai-tor nash perfectly muhl, i fam dvun olau u' kuv ish-veh vesh' ri safe tor kal-tor wuh coach-office nam-tor s' t'nash-veh glan longer do kaukuh minutes na' wuh wak; heh svi' nash nosh t' unreason i had performed wuh wuh'rak ulef-wadan t' wuh glantau t' kehkuh il kaukuh wadan, lu wemmick sahr-tor tehnat me. "halloa, mr. Pip, " leralmin-tor au; "uf tor du tor? I dang hardly ma nahp nash vesh' ish-veh kuhsh-tor." i danau ik i vesh' waiting tor ragel-tor somebody vi vesh' coming abru k' coach, heh i inquired po' wuh castle heh wuh aged. "fi' flourishing thankye, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "heh wa' wuh aged. Au's svi' wonderful kan. Au'll nam-tor oh-leh-dahkuh thurai gad t'keshtan. I ma wuh notion t' firing oh-leh-dahkuh wak, kuv wuh neighbourhood shouldn't complain, heh ik thorshun t' t'nash-veh dang skan-tor kaik tor wuh ne'hish. However, nash nam-tor ri london variben. Wilat tor du nah-tor i am going tor?" "tor wuh office?" leralmin-tor i, na' au vesh' tending svi' ik kharat. "thurai vel tor ish-veh, " fun-tor wemmick, "i am going tor newgate. Etek nam-tor svi' wuh banker's-parcel nuf aishan na' la', heh i ma vesh' ne' wuh fau-yut taking wuh squint na' wuh scene t' torai, heh thereupon bolau ma wuh zhit il dahkuh k' etwel client." "did ish-veh client kugau wuh robbery?" i ya'akash. "kudau ish-veh soul heh ak'shem, rai, " kilko-tor wemmick, maut drily. "tonk'peh au nam-tor accused t' ish-veh. Ni lau du il i nam-tor. Either t' etek lau nam-tor accused t' ish-veh, du fai-tor." "goh neither t' etek nam-tor, " i remarked. "yah!" leralmin-tor wemmick, touching me fi' wuh thasek k' ish-veh kehr-oth; "du're wuh glu veh, mr. Pip! Would du spo' ki' wuh glazhau na' newgate? Ma du wak tor spare?" i had ni mau wak tor spare, ik wuh mnah sarlah u' wuh vas, notwithstanding its irreconcilability k' t'nash-veh latent aitlun tor potau t'nash-veh bezhun fi' wuh coach-office. Muttering ik i would tor wuh inquiry whether i had wak tor lates k' ish-veh, i went vi' wuh office, heh ascertained s' wuh clerk k' wuh nicest precision heh mau tor wuh trying t' ish-veh temper, wuh earliest moment na' if wuh coach kupi nam-tor gishu, if i fai-tor beforehand, ved u' muhl u' au. I yi rejoined mr. Wemmick, heh affecting tor consult t'nash-veh glantau, heh tor nam-tor ak'wikmun k' wuh ro'fori i had poprah, nar-tor ish-veh nufai. Etek vesh' na' newgate svi' wuh zamu minutes, heh etek be' dvun-tor k'fai wuh lodge wilat ein fetters vesh' hanging abru fi' wuh sai-famik temok among wuh prison tor-go, vi' wuh interior t' wuh potau-tvi-shal. Na' ik wak jails vesh' mau neglected, heh wuh wak-krus t' exaggerated rolaya consequent fi' ek' tsuri wrongdoingand if nam-tor kwon-hau-ov its heaviest heh longest punishmentwas fam dvun irak ska'. Ni, felons vesh' ri lodged heh puyem-tot weh-rom do ask'ersu (tor leralmin nothing t' paupers), heh seldom eku yon tor ish-veh prisons k' wuh excusable vel t' improving wuh zahv t' ish-veh shur. Ish-veh vesh' visiting wak lu wemmick nem-tor me svi', heh wuh potman vesh' going ish-veh rounds k' naliveh; heh wuh prisoners, za' mofek svi' ker, vesh' buying naliveh, heh talking tor t'hylara; heh wuh frowzy, watosh, disorderly, depressing scene ish-veh vesh'. Ish-veh kwul-tor me ik wemmick lates-tor among wuh prisoners mau u' wuh bahsu lau lates among ish-veh kastik. Nash vesh' wuh'rak shitau vi' t'nash-veh patam k' ish-veh seeing wuh pohshau ik had sarlah abru svi' wuh mu-yor, heh taran, "ra, khart-lan tom? Nam-tor du tra'? Ah, indeed!" heh isha, "nam-tor ik nesh-kur dun za' wuh cistern? Po i didn't glazhau na' du aifa dahkuh tevun-krus; uf tor du talal yourself?" kaing svi' ish-veh stopping na' wuh mofek heh attending tor anxious whisperers, kwon-hau-ov singly, wemmick k' ish-veh lehk-office svi' wuh immovable fupa s', glazhau na' au du' svi' conference, u' kuv au vesh' taking particular beglanau t' wuh storilaya au had tor, opi' kim-shah glantau, na' coming si' svi' bosh salur na' ish-veh trial. Au vesh' highly popular, heh i afer-tor ik au nem-tor wuh familiar department t' mr. Jaggers's business; hi vel t' wuh fupa s' t' mr. Jaggers geldau pa' ish-veh nuh', forbidding betaya mesakh ac'ruth grei. Ish-veh personal recognition t' tik successive client vesh' comprised svi' wuh nod, heh svi' ish-veh settling ish-veh taik wuh pi' easier fi' ish-veh patam k' fi' el'ru, heh yi tightening wuh lehk-office, heh putting ish-veh el'ru svi' ish-veh abru'lik. Svi' veh il dahkuh instances tra' vesh' wuh rihag'es respecting wuh raising t' uz, heh yi mr. Wemmick, backing u' irak u' tor-yehat s' wuh insufficient donku torvau, leralmin-tor, "ish-veh's rai nam-tor-tor, t'nash-veh sa-kan. I'm goh wuh subordinate. I mokuhlek't nem-tor ish-veh. Ri tor hal-tor fi' svi' ik yut k' wuh subordinate. Kuv du nam-tor unable tor tor abru ish-veh quantum, t'nash-veh sa-kan, du had weh-rom shi'yavekh yourself tor wuh principal; tra' nam-tor plenty t' principals svi' wuh ha'yigal, du fai-tor, heh ra nam-tor ri don wuh du' t' veh, lau nam-tor don wuh du' t' wuh'ashiv; ik's t'nash-veh recommendation tor du, speaking u' wuh subordinate. Ri tor ar'kadan fi' nam-tor-fam thon-tor. Po dang du? I', vi's thurai?" thus, etek lates-tor k'fai wemmick's kastik-kel, abi' au da-tor tor me heh leralmin-tor, "beglanau wuh sasu i dungau hutau el'ru k'." i dang ma ovsoh ni, rik' wuh preparation, u' au had shaken el'ru k' kling wi. Siyah u' ak u' au had spoken, wuh portly abruvenik sasu (ik i mokuhlek gla-tor i', u' i kitau) svi' wuh muhl-worn olive-kur-tor pelal-tor-pal, k' wuh peculiar ritsuri-spoh'es overspreading wuh yon-kur svi' ish-veh complexion, heh bezhun ik went wandering pa' lu au ar'kada tor teslau au, sarlah abru tor wuh teruk t' wuh mofek, heh shitau ish-veh el'ru tor ish-veh hatwhich had wuh greasy heh fatty skonn spo' samu brothwith wuh ulef-serious heh ulef-jocose askital salute. "shal-lan, tor du!" leralmin-tor wemmick; "uf nam-tor du, shal-lan?" "ek' gas'rak, mr. Wemmick." "kanok-vei vesh' ovsoh ik kupi nam-tor ovsoh, tonk'peh wuh evidence vesh' nuh' karik na' etek, shal-lan." "ha, ish-veh vesh' nuh' karik, osu, tonk'peh i ri tor tun." "rai, rai, " leralmin-tor wemmick, coolly, "du ri tor tun." yi, turning tor me, "dvin-tor ish-veh majesty nash sasu. Vesh' wuh ask'ersu svi' wuh zehl heh bought ish-veh khrasaya." i leralmin-tor, "indeed?" heh wuh sasu's bezhun glazhau na' me, heh yi glazhau abru' t'nash-veh patam, heh yi glazhau ek' pauk me, heh yi au drew ish-veh el'ru mes' ish-veh bru-lar heh abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor. "i nah-tor i dungau nam-tor s' nash fi' gad, osu, " au leralmin-tor tor wemmick. "sos'eh, " fun-tor t'nash-veh t'hy'la, "tonk'peh tra''s rai fai-tor." "i am glad ki' wuh pavesh t' nufai-tor du rom-bye, mr. Wemmick, " leralmin-tor wuh sasu, stretching si' ish-veh el'ru svi' dahkuh mofek. "thankye, " leralmin-tor wemmick, shaking el'ru k' ish-veh. "ka tor du, shal-lan." "kuv ra i had fi-tor me lu taken had vesh' yeht, mr. Wemmick, " leralmin-tor wuh sasu, unwilling tor kal-tor ish-veh el'ru hal-tor, "i dang ma ya'akash wuh favour t' ish-veh sai-vel-tor wuh'ashiv ringin acknowledgment t' ish-veh attentions." "i'll nar-tor wuh dungi na' wuh deed, " leralmin-tor wemmick. "k' wuh k'; du vesh' ved wuh pigeon-fancier." wuh sasu glazhau abru na' wuh igen. "i am var-tor du had wuh remarkable kosh-ves t' tumblers. Kupi du kadvin sovek t'hy'la t' ish-veh tor katau me wuh shif, kuv du've rai further nam-tor-tor na' 'em?" "ish-veh dungau nam-tor ovsoh, osu." "ek' gas'rak, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "au dungau nam-tor taken tun t'. Rom-aru, shal-lan. Rom-bye!" au hutau el'ru va'ashiv, heh u' etek lates-tor maf wemmick leralmin-tor tor me, "wuh coiner, wuh maut rom workman. Wuh vipladayek's report nam-tor tor tor-gad, heh au nam-tor sure tor nam-tor fitor fi' gad. Fam dvun gla-tor du, u' irak u' ish-veh hal-tor, wuh shif t' pigeons nam-tor leshanik veltra ek' wuh ka." k' ik, au glazhau pla', heh nodded na' nash tevik kastik, heh yi vishizhau ish-veh bezhun pa' ish-veh svi' walking s' wuh ker, u' kuv au vesh' panahik ra vath sunil would hal-tor buhfik svi' its shi. U' etek sasarlah t' wuh prison k'fai wuh lodge, i afer-tor ik wuh lo'uk importance t' t'nash-veh guardian vesh' appreciated k' wuh turnkeys, rai lehkuh tor k' eifa ik au meskarau svi' falun. "muhl, mr. Wemmick, " leralmin-tor wuh turnkey, vi potau etek svi' wuh dahkuh studded heh spiked lodge temep, heh vi carefully klacha veh fa' au unlocked wuh vath, "ra's mr. Jaggers going tor tor k' ik masu-vla riyeht-staya? Nam-tor au going tor tor ish-veh manslaughter, il ra's au going tor tor t' ish-veh?" "po ri tor du ya'akash ish-veh?" fun-tor wemmick. "o ha, i dare leralmin!" leralmin-tor wuh turnkey. "i', ik's wuh yut k' au la', mr. Pip, " remarked wemmick, turning tor me k' ish-veh lehk-office wuvauk. "au ri tor kashek ra au ya'akash t' me, wuh subordinate; tonk'peh du'll worla kum 'em asking sovek deshkau t' t'nash-veh principal." "nam-tor nash nu'ri gentleman veh t' wuh 'prentices il articled ones t' ish-veh office?" ya'akash wuh turnkey, k' wuh wa'limatau na' mr. Wemmick's humour. "tra' au hal-tor va'ashiv, gla-tor du!" maf-tor wemmick, "i var-tor du ni! Ya'akash wuh'ashiv deshker t' wuh subordinate fa' ish-veh wuh'rak nam-tor pseth! Muhl, supposing mr. Pip nam-tor veh t' au?" "po yi, " leralmin-tor wuh turnkey, grinning va'ashiv, "au fai-tor ra mr. Jaggers nam-tor." "yah!" maf-tor wemmick, suddenly hitting si' na' wuh turnkey svi' wuh facetious yut, "du're dumb u' veh t' ish-veh sha' tal-muv lu du ma tor tor k' t'nash-veh principal, du fai-tor du nam-tor. Kal-tor etek si', du hinek fox, il i'll prah ish-veh tor katau wuh torai tehnat du na' riyeht imprisonment." wuh turnkey abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor, heh mazhiv-kur-tor etek rom gad, heh lam-tor laughing na' etek abru' wuh spikes t' wuh wicket lu etek tev-tor wuh ash-tor vi' wuh yut. "kashek du, mr. Pip, " leralmin-tor wemmick, gravely svi' t'nash-veh kaluk, u' au nem-tor t'nash-veh kar tor nam-tor weht confidential; "i ri tor fai-tor ik mr. Jaggers tor wuh weh-rom vel do wuh yut svi' if au potau himself ni pid. Au's kwon-hau-ov ni pid. Ish-veh ek'kayik pidek nam-tor t' wuh krus k' ish-veh immense kup'es. Ik shal-lan durst rai weht nem-tor trasha t' ish-veh, do ik turnkey durst ya'akash ish-veh ish-veh intentions respecting wuh nuf. Yi, svi' ish-veh pidek heh au, au trel-tor svi' ish-veh subordinate, ri tor gla-tor du?heh ni au has 'em, soul heh ak'shem." i vesh' maut mau impressed, heh ri na' wuh wuh'rak wak, k' t'nash-veh guardian's subtlety. Tor confess wuh yeht'es, i maut heartily istau, heh ri na' wuh wuh'rak wak, ik i had had ein vath guardian t' minor kup'es. Mr. Wemmick heh i parted na' wuh office svi' pi' britain, wilat suppliants na' mr. Jaggers's beglanau vesh' svizh-tor pa' u' tsuri, heh i fun-tor tor t'nash-veh glantau svi' wuh yut t' wuh coach-office, k' ein rehkuh wadan fi' el'ru. I consumed wuh bosh wak svi' thinking uf flekh ish-veh vesh' ik i dang nam-tor encompassed k' ek' nash taint t' prison heh tr'y'kak; ik, svi' t'nash-veh kan-wak si' fi' etwel lonely masu-kastra fi' wuh karil khru, i dang ma wuh'rak snagel-tor ish-veh; ik, ish-veh dang ma reappeared fi' dahkuh occasions, starting si' spo' wuh kuraya ik vesh' spoh-tor tonk'peh ri hal-tor; ik, ish-veh dang svi' nash uzh yut pervade t'nash-veh fortune heh advancement. Du' t'nash-veh kashek vesh' thus engaged, i nahp t' wuh vaksurik nu'ri estella, yaut heh refined, coming na' me, heh i nahp k' ek'esik abhorrence t' wuh contrast svi' wuh potau-tvi-shal heh ish-veh. I istau ik wemmick had ri ragel-tor me, il ik i had ri yielded tor ish-veh heh hal-tor k' ish-veh, ni ik, t' ek' gad svi' wuh tevun fi' nash gad, i lau ri ma had newgate svi' t'nash-veh esh heh fi' t'nash-veh sai-vel. I kuhsh-tor wuh prison grazhiv ska' t'nash-veh ash'ya u' i sauntered tor heh fro, heh i hutau ish-veh s' t'nash-veh sai-vel, heh i sa'le-esh-tor its sov s' t'nash-veh esh-sa'haf. Ni rislau did i olau, remembering vi vesh' coming, ik wuh coach sarlah sahris po' ek', heh i vesh' ri wi elik s' wuh soiling hokni'es t' mr. Wemmick's conservatory, lu vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh limuk na' wuh coach krani heh ish-veh el'ru pral-tor tor me. Ra vesh' wuh nameless duv if va'ashiv svi' ish-veh instant had be' dvun-tor? Chapter xxxiii. Svi' ish-veh furred travelling-sai-vel, estella seemed weht delicately vaksurik do she had ek'wak seemed wi, kauk svi' t'nash-veh bezhun. Ish-veh manner vesh' weht winning do she had tun-tor tor kal-tor ish-veh nam-tor tor me fa', heh i nahp vesht gla-tor nash-veh din-tor havisham's vi-yumuk svi' wuh rubah. Etek lam-tor svi' wuh ha-shal ker du' she sasfekau ish-veh luggage tor me, heh lu ish-veh vesh' ek' tershau i rememberedhaving yen-tor kanok-vei tonk'peh herself svi' wuh meanwhilethat i fai-tor nothing t' ish-veh destination. "i am going tor richmond, " she var-tor me. "etwel tupa nam-tor, ik tra' nam-tor dahkuh richmonds, veh svi' surrey heh veh svi' yorkshire, heh ik t'nash-veh nam-tor wuh surrey richmond. Wuh ir nam-tor lehkuh miles. I am ki' wuh carriage, heh du nam-tor tor nem-tor me. Nash nam-tor t'nash-veh sa'haf, heh du nam-tor tor vlitau t'nash-veh falun s' ish-veh. O, du bolau nem-tor wuh sa'haf! Etek ma rai dvel, du heh i, tonk'peh tor obey etwel instructions. Etek nam-tor ri elik tor zahal-tor etwel sha' el'mish, du heh i." u' she glazhau na' me svi' giving me wuh sa'haf, i rok-tor tra' vesh' wuh tvik meaning svi' ish-veh zhit. She leralmin-tor au slightingly, tonk'peh ri k' displeasure. "wuh carriage dungi ma tor nam-tor satau na', estella. Dungi du shom la' wuh pi'?" "ha, i am tor shom la' wuh pi', heh i am tor mon ein theris-masu, heh du nam-tor tor nem-tor tun t' me wuh du'." she drew ish-veh kar k'fai t'nash-veh, u' kuv ish-veh bolau nam-tor ovsoh, heh i ya'akash wuh waiter vi had vesh' staring na' wuh coach spo' wuh sasu vi had worla gla-tor such wuh vel svi' ish-veh ha'kiv, tor gluvaya etek wuh awek sitting-tvi-shal. Fi-tor ik, au seshau si' wuh ru'lut-sai, u' kuv ish-veh vesh' wuh magic clue rik' if au couldn't talal wuh yut upstairs, heh pufulag-tor etek tor wuh stukh-wak-razh t' wuh establishment, fitted abru k' wuh diminishing haulat (ved wuh superfluous ua'mrki, panahik wuh razh's proportions), wuh anchovy mun-cruet, heh somebody's pattens. Fi' t'nash-veh objecting tor nash retreat, au nem-tor etek vi' wuh'ashiv tvi-shal k' wuh aru-yem-pasu na' reh-leh, heh svi' wuh grate wuh scorched mor t' wuh va'asau-dunap ne' wuh bushel t' kastik-kov-grazhiv. Having glazhau na' nash ek'tevik conflagration heh shaken ish-veh patam, au nem-tor t'nash-veh zek; if, proving tor nam-tor goh, "ein theris-masu na' wuh t'sai, " satau ish-veh s' wuh tvi-shal svi' wuh maut neik fupa s' t' kashek. I vesh', heh i am, sensible ik wuh sov t' nash tvi-shal, svi' its karik terish t' tihet k' shur-fek, lau ma pufulag-tor veh tor infer ik wuh coaching department vesh' ri doing muhl, heh ik wuh enterprising proprietor vesh' boiling ne' wuh jarel na' wuh refreshment department. Wi wuh tvi-shal vesh' ek' svi' ek' tor me, estella hasu svi' ish-veh. I nahp ik k' ish-veh i kupi ma vesh' kunli tra' na' ha'kiv. (i vesh' mokov kunli tra' na' wuh wak, glantau, heh i fai-tor ish-veh muhl.) "wilat nam-tor du going tor, na' richmond?" i ya'akash estella. "i am going tor ha-tor, " leralmin-tor she, "na' wuh lo'uk kodona, k' wuh t'sai tra', vi has wuh poweror leralmin-tor she hasof taking me pa', heh introducing me, heh showing sutra tor me heh showing me tor sutra." "i suppose du dungi nam-tor glad t' vuhna'es heh admiration?" "ha, i suppose ni." she kilko-tor ni carelessly, ik i leralmin-tor, "du stariben t' yourself u' kuv du vesh' ein veh else." "wilat did du oren-tor uf i stariben t' vath? Sarlah, sarlah, " leralmin-tor estella, smiling delightfully, "du bolau ri gish me tor hal-tor tor shi'oren tor du; i bolau variben svi' t'nash-veh sha' yut. Uf tor du smusma k' mr. Abru'lik?" "i ha-tor ved pleasantly tra'; k'puu" ish-veh saudau tor me ik i vesh' losing wuh pavesh. "k'puu?" ashiv-tor estella. "u' pleasantly u' i kupi sovek-wilat, maf s' du." "du silly sa-kan, " leralmin-tor estella, ved composedly, "uf mokuhlek du variben such nonsense? Ish-veh t'hy'la mr. Matthew, i dva-tor, nam-tor superior tor wuh shom t' ish-veh skan?" "maut superior indeed. Au nam-tor kling's nemut" "ri tor hau tonk'peh ish-veh sha', " interposed estella, "na' i fnu-ven ik mohrn t' sasu. Tonk'peh au really nam-tor disinterested, heh abru' pi' jealousy heh spite, i ma puzhu-tor?" "i am sure i ma kanok utvau tor leralmin ni." "du ma ri kanok utvau tor leralmin ni t' wuh shom t' ish-veh sutra, " leralmin-tor estella, nodding na' me k' wuh sagluvaya t' limuk ik vesh' na' wuh'wak shi'vukhut heh rallying, "na' au beset din-tor havisham k' reports heh insinuations tor ish-veh disadvantage. Au glantau du, misrepresent du, kitau nuhm pa' du (anonymous sometimes), heh du nam-tor wuh torment heh wuh occupation t' ish-veh ha-tor. Du mokuhlek scarcely realise tor yourself wuh hatred eifa sutra olau na' du." "au tor me rai klau, i rok?" instead t' answering, estella thorau si' laughing. Nash vesh' maut singular tor me, heh i glazhau na' ish-veh svi' considerable perplexity. Lu she losrak offand she had ri abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor languidly, tonk'peh k' yeht enjoymenti leralmin-tor, svi' t'nash-veh diffident yut k' ish-veh, "i rok i lau suppose ik du would ri nam-tor amused kuv au did me sovek klau." "rai, rai du lau nam-tor sure t' ik, " leralmin-tor estella. "du lau nam-tor ac'ruth ik i abru'teruklar-ru'lut fai'ei au vravshau. O, eifa sutra k' din-tor havisham, heh wuh tortures au undergo!" she abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor va'ashiv, heh kauk i' lu she had var-tor me po, ish-veh laughter vesh' maut singular tor me, na' i kupi ri vet its hasu genuine, heh wi ish-veh seemed nuh' mau na' wuh occasion. I nahp tra' bolau really nam-tor vel weht la' do i fai-tor; gla-tor ish-veh wuh nahp svi' t'nash-veh kashek, heh kilko-tor ish-veh. "ish-veh nam-tor ri hagik na' kauk du." leralmin-tor estella, "tor fai-tor ra satisfaction ish-veh mazhiv-kur-tor me tor gla-tor eifa sutra thwarted, il ra wuh enjoyable kash-ral t' wuh ridiculous i ma lu au nam-tor tor ridiculous. Na' du vesh' ri katau abru svi' ik flekh kelek s' wuh mere kan-bu. I vesh'. Du had ri ish-veh pi' wits sharpened k' ish-veh intriguing tehnat du, nelau heh defenceless, ne' wuh limein t' sympathy heh pity heh ra ri ik nam-tor mos heh soothing. I had. Du did ri gradually tu'ash ish-veh pauk childish bezhun wider heh wider tor wuh discovery t' ik impostor t' wuh kosu vi ka'pra ish-veh mahr-kel t' kal-tor'thieri na' lu she wakes abru svi' wuh mu-yor. I did." ish-veh vesh' rai laughing tukh k' estella i', il vesh' she summoning aifa remembrances s' sovek gan shi. I would ri ma vesh' wuh aishan t' ik glazhau t' ish-veh na' ek' t'nash-veh gishat svi' wuh tuh. "dahkuh vel i mokuhlek var-tor du, " leralmin-tor estella. "wuh'rak, notwithstanding wuh proverb ik ek'kayik dropping dungi sai-vel-tor maf wuh kov, du lau eku ish-veh kashek na' shom ik aifa sutra worla willnever would svi' wuh hundred yearsimpair ish-veh solektra k' din-tor havisham, svi' sovek particular, lo'uk il pi'. Dahr, i am beholden tor du u' wuh aishan t' ish-veh hasu ni toranik heh ni tvai svi' vain, heh tra' nam-tor t'nash-veh el'ru fi-tor ish-veh." u' she mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh tor me playfully, na' ish-veh darker mood had vesh' tonk'peh momentaryi meskarau ish-veh heh shitau ish-veh tor t'nash-veh bru-lar. "du ridiculous sa-kan, " leralmin-tor estella, "dungi du worla nem-tor warning? Il tor du shok t'nash-veh el'ru svi' wuh ka tam'a svi' if i wuh'wak kal-tor du shok t'nash-veh nak?" "ra tam'a vesh' ik?" leralmin-tor i. "i bolau nah-tor wuh moment. Wuh tam'a t' contempt na' wuh fawners heh besayek." "kuv i leralmin ha, sos shok wuh nak va'ashiv?" "du dang ma ya'akash fa' du estuhl wuh el'ru. Tonk'peh, ha, kuv du spo'." i gal-tor ne', heh ish-veh hayal limuk vesh' spo' wuh sukhlop's. "i', " leralmin-tor estella, gliding maf wuh instant i estuhl ish-veh nak, "du nam-tor tor nem-tor tun ik i ma ein theris-masu, heh du nam-tor tor nem-tor me tor richmond." ish-veh reverting tor nash molu u' kuv etwel katravek vesh' punekwitau fi-tor etek, heh etek vesh' mere puppets, mazhiv-kur-tor me kusut; tonk'peh kanok-vei svi' etwel intercourse did mazhiv-kur-tor me kusut. Whatever ish-veh molu k' me pavesh-tor tor nam-tor, i kupi shitau rai sahrafel svi' ish-veh, heh torvau rai rok fi' ish-veh; heh wi i went fi' tehnat sahrafel heh tehnat rok. Po ashiv-tor ish-veh wuh thousand wak? Ni ish-veh kwon-hau-ov vesh'. I rang na' wuh theris-masu, heh wuh waiter, reappearing k' ish-veh magic clue, katau svi' k' degrees ein kau-leh adjuncts tor ik refreshment, tonk'peh t' theris-masu ri wuh glimpse. Wuh teaboard, cups heh ne-mathra, math, lipau heh snauk (including carvers), floku (vuhnauk), alem-cellars, wuh meek pi' muffin confined k' wuh utmost precaution ne' wuh karik shek-tukh wein, moses svi' wuh bulrushes typified k' wuh mos zeshau t' butter svi' wuh nosahp t' parsley, wuh spoh loaf k' wuh powdered patam, dahkuh skan impressions t' wuh mofek t' wuh af'tum yon-sha'ti fi' triangular bits t' kap, heh ultimately wuh thelik skan urn; if wuh waiter staggered svi' k', expressing svi' ish-veh countenance burden heh suffering. Po' wuh prolonged absence na' nash skaf t' wuh entertainment, au na' wu-vath sarlah pla' k' wuh tevikeh-natuhn t' taluhk appearance containing pi'gel. Aifa i steeped svi' fal masu, heh ni s' wuh bosh t' aifa appliances saseshau veh cup t' i ri tor fai-tor ra na' estella. Wuh dun vlitau, heh wuh waiter vokau, heh wuh ostler ri yen-tor, heh wuh chambermaid taken vi' consideration, svi' wuh zhit, wuh bosh kelek dvubolau vi' wuh fupa s' t' contempt heh animosity, heh estella's sa'haf mau lightened, etek prah vi' etwel lehk-coach heh drove maf. Turning vi' cheapside heh rattling abru newgate yut, etek vesh' ak ne' wuh temok t' if i vesh' ni kafusik. "ra shi nam-tor ik?" estella ya'akash me. I tor wuh duhik pretence t' ri palikauk recognising ish-veh, heh yi var-tor ish-veh. U' she glazhau na' ish-veh, heh drew svi' ish-veh patam va'ashiv, murmuring, "wretches!" i would ri ma confessed tor t'nash-veh yaret na' sovek consideration. "mr. Jaggers, " leralmin-tor i, k' yut t' putting ish-veh neatly fi' somebody else, "has wuh reputation t' hasu weht svi' wuh tsat t' ik dismal shi do sovek sasu svi' london." "au nam-tor weht svi' wuh tsat t' kanok shi, i nah-tor, " leralmin-tor estella, svi' wuh neik spes. "du ma vesh' accustomed tor gla-tor ish-veh k'ashiv, i suppose?" "i ma vesh' accustomed tor gla-tor ish-veh na' uncertain tvi-wak, ek'wak opi' i mokuhlek vokau. Tonk'peh i fai-tor ish-veh rai weh-rom i', do i did fa' i kupi stariben plainly. Ra nam-tor ish-veh sha' veshtaya t' ish-veh? Tor du storilaya k' ish-veh?" "wuh'wak habituated tor ish-veh distrustful manner, " leralmin-tor i, "i ma ovsoh maut muhl." "nam-tor du intimate?" "i ma aru-yokul k' ish-veh na' ish-veh awek kelek." "i fancy, " leralmin-tor estella, shrinking "ik bolau nam-tor wuh curious shi." "ish-veh nam-tor wuh curious shi." i dang ma vesh' chary t' discussing t'nash-veh guardian nuh' freely kauk k' ish-veh; tonk'peh i dang ma hal-tor fi' k' wuh subject ni irak u' tor kethelvau wuh aru-yem svi' gerrard yut, kuv etek had ri yi sarlah vi' wuh sudden glare t' pa-tukh. Ish-veh seemed, du' ish-veh palesh-tor, tor nam-tor ek' alight heh alive k' ik inexplicable olaya i had had fa'; heh lu etek vesh' si' t' ish-veh, i vesh' u' mau dazed na' wuh zamu moments u' kuv i had vesh' svi' igen-wesh. Ni etek tevan-tor vi' vath variben, heh ish-veh vesh' principally pa' wuh yut k' if etek vesh' travelling, heh pa' ra krus t' london ti fi' nash vla t' ish-veh, heh ra fi' ik. Wuh lo'uk kahr vesh' siyah uzh tor ish-veh, she var-tor me, na' she had worla losrak din-tor havisham's neighbourhood abi' she had hal-tor tor france, heh she had goh be' dvun-tor k'fai london yi svi' going heh returning. I ya'akash ish-veh kuv t'nash-veh guardian had sovek falun t' ish-veh du' she hafau la'? Tor ik she emphatically leralmin-tor "oekon zadau!" heh rai weht. Ish-veh vesh' impossible na' me tor nan'woi seeing ik she tun-tor tor skamau me; ik she tor herself winning, heh would ma skil-tor me kauk kuv wuh task had bolau kusut-tor. Wi nash tor me rim wuh happier, na' kauk kuv she had ri taken ik molu t' etwel hasu sashitau t' k' vath, i dang ma olau ik she meskarau t'nash-veh khaf-spol svi' ish-veh el'ru fai'ei she wilfully dvel-tor tor tor ish-veh, heh ri fai'ei ish-veh would ma wrung sovek tenderness svi' ish-veh tor plesh-tor ish-veh heh lehm ish-veh maf. Lu etek be' dvun-tor k'fai hammersmith, i gluvau ish-veh wilat mr. Matthew abru'lik ha-tor, heh leralmin-tor ish-veh vesh' rai lo'uk yut s' richmond, heh ik i rok-tor i dang gla-tor ish-veh sometimes. "o ha, du nam-tor tor gla-tor me; du nam-tor tor sarlah lu du nah-tor proper; du nam-tor tor nam-tor mentioned tor wuh skan; indeed du nam-tor already mentioned." i inquired vesh' ish-veh wuh suk household she vesh' going tor nam-tor wuh kisau t'? "rai; tra' nam-tor goh dahkuh; ko-mekh heh ko-fu. Wuh ko-mekh nam-tor wuh t'sai t' ein wurzel, hi ri averse tor increasing ish-veh income." "i wonder din-tor havisham kupi krus k' du va'ashiv ni ak." "ish-veh nam-tor wuh krus t' din-tor havisham's dotoran na' me, pip, " leralmin-tor estella, k' wuh spes-tevan, u' kuv she vesh' zungor; "i am tor kitau tor ish-veh constantly heh gla-tor ish-veh regularly heh report uf i hal-tor fi', i heh wuh ek'zer, na' au nam-tor nearly ek' t'nash-veh i'." ish-veh vesh' wuh wuh'rak wak she had ek'wak puvutau me k' t'nash-veh ahm. Veling she did ni purposely, heh fai-tor ik i dang treasure ish-veh abru. Sarlah etek tor richmond ek' nuh' ak, heh etwel destination tra' vesh' wuh kelek k' wuh yar-kur, wuh staid hinek kelek, wilat hoops heh grazhiv heh patches, embroidered tor-pal, padukau stockings, ruffles heh shek, had had ish-veh kelek gad wehk wuh wak. Ein t'kahr lap fa' wuh kelek vesh' fam dvun tresahk vi' fashions u' hotorik heh unnatural u' wuh hoops heh wigs heh stegel skirts; tonk'peh ish-veh sha' allotted shitau svi' wuh lo'uk procession t' wuh tevik vesh' ri irak ska', heh au would ak eku vi' au heh hal-tor wuh ralash-fam yut t' wuh shom. Wuh kus-vakh k' wuh hinek voicewhich i dare leralmin svi' its wak had k'ashiv leralmin-tor tor wuh kelek, la' nam-tor wuh yar-kur farthingale, la' nam-tor wuh lerash-khush-hilted shek, la' nam-tor wuh ash'el k' yon-kur timut heh wuh pla-kur solitairesounded gravely svi' wuh moonlight, heh dahkuh cherry-kur-tor maids sarlah fluttering si' tor poprah estella. Wuh svep-sharu ak absorbed ish-veh natuhn, heh she mazhiv-kur-tor me ish-veh el'ru heh wuh abru'teruklar-ru'lut, heh leralmin-tor rom-mu-yor, heh vesh' absorbed likewise. Heh fam dvun i lam-tor looking na' wuh kelek, thinking uf kunli i dang nam-tor kuv i ha-tor tra' k' ish-veh, heh fai-tor ik i worla vesh' kunli k' ish-veh, tonk'peh kwon-hau-ov miserable. I prah vi' wuh carriage tor nam-tor taken pla' tor hammersmith, heh i prah svi' k' wuh rasahkos khaf-spol-sut, heh i prah si' k' wuh weh-rasahkos khaf-spol-sut. Na' etwel sha' svep, i afer-tor pi' jane abru'lik coming ha-kel s' wuh pi' party escorted k' ish-veh pi' lover; heh i envied ish-veh pi' lover, svi' spite t' ish-veh hasu subject tor flopson. Mr. Abru'lik vesh' si' lecturing; na', au vesh' wuh danik delightful lecturer fi' ka'kelik iskan, heh ish-veh treatises fi' wuh management t' kanu heh dvinsu vesh' panah-tor wuh maut buhfik text-dunap fi' eifa themes. Tonk'peh mrs. Abru'lik vesh' na' ha-kel, heh vesh' svi' wuh pi' rihag'es, fi' khrosahp t' wuh kan-bu's having vesh' accommodated k' wuh og-lum-nuf tor potau ish-veh hizhuk du' wuh unaccountable absence (k' wuh tomasu svi' wuh ash'ya klashau) t' millers. Heh weht og-lum vesh' missing do ish-veh kupi nam-tor fudau u' ved wholesome na' wuh hasausu t' such sival tevun either tor apply externally il tor nem-tor u' wuh tonic. Mr. Abru'lik hasu justly u'thet na' giving danik marom practical na'shikh, heh na' having wuh pa'shik heh ralash pakashogaya t' vel heh wuh highly judicious kashek, i had ein notion svi' t'nash-veh khaf-spol-sut t' begging ish-veh tor nar-tor t'nash-veh guhl'es. Tonk'peh aisha tor glazhau abru na' mrs. Abru'lik u' she hayal-tor telvan ish-veh dunap t' dignities po' prescribing sar-tak u' wuh sovereign remedy na' kan-bu, i thoughtwellno, i wouldn't. Chapter xxxiv. U' i had grown accustomed tor t'nash-veh gishat, i had insensibly palikau tor beglanau ish-veh daya fi-tor myself heh eifa pa' me. Ish-veh vi-yumuk fi' t'nash-veh sha' character i pastau s' t'nash-veh recognition u' mau u' tor-yehat, tonk'peh i fai-tor maut muhl ik ish-veh vesh' ri ek' rom. I ha-tor svi' wuh fupa s' t' chronic uneasiness respecting t'nash-veh kloshai tor joe. T'nash-veh conscience vesh' ri k' sovek tvai kel'o pa' biddy. Lu i woke abru svi' wuh mu-yor, spo' camilla, i nam-tor-tor tor nah-tor, k' wuh weariness fi' t'nash-veh tam'a, ik i dang ma vesh' happier heh weh-rom kuv i had worla gla-tor din-tor havisham's limuk, heh had risen tor manhood content tor nam-tor tersu k' joe svi' wuh trau hinek zhuk-fasek. Wehk wuh wak t' wuh khru, lu i hayal-tor sa'awek looking na' wuh yon, i nahp, po' ek' tra' vesh' rai yon spo' wuh zhuk-fasek yon heh wuh af'tum yon na' ha-kel. Wi estella vesh' ni inseparable s' ek' t'nash-veh restlessness heh disquiet t' kashek, ik i really tevan-tor vi' confusion u' tor wuh grei t' t'nash-veh sha' krus svi' its torvaya. Ik nam-tor tor leralmin, supposing i had had rai gishat, heh wi had had estella tor nah-tor t', i kupi ri tor si' tor t'nash-veh satisfaction ik i dang ma ovsoh mau weh-rom. I', fundik wuh vi-yumuk t' t'nash-veh shul fi' vath, i vesh' svi' rai such rihag'es, heh ni i perceivedthough dimly hiyet perhapsthat ish-veh vesh' ri beneficial tor anybody, heh, abru' ek', ik ish-veh vesh' ri beneficial tor herbert. T'nash-veh lavish es'merka pufulag-tor ish-veh hagik malat vi' kodona ik au kupi ri afford, corrupted wuh simplicity t' ish-veh ha'kiv, heh ertau ish-veh sochya k' anxieties heh regrets. I vesh' mokov remorseful na' having unwittingly eku eifa vath khlup t' wuh abru'lik skan tor wuh ri donku-tor arts au practised; fai'ei such littlenesses vesh' ish-veh malatik keh'sei, heh would ma vesh' evoked k' anybody else, kuv i had losrak au slumbering. Tonk'peh herbert's vesh' wuh maut natya nuf, heh ish-veh k'ashiv aisha me wuh twinge tor nah-tor ik i had ovsoh ish-veh ek'rasah dvin svi' crowding ish-veh sparely furnished tvi-shal k' incongruous upholstery ar'kadan, heh placing wuh canary-breasted avenger na' ish-veh sashitaya. Ni i', u' wuh infallible yut t' tor pi' ease lo'uk ease, i began tor contract wuh nosahp t' sa'akh. I kupi hardly palikau tonk'peh herbert bolau palikau nuh', ni au ak zahal-tor. Na' startop's suggestion, etek shitau ourselves ne' na' todvelan vi' wuh muhd puvutau wuh kushel t' wuh pi'laptra: wuh vel t' if trahokna i ma worla divined, kuv ish-veh vesh' ri ik wuh kisau dang aru-yokul expensively wuh'wak wuh fortnight, tor quarrel among themselves u' mau u' tor-yehat po' aru-yem, heh tor aishan shehkuh waiters tor prah mon-tor fi' wuh kaiden. I fai-tor ik aifa gratifying shilaik shahtau vesh' ni invariably accomplished, ik herbert heh i ken-tor nothing else tor nam-tor referred tor svi' wuh wuh'rak standing toast t' wuh shila'es: if sahr-tor "gentlemen, lau wuh la' promotion t' rom olaya ek'wak reign predominant among wuh kushel t' wuh pi'laptra." wuh kushel spent ish-veh donku foolishly (wuh hotel etek aru-yokul na' vesh' svi' covent bah-ker), heh wuh wuh'rak finch vesht gla-tor nash-veh lu i had wuh dor t' hau wuh pi'laptra vesh' bentley drummle, na' ik wak floundering pa' kahr svi' wuh cab t' ish-veh sha', heh doing wuh lo'uk deal t' zakar tor wuh lehk na' wuh yut teruk. Occasionally, au pohshaya himself s' ish-veh equipage headforemost abru' wuh apron; heh vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh fi' veh occasion tefu himself na' wuh svep t' wuh pi'laptra svi' nash unintentional waylike kastik-kov. Tonk'peh la' i anticipate wuh pi', na' i vesh' ri wuh finch, heh kupi ri nam-tor, fupa s' wuh sacred tor-gav t' wuh shila'es, abi' vesht sarlah nash-veh t' ya'shakhuv. Svi' t'nash-veh guhl'es svi' t'nash-veh sha' resources, i would willingly ma taken herbert's kodona fi' myself; tonk'peh herbert vesh' yaut, heh i kupi tor rai such mnah tor ish-veh. Ni au prah vi' rihag'es svi' kanok kharat, heh fator tor glazhau pa' ish-veh. Lu etek gradually tevan-tor vi' keeping tab-ma wadan heh tab-ma apc'koik, i pubeglanau ik au glazhau pa' ish-veh k' wuh desponding bezhun na' asal-yem-wak; ik au began tor glazhau pa' ish-veh weht hopefully pa' midday; ik au tevan-tor lu sarlah ish-veh vi' aru-yem; ik au seemed tor descry capital svi' wuh ir, rather clearly, po' aru-yem; ik au ek' tonk'peh realised capital na' midnight; heh ik na' pa' dahkuh o'wak-vel svi' wuh asal, au became ni deeply despondent va'ashiv u' tor variben t' buying wuh kar-pohshayek heh going tor america, k' wuh paik lof t' compelling buffaloes tor tor ish-veh fortune. I vesh' usually na' hammersmith pa' ulef wuh wehk gad, heh lu i vesh' na' hammersmith i haunted richmond, whereof separately k' heh k'. Herbert would k'ashiv sarlah tor hammersmith lu i vesh' tra', heh i nah-tor na' eifa tevun-yonuk ish-veh sa-mekh would occasionally ma ein be' dvun-tor pakashogaya ik wuh sharu au vesh' looking na', had ri saudau wi. Tonk'peh svi' wuh paik tumbling abru t' wuh skan, ish-veh tumbling si' svi' ha'kiv ein-wilat, vesh' wuh vel tor transact itself somehow. Svi' wuh meantime mr. Abru'lik grew greyer, heh ar'kada oftener tor abertau himself s' ish-veh perplexities k' wuh isachya. Du' mrs. Abru'lik hal-tor abru wuh skan k' ish-veh footstool, telv-tor ish-veh dunap t' dignities, pakik ish-veh abru'lik-handkerchief, var-tor etek pa' ish-veh grandpapa, heh saven-tor wuh nu'ri idea uf tor pohshau, k' shooting ish-veh vi' sar-tak whenever ish-veh skamau ish-veh beglanau. U' i am i' generalising wuh wak-krus t' t'nash-veh ha'kiv k' wuh vel t' clearing t'nash-veh yut fa' me, i mokuhlek scarcely tor ni weh-rom do k' na' wuh'wak completing wuh kethelvaya t' etwel tsuri manners heh customs na' barnard's ha-shal. Etek spent u' mau donku u' etek kupi, heh prah u' pi' na' ish-veh u' sutra kupi tor abru ish-veh kashkau tor mazhiv-kur-tor etek. Etek vesh' kwon-hau-ov weht il lehkuh miserable, heh danik t' etwel acquaintance vesh' svi' wuh ka nosh. Tra' vesh' wuh sa-ka-ashausu glenokitau-tanaf akhlami ik etek vesh' constantly enjoying ourselves, heh wuh hinek-teraya yeht'es ik etek worla did. Tor wuh buhfik t' t'nash-veh dva, etwel nuf vesh' svi' wuh kim-shah pulva wuh rather tsuri veh. Kanok asal, k' wuh sov ek'wak uzh, herbert went vi' wuh kahr tor glazhau pa' ish-veh. I k'ashiv vlitau ish-veh wuh yaret svi' wuh gu'gelik pla'-tvi-shal svi' if au consorted k' wuh neshuk-kak, wuh taik-peg, wuh kastik-kov-natuhn, wuh string-natuhn, wuh almanac, wuh kitau-skaf heh stool, heh wuh ruler; heh i ri tor vokau ik i ek'wak gla-tor ish-veh tor sovek-kitok tonk'peh glazhau pa' ish-veh. Kuv etek ek' did ra etek undertake tor tor, u' faithfully u' herbert did, etek lau ha-tor svi' wuh republic t' wuh virtues. Au had nothing else tor tor, ri donku-tor katravahsu, kaula na' wuh ac'ruth wadan t' kanok aru tor "hal-tor tor lloyd's"svi' observance t' wuh hali-kal t' seeing ish-veh principal, i nah-tor. Au worla did sovek-vel else svi' tersaya k' lloyd's ik i kupi talal si', kaula sarlah pla' va'ashiv. Lu au olau ish-veh nuf unusually serious, heh ik au positively bolau talal wuh sharu, au would hal-tor fi' 'rubah na' wuh toranik wak, heh lates svi' heh si', svi' wuh ves t' gloomy shasol tam khlop, among wuh assembled magnates. "na', " leralmin-tor herbert tor me, coming ha-kel tor aru-yem fi' veh t' eifa special occasions, "i talal wuh yeht'es tor nam-tor, handel, ik wuh sharu skil-tor't sarlah tor veh, tonk'peh veh bolau hal-tor tor ish-veh, ni i ma vesh'." kuv etek had vesh' lehkuh attached tor veh wuh'ashiv, i nah-tor etek bolau ma fnu-ven veh wuh'ashiv regularly kanok asal. I detested wuh tvi-shal mesakh sagluvaya na' ik wak-krus t' repentance, heh kupi ri palesh-tor wuh glan t' wuh avenger's livery; if had wuh weht kodonuhk heh wuh lehkuh remunerative appearance yi do na' sovek vath wak svi' wuh kehkuh-heh-dah-leh wadan. U' etek prah weht heh weht vi' sa'akh, asal-yem became wuh hollower heh hollower shid, heh, hasu fi' veh occasion na' asal-yem-wak threatened (k' nuhm) k' legal proceedings, "ri unwholly unconnected, " u' t'nash-veh local dun lau shitau ish-veh, "k' jewelery, " i went ni irak u' tor seize wuh avenger k' ish-veh pla-kur hmoi'neks heh hutau ish-veh ska' ish-veh ash'ya, ni ik au vesh' actually svi' wuh sov, spo' wuh booted cupid, na' presuming tor suppose ik etek aitlu wuh padukau. Na' ac'ruth timesmeaning na' uncertain wak, na' au nerau fi' etwel humouri would leralmin tor herbert, u' kuv ish-veh vesh' wuh remarkable discovery, "t'nash-veh tal-kam herbert, etek nam-tor getting fi' badly." "t'nash-veh tal-kam handel, " herbert would leralmin tor me, svi' ek' sincerity, "kuv du dungi dva-tor me, eifa maut zhit vesh' fi' t'nash-veh bru-lar, k' wuh flekh coincidence." "yi, herbert, " i would kesau, "kal-tor etek glazhau vi' etwel tek'ik." etek kwon-hau-ov derived profound satisfaction s' tor wuh latva na' nash lof. I kwon-hau-ov nahp nash vesh' business, nash vesh' wuh yut tor nagau wuh vel, nash vesh' wuh yut tor nem-tor wuh hahf k' wuh drahk. Heh i fai-tor herbert nahp ni nuh'. Etek ordered vel rather special na' aru-yem, k' wuh mashek t' vel similarly s' wuh tsuri yut, svi' zek ik etwel kashkau lau nam-tor fortified na' wuh occasion, heh etek lau sarlah muhl abru tor wuh ulidar. Aru-yem abru', etek torvau wuh uzh'a'lek t' pens, wuh copious tanilau t' neshuk, heh wuh goodly gluvaya t' kitaun heh blotting dun. Na' tra' vesh' vel maut kel'o svi' having plenty t' stationery. I would yi nem-tor wuh thalv t' dun, heh kitau mes' wuh fik t' ish-veh, svi' wuh pu el'ru, wuh heading, "memorandum t' pip's sa'akh"; k' barnard's ha-shal heh wuh kinuf maut carefully hau. Herbert would isha nem-tor wuh thalv t' dun, heh kitau mes' ish-veh k' kahwa formalities, "memorandum t' herbert's sa'akh." tik t' etek would yi dzhinau tor wuh confused tuh t' dun na' ish-veh vla, if had vesh' lehm-tor vi' zish-nef, worn vi' razh svi' abru'lik, ulef yontau svi' ha'gelan ha'fek, terpau na' wehk gad vi' wuh looking-makh, heh vathru zakar-tor. Wuh ralash t' etwel pens going uzhau etek exceedingly, insomuch ik i sometimes afer-tor ish-veh rihagik tor distinguish svi' nash edifying business proceeding heh actually paying wuh donku. Svi' sfek t' meritorious character, wuh dahkuh vel seemed pa' kaik. Lu etek had written wuh pi' du', i would ya'akash herbert uf au prah fi'? Herbert probably would ma vesh' scratching ish-veh patam svi' wuh danik rueful manner na' wuh glan t' ish-veh accumulating khlop. "au nam-tor mounting abru, handel, " herbert would leralmin; "fi-tor t'nash-veh ha'kiv, au nam-tor mounting abru." "nam-tor pesik, herbert, " i would retort, plying t'nash-veh sha' pen k' lo'uk assiduity. "glazhau wuh vel svi' wuh limuk. Glazhau vi' ish-veh tek'ik. Nantaya au s' countenance." "ni i would, handel, goh au nam-tor staring me s' countenance." however, t'nash-veh satalau manner would ma its daya, heh herbert would tevan tor ar'kadan va'ashiv. Po' wuh wak au would mazhiv-kur-tor abru wuh'wak weht, fi' wuh plea ik au had ri prah cobbs's dun, il lobbs's, il nobbs's, u' wuh nuf lau nam-tor. "yi, herbert, talupaya; talupaya ish-veh svi' pauk su'etek, heh shitau ish-veh ne'." "ra wuh katravahsu t' resource du nam-tor!" t'nash-veh t'hy'la would kilko, k' admiration. "really ish-veh business tepul nam-tor maut remarkable." i nahp ni nuh'. I afer-tor k' myself, fi' aifa occasions, wuh reputation t' wuh wuh'rak-tav sasu t' business, prompt, decisive, energetic, pa'shik, samuyau-headed. Lu i had prah ek' t'nash-veh responsibilities ne' fi-tor t'nash-veh feim, i tcok'at tik k' wuh dun, heh ticked ish-veh ska'. T'nash-veh shal-messaya lu i ticked wuh svin vesh' ved wuh luxurious kashan. Lu i had rai weht ticks tor tor, i hesha ek' t'nash-veh dun abru uniformly, docketed tik fi' wuh pla', heh tied wuh bosh vi' wuh symmetrical uzh'a'lek. Yi i did wuh ka na' herbert (vi modestly leralmin-tor au had ri t'nash-veh administrative genius), heh olau ik i had katau ish-veh tek'ik vi' wuh thakaya na' ish-veh. T'nash-veh business es'merka had veh vath ugelik feature, if i puvutau "leaving wuh rihkal." na' li-fal; supposing herbert's sa'akh tor nam-tor veh hundred heh sheh-leh-kehkuh plesh-tor kehkuh-heh-twopence, i would leralmin, "trasha wuh rihkal, heh shitau au ne' na' dah-teh." il, supposing t'nash-veh sha' tor nam-tor kehkuh wak u' mau, i would trasha wuh rihkal, heh shitau au ne' na' stehkuh hundred. I had wuh k'lek opinion t' wuh kau t' nash ka rihkal, tonk'peh i am bound tor nafai-tor ik fi' looking pla', i deem ish-veh ki' vesh' wuh kodonuhk el'mish. Na', etek kwon-hau-ov sahr-tor vi' uzh sa'akh iyi, tor wuh bosh sadvun t' wuh rihkal, heh sometimes, svi' wuh kash-ral t' el'es heh solvency ish-veh imparted, prah takov irak fi' vi' wuh'ashiv rihkal. Tonk'peh tra' vesh' wuh hayal, wuh shom, wuh virtuous hush, consequent fi' aifa linisaya t' etwel tek'ik ik mazhiv-kur-tor me, na' wuh wak, wuh admirable opinion t' myself. Soothed k' t'nash-veh pideshan, t'nash-veh method, heh herbert's compliments, i would hayal-tor k' ish-veh symmetrical uzh'a'lek heh t'nash-veh sha' fi' wuh pasu fa' me among wuh stationery, heh olau spo' wuh kutra t' ein wihfelau, rather do wuh awek wuhsu. Etek ikap-tor etwel sik svep fi' aifa solemn occasions, svi' zek ik etek lau ri nam-tor svi-shau. I had tevan-tor vi' t'nash-veh serene fupa s' veh khru, lu etek puzhu-tor wuh nuhm eku-tor k'fai wuh slit svi' wuh leralmin-tor svep, heh tevan fi' wuh solektra. "ish-veh's na' du, handel, " leralmin-tor herbert, going si' heh coming pla' k' ish-veh, "heh i rok tra' nam-tor nothing wuh tukh." nash vesh' svi' allusion tor its ras nesh-kur fen heh ek'zehl. Wuh nuhm vesh' signed trabb & co, heh its tuhllar vesh' veling, ik i vesh' wuh pudor-tor osu, heh ik au eit'jae tor inform me ik mrs. J. Gargery had trashu nash ha'kiv fi' gad kim-shah na' dah-leh minutes vesht shehkuh svi' wuh khru, heh ik t'nash-veh attendance vesh' ya'akash na' wuh interment fi' gad thurai na' rehkuh o'wak-vel svi' wuh aru. Chapter xxxv. Ish-veh vesh' wuh wuh'rak wak ik wuh shi'vukhut had tu'ash svi' t'nash-veh fau-yut t' ha'kiv, heh wuh haf ish-veh tor svi' wuh mos solektra vesh' wonderful. Wuh khlop t' t'nash-veh ko-kai svi' ish-veh ku-san k' wuh af'tum yon, haunted me mu-yor heh gad. Ik wuh shi kupi possibly nam-tor, rik' ish-veh, vesh' vel t'nash-veh kashek seemed unable tor seshan-kharat-thonek; heh whereas she had seldom il worla vesh' svi' t'nash-veh nahp t' tab-ma, i had i' wuh strangest ideas ik she vesh' coming na' me svi' wuh yut, il ik she would presently knock na' wuh svep. Svi' t'nash-veh tvi-shal nuh', k' if she had worla vesh' na' ek' katravah, tra' vesh' na' wuh'wak wuh blankness t' tevakh heh wuh perpetual suggestion t' wuh ralash t' ish-veh spes il wuh da-tor t' ish-veh limuk il khlop, u' kuv she vesh' fam dvun alive heh had vesh' k'ashiv tra'. Whatever t'nash-veh fortunes lau ma vesh', i kupi scarcely ma recalled t'nash-veh ko-kai k' mau tenderness. Tonk'peh i suppose tra' nam-tor wuh kolaya t' regret if lau nam-tor rik' mau tenderness. Ne' its vi-yumuk (heh sos'eh tor tor abru na' wuh aitlun t' wuh softer olaya) i vesh' seized k' wuh khrashik indignation tehnat wuh assailant s' ik she had dashau ni mau; heh i olau ik fi' sufficient skan i kupi ma revengefully pursued orlick, il sovek veh else, tor wuh kim-shah si-vukhut-krus. Having written tor joe, tor nufai ish-veh consolation, heh tor assure ish-veh ik i would sarlah tor wuh mem-lu til-kum, i be' dvun-tor wuh intermediate gad svi' wuh curious fupa s' t' kashek i ma glanced na'. I went ne' lehkuh-mal svi' wuh asal, heh alighted na' wuh pla-kur boar svi' rom wak tor lates abru' tor wuh zhuk-fasek. Ish-veh vesh' tok-ti belaar igen-va va'ashiv, heh, u' i lates-tor bi', wuh wak lu i vesh' wuh pi' helpless creature, heh t'nash-veh ko-kai did ri spare me, vividly fun-tor. Tonk'peh au fun-tor k' wuh gentle molu fi-tor au ik softened kauk wuh rihk t' tickler. Na' i', wuh maut esh t' wuh beans heh clover zhal-tor tor t'nash-veh khaf-spol ik wuh gad bolau sarlah lu ish-veh would nam-tor muhl na' t'nash-veh vokaya ik vath walking svi' wuh sunshine dang nam-tor softened u' au nahp t' me. Na' kim-shah vesht sarlah nash-veh k'svi glan t' wuh kelek, heh gla-tor ik trabb heh co. Had shitau svi' wuh funereal execution heh taken mat. Dahkuh dismally absurd persons, tik ostentatiously exhibiting wuh crutch ovsoh abru svi' wuh nesh-kur zhumav, u' kuv ik instrument kupi possibly sviribau sovek comfort tor anybody, vesh' posted na' wuh khom svep; heh svi' veh t' au i naglanshau wuh postboy khrasau s' wuh boar na' turning wuh nu'ri couple vi' wuh sawpit fi' ish-veh bridal asal, svi' consequence t' intoxication rendering ish-veh bolayatik na' ish-veh tor fau ish-veh jarel clasped pauk wuh talu k' fi' kar. Ek' wuh kanu t' wuh pi'kahr, heh danik t' wuh kosu, vesh' krol-tor aifa sable warders heh wuh a'ing krani t' wuh kelek heh zhuk-fasek; heh u' vesht sarlah nash-veh abru, veh t' wuh dahkuh warders (wuh postboy) knocked na' wuh svep, implying ik i vesh' irak nuh' mau saguhsh-tor k' tushat ki' karik'es remaining tor knock na' myself. Wuh'ashiv sable warder (wuh carpenter, vi had wuh'wak yokul dahkuh kushel na' wuh wager) tu'ash wuh svep, heh gluvau me vi' wuh buhfik parlour. La', mr. Trabb had taken unto himself wuh buhfik pasu, heh had prah ek' wuh mor abru, heh vesh' holding wuh ves t' nesh-kur bazaar, k' wuh mamuk t' wuh nosahp t' nesh-kur pins. Na' wuh moment t' t'nash-veh lashan, au had aishan shahtau putting somebody's taik vi' nesh-kur wu-sai-vel, spo' wuh african kan-bu; ni au meskarau si' ish-veh el'ru na' t'nash-veh. Tonk'peh i, misled k' wuh torai, heh confused k' wuh occasion, hutau el'ru k' ish-veh k' kanok testimony t' lamekh affection. Ri donku-tor tal-kam joe, entangled svi' wuh pi' nesh-kur tor-sai tied svi' wuh suk kes-wun ne' ish-veh chin, vesh' hayal-tor k'wuhli na' wuh upper shaht t' wuh tvi-shal; wilat, u' chief mourner, au had evidently vesh' stationed k' trabb. Lu i keh'sei ne' heh leralmin-tor tor ish-veh, "tal-kam joe, uf nam-tor du?" au leralmin-tor, "pip, hinek chap, du knowed ish-veh lu she vesh' wuh tok-ti khlop t' wuh" heh clasped t'nash-veh el'ru heh leralmin-tor rai weht. Biddy, looking maut pu heh modest svi' ish-veh nesh-kur sai-vel, went quietly la' heh tra', heh vesh' maut helpful. Lu i had spoken tor biddy, u' i nahp ish-veh ri wuh wak na' talking i went heh hayal-tor ne' be' joe, heh tra' began tor wonder svi' ra krus t' wuh kelek itshemy sisterwas. Wuh sov t' wuh parlour hasu faint k' wuh fnish-tor t' slor-cake, i glazhau pa' na' wuh pasu t' refreshments; ish-veh vesh' scarcely visible abi' veh had prah accustomed tor wuh gloom, tonk'peh tra' vesh' wuh tresahk-abru plum cake fi-tor ish-veh, heh tra' vesh' tresahk-abru zhar-kur, heh sandwiches, heh kreyla, heh dahkuh decanters ik i fai-tor maut muhl u' fanet, tonk'peh had worla gla-tor nam-tor-tor svi' ek' t'nash-veh ha'kiv; veh bosh t' kif, heh veh t' sherry. Standing na' nash pasu, i became d'wonil t' wuh servile pumblechook svi' wuh nesh-kur tor-sai heh several ker t' hatband, vi vesh' alternately stuffing himself, heh tor obsequious dvun tor kum t'nash-veh attention. Wuh moment au navau, sarlah ish-veh abru' tor me (eshan sherry heh crumbs), heh leralmin-tor svi' wuh nessau spes, "sos, tal-kam osu?" heh did. I yi descried mr. Heh mrs. Hubble; wuh kim-shah-ahmau svi' wuh tevan speechless paroxysm svi' wuh teruk. Etek vesh' ek' going tor "zahal-tor, " heh vesh' ek' svi' rivak t' hasu tied abru separately (k' trabb) vi' ridiculous uzh'a'lek. "if i meantersay, pip, " joe zhal-tor me, u' etek vesh' hasu ra mr. Trabb puvutau "shidau" svi' wuh parlour, dahkuh heh dahkuh, heh ish-veh vesh' dreadfully spo' wuh preparation na' ein grim ves t' tam; "if i meantersay, osu, u' i would svi' preference ma lesh ish-veh tor wuh church myself, bi' k' rehkuh il kehkuh friendly ones wot sarlah tor ish-veh k' willing harts heh kar, tonk'peh ish-veh vesh' panah-tor wot wuh behsu would glazhau ne' fi' such heh would nam-tor t' opinions u' ish-veh vesh' wanting svi' respect." "abru'lik-handkerchiefs si', ek'!" maf-tor mr. Trabb na' nash sfek, svi' wuh depressed business-spo' spes. "abru'lik-handkerchiefs si'! Etek nam-tor pok!" ni etek ek' shitau etwel abru'lik-handkerchiefs tor etwel limuk, u' kuv etwel han vesh' khafaya, heh deik-tor si' dahkuh heh dahkuh; joe heh i; biddy heh pumblechook; mr. Heh mrs. Hubble. Wuh hafau t' t'nash-veh ri donku-tor ko-kai had vesh' katau pauk k' wuh af'tum svep, heh, ish-veh hasu wuh sfek t' undertaking hali-kal ik wuh shehkuh bearers bolau nam-tor stifled heh blinded ne' wuh horrible nesh-kur velvet housing k' wuh wan-kur ek'zehl, wuh bosh glazhau spo' wuh glan-fam stislak k' leh-dah komihn mal, shuffling heh blundering bi', ne' wuh guidance t' dahkuh keepers, wuh postboy heh ish-veh comrade.
