Wuh neighbourhood, however, highly messau t' aifa arrangements, heh etek vesh' mau krol-tor u' etek went k'fai wuh pi'kahr; wuh weht youthful heh hakarik krus t' wuh shila tor dashes i' heh yi tor tresahk etek ska', heh lying svi' bek-tor tor fnakaya etek na' sfekau t' vantage. Na' such wak wuh weht mabuhlik ekhlami puvutau si' svi' wuh teporilau manner fi' etwel emergence pauk ein teruk t' expectancy, "la' sarlah au!" "la' au nam-tor!" heh etek vesh' ek' tonk'peh cheered. Svi' nash progress i vesh' mau annoyed k' wuh abject pumblechook, vi, hasu za' me, persisted ek' wuh yut u' wuh delicate attention svi' arranging t'nash-veh streaming hatband, heh smoothing t'nash-veh tor-sai. T'nash-veh nahp vesh' further saglakolau k' wuh mauyik pride t' mr. Heh mrs. Hubble, vi vesh' surpassingly conceited heh vainglorious svi' hasu kisau t' ni distinguished wuh procession. Heh i' wuh eik'es t' masu-kastra ti pa'shik fa' etek, k' wuh masu-halovau t' wuh ships fi' wuh pilash growing s' ish-veh; heh etek went vi' wuh churchyard, beyik wuh shi'vukhut t' t'nash-veh ri-fainu mekhlar, philip pirrip, tab-ma t' nash parish, heh isha georgiana, ko-telsu t' wuh abru'. Heh tra', t'nash-veh ko-kai vesh' laid quietly svi' wuh terra, du' wuh larks sang pid abru' ish-veh, heh wuh ta'hal salan strewed ish-veh k' vaksurik duv t' wan heh lap. T' wuh spa-tor t' wuh worldly minded pumblechook du' nash vesh' doing, i aitlun tor leralmin rai weht do ish-veh vesh' ek' addressed tor me; heh ik kauk lu eifa thol tvur vesh' telv-tor if remind humanity uf ish-veh katau nothing vi' wuh panu heh mokuhlek nem-tor nothing si', heh uf ish-veh fleeth spo' wuh duv heh worla continueth wu svi' veh stay, i puzhu-tor ish-veh huhsh wuh reservation t' wuh nuf t' wuh nu'ri gentleman vi sarlah unexpectedly vi' suk veltra. Lu etek zaprah, au had wuh hardihood tor var-tor me ik au istau t'nash-veh ko-kai kupi ma fainu i had ovsoh ish-veh ni mau dor, heh tor hint ik she would ma panah-tor ish-veh reasonably purchased na' wuh price t' ish-veh tevakh. Po' ik, au drank ek' wuh shom t' wuh sherry, heh mr. Hubble drank wuh kif, heh wuh dahkuh variben (if i ma opi' glantau tor nam-tor customary svi' such nuf) u' kuv au vesh' t' ved wuh'ashiv ne-koshtri s' wuh tevik, heh vesh' notoriously immortal. T'forti, au went maf k' mr. Heh mrs. Hubble, tor tor wuh khru t' ish-veh, i olau sure, heh tor var-tor wuh jolly bargemen ik au vesh' wuh afersu t' t'nash-veh fortunes heh t'nash-veh earliest benefactor. Lu au vesh' ek' hal-tor, heh lu trabb heh ish-veh menbut ri ish-veh sa-kan; i glazhau na' himhad crammed ish-veh mummery vi' sa'haf, heh vesh' hal-tor nuh', wuh kelek olau wholesomer. Ak afterwards, biddy, joe, heh i, had wuh samu aru-yem teretuhr; tonk'peh etek aru-yokul svi' wuh buhfik parlour, ri svi' wuh hinek af'tum, heh joe vesh' ni exceedingly particular ra au did k' ish-veh lipau heh snauk heh wuh saltcellar heh ra ri, ik tra' vesh' lo'uk restraint fi-tor etek. Tonk'peh po' aru-yem, lu i tor ish-veh nem-tor ish-veh mev, heh lu i had loitered k' ish-veh pa' wuh zhuk-fasek, heh lu etek hayal-tor ne' teretuhr fi' wuh lo'uk vihpan t' kov s'udish ish-veh, etek prah fi' weh-rom. I pubeglanau ik po' wuh mem-lu til-kum joe rubai ish-veh sai-vel ni irak, u' tor tor wuh compromise svi' ish-veh gad sai-vel heh working sai-vel; svi' if wuh tal-kam katravahsu glazhau malatik, heh spo' wuh sasu au vesh'. Au vesh' maut mau sanoi k' t'nash-veh asking kuv i lau yuk svi' t'nash-veh sha' pi' tvi-shal, heh i vesh' sanoi nuh'; na' i olau ik i had ovsoh rather wuh lo'uk vel svi' tor wuh ya'akash. Lu wuh duv t' khru vesh' ikapik svi', i nem-tor wuh opportunity t' getting vi' wuh bah-ker k' biddy na' wuh pi' variben. "biddy, " leralmin-tor i, "i nah-tor du lau ma written tor me pa' aifa maf tukh." "tor du, mr. Pip?" leralmin-tor biddy. "i dang ma written kuv i had nahp ik." "ri tor suppose ik i tvai tor nam-tor unkind, biddy, lu i leralmin i panah-tor ik du ought ki' nahp ik." "tor du, mr. Pip?" she vesh' ni hizhuk, heh had such wuh orderly, rom, heh takov yut k' ish-veh, ik i did ri spo' wuh nahp t' tor ish-veh maf va'ashiv. Po' looking wuh pi' na' ish-veh downcast bezhun u' she lates-tor be' me, i mazhiv-kur-tor abru ik sfek. "i suppose ish-veh dungi nam-tor rihagik na' du tor hafau la' i', biddy tal-kam?" "oh! I mokuhlek't tor ni, mr. Pip, " leralmin-tor biddy, svi' wuh molu t' regret tonk'peh fam dvun t' hizhuk conviction. "i ma vesh' speaking tor mrs. Hubble, heh i am going tor ish-veh tor-morrow. I rok etek dungau nam-tor kup tor nem-tor ein tun t' mr. Gargery, teretuhr, abi' au settles ne'." "uf nam-tor du going tor ha-tor, biddy? Kuv du aitlun sovek mo" "uf am i going tor ha-tor?" ashiv-tor biddy, striking svi', k' wuh momentary kluhvau fi-tor ish-veh limuk. "i'll var-tor du, mr. Pip. I am going tor ar'kadan tor prah wuh shi' mistress svi' wuh uzh shi'oren nearly shahtau la'. I mokuhlek nam-tor muhl recommended k' ek' wuh behsu, heh i rok i mokuhlek nam-tor industrious heh hasausu, heh saven-tor myself du' i saven-tor vath. Du fai-tor, mr. Pip, " pursued biddy, k' wuh abru'teruklar-ru'lut, u' she ashenau ish-veh bezhun tor t'nash-veh limuk, "wuh uzh shi'oren nam-tor ri spo' wuh hinek, tonk'peh i oren-tor wuh rom deal s' du po' ik wak, heh ma had wak opi' yi tor improve." "i nah-tor du would kwon-hau-ov improve, biddy, ne' sovek circumstances." "ah! Kaula svi' t'nash-veh rasahkos vla t' komihn malat, " murmured biddy. Ish-veh vesh' ri ni mau wuh reproach u' wuh irresistible thinking aloud. Muhl! I nahp i would mazhiv-kur-tor abru ik sfek nuh'. Ni, i lates-tor wuh pi' further k' biddy, looking silently na' ish-veh downcast bezhun. "i ma ri puzhu-tor wuh particulars t' t'nash-veh ko-kai's tevakh, biddy." "au nam-tor maut slight, ri donku-tor vel. She had vesh' svi' veh t' ish-veh rasahkos statesthough au had prah weh-rom t' tab-ma, rather do worsefor kehkuh gad, lu she sasarlah t' ish-veh svi' wuh khru, aishan na' theris-masu-wak, heh leralmin-tor ved plainly, 'joe.' u' she had worla leralmin-tor sovek zhit na' wuh wu du', i sahr-tor heh zaprah svi' mr. Gargery s' wuh zhuk-fasek. She tor glat tor me ik she aitlu ish-veh tor hayal-tor ne' beyik ish-veh, heh aitlu me tor shitau ish-veh kar pauk ish-veh talu. Ni i shitau au pauk ish-veh talu, heh she laid ish-veh patam ne' fi' ish-veh tipan ved content heh satisfied. Heh ni she presently leralmin-tor 'joe' va'ashiv, heh wuh'wak 'pardon, ' heh wuh'wak 'pip.' heh ni she worla abertau ish-veh patam abru sovek weht, heh ish-veh vesh' aishan wuh wadan later lu etek laid ish-veh ne' fi' ish-veh sha' sar-tak, fai'ei etek afer-tor she vesh' hal-tor." biddy maf-tor; wuh darkening bah-ker, heh wuh lane, heh wuh yel ik vesh' coming si', vesh' blurred svi' t'nash-veh sha' glan. "nothing vesh' ek'wak discovered, biddy?" "nothing." "tor du fai-tor ra nam-tor shetau t' orlick?" "i dang nah-tor s' wuh kur t' ish-veh sai-vel ik au nam-tor working svi' wuh quarries." "veling du ma gla-tor ish-veh yi?po nam-tor du looking na' ik gu'gelik lap svi' wuh lane?" "vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh tra', fi' wuh mu-yor she tev-tor." "ik vesh' ri wuh kim-shah wak either, biddy?" "rai; ki'gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh tra', opi' etek ma vesh' walking la'. Ish-veh nam-tor t' rai nam-tor-tor, " leralmin-tor biddy, laying ish-veh el'ru fi-tor t'nash-veh kar, u' i vesh' na' sahran si', "du fai-tor i would ri tehs-tor du; au vesh' ri tra' wuh minute, heh au nam-tor hal-tor." ish-veh zaprah-tor t'nash-veh utmost indignation tor talal ik she vesh' fam dvun pursued k' nash katravahsu, heh i olau inveterate tehnat ish-veh. I var-tor ish-veh ni, heh var-tor ish-veh ik i would spend sovek donku il nem-tor sovek kusut-tor tor yetur ish-veh s' ik shasol. K' degrees she pufulag-tor me vi' weht temperate variben, heh she var-tor me uf joe ashau me, heh uf joe worla complained t' sovek-vel, she didn't leralmin, t' me; she had rai bolaya; i fai-tor ra she tvai, tonk'peh ek'wak did ish-veh gu-vam svi' ish-veh yut t' ha'kiv, k' wuh karik el'ru, wuh hizhuk lahv, heh wuh gentle khaf-spol. "indeed, ish-veh would nam-tor lerash tor leralmin nuh' mau na' ish-veh, " leralmin-tor i; "heh biddy, etek bolau k'ashiv stariben t' aifa vel, na' veling i dungau nam-tor k'ashiv ne' la' i'. I am ri going tor trasha ri donku-tor joe sa'awek." biddy leralmin-tor worla wuh single zhit. "biddy, ri tor du zhu-tor me?" "ha, mr. Pip." "ri tor mention ish-veh calling me mr. Pip, if saudau tor me tor nam-tor svi' rasahkos zahvan, biddy, ra tor du tvai?" "ra tor i tvai?" ya'akash biddy, timidly. "biddy, " leralmin-tor i, svi' wuh virtuously shal-asserting manner, "i bolau ya'akash tor fai-tor ra du tvai k' nash?" "k' nash?" leralmin-tor biddy. "i', ri tor vava, " i retorted. "du nam-tor-tor ri tor vava, biddy." "nam-tor-tor ri!" leralmin-tor biddy. "o mr. Pip! Nam-tor-tor!" muhl! I rather nahp i would mazhiv-kur-tor abru ik sfek nuh'. Po' wuh'ashiv ralash-fam da-tor svi' wuh bah-ker, i tevan-tor pla' fi' wuh nen shul. "biddy, " leralmin-tor i, "i tor wuh remark respecting t'nash-veh coming ne' la' k'ashiv, tor gla-tor joe, if du poprah k' wuh pu'ulidau silence. Ma wuh goodness, biddy, tor var-tor me po." "nam-tor du ved sure, yi, ik du dungi sarlah tor gla-tor ish-veh k'ashiv?" ya'akash biddy, stopping svi' wuh wonil bah-ker lates, heh looking na' me ne' wuh yel k' wuh pa'shik heh trau bezhun. "o tal-kam me!" leralmin-tor i, u' kuv i afer-tor myself compelled tor mazhiv-kur-tor abru biddy svi' despair. "nash really nam-tor wuh maut rasahkos vla t' komihn malat! Ri tor leralmin sovek weht, kuv du sanoi, biddy. Nash kolaya me maut mau." na' if cogent utvau i potau biddy na' wuh ir du' mu'yor-yem, heh lu i went abru tor t'nash-veh sha' hinek pi' tvi-shal, nem-tor u' stately wuh trasha t' ish-veh u' i kupi, svi' t'nash-veh murmuring soul, deem reconcilable k' wuh churchyard heh wuh pavek t' wuh gad. U' k'ashiv u' i vesh' restless svi' wuh mu-yor, heh ik vesh' kanok yonuk t' wuh wadan, i haul-tor ra wuh unkindness, ra wuh dash, ra wuh injustice, biddy had ovsoh me. Lehkuh-mal svi' wuh asal i vesh' tor hal-tor. Lehkuh-mal svi' wuh asal i vesh' si', heh looking svi', unseen, na' veh t' wuh wooden krani t' wuh zhuk-fasek. Tra' i lam-tor, na' minutes, looking na' joe, already na' ar'kadan k' wuh min t' muhl'es heh karik'es fi-tor ish-veh limuk ik tor ish-veh gluvaya u' kuv wuh ugelik yel t' wuh ha'kiv svi' mahr-kel na' ish-veh vesh' shining fi' ish-veh. "rom-bye, tal-kam joe!rai, ri tor psethau ish-veh offfor oekon's sake, mazhiv-kur-tor me ish-veh blackened el'ru!i dungau nam-tor ne' ak heh k'ashiv." [illustration] "worla nuh' ak, osu, " leralmin-tor joe, "heh worla nuh' k'ashiv, pip!" biddy vesh' waiting na' me na' wuh af'tum svep, k' wuh mug t' uzh thas heh wuh puhnk t' kap. "biddy, " leralmin-tor i, lu i mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh t'nash-veh el'ru na' parting, "i am ri reshnek, tonk'peh i am dash-tor." "rai, ri tor nam-tor dash-tor, " she pleaded ved pathetically; "kal-tor goh me nam-tor dash-tor, kuv i ma vesh' ungenerous." wuh'wak weht, wuh mists vesh' rising u' i lates-tor maf. Kuv au disclosed tor me, u' i suspect au did, ik i dang ri sarlah pla', heh ik biddy vesh' ved gas'rak, ek' i mokuhlek leralmin nam-tor, au vesh' ved gas'rak nuh'. Chapter xxxvi. Herbert heh i went fi' s' rasahkos tor weh-rasahkos, svi' wuh yut t' increasing etwel sa'akh, looking vi' etwel tek'ik, leaving rihkal, heh wuh spo' exemplary transactions; heh wak went fi', whether il rai, u' au has wuh yut t' doing; heh vesht sarlah nash-veh t' ya'shakhuv, svi' fulfilment t' herbert's prediction, ik i dang tor ni fa' i fai-tor wilat i vesh'. Herbert himself had sarlah t' ya'shakhuv ohkuh tevun-krus fa' me. U' au had nothing else do ish-veh majority tor sarlah vi', wuh pavek did ri tor wuh profound kashan svi' barnard's ha-shal. Tonk'peh etek had glazhau fa'rak tor t'nash-veh veh-heh-twentieth gad t'keshtan, k' wuh patreitan t' speculations heh anticipations, na' etek had fi' panah-tor ik t'nash-veh guardian kupi hardly gol'nev taran vel definite fi' ik occasion. I had taken tun ki' ish-veh muhl ken-tor svi' pi' britain lu t'nash-veh gad t'keshtan vesh'. Fi' wuh gad fa' ish-veh, i poprah wuh official pitoh s' wemmick, informing me ik mr. Jaggers would nam-tor glad kuv i would vutau fi-tor ish-veh na' kaukuh svi' wuh aru t' wuh auspicious gad. Nash convinced etek ik vel lo'uk vesh' tor pavesh-tor, heh threw me vi' wuh ritsuri nuv lu i teslau tor t'nash-veh guardian's office, wuh model t' punctuality. Svi' wuh sik office wemmick nufau me ish-veh congratulations, heh incidentally tetau wuh vla t' ish-veh han k' wuh hesha krus t' nalatra-dun ik i tishau wuh glazhau t'. Tonk'peh au leralmin-tor nothing respecting ish-veh, heh motioned me k' wuh nod vi' t'nash-veh guardian's tvi-shal. Ish-veh vesh' november, heh t'nash-veh guardian vesh' standing fa' ish-veh yon leaning ish-veh pla' tehnat wuh vuzh-mev-krus, k' ish-veh el'ru ne' ish-veh coattails. "muhl, pip, " leralmin-tor au, "i bolau vutau du mr. Pip tor-gad. Congratulations, mr. Pip." etek hutau el'ru, au vesh' kwon-hau-ov wuh remarkably pen shaker, heh i itaren ish-veh. "nem-tor wuh ku-san, mr. Pip, " leralmin-tor t'nash-veh guardian. U' i hayal-tor ne', heh au korsau ish-veh attitude heh keh'sei ish-veh meix'tem na' ish-veh kluf, i olau na' wuh disadvantage, if reminded me t' ik hinek wak lu i had vesh' shitau fi-tor wuh tombstone. Wuh dahkuh ghastly vishizhau fi' wuh nef vesh' ri irak s' ish-veh, heh ish-veh sagluvaya vesh' u' kuv au vesh' tor wuh stupid apoplectic attempt tor attend tor wuh conversation. "i' t'nash-veh nu'ri t'hy'la, " t'nash-veh guardian began, u' kuv i vesh' wuh toglantausu svi' wuh natuhn, "i am going ki' wuh zhit il dahkuh k' du." "kuv du sanoi, osu." "ra tor du suppose, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, bending fa'rak tor glazhau na' wuh solektra, heh yi throwing ish-veh patam pla' tor glazhau na' wuh abru-tol, "ra tor du suppose du nam-tor living na' wuh tav t'?" "na' wuh tav t', osu?" "na', " ashiv-tor mr. Jaggers, fam dvun looking na' wuh abru-tol, "therateof?" heh yi glazhau ek' pauk wuh tvi-shal, heh svizh-tor k' ish-veh abru'lik-handkerchief svi' ish-veh el'ru, ulef-yut tor ish-veh han. I had glazhau vi' t'nash-veh tek'ik ni k'ashiv, ik i had thoroughly vashau sovek slight notion i lau ek'wak ma had t' ish-veh bearings. Reluctantly, i confessed myself ved unable tor kilko-srashiv wuh deshker. Nash kilko seemed agreeable tor mr. Jaggers, vi leralmin-tor, "i nahp ni!" heh blew ish-veh han k' wuh sov t' satisfaction. "i', i ma ya'akash du wuh deshker, t'nash-veh t'hy'la, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. "ma du sovek-vel tor ya'akash me?" "veling ish-veh would nam-tor wuh lo'uk vas tor me tor ya'akash du several deshkau, osu; tonk'peh i vokau ish-veh prohibition." "ya'akash veh, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. "nam-tor t'nash-veh benefactor tor nam-tor tor fainu tor me tor-gad?" "rai. Ya'akash wuh'ashiv." "nam-tor ik guhl'es tor nam-tor imparted tor me ak?" "waive ik, wuh moment, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, "heh ya'akash wuh'ashiv." i glazhau pa' me, tonk'peh tra' saudau tor nam-tor i' rai tor-yehat stron s' wuh inquiry, "ma-ianything tor poprah, osu?" fi' ik, mr. Jaggers leralmin-tor, triumphantly, "i nahp etek dang sarlah tor ish-veh!" heh puvutau tor wemmick tor mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh ik krus t' dun. Wemmick saudau, handed ish-veh svi', heh sasaudau. "i', mr. Pip, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, "attend, kuv du sanoi. Du ma vesh' bestan takov freely la'; ish-veh ahm paresh-tor takov k'ashiv svi' wemmick's cash-dunap; tonk'peh du nam-tor svi' sa'akh, veling?" "i am kwes i bolau leralmin ha, osu." "du fai-tor du bolau leralmin ha; ri tor du?" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. "ha, osu." "i ri tor ya'akash du ra du owe, fai'ei du ri tor fai-tor; heh kuv du did fai-tor, du wouldn't var-tor me; du would leralmin lehkuh. Ha, ha, t'nash-veh t'hy'la, " maf-tor mr. Jaggers, pral-tor ish-veh kehr-oth tor pehkaya me u' i tor wuh gluvaya t' protesting: "ish-veh's kesik hiyet ik du nah-tor du wouldn't, tonk'peh du would. Du'll tobeg me, tonk'peh i fai-tor weh-rom do du. I', nem-tor nash krus t' dun svi' ish-veh el'ru. Du ma prah ish-veh? Maut rom. I', unfold ish-veh heh var-tor me ra ish-veh nam-tor." "nash nam-tor wuh kutra-pitoh, " leralmin-tor i, "na' kaukuh hundred plesh-tor." "ik nam-tor wuh kutra-pitoh, " ashiv-tor mr. Jaggers, "na' kaukuh hundred plesh-tor. Heh wuh maut handsome hau-ov t' donku nuh', i nah-tor. Du panah-tor ish-veh ni?" "uf sos tor vathru!" "ah! Tonk'peh kilko-srashiv wuh deshker, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. "undoubtedly." "du panah-tor ish-veh, undoubtedly, wuh handsome hau-ov t' donku. I', ik handsome hau-ov t' donku, pip, nam-tor ish-veh sha'. Ish-veh nam-tor wuh la' tor du fi' nash gad, svi' earnest t' ish-veh gishat. Heh na' wuh tav t' ik handsome hau-ov t' donku fundauik annum, heh na' rai higher tav, du nam-tor tor ha-tor abi' wuh tansu t' wuh bosh saudau. Ik nam-tor tor leralmin, du dungi i' nem-tor ish-veh donku tek'ik entirely vi' ish-veh sha' el'ru, heh du dungi bes-tor s' wemmick teh heh dah-leh-kaukuh plesh-tor fundauik yonuk, abi' du nam-tor svi' sviribaya k' wuh mashulek-patam, heh rai longer k' wuh mere agent. U' i ma var-tor du fa', i am wuh mere agent. I fitor t'nash-veh instructions, heh i am vlitau na' doing ni. I nah-tor au injudicious, tonk'peh i am ri vlitau na' giving sovek opinion fi' ish-veh merits." i vesh' palikaya tor sagluvau t'nash-veh gratitude tor t'nash-veh benefactor na' wuh lo'uk liberality k' if i vesh' skasau, lu mr. Jaggers pehkau me. "i am ri vlitau, pip, " leralmin-tor au, coolly, "tor lesh ish-veh zhit tor sovek veh; " heh yi hoknau abru ish-veh tor-pal-harr, u' au had hoknau abru wuh subject, heh lam-tor frowning na' ish-veh kluf u' kuv au suspected au t' designs tehnat ish-veh. Po' wuh svizh, i hinted, "tra' vesh' wuh deshker aishan i', mr. Jaggers, if du aitlu me tor waive na' wuh moment. I rok i am doing nothing riyeht svi' asking ish-veh va'ashiv?" "ra nam-tor ish-veh?" leralmin-tor au. I lau ma fainu ik au would worla gol'nev me si'; tonk'peh ish-veh nem-tor me aback ki' tor shid wuh deshker afresh, u' kuv ish-veh vesh' ved uzh. "nam-tor ish-veh kesik, " i leralmin-tor, po' hesitating, "ik t'nash-veh patron, wuh mashulek-patam du ma spoken t', mr. Jaggers, dungi ak" tra' i delicately pehkau. "dungi ak ra?" ya'akash mr. Jaggers. "ik's rai deshker u' ish-veh lam-tor, du fai-tor." "dungi ak sarlah tor london, " leralmin-tor i, po' casting pa' na' wuh precise shid t' zhit, "il summon me sovek-wilat else?" "i', la', " kilko-tor mr. Jaggers, fixing me na' wuh wuh'rak wak k' ish-veh gu'gelik glu-eku bezhun, "etek bolau revert tor wuh khru lu etek wuh'rak snagel-tor veh wuh'ashiv svi' ish-veh pi'kahr. Ra did i var-tor du yi, pip?" "du var-tor me, mr. Jaggers, ik ish-veh lau nam-tor tevun hence lu ik person saudau." "aishan ni, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, "ik's t'nash-veh kilko-srashiv." u' etek glazhau bosh na' veh wuh'ashiv, i olau t'nash-veh esh sarlah quicker svi' t'nash-veh karik aitlun tor prah vel s' ish-veh. Heh u' i olau ik sarlah ish-veh quicker, heh u' i olau ik gla-tor ish-veh ik sarlah ish-veh quicker, i olau ik i had lehkuh pavesh do ek'wak t' getting sovek-vel s' ish-veh. "tor du suppose ish-veh dungi fam dvun nam-tor tevun hence, mr. Jaggers?" mr. Jaggers hutau ish-veh patam, ri svi' negativing wuh deshker, tonk'peh svi' altogether negativing wuh notion ik au kupi anyhow nam-tor prah tor kilko-srashiv ish-veh, heh wuh dahkuh horrible vishizhau t' wuh twitched limuk glazhau, lu t'nash-veh bezhun fam-kelek-tor abru tor au, u' kuv au had sarlah tor wuh burun svi' ish-veh suspended attention, heh vesh' going tor uhfuk. "sarlah!" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, warming wuh pla'dor t' ish-veh mal k' wuh pla'dor t' ish-veh warmed el'ru, "i'll nam-tor eiktra k' du, t'nash-veh t'hy'la pip. Ik's wuh deshker i bolau ri nam-tor ya'akash. Du'll ken-tor ik weh-rom, lu i var-tor du ish-veh's wuh deshker ik lau compromise me. Sarlah! I'll hal-tor wuh pi' further k' du; i'll leralmin vel weht." au keh'sei ne' ni neik tor kwal na' ish-veh kluf, ik au vesh' kup tor tetaya wuh vaukh t' ish-veh mal svi' wuh svizh au tor. "lu ik person discloses, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, straightening himself, "du heh ik person dungi settle ish-veh sha' tek'ik. Lu ik person discloses, t'nash-veh krus svi' nash business dungi cease heh satalau. Lu ik person discloses, ish-veh dungi ri nam-tor bolayatik na' me tor fai-tor sovek-vel pa' ish-veh. Heh ik's ek' i ma prah tor leralmin." etek glazhau na' veh wuh'ashiv abi' i withdrew t'nash-veh bezhun, heh glazhau thoughtfully na' wuh lan-tol. S' nash kim-shah starun i derived wuh notion ik din-tor havisham, na' ein utvau il rai utvau, had ri taken ish-veh vi' ish-veh guhl'es u' tor ish-veh designing me na' estella; ik au resented nash, heh olau wuh jealousy pa' ish-veh; il ik au really did vel tor ik scheme, heh would ma nothing tor tor k' ish-veh. Lu i ashenau t'nash-veh bezhun va'ashiv, i afer-tor ik au had vesh' shrewdly looking na' me ek' wuh wak, heh vesh' doing ni fam dvun. "kuv ik nam-tor ek' du ma tor leralmin, osu, " i remarked, "tra' mokuhlek nam-tor nothing losrak na' me tor leralmin." au nodded assent, heh seshau si' ish-veh pi'tak-dreaded glantau, heh ya'akash me wilat i vesh' going tor aru-yokul? I kilko-tor na' t'nash-veh sha' tvi-shal, k' herbert. U' wuh bolayatik zehlanaya, i ya'akash ish-veh kuv au would favour etek k' ish-veh apc'koik, heh au promptly nar-tor wuh k'waw'zhe. Tonk'peh au insisted fi' walking ha-kel k' me, svi' zek ik i lau tor rai hayaik preparation na' ish-veh, heh wuh'rak au had wuh nuhm il dahkuh tor kitau, heh (veling) had ish-veh el'ru tor pu-tor. Ni i leralmin-tor i would hal-tor vi' wuh sik office heh variben tor wemmick. Wuh kla-min vesh', ik lu wuh kaukuh hundred plesh-tor had sarlah vi' t'nash-veh abru'lik, wuh nahp had sarlah vi' t'nash-veh patam if had vesh' k'ashiv tra' fa'; heh ish-veh saudau tor me ik wemmick vesh' wuh rom person tor na'shikhau k' fundik such nahp. Au had already klacha abru ish-veh safe, heh tor preparations na' going ha-kel. Au had losrak ish-veh kitau-skaf, katau si' ish-veh dahkuh greasy office ha'fek heh lam-tor au svi' zehl k' wuh snuffers fi' wuh slab be' wuh svep, pok tor nam-tor sayonotau; au had dref-tor ish-veh yon neik, shitau ish-veh taik heh lo'uk-tor-pal pok, heh vesh' beating himself ek' abru' wuh tuf k' ish-veh safe-tal-muv, u' wuh athletic tusok po' business. "mr. Wemmick, " leralmin-tor i, "i aitlun tor ya'akash ish-veh opinion. I am maut desirous tor dvin-tor wuh t'hy'la." wemmick tightened ish-veh lehk-office heh hutau ish-veh patam, u' kuv ish-veh opinion vesh' tevik tehnat sovek fatal kobat'es t' ik wihfelau. "nash t'hy'la, " i pursued, "nam-tor trying tor prah fi' svi' commercial ha'kiv, tonk'peh has rai donku, heh tal-tor ish-veh rihagik heh disheartening tor tor wuh palikaya. I' i aitlun somehow tor gol'nev ish-veh tor wuh palikaya." "k' donku ne'?" leralmin-tor wemmick, svi' wuh molu psethayek do sovek sawdust. "k' ein donku ne', " i kilko-tor, na' wuh uneasy remembrance pohshaya mes' me t' ik symmetrical uzh'a'lek t' dun na' ha-kel"k' ein donku ne', heh sos'eh ein anticipation t' t'nash-veh gishat." "mr. Pip, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "i dang spo' aishan tor sahr-tor abru' k' du fi' t'nash-veh ozh, kuv du sanoi, wuh ahm t' wuh vuhnauk mesut abru u' pid u' chelsea pulau. Kal-tor's gla-tor; tra''s london, veh; southwark, dahkuh; blackfriars, rehkuh; waterloo, kehkuh; westminster, kaukuh; vauxhall, shehkuh." au had rihamau ska' tik mesut svi' its da-tor, k' wuh el'rek t' ish-veh safe-tal-muv fi' wuh ku t' ish-veh el'ru. "tra''s u' wehk u' shehkuh, gla-tor du, tor dvel-tor s'." "i ri tor ken-tor du, " leralmin-tor i. "dvel-tor ish-veh mesut, mr. Pip, " fun-tor wemmick, "heh nem-tor wuh lates fi-tor ish-veh mesut, heh ralash ish-veh donku vi' wuh thames abru' wuh centre kesek t' ish-veh mesut, heh du fai-tor wuh shaht t' ish-veh. Dvin-tor wuh t'hy'la k' ish-veh, heh du lau fai-tor wuh shaht t' ish-veh nuh', tonk'peh ish-veh's wuh lehkuh vaksurik heh profitable shaht." i kupi ma posted wuh newspaper svi' ish-veh ru'lut, au tor ish-veh ni eik po' taran nash. "nash nam-tor maut discouraging, " leralmin-tor i. "tvai tor nam-tor ni, " leralmin-tor wemmick. "yi nam-tor ish-veh ish-veh opinion, " i inquired, k' ein pi' indignation, "ik wuh sasu dang worla" "invest leshanik veltra svi' wuh t'hy'la?" leralmin-tor wemmick. "certainly au dang ri. Vita au aitlu tor prah rid t' wuh t'hy'la, heh yi ish-veh shetau wuh deshker uf mau leshanik veltra ish-veh lau nam-tor don tor prah rid t' ish-veh." "heh ik, " leralmin-tor i, "nam-tor ish-veh deliberate opinion, mr. Wemmick?" "ik, " au fun-tor, "nam-tor t'nash-veh deliberate opinion svi' nash office." "ah!" leralmin-tor i, pressing ish-veh, na' i nahp vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh be' wuh loophole la'; "tonk'peh would ik nam-tor ish-veh opinion na' walworth?" "mr. Pip, " au kilko-tor, k' ne-seshan, "walworth nam-tor veh shi, heh nash office nam-tor wuh'ashiv. Mau u' wuh aged nam-tor veh person, heh mr. Jaggers nam-tor wuh'ashiv. Au bolau ri nam-tor confounded teretuhr. T'nash-veh walworth sentiments bolau nam-tor taken na' walworth; rim tonk'peh t'nash-veh official sentiments mokuhlek nam-tor taken svi' nash office." "maut muhl, " leralmin-tor i, mau vas-tor, "yi i dungau glazhau du abru na' walworth, du lau nerau fi-tor ish-veh." "mr. Pip, " au fun-tor, "du dungi nam-tor welcome tra', svi' wuh awek heh personal tsoh." etek had meskarau nash conversation svi' wuh neik spes, muhl fai-tor t'nash-veh guardian's kaluk tor nam-tor wuh sharpest t' wuh nasik. U' au i' saudau svi' ish-veh svep-sharu, towelling ish-veh el'ru, wemmick prah fi' ish-veh lo'uk-tor-pal heh lam-tor k' tor snuff si' wuh ha'fek. Etek ek' rehkuh went vi' wuh yut teretuhr, heh s' wuh svep-ash wemmick da-tor ish-veh yut, heh mr. Jaggers heh i da-tor ours. I kupi ri gol'nev wishing weht do wuh'wak ik khru, ik mr. Jaggers had had wuh aged svi' gerrard yut, il wuh stinger, il wuh vel, il wuh somebody, tor unbend ish-veh meix'tem wuh pi'. Ish-veh vesh' wuh uncomfortable consideration fi' wuh dah-leh-wuh'rak gad t'keshtan, ik coming t' ya'shakhuv na' ek' seemed hardly don du' svi' such wuh klashau heh suspicious panu u' au tor t' ish-veh. Au vesh' wuh thousand wak weh-rom informed heh cleverer do wemmick, heh wi i would wuh thousand wak rather ma had wemmick tor aru-yem. Heh mr. Jaggers tor ri me sa'awek intensely melancholy, fai'ei, po' au vesh' hal-tor, herbert leralmin-tor t' himself, k' ish-veh bezhun teslau fi' wuh yon, ik au nahp au bolau ma committed wuh felony heh yen-tor wuh details t' ish-veh, au olau ni dejected heh guilty. Chapter xxxvii. Deeming gad wuh buhfik gad na' taking mr. Wemmick's walworth sentiments, i vaikau wuh thurai ensuing gad aru tor wuh pilgrimage tor wuh castle. Fi' arriving fa' wuh battlements, i afer-tor wuh union jack hashan heh wuh drawbridge abru; tonk'peh undeterred k' nash gluvaya t' defiance heh tehnaya, i rang na' wuh temep, heh vesh' nafai-tor svi' wuh danik pacific manner k' wuh aged. "t'nash-veh sa-fu, osu, " leralmin-tor wuh hinek sasu, po' securing wuh drawbridge, "rather had ish-veh svi' ish-veh kashek ik du lau pavesh-tor tor eku svi', heh au losrak zhit ik au would ak nam-tor ha-kel s' ish-veh aru's lates. Au nam-tor maut regular svi' ish-veh lates-tor, nam-tor t'nash-veh sa-fu. Maut regular svi' kanok-vei, nam-tor t'nash-veh sa-fu." i nodded na' wuh hinek gentleman u' wemmick himself lau ma nodded, heh etek went svi' heh hayal-tor ne' k' wuh yon-shal. "du tor acquaintance k' t'nash-veh sa-fu, osu, " leralmin-tor wuh hinek sasu, svi' ish-veh chirping yut, du' au warmed ish-veh el'ru na' wuh yon, "na' ish-veh office, i gish?" i nodded. "hah! I ma heerd ik t'nash-veh sa-fu nam-tor wuh wonderful el'ru na' ish-veh business, osu?" i nodded lerash. "ha; ni au var-tor me. Ish-veh business nam-tor wuh tor-gav?" i nodded harder. "if tor ish-veh weht surprising svi' t'nash-veh sa-fu, " leralmin-tor wuh hinek sasu, "na' au vesh' ri katau abru tor wuh tor-gav, tonk'peh tor wuh wine-coopering." curious tor fai-tor uf wuh hinek gentleman lam-tor informed fundik wuh reputation t' mr. Jaggers, i roared ik ahm na' ish-veh. Au threw me vi' wuh greatest confusion k' laughing heartily heh replying svi' wuh maut sprightly manner, "rai, tor nam-tor sure; du're gas'rak." heh tor nash wadan i ma ri wuh faintest notion ra au tvai, il ra kha'wal au nahp i had tor. U' i kupi ri hayal-tor tra' nodding na' ish-veh perpetually, rik' tor ein vath attempt tor eku'ko ish-veh, i saul-tor na' inquiry whether ish-veh sha' calling svi' ha'kiv had vesh' "wuh wine-coopering." k' dint t' straining ik zhil s' myself several wak heh tapping wuh hinek gentleman fi' wuh tuf tor katravahsu ish-veh k' ish-veh, i na' kim-shah navau svi' tor t'nash-veh meaning ken-tor. "rai, " leralmin-tor wuh hinek gentleman; "wuh warehousing, wuh warehousing. Wuh'rak, abru' yonder; " au saudau tor tvai abru wuh vuzh-mev, tonk'peh i dva-tor au intended tor dzhinau me tor liverpool; "heh yi svi' wuh kahr t' london la'. However, having wuh infirmityfor i am lerash t' khaf-spol, osu" i sagluvau svi' pantomime wuh greatest astonishment. "ha, lerash t' khaf-spol; having ik infirmity coming fi-tor me, t'nash-veh sa-fu au went vi' wuh tor-gav, heh au nem-tor falun t' me, heh au k' pi' heh pi' tor si' nash sohkik heh vaksurik veltra. Tonk'peh returning tor ra du leralmin-tor, du fai-tor, " pursued wuh hinek sasu, va'ashiv laughing heartily, "ra i leralmin nam-tor, rai tor nam-tor sure; du're gas'rak." i vesh' modestly wondering whether t'nash-veh utmost ingenuity would ma enabled me tor leralmin sovek-vel ik would ma amused ish-veh ulef u' mau u' nash glenonik pleasantry, lu i vesh' startled k' wuh sudden click svi' wuh temok fi' veh vla t' wuh vuzh-mev, heh wuh ghostly tumbling tu'ash t' wuh pi' wooden pi'rala k' "john" fi-tor ish-veh. Wuh hinek sasu, zahalik t'nash-veh bezhun, maf-tor k' lo'uk triumph, "t'nash-veh sa-fu's sarlah ha-kel!" heh etek fi' went si' tor wuh drawbridge. Ish-veh vesh' don sovek donku tor gla-tor wemmick pral-tor wuh salute tor me s' wuh vath vla t' wuh moat, lu etek lau ma shaken el'ru mes' ish-veh k' wuh greatest ease. Wuh aged vesh' ni delighted tor ar'kadan wuh drawbridge, ik i tor rai nufai tor gol-tor ish-veh, tonk'peh lam-tor hizhuk abi' wemmick had sarlah mes', heh had presented me tor din-tor skiffins; wuh t'sai k' ik au vesh' accompanied. Din-tor skiffins vesh' t' wuh wooden appearance, heh vesh', spo' ish-veh escort, svi' wuh lehk-office khlup t' wuh dvin. She lau ma vesh' ein dahkuh il rehkuh tevun younger do wemmick, heh i judged ish-veh tor lamok ma t' leshanik veltra. Wuh tresahk t' ish-veh sai-vel s' wuh san abru'le, fi' fa' heh za', tor ish-veh khlop maut spo' wuh sa-kan's kite; heh i lau ma pronounced ish-veh gown wuh pi' nuh' decidedly zhar-kur, heh ish-veh gloves wuh pi' nuh' intensely yar-kur. Tonk'peh she seemed tor nam-tor wuh rom wihfelau t' katravahsu, heh gluvau wuh pid fudau na' wuh aged. I vesh' ri wu svi' discovering ik she vesh' wuh vakavik visitor na' wuh castle; na', fi' etwel going svi', heh t'nash-veh complimenting wemmick fi' ish-veh ingenious contrivance na' announcing himself tor wuh aged, au eit'jae me tor mazhiv-kur-tor t'nash-veh attention na' wuh moment tor wuh vath vla t' wuh vuzh-mev, heh sasaudau. Presently wuh'ashiv click sarlah, heh wuh'ashiv pi' svep tumbled tu'ash k' "din-tor skiffins" fi' ish-veh; yi din-tor skiffins ikap'uh t'du ru'lut heh john tumbled tu'ash; yi din-tor skiffins heh john fi' tumbled tu'ash teretuhr, heh t'forti ikap'uh t'du ru'lut teretuhr. Fi' wemmick's fun s' working aifa mechanical appliances, i sagluvau wuh lo'uk admiration k' if i fudau au, heh au leralmin-tor, "muhl, du fai-tor, au're fi' vaksurik heh useful tor wuh aged. Heh k' george, osu, ish-veh's wuh vel don mentioning, ik t' ek' wuh sutra vi sarlah tor nash temep, wuh tsat t' eifa seshau nam-tor goh fainu tor wuh aged, din-tor skiffins, heh me!" "heh mr. Wemmick tor au, " hau din-tor skiffins, "k' ish-veh sha' el'ru s' ish-veh sha' patam." du' din-tor skiffins vesh' taking ska' ish-veh bonnet (she retained ish-veh yar-kur gloves du' wuh khru u' wuh outward heh visible glat ik tra' vesh' apc'koik), wemmick invited me tor nem-tor wuh lates k' ish-veh pauk wuh veltra, heh gla-tor uf wuh vikuvtra glazhau svi' wintertime. Thinking ik au did nash tor mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh opportunity t' taking ish-veh walworth sentiments, i seized wuh opportunity u' ak u' etek vesh' s' wuh castle. Having nahp t' wuh tukh k' tun, i betau t'nash-veh subject u' kuv i had worla hinted na' ish-veh fa'. I informed wemmick ik i vesh' anxious svi' behalf t' herbert abru'lik, heh i var-tor ish-veh uf etek had wuh'rak ragel-tor, heh uf etek had fought. I glanced na' herbert's ha-kel, heh na' ish-veh character, heh na' ish-veh having rai tvai tonk'peh such u' au vesh' nerik fi' ish-veh sa-mekh na'; eifa, uncertain heh unpunctual. I alluded tor wuh advantages i had derived svi' t'nash-veh wuh'rak rawness heh ignorance s' ish-veh shila'es, heh i confessed ik i ptha i had tonk'peh has-bosh repaid au, heh ik au lau ma ovsoh weh-rom rik' me heh t'nash-veh gishat. Keeping din-tor havisham svi' wuh za-mesu na' wuh lo'uk ir, i fam dvun hinted na' wuh possibility t' t'nash-veh having kuhlau k' ish-veh svi' ish-veh prospects, heh na' wuh certainty t' ish-veh possessing wuh generous soul, heh hasu irak abru' sovek tvai distrusts, retaliations, il designs. Na' ek' aifa utvau (i var-tor wemmick), heh fai'ei au vesh' t'nash-veh nu'ri besu heh t'hy'la, heh i had wuh lo'uk affection na' ish-veh, i istau t'nash-veh sha' rom fortune tor haul-tor ein ha'zehl fi-tor ish-veh, heh therefore i sought na'shikh s' wemmick's veshtaya heh fai-tukh t' sasu heh tek'ik, uf i kupi buhfik ar'kadan k' t'nash-veh resources tor gol'nev herbert tor ein la' income, leralmin t' wuh hundred wuh tevun, tor potau ish-veh svi' rom rok heh khaf-spol, heh gradually tor mahr-tor ish-veh fi' tor ein pi' partnership. I eit'jae wemmick, svi' conclusion, tor ken-tor ik t'nash-veh gol'nev bolau kwon-hau-ov nam-tor rendered rik' herbert's fai-tukh il suspicion, heh ik tra' vesh' kling else svi' wuh panu k' ik i kupi na'shikhau. I skek abru k' laying t'nash-veh el'ru fi-tor ish-veh tipan, heh taran, "i mokuhlek't gol'nev confiding svi' du, hi i fai-tor ish-veh bolau nam-tor troublesome tor du; tonk'peh ik nam-tor ish-veh lafot, svi' having ek'wak katau me la'." wemmick vesh' ralash-fam na' wuh pi' du', heh yi leralmin-tor k' wuh ves t' palikaya, "muhl du fai-tor, mr. Pip, i bolau var-tor du veh vel. Nash nam-tor devilish rom t' du." "leralmin du'll gol'nev me tor nam-tor rom yi, " leralmin-tor i. "ecod, " kilko-tor wemmick, shaking ish-veh patam, "ik's ri t'nash-veh trade." "il nam-tor nash ish-veh trading-shi, " leralmin-tor i. "du nam-tor gas'rak, " au fun-tor. "du kwul wuh felu fi' wuh patam. Mr. Pip, i'll shitau fi' t'nash-veh panahik-taik, heh i nah-tor ek' du aitlun tor tor lau nam-tor ovsoh k' degrees. Skiffins (ik's ish-veh sa-kai) nam-tor wuh accountant heh agent. I'll glazhau ish-veh abru heh hal-tor tor ar'kadan na' du." "i nemaiyo lehkuh thousand wak." "fi' wuh contrary, " leralmin-tor au, "i nemaiyo, na' hi etek nam-tor strictly svi' etwel awek heh personal tsoh, fam dvun ish-veh lau nam-tor mentioned ik tra' nam-tor newgate cobwebs pa', heh ish-veh brushes au maf." po' wuh pi' further conversation tor wuh ka daya, etek fun-tor vi' wuh castle wilat etek afer-tor din-tor skiffins preparing theris-masu. Wuh responsible gu-vam t' tor wuh toast vesh' delegated tor wuh aged, heh ik marom hinek gentleman vesh' ni intent fi-tor ish-veh ik au seemed tor me svi' ein tehvar t' melting ish-veh bezhun. Ish-veh vesh' rai nominal yem ik etek vesh' going tor tor, tonk'peh wuh hakarik reality. Wuh aged dator such wuh hay-tuh t' buttered toast, ik i kupi scarcely gla-tor ish-veh abru' ish-veh u' ish-veh simmered fi' wuh shek-tukh lamok hooked fi' tor wuh fik-mofek; du' din-tor skiffins fas-tor such wuh jorum t' theris-masu, ik wuh pig svi' wuh pla' premises became strongly teporilau, heh repeatedly sagluvau ish-veh aitlun tor participate svi' wuh entertainment. Wuh haifan had vesh' kwul-tor, heh wuh pohshayek had vesh' pohshau, na' wuh gas'rak moment t' wak, heh i olau u' snugly tresahk ska' s' wuh shom t' walworth u' kuv wuh moat vesh' reh-leh ash'ya eik k' u' wehk glu. Nothing ertau wuh tranquillity t' wuh castle, tonk'peh wuh occasional tumbling tu'ash t' john heh din-tor skiffins: if pi' svep vesh' wuh shi-kar-tor tor ein spasmodic infirmity ik tor me sympathetically uncomfortable abi' i prah nam-tor-tor tor ish-veh. I inferred s' wuh methodical malat t' din-tor skiffins's arrangements ik she tor theris-masu tra' kanok gad mu-yor; heh i rather suspected ik wuh classic brooch she sai-vel-tor, representing wuh ek'zhai-tukh t' wuh undesirable kotik k' wuh maut zehik han heh wuh maut uzh aikum, vesh' wuh krus t' leshanik veltra ik had vesh' putan-tor ish-veh k' wemmick. Etek ate wuh bosh t' wuh toast, heh drank theris-masu svi' proportion, heh ish-veh vesh' delightful tor gla-tor uf lamekh heh greasy etek ek' prah po' ish-veh. Wuh aged wa', lau ma be' dvun-tor na' ein sok'i hinek chief t' wuh savage tribe, aishan oiled. Po' wuh pen svizh t' repose, din-tor skiffinsin wuh k'torr wuh pi' dvinsu vi, ish-veh seemed, retired tor wuh bosom t' ish-veh skan fi' gad afternoonswashed abru wuh theris-masu-vel, svi' wuh trifling t'sai-spo' amateur manner ik compromised rim t' etek. Yi, she shitau fi' ish-veh gloves va'ashiv, heh etek drew pauk wuh yon, heh wemmick leralmin-tor, "i', aged parent, um etek wuh dun." wemmick danau tor me du' wuh aged prah ish-veh spectacles si', ik nash vesh' fupa s' custom, heh ik ish-veh mazhiv-kur-tor wuh hinek gentleman vaik satisfaction tor telv-tor wuh ro'fori aloud. "i skil-tor't nufai wuh apology, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "na' au isn't capable t' wehk pleasuresare du, aged p?" "ek' gas'rak, john, ek' gas'rak, " fun-tor wuh hinek sasu, seeing himself spoken tor. "goh um ish-veh wuh nod kanok i' heh yi lu au glazhau ska' ish-veh dun, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "heh au'll nam-tor u' kunli u' wuh sa-te'kru. Etek nam-tor ek' attention, aged veh." "ek' gas'rak, john, ek' gas'rak!" fun-tor wuh cheerful hinek sasu, ni toranik heh ni sanoi, ik ish-veh really vesh' ved sem-rik-tor. Wuh aged's telvan reminded me t' wuh mohrn na' mr. Wopsle's lo'uk-ezyet's, k' wuh pleasanter peculiarity ik ish-veh seemed tor sarlah k'fai wuh keyhole. U' au aitlu wuh ha'fek beyik ish-veh, heh u' au vesh' kwon-hau-ov fi' wuh verge t' putting either ish-veh patam il wuh newspaper vi' au, au required u' mau watching u' wuh grazhiv-mill. Tonk'peh wemmick vesh' kaing untiring heh gentle svi' ish-veh vigilance, heh wuh aged telv-tor fi', ved unconscious t' ish-veh wehk rescues. Whenever au glazhau na' etek, etek ek' sagluvau wuh greatest eku'ko heh tauraya, heh nodded abi' au resumed va'ashiv. U' wemmick heh din-tor skiffins hayal-tor vla k' vla, heh u' i hayal-tor svi' wuh shadowy teruk, i glantau wuh vohris heh gradual wuvaya t' mr. Wemmick's ru'lut, powerfully suggestive t' ish-veh slowly heh gradually stealing ish-veh kar pauk din-tor skiffins's san. Svi' rivak t' wak vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh el'ru saudau fi' wuh vath vla t' din-tor skiffins; tonk'peh na' ik moment din-tor skiffins neatly pehkau ish-veh k' wuh yar-kur glove, unwound ish-veh kar va'ashiv u' kuv ish-veh vesh' wuh ua'mrki t' sai-vel, heh k' wuh greatest deliberation laid ish-veh fi' wuh pasu fa' ish-veh. Din-tor skiffins's composure du' she did nash vesh' veh t' wuh danik remarkable sights i ma ek'wak gla-tor, heh kuv i kupi ma nahp wuh bae'cok tsurkanik k' abstraction t' kashek, i dang ma deemed ik din-tor skiffins performed ish-veh mechanically. K' heh k', i pubeglanau wemmick's kar palikaya tor sasaudau va'ashiv, heh gradually fading s' zan-tor. Shortly afterwards, ish-veh ru'lut began tor widen va'ashiv. Po' wuh tvi-wak t' suspense fi' t'nash-veh krus ik vesh' ved enthralling heh siyah kusut-tor, vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh el'ru saudau fi' wuh vath vla t' din-tor skiffins. Instantly, din-tor skiffins pehkau ish-veh k' wuh neatness t' wuh placid boxer, nem-tor ska' ik girdle il cestus u' fa', heh laid ish-veh fi' wuh pasu. Taking wuh pasu tor represent wuh yut t' virtue, i am justified svi' fupa s' ik du' wuh bosh wak t' wuh aged's telvan, wemmick's kar vesh' fam-kelek-tor s' wuh yut t' virtue heh hasu recalled tor ish-veh k' din-tor skiffins. Na' kim-shah, wuh aged telv-tor himself vi' wuh ta'hal slumber. Nash vesh' wuh wak na' wemmick tor torvau wuh pi' kettle, wuh tray t' bezhun-zaneshu, heh wuh nesh-kur mashek k' wuh porcelain-topped kem, representing ein clerical dignitary t' wuh rubicund heh shilaik pulva. K' wuh mamuk t' aifa appliances etek ek' had vel lamekh tor mon, including wuh aged, vi vesh' ak kum'i va'ashiv. Din-tor skiffins rish-tor, heh i glantau ik she heh wemmick drank s' veh makh. Veling i fai-tor weh-rom do tor nufai tor gla-tor din-tor skiffins ha-kel, heh ne' wuh circumstances i nahp i had buhfik hal-tor wuh'rak; if i did, taking wuh cordial trasha t' wuh aged, heh having be' dvun-tor wuh vaksurik khru. Fa' wuh wehk gad vesh' si', i poprah wuh pitoh s' wemmick, dated walworth, fupa s' ik au rok-tor au had tor ein storilaya svi' ik tukh appertaining tor etwel awek heh personal tsoh, heh ik au would nam-tor glad kuv kupi-sarlah nash-veh heh gla-tor ish-veh va'ashiv fi-tor ish-veh. Ni, i went si' tor walworth va'ashiv, heh wi va'ashiv, heh wi va'ashiv, heh vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh k' latva svi' wuh kahr several wak, tonk'peh worla meskarau sovek sviribaya k' ish-veh fi' wuh subject svi' il be' pi' britain. Wuh upshot vesh', ik etek afer-tor wuh worthy nu'ri merchant il shipping-broker, ri wu afer-tor svi' business, vi aitlu kash-tok gol'nev, heh vi aitlu capital, heh vi svi' due rivak t' wak heh receipt would aitlun wuh tersu. Svi' ish-veh heh me, tsat ua'mrki vesh' signed t' if herbert vesh' wuh subject, heh i vlitau ish-veh ulef t' t'nash-veh kaukuh hundred plesh-tor ne', heh engaged na' sundry vath vlitaya: ein, tor tevan due na' ac'ruth kinuf s' t'nash-veh income: ein, contingent fi' t'nash-veh coming vi' t'nash-veh veltra. Din-tor skiffins's sa-kai conducted wuh negotiation. Wemmick pervaded ish-veh throughout, tonk'peh worla saudau svi' ish-veh. Wuh bosh business vesh' ni cleverly khartau, ik herbert had ri wuh least suspicion t' t'nash-veh el'ru hasu svi' ish-veh. I worla dungau yen-tor wuh radiant limuk k' if sarlah ish-veh ha-kel veh aru, heh var-tor me, u' wuh mighty krus t' ro'fori, t' ish-veh having tevan-tor svi' k' veh clarriker (wuh nu'ri merchant's ahm), heh t' clarriker's having shown wuh wehtsuri inclination na' ish-veh, heh t' ish-veh dva ik wuh sharu had sarlah na' kim-shah. Gad k' gad u' ish-veh rok-tor grew stronger heh ish-veh limuk brighter, au bolau ma nahp me wuh weht heh weht affectionate t'hy'la, na' i had wuh greatest rihag'es svi' restraining t'nash-veh bezhun-masu t' triumph lu vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh ni kunli. Na' wu-vath, wuh vel hasu ovsoh, heh au having ik gad svi-tor clarriker's kelek, heh au having variben tor me na' wuh bosh khru svi' wuh kluhvau t' sanosh heh navun, i did really maf svi' rom earnest lu i went tor sar-tak, tor nah-tor ik t'nash-veh gishat had ovsoh ein rom tor somebody. Wuh lo'uk pavek svi' t'nash-veh ha'kiv, wuh turning sfek t' t'nash-veh ha'kiv, i' tu'ash fi' t'nash-veh zan-tor. Tonk'peh, fa' i proceed tor narrate ish-veh, heh fa' i be' dvun fi' tor ek' wuh rubai ish-veh involved, i bolau mazhiv-kur-tor veh chapter tor estella. Ish-veh nam-tor ri mau tor mazhiv-kur-tor tor wuh theme ik ni wu boshau t'nash-veh khaf-spol. Chapter xxxviii. Kuv ik staid hinek kelek be' wuh yar-kur na' richmond dang ek'wak sarlah tor nam-tor haunted lu i am tevik, ish-veh dungi nam-tor haunted, surely, k' t'nash-veh tam'a. O wuh wehk, wehk mu-yor heh gad k'fai'ei wuh unquiet tam'a k'svi me haunted ik kelek lu estella ha-tor tra'! Kal-tor t'nash-veh ak'shem nam-tor wilat ish-veh would, t'nash-veh tam'a vesh' kwon-hau-ov wandering, wandering, wandering, pa' ik kelek. Wuh t'sai k' ik estella vesh' shitau, mrs. Brandley k' ahm, vesh' wuh kir'an, k' veh ko-fu several tevun older do estella. Wuh ko-mekh glazhau nu'ri, heh wuh ko-fu glazhau hinek; wuh ko-mekh's complexion vesh' faf-kur, heh wuh ko-fu's vesh' kin-kur; wuh ko-mekh eku abru na' frivolity, heh wuh ko-fu na' theology. Au vesh' svi' ra nam-tor puvutau wuh rom shul, heh yaretau, heh vesh' yaretau k', su'etek t' sutra. Pi', kuv sovek, shila t' olaya subsisted svi' au heh estella, tonk'peh wuh understanding vesh' afer-tor ik au vesh' bolayatik tor ish-veh, heh ik she vesh' bolayatik tor au. Mrs. Brandley had vesh' wuh t'hy'la t' din-tor havisham's fa' wuh wak t' ish-veh seclusion. Svi' mrs. Brandley's kelek heh s' mrs. Brandley's kelek, i dashau kanok ves heh degree t' torture ik estella kupi aishan me. Wuh malat t' t'nash-veh relations k' ish-veh, if shitau me fi' zhil t' familiarity rik' placing me fi' zhil t' favour, conduced tor t'nash-veh saglakolaya. She tor nam-tor-tor t' me tor tease vath admirers, heh she da-tor wuh maut familiarity svi' herself heh me tor wuh khrosahp t' putting wuh ek'kayik slight fi' t'nash-veh vaikaya tor ish-veh. Kuv i had vesh' ish-veh secretary, steward, ulef-sa-kai, ri donku-tor relation, kuv i had vesh' wuh younger sa-kai t' ish-veh kru'minaakh sa-telsu, i kupi ri ma seemed tor myself further s' t'nash-veh rok-tor lu i vesh' nearest tor ish-veh. Wuh privilege t' calling ish-veh k' ish-veh ahm heh khaf-spol ish-veh vutau me k' t'nash-veh became, ne' wuh circumstances wuh aggravation t' t'nash-veh trials; heh du' i nah-tor ish-veh kesik ik ish-veh siyah maddened ish-veh vath lovers, i fai-tor nuh' certainly ik ish-veh siyah maddened me. She had admirers rik' shaht. Rai vet t'nash-veh jealousy tor wuh admirer t' kanok veh vi went be' ish-veh; tonk'peh tra' vesh' weht do hiyet t' au rik' ik. Vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh k'ashiv na' richmond, i puzhu-tor t' ish-veh k'ashiv svi' kahr, heh i nam-tor-tor k'ashiv tor nem-tor ish-veh heh wuh brandleys fi' wuh masu; tra' vesh' picnics, fte gad, mavau, operas, concerts, parties, ek' wihfelau t' pleasures, k'fai'ei i pursued ish-veh, heh au vesh' ek' miseries tor me. I worla had veh wadan's happiness svi' ish-veh shila'es, heh wi t'nash-veh kashek ek' pauk wuh kehkuh-heh-dah-leh wadan vesh' harping fi' wuh happiness t' having ish-veh k' me unto tevakh. Throughout nash krus t' etwel intercourse, heh ish-veh palesh-tor, u' dungi presently nam-tor gla-tor, na' ra i yi nahp wuh akarshif, she habitually reverted tor ik molu if sagluvau ik etwel katravek vesh' punekwitau fi-tor etek. Tra' vesh' vath wak lu she would sarlah tor wuh sudden rihamau svi' nash molu heh svi' ek' ish-veh wehk molu, heh would seem tor pity me. "pip, pip, " she leralmin-tor veh khru, coming tor such wuh rihamau, lu etek hayal-tor k'wuhli na' wuh darkening krani t' wuh kelek svi' richmond; "dungi du worla nem-tor warning?" "t' ra?" "t' me." "warning ri tor nam-tor skamau k' du, tor du tvai, estella?" "tor i tvai! Kuv du ri tor fai-tor ra i tvai, du nam-tor glan-fam." i dang ma kilko-tor ik ashaya vesh' commonly reputed glan-fam, tonk'peh na' wuh utvau ik i kwon-hau-ov vesh' restrainedand nash vesh' ri wuh least t' t'nash-veh miseriesby wuh olaya ik ish-veh vesh' ungenerous tor hish-tor myself fi-tor ish-veh, lu she fai-tor ik she kupi ri dvel-tor tonk'peh obey din-tor havisham. T'nash-veh dread kwon-hau-ov vesh', ik nash fai-tukh fi' ish-veh krus laid me ne' wuh ras disadvantage k' ish-veh pride, heh tor me wuh subject t' wuh rebellious struggle svi' ish-veh bosom. "na' sovek tav, " leralmin-tor i, "i ma rai warning putan-tor me aishan i', na' du kitau tor me tor sarlah tor du, nash wak." "ik's yeht, " leralmin-tor estella, k' wuh samu careless abru'teruklar-ru'lut ik kwon-hau-ov chilled me. Po' looking na' wuh twilight rik', na' wuh pi' du', she went fi' tor leralmin: "wuh wak has sarlah pauk lu din-tor havisham istau ki' me na' wuh gad na' satis. Du nam-tor tor nem-tor me tra', heh katau me pla', kuv du dungi. She would rather i did ri haolvaya sa'awek, heh vel tor receiving t'nash-veh maid, na' she has wuh kash-zakar horror t' hasu variben t' k' such sutra. Mokuhlek du nem-tor me?" "mokuhlek i nem-tor du, estella!" "du mokuhlek yi? Wuh gad po' tor-morrow, kuv du sanoi. Du nam-tor tor vlitau ek' falun s' t'nash-veh sa'haf. Du zhu-tor wuh nosh t' ish-veh going?" "heh bolau obey, " leralmin-tor i. Nash vesh' ek' wuh preparation i poprah na' ik yaret, il na' vath spo' ish-veh; din-tor havisham worla kitau tor me, il had i ek'wak ni mau u' gla-tor ish-veh handwriting. Etek went ne' fi' wuh thurai gad tonk'peh veh, heh etek afer-tor ish-veh svi' wuh tvi-shal wilat i had wuh'rak beheld ish-veh, heh ish-veh nam-tor needless tor hau ik tra' vesh' rai rubah svi' satis kelek. She vesh' kauk weht dreadfully tishau t' estella do she had vesh' lu i kim-shah gla-tor au teretuhr; i ashiv-tor wuh zhit advisedly, na' tra' vesh' vel positively dreadful svi' wuh tepul t' ish-veh glazhau heh nartau. She geldau fi-tor estella's vaksur, geldau fi-tor ish-veh zhit, geldau fi-tor ish-veh gestures, heh hayal-tor mumbling ish-veh sha' trembling ozh du' she glazhau na' ish-veh, u' hi she vesh' devouring wuh vaksurik creature she had reared. S' estella she glazhau na' me, k' wuh searching glance ik seemed tor ihv-tor vi' t'nash-veh khaf-spol heh nisaya its skek. "uf tor she nam-tor-tor du, pip; uf tor she nam-tor-tor du?" she ya'akash me va'ashiv, k' ish-veh witch-spo' eagerness, kauk svi' estella's khaf-spol. Tonk'peh, lu etek hayal-tor k' ish-veh flickering yon na' mu-yor, she vesh' danik flekh; na' yi, keeping estella's el'ru drawn k'fai ish-veh kar heh clutched svi' ish-veh sha' el'ru, she extorted s' ish-veh, k' dint t' referring pla' tor ra estella had var-tor ish-veh svi' ish-veh regular nuhm, wuh ahm heh nosh t' wuh sasu ik she had sem-tor; heh u' din-tor havisham dwelt fi-tor nash padukau, k' wuh flan'es t' wuh kashek mortally dash-tor heh diseased, she hayal-tor k' ish-veh vath el'ru fi' ish-veh crutch terpau, heh ish-veh chin fi' ik, heh ish-veh wan ugelik bezhun glaring na' me, wuh maut spectre. Vesht gla-tor nash-veh svi' nash, wretched hi ish-veh tor me, heh sfith(-) wuh kash-ral t' dependence heh kauk t' degradation ik ish-veh awakened, vesht gla-tor nash-veh svi' nash ik estella vesh' eku tor wreak din-tor havisham's revenge fi' sasu, heh ik she vesh' ri tor nam-tor putan-tor tor me abi' she had gratified ish-veh na' wuh zhil. Vesht gla-tor nash-veh svi' nash, wuh utvau na' ish-veh hasu beforehand assigned tor me. Sending ish-veh si' tor skamau heh torment heh tor mischief, din-tor havisham satau ish-veh k' wuh malicious assurance ik she vesh' mesakh wuh pulau t' ek' admirers, heh ik ek' vi staked fi-tor ik vishizhau vesh' shar-tor tor pak-tor. Vesht gla-tor nash-veh svi' nash ik i, nuh', vesh' tormented k' wuh perversion t' ingenuity, kauk du' wuh prize vesh' reserved na' me. Vesht gla-tor nash-veh svi' nash wuh utvau na' t'nash-veh hasu staved ska' ni wu heh wuh utvau na' t'nash-veh tab-ma guardian's declining tor kugau himself tor wuh hotorik fai-tukh t' such wuh scheme. Svi' wuh zhit, vesht gla-tor nash-veh svi' nash din-tor havisham u' i had ish-veh yi heh tra' fa' t'nash-veh bezhun, heh kwon-hau-ov had had ish-veh fa' t'nash-veh bezhun; heh vesht gla-tor nash-veh svi' nash, wuh natya duv t' wuh mu'glau heh unhealthy kelek svi' if ish-veh ha'kiv vesh' ipik s' wuh yel. Wuh ha'fek ik lighted ik tvi-shal t' ish-veh vesh' shitau svi' sconces fi' wuh temok. Au vesh' pid s' wuh solektra, heh au yontau k' wuh br'xan dulness t' sutorik ta'hal svi' sov ik nam-tor seldom uzhau. U' i glazhau pauk na' au, heh na' wuh spoh gloom au tor, heh na' wuh pehkau wak-vel, heh na' wuh withered ua'mrki t' bridal sai-vel fi-tor wuh pasu heh wuh solektra, heh na' ish-veh sha' awful khlop k' its ghostly haulan lehm-tor suk k' wuh yon fi-tor wuh abru-tol heh wuh temok, i gla-tor svi' kanok-vei wuh torvaya ik t'nash-veh kashek had sarlah tor, ashiv-tor heh lehm-tor pla' tor me. T'nash-veh nahp be' dvun-tor vi' wuh lo'uk tvi-shal mes' wuh landing wilat wuh pasu vesh' sak-tor, heh vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh written, u' ish-veh vesh', svi' wuh tevan-tor t' wuh cobwebs s' wuh centre-krus, svi' wuh crawlings t' wuh a'lazb fi' wuh sai, svi' wuh ash'yaidar t' wuh aushfa u' au betook ish-veh pi' quickened khaf-spol za' wuh gluvau-math, heh svi' wuh gropings heh pausings t' wuh sark fi' wuh lan-tol. Ish-veh pavesh-tor fi' wuh occasion t' nash yaret ik ein nasik zhit arose svi' estella heh din-tor havisham. Ish-veh vesh' wuh wuh'rak wak i had ek'wak gla-tor au opposed. Etek vesh' hayal-tor k' wuh yon, u' aishan i' kethelvau, heh din-tor havisham fam dvun had estella's kar drawn k'fai ish-veh sha', heh fam dvun clutched estella's el'ru svi' ish-veh, lu estella gradually began tor dahl-tor herself. She had shown wuh yaut impatience weht do wuh'wak fa', heh had rather palesh-tor ik kei affection do nar-tor il fun-tor ish-veh. "ra!" leralmin-tor din-tor havisham, flashing ish-veh bezhun fi-tor ish-veh, "nam-tor du zungor t' me?" "goh wuh pi' zungor t' myself, " kilko-tor estella, disengaging ish-veh kar, heh dvun-tor tor wuh lo'uk vuzh-mev-krus, wilat she lam-tor looking ne' na' wuh yon. "stariben wuh yeht'es, du ingrate!" maf-tor din-tor havisham, passionately striking ish-veh terpau fi-tor wuh lan-tol; "du nam-tor zungor t' me." estella glazhau na' ish-veh k' buhfik composure, heh va'ashiv glazhau ne' na' wuh yon. Ish-veh graceful khlop heh ish-veh vaksurik limuk sagluvau wuh shal-ma indifference tor wuh kwai falek t' wuh vath, ik vesh' siyah pi-maat'rer. "du fek heh kov!" sporiben din-tor havisham. "du samu, samu khaf-spol!" "ra?" leralmin-tor estella, preserving ish-veh attitude t' indifference u' she gal-tor tehnat wuh lo'uk vuzh-mev-krus heh goh dvun-tor ish-veh bezhun; "tor du reproach me na' hasu samu? Du?" "nam-tor du ri?" vesh' wuh kei retort. "du dang fai-tor, " leralmin-tor estella. "i am ra du ma tor me. Nem-tor ek' wuh krol, nem-tor ek' wuh tenai; nem-tor ek' wuh navun, nem-tor ek' wuh vravshaya; svi' pen, nem-tor me." "o, glazhau na' ish-veh, glazhau na' ish-veh!" maf-tor din-tor havisham, bitterly; "glazhau na' ish-veh ni lerash heh thankless, fi' wuh hearth wilat she vesh' reared! Wilat i nem-tor ish-veh vi' nash wretched thasek lu ish-veh vesh' wuh'rak khafaya s' its stabs, heh wilat i ma lavished tevun t' tenderness fi-tor ish-veh!" [illustration] "k'puu i vesh' rai party tor wuh lerakhovau, " leralmin-tor estella, "na' kuv i kupi lates heh stariben, lu ish-veh vesh' tor, ish-veh vesh' u' mau u' i kupi tor. Tonk'peh ra would du ma? Du ma vesh' maut rom tor me, heh i owe kanok-vei tor du. Ra would du ma?" "ashaya, " kilko-tor wuh vath. "du ma ish-veh." "i ma ri, " leralmin-tor din-tor havisham. "ko-mekh k' thanah, " retorted estella, worla departing s' wuh hagik takov t' ish-veh attitude, worla raising ish-veh spes u' wuh vath did, worla yielding either tor reshan il tenderness, "ko-mekh k' thanah, i ma leralmin-tor ik i owe kanok-vei tor du. Ek' i ma nam-tor freely ish-veh. Ek' ik du ma putan-tor me, nam-tor na' ish-veh a'fic ki' va'ashiv. Mesakh ik, i ma nothing. Heh kuv du ya'akash me tor mazhiv-kur-tor du, ra du worla mazhiv-kur-tor me, t'nash-veh gratitude heh gu-vam fam yehat tor impossibilities." "did i worla mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh ashaya!" maf-tor din-tor havisham, turning wildly tor me. "did i worla mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh wuh yontau ashaya, inseparable s' jealousy na' ek' wak, heh s' nasik kusut, du' she stariben thus tor me! Kal-tor ish-veh vutau me mad, kal-tor ish-veh vutau me mad!" "po dang i vutau du mad, " fun-tor estella, "i, t' ek' sutra? Tor sovek veh ha-tor, vi fai-tor ra eku lof du ma, ulef u' muhl u' i tor? Tor sovek veh ha-tor, vi fai-tor ra wuh br'xan vokaya du ma, ulef u' muhl u' i tor? I vi ma hayal-tor fi' nash ka hearth fi' wuh pi' stool ik nam-tor kauk i' be' du tra', learning ish-veh tupa heh looking abru vi' ish-veh limuk, lu ish-veh limuk vesh' flekh heh koltha me!" "ak yen-tor!" nau din-tor havisham. "wak ak yen-tor!" "rai, ri yen-tor, " retorted estella, "ri yen-tor, tonk'peh treasured abru svi' t'nash-veh vokaya. Lu ma du afer-tor me riyeht tor ish-veh teaching? Lu ma du afer-tor me unmindful t' ish-veh tupa? Lu ma du afer-tor me giving admission la', " she estuhl ish-veh bosom k' ish-veh el'ru, "tor sovek-vel ik du sanan-tor? Nam-tor aishan tor me." "ni yaut, ni yaut!" nau din-tor havisham, pushing maf ish-veh zhai-kur isachya k' fi' ish-veh el'ru. "vi saven-tor me tor nam-tor yaut?" fun-tor estella. "vi krol-tor me lu i oren-tor t'nash-veh tupa?" "ni lerash, ni lerash!" nau din-tor havisham, k' ish-veh former torai. "vi saven-tor me tor nam-tor lerash?" fun-tor estella. "vi krol-tor me lu i oren-tor t'nash-veh tupa?" "tonk'peh tor nam-tor yaut heh lerash tor me!" din-tor havisham ved shrieked, u' she sakadau si' ish-veh kar. "estella, estella, estella, tor nam-tor yaut heh lerash tor me!" estella glazhau na' ish-veh na' wuh moment k' wuh ves t' hayal wonder, tonk'peh vesh' ri vathru ertau; lu wuh moment vesh' vesht, she glazhau ne' na' wuh yon va'ashiv. "i fam yehat nah-tor, " leralmin-tor estella, raising ish-veh bezhun po' wuh silence "po du dang nam-tor ni unreasonable lu sarlah nash-veh tor gla-tor du po' wuh dahshaya. I ma worla yen-tor ish-veh wrongs heh ish-veh aisha. I ma worla vesh' unfaithful tor du il ish-veh schooling. I ma worla shown sovek kobat'es ik i mokuhlek falun myself k'." "would ish-veh nam-tor kobat'es tor fun t'nash-veh ashaya?" sporiben din-tor havisham. "tonk'peh ha, ha, she would vutau ish-veh ni!" "i palikau tor nah-tor, " leralmin-tor estella, svi' wuh musing yut, po' wuh'ashiv moment t' hayal wonder, "ik i siyah ken-tor uf nash sarlah pa'. Kuv du had katau abru ish-veh thanai ko-fu wholly svi' wuh gu'gelik confinement t' aifa tvi-shal, heh had worla kal-tor ish-veh fai-tor ik tra' vesh' such wuh vel u' wuh gad-ha'khlup k' if she had worla wuh'wak gla-tor ish-veh limuk, kuv du had ovsoh ik, heh yi, na' wuh lof had aitlu ish-veh tor ken-tor wuh gad-ha'khlup heh fai-tor ek' pa' ish-veh, du would ma vesh' disappointed heh reshnek?" din-tor havisham, k' ish-veh patam svi' ish-veh el'ru, hayal-tor tor wuh neik moaning, heh swaying herself fi' ish-veh ku-san, tonk'peh mazhiv-kur-tor rai kilko-srashiv. "il, " leralmin-tor estella, "if nam-tor wuh nearer nuf, kuv du had saven-tor ish-veh, s' wuh gad-keshtan t' ish-veh kash-tor'es, k' ish-veh utmost tepul heh lau, ik tra' vesh' such wuh vel u' gad-ha'khlup, tonk'peh ik ish-veh vesh' tor tor nam-tor ish-veh nemut heh destroyer, heh she bolau kwon-hau-ov da-tor tehnat ish-veh, na' ish-veh had blighted du heh would else luk-has ish-veh; kuv du had ovsoh nash, heh yi, na' wuh lof, had aitlu ish-veh tor nem-tor naturally tor wuh gad-ha'khlup heh she kupi ri tor ish-veh, du would ma vesh' disappointed heh reshnek?" din-tor havisham hayal-tor listening (il ish-veh seemed ni, na' i kupi ri gla-tor ish-veh limuk), tonk'peh fam dvun tor rai kilko-srashiv. "ni, " leralmin-tor estella, "i bolau nam-tor taken u' i ma vesh' tor. Wuh navun nam-tor ri t'nash-veh, wuh vravshaya nam-tor ri t'nash-veh, tonk'peh wuh dahkuh teretuhr tor me." din-tor havisham had settled ne', i hardly fai-tor uf, fi-tor wuh lan-tol, among wuh spoh-tor bridal za-vel k' if ish-veh vesh' strewn. I nem-tor advantage t' wuh momenti had sought veh s' wuh firstto trasha wuh tvi-shal, po' beseeching estella's attention tor ish-veh, k' wuh dvun t' t'nash-veh el'ru. Lu i losrak, estella vesh' wi standing k' wuh lo'uk vuzh-mev-krus, aishan u' she had lam-tor throughout. Din-tor havisham's zhai-kur isachya vesh' ek' adrift fi-tor wuh solektra, among wuh vath bridal vashau, heh vesh' wuh miserable glan tor gla-tor. Ish-veh vesh' k' wuh depressed khaf-spol ik i lates-tor svi' wuh starlight na' wuh wadan heh weht, pa' wuh courtyard, heh pa' wuh brewery, heh pa' wuh ruined bah-ker. Lu i na' kim-shah nem-tor courage tor fun tor wuh tvi-shal, i afer-tor estella sitting na' din-tor havisham's mal-nef, taking abru ein og svi' veh t' eifa hinek ua'mrki t' sai-vel ik vesh' dropping tor krus, heh t' if i ma k'ashiv vesh' reminded opi' k' wuh spoh-tor tatters t' hinek hai-sovek ik ki'gla-tor nash-veh hanging abru svi' cathedrals. Afterwards, estella heh i mavau na' nop, u' t' yore, goh etek vesh' skilful i', heh mavau french zhagra, heh ni wuh khru sai-vel-tor maf, heh i went tor sar-tak. I ti svi' ik dahshauk kelek mes' wuh courtyard. Ish-veh vesh' wuh wuh'rak wak i had ek'wak lain ne' tor shom svi' satis kelek, heh yuk klee'fah tor sarlah be' me. Wuh thousand din-tor havishams haunted me. She vesh' fi' nash vla t' t'nash-veh trak, fi' ik, na' wuh patam t' wuh sar-tak, na' wuh ash'ya, za' wuh ulef-tu'ash svep t' wuh sai-vel-tor-tvi-shal, svi' wuh sai-vel-tor-tvi-shal, svi' wuh tvi-shal overhead, svi' wuh tvi-shal ne'rak, kanok-wilat. Na' kim-shah, lu wuh mu-yor vesh' vohris tor creep fi' na' dahkuh o'wak-vel, i olau ik i absolutely kupi rai longer lesh wuh shi u' wuh shi tor ti ne' svi', heh ik i bolau prah abru. I therefore prah abru heh shitau fi' t'nash-veh sai-vel, heh went si' mes' wuh ker vi' wuh wu kov tvur, designing tor nazh-kap wuh sik courtyard heh lates tra' na' wuh vas t' t'nash-veh kashek. Tonk'peh i vesh' rai sooner svi' wuh tvur do i sayonotau t'nash-veh ha'fek; na' vesht gla-tor nash-veh din-tor havisham going bi' ish-veh svi' wuh ghostly manner, tor wuh neik maf. I zahal-tor ish-veh na' wuh ir, heh gla-tor ish-veh hal-tor abru wuh staircase. She lesh wuh sai-famik ha'fek svi' ish-veh el'ru, if she had probably taken s' veh t' wuh sconces svi' ish-veh sha' tvi-shal, heh vesh' wuh danik unearthly vel k' its ta'hal. Standing na' wuh lanet t' wuh staircase, i olau wuh mildewed sov t' wuh gadzhak-tvi-shal, rik' seeing ish-veh tu'ash wuh svep, heh i puzhu-tor ish-veh walking tra', heh ni mes' vi' ish-veh sha' tvi-shal, heh ni mes' va'ashiv vi' ik, worla ceasing wuh neik maf. Po' wuh wak, i ar'kada svi' wuh gu'gelik fi' tor prah si', heh tor hal-tor pla', tonk'peh i kupi tor neither abi' ein wesh-tor t' gad fam-kelek-tor svi' heh gluvau me wilat tor ti t'nash-veh el'ru. Du' wuh bosh tvi-wak, whenever i went tor wuh lanet t' wuh staircase, i puzhu-tor ish-veh footstep, gla-tor ish-veh ta'hal be' dvun abru', heh puzhu-tor ish-veh ceaseless neik maf. Fa' etek losrak thurai gad, tra' vesh' rai revival t' wuh natyan svi' ish-veh heh estella, il vesh' ish-veh ek'wak zaprah-tor fi' sovek kahwa occasion; heh tra' vesh' kehkuh kahwa occasions, tor wuh buhfik t' t'nash-veh remembrance. Il, did din-tor havisham's manner na' estella svi' anywise rubah, kaula ik i pudva-tor ish-veh ki' vel spo' pthak infused among its former noshtra. Ish-veh nam-tor impossible tor da-tor nash mor t' t'nash-veh ha'kiv, rik' putting bentley drummle's ahm fi-tor ish-veh; il i would, maut gladly. Fi' wuh ac'ruth occasion lu wuh kushel vesh' assembled svi' nekwitaya, heh lu rom olaya vesh' hasu promoted svi' wuh tsuri manner k' kling's agreeing k' anybody else, wuh presiding finch puvutau wuh pi'laptra tor zek, forasmuch u' mr. Drummle had ri wi toasted wuh t'sai; if, fupa s' wuh solemn constitution t' wuh shila'es, ish-veh vesh' wuh brute's da-tor tor tor ik gad. I nahp vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh leer svi' wuh watosh yut na' me du' wuh decanters vesh' going pauk, tonk'peh u' tra' vesh' rai ashaya pakik svi' etek, ik lau easily nam-tor. Ra vesh' t'nash-veh indignant ak'wikmun lu au puvutau fi-tor wuh apc'koik tor pledge ish-veh tor "estella!" "estella vi?" leralmin-tor i. "worla du kashek, " retorted drummle. "estella t' wilat?" leralmin-tor i. "du nam-tor bound tor leralmin t' wilat." if au vesh', u' wuh finch. "t' richmond, gentlemen, " leralmin-tor drummle, putting me s' wuh deshker, "heh wuh peerless vaksur." mau au fai-tor pa' peerless beauties, wuh tvai, miserable idiot! I zhal-tor herbert. "i fai-tor ik t'sai, " leralmin-tor herbert, mes' wuh pasu, lu wuh toast had vesh' pudor-tor. "tor du?" leralmin-tor drummle. "heh ni tor i, " i hau, k' wuh ug'yon-kur limuk. "tor du?" leralmin-tor drummle. "o, s'haile!" nash vesh' wuh goh retortexcept makh il crockerythat wuh ras creature vesh' capable t' tor; tonk'peh, i became u' highly incensed k' ish-veh u' kuv ish-veh had vesh' barbed k' wit, heh i iyi she-tor svi' t'nash-veh shi heh leralmin-tor ik i kupi ri tonk'peh fudau ish-veh u' hasu spo' wuh dorli finch's impudence tor sarlah ne' tor ik pi'laptra, etek kwon-hau-ov variben pa' coming ne' tor ik pi'laptra, u' wuh pu parliamentary da-tor t' sagluvaya, ne' tor ik pi'laptra, proposing wuh t'sai t' ik au fai-tor nothing. Mr. Drummle, fi-tor nash, starting abru, halishau ra i tvai k' ik? Whereupon i tor ish-veh wuh mairik kilko ik i pudva-tor au fai-tor wilat i vesh' tor nam-tor afer-tor. Whether ish-veh vesh' tor-yehat svi' wuh christian shasol tor prah fi' rik' khaf, po' nash, vesh' wuh deshker fi' if wuh kushel vesh' dahsau. Wuh debate fi-tor ish-veh grew ni lively, indeed, ik k'puu shehkuh weht dorli kisau var-tor shehkuh weht, du' wuh discussion, ik au pudva-tor au fai-tor wilat au vesh' tor nam-tor afer-tor. However, ish-veh vesh' klopau na' kim-shah (wuh pi'laptra hasu wuh kelek t' dor) ik kuv mr. Drummle would katau worla ni slight wuh tor-kisev s' wuh t'sai, importing ik au had wuh dor t' ish-veh acquaintance, mr. Pip bolau sagluvau ish-veh regret, u' wuh gentleman heh wuh finch, na' "having vesh' pusvik-tor vi' wuh warmth if." thurai gad vesh' kru'minaakh na' wuh torvaya (lest etwel dor dang nem-tor samu s' vohtaya), heh thurai gad drummle saudau k' wuh polite pi' avowal svi' estella's el'ru, ik she had had wuh dor t' taman k' ish-veh several wak. Nash losrak me rai rivak tonk'peh tor regret ik i had vesh' "pusvik-tor vi' wuh warmth if, " heh fi' wuh bosh tor repudiate, u' untenable, wuh idea ik i vesh' tor nam-tor afer-tor sovek-wilat. Drummle heh i yi hayal-tor snorting na' veh wuh'ashiv na' wuh wadan, du' wuh pi'laptra engaged svi' indiscriminate contradiction, heh t'forti wuh promotion t' rom olaya vesh' afsakau ki' hal-tor ahead na' wuh taurauk tav. I var-tor nash lightly, tonk'peh ish-veh vesh' rai ta'hal vel tor me. Na', i fam yehat adequately sagluvau ra kusut ish-veh mazhiv-kur-tor me tor nah-tor ik estella dang gluvaya sovek favour tor wuh contemptible, om'toi, sulky booby, ni maut irak ne' wuh bov. Tor wuh la' moment, i dva-tor ish-veh ki' vesh' referable tor ein pure yon t' generosity heh disinterestedness svi' t'nash-veh ashaya na' ish-veh, ik i kupi ri palesh-tor wuh nahp t' ish-veh stooping tor ik hound. Rai vet i dang ma vesh' miserable whomsoever she had favoured; tonk'peh wuh worthier vel would ma aisha me wuh natya ves heh degree t' flakosh. Ish-veh vesh' hagik na' me tor talal si', heh i did ak talal si', ik drummle had palikau tor zahal-tor ish-veh closely, heh ik she kal-tor ish-veh tor tor ish-veh. Wuh pi' du', heh au vesh' kwon-hau-ov svi' pursuit t' ish-veh, heh au heh i tuhsau veh wuh'ashiv kanok gad. Au meskarau fi', svi' wuh pasik persistent yut, heh estella meskarau ish-veh fi'; i' k' kastoraya, i' k' discouragement, i' siyah flattering ish-veh, i' openly despising ish-veh, i' fai-tor ish-veh maut muhl, i' scarcely remembering vi au vesh'. Wuh a'lazb, u' mr. Jaggers had puvutau ish-veh, vesh' nam-tor-tor tor lying svi' bek-tor, however, heh had wuh tranush t' ish-veh tribe. Hau tor ik, au had wuh blockhead guhl'es svi' ish-veh donku heh svi' ish-veh skan greatness, if sometimes did ish-veh rom dvin, siyah taking wuh shi' concentration heh satalau lof. Ni, wuh a'lazb, doggedly watching estella, outwatched wehk brighter ravot, heh would k'ashiv uncoil himself heh eku na' wuh gas'rak nick t' wak. Na' wuh ac'ruth feretai rin'k'n na' richmond (tra' nam-tor-tor tor nam-tor feretai rin'k'n na' danik shitau yi), wilat estella had outshone ek' vath beauties, nash blundering drummle ni geldau pa' ish-veh, heh k' ni mau toleration fi' ish-veh krus, ik i resolved tor stariben tor ish-veh fundik ish-veh. I nem-tor wuh thurai opportunity; if vesh' lu she vesh' waiting na' mrs. Blandley tor nem-tor ish-veh ha-kel, heh vesh' sitting k'wuhli among ein svai, pok tor hal-tor. I vesh' k' ish-veh, na' i siyah kwon-hau-ov accompanied au tor heh s' such shitau. "nam-tor du zungor, estella?" "rather, pip." "du dang nam-tor." "leralmin rather, i dang ri nam-tor; na' i ma t'nash-veh nuhm tor satis kelek tor kitau, fa' i hal-tor tor yuk." "recounting tor-mu-yor's triumph?" leralmin-tor i. "surely wuh maut ri donku-tor veh, estella." "ra tor du tvai? I didn't fai-tor tra' had vesh' sovek." "estella, " leralmin-tor i, "tor glazhau na' ik katravahsu svi' wuh teruk yonder, vi nam-tor looking abru' la' na' etek." "po dang i glazhau na' ish-veh?" fun-tor estella, k' ish-veh bezhun fi' me instead. "ra nam-tor tra' svi' ik katravahsu svi' wuh teruk yonder, tor nam-tor-tor ish-veh zhit, ik i bolaya glazhau na'?" "indeed, ik nam-tor wuh maut deshker i aitlun tor ya'akash du, " leralmin-tor i. "na' au has vesh' hovering pa' du ek' mu-yor." "moths, heh ek' wihfelau t' watosh creatures, " kilko-tor estella, k' wuh glance na' ish-veh, "hover pa' wuh lighted ha'fek. Mokuhlek wuh ha'fek gol'nev ish-veh?" "rai, " i fun-tor; "tonk'peh fam yehat wuh estella gol'nev ish-veh?" "muhl!" leralmin-tor she, laughing, po' wuh moment, "sos'eh. Ha. Sovek-vel du spo'." "tonk'peh, estella, tor zhu-tor me stariben. Ish-veh tor me wretched ik du dang kastorau wuh sasu ni paik despised u' drummle. Du fai-tor au nam-tor despised." "muhl?" leralmin-tor she. "du fai-tor au nam-tor u' ungainly k'svi u' rik'. Wuh pafam, has-bosh-tempered, lowering, stupid katravahsu." "muhl?" leralmin-tor she. "du fai-tor au has nothing tor recommend ish-veh tonk'peh donku heh wuh ridiculous padukau t' addle-headed predecessors; i', ri tor du?" "muhl?" leralmin-tor she va'ashiv; heh tik wak she leralmin-tor ish-veh, she tu'ash ish-veh lovely bezhun wuh wider. Tor overcome wuh rihag'es t' getting vesht ik monosyllable, i nem-tor ish-veh s' ish-veh, heh leralmin-tor, repeating ish-veh k' emphasis, "muhl! Yi, ik nam-tor po ish-veh tor me wretched." i', kuv i kupi ma pudva-tor ik she favoured drummle k' sovek idea t' tor memewretched, i dang ma vesh' svi' weh-rom khaf-spol pa' ish-veh; tonk'peh svi' ik habitual yut t' ish-veh, she shitau me ni entirely s' wuh deshker, ik i kupi dva-tor nothing t' wuh ves. "pip, " leralmin-tor estella, casting ish-veh glance abru' wuh tvi-shal, "ri tor nam-tor duhik pa' its daya fi' du. Ish-veh lau ma its daya fi' vath, heh lau nam-tor tvai ki'. Ish-veh's ri don discussing." "ha ish-veh nam-tor, " leralmin-tor i, "fai'ei i fam yehat lesh ik sutra dang leralmin, 'she lehm-tor maf ish-veh takov-tor heh attractions fi' wuh mere boor, wuh lowest svi' wuh patreitan.'" "i mokuhlek lesh ish-veh, " leralmin-tor estella. "oh! Ri tor nam-tor ni yaut, estella, heh ni inflexible." "calls me yaut heh inflexible svi' nash esh!" leralmin-tor estella, sharu ish-veh el'ru. "heh svi' ish-veh kim-shah esh reproached me na' stooping tor wuh boor!" "tra' nam-tor rai vet du tor, " leralmin-tor i, vel hurriedly, "na' i ma gla-tor du mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh glazhau heh abru'teruklar-ru'lut nash maut mu-yor, such u' du worla mazhiv-kur-tor tome." "tor du aitlun me yi, " leralmin-tor estella, turning suddenly k' wuh teslau heh serious, kuv ri reshnek, glazhau, "tor tehs-tor heh entrap du?" "tor du tehs-tor heh entrap ish-veh, estella?" "ha, heh wehk vath, ek' t' au tonk'peh du. La' nam-tor mrs. Brandley. I'll leralmin rai weht." heh i' ik i ma putan-tor wuh veh chapter tor wuh theme ik ni boshau t'nash-veh khaf-spol, heh ni k'ashiv tor ish-veh sut heh sut va'ashiv, i be' dvun fi' unhindered, tor wuh pavek ik had impended abru' me longer wi; wuh pavek ik had palikau tor nam-tor dator na', fa' i fai-tor ik wuh panu meskarau estella, heh svi' wuh gad lu ish-veh kan-bu kash-tor'es vesh' receiving its wuh'rak distortions s' din-tor havisham's wasting el'ru. Svi' wuh she'rakik var, wuh ras slab ik vesh' tor tevan fi' wuh sar-tak t' fupa s' svi' wuh kluhvau t' conquest vesh' slowly wrought s' wuh quarry, wuh ur na' wuh man-elakh tor meskaraya ish-veh svi' its shi vesh' slowly lesh k'fai wuh leagues t' kov, wuh slab vesh' slowly ashenau heh fitted svi' wuh kamu, wuh man-elakh vesh' rove tor ish-veh heh slowly taken k'fai wuh miles t' hollow tor wuh lo'uk shek-tukh mokov. Ek' hasu tor pok k' mau zup, heh wuh wadan sarlah, wuh sultan vesh' aroused svi' wuh tevik t' wuh mu-yor, heh wuh sharpened la'ash ik vesh' tor ktorr wuh man-elakh s' wuh lo'uk shek-tukh mokov vesh' shitau vi' ish-veh el'ru, heh au kwul-tor k' ish-veh, heh wuh man-elakh parted heh rushed maf, heh wuh abru-tol tevan-tor. Ni, svi' t'nash-veh nuf; ek' wuh ar'kadan, be' heh afar, ik palutunau tor wuh shaht, had vesh' accomplished; heh svi' wuh instant wuh salur vesh' kwul-tor, heh wuh kamu t' t'nash-veh stronghold eku-tor fi-tor me. Chapter xxxix. I vesh' rehkuh-heh-dah-leh tevun t' ya'shakhuv. Ri wuh'ashiv zhit had i puzhu-tor tor enlighten me fi' wuh subject t' t'nash-veh gishat, heh t'nash-veh dah-leh-wuh gad t'keshtan vesh' wuh wehk gad hal-tor. Etek had losrak barnard's ha-shal weht do wuh tevun, heh ha-tor svi' wuh temple. Etwel tvi-shal vesh' svi' bah-ker-kelek, ne' k' wuh pilash. Mr. Abru'lik heh i had na' ein wak parted apc'koik u' tor etwel tveshik relations, hi etek fator fi' wuh buhfik zhil. Notwithstanding t'nash-veh inability tor settle tor sovek-vel, if i rok arose s' wuh restless heh incomplete tenure fi' if i meskarau t'nash-veh tvai, i had wuh zahvan na' telvan, heh telv-tor regularly ni wehk wadan wuh gad. Ik tukh t' herbert's vesh' fam dvun progressing, heh kanok-vei k' me vesh' u' i ma katau ish-veh ne' tor wuh ikap-tor t' wuh kim-shah preceding chapter. Business had taken herbert fi' wuh halovaya tor marseilles. I vesh' sa'awek, heh had wuh pasik kash-ral t' hasu sa'awek. Dispirited heh anxious, wu hoping ik tor-morrow il thurai wehk gad would pa'shik t'nash-veh yut, heh wu disappointed, i sadly din-tor wuh cheerful limuk heh pok kesaya t' t'nash-veh t'hy'la. Ish-veh vesh' wretched igen-va; stormy heh masupik, stormy heh masupik; heh vral, vral, vral, glu svi' ek' wuh yut. Gad po' gad, wuh vast ras veil had vesh' driving abru' london s' wuh she'rak, heh ish-veh drove fam dvun, u' kuv svi' wuh she'rak tra' vesh' wuh ek'wak'es t' wan heh salan. Ni furious had vesh' wuh gusts, ik pid kelek svi' kahr had had wuh ras-tukh stripped ska' ish-veh kamu; heh svi' wuh shasol, lap had vesh' torn abru, heh masu-halovau t' salan-grazhakel lesh maf; heh gloomy khrosahp had sarlah svi' s' wuh gef, t' shipwreck heh tevakh. Khrashik thorshau t' sov-masu had accompanied aifa resha t' salan, heh wuh gad aishan a'ing u' i hayal-tor ne' tor telv-tor had vesh' wuh rasahkos t' ek'. Alterations ma vesh' tor svi' ik krus t' wuh temple opi' ik wak, heh ish-veh has ri i' ni lonely wuh character u' ish-veh had yi, il nam-tor ish-veh ni ko'nar tor wuh pilash. Etek ha-tor na' wuh fik t' wuh kim-shah kelek, heh wuh salan rushing abru wuh pilash hutau wuh kelek ik mu-yor, spo' khrasau t' thorshun, il breakings t' wuh masutra. Lu wuh sov-masu sarlah k' ish-veh heh dashed tehnat wuh krani, i nahp, raising t'nash-veh bezhun tor au u' au rocked, ik i lau ma fancied myself svi' wuh sahriv-beaten masu-ha'zehl-kel. Occasionally, wuh vuzh sarlah rolling ne' wuh vuzh-mev u' hi ish-veh kupi ri lesh tor hal-tor si' vi' such wuh mu-yor; heh lu i eku wuh svep tu'ash heh glazhau ne' wuh staircase, wuh staircase ha'gelek vesh' blown si'; heh lu i duvek-tor t'nash-veh limuk k' t'nash-veh el'ru heh glazhau k'fai wuh nesh-kur krani (sharu au ek'wak ni pi' vesh' s' wuh deshker svi' wuh zud t' such salan heh sov-masu), vesht gla-tor nash-veh ik wuh ha'gelek svi' wuh kelek vesh' blown si', heh ik wuh ha'gelek fi' wuh mesut heh wuh gef vesh' shuddering, heh ik wuh kastik-kov-yon svi' tus-hali fi' wuh pilash vesh' hasu lesh maf fa' wuh salan spo' yon-kur-fal splashes svi' wuh sov-masu. I telv-tor k' t'nash-veh glantau fi-tor wuh pasu, purposing tor ikap-tor t'nash-veh dunap na' leh-wun o'wak-vel. U' i ikap-tor ish-veh, osu paul's, heh ek' wuh wehk church-wak-vel svi' wuh citysome leading, ein accompanying, ein followingstruck ik wadan. Wuh ralash vesh' curiously lafot k' wuh salan; heh i vesh' listening, heh thinking uf wuh salan assailed heh tore ish-veh, lu i puzhu-tor wuh footstep fi' wuh stair. Ra nervous folly tor me palikaya, heh awfully tersau ish-veh k' wuh footstep t' t'nash-veh tevik ko-kai, tukh ri. Ish-veh vesh' vesht svi' wuh moment, heh i shroi va'ashiv, heh puzhu-tor wuh footstep stumble svi' coming fi'. Remembering yi, ik wuh staircase-ha'ge vesh' blown si', i nem-tor abru t'nash-veh telvan-ha'gelek heh went si' tor wuh stair-patam. Whoever vesh' ne' had pehkau fi' seeing t'nash-veh ha'gelek, na' ek' vesh' hizhuk. "tra' nam-tor ein veh ne' tra', nam-tor tra' ri?" i puvutau si', looking ne'. "ha, " leralmin-tor wuh spes s' wuh mu'khlup'es ne'rak. "ra lan-tol tor du aitlun?" "wuh fik. Mr. Pip." "ik nam-tor t'nash-veh ahm. Tra' nam-tor nothing wuh tukh?" "nothing wuh tukh, " fun-tor wuh spes. Heh wuh sasu sarlah fi'. I lam-tor k' t'nash-veh ha'gelek meskarau si' abru' wuh stair-rail, heh sarlah ish-veh slowly k'svi its ta'hal. Ish-veh vesh' wuh duvek-tor ha'gelek, tor min-tor fi-tor wuh dunap, heh its da-kuv t' ta'hal vesh' maut contracted; ni ik au vesh' svi' ish-veh na' wuh mere instant, heh yi s' ish-veh. Svi' wuh instant, i had gla-tor wuh limuk ik vesh' flekh tor me, looking abru k' wuh incomprehensible sov t' hasu estuhl heh sanoi k' wuh glan t' me. Dvun-tor wuh ha'gelek u' wuh sasu dvun-tor, i tor si' ik au vesh' substantially sai-vel-tor, tonk'peh roughly, spo' wuh voyager k' masutra. Ik au had wu shek-tukh-zhai-kur isachya. Ik ish-veh ya'shakhuv vesh' pa' sheh-leh. Ik au vesh' wuh muscular sasu, karik fi' ish-veh mal, heh ik au vesh' browned heh hardened k' sashavaya tor igen-va. U' au she-tor wuh kim-shah stair il dahkuh, heh wuh ta'hal t' t'nash-veh ha'gelek vinan-tor etek fi', vesht gla-tor nash-veh, k' wuh stupid ves t' tauraya, ik au vesh' holding si' fi' ish-veh el'ru tor me. "pray ra nam-tor ish-veh business?" i ya'akash ish-veh. "t'nash-veh business?" au ashiv-tor, pausing. "ah! Ha. I dungi danau t'nash-veh business, k' ish-veh trasha." "tor du istaya tor sarlah svi'?" "ha, " au kilko-tor; "i istaya tor sarlah svi', trensu." i had ya'akash ish-veh wuh deshker inhospitably hiyet, na' i resented wuh wihfelau t' ugelik heh gratified recognition ik fam dvun min-tor svi' ish-veh limuk. I resented ish-veh, fai'ei ish-veh seemed tor imply ik au gishu me tor kesau tor ish-veh. Tonk'peh i nem-tor ish-veh vi' wuh tvi-shal i had aishan losrak, heh, having eku wuh ha'gelek fi' wuh pasu, ya'akash ish-veh u' civilly u' i kupi tor danau himself. Au glazhau pa' ish-veh k' wuh strangest sov, wuh sov t' wondering sanosh, u' kuv au had ein krus svi' wuh vel au krol-tor, heh au seshau ska' wuh rough sik tor-pal, heh ish-veh taik. Yi, vesht gla-tor nash-veh ik ish-veh patam vesh' furrowed heh bald, heh ik wuh wu shek-tukh-zhai-kur isachya grew goh fi' its vla. Tonk'peh, vesht gla-tor nash-veh nothing ik svi' wuh least danau ish-veh. Fi' wuh contrary, vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh thurai moment, wuh'wak weht holding si' fi' ish-veh el'ru tor me. "ra tor du tvai?" leralmin-tor i, ulef suspecting ish-veh tor nam-tor mad. Au pehkau svi' ish-veh looking na' me, heh slowly tetau ish-veh gas'rak el'ru abru' ish-veh patam.
