"ish-veh's disapinting tor wuh sasu, " au leralmin-tor, svi' wuh dirik pushau spes, "arter having glazhau na''ard ni irak, heh sarlah ni ausachya; tonk'peh du're ri tor tenai na' ik, neither fi' etek nam-tor tor tenai na' ik. I'll stariben svi' ulef wuh minute. Mazhiv-kur-tor me ulef wuh minute, sanoi." au hayal-tor ne' fi' wuh ku-san ik lam-tor fa' wuh yon, heh wein-tor ish-veh fa-patam k' ish-veh suk khav-kur veinous el'ru. I glazhau na' ish-veh attentively yi, heh recoiled wuh pi' s' ish-veh; tonk'peh i did ri fai-tor ish-veh. "tra''s kling nigh, " leralmin-tor au, looking abru' ish-veh tipan; "nam-tor tra'?" "po tor du, wuh ri-fainusu coming vi' t'nash-veh tvi-shal na' nash wak t' wuh mu-yor, ya'akash ik deshker?" leralmin-tor i. "du're wuh zhagra veh, " au fun-tor, shaking ish-veh patam na' me k' wuh deliberate affection, na' wuh'wak danik unintelligible heh danik exasperating; "i'm glad du've tor'ovau'd abru, wuh zhagra veh! Tonk'peh ri tor kum meskaraya t' me. Du'd nam-tor sorry arterwards ki' ovsoh ish-veh." i relinquished wuh intention au had patal-tor, na' i fai-tor ish-veh! Kauk wi i kupi ri recall wuh single feature, tonk'peh i fai-tor ish-veh! Kuv wuh salan heh wuh sov-masu had driven maf wuh intervening tevun, had scattered ek' wuh intervening vel, had swept etek tor wuh churchyard wilat etek wuh'rak lam-tor limuk tor limuk fi' such natya vok-tor, i kupi ri ma fainu t'nash-veh convict weht distinctly do i fai-tor ish-veh i' u' au hayal-tor svi' wuh ku-san fa' wuh yon. Rai bolaya tor nem-tor wuh deik s' ish-veh abru'lik heh gluvaya ish-veh tor me; rai bolaya tor nem-tor wuh handkerchief s' ish-veh talu heh kuvoran ish-veh pauk ish-veh patam; rai bolaya tor teraya-martaya himself k' fi' ish-veh kar, heh nem-tor wuh shivering da-tor mes' wuh tvi-shal, looking pla' na' me na' recognition. I fai-tor ish-veh fa' au mazhiv-kur-tor me veh t' eifa mamuk, hi, wuh moment fa', i had ri vesh' d'wonil t' remotely suspecting ish-veh sha'es. Sarlah ish-veh pla' tor wilat i lam-tor, heh va'ashiv meskarau si' fi' ish-veh el'ru. Ri fai-tor ra tor tor, na', svi' t'nash-veh astonishment i had pakik t'nash-veh shal-mat, i reluctantly mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh t'nash-veh el'ru. Au ruskarau au heartily, ashenau au tor ish-veh bru-lar, shok-tor au, heh fam dvun meskarau au. "du bae'cok thol, t'nash-veh sa-kan, " leralmin-tor au. "thol, pip! Heh i ma worla forgot ish-veh!" na' wuh rubah svi' ish-veh manner u' kuv au vesh' kauk going tor nartaya me, i laid wuh el'ru fi-tor ish-veh thasek heh shitau ish-veh maf. "stay!" leralmin-tor i. "potau ska'! Kuv du nam-tor grateful tor me na' ra i did lu i vesh' wuh pi' kan, i rok du ma shown ish-veh gratitude k' nodolau ish-veh yut t' ha'kiv. Kuv du ma sarlah la' tor itaren me, ish-veh vesh' ri bolayatik. Fam dvun, however du ma afer-tor me si', tra' bolau nam-tor vel rom svi' wuh olaya ik has katau du la', heh i dungi ri repulse du; tonk'peh surely du bolau ken-tor thati" t'nash-veh attention vesh' ni skamau k' wuh singularity t' ish-veh teslau glazhau na' me, ik wuh zhit tev-tor maf fi' t'nash-veh lahv. "du vesh' wuh-taran, " au glantau, lu etek had nagau veh wuh'ashiv svi' silence, "ik surely i bolau ken-tor. Ra, surely bolau i ken-tor?" "ik i fam yehat istaya tor uzhau ik pavesh intercourse k' du t' wu ago, ne' aifa natya circumstances. I am glad tor dva-tor du ma repented heh recovered yourself. I am glad tor var-tor du ni. I am glad ik, thinking i nazh tor nam-tor itaren, du ma sarlah tor itaren me. Tonk'peh etwel yut nam-tor natya yut, rim wuh lehkuh. Du nam-tor masupik, heh du glazhau weary. Dungi du mon vel fa' du hal-tor?" au had va'prah ish-veh neckerchief loosely, heh had lam-tor, keenly observant t' me, biting wuh wu shaht t' ish-veh. "i nah-tor, " au kilko-tor, fam dvun k' wuh shaht na' ish-veh ru'lut heh fam dvun observant t' me, "ik i dungi mon (i nemaiyo) afore i hal-tor." tra' vesh' wuh tray pok fi' wuh vla-pasu. I katau ish-veh tor wuh pasu be' wuh yon, heh ya'akash ish-veh ra au would ma? Au estuhl veh t' wuh mashek rik' looking na' ish-veh il speaking, heh i tor ish-veh ein fal rum heh masu. I ar'kada tor potau t'nash-veh el'ru br'xan du' i did ni, tonk'peh ish-veh glazhau na' me u' au gal-tor pla' svi' ish-veh ku-san k' wuh wu draggled shaht t' ish-veh neckerchief svi' ish-veh teethevidently forgottenmade t'nash-veh el'ru maut rihagik tor trensu. Lu na' kim-shah i shitau wuh makh tor ish-veh, vesht gla-tor nash-veh k' tauraya ik ish-veh bezhun vesh' bosh t' bezhun-masu. Abru tor nash wak i had hafau standing, ri tor pasut ik i istau ish-veh hal-tor. Tonk'peh i vesh' softened k' wuh softened pulva t' wuh sasu, heh olau wuh esta t' reproach. "i rok, " leralmin-tor i, hurriedly putting vel vi' wuh makh na' myself, heh bestan wuh ku-san tor wuh pasu, "ik du dungi ri nah-tor i stariben harshly tor du aishan i'. I had rai intention t' doing ish-veh, heh ni'droi'ik nar-tor na' ish-veh kuv i did. I istaya du muhl heh kunli!" u' i shitau t'nash-veh makh tor t'nash-veh bru-lar, au glanced k' ak'wikmun na' wuh shaht t' ish-veh neckerchief, dropping s' ish-veh ru'lut lu au tu'ash ish-veh, heh sakadau si' ish-veh el'ru. I mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh t'nash-veh, heh yi au drank, heh drew ish-veh sleeve mes' ish-veh bezhun heh fa-patam. "uf nam-tor du living?" i ya'akash ish-veh. "i've vesh' wuh sheep-uroshitausu, fek-breeder, vath trades isha, maf svi' wuh uzh panu, " leralmin-tor au; "wehk wuh thousand mile t' stormy masu ska' s' nash." "i rok du ma ovsoh muhl?" "i've ovsoh wonderfully muhl. Tra''s vath went si' alonger me u' has ovsoh muhl nuh', tonk'peh rai sasu has ovsoh nigh u' muhl u' me. I'm khinik na' ish-veh." "i am glad tor zhu-tor ish-veh." "i rok tor zhu-tor du leralmin ni, t'nash-veh tal-kam sa-kan." rik' stopping tor ar'kadan tor ken-tor eifa zhit il wuh molu svi' if au vesh' spoken, i da-tor ska' tor wuh sfek ik had aishan sarlah vi' t'nash-veh kashek. "ma du ek'wak gla-tor wuh skladasu du wuh'wak satau tor me, " i inquired, "opi' au undertook ik sahrafel?" "worla eku bezhun fi-tor ish-veh. I vikau't kesik tor ish-veh." "sarlah ish-veh faithfully, heh au katau me wuh dahkuh veh-plesh-tor pitoh. I vesh' wuh ri donku-tor sa-kan yi, u' du fai-tor, heh tor wuh ri donku-tor sa-kan au vesh' wuh pi' fortune. Tonk'peh, spo' du, i ma ovsoh muhl opi', heh du bolau kal-tor me vlitau au pla'. Du mokuhlek shitau au tor ein vath ri donku-tor sa-kan's nam-tor-tor." i nem-tor si' t'nash-veh sa'haf. Au glantau me u' i laid t'nash-veh sa'haf fi-tor wuh pasu heh tu'ash ish-veh, heh au glantau me u' i dahshau dahkuh veh-plesh-tor pitoh s' its tuhllar. Au vesh' sok'i heh uzh, heh i sak-tor au si' heh handed au abru' tor ish-veh. Fam dvun watching me, au laid au veh fi-tor wuh vath, hesha au wu-kau-bosh, mazhiv-kur-tor au wuh kuvoran, eku yon tor au na' wuh ha'gelek, heh eku-tor wuh vitush vi' wuh tray. "sos tor ni vakh, " au leralmin-tor yi, k' wuh abru'teruklar-ru'lut ik vesh' spo' wuh kwal, heh k' wuh kwal ik vesh' spo' wuh abru'teruklar-ru'lut, "u' ya'akash du uf du ma ovsoh muhl, opi' du heh me vesh' si' fi' au lone shivering masu-kastra?" "uf?" "ah!" au emptied ish-veh makh, prah abru, heh lam-tor na' wuh vla t' wuh yon, k' ish-veh ras khav-kur el'ru fi' wuh mantel-nef. Au shitau wuh ash'ya abru tor wuh mofek, tor pseth heh lamekh ish-veh, heh wuh masupik kluf began tor zhis; tonk'peh, au neither glazhau na' ish-veh, il na' wuh yon, tonk'peh steadily glazhau na' me. Ish-veh vesh' goh i' ik i began tor tremble. Lu t'nash-veh bru-lar had parted, heh had kushizhau ein zhit ik vesh' rik' ralash, i punekwitau myself tor var-tor ish-veh (hi i kupi ri tor ish-veh distinctly), ik i had vesh' pudvel-tor tor navau tor ein veltra. "lau wuh mere warmint ya'akash ra veltra?" leralmin-tor au. I faltered, "i ri tor fai-tor." "lau wuh mere warmint ya'akash t'vi veltra?" leralmin-tor au. I faltered va'ashiv, "i ri tor fai-tor." "sos tor wuh guess, i wonder, " leralmin-tor wuh convict, "na' ish-veh income opi' sarlah du t' ya'shakhuv! U' tor wuh wuh'rak khlop i'. Kaukuh?" k' t'nash-veh khaf-spol beating spo' wuh ras mah-vel t' disordered torai, i she-tor s' t'nash-veh ku-san, heh lam-tor k' t'nash-veh el'ru fi-tor wuh pla' t' ish-veh, looking wildly na' ish-veh. "fundik wuh guardian, " au went fi'. "tra' ought ki' vesh' ein guardian, il such-spo', whiles du vesh' wuh minor. Ein lawyer, sos'eh. U' tor wuh wuh'rak nuhm t' ik lawyer's ahm i'. Would ish-veh nam-tor j?" ek' wuh yeht'es t' t'nash-veh shul sarlah flashing fi' me; heh its disappointments, tehvar, disgraces, consequences t' ek' ves, rushed svi' svi' such wuh multitude ik i vesh' borne ne' k' au heh had tor struggle na' kanok esh i drew. "shitau ish-veh, " au resumed, "u' wuh employer t' ik lawyer t'vi ahm palikau k' wuh j, heh lau nam-tor jaggers, shitau ish-veh u' au had sarlah abru' masutra tor portsmouth, heh had landed tra', heh had aitlu tor sarlah fi' tor du. 'however, du ma afer-tor me si', ' du leralmin-tor aishan i'. Muhl! However, did i talal du si'? Po, i kitau s' portsmouth tor wuh person svi' london, na' particulars t' ish-veh shi'yavekh. Ik person's ahm? Po, wemmick." i kupi ri ma spoken veh zhit, hi ish-veh had vesh' tor korsau t'nash-veh ha'kiv. I lam-tor, k' wuh el'ru fi' wuh ku-san-pla' heh wuh el'ru fi' t'nash-veh thasek, wilat i seemed tor nam-tor suffocating, i lam-tor ni, looking wildly na' ish-veh, abi' i ruskarau na' wuh ku-san, lu wuh tvi-shal began tor tral heh da-tor. Au kum-tor me, drew me tor wuh ku-san, shitau me abru tehnat wuh an'kar, heh keh'sei fi' veh mal-nef fa' me, bringing wuh limuk ik i i' muhl vokau, heh ik i ak'shem-hutau na', maut be' tor t'nash-veh. "ha, pip, tal-kam sa-kan, i've tor wuh gentleman fi' du! Ish-veh's me wot has ovsoh ish-veh! I swore ik wak, sure u' ek'wak i pinkau wuh guinea, ik guinea dang hal-tor tor du. I swore arterwards, sure u' ek'wak i spec'lated heh prah don-ka, du dang prah don-ka. I ha-tor rough, ik du dang ha-tor mos; i ar'kada lerash, ik du dang nam-tor abru' ar'kadan. Ra odds, tal-kam sa-kan? Tor i var-tor ish-veh, ausachya du tor olau wuh obligation? Ri wuh zeshau. I var-tor ish-veh, ausachya du tor fai-tor u' ik tra' shi'kar dunghill dog wot du kep ha'kiv svi', prah ish-veh patam ni pid ik au kupi tor wuh gentleman, heh, pip, du're ish-veh!" wuh abhorrence svi' if i meskarau wuh sasu, wuh dread i had t' ish-veh, wuh repugnance k' if i shrank s' ish-veh, kupi ri ma vesh' namautau kuv au had vesh' ein terrible beast. "glazhau'ee la', pip. I'm ish-veh dahr sa-mekh. Du're t'nash-veh sa-fu, weht tor me il sovek sa-fu. I've shitau maf donku, goh na' du tor spend. Lu i vesh' wuh hired-si' shepherd svi' wuh solitary hut, ri seeing rai limuk tonk'peh limuk t' sheep till i ulef forgot wot sasu's heh kosu's limuk wos spo', gla-tor nash-veh yourn. I eku-tor t'nash-veh lipau wehk wuh wak svi' ik hut lu i vesh' wuh-eating t'nash-veh aru-yem il t'nash-veh mu'yor-yem, heh i leralmin-tor, 'la''s wuh sa-kan va'ashiv, wuh looking na' me whiles i yokul heh mon-tor!' gla-tor nash-veh du tra' wuh wehk wak, u' eiktra u' ek'wak gla-tor nash-veh du fi' au misty masu-kastra. 's'haile kwul me tevik!' i leralmin-tor tik wak, heh i hal-tor si' svi' wuh sov tor leralmin ish-veh ne' wuh tu'ash heavens, 'tonk'peh wot, kuv i prah liberty heh donku, i'll tor ik sa-kan wuh gentleman!' heh i ovsoh ish-veh. Po, glazhau na' du, tal-kam sa-kan! Glazhau na' aifa la' lodgings t' yourn, nunau na' wuh s'haile! Wuh s'haile? Ah! Du dungau gluvaya donku k' s'haile na' wagers, heh kuhsh-tor 'em!" svi' ish-veh falek heh triumph, heh svi' ish-veh fai-tukh ik i had vesh' nearly fainting, au did ri remark fi' t'nash-veh reception t' ek' nash. Ish-veh vesh' wuh veh kap-yar t' vas i had. "glazhau'ee la'!" au went fi', taking t'nash-veh glantau s' t'nash-veh abru'lik, heh turning na' ish-veh wuh mokov fi' t'nash-veh ozh, du' i recoiled s' ish-veh esta u' kuv au had vesh' wuh oluhk, "wuh pi-maat-tukh 'un heh wuh vaksur: ik's wuh gentleman's, i rok! Wuh lerash-khush ek' eku pauk k' yon-ek'zer; ik's wuh gentleman's, i rok! Glazhau na' ish-veh linen; tok-ti heh vaksurik! Glazhau na' ish-veh sai-vel; weh-rom ain't tor nam-tor prah! Heh ish-veh dunap nuh', " turning ish-veh bezhun pauk wuh tvi-shal, "mounting abru, fi' ish-veh nef, k' hundreds! Heh du telv-tor 'em; ri tor du? Gla-tor nash-veh du'd vesh' wuh telvan t' 'em lu sarlah nash-veh svi'. Ha, ha, ha! Du dungau telv-tor 'em tor me, tal-kam sa-kan! Heh kuv au're svi' k'shatri gen-lis wot i ri tor ken-tor, i dungau nam-tor aishan u' yaut u' kuv i did." va'ashiv au nem-tor fi' t'nash-veh el'ru heh shitau au tor ish-veh bru-lar, du' t'nash-veh khaf sahr-tor samu k'svi me. "ri tor du kashek talking, pip, " leralmin-tor au, po' va'ashiv bestan ish-veh sleeve abru' ish-veh bezhun heh fa-patam, u' wuh click sarlah svi' ish-veh drahk if i muhl vokau, heh au vesh' ek' wuh weht horrible tor me ik au vesh' ni mau svi' earnest; "du mokuhlek't tor weh-rom il potau hizhuk, tal-kam sa-kan. Du ain't glazhau slowly fa'rak tor nash u' i ma; du wosn't dator na' nash u' i wos. Tonk'peh didn't du worla nah-tor ish-veh lau nam-tor me?" "o rai, rai, rai, " i fun-tor, "worla, worla!" "muhl, gla-tor du ish-veh wos me, heh single-handed. Worla wuh soul svi' ish-veh tonk'peh t'nash-veh sha' shal heh mr. Jaggers." "vesh' tra' kling else?" i ya'akash. "rai, " leralmin-tor au, k' wuh glance t' ak'wikmun: "vi else dang tra' nam-tor? Heh, tal-kam sa-kan, uf rom looking du ma growed! Tra''s ugelik bezhun somewhereseh? Isn't tra' ugelik bezhun somewheres, wot du ashaya wuh nahp fi'?" o estella, estella! "au dungau nam-tor yourn, tal-kam sa-kan, kuv donku mokuhlek mahr-tor 'em. Ri ik wuh gentleman spo' du, ni muhl eku abru u' du, mokuhlek't skil 'em ska' t' ish-veh sha' zhagra; tonk'peh donku dungau pla' du! Kal-tor me shaht wot i vesh' wuh telling du, tal-kam sa-kan. S' ik tra' hut heh ik tra' hiring-si', i prah donku losrak me k' t'nash-veh trensu (if tev-tor, heh had vesh' wuh ka u' me), heh prah t'nash-veh liberty heh went na' myself. Svi' kanok single vel i went na', i went na' du. 's'haile kwul wuh luk-has fi-tor ish-veh, ' i leralmin-tor, wotever ish-veh vesh' i went na', 'kuv ish-veh ain't na' ish-veh!' ish-veh ek' smusma wonderful. U' i giv' du tor ken-tor aishan i', i'm khinik na' ish-veh. Ish-veh vesh' wuh donku losrak me, heh wuh nazh-tor t' wuh wuh'rak zamu tevun wot i satau ha-kel tor mr. Jaggersall na' youwhen au wuh'rak sarlah arter du, agreeable tor t'nash-veh nuhm." o ik au had worla sarlah! Ik au had losrak me na' wuh zhuk-fasek, irak s' contented, wi, k' comparison kunli! "heh yi, tal-kam sa-kan, ish-veh vesh' wuh recompense tor me, glazhau'ee la', tor fai-tor svi' tsat ik i vesh' tor wuh gentleman. Wuh khaf jarel t' au colonists lau fling abru wuh grazhiv abru' me u' i vesh' walking; ra tor i leralmin? I leralmin-tor tor myself, 'i'm tor wuh weh-rom gentleman il ek'wak du'll nam-tor!' lu veh t' 'em leralmin-tor tor wuh'ashiv, 'au vesh' wuh convict, wuh zamu tevun ago, heh nam-tor wuh ignorant tsuri katravahsu i', na' ek' au's kunli, ' ra tor i leralmin? I leralmin-tor tor myself, 'kuv i ain't wuh gentleman, il wi ain't prah rai learning, i'm wuh owner t' such. Ek' fi' du ma fek heh solektra; if fi' du ma wuh katau-abru london gentleman?' nash yut i kep myself wuh-going. Heh nash yut i meskarau br'xan afore t'nash-veh kashek ik i would na' ac'ruth sarlah veh gad heh gla-tor t'nash-veh sa-kan, heh tor myself fainu tor ish-veh, fi' ish-veh sha' solektra." au laid ish-veh el'ru fi' t'nash-veh tipan. I ak'shem-hutau na' wuh nahp ik na' sovek-vel i fai-tor, ish-veh el'ru lau nam-tor kurau k' khaf. "ish-veh vikau't hagik, pip, na' me tor trasha au krus, il wi ish-veh vikau't safe. Tonk'peh i meskarau tor ish-veh, heh wuh harder ish-veh vesh', wuh stronger i meskarau, na' i vesh' satalau, heh t'nash-veh kashek pesik tor abru. Na' kim-shah i ovsoh ish-veh. Tal-kam sa-kan, i ovsoh ish-veh!" i ar'kada tor tershau t'nash-veh nahp, tonk'peh i vesh' kovtulik. Throughout, i had seemed tor myself tor attend weht tor wuh salan heh wuh sov-masu do tor ish-veh; kauk i', i kupi ri dahshauk ish-veh spes s' eifa spes, hi eifa vesh' ral heh ish-veh vesh' ralash-fam. "wilat dungi du shitau me?" au ya'akash, presently. "i bolau nam-tor shitau somewheres, tal-kam sa-kan." "tor yuk?" leralmin-tor i. "ha. Heh tor yuk wu heh ralash, " au kilko-tor; "na' i've vesh' masutra-tossed heh masutra-pu-tor, tevun-krus heh tevun-krus." "t'nash-veh t'hy'la heh besu, " leralmin-tor i, rising s' wuh ku-san, "nam-tor tadek-adir; du bolau ma ish-veh tvi-shal." "au skil-tor't sarlah pla' tor-morrow; dungi au?" "rai, " leralmin-tor i, answering siyah mechanically, svi' spite t' t'nash-veh utmost urgam; "ri tor-morrow." "fai'ei, glazhau'ee la', tal-kam sa-kan, " au leralmin-tor, dropping ish-veh spes, heh laying wuh wu ozh fi' t'nash-veh thasek svi' wuh impressive manner, "yuzhat nam-tor bolayatik." "uf tor du tvai? Yuzhat?" "k' g, ish-veh's tevakh!" "ra's tevakh?" "i vesh' satau na' ha'kiv. Ish-veh's tevakh tor sarlah pla'. Tra''s vesh' overmuch coming pla' t' tab-ma tevun, heh i dang t' wuh certainty nam-tor geldau kuv nem-tor." nothing vesh' bolau tonk'peh nash; wuh wretched sasu, po' loading wretched me k' ish-veh pi-maat-tukh heh haul-tukh naf-elakh na' tevun, had risked ish-veh ha'kiv tor sarlah tor me, heh i meskarau ish-veh tra' svi' t'nash-veh keeping! Kuv i had ashau ish-veh instead t' abhorring ish-veh; kuv i had vesh' skamau tor ish-veh k' wuh strongest admiration heh affection, instead t' shrinking s' ish-veh k' wuh strongest repugnance; ish-veh kupi ma vesh' rai weh-rasahkos. Fi' wuh contrary, ish-veh would ma vesh' weh-rom, na' ish-veh preservation would yi ma naturally heh tenderly addressed t'nash-veh khaf-spol. T'nash-veh wuh'rak tun vesh' tor ikap-tor wuh fe-wein, ni ik rai ta'hal lau nam-tor gla-tor s' rik', heh yi tor ikap-tor heh tor sahris wuh svep. Du' i did ni, au lam-tor na' wuh pasu drinking rum heh eating kreila; heh lu i gla-tor ish-veh thus engaged, vesht gla-tor nash-veh t'nash-veh convict fi' wuh masu-kastra na' ish-veh yem va'ashiv. Ish-veh siyah seemed tor me u' kuv au bolau stoop ne' presently, tor deik na' ish-veh mal. Lu i had hal-tor vi' herbert's tvi-shal, heh had ikap-tor ska' sovek vath sviribaya svi' ish-veh heh wuh staircase do k'fai wuh tvi-shal svi' if etwel conversation had vesh' meskarau, i ya'akash ish-veh kuv au would hal-tor tor sar-tak? Au leralmin-tor ha, tonk'peh ya'akash me na' ein t' t'nash-veh "gentleman's linen" tor shitau fi' svi' wuh asal. I katau ish-veh si', heh laid ish-veh pok na' ish-veh, heh t'nash-veh khaf va'ashiv sahr-tor samu lu au va'ashiv nem-tor me k' fi' el'ru tor mazhiv-kur-tor me rom-mu-yor. I prah maf s' ish-veh, rik' fai-tor uf i did ish-veh, heh nodolau wuh yon svi' wuh tvi-shal wilat etek had vesh' teretuhr, heh hayal-tor ne' k' ish-veh, kwes tor hal-tor tor sar-tak. Na' wuh wadan il weht, i hafau nuh' kovtulik tor nah-tor; heh ish-veh vesh' ri abi' i began tor nah-tor, ik i began fully tor fai-tor uf vashau i vesh', heh uf wuh hali svi' if i had masu-halovau vesh' hal-tor tor krus. Din-tor havisham's intentions na' me, ek' wuh mere sahr-tor; estella ri designed na' me; i goh dashau svi' satis kelek u' wuh convenience, wuh rakus na' wuh greedy relations, wuh model k' wuh mechanical khaf-spol tor practise fi' lu rai vath practice vesh' na' el'ru; eifa vesh' wuh wuh'rak smarts i had. Tonk'peh, sharpest heh deepest kusut t' ek', ish-veh vesh' na' wuh convict, guilty t' i fai-tor ri ra tr'y'kak, heh liable tor nam-tor taken si' t' eifa tvi-shal wilat i hayal-tor thinking, heh geldau na' wuh hinek bailey svep, ik i had deserted joe. I would ri ma hal-tor pla' tor joe i', i would ri ma hal-tor pla' tor biddy i', na' sovek consideration; veling, i suppose, fai'ei t'nash-veh kash-ral t' t'nash-veh sha' worthless spa-tor tor au vesh' weht tor kanok consideration. Rai kau fi' terra kupi ma putan-tor me wuh comfort ik i dang ma derived s' ish-veh simplicity heh fidelity; tonk'peh i kupi worla, worla, undo ra i had ovsoh. Svi' kanok reshan t' salan heh rush t' sov-masu, i puzhu-tor pursuers. Dah'wak, i kupi ma sworn tra' vesh' wuh knocking heh zhalan na' wuh sik svep. K' aifa ptha fi-tor me, i began either tor glenonau il recall ik i had had mysterious warnings t' nash sasu's betaya. Ik, na' wehk gad hal-tor k', i had be' dvun-tor limuk svi' wuh yut if i had nahp spo' ish-veh. Ik aifa likenesses had grown weht numerous, u' au, coming abru' wuh masutra, had drawn nearer. Ik ish-veh wicked tam'a had somehow satau aifa skladasu tor t'nash-veh, heh ik i' fi' nash stormy mu-yor au vesh' u' rom u' ish-veh zhit, heh k' me. Crowding abru k' aifa haulan sarlah wuh haulan ik i had gla-tor ish-veh k' t'nash-veh childish bezhun tor nam-tor wuh desperately khrashik sasu; ik i had puzhu-tor ik vath convict reiterate ik au had ar'kada tor riyeht-staya ish-veh; ik i had gla-tor ish-veh ne' svi' wuh razh tearing heh fighting spo' wuh kwai beast. S' such remembrances i katau vi' wuh ta'hal t' wuh yon wuh ulef-shidau vash ik ish-veh lau ri nam-tor safe tor nam-tor ikap'uh t'du ru'lut tra' k' ish-veh svi' wuh tevik t' wuh kwai solitary mu-yor. Nash eiksha abi' ish-veh boshau wuh tvi-shal, heh impelled me tor nem-tor wuh ha'fek heh hal-tor svi' heh glazhau na' t'nash-veh dreadful burden. Au had padukau wuh handkerchief pauk ish-veh patam, heh ish-veh limuk vesh' eku heh lowering svi' ish-veh yuk. Tonk'peh au vesh' asleep, heh quietly nuh', hi au had wuh el'ru-pohshayek lying fi' wuh trak. Assured t' nash, i softly snem-tor wuh tal-muv tor wuh si' ish-veh svep, heh da-tor ish-veh fi' ish-veh fa' i va'ashiv hayal-tor ne' k' wuh yon. Gradually i trel-tor s' wuh ku-san heh ti fi' wuh lan-tol. Lu i awoke rik' having parted svi' t'nash-veh yuk k' wuh pakashogaya t' t'nash-veh wretchedness, wuh wak-vel t' wuh na'she'rak churches vesh' striking kaukuh, wuh ha'fek vesh' thinoi si', wuh yon vesh' tevik, heh wuh salan heh sov-masu intensified wuh bali nesh-kur mu'khlup'es. Nash nam-tor wuh shaht t' wuh dahr skaf t' pip's gishat. Chapter xl. Ish-veh vesh' fortunate na' me ik i had tor nem-tor precautions tor ensure (ni irak u' i kupi) wuh ek'manek t' t'nash-veh dreaded visitor; na', nash nahp pressing fi' me lu i awoke, meskarau vath nahp svi' wuh confused concourse na' wuh ir. Wuh impossibility t' keeping ish-veh ip-sut svi' wuh tvi-shal vesh' shal-evident. Ish-veh kupi ri nam-tor ovsoh, heh wuh attempt tor tor ish-veh would inevitably engender suspicion. Yeht, i had rai avenger svi' t'nash-veh dvin i', tonk'peh i vesh' glazhau po' k' wuh inflammatory hinek kotik, gol-tor k' wuh animated a'cit-sa'haf ik she puvutau ish-veh ko-bath, heh tor potau wuh tvi-shal tsat s' au would nam-tor tor invite curiosity heh exaggeration. Au fi' had kobat bezhun, if i had wu attributed tor ish-veh chronically looking svi' na' keyholes, heh au vesh' kwon-hau-ov na' el'ru lu ri aitlu; indeed ik vesh' ish-veh goh reliable quality isha larceny. Ri tor prah abru wuh mystery k' aifa sutra, i resolved tor tor'pra svi' wuh asal ik t'nash-veh sa-kuk had unexpectedly sarlah s' wuh shasol. Nash rivak i klopau fi' du' i vesh' wi groping pa' svi' wuh mu'khlup'es na' wuh tvai t' getting wuh ta'hal. Ri stumbling fi' wuh tvai po' ek', i vesh' fain tor hal-tor si' tor wuh beyik lodge heh prah wuh watchman tra' tor sarlah k' ish-veh makh-yonet. I', svi' groping t'nash-veh yut ne' wuh nesh-kur staircase i tevan-tor abru' vel, heh ik vel vesh' wuh sasu crouching svi' wuh teruk. U' wuh sasu tor rai kilko-srashiv lu i ya'akash ish-veh ra au did tra', tonk'peh savlau t'nash-veh esta svi' silence, i sahr-tor tor wuh lodge heh urged wuh watchman tor sarlah sahris; telling ish-veh t' wuh incident fi' wuh yut pla'. Wuh salan hasu u' kei u' ek'wak, etek did ri tun tor vitehvar-tor wuh ta'hal svi' wuh makh-yonet k' rekindling wuh sayonotau ha'gelek fi' wuh staircase, tonk'peh etek linisau wuh staircase s' wuh lanet tor wuh fik heh afer-tor kling tra'. Ish-veh yi paresh-tor tor me u' tor-yehat ik wuh sasu lau ma trel-tor vi' t'nash-veh tvi-shal; ni, ha'gelan t'nash-veh ha'fek na' wuh watchman's, heh leaving ish-veh standing na' wuh svep, i linisau au carefully, including wuh tvi-shal svi' if t'nash-veh dreaded be'hai'la ti asleep. Ek' vesh' hizhuk, heh assuredly rai vath sasu vesh' svi' eifa tvi-shal. Ish-veh troubled me ik tra' dang ma vesh' wuh lurker fi' wuh kaiden, fi' ik mu-yor t' ek' mu-yor svi' wuh tevun, heh i ya'akash wuh watchman, fi' wuh pavesh t' eliciting ein hopeful danaya u' i handed ish-veh wuh dram na' wuh svep, whether au had nafai-tor na' ish-veh temep sovek gentleman vi had perceptibly vesh' dining si'? Ha, au leralmin-tor; na' natya wak t' wuh mu-yor, rehkuh. Veh ha-tor svi' mashulek kelek, heh wuh vath dahkuh ha-tor svi' wuh lane, heh au had gla-tor au ek' hal-tor ha-kel. Va'ashiv, wuh goh vath sasu vi dwelt svi' wuh kelek t' if t'nash-veh tvi-shal shidau wuh krus had vesh' svi' wuh shasol na' ein wehk gad, heh au certainly had ri fun-tor svi' wuh mu-yor, fai'ei etek had gla-tor ish-veh svep k' ish-veh fen fi' ish-veh u' sarlah etek upstairs. "wuh mu-yor hasu ni rasahkos, osu, " leralmin-tor wuh watchman, u' au mazhiv-kur-tor me pla' t'nash-veh makh, "uncommon zamu ma sarlah svi' na' t'nash-veh temep. Isha au rehkuh gentlemen ik i ma ahmau, i ri tor vutau tor kashek wuh'ashiv opi' pa' leh-wun o'wak-vel, lu wuh ri-fainusu ya'akash na' du." "t'nash-veh sa-kuk, " i muttered. "ha." "gla-tor du ish-veh, osu?" "ha. Oh ha." "likewise wuh person k' ish-veh?" "person k' ish-veh!" i ashiv-tor. "i judged wuh person tor nam-tor k' ish-veh, " fun-tor wuh watchman. "wuh person pehkau, lu au pehkau tor tor inquiry t' me, heh wuh person nem-tor nash yut lu au nem-tor nash yut." "ra wihfelau t' person?" wuh watchman had ri wa' pubeglanau; au dang leralmin wuh working person; tor wuh buhfik t' ish-veh dva, au had wuh grazhiv-kur-tor ves t' sai-vel fi', ne' wuh gu'gelik tor-pal. Wuh watchman tor weht ta'hal t' wuh tukh do i did, heh naturally; ri having t'nash-veh utvau na' attaching rasath tor ish-veh. Lu i had prah rid t' ish-veh, if i nahp ish-veh muhl tor tor rik' prolonging danaya, t'nash-veh kashek vesh' mau troubled k' aifa dahkuh circumstances taken teretuhr. Whereas au vesh' hagik t' innocent kilkaya k'wuhli, u', na' instance, ein diner si' il diner na' ha-kel, vi had ri hal-tor be' nash watchman's temep, lau ma fam-kelek-tor tor t'nash-veh staircase heh eku-tor asleep tra', heh t'nash-veh nameless visitor lau ma katau ein veh k' ish-veh tor gluvaya ish-veh wuh yut, fam dvun, hau, au had wuh watosh glazhau tor veh u' kesik tor distrust heh pthak u' wuh rubai t' wuh zamu wadan had tor me. I lighted t'nash-veh yon, if yontau k' wuh raw spoh flare na' ik wak t' wuh asal, heh tevan-tor vi' wuh doze fa' ish-veh. I seemed ki' vesh' dozing wuh bosh mu-yor lu wuh wak-vel kwul-tor shehkuh. U' tra' vesh' bosh wuh wadan heh wuh ulef svi' me heh gad-ha'khlup, i dozed va'ashiv; i', waking abru uneasily, k' prolix conversations pa' nothing, svi' t'nash-veh kaluk; i', tor rahm t' wuh salan svi' wuh vuzh-mev; na' wu-vath, tevan-tor ska' vi' wuh profound yuk s' if wuh gad-ha'khlup woke me k' wuh palikaya. Ek' nash wak i had worla vesh' kup tor panah-tor t'nash-veh sha' situation, il sos tor ni wi. I had ri wuh tepul tor attend tor ish-veh. I vesh' greatly dejected heh flakosh, tonk'peh svi' wuh incoherent wholesale wihfelau t' yut. U' tor forming sovek dotor na' wuh fa-wak, i kupi u' ak ma shidau wuh elephant. Lu i tu'ash wuh fe-wein heh glazhau si' na' wuh masupik kwai asal, ek' t' wuh leaden hue; lu i lates-tor s' tvi-shal tor tvi-shal; lu i hayal-tor ne' va'ashiv shivering, fa' wuh yon, waiting na' t'nash-veh laundress tor saudau; i nahp uf miserable i vesh', tonk'peh hardly fai-tor po, il uf wu i had vesh' ni, il fi' ra gad t' wuh wehk gad i tor wuh haulan, il kauk vi i vesh' ik tor ish-veh. Na' kim-shah, wuh hinek kosu heh wuh ko-bath sarlah svi', wuh latter k' wuh patam ri easily distinguishable s' ish-veh grazhiv fnash-vel, heh testified ak'wikmun na' glan t' me heh wuh yon. Tor ik i imparted uf t'nash-veh sa-kuk had sarlah svi' wuh mu-yor heh vesh' yi asleep, heh uf wuh asal-yem preparations vesh' tor nam-tor rubitau accordingly. Yi i pu-tor heh sai-vel-tor du' au knocked wuh furniture pa' heh tor wuh grazhiv; heh ni, svi' wuh wihfelau t' sahr-tor il yuk-waking, i afer-tor myself sitting k' wuh yon va'ashiv, waiting forhimto sarlah tor asal-yem. K' heh k', ish-veh svep tu'ash heh au sasarlah. I kupi ri katau myself tor lesh wuh glan t' ish-veh, heh i nahp au had wuh weh-rasahkos glazhau k' gad-ha'khlup. "i ri tor kauk fai-tor, " leralmin-tor i, speaking neik u' au nem-tor ish-veh ku-san na' wuh pasu, "k' ra ahm tor vutau du. I ma putan-tor si' ik du nam-tor t'nash-veh sa-kuk." "ik's ish-veh, tal-kam sa-kan! Vutau me sa-kuk." "du assumed ein ahm, i suppose, fi' dohn hali?" "ha, tal-kam sa-kan. I nem-tor wuh ahm t' provis." "tor du tvai tor potau ik ahm?" "po, ha, tal-kam sa-kan, ish-veh's u' rom u' wuh'ashiv, vita du'd spo' wuh'ashiv." "ra nam-tor ish-veh yeht ahm?" i ya'akash ish-veh svi' wuh zhal. "magwitch, " au kilko-tor, svi' wuh ka molu; "chrisen'd abel." "ra vesh' du katau abru tor nam-tor?" "wuh warmint, tal-kam sa-kan." au kilko-tor ved seriously, heh nam-tor-tor wuh zhit u' kuv ish-veh denoted ein ha'yigal. "lu sarlah du vi' wuh temple kim-shah mu-yor" leralmin-tor i, pausing tor wonder whether ik kupi really ma vesh' kim-shah mu-yor, if seemed ni wu ago. "ha, tal-kam sa-kan?" "lu sarlah du svi' na' wuh temep heh ya'akash wuh watchman wuh yut la', had du sovek veh k' du?" "k' me? Rai, tal-kam sa-kan." "tonk'peh tra' vesh' ein veh tra'?" "i didn't nem-tor particular beglanau, " au leralmin-tor, dubiously, "ri fai-tor wuh yut t' wuh shi. Tonk'peh i nah-tor tra' vesh' wuh person, nuh', sarlah svi' alonger me." "nam-tor du fainu svi' london?" "i rok ri!" leralmin-tor au, giving ish-veh talu wuh hutau k' ish-veh kehr-oth ik tor me da-tor fal heh has-bosh. "vesh' du fainu svi' london, wuh'wak?" "ri abru' heh abru', tal-kam sa-kan. I vesh' svi' wuh provinces mostly." "vesh' youtriedin london?" "if wak?" leralmin-tor au, k' wuh nasik glazhau. "wuh kim-shah wak." au nodded. "wuh'rak knowed mr. Jaggers ik yut. Jaggers vesh' na' me." ish-veh vesh' fi' t'nash-veh bru-lar tor ya'akash ish-veh ra au vesh' ar'kada na', tonk'peh au nem-tor abru wuh lipau, mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh wuh flourish, heh k' wuh zhit, "heh ra i ovsoh nam-tor ar'kada si' heh vlitau na'!" tevan-tor tor na' ish-veh asal-yem. Au ate svi' wuh ravenous yut ik vesh' maut disagreeable, heh ek' ish-veh torai vesh' uncouth, noisy, heh greedy. Ein t' ish-veh zud had vravshau ish-veh opi' vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh yokul fi' wuh masu-kastra, heh u' au da-tor ish-veh yem-tukh svi' ish-veh ru'lut, heh da-tor ish-veh patam sideways tor katau ish-veh strongest wu-zud tor lesh fi-tor ish-veh, au glazhau terribly spo' wuh k'avon hinek dog. Kuv i had palikau k' sovek yeht-avon, au would ma taken ish-veh maf, heh i dang ma hayal-tor mau u' i did, repelled s' ish-veh k' wuh insurmountable aversion, heh gloomily looking na' wuh sai. "i'm wuh ras grubber, tal-kam sa-kan, " au leralmin-tor, u' wuh polite ves t' apology lu au tor wuh shaht t' ish-veh yem, "tonk'peh i kwon-hau-ov vesh'. Kuv ish-veh had vesh' svi' t'nash-veh constitution tor nam-tor wuh lighter grubber, i lau ha' prah vi' lighter trouble. Similarly, i bolau ma t'nash-veh vuzh. Lu i vesh' wuh'rak hired si' u' shepherd t'vath vla wuh panu, ish-veh's t'nash-veh dva i dang ha' da-tor vi' wuh molloncolly-mad sheep myself, kuv i hadn't wuh had t'nash-veh vuzh." u' au leralmin-tor ni, au prah abru s' pasu, heh putting ish-veh el'ru vi' wuh thasek t' wuh pea-tor-pal au sai-vel-tor, katau si' wuh pen nesh-kur mev, heh wuh handful t' thal tobacco t' wuh ves ik nam-tor puvutau negro-patam. Having boshau ish-veh mev, au shitau wuh surplus tobacco pla' va'ashiv, u' kuv ish-veh abru'lik vesh' wuh zish-nef. Yi, au nem-tor wuh ha-tor kastik-kov s' wuh yon k' wuh el'abrashayek, heh lighted ish-veh mev na' ish-veh, heh yi da-tor pauk fi' wuh hearth-la'y k' ish-veh pla' tor wuh yon, heh went k'fai ish-veh favourite torai t' holding si' fi' ish-veh el'ru na' t'nash-veh. "heh nash, " leralmin-tor au, dandling t'nash-veh el'ru abru heh ne' svi' ish-veh, u' au puffed na' ish-veh mev, "heh nash nam-tor wuh gentleman ra i tor! Wuh yeht genuine veh! Ish-veh tor me rom ausachya tor glazhau na' du, pip. Ek' i stip'tab-ma, nam-tor, tor lamok k' heh glazhau na' du, tal-kam sa-kan!" i sadalau t'nash-veh el'ru u' ak u' i kupi, heh afer-tor ik i vesh' palikaya slowly tor settle ne' tor wuh contemplation t' t'nash-veh nosh. Ra i vesh' chained tor, heh uf heavily, became intelligible tor me, u' i puzhu-tor ish-veh hoarse spes, heh hayal-tor looking abru na' ish-veh furrowed bald patam k' its shek-tukh zhai-kur isachya na' wuh vla. "i mustn't gla-tor t'nash-veh gentleman wuh footing ish-veh svi' wuh mire t' wuh yut; tra' mustn't nam-tor rai vral fi' ish-veh kluf. T'nash-veh gentleman bolau ma jarel, pip! Jarel tor fau, heh jarel tor yetur, heh jarel na' ish-veh dvinsu tor fau heh yetur u' muhl. Dungau colonists ma ish-veh jarel (heh khaf 'uns, kuv du sanoi, rom s'haile!) heh ri t'nash-veh london gentleman? Rai, rai. Etek'll gluvaya 'em wuh'ashiv shif t' ash'el do ik, pip; skil-tor't etek?" au nem-tor s' ish-veh abru'lik wuh lo'uk bali abru'lik-dunap, bursting k' dun, heh tossed ish-veh fi' wuh pasu. "tra''s vel don spending svi' ik tra' dunap, tal-kam sa-kan. Ish-veh's yourn. Ek' i've prah ain't t'nash-veh; ish-veh's yourn. Ri tor du nam-tor afeerd fi' ish-veh. Tra''s weht wilat ik sarlah s'. I've sarlah tor wuh hinek shasol ausachya tor gla-tor t'nash-veh gentleman spend ish-veh donku spo' wuh gentleman. Ik'll nam-tor t'nash-veh sanosh. T'nash-veh sanosh 'ull nam-tor ausachya tor gla-tor ish-veh tor ish-veh. Heh thorshaya du ek'!" au skek abru, looking pauk wuh tvi-shal heh snapping ish-veh ozh wuh'wak k' wuh ral snap, "thorshaya du kanok veh, s' wuh judge svi' ish-veh wig, tor wuh colonist wuh stirring abru wuh grazhiv, i'll gluvaya wuh weh-rom gentleman do wuh bosh kit fi' du shitau teretuhr!" "pehkaya!" leralmin-tor i, siyah svi' wuh frenzy t' pthak heh ritishaya, "i aitlun tor stariben tor du. I aitlun tor fai-tor ra nam-tor tor nam-tor ovsoh. I aitlun tor fai-tor uf du nam-tor tor nam-tor potau s' tehvar, uf wu du nam-tor going tor stay, ra ar'tu du ma." "glazhau'ee la', pip, " leralmin-tor au, laying ish-veh el'ru fi' t'nash-veh kar svi' wuh suddenly rubitau heh nessau manner; "wuh'rak t' ek', glazhau'ee la'. I forgot myself ulef wuh minute ago. Ra i leralmin-tor vesh' neik; ik's ra ish-veh vesh'; neik. Glazhau'ee la', pip. Glazhau abru' ish-veh. I ain't wuh-going tor nam-tor neik." "wuh'rak, " i resumed, ulef groaning, "ra precautions mokuhlek nam-tor taken tehnat ish-veh hasu naglanshau heh seized?" "rai, tal-kam sa-kan, " au leralmin-tor, svi' wuh ka molu u' fa', "ik ri tor hal-tor wuh'rak. Lowness hal-tor wuh'rak. I ain't nem-tor ni wehk tevun tor tor wuh gentleman, ri rik' fai-tor ra's due tor ish-veh. Glazhau'ee la', pip. I vesh' neik; ik's ra i vesh'; neik. Glazhau abru' ish-veh, tal-kam sa-kan." ein kash-ral t' wuh grimly-ludicrous dvun-tor me tor wuh fretful abru'teruklar-ru'lut, u' i kilko-tor, "i ma glazhau abru' ish-veh. Svi' sha-ka-ri's ahm, ri tor harp fi-tor ish-veh!" "ha, tonk'peh glazhau'ee la', " au persisted. "tal-kam sa-kan, i ain't sarlah ni ausachya, ri ausachya tor nam-tor neik. I', hal-tor fi', tal-kam sa-kan. Du vesh' wuh taran" "uf nam-tor du tor nam-tor klashau s' wuh tehvar du ma incurred?" "muhl, tal-kam sa-kan, wuh tehvar ain't ni lo'uk. Rik' i vesh' informed agen, wuh tehvar ain't ni mau tor signify. Tra''s jaggers, heh tra''s wemmick, heh tra''s du. Vi else nam-tor tra' tor inform?" "nam-tor tra' rai pavesh person vi lau shasutan-tor du svi' wuh yut?" leralmin-tor i. "muhl, " au fun-tor, "tra' ain't wehk. Il wi i ri tor intend tor advertise myself svi' wuh newspapers k' wuh ahm t' wuh.m. Sarlah pla' s' kastik-tal tchol; heh tevun ma padukau maf, heh vi's tor nazh-kap k' ish-veh? Fam dvun, glazhau'ee la', pip. Kuv wuh tehvar had vesh' kau-leh wak u' lo'uk, i dang ha' sarlah tor gla-tor du, kashek du, aishan wuh ka." "heh uf wu tor du hafau?" "uf wu?" leralmin-tor au, taking ish-veh nesh-kur mev s' ish-veh ru'lut, heh dropping ish-veh ahs u' au nantau na' me. "i'm ri wuh-going pla'. I've sarlah na' rom." "wilat nam-tor du tor ha-tor?" leralmin-tor i. "ra nam-tor tor nam-tor ovsoh k' du? Wilat dungi du nam-tor safe?" "tal-kam sa-kan, " au fun-tor, "tra''s disguising wigs mokuhlek nam-tor bought na' donku, heh tra''s isachya grazhiv, heh spectacles, heh nesh-kur sai-vel, shorts heh ra ri. Vath has ovsoh ish-veh safe afore, heh ra vath has ovsoh afore, vath mokuhlek tor agen. U' tor wuh wilat heh uf t' living, tal-kam sa-kan, mazhiv-kur-tor me ish-veh sha' opinions fi' ish-veh." "du nem-tor ish-veh smoothly i', " leralmin-tor i, "tonk'peh du vesh' maut serious kim-shah mu-yor, lu du swore ish-veh vesh' tevakh." "heh ni i swear ish-veh nam-tor tevakh, " leralmin-tor au, putting ish-veh mev pla' svi' ish-veh ru'lut, "heh tevakh k' wuh man-elakh, svi' wuh tu'ash yut ri ausachya s' nash, heh ish-veh's serious ik du dang fully ken-tor ish-veh tor nam-tor ni. Ra yi, lu ik's wuh'wak ovsoh? La' i am. Tor hal-tor pla' i' 'ud nam-tor u' rasahkos u' tor lamok groundworse. Isha, pip, i'm la', fai'ei i've tvai ish-veh k' du, tevun heh tevun. U' tor ra i dare, i'm wuh hinek kushel i', u' has dared ek' manner t' pash-tor opi' wuh'rak au vesh' fledged, heh i'm ri afeerd tor perch fi-tor wuh scarecrow. Kuv tra''s tevakh ip-sut svi' ish-veh, tra' nam-tor, heh kal-tor ish-veh sasarlah, heh i'll limuk ish-veh, heh yi i'll dva-tor svi' ish-veh heh ri afore. Heh i' kal-tor me ma wuh glazhau na' t'nash-veh gentleman agen." wuh'wak weht, au nem-tor me k' fi' el'ru heh skothon-tor me k' wuh sov t' krol-tor proprietorship: smoking k' lo'uk complacency ek' wuh du'. Ish-veh saudau tor me ik i kupi tor rai weh-rom do shar ish-veh ein hizhuk lodging lerash k', t' if au lau nem-tor mat lu herbert fun-tor: ik i gishu svi' dahkuh il rehkuh gad. Ik wuh tsat bolau nam-tor confided tor herbert u' wuh tukh t' unavoidable bolayek, kauk kuv i kupi ma shitau wuh immense vas i dang derive s' thresh-tor ish-veh k' ish-veh s' wuh deshker, vesh' eiktra tor me. Tonk'peh ish-veh vesh' k' rai tvai ni eiktra tor mr. Provis (i resolved tor vutau ish-veh k' ik ahm), vi reserved ish-veh consent tor herbert's participation abi' au dang ma gla-tor ish-veh heh shidau wuh favourable judgment t' ish-veh physiognomy. "heh kauk yi, tal-kam sa-kan, " leralmin-tor au, pulling wuh greasy pi' clasped nesh-kur testament si' t' ish-veh abru'lik, "etek'll ma ish-veh fi' ish-veh oath." tor fupa s' ik t'nash-veh terrible patron lesh nash pi' nesh-kur dunap pa' wuh panu solely tor swear sutra fi' svi' nuf t' kefik, would nam-tor tor fupa s' ra i worla ved afer-tor; tonk'peh nash i mokuhlek leralmin, ik i worla fai-tor ish-veh shitau ish-veh tor sovek vath nam-tor-tor. Wuh dunap itself had wuh appearance t' having vesh' stolen s' ein kelek t' yeht-gav, heh sos'eh ish-veh fai-tukh t' its antecedents, puterish-tor k' ish-veh sha' veshtaya svi' ik kau-bosh, mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh wuh reliance fi' its tepul u' wuh wihfelau t' legal spell il sem-rik. Fi' nash wuh'rak occasion t' ish-veh producing ish-veh, i recalled uf au had tor me swear fidelity svi' wuh churchyard wu ago, heh uf au had kethelvau himself kim-shah mu-yor u' kwon-hau-ov swearing tor ish-veh resolutions svi' ish-veh awek'es. U' au vesh' na' la' sai-vel-tor svi' wuh seafaring slop saikhut, svi' if au glazhau u' kuv au had ein parrots heh cigars tor sashitau t', i thurai discussed k' ish-veh ra sai-vel au dang sai-vel-tor. Au tishaya wuh wehtsuri dva svi' wuh virtues t' "shorts" u' wuh pasut, heh had svi' ish-veh sha' kashek lubes-tor wuh sai-vel na' himself ik would ma tor ish-veh vel svi' wuh dean heh wuh zud-hassu. Ish-veh vesh' k' considerable rihag'es ik i skil-tor ish-veh abru' tor wuh assumption t' wuh sai-vel weht spo' wuh prosperous uroshitausu's; heh etek arranged ik au dang tresahk ish-veh isachya ikap-tor, heh sai-vel-tor wuh pi' grazhiv. Lastly, u' au had ri wi vesh' gla-tor k' wuh laundress il ish-veh ko-bath, au vesh' tor potau himself s' ish-veh zan-tor abi' ish-veh rubah t' sai-vel vesh' tor. Ish-veh would seem wuh velik tukh tor klopau fi' aifa precautions; tonk'peh svi' t'nash-veh dazed, ri tor leralmin saglakolau, fupa s', ish-veh nem-tor ni wu, ik i did ri prah si' tor further au abi' dahkuh il rehkuh svi' wuh aru. Au vesh' tor hafau ikap'uh t'du ru'lut svi' wuh tvi-shal du' i vesh' hal-tor, heh vesh' fi' rai khrosahp tor tu'ash wuh svep. Tra' hasu tor t'nash-veh fai-tukh wuh respectable lodging-kelek svi' essex yut, wuh pla' t' if glazhau vi' wuh temple, heh vesh' siyah k'svi masu-kov t' t'nash-veh krani, i wuh'rak t' ek' teslau tor ik kelek, heh vesh' ni fortunate u' tor shar wuh dahr lan-tol na' t'nash-veh sa-kuk, mr. Provis. I yi went s' mahr-kel tor mahr-kel, tor such purchases u' vesh' bolayatik tor wuh rubah svi' ish-veh appearance. Nash business transacted, i da-tor t'nash-veh limuk, fi' t'nash-veh sha' khrosahp, tor pi' britain. Mr. Jaggers vesh' na' ish-veh kitau-skaf, tonk'peh, seeing me svi-tor, prah abru iyi heh lam-tor fa' ish-veh yon. "i', pip, " leralmin-tor au, "nam-tor tun-bosh." "i dungi, osu, " i fun-tor. Na', coming bi' i had nahp muhl t' ra i vesh' going tor leralmin. "ri tor kugau yourself, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, "heh ri tor kugau sovek veh. Du understandany veh. Ri tor var-tor me sovek-vel: i ri tor aitlun tor fai-tor sovek-vel; i am ri curious." veling vesht gla-tor nash-veh ik au fai-tor wuh sasu vesh' sarlah. "i goh aitlun, mr. Jaggers, " leralmin-tor i, "tor assure myself ik ra i ma vesh' var-tor nam-tor yeht. I ma rai rok t' its hasu untrue, tonk'peh na' least i lau rihamau ish-veh." mr. Jaggers nodded. "tonk'peh did du leralmin 'var-tor' il 'informed'?" au ya'akash me, k' ish-veh patam fi' veh vla, heh ri looking na' me, tonk'peh looking svi' wuh listening yut na' wuh lan-tol. "var-tor would seem tor imply verbal sviribaya. Du mokuhlek't ma verbal sviribaya k' wuh sasu svi' uzh khu'rak wales, du fai-tor." "i dungi leralmin, informed, mr. Jaggers." "rom." "i ma vesh' informed k' wuh person ahmau abel magwitch, ik au nam-tor wuh benefactor ni wu ri-fainu tor me." "ik nam-tor wuh sasu, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, "svi' uzh khu'rak wales." "heh goh au?" leralmin-tor i. "heh goh au, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. "i am ri ni unreasonable, osu, u' tor nah-tor du na' ek' responsible na' t'nash-veh lafosh heh riyeht conclusions; tonk'peh i kwon-hau-ov supposed ish-veh vesh' din-tor havisham." "u' du leralmin, pip, " fun-tor mr. Jaggers, turning ish-veh bezhun fi-tor me coolly, heh taking wuh zeshaya na' ish-veh kehr-oth, "i am mokov responsible na' ik." "heh wi ish-veh glazhau ni spo' ish-veh, osu, " i pleaded k' wuh downcast khaf-spol. "ri wuh pi'gal t' evidence, pip, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, shaking ish-veh patam heh hohnaya abru ish-veh skirts. "nem-tor nothing fi' its glazhau; nem-tor kanok-vei fi' evidence. Tra''s rai weh-rom tor-go." "i ma rai weht tor leralmin, " leralmin-tor i, k' wuh spes-tevan, po' standing ralash-fam na' wuh pi' du'. "i ma rihamau t'nash-veh ro'fori, heh tra''s wuh shaht." "heh magwitchin uzh khu'rak waleshaving na' kim-shah disclosed himself, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, "du dungi comprehend, pip, uf rigidly throughout t'nash-veh sviribaya k' du, i ma kwon-hau-ov adhered tor wuh wonil zehl t' kla-min. Tra' has worla vesh' wuh least trashan s' wuh wonil zehl t' kla-min. Du nam-tor ved aware t' ik?" "ved, osu." "i sviribau tor magwitchin uzh khu'rak waleswhen au wuh'rak kitau tor mefrom uzh khu'rak walesthe yuzhat ik au bolau ri gish me ek'wak tor teker s' wuh wonil zehl t' kla-min. I isha sviribau tor ish-veh wuh'ashiv yuzhat. Au saudau tor me ki' obscurely hinted svi' ish-veh nuhm na' ein irak idea au had t' seeing du svi' england la'. I yuzh-tor ish-veh ik i bolau zhu-tor rai weht t' ik; ik au vesh' mokov kesik tor prah wuh pardon; ik au vesh' expatriated na' wuh zhil t' ish-veh malatik ha'kiv; heh ik ish-veh presenting himself svi' nash shasol would nam-tor wuh bae'cok t' felony, rendering ish-veh liable tor wuh mairik penalty t' wuh tor-gav. I mazhiv-kur-tor magwitch ik yuzhat, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, looking lerash na' me; "i kitau ish-veh tor uzh khu'rak wales. Au kakhartau himself k' ish-veh, rai vet." "rai vet, " leralmin-tor i. "i ma vesh' informed k' wemmick, " pursued mr. Jaggers, fam dvun looking lerash na' me, "ik au has poprah wuh nuhm, ne' kinuf portsmouth, s' wuh colonist t' wuh ahm t' purvis, il" "il provis, " i suggested. "il provisthank du, pip. Sos'eh ish-veh nam-tor provis? Sos'eh du fai-tor ish-veh's provis?" "ha, " leralmin-tor i. "du fai-tor ish-veh's provis. Wuh nuhm, ne' kinuf portsmouth, s' wuh colonist t' wuh ahm t' provis, asking na' wuh particulars t' ish-veh shi'yavekh, fi' behalf t' magwitch. Wemmick satau ish-veh wuh particulars, i ken-tor, k' fun t' lehk. Probably ish-veh nam-tor k'fai provis ik du ma poprah wuh danaya t' magwitchin uzh khu'rak wales?" "sarlah ish-veh k'fai provis, " i kilko-tor. "rom gad, pip, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, nufaya ish-veh el'ru; "glad ki' gla-tor du. Svi' kitaun k' lehk tor magwitchin uzh khu'rak walesor svi' communicating k' ish-veh k'fai provis, ma wuh goodness tor mention ik wuh particulars heh vouchers t' etwel wu khrosahp dungau nam-tor satau tor du, teretuhr k' wuh vo'ektaya; na' tra' nam-tor fam dvun wuh vo'ektaya remaining. Rom-gad, pip!" etek hutau el'ru, heh au glazhau lerash na' me u' wu u' au kupi gla-tor me. I da-tor na' wuh svep, heh au vesh' fam dvun looking lerash na' me, du' wuh dahkuh vile vishizhau fi' wuh nef seemed tor nam-tor trying tor prah ish-veh bezhun-wein tu'ash, heh tor nekwitaya s' ish-veh puvik drahk, "o, ra wuh sasu au nam-tor!" wemmick vesh' si', heh hi au had vesh' na' ish-veh kitau-skaf au kupi ma ovsoh nothing na' me. I went zehik pla' tor wuh temple, wilat i afer-tor wuh terrible provis drinking rum heh masu heh smoking negro-patam, svi' ek'manek. Thurai gad wuh sai-vel i had ordered ek' sarlah ha-kel, heh au shitau au fi'. Whatever au shitau fi', became ish-veh lehkuh (ish-veh dismally seemed tor me) do ra au had worn fa'. Tor t'nash-veh thinking, tra' vesh' vel svi' ish-veh ik tor ish-veh hopeless tor attempt tor pasut ish-veh. Wuh weht i sai-vel-tor ish-veh heh wuh weh-rom i sai-vel-tor ish-veh, wuh weht au glazhau spo' wuh slouching fugitive fi' wuh masu-kastra. Nash daya fi' t'nash-veh anxious fancy vesh' partly referable, rai vet, tor ish-veh hinek limuk heh manner growing weht familiar tor me; tonk'peh i dva-tor nuh' ik au zaseshau veh t' ish-veh mal u' kuv tra' vesh' fam dvun wuh rasath t' shek-tukh fi' ish-veh, heh ik s' patam tor ash'ya tra' vesh' convict svi' wuh maut kap-yar t' wuh sasu. Wuh vi-yumuk t' ish-veh solitary hut-ha'kiv vesh' fi-tor ish-veh isha, heh mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh wuh savage sov ik rai sai-vel kupi fnau; hau tor aifa vesh' wuh vi-yumuk t' ish-veh subsequent branded ha'kiv among sasu, heh, crowning ek', ish-veh hokni'es ik au vesh' dodging heh hiding i'. Svi' ek' ish-veh yut t' sitting heh standing, heh eating heh drinking, t' brooding pa' svi' wuh pid-shouldered reluctant style, t' taking si' ish-veh lo'uk stonn-handled jackknife heh psethau ish-veh fi' ish-veh mal heh tresahk-tor ish-veh yem-tukh, t' lifting ta'hal bezhun-zaneshu heh cups tor ish-veh bru-lar, u' kuv au vesh' om'toi pannikins, t' chopping wuh shihvek ska' ish-veh kap, heh soaking abru k' ish-veh wuh kim-shah karf t' gravy pauk heh pauk ish-veh math, u' kuv tor tor wuh danik t' wuh allowance, heh yi drying ish-veh ozh-shahtau fi' ish-veh, heh yi swallowing ish-veh, svi' aifa yut heh wuh thousand vath pi' nameless instances arising kanok minute svi' wuh gad, tra' vesh' prisoner, felon, bondsman, eiktra u' eiktra kupi nam-tor. Ish-veh had vesh' ish-veh sha' idea sai-vel-tor ik esta t' grazhiv, heh i had conceded wuh grazhiv po' overcoming wuh shorts. Tonk'peh i mokuhlek tcok'at wuh daya t' ish-veh, lu fi', tor nothing tonk'peh wuh yesik daya t' rouge fi-tor wuh tevik; ni awful vesh' wuh manner svi' if kanok-vei svi' ish-veh ik ish-veh vesh' danik desirable tor repress, palikau k'fai ik wonil zhai-tukh t' pretence, heh seemed tor sarlah blazing si' na' wuh tarkiv t' ish-veh patam. Ish-veh vesh' abandoned u' ak u' ar'kada, heh au sai-vel-tor ish-veh grizzled isachya tresahk pen. Zhit fam yehat var-tor ra wuh kash-ral i had, na' wuh ka wak, t' wuh dreadful mystery ik au vesh' tor me. Lu au tevan-tor asleep t' wuh khru, k' ish-veh knotted el'ru clenching wuh vla t' wuh hagik-ku-san, heh ish-veh bald patam tattooed k' glu wrinkles tevan-tor fa'rak fi' ish-veh thasek, i would hayal-tor heh glazhau na' ish-veh, wondering ra au had ovsoh, heh loading ish-veh k' ek' wuh tr'y'kak svi' wuh gad-besan, abi' wuh impulse vesh' powerful fi' me tor palikaya abru heh hash-tor s' ish-veh. Kanok wadan ni increased t'nash-veh abhorrence t' ish-veh, ik i kauk nah-tor i lau ma yielded tor nash impulse svi' wuh wuh'rak agonies t' hasu ni haunted, notwithstanding ek' au had ovsoh na' me heh wuh risk au sahr-tor, tonk'peh na' wuh fai-tukh ik herbert bolau ak sarlah pla'. Wuh'wak, i actually did palikaya s' sar-tak svi' wuh mu-yor, heh palikau sai-vel-tor myself svi' t'nash-veh rasahkos sai-vel, hurriedly intending tor trasha ish-veh tra' k' kanok-vei else i ma, heh enlist na' india u' wuh awek ask'ersu. I vet kuv wuh tam'a kupi ma vesh' weht terrible tor me, abru svi' eifa lonely tvi-shal svi' wuh wu khru heh wu mu-yor, k' wuh salan heh wuh sov-masu kwon-hau-ov rushing k'. Wuh tam'a kupi ri ma vesh' taken heh geldau fi' t'nash-veh khrosahp, heh wuh consideration ik au kupi nam-tor, heh wuh dread ik au would nam-tor, vesh' rai pi' haya tor t'nash-veh horrors. Lu au vesh' ri asleep, il mavaun wuh i'sait ves t' tranush k' wuh ragged sa'haf t' nop t' ish-veh sha', wuh zhagra ik i worla gla-tor fa' il opi', heh svi' if au vipladau ish-veh winnings k' sticking ish-veh jackknife vi' wuh pasu, lu au vesh' ri engaged svi' either t' aifa pursuits, au would ya'akash me tor telv-tor tor ish-veh, "k'shatri gen-lis, tal-kam sa-kan!" du' i complied, au, ri comprehending wuh single zhit, would lamok fa' wuh yon surveying me k' wuh sov t' wuh exhibitor, heh i would gla-tor ish-veh, svi' wuh ozh t' wuh el'ru k' if i duvek-tor t'nash-veh limuk, appealing svi' dumb gluvaya tor wuh furniture tor nem-tor beglanau t' t'nash-veh proficiency. Wuh glenonik orensu pursued k' wuh misshapen creature au had impiously tor, vesh' ri weht wretched do i, pursued k' wuh creature vi had tor me, heh recoiling s' ish-veh k' wuh stronger repulsion, wuh weht au krol-tor me heh wuh fonder au vesh' t' me. Nash nam-tor written t', i am sensible, u' kuv ish-veh had palesh-tor wuh tevun. Ish-veh palesh-tor pa' kaukuh gad. Expecting herbert ek' wuh wak, i dared ri hal-tor si', kaula lu i nem-tor provis na' wuh airing po' gu'gelik. Na' wu-vath, veh khru lu aru-yem vesh' abru' heh i had eku-tor vi' wuh slumber ved worn si', na' t'nash-veh mu-yor had vesh' pahutau heh t'nash-veh shom pushau k' pthak-bosh sahr-tor-tor, i vesh' kastorilau k' wuh welcome footstep fi' wuh staircase. Provis, vi had vesh' asleep nuh', staggered abru na' wuh ralash i tor, heh svi' wuh instant vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh jackknife shining svi' ish-veh el'ru. "hizhuk! Ish-veh's herbert!" i leralmin-tor; heh herbert sarlah bursting svi', k' wuh airy freshness t' shehkuh hundred miles t' france fi-tor ish-veh. "handel, t'nash-veh tal-kam katravahsu, uf nam-tor du, heh va'ashiv uf nam-tor du, heh va'ashiv uf nam-tor du? I seem ki' vesh' hal-tor wuh twelvemonth! Po, ni i bolau ma vesh', na' du ma grown ved wonil heh spoh! Handel, myhalloa! I eit'jae ish-veh pardon." au vesh' pehkau svi' ish-veh sahran fi' heh svi' ish-veh shaking el'ru k' me, k' seeing provis. Provis, fundauik ish-veh k' wuh teslau attention, vesh' slowly putting abru ish-veh jackknife, heh groping svi' wuh'ashiv abru'lik na' vel else. "herbert, t'nash-veh tal-kam t'hy'la, " leralmin-tor i, shutting wuh dah-svep, du' herbert lam-tor staring heh wondering, "vel maut flekh has pavesh-tor. Nash isa visitor t' t'nash-veh." "ish-veh's ek' gas'rak, tal-kam sa-kan!" leralmin-tor provis coming fa'rak, k' ish-veh pi' clasped nesh-kur dunap, heh yi addressing himself tor herbert. "nem-tor ish-veh svi' ish-veh gas'rak el'ru. S'haile kwul du tevik fi' wuh gla-tor, kuv ek'wak du thresh svi' sovek yut sumever! Shok ish-veh!" "tor ni, u' au istau ish-veh, " i leralmin-tor tor herbert. Ni, herbert, looking na' me k' wuh friendly uneasiness heh tauraya, complied, heh provis iyi shaking el'ru k' ish-veh, leralmin-tor, "i' du're fi' ish-veh oath, du fai-tor. Heh worla dva-tor me fi' t'nash-veh, kuv pip shan't tor wuh gentleman fi' du!" chapter xli. Svi' vain dang i attempt tor kethelvau wuh astonishment heh disquiet t' herbert, lu au heh i heh provis hayal-tor ne' fa' wuh yon, heh i recounted wuh bosh t' wuh tsat. Hiyet, ik vesht gla-tor nash-veh t'nash-veh sha' feelings haul-tor svi' herbert's limuk, heh ri least ekhlami, t'nash-veh repugnance na' wuh sasu vi had ovsoh ni mau na' me. Ra would sa'awek ma eku wuh dahsaya svi' ik sasu heh etek, kuv tra' had vesh' rai vath dividing circumstance, vesh' ish-veh triumph svi' t'nash-veh var. Saving ish-veh troublesome kash-ral t' having vesh' "neik" fi' veh occasion opi' ish-veh fun, fi' if sfek au began tor meskaraya forth tor herbert, wuh moment t'nash-veh revelation vesh' shahtau, au had rai pakashogaya t' wuh possibility t' t'nash-veh finding sovek lafot k' t'nash-veh rom fortune. Ish-veh boast ik au had tor me wuh gentleman, heh ik au had sarlah tor gla-tor me nenikaya wuh character fi' ish-veh ample resources, vesh' tor na' me ved u' mau u' na' himself. Heh ik ish-veh vesh' wuh highly agreeable boast tor fi' t' etek, heh ik etek bolau fi' nam-tor maut yaut t' ish-veh, vesh' wuh conclusion ved afer-tor svi' ish-veh sha' kashek. "hi, glazhau'ee la', pip's comrade, " au leralmin-tor tor herbert, po' having discoursed na' ein wak, "i fai-tor maut muhl ik wuh'wak opi' sarlah nash-veh backfor ulef wuh minutei've vesh' neik. I leralmin-tor tor pip, i knowed u' i had vesh' neik. Tonk'peh ri tor du fret yourself fi' ik nosahp. I ain't tor pip wuh gentleman, heh pip ain't wuh-going tor tor du wuh gentleman, ri ausachya me ri tor fai-tor ra's due tor ye fi'. Tal-kam sa-kan, heh pip's comrade, du dahkuh lau tum-tor fi-tor me kwon-hau-ov having wuh genteel muzzle fi'. Muzzled i ma vesh' opi' ik ulef wuh minute lu i vesh' pusvik-tor vi' lowness, muzzled i am na' wuh la' wak, muzzled i ek'wak dungi nam-tor." herbert leralmin-tor, "certainly, " tonk'peh glazhau u' kuv tra' vesh' rai specific consolation svi' nash, heh hafau perplexed heh dismayed. Etek vesh' anxious na' wuh wak lu au would hal-tor tor ish-veh lodging heh trasha etek teretuhr, tonk'peh au vesh' evidently kis-ka t' leaving etek teretuhr, heh hayal-tor tab-ma. Ish-veh vesh' midnight fa' i nem-tor ish-veh pauk tor essex yut, heh gla-tor ish-veh safely svi' na' ish-veh sha' gu'gelik svep. Lu ish-veh a'ing fi-tor ish-veh, i veshtau wuh wuh'rak moment t' vas i had fainu opi' wuh mu-yor t' ish-veh lashan. Worla ved elik s' wuh uneasy remembrance t' wuh sasu fi' wuh kaiden, i had kwon-hau-ov glazhau pa' me svi' taking t'nash-veh be'hai'la si' po' gu'gelik, heh svi' bringing ish-veh pla'; heh i glazhau pa' me i'. Rihagik u' ish-veh nam-tor svi' wuh suk kahr tor nan'woi wuh suspicion t' hasu glantau, lu wuh kashek nam-tor d'wonil t' tehvar svi' ik fudau, i kupi ri persuade myself ik sovek t' wuh sutra k'svi glan tun-tor pa' t'nash-veh dvun. Wuh zamu vi vesh' be' dvun-tor be' dvun-tor fi' ish-veh several yut, heh wuh yut vesh' herbosh lu i da-tor pla' vi' wuh temple. Kling had sasarlah na' wuh temep k' etek, kling went svi' na' wuh temep k' me. U' i tuhsau k' wuh mashulek, vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh lighted pla' krani looking ugelik heh hizhuk, heh, lu i lam-tor na' wuh zamu moments svi' wuh svep-sharu t' wuh kelek wilat i ha-tor, fa' going abru wuh kaiden, bah-ker kelek vesh' u' fam dvun heh lifeless u' wuh staircase vesh' lu i she-tor ish-veh. Herbert poprah me k' tu'ash kar, heh i had worla olau fa' ni blessedly ra ish-veh nam-tor ki' wuh t'hy'la. Lu au had spoken ein ralash zhit t' sympathy heh kastoraya, etek hayal-tor ne' tor panah-tor wuh deshker, ra vesh' tor nam-tor ovsoh? Wuh ku-san ik provis had occupied fam dvun remaining wilat ish-veh had lam-tor, na' au had wuh barrack yut k' ish-veh t' hanging pa' veh gla-tor, svi' veh unsettled manner, heh going k'fai veh pauk t' observances k' ish-veh mev heh ish-veh negro-patam heh ish-veh jackknife heh ish-veh sa'haf t' nop, heh ra ri, u' kuv ish-veh vesh' ek' shitau ne' na' ish-veh fi' wuh kitau-kov, i leralmin ish-veh ku-san remaining wilat ish-veh had lam-tor, herbert unconsciously nem-tor ish-veh, tonk'peh thurai moment palikau s' ish-veh, kwitau ish-veh maf, heh nem-tor wuh'ashiv. Au had rai occasion tor leralmin po' ik ik au had conceived wuh aversion na' t'nash-veh patron, neither had i occasion tor confess t'nash-veh sha'. Etek interchanged ik guhl'es rik' shaping wuh zhit-shaya. "ra, " leralmin-tor i tor herbert, lu au vesh' safe svi' wuh'ashiv ku-san, "ra nam-tor tor nam-tor ovsoh?" "t'nash-veh ri donku-tor tal-kam handel, " au kilko-tor, holding ish-veh patam, "i am nuh' kovtulik tor nah-tor." "ni vesh' i, herbert, lu wuh salur wuh'rak tevan-tor. Fam dvun, vel bolau nam-tor ovsoh. Au nam-tor intent fi-tor vuhnauk uzh kodona, jarel, heh carriages, heh lavish appearances t' ek' ves. Au bolau nam-tor pehkau somehow." "du tvai ik du mokuhlek't nar-tor" "uf mokuhlek i?" i interposed, u' herbert svizh-tor. "nah-tor t' ish-veh! Glazhau na' ish-veh!" wuh shatipik ak'shem-hutau be' dvun-tor abru' fi' t' etek. "wi i am kwes wuh dreadful yeht'es nam-tor, herbert, ik au nam-tor attached tor me, strongly attached tor me. Vesh' tra' ek'wak such wuh buk!" "t'nash-veh ri donku-tor tal-kam handel, " herbert ashiv-tor. "yi, " leralmin-tor i, "po' ek', stopping pen la', worla taking wuh'ashiv qsu'lit s' ish-veh, nah-tor ra i owe ish-veh already! Yi va'ashiv: i am heavily svi' sa'akh, maut heavily na' me, vi ma i' rai gishat, heh i ma vesh' bred tor rai calling, heh i am nunau na' nothing." "muhl, muhl, muhl!" herbert remonstrated. "ri tor leralmin nunau na' nothing." "ra am i nunau na'? I fai-tor goh veh vel ik i am nunau na', heh ik nam-tor, tor hal-tor na' wuh ask'ersu. Heh i lau ma hal-tor, t'nash-veh tal-kam herbert, tonk'peh na' wuh prospect t' taking counsel k' ish-veh friendship heh affection." veling i shau ne' tra': heh veling herbert, mesakh seizing wuh lamekh grip t' t'nash-veh el'ru, pretended ri tor fai-tor ish-veh. "anyhow, t'nash-veh tal-kam handel, " leralmin-tor au presently, "soldiering skil-tor't tor. Kuv du vesh' tor renounce nash patronage heh aifa favours, i suppose du would tor ni k' ein faint rok t' veh gad repaying ra du ma already had. Ri maut karik, ik rok, kuv du went soldiering! Isha, ish-veh's absurd. Du would nam-tor infinitely weh-rom svi' clarriker's kelek, pi' u' ish-veh nam-tor. I am working abru na' wuh partnership, du fai-tor." ri donku-tor katravahsu! Au pi' suspected k' t'vi donku. "tonk'peh tra' nam-tor wuh'ashiv deshker, " leralmin-tor herbert. "nash nam-tor wuh ignorant, satalau sasu, vi has wu had veh teslau idea. Weht do ik, au seems tor me (i lau misjudge ish-veh) tor nam-tor wuh sasu t' wuh desperate heh kei character." "i fai-tor au nam-tor, " i fun-tor. "kal-tor me var-tor du ra evidence ki'gla-tor nash-veh t' ish-veh." heh i var-tor ish-veh ra i had ri mentioned svi' t'nash-veh narrative, t' ik snagel k' wuh vath convict. "gla-tor, yi, " leralmin-tor herbert; "nah-tor t' nash! Sarlah ish-veh la' na' wuh peril t' ish-veh ha'kiv, na' wuh realisation t' ish-veh teslau idea. Svi' wuh moment t' realisation, po' ek' ish-veh toil heh waiting, du tresahk wuh solektra s' ne' ish-veh ash'ya, vashau ish-veh idea, heh tor ish-veh nazh-tor worthless tor ish-veh. Tor gla-tor du nothing ik au lau tor, ne' wuh disappointment?" "ki'gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh, herbert, heh sahr-tor-tor t' ish-veh, ek'wak opi' wuh fatal mu-yor t' ish-veh lashan. Nothing has vesh' svi' t'nash-veh nahp ni distinctly u' ish-veh putting himself svi' wuh yut t' hasu taken." "yi du lau rely fi-tor ish-veh, " leralmin-tor herbert, "ik tra' would nam-tor lo'uk tehvar t' ish-veh doing ish-veh. Ik nam-tor ish-veh tepul abru' du u' wu u' au hafau svi' england, heh ik would nam-tor ish-veh reckless rivak kuv du forsook ish-veh." i vesh' ni kwul-tor k' wuh horror t' nash idea, if had rasathau fi-tor me s' wuh wuh'rak, heh wuh working s' if would tor me fudau myself, svi' ein wihfelau, u' ish-veh murderer, ik i kupi ri shom svi' t'nash-veh ku-san, tonk'peh began pacing tor heh fro. I leralmin-tor tor herbert, meanwhile, ik kauk kuv provis vesh' naglanshau heh taken, svi' spite t' himself, i dang nam-tor wretched u' wuh aishan, however innocently. Ha; kauk hi i vesh' ni wretched svi' having ish-veh na' suk heh be' me, heh kauk hi i would irak rather ma ar'kada na' wuh zhuk-fasek ek' wuh gad t' t'nash-veh ha'kiv do i would ek'wak ma sarlah tor nash! Tonk'peh tra' vesh' rai staving ska' wuh deshker, ra vesh' tor nam-tor ovsoh? "wuh wuh'rak heh wuh nen vel tor nam-tor ovsoh, " leralmin-tor herbert, "nam-tor tor prah ish-veh s' england. Du dungi ma tor hal-tor k' ish-veh, heh yi au lau nam-tor vimevilau tor hal-tor." "tonk'peh prah ish-veh wilat i dungi, sos prevent ish-veh coming pla'?" "t'nash-veh rom handel, nam-tor ish-veh ri obvious ik k' newgate svi' wuh thurai yut, tra' bolau nam-tor irak greater hazard svi' ish-veh breaking ish-veh kashek tor ish-veh heh tor ish-veh reckless, la', do kitok-wilat? Kuv wuh pretext tor prah ish-veh maf kupi nam-tor tor s' ik vath convict, il s' sovek-vel else svi' ish-veh ha'kiv, i'." "tra', va'ashiv!" leralmin-tor i, stopping fa' herbert, k' t'nash-veh tu'ash el'ru meskarau si', u' kuv au tuhlau wuh desperation t' wuh nuf. "i fai-tor nothing t' ish-veh ha'kiv. Ish-veh has siyah tor me mad tor hayal-tor la' t' wuh mu-yor heh gla-tor ish-veh fa' me, ni bound abru k' t'nash-veh fortunes heh misfortunes, heh wi ni ri-fainu tor me, kaula u' wuh miserable wretch vi terrified me dahkuh gad svi' t'nash-veh kan-wak!" herbert prah abru, heh punaf-tor ish-veh kar svi' t'nash-veh, heh etek slowly lates-tor tor heh fro teretuhr, studying wuh la'y. "handel, " leralmin-tor herbert, stopping, "du olau convinced ik du mokuhlek nem-tor rai further rufai s' ish-veh; tor du?" "fully. Surely du would, nuh', kuv du vesh' svi' t'nash-veh shi?" "heh du olau convinced ik du bolau shaya k' ish-veh?" "herbert, mokuhlek du ya'akash me?" "heh du ma, heh nam-tor bound ki', ik tenderness na' wuh ha'kiv au has risked fi' ish-veh khrosahp, ik du bolau korsau ish-veh, kuv tor-yehat, s' throwing ish-veh maf. Yi du bolau prah ish-veh s' england fa' du stir wuh ozh tor extricate yourself. Ik ovsoh, extricate yourself, svi' sha-ka-ri's ahm, heh etek'll gla-tor ish-veh si' teretuhr, tal-kam hinek sa-kan." ish-veh vesh' wuh comfort tor hutau el'ru fi-tor ish-veh, heh lates abru heh ne' va'ashiv, k' goh ik ovsoh. "i', herbert, " leralmin-tor i, "k' dzhinaya tor gaining ein fai-tukh t' ish-veh vesht-var. Tra' nam-tor tonk'peh veh yut ik i fai-tor t'. I bolau ya'akash ish-veh sfek blank." "ha. Ya'akash ish-veh, " leralmin-tor herbert, "lu etek hayal-tor na' asal-yem svi' wuh asal." na' au had leralmin-tor, fi' taking trasha t' herbert, ik au would sarlah tor asal-yem k' etek. K' nash ar'tu shidau, etek went tor sar-tak. I had wuh wildest sahr-tor-tor fundik ish-veh, heh woke unrefreshed; i woke, nuh', tor recover wuh pthak if i had pakik svi' wuh mu-yor, t' ish-veh hasu afer-tor si' u' wuh fun-tor ifis-hali. Waking, i worla pakik ik pthak. Sarlah ish-veh pauk na' wuh kru'minaakh wak, nem-tor si' ish-veh jackknife, heh hayal-tor ne' tor ish-veh yem. Au vesh' bosh t' dotoran "na' ish-veh gentleman's coming si' karik, heh spo' wuh gentleman, " heh urged me tor palikau speedily fi-tor wuh abru'lik-dunap if au had losrak svi' t'nash-veh mat. Au panah-tor wuh tvi-shal heh ish-veh sha' lodging u' rikwonik residences, heh na'shikhau me tor glazhau si' na' wuh'wak na' wuh "fashionable crib" be' hyde shi'sochya, svi' if au kupi ma "wuh hutau-ne'." lu au had tor wuh shaht t' ish-veh asal-yem, heh vesh' psethau ish-veh lipau fi' ish-veh mal, i leralmin-tor tor ish-veh, rik' wuh zhit t' preface, "po' du vesh' hal-tor kim-shah mu-yor, i var-tor t'nash-veh t'hy'la t' wuh struggle ik wuh ask'ersu afer-tor du engaged svi' fi' wuh masu-kastra, lu sarlah etek abru. Du vokau?" "vokau!" leralmin-tor au. "i nah-tor ni!" "etek aitlun tor fai-tor vel pa' ik manand pa' du. Ish-veh nam-tor flekh tor fai-tor rai weht pa' either, heh wa' du, do i vesh' kup tor var-tor kim-shah mu-yor. Nam-tor ri nash u' rom wuh wak u' wuh'ashiv na' etwel fai-tor weht?" "muhl!" au leralmin-tor, po' consideration. "du're fi' ish-veh oath, du fai-tor, pip's comrade?" "assuredly, " kilko-tor herbert. "u' tor sovek-vel i leralmin, du fai-tor, " au insisted. "wuh oath applies tor ek'." "i ken-tor ish-veh tor tor ni." "heh glazhau'ee la'! Wotever i ovsoh nam-tor ar'kada si' heh vlitau na', " au insisted va'ashiv. "ni nam-tor ish-veh." au nem-tor si' ish-veh nesh-kur mev heh vesh' going tor boshaya ish-veh k' negro-patam, lu, looking na' wuh tangle t' tobacco svi' ish-veh el'ru, au seemed tor nah-tor ish-veh lau perplex wuh og-elakh t' ish-veh narrative. Au shitau ish-veh pla' va'ashiv, terpau ish-veh mev svi' wuh gonaf-razh t' ish-veh tor-pal, sak-tor wuh el'ru fi' tik mal-nef, heh po' turning wuh reshnek bezhun fi' wuh yon na' wuh zamu ralash-fam moments, glazhau pauk na' etek heh leralmin-tor ra zahal-tor. Chapter xlii. "tal-kam sa-kan heh pip's comrade. I am ri wuh-going ausachya tor var-tor du t'nash-veh ha'kiv spo' wuh song, il wuh var-dunap. Tonk'peh tor mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh du pen heh handy, i'll shitau ish-veh na' wuh'wak vi' wuh mouthful t' eingelsu. Svi' potau-tvi-shal heh s' potau-tvi-shal, svi' potau-tvi-shal heh s' potau-tvi-shal, svi' potau-tvi-shal heh s' potau-tvi-shal. Tra', du've prah ish-veh. Ik's t'nash-veh ha'kiv takov mau, ne' tor such wak u' i prah shipped ska', arter pip lam-tor t'nash-veh t'hy'la. "i've vesh' ovsoh kanok-vei tor, takov wellexcept geldau. I've vesh' klacha abru u' mau u' wuh haul-tukh theris-masu-kittle. I've vesh' carted la' heh carted tra', heh shitau s' nash kahr, heh shitau s' ik kahr, heh terpau svi' wuh fek, heh whipped heh worried heh drove. I've rai weht notion wilat i vesh' pukeshta do du haveif ni mau. I wuh'rak shetau aware t' myself ne' svi' essex, wuh thieving turnips na' t'nash-veh living. Summun had sahr-tor maf s' mea mana tinkerand au'd nem-tor wuh yon k' ish-veh, heh losrak me wery samu. "i fai-tor'd t'nash-veh ahm tor nam-tor magwitch, chrisen'd abel. Uf did i fai-tor ish-veh? Mau u' i fai-tor'd wuh kushel' ahm svi' wuh labah tor nam-tor chaffinch, sparrer, thrush. I lau ma nahp ish-veh vesh' ek' ti teretuhr, goh u' wuh kushel' ahm sasarlah yeht, i supposed t'nash-veh did. "ni ausachya u' i kupi talal, tra' vikau't wuh soul ik gla-tor nu'ri abel magwitch, k' etek pi' fi' ish-veh u' svi' ish-veh, tonk'peh wot kum-tor kolthak na' ish-veh, heh either drove ish-veh ska', il nem-tor ish-veh abru. I vesh' nem-tor abru, nem-tor abru, nem-tor abru, tor ik sadvun ik i reg'larly tor'ovau'd abru nem-tor abru. "nash nam-tor wuh yut ish-veh vesh', ik lu i vesh' wuh ragged pi' creetur u' mau tor nam-tor pitied u' ek'wak gla-tor nash-veh (ri ik i glazhau svi' wuh makh, na' tra' vikau't wehk insides t' furnished kelek fainu tor me), i prah wuh ahm t' hasu hardened. 'nash nam-tor wuh terrible hardened veh, ' au leralmin-tor tor prison wisitors, picking si' me. 'lau nam-tor leralmin-tor tor ha-tor svi' jails, nash sa-kan.' yi au glazhau na' me, heh i glazhau na' au, heh au thon-tor t'nash-veh patam, ein fi' 'em, au had weh-rom wuh thon-tor t'nash-veh skaun-sa'haf, heh vath fi' 'em giv me ek'ur ra i couldn't telv-tor, heh tor me starun ra i couldn't ken-tor. Au kwon-hau-ov went fi' agen me pa' wuh e'shua. Tonk'peh ra wuh e'shua vesh' i tor tor? I bolau shitau vel vi' t'nash-veh skaun-sa'haf, mustn't i?howsomever, i'm wuh getting neik, heh i fai-tor ra's due. Tal-kam sa-kan heh pip's comrade, ri tor du nam-tor afeerd t' me hasu neik. "tramping, begging, thieving, working sometimes lu i kupi, hi ik vikau't u' k'ashiv u' du lau nah-tor, till du shitau wuh deshker whether du would ha' vesh' abru'-pok tor mazhiv-kur-tor me ar'kadan yourselves, wuh zeshau t' wuh poacher, wuh zeshau t' wuh labourer, wuh zeshau t' wuh wagoner, wuh zeshau t' wuh haymaker, wuh zeshau t' wuh hawker, wuh zeshau t' danik vel ik ri tor vlitau heh ras-tukh tor trouble, i prah tor nam-tor wuh sasu. Wuh deserting ask'ersu svi' wuh traveller's shom, ra ti ip-sut abru tor wuh chin ne' wuh lot t' taturs, oren-tor me tor telv-tor; heh wuh travelling masuk'veh ra signed ish-veh ahm na' wuh qsu'lit wuh wak oren-tor me tor kitau. I vikau't klacha abru u' k'ashiv i' u' formerly, tonk'peh i sai-vel-tor si' t'nash-veh rom thresh t' tal-muv-mokev fam dvun. "na' epsom ne-koshtri, wuh tukh t' abru' dah-leh tevun ago, i prah acquainted wi' wuh sasu t'vi grat i'd treshaya wi' nash poker, spo' wuh spahk t' wuh lobster, kuv i'd prah ish-veh fi' nash hob. Ish-veh gas'rak ahm vesh' compeyson; heh ik's wuh sasu, tal-kam sa-kan, ra gla-tor du me wuh pounding svi' wuh razh, fupa s' ra du truly var-tor ish-veh comrade arter i vesh' hal-tor kim-shah mu-yor. "au eku abru ausachya wuh gentleman, nash compeyson, heh au'd vesh' tor wuh tsuri boarding-shi'oren heh had learning. Au vesh' wuh mos veh tor variben, heh vesh' wuh dab na' wuh yut t' gentlefolks. Au vesh' rom-looking nuh'. Ish-veh vesh' wuh mu-yor afore wuh lo'uk ne-koshtri, lu i afer-tor ish-veh fi' wuh heath, svi' wuh booth ik i fai-tor'd fi'. Ish-veh heh ein weht vesh' wuh sitting among wuh pasu lu i went svi', heh wuh landlord (if had wuh fai-tukh t' me, heh vesh' wuh sporting veh) puvutau ish-veh si', heh leralmin-tor, 'i nah-tor nash nam-tor wuh sasu ik lau saikhut du, 'meaning i vesh'. "compeyson, au glazhau na' me maut noticing, heh i glazhau na' ish-veh. Au has wuh glantau heh wuh naf-elakh heh wuh mokov heh wuh thasek-pin heh wuh handsome saikhut t' sai-vel. "'tor judge s' appearances, du're s' kunli, ' leralmin-tor compeyson tor me. "'ha, trensu, heh i've worla vesh' svi' ish-veh mau.' (i had sasarlah t' kingston potau-tvi-shal kim-shah fi' wuh vagrancy committal. Ri tonk'peh ra ish-veh lau ma vesh' na' vel else; tonk'peh ish-veh vikau't.) "'kunli rubai, ' leralmin-tor compeyson; 'sos'eh ish-veh nam-tor going tor rubah.' "i leralmin-tor, 'i rok ish-veh lau nam-tor ni. Tra''s tvi-shal.' "'ra mokuhlek du tor?' leralmin-tor compeyson. "'yokul heh mon, ' i leralmin-tor; 'kuv du'll talal wuh tukh.' "compeyson abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor, glazhau na' me va'ashiv maut noticing, giv me kaukuh shillings, heh kru'minaakh me na' thurai mu-yor. Ka shi. "i went tor compeyson thurai mu-yor, ka shi, heh compeyson nem-tor me fi' tor nam-tor ish-veh sasu heh pardner. Heh ra vesh' compeyson's business svi' if etek vesh' tor hal-tor pardners? Compeyson's business vesh' wuh swindling, handwriting forging, stolen kutra-pitoh be' dvun-tor, heh such-spo'. Ek' wihfelau t' pash-tor u' compeyson kupi eku k' ish-veh patam, heh potau ish-veh sha' mal s' heh prah wuh pinkaunu s' heh kal-tor wuh'ashiv sasu svi' na', vesh' compeyson's business. Au'd rai weht khaf-spol do wuh shek-tukh deik, au vesh' u' samu u' tevakh, heh au had wuh patam t' wuh e'shua afore mentioned. "tra' vesh' wuh'ashiv svi' k' compeyson, u' vesh' puvutau arthur, ri u' hasu ni chrisen'd, tonk'peh u' wuh surname. Au vesh' svi' wuh decline, heh vesh' wuh duv tor glazhau na'. Ish-veh heh compeyson had vesh' svi' wuh rasahkos vel k' wuh don-ka t'sai ein tevun afore, heh au'd tor wuh sunil t' donku k' ish-veh; tonk'peh compeyson sihau heh gamed, heh au'd ma sahr-tor k'fai wuh sa-te'kru's taxes. Ni, arthur vesh' wuh dying, heh wuh dying ri donku-tor heh k' wuh horrors fi' ish-veh, heh compeyson's ko-telsu (if compeyson kicked mostly) vesh' wuh having pity fi' ish-veh lu she kupi, heh compeyson vesh' wuh having pity fi' nothing heh kling. "i lau wuh nem-tor warning k' arthur, tonk'peh i didn't; heh i skil-tor't pretend i vesh' partick'lerfor wilat 'ud nam-tor wuh rom fi' ish-veh, tal-kam sa-kan heh comrade? Ni i palikau wi' compeyson, heh wuh ri donku-tor raul i vesh' svi' ish-veh el'ru. Arthur ha-tor na' wuh fik t' compeyson's kelek (abru' nigh brentford ish-veh vesh'), heh compeyson potau wuh tun-bosh khrosahp agen ish-veh na' dohn heh lodging, svi' nuf au dang ek'wak prah weh-rom tor ar'kadan ish-veh si'. Tonk'peh arthur ak settled wuh khrosahp. Wuh dahr il wuh wak u' ek'wak gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh, au sarlah wuh tearing ne' vi' compeyson's parlour tab-ma na' mu-yor, svi' goh wuh flannel gown, k' ish-veh isachya ek' svi' wuh wadashaya, heh au leralmin-tor tor compeyson's ko-telsu, 'sally, she really nam-tor upstairs alonger me, i', heh i mokuhlek't prah rid t' ish-veh. She's ek' svi' wan-kur, ' au leralmin-tor, 'wi' wan-kur svai svi' ish-veh isachya, heh she's awful mad, heh she's prah wuh shroud hanging abru' ish-veh kar, heh she leralmin-tor she'll shitau ish-veh fi' me na' kaukuh svi' wuh asal.' "leralmin-tor compeyson: 'po, du duhsu, ri tor du fai-tor she's prah wuh living ak'shem? Heh uf dang she nam-tor abru tra', rik' coming k'fai wuh svep, il svi' na' wuh krani, heh abru wuh kaiden?' "'i ri tor fai-tor uf she's tra', ' leralmin-tor arthur, shivering dreadful k' wuh horrors, 'tonk'peh she's standing svi' wuh teruk na' wuh ash'ya t' wuh sar-tak, awful mad. Heh abru' wilat ish-veh khaf-spol's brokeyou shau ish-veh!tra''s eku-tor t' khaf.' "compeyson stariben hardy, tonk'peh au vesh' kwon-hau-ov wuh coward. 'hal-tor abru alonger nash drivelling has-bosh sasu, ' au leralmin-tor tor ish-veh ko-telsu, 'heh magwitch, lend ish-veh wuh el'ru, dungi du?' tonk'peh au worla sarlah nigh himself. "compeyson's ko-telsu heh me nem-tor ish-veh abru tor sar-tak agen, heh au raved danik dreadful. 'po glazhau na' ish-veh!' au lit'dhae. 'she's wuh shaking wuh shroud na' me! Ri tor gla-tor du ish-veh? Glazhau na' ish-veh bezhun! Ain't ish-veh awful tor gla-tor ish-veh ni mad?' thurai au maf-tor, 'she'll shitau ish-veh fi' me, heh yi i'm ovsoh na'! Nem-tor ish-veh maf s' ish-veh, nem-tor ish-veh maf!' heh yi au catched meskaraya t' etek, heh kep fi' wuh talking tor ish-veh, heh answering t' ish-veh, till i ulef pudva-tor gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh myself. "compeyson's ko-telsu, hasu nam-tor-tor tor ish-veh, giv ish-veh ein liquor tor prah wuh horrors ska', heh k' heh k' au quieted. 'o, she's hal-tor! Has ish-veh keeper vesh' na' ish-veh?' au leralmin-tor. 'ha, ' leralmin-tor compeyson's ko-telsu. 'did du var-tor ish-veh tor klachek ish-veh heh mofek ish-veh svi'?' 'ha.' 'heh tor nem-tor ik watosh vel maf s' ish-veh?' 'ha, ha, ek' gas'rak.' 'du're wuh rom creetur, ' au leralmin-tor, 'ri tor trasha me, whatever du tor, heh nemaiyo!' "au shom-tor takov hizhuk till ish-veh lau aitlun wuh zamu minutes t' kaukuh, heh yi au palikau abru k' wuh shei, heh shei si', 'la' she nam-tor! She's prah wuh shroud va'ashiv. She's unfolding ish-veh. She's coming s' wuh teruk. She's coming tor wuh sar-tak. Meskaraya me, fi' fi' youone t' tik sidedon't kal-tor ish-veh esta me k' ish-veh. Hah! She din-tor me ik wak. Ri tor kal-tor ish-veh lehm ish-veh abru' t'nash-veh tipan. Ri tor kal-tor ish-veh abertau me abru tor prah ish-veh pauk me. She's lifting me abru. Potau me ne'!' yi au abertau himself abru lerash, heh vesh' tevik. "compeyson nem-tor ish-veh hagik u' wuh rom riddance na' fi' vla. Ish-veh heh me vesh' ak toranik, heh wuh'rak au swore me (hasu ek'wak artful) fi' t'nash-veh sha' dunap, nash la' pi' nesh-kur dunap, tal-kam sa-kan, ra i swore ish-veh comrade fi'. "ri tor hal-tor vi' wuh vel ik compeyson dotoran, heh i donewhich 'ud nem-tor wuh weeki'll veling leralmin tor du, tal-kam sa-kan, heh pip's comrade, ik ik sasu prah me vi' such vis u' tor me ish-veh nesh-kur kafeh. I vesh' kwon-hau-ov svi' sa'akh tor ish-veh, kwon-hau-ov ne' ish-veh kaur-ozh, kwon-hau-ov wuh working, kwon-hau-ov wuh getting vi' tehvar. Au vesh' younger do me, tonk'peh au'd prah hali, heh au'd prah learning, heh au overmatched me kaukuh hundred wak var-tor heh rai mercy. T'nash-veh missis u' i had wuh lerash wak wi'pehkaya hi! I ain't katau ish-veh svi'" au glazhau pa' ish-veh svi' wuh confused yut, u' kuv au had pakik ish-veh shi svi' wuh dunap t' ish-veh remembrance; heh au da-tor ish-veh limuk tor wuh yon, heh sak-tor ish-veh el'ru broader fi' ish-veh mal-nef, heh abertau au ska' heh shitau au fi' va'ashiv. "tra' ain't rai bolaya tor hal-tor vi' ish-veh, " au leralmin-tor, looking pauk wuh'wak weht. "wuh wak wi' compeyson vesh' wuh'danik u' lerash wuh wak u' ek'wak i had; ik leralmin-tor, ek''s leralmin-tor. Did i var-tor du u' i vesh' ar'kada, sa'awek, na' misdemeanor, du' k' compeyson?" i kilko-tor, rai. "muhl!" au leralmin-tor, "i vesh', heh prah convicted. U' tor nem-tor abru fi' suspicion, ik vesh' dah'wak il rehkuh wak svi' wuh kehkuh il kaukuh tevun ik ish-veh palesh-tor; tonk'peh evidence vesh' wanting. Na' kim-shah, me heh compeyson vesh' fi' committed na' felony, fi' wuh falun t' putting stolen pitoh svi' da-kuvaya, heh tra' vesh' vath falun za'. Compeyson leralmin-tor tor me, 'dahshauk defences, rai sviribaya, ' heh ik vesh' ek'. Heh i vesh' ni miserable ri donku-tor, ik i makau ek' wuh sai-vel i had, kaula ra geldau fi' t'nash-veh pla', afore i kupi prah jaggers. "lu etek vesh' shitau svi' wuh kif, i pubeglanau wuh'rak t' ek' ra wuh gentleman compeyson glazhau, wi' ish-veh curly isachya heh ish-veh nesh-kur sai-vel heh ish-veh wan-kur abru'lik-handkercher, heh ra wuh tsuri wihfelau t' wuh wretch i glazhau. Lu wuh prosecution tu'ash heh wuh evidence vesh' shitau pen, aforehand, i pubeglanau uf ras ish-veh ek' spitau fi' me, heh uf ta'hal fi' ish-veh. Lu wuh evidence vesh' giv svi' wuh natuhn, i pubeglanau uf ish-veh vesh' kwon-hau-ov me ik had sarlah na''ard, heh kupi nam-tor swore tor, uf ish-veh vesh' kwon-hau-ov me ik wuh donku had vesh' vlitau tor, uf ish-veh vesh' kwon-hau-ov me ik had seemed tor ar'kadan wuh vel heh prah wuh pinkaunu. Tonk'peh lu wuh defence sarlah fi', yi gla-tor nash-veh wuh dotor plainer; na', leralmin-tor wuh counsellor na' compeyson, 't'nash-veh s'haile heh gentlemen, la' du has afore du, vla k' vla, dahkuh persons u' ish-veh bezhun mokuhlek dahshauk eik; veh, wuh younger, muhl katau abru, vi dungi nam-tor stariben tor u' such; veh, wuh tela'at, has-bosh katau abru, vi dungi nam-tor stariben tor u' such; veh, wuh younger, seldom kuv ek'wak gla-tor svi' aifa la' transactions, heh goh suspected; t'vath, wuh tela'at, kwon-hau-ov gla-tor svi' 'em heh kwon-hau-ov wi' ish-veh guilt katau ha-kel. Mokuhlek du vet, kuv tra' nam-tor tonk'peh veh svi' ish-veh, if nam-tor wuh veh, heh, kuv tra' nam-tor dahkuh svi' ish-veh, if nam-tor mau wuh rasahkos veh?' heh such-spo'. Heh lu ish-veh sarlah tor character, vikau't ish-veh compeyson u' had vesh' tor wuh shi'oren, heh vikau't ish-veh ish-veh schoolfellows u' vesh' svi' nash shul heh svi' ik, heh vikau't ish-veh ish-veh u' had vesh' fai-tor'd k' toglantausu svi' such muhd heh shila'es, heh nowt tor ish-veh disadvantage? Heh vikau't ish-veh me u' had vesh' ar'kada afore, heh u' had vesh' fai-tor'd abru kunel heh ne' dale svi' bridewells heh klachek-ups!
