Heh lu ish-veh sarlah tor starun-tor, vikau't ish-veh compeyson u' kupi stariben tor 'em wi' ish-veh limuk dropping kanok i' heh yi vi' ish-veh wan-kur abru'lik-handkercher, ah! Heh wi' zehl svi' ish-veh starun, nuh', heh vikau't ish-veh me u' kupi goh leralmin, 'gentlemen, nash sasu na' t'nash-veh vla nam-tor wuh danik taluhk rascal'? Heh lu wuh verdict sarlah, vikau't ish-veh compeyson u' vesh' recommended tor mercy fi' khrosahp t' rom character heh rasahkos apc'koik, heh giving abru ek' wuh ro'fori au kupi agen me, heh vikau't ish-veh me u' prah worla wuh zhit tonk'peh guilty? Heh lu i leralmin-tor tor compeyson, 'wuh'wak s' nash kelek, i'll smash ik limuk t' yourn!' ain't ish-veh compeyson u' prays wuh judge tor nam-tor protected, heh prah dahkuh turnkeys lam-tor betwixt etek? Heh lu etek're sentenced, ain't ish-veh ish-veh u' prah stehkuh tevun, heh me leh-keh, heh ain't ish-veh ish-veh u' wuh judge nam-tor sorry na', fai'ei au lau wuh ovsoh ni muhl, heh ain't ish-veh me u' wuh judge pakashogau tor nam-tor wuh hinek offender t' wiolent shaukaush, kesik tor sarlah tor weh-rasahkos?" au had ar'kada himself vi' wuh fupa s' t' lo'uk tepor'es, tonk'peh au rihamau ish-veh, nem-tor dahkuh il rehkuh pen esh, vitem-tor u' k'ashiv, heh stretching si' ish-veh el'ru na' me leralmin-tor, svi' wuh reassuring manner, "i ain't wuh-going tor nam-tor neik, tal-kam sa-kan!" au had ni falek-tor himself ik au nem-tor si' ish-veh handkerchief heh psethau ish-veh limuk heh patam heh talu heh el'ru, fa' au kupi hal-tor fi'. [illustration] "i had leralmin-tor tor compeyson ik i'd smash ik limuk t' ish-veh, heh i swore s'haile smash t'nash-veh! Tor tor ish-veh. Etek vesh' svi' wuh ka prison-hali, tonk'peh i couldn't prah na' ish-veh na' wu, hi i ar'kada. Na' kim-shah sarlah nash-veh za' ish-veh heh kwul ish-veh fi' wuh nak tor da-tor ish-veh pauk heh prah wuh smashing veh na' ish-veh, lu i vesh' gla-tor heh seized. Wuh nesh-kur-razh t' ik hali vikau't wuh karik veh, tor wuh judge t' nesh-kur-razh ik kupi mahal-tor heh taul. I stron-tor tor wuh gef, heh i vesh' wuh hiding among wuh shi'vukhut tra', envying au u' vesh' svi' 'em heh ek' abru', lu i wuh'rak gla-tor t'nash-veh sa-kan!" au fudau me k' wuh glazhau t' affection ik tor ish-veh siyah abhorrent tor me va'ashiv, hi i had olau lo'uk pity na' ish-veh. "k' t'nash-veh sa-kan, i vesh' giv tor ken-tor u' compeyson vesh' si' fi' au masu-kastra nuh'. Fi-tor t'nash-veh soul, i ulef dva-tor au stron-tor svi' ish-veh vash, tor prah quit t' me, ri fai-tor ish-veh vesh' me u' had prah ashore. I shi'kar ish-veh ne'. I smashed ish-veh limuk. 'heh i', ' leralmin-tor i 'u' wuh rasahkos vel i mokuhlek tor, caring nothing na' myself, i'll zaseshau du pla'.' heh i'd ma mahal-tor ska', towing ish-veh k' wuh isachya, kuv ish-veh had sarlah tor ik, heh i'd wuh prah ish-veh aboard rik' wuh ask'ersu. "veling au'd mau wuh buhfik t' ish-veh tor wuh kim-shah, ish-veh character vesh' ni rom. Au had stron-tor lu au vesh' tor ulef kwai k' me heh t'nash-veh murderous intentions; heh ish-veh taflaya vesh' ta'hal. I vesh' shitau svi' irons, katau tor trial va'ashiv, heh satau na' ha'kiv. I didn't pehkaya na' ha'kiv, tal-kam sa-kan heh pip's comrade, hasu la'." au psethau himself va'ashiv, u' au had ovsoh fa', heh yi slowly nem-tor ish-veh tangle t' tobacco s' ish-veh abru'lik, heh plucked ish-veh mev s' ish-veh gonaf-razh, heh slowly boshau ish-veh, heh began tor vuzh. "nam-tor au tevik?" i ya'akash, po' wuh silence. "nam-tor vi tevik, tal-kam sa-kan?" "compeyson." "au rok-tor i am, kuv au's alive, du lau nam-tor sure, " k' wuh kei glazhau. "i worla heerd rai weht t' ish-veh." herbert had vesh' kitaun k' ish-veh hish svi' wuh wein t' wuh dunap. Au softly kwitau wuh dunap abru' tor me, u' provis lam-tor smoking k' ish-veh bezhun fi' wuh yon, heh i telv-tor svi' ish-veh: "nu'ri havisham's ahm vesh' arthur. Compeyson nam-tor wuh sasu vi professed tor nam-tor din-tor havisham's lover." i ikap-tor wuh dunap heh nodded slightly tor herbert, heh shitau wuh dunap k'; tonk'peh etek neither t' etek leralmin-tor sovek-vel, heh fi' glazhau na' provis u' au lam-tor smoking k' wuh yon. Chapter xliii. Po dang i svizh tor ya'akash uf mau t' t'nash-veh shrinking s' provis lau nam-tor traced tor estella? Po dang i loiter fi' t'nash-veh fau-yut, tor tcok'at wuh fupa s' t' kashek svi' if i had ar'kada tor rid myself t' wuh kuraya t' wuh prison fa' latva ish-veh na' wuh coach-office, k' wuh fupa s' t' kashek svi' if i i' haul-tor fi' wuh gosh svi' estella svi' ish-veh pride heh vaksur, heh wuh fun-tor ifis-hali ik i harboured? Wuh fau-yut would nam-tor rim wuh smoother na' ish-veh, wuh shaht would nam-tor rim wuh weh-rom na' ish-veh, au would ri nam-tor gol-tor, il i extenuated. Wuh uzh pthak had vesh' engendered svi' t'nash-veh kashek k' ish-veh narrative; il rather, ish-veh narrative had putan-tor shid heh lof tor wuh pthak ik vesh' already tra'. Kuv compeyson vesh' alive heh dang discover ish-veh fun, i kupi hardly vet wuh consequence. Ik compeyson lam-tor svi' mortal pthak t' ish-veh, neither t' wuh dahkuh kupi fai-tor mau weh-rom do i; heh ik sovek such sasu u' ik sasu had vesh' kethelvau tor nam-tor would hesitate tor sadalaya himself na' rom s' wuh dreaded nemut k' wuh safe tvai t' becoming wuh informer vesh' scarcely tor nam-tor glenonau. Worla had i breathed, heh worla would i breatheor ni i resolveda zhit t' estella tor provis. Tonk'peh, i leralmin-tor tor herbert ik, fa' i kupi hal-tor abroad, i bolau gla-tor fi' estella heh din-tor havisham. Nash vesh' lu etek vesh' losrak sa'awek fi' wuh mu-yor t' wuh gad lu provis var-tor etek ish-veh var. I resolved tor hal-tor si' tor richmond thurai gad, heh i went. Fi' t'nash-veh presenting myself na' mrs. Brandley's, estella's maid vesh' puvutau tor var-tor ik estella had hal-tor vi' wuh shasol. Wilat? Tor satis kelek, u' tsuri. Ri u' tsuri, i leralmin-tor, na' she had worla wi hal-tor tra' rik' me; lu vesh' she coming pla'? Tra' vesh' wuh sov t' reservation svi' wuh kilko-srashiv if increased t'nash-veh perplexity, heh wuh kilko-srashiv vesh', ik ish-veh maid pudva-tor she vesh' goh coming pla' na' ek' na' wuh pi' du'. I kupi tor nothing t' nash, kaula ik ish-veh vesh' tvai ik i dang tor nothing t' ish-veh, heh i went ha-kel va'ashiv svi' ovsotik discomfiture. Wuh'ashiv mu-yor consultation k' herbert po' provis vesh' hal-tor ha-kel (i kwon-hau-ov nem-tor ish-veh ha-kel, heh kwon-hau-ov glazhau muhl pa' me), pufulag-tor etek tor wuh conclusion ik nothing dang nam-tor leralmin-tor pa' going abroad abi' vesht sarlah nash-veh pla' s' din-tor havisham's. Svi' wuh tvai wak, herbert heh i vesh' tor panah-tor separately ra ish-veh would nam-tor buhfik tor leralmin; whether etek dang devise sovek pretence t' hasu kwes ik au vesh' ne' suspicious glantaya; il whether i, vi had worla wi vesh' abroad, dang propose wuh expedition. Etek fi' fai-tor ik i had tonk'peh tor propose sovek-vel, heh au would consent. Etek sep-wafikh ik ish-veh remaining wehk gad svi' ish-veh la' hazard vesh' ri tor nam-tor nahp t'. Thurai gad i had wuh meanness tor vup-tor ik i vesh' ne' wuh binding ugaya tor hal-tor ne' tor joe; tonk'peh i vesh' capable t' siyah sovek meanness na' joe il ish-veh ahm. Provis vesh' tor nam-tor strictly tun-bosh du' i vesh' hal-tor, heh herbert vesh' tor nem-tor wuh falun t' ish-veh ik i had taken. I vesh' tor nam-tor tadek-adir goh veh mu-yor, heh, fi' t'nash-veh fun, wuh gratification t' ish-veh impatience na' t'nash-veh starting u' wuh gentleman fi' wuh greater wef vesh' tor nam-tor palikau. Ish-veh paresh-tor tor me yi, heh u' i afterwards afer-tor tor herbert isha, ik au lau nam-tor buhfik prah maf mes' wuh masu, fi' ik pretence, u', tor tor purchases, il wuh spo'. Having thus pa'shu wuh yut na' t'nash-veh expedition tor din-tor havisham's, i eku ska' k' wuh lehkuh-mal asal coach fa' ish-veh vesh' wi ta'hal, heh vesh' si' fi' wuh tu'ash shasol fau-yut lu wuh gad sarlah creeping fi', halting heh whimpering heh shivering, heh wrapped svi' patches t' wan heh a'cit t' mist, spo' wuh beggar. Lu etek drove abru tor wuh pla-kur boar po' wuh drizzly fau, ik dang gla-tor nash-veh sasarlah ne' wuh temep-sharu, toothpick svi' el'ru, tor glazhau na' wuh coach, tonk'peh bentley drummle! U' au pretended ri tor gla-tor me, i pretended ri tor gla-tor ish-veh. Ish-veh vesh' wuh maut lame pretence fi' fi' vla; wuh lamer, fai'ei etek fi' went vi' wuh mon-tvi-shal, wilat au had aishan shahtau ish-veh asal-yem, heh wilat i ordered t'nash-veh. Ish-veh vesh' poisonous tor me tor gla-tor ish-veh svi' wuh kahr, na' i maut muhl fai-tor po au had sarlah tra'. Pretending tor telv-tor wuh smeary newspaper wu s' kinuf, if had nothing ulef ni legible svi' its local ro'fori, u' wuh k'shatri tukh t' mon, sazh, aluk mun, gravy, klimtau butter, heh wine k' if ish-veh vesh' sprinkled ek' abru', u' kuv ish-veh had taken wuh measles svi' wuh highly ripakhaik shid, i hayal-tor na' t'nash-veh pasu du' au lam-tor fa' wuh yon. K' degrees ish-veh became wuh masuk' dash tor me ik au lam-tor fa' wuh yon. Heh i prah abru, satalau ki' t'nash-veh thresh t' ish-veh. I had tor shitau t'nash-veh el'ru za' ish-veh mal na' wuh poker lu i went abru tor wuh yon-sha'ti tor stir wuh yon, tonk'peh fam dvun pretended ri tor fai-tor ish-veh. "nam-tor nash wuh tresahk?" leralmin-tor mr. Drummle. "oh!" leralmin-tor i, poker svi' el'ru; "ish-veh's du, nam-tor ish-veh? Uf tor du tor? I vesh' wondering vi ish-veh vesh', vi potau wuh yon ska'." k' ik, i poked tremendously, heh having ovsoh ni, kastkau myself vla k' vla k' mr. Drummle, t'nash-veh tipan shai-wehkovau heh t'nash-veh pla' tor wuh yon. "du ma aishan sarlah ne'?" leralmin-tor mr. Drummle, rihkaya me wuh pi' maf k' ish-veh tipan. "ha, " leralmin-tor i, rihkaya ish-veh wuh pi' maf k' t'nash-veh tipan. "beastly shi, " leralmin-tor drummle. "ish-veh krus t' wuh shasol, i nah-tor?" "ha, " i assented. "i am var-tor ish-veh's maut spo' ish-veh shropshire." "ri svi' wuh least spo' ish-veh, " leralmin-tor drummle. La' mr. Drummle glazhau na' ish-veh kluf heh i glazhau na' t'nash-veh, heh yi mr. Drummle glazhau na' t'nash-veh kluf, heh i glazhau na' ish-veh. "ma du vesh' la' wu?" i ya'akash, satalau ri tor yield wuh inch t' wuh yon. "wu hiyet tor nam-tor zungor t' ish-veh, " fun-tor drummle, pretending tor luvaya, tonk'peh kaing satalau. "tor du stay la' wu?" "mokuhlek't leralmin, " kilko-tor mr. Drummle. "tor du?" "mokuhlek't leralmin, " leralmin-tor i. I olau la', k'fai wuh tingling svi' t'nash-veh khaf, ik kuv mr. Drummle's tipan had claimed wuh'ashiv isachya's breadth t' tvi-shal, i dang ma hutau ish-veh vi' wuh krani; kaing, ik kuv t'nash-veh sha' tipan had urged wuh kahwa claim, mr. Drummle would ma hutau me vi' wuh nearest natuhn. Au whistled wuh pi'. Ni did i. "suk ek'ur t' masu-kastra pa' la', i dva-tor?" leralmin-tor drummle. "ha. Ra t' ik?" leralmin-tor i. Mr. Drummle glazhau na' me, heh yi na' t'nash-veh kluf, heh yi leralmin-tor, "oh!" heh abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor. "nam-tor du amused, mr. Drummle?" "rai, " leralmin-tor au, "ri wa'. I am going si' na' wuh fau svi' wuh saddle. I tvai tor explore eifa masu-kastra na' amusement. Si'-t'-wuh-yut pi'kahr tra', au var-tor me. Curious pi' tsuri-housesand smithiesand ik. Waiter!" "ha, osu." "nam-tor ik jarel t' t'nash-veh pok?" "katau pauk tor wuh svep, osu." "i leralmin. Glazhau la', du osu. Wuh t'sai skil-tor't fau tor-gad; wuh igen-va skil-tor't tor." "maut rom, osu." "heh i ri tor aru-yokul, fai'ei i'm going tor aru-yokul na' wuh t'sai's." "maut rom, osu." yi, drummle glanced na' me, k' wuh insolent triumph fi' ish-veh lo'uk-jowled limuk ik tresahk me tor wuh khaf-spol, pasik u' au vesh', heh ni exasperated me, ik i olau vul-tor tor nem-tor ish-veh svi' t'nash-veh kar (u' wuh robber svi' wuh var-dunap nam-tor leralmin-tor ki' taken wuh hinek t'sai) heh ku-san ish-veh fi' wuh yon. Veh vel vesh' manifest tor fi' t' etek, heh ik vesh', ik abi' vas sarlah, neither t' etek kupi relinquish wuh yon. Tra' etek lam-tor, muhl shai-wehkovau abru fa' ish-veh, tipan tor tipan heh ash'ya tor ash'ya, k' etwel el'ru za' etek, ri budging wuh inch. Wuh jarel vesh' visible s'udish svi' wuh pi'sov-masu na' wuh svep, t'nash-veh asal-yem vesh' shitau fi' wuh pasu, drummle's vesh' pa'shu maf, wuh waiter invited me tor palikau, i nodded, etek fi' lam-tor etwel solektra. "ma du vesh' tor wuh pi'laptra opi'?" leralmin-tor drummle. "rai, " leralmin-tor i, "i had ved hiyet t' wuh kushel wuh kim-shah wak i vesh' tra'." "vesh' ik lu etek had wuh natyan t' opinion?" "ha, " i kilko-tor, maut shortly. "sarlah, sarlah! Au kal-tor du ska' easily hiyet, " sneered drummle. "du shouldn't ma pakik ish-veh temper." "mr. Drummle, " leralmin-tor i, "du nam-tor ri competent tor mazhiv-kur-tor na'shikh fi' ik subject. Lu i pak-tor t'nash-veh temper (ri ik i nafai-tor having ovsoh ni fi' ik occasion), i ri tor lehm bezhun-zaneshu." "i tor, " leralmin-tor drummle. Po' glancing na' ish-veh wuh'wak il dah'wak, svi' wuh increased fupa s' t' smouldering keimen'es, i leralmin-tor, "mr. Drummle, i did ri seek nash conversation, heh i ri tor nah-tor ish-veh wuh agreeable veh." "i am sure ish-veh's ri, " leralmin-tor au, superciliously abru' ish-veh tipan; "i ri tor nah-tor sovek-vel pa' ish-veh." "heh therefore, " i went fi', "k' ish-veh trasha, i dungi suggest ik etek meskaraya rai ves t' sviribaya svi' fa-wak." "ved t'nash-veh opinion, " leralmin-tor drummle, "heh ra i dang ma suggested myself, il donemore likelywithout suggesting. Tonk'peh ri tor pak-tor ish-veh temper. Haven't du pakik hiyet rik' ik?" "ra tor du tvai, osu?" "waiter!" leralmin-tor drummle, k' yut t' answering me. Wuh waiter reappeared. "glazhau la', du osu. Du ved ken-tor ik wuh nu'ri t'sai ri tor fau tor-gad, heh ik i aru-yokul na' wuh nu'ri t'sai's?" "ved ni, osu!" lu wuh waiter had olau t'nash-veh sahris-cooling teapot k' wuh ku t' ish-veh el'ru, heh had glazhau imploringly na' me, heh had hal-tor si', drummle, tun-bosh ri tor dvun wuh tipan thurai me, nem-tor wuh cigar s' ish-veh abru'lik heh zeshau wuh shaht ska', tonk'peh gluvau rai glat t' stirring. Choking heh boiling u' i vesh', i olau ik etek kupi ri hal-tor wuh zhit further, rik' introducing estella's ahm, if i kupi ri palesh-tor tor zhu-tor ish-veh utter; heh therefore i glazhau stonily na' wuh mesyutik temok, u' kuv tra' vesh' kling la', heh punekwitau myself tor silence. Uf wu etek lau ma hafau svi' nash ridiculous shul ish-veh nam-tor impossible tor leralmin, tonk'peh na' wuh incursion t' rehkuh smusma-tor farmerslaid fi' k' wuh waiter, i thinkwho sarlah vi' wuh mon-tvi-shal unbuttoning ish-veh lo'uk-tor-pal heh rubbing ish-veh el'ru, heh fa' ik, u' au vifalunau na' wuh yon, etek vesh' obliged tor mazhiv-kur-tor yut. Vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh k'fai wuh krani, seizing ish-veh jarel's mane, heh mounting svi' ish-veh blundering brutal manner, heh sidling heh backing maf. I nahp au vesh' hal-tor, lu sarlah ish-veh pla', calling na' wuh ta'hal na' wuh cigar svi' ish-veh ru'lut, if au had yen-tor. Wuh sasu svi' wuh grazhiv-kur-tor sai-vel saudau k' ra vesh' aitlu, i kupi ri ma leralmin-tor s' wilat: whether s' wuh ha-shal ker, il wuh yut, il wilat ri, heh u' drummle gal-tor ne' s' wuh saddle heh lighted ish-veh cigar heh abru'teruklar-ru'lut-tor, k' wuh hutau t' ish-veh patam na' wuh mon-tvi-shal krani, wuh slouching tipan heh ragged isachya t' nash sasu t'vi pla' vesh' na' me reminded me t' orlick. Nuh' heavily s' wihfelau tor tun mau na' wuh wak whether ish-veh vesh' au il rai, il po' ek' tor esta wuh asal-yem, i pu-tor wuh igen-va heh wuh halovaya s' t'nash-veh limuk heh el'ru, heh went si' tor wuh memorable hinek kelek ik ish-veh would ma vesh' ni mau wuh weh-rom na' me worla ki' svi-tor, worla ki' gla-tor. Chapter xliv. Svi' wuh tvi-shal wilat wuh sai-vel-tor-pasu lam-tor, heh wilat wuh wax-ha'fek yontau fi' wuh temok, i afer-tor din-tor havisham heh estella; din-tor havisham hayal-tor fi' wuh settee be' wuh yon, heh estella fi' wuh an'kar na' ish-veh ash'ya. Estella vesh' knitting, heh din-tor havisham vesh' looking fi'. Au fi' ashenau ish-veh bezhun u' i went svi', heh fi' gla-tor wuh alteration svi' me. I derived ik, s' wuh glazhau au interchanged. "heh ra salan, " leralmin-tor din-tor havisham, "salur du la', pip?" hi she glazhau steadily na' me, vesht gla-tor nash-veh ik she vesh' rather confused. Estella, pausing wuh moment svi' ish-veh knitting k' ish-veh bezhun fi-tor me, heh yi going fi', i fancied ik i telv-tor svi' wuh torai t' ish-veh ozh, u' plainly u' kuv she had var-tor me svi' wuh dumb alphabet, ik she pakashogau i had discovered t'nash-veh yeht benefactor. "din-tor havisham, " leralmin-tor i, "i went tor richmond za-gad, tor stariben tor estella; heh finding ik ein salan had blown ish-veh la', i zahal-tor." din-tor havisham motioning tor me na' wuh wuh il fourth wak tor hayal-tor ne', i nem-tor wuh ku-san k' wuh sai-vel-tor-pasu, if i had k'ashiv gla-tor ish-veh occupy. K' ek' ik ruin na' t'nash-veh ash'ya heh pa' me, ish-veh seemed wuh malatik shi na' me, ik gad. "ra i had tor leralmin tor estella, din-tor havisham, i dungi leralmin fa' du, presentlyin wuh zamu moments. Ish-veh dungi ri ak'wikmun du, ish-veh dungi ri displease du. I am u' unhappy u' du mokuhlek ek'wak ma tvai me tor nam-tor." din-tor havisham fator tor glazhau steadily na' me. Kupi gla-tor nash-veh svi' wuh torai t' estella's ozh u' au ar'kada ik she attended tor ra i leralmin-tor; tonk'peh she did ri glazhau abru. "i ma afer-tor si' vi t'nash-veh patron nam-tor. Ish-veh nam-tor ri wuh fortunate discovery, heh nam-tor ri kesik ek'wak tor tvidon-tor me svi' reputation, wurzel, fortune, sovek-vel. Tra' nam-tor utvau po i bolau leralmin rai weht t' ik. Ish-veh nam-tor ri t'nash-veh tsat, tonk'peh wuh'ashiv's." u' i vesh' ralash-fam na' wuh du', looking na' estella heh panahik uf tor hal-tor fi', din-tor havisham ashiv-tor, "ish-veh nam-tor ri ish-veh tsat, tonk'peh wuh'ashiv's. Muhl?" "lu du wuh'rak aisha me tor nam-tor katau la', din-tor havisham, lu i belonged tor wuh pi'kahr abru' yonder, ik i istaya i had worla losrak, i suppose i did really sarlah la', u' sovek vath pavesh sa-kan lau ma sarlah, u' wuh ves t' dvinsu, tor gratify wuh aitlun il wuh whim, heh tor nam-tor vlitau na' ish-veh?" "ay, pip, " kilko-tor din-tor havisham, steadily nodding ish-veh patam; "du did." "heh ik mr. Jaggers" "mr. Jaggers, " leralmin-tor din-tor havisham, taking me abru svi' wuh pesik molu, "had nothing tor tor k' ish-veh, heh fai-tor nothing t' ish-veh. Ish-veh hasu t'nash-veh lawyer, heh ish-veh hasu wuh lawyer t' ish-veh patron nam-tor wuh coincidence. Au meskarau wuh ka relation na' su'etek t' sutra, heh ish-veh lau easily arise. Nam-tor ik u' ish-veh lau, ish-veh did arise, heh vesh' ri katau pa' k' sovek veh." sovek veh lau ma gla-tor svi' ish-veh haggard limuk ik tra' vesh' rai nelaya il savlaya ni irak. "tonk'peh lu i tevan-tor vi' wuh lafosh i ma ni wu hafau svi', k'puu du pufulag-tor me fi'?" leralmin-tor i. "ha, " she fun-tor, va'ashiv nodding steadily, "i kal-tor du hal-tor fi'." "vesh' ik ves?" "vi am i, " maf-tor din-tor havisham, striking ish-veh terpau fi-tor wuh lan-tol heh flashing vi' wrath ni suddenly ik estella glanced abru na' ish-veh svi' ak'wikmun, "vi am i, na' oekon's sake, ik i dang nam-tor ves?" ish-veh vesh' wuh kobat complaint ki' tor, heh i had ri tvai tor tor ish-veh. I var-tor ish-veh ni, u' she hayal-tor brooding po' nash outburst. "muhl, muhl, muhl!" she leralmin-tor. "ra else?" "i vesh' liberally vlitau na' t'nash-veh hinek attendance la', " i leralmin-tor, tor soothe ish-veh, "svi' hasu apprenticed, heh i ma ya'akash aifa deshkau goh na' t'nash-veh sha' ro'fori. Ra zahal-tor has wuh'ashiv (heh i rok weht disinterested) lof. Svi' humouring t'nash-veh lafosh, din-tor havisham, du punishedpractised onperhaps du dungi tanilau whatever zhil sagluvau ish-veh intention, rik' offenceyour shal-seeking relations?" "i did. Po, au would ma ish-veh ni! Ni would du. Ra has vesh' t'nash-veh vesht-var, ik i dang nam-tor na' wuh kusut-tor t' entreating either au il du ri ki' ish-veh ni! Du tor ish-veh sha' snares. I worla tor au." waiting abi' she vesh' hizhuk va'ashiv, na' nash, nuh', kahai s' ish-veh svi' wuh kwai heh sudden yut, i went fi'. "i ma vesh' lehm-tor among veh skan t' ish-veh relations, din-tor havisham, heh ma vesh' constantly ekhlami opi' i went tor london. I fai-tor au ki' vesh' u' honestly ne' t'nash-veh plokh u' i myself. Heh i dang nam-tor riyeht heh nen kuv i did ri var-tor du, whether ish-veh nam-tor acceptable tor du il rai, heh whether du nam-tor vul-tor tor mazhiv-kur-tor credence tor ish-veh il rai, ik du deeply riyeht fi' mr. Matthew abru'lik heh ish-veh sa-fu herbert, kuv du suppose au tor nam-tor vathru do generous, abruvenik, tu'ash, heh incapable t' sovek-vel designing il tvai." "au nam-tor ish-veh t'hylara, " leralmin-tor din-tor havisham. "au tor themselves t'nash-veh t'hylara, " leralmin-tor i, "lu au supposed me tor ma superseded au; heh lu sarah abru'lik, din-tor georgiana, heh mistress camilla vesh' ri t'nash-veh t'hylara, i nah-tor." nash contrasting t' au k' wuh shom seemed, i vesh' glad tor gla-tor, tor tor au rom k' ish-veh. She glazhau na' me keenly na' wuh pi' du', heh yi leralmin-tor quietly, "ra tor du aitlun na' au?" "goh, " leralmin-tor i, "ik du would ri confound au k' wuh vath. Au lau nam-tor t' wuh ka khaf, tonk'peh, dva-tor me, au nam-tor ri t' wuh ka malat." fam dvun looking na' me keenly, din-tor havisham ashiv-tor, "ra tor du aitlun na' au?" "i am ri ni cunning, gla-tor du, " i leralmin-tor, svi' kilko-srashiv, d'wonil ik i reddened wuh pi', "u' ik i kupi ip-sut s' du, kauk kuv i aitlu, ik i tor aitlun vel. Din-tor havisham, kuv du would spare wuh donku tor tor t'nash-veh t'hy'la herbert wuh lasting dvin svi' ha'kiv, tonk'peh if s' wuh malat t' wuh nuf bolau nam-tor ovsoh rik' ish-veh fai-tukh, i kupi gluvaya du uf." "po bolau ish-veh nam-tor ovsoh rik' ish-veh fai-tukh?" she ya'akash, settling ish-veh el'ru fi-tor ish-veh terpau, ik she lau fudau me wuh weht attentively. "fai'ei, " leralmin-tor i, "i began wuh dvin myself, weht do dahkuh tevun ago, rik' ish-veh fai-tukh, heh i ri tor aitlun tor nam-tor pusvik-tor. Po i vravshau svi' t'nash-veh kup'es tor shaht ish-veh, i fam yehat danau. Ish-veh nam-tor wuh krus t' wuh tsat if nam-tor wuh'ashiv person's heh ri t'nash-veh." she gradually withdrew ish-veh bezhun s' me, heh da-tor au fi' wuh yon. Po' watching ish-veh na' ra saudau svi' wuh silence heh k' wuh ta'hal t' wuh slowly wasting ha'fek tor nam-tor wuh akarshif, she vesh' kastorilau k' wuh neshaya t' ein t' wuh yon-kur kastik-kov, heh glazhau na' me againat wuh'rak, vacantlythen, k' wuh gradually concentrating attention. Ek' nash wak estella knitted fi'. Lu din-tor havisham had teslau ish-veh attention fi' me, she leralmin-tor, speaking u' kuv tra' had vesh' rai lapse svi' etwel dialogue, "ra else?" "estella, " leralmin-tor i, turning tor ish-veh i', heh trying tor a'fic t'nash-veh trembling spes, "du fai-tor i ashaya du. Du fai-tor ik i ma ashau du wu heh dearly." she ashenau ish-veh bezhun tor t'nash-veh limuk, fi' hasu thus addressed, heh ish-veh ozh plied ish-veh ar'kadan, heh she glazhau na' me k' wuh unmoved countenance. Vesht gla-tor nash-veh ik din-tor havisham glanced s' me tor ish-veh, heh s' ish-veh tor me. "i dang ma leralmin-tor nash sooner, tonk'peh na' t'nash-veh wu lafosh. Ish-veh vimevilau me tor rok ik din-tor havisham tvai etek na' veh wuh'ashiv. Du' i nahp du kupi ri gol'nev yourself, u' ish-veh vesh', i refrained s' taran ish-veh. Tonk'peh i bolau leralmin ish-veh i'." preserving ish-veh unmoved countenance, heh k' ish-veh ozh fam dvun going, estella hutau ish-veh patam. "i fai-tor, " leralmin-tor i, svi' kilko-srashiv tor ik torai, "i fai-tor. I ma rai rok ik i dungau ek'wak vutau du t'nash-veh, estella. I am ignorant ra lau shetau t' me maut ak, uf ri donku-tor i lau nam-tor, il wilat i lau hal-tor. Fam dvun, i ashaya du. I ma ashau du ek'wak opi' i wuh'rak gla-tor du svi' nash kelek." looking na' me perfectly unmoved heh k' ish-veh ozh toranik, she hutau ish-veh patam va'ashiv. "ish-veh would ma vesh' pi-maat'rer svi' din-tor havisham, horribly pi-maat'rer, tor practise fi' wuh susceptibility t' wuh ri donku-tor sa-kan, heh tor torture me k'fai ek' aifa tevun k' wuh vain rok heh wuh idle pursuit, kuv she had haul-tor fi' wuh ne-seshan t' ra she did. Tonk'peh i nah-tor she did ri. I nah-tor ik, svi' wuh palesh t' ish-veh sha' trial, she forgot t'nash-veh, estella." vesht gla-tor nash-veh din-tor havisham shitau ish-veh el'ru tor ish-veh khaf-spol heh meskaraya ish-veh tra', u' she hayal-tor looking k' da-tor na' estella heh na' me. "ish-veh seems, " leralmin-tor estella, maut calmly, "ik tra' nam-tor sentiments, fancies, i ri tor fai-tor uf tor vutau au, if i am ri kup tor comprehend. Lu du leralmin du ashaya me, i fai-tor ra du tvai, u' wuh shid t' zhit; tonk'peh nothing weht. Du shi'yavekh nothing svi' t'nash-veh thasek, du esta nothing tra'. I ri tor palutunau ra du leralmin na' ek'. I ma ar'kada tor vikau du t' nash; i', ma i ri?" i leralmin-tor svi' wuh miserable manner, "ha." "ha. Tonk'peh du would ri nam-tor vikau, na' du nahp i did ri tvai ish-veh. I', did du ri nah-tor ni?" "i nahp heh rok-tor du kupi ri tvai ish-veh. Du, ni nu'ri, untried, heh vaksurik, estella! Surely ish-veh nam-tor ri svi' malat." "ish-veh nam-tor svi' t'nash-veh malat, " she fun-tor. Heh yi she hau, k' wuh hishel fi-tor wuh zhit, "ish-veh nam-tor svi' wuh malat shidau k'svi me. I tor wuh lo'uk natyan svi' du heh ek' vath sutra lu i leralmin ni mau. I mokuhlek tor rai weht." "nam-tor ish-veh ri yeht, " leralmin-tor i, "ik bentley drummle nam-tor svi' kahr la', heh pursuing du?" "ish-veh nam-tor ved yeht, " she kilko-tor, referring tor ish-veh k' wuh indifference t' utter contempt. "ik du kastorau ish-veh, heh fau si' k' ish-veh, heh ik au aru-yokul k' du nash maut gad?" she seemed wuh pi' ak'wikmun ik i dang fai-tor ish-veh, tonk'peh va'ashiv kilko-tor, "ved yeht." "du fam yehat ashaya ish-veh, estella!" ish-veh ozh pehkau na' wuh wuh'rak wak, u' she retorted rather angrily, "ra ma i var-tor du? Tor du fam dvun nah-tor, svi' spite t' ish-veh, ik i tor ri tvai ra i leralmin?" "du would worla marry ish-veh, estella?" she glazhau na' din-tor havisham, heh panah-tor na' wuh moment k' ish-veh ar'kadan svi' ish-veh el'ru. Yi she leralmin-tor, "po ri var-tor du wuh yeht'es? I am going tor nam-tor telik tor ish-veh." i eku-tor t'nash-veh limuk vi' t'nash-veh el'ru, tonk'peh vesh' kup tor tash myself weh-rom do i kupi ma gishu, panahik ra agony ish-veh mazhiv-kur-tor me tor zhu-tor ish-veh leralmin eifa zhit. Lu i ashenau t'nash-veh limuk va'ashiv, tra' vesh' such wuh ghastly glazhau fi-tor din-tor havisham's, ik ish-veh impressed me, kauk svi' t'nash-veh passionate brax heh tushat. "estella, dearest estella, ri tor kal-tor din-tor havisham ras-tukh du vi' nash fatal ash. Shitau me aside na' ek'wak, du ma ovsoh ni, i muhl fai-tor, tonk'peh bestow yourself fi' ein worthier person do drummle. Din-tor havisham mazhiv-kur-tor du tor ish-veh, u' wuh greatest slight heh dash ik kupi nam-tor ovsoh tor wuh wehk irak weh-rom sasu vi krol-tor du, heh tor wuh zamu vi truly ashaya du. Among eifa zamu tra' lau nam-tor veh vi ashau du kauk u' dearly, hi au has ri ashau du u' wu, u' i. Nem-tor ish-veh, heh i mokuhlek lesh ish-veh weh-rom, na' ish-veh sake!" t'nash-veh earnestness awoke wuh wonder svi' ish-veh ik seemed u' kuv ish-veh would ma vesh' estuhl k' utan'es, kuv she kupi ma rendered me na' ek' intelligible tor ish-veh sha' kashek. "i am going, " she leralmin-tor va'ashiv, svi' wuh gentler spes, "tor nam-tor telik tor ish-veh. Wuh preparations na' t'nash-veh kal'i'farr nam-tor tor, heh i dungau nam-tor telik ak. Po tor du injuriously ragtau wuh ahm t' t'nash-veh ko-mekh k' thanah? Ish-veh nam-tor t'nash-veh sha' bae'cok." "ish-veh sha' bae'cok, estella, tor fling yourself maf fi-tor wuh brute?" "fi' ik dang i fling myself maf?" she retorted, k' wuh abru'teruklar-ru'lut. "dang i fling myself maf fi-tor wuh sasu vi would wuh soonest olau (kuv sutra tor olau such vel) ik i nem-tor nothing tor ish-veh? Tra'! Ish-veh nam-tor ovsoh. I dungau tor muhl hiyet, heh ni dungi t'nash-veh sa-telsu. U' tor leading me vi' ra du vutau nash fatal ash, din-tor havisham would ma had me bek-tor, heh ri marry wi; tonk'peh i am zungor t' wuh ha'kiv i ma pufulag-tor, if has maut zamu sem-rik-tor na' me, heh i am willing hiyet tor rubah ish-veh. Leralmin rai weht. Etek dungau worla ken-tor tik vath." "such wuh tvai brute, such wuh stupid brute!" i urged, svi' despair. "ri tor nam-tor kwes t' t'nash-veh hasu wuh kudaya tor ish-veh, " leralmin-tor estella; "i dungau ri nam-tor ik. Sarlah! La' nam-tor t'nash-veh el'ru. Tor etek krus fi' nash, du visionary boyor sasu?" "o estella!" i kilko-tor, u' t'nash-veh sfith(-) bezhun-masu tevan-tor sahris fi' ish-veh el'ru, tor ra i would tor restrain au; "kauk kuv i hafau svi' england heh kupi meskaraya t'nash-veh patam abru k' wuh shom, uf kupi gla-tor nash-veh du drummle's ko-telsu?" "nonsense, " she fun-tor, "nonsense. Nash dungi be' dvun svi' rai wak." "worla, estella!" "du dungi prah me s' nahp svi' wuh wehk gad." "s' t'nash-veh nahp! Du nam-tor krus t' t'nash-veh nam, krus t' myself. Du ma vesh' svi' kanok zehl i ma ek'wak telv-tor opi' i wuh'rak sarlah la', wuh rough tsuri sa-kan t'vi ri donku-tor khaf-spol du wounded kauk yi. Du ma vesh' svi' kanok prospect i ma ek'wak gla-tor opi', fi' wuh pilash, fi' wuh masu-halovau t' wuh ships, fi' wuh masu-kastra, svi' wuh wan, svi' wuh ta'hal, svi' wuh mu'khlup'es, svi' wuh salan, svi' wuh lapan, svi' wuh masutra, svi' wuh yut. Du ma vesh' wuh embodiment t' kanok graceful fancy ik t'nash-veh kashek has ek'wak shetau acquainted k'. Wuh kov t' if wuh strongest london kelek nam-tor tor nam-tor ri weht yeht, il weht impossible tor nam-tor sa'dvun-tor k' ish-veh el'ru, do ish-veh la'es heh vi-yumuk ma vesh' tor me, tra' heh kanok-wilat, heh dungi nam-tor. Estella, tor wuh kim-shah wadan t' t'nash-veh ha'kiv, du fam yehat dvel-tor tonk'peh hafau krus t' t'nash-veh character, krus t' wuh pi' rom svi' me, krus t' wuh ek'rasah. Tonk'peh, svi' nash dahshaya, i katravahsu du goh k' wuh rom; heh i dungi faithfully meskaraya du tor ik kwon-hau-ov, na' du bolau ma ovsoh me irak weht rom do klau, kal-tor me olau i' ra nasik flakosh i lau. O oekon kudau du, oekon forgive du!" svi' ra prahk'es t' unhappiness i prah aifa pushau zhit s' myself, i ri tor fai-tor. Wuh rhapsody welled abru k'svi me, spo' khaf s' wuh inward skek, heh gushed si'. I meskarau ish-veh el'ru tor t'nash-veh bru-lar ein svizh-tor moments, heh ni i losrak ish-veh. Tonk'peh ek'wak afterwards, i vokau, heh ak afterwards k' stronger utvau, ik du' estella glazhau na' me goh k' incredulous wonder, wuh spectral khlop t' din-tor havisham, ish-veh el'ru fam dvun covering ish-veh khaf-spol, seemed ek' resolved vi' wuh ghastly nantaya t' pity heh remorse. Ek' ovsoh, ek' hal-tor! Ni mau vesh' ovsoh heh hal-tor, ik lu i went si' na' wuh temep, wuh ta'hal t' wuh gad seemed t' wuh darker kur do lu i went svi'. Na' wuh du', i ip-sut myself among ein lanes heh k'-yut, heh yi kwul-tor ska' tor lates ek' wuh yut tor london. Na', i had k' ik wak sarlah tor myself ni irak u' tor panah-tor ik i kupi ri hal-tor pla' tor wuh ha-shal heh gla-tor drummle tra'; ik i kupi ri lesh tor hayal-tor fi-tor wuh coach heh nam-tor spoken tor; ik i kupi tor nothing ulef ni rom na' myself u' zung-tor myself si'. Ish-veh vesh' vesht midnight lu i tuhsau london mesut. Pursuing wuh wonil intricacies t' wuh yut if na' ik wak palutunau na'tev'rak be' wuh middlesex gef t' wuh pilash, t'nash-veh readiest access tor wuh temple vesh' beyik wuh pilash-vla, k'fai whitefriars. I vesh' ri gishu till tor-morrow; tonk'peh i had t'nash-veh tal-muv, heh, kuv herbert vesh' hal-tor tor sar-tak, kupi prah tor sar-tak myself rik' disturbing ish-veh. U' ish-veh seldom pavesh-tor ik vesht sarlah nash-veh svi' na' ik whitefriars temep po' wuh temple vesh' a'ing, heh u' i vesh' maut muddy heh weary, i did ri nem-tor ish-veh has-bosh ik wuh mu-yor-porter linisau me k' mau attention u' au meskarau wuh temep wuh pi' yut tu'ash na' me tor be' dvun svi'. Tor gol'nev ish-veh vokaya i mentioned t'nash-veh ahm. "i vesh' ri ved sure, osu, tonk'peh i nahp ni. La''s wuh pitoh, osu. Wuh skladasu ik katau ish-veh, leralmin-tor would du nam-tor ni rom u' telv-tor ish-veh k' t'nash-veh makh-yonet?" [illustration] mau ak'wikmun k' wuh ya'akash, i nem-tor wuh pitoh. Ish-veh vesh' khartau tor philip pip, esquire, heh fi' wuh fik t' wuh superscription vesh' wuh zhit, "sanoi telv-tor nash, la'." i tu'ash ish-veh, wuh watchman holding abru ish-veh ta'hal, heh telv-tor svi'udish, svi' wemmick's kitaun, "ri tor hal-tor ha-kel." chapter xlv. Turning s' wuh temple temep u' ak u' i had telv-tor wuh warning, i tor wuh buhfik t' t'nash-veh yut tor halitra yut, heh tra' prah wuh tab-ma hackney chariot heh drove tor wuh hummums svi' covent bah-ker. Svi' eifa wak wuh sar-tak vesh' kwon-hau-ov tor nam-tor prah tra' na' sovek wadan t' wuh mu-yor, heh wuh chamberlain, letting me svi' na' ish-veh pok wicket, lighted wuh ha'fek thurai svi' zek fi' ish-veh nef, heh gluvau me zehik vi' wuh shi'yuk thurai svi' zek fi' ish-veh feim. Ish-veh vesh' wuh wihfelau t' vault fi' wuh solektra lan-tol na' wuh pla', k' wuh despotic stislak t' wuh kehkuh-lehk bedstead svi' ish-veh, straddling abru' wuh bosh shi, putting veh t' ish-veh arbitrary mal vi' wuh yon-sha'ti heh wuh'ashiv vi' wuh svep-sharu, heh squeezing wuh wretched pi' washing-lamok svi' ved wuh divinely righteous manner. U' i had ya'akash na' wuh mu-yor-ta'hal, wuh chamberlain had katau me svi', fa' au losrak me, wuh rom hinek constitutional rushlight t' eifa virtuous daysan vel spo' wuh tam'a t' wuh walking-cane, if instantly shau its pla' kuv ish-veh vesh' estuhl, if nothing kupi ek'wak nam-tor lighted na', heh if vesh' shitau svi' solitary confinement na' wuh lanet t' wuh pid zhai-tukh kispek, tilau k' pauk razh ik tor wuh staringly eik-kum'i nel-dath fi' wuh temok. Lu i had prah vi' sar-tak, heh ti tra' footsore, weary, heh wretched, i afer-tor ik i kupi rai weht ikap-tor t'nash-veh sha' bezhun do i kupi ikap-tor wuh bezhun t' nash duhik argus. Heh thus, svi' wuh gloom heh tevakh t' wuh mu-yor, etek nantau na' veh wuh'ashiv. Ra wuh doleful mu-yor! Uf anxious, uf dismal, uf wu! Tra' vesh' wuh inhospitable fnish-tor svi' wuh tvi-shal, t' samu soot heh fal grazhiv; heh, u' i glazhau abru vi' wuh teruk t' wuh tester abru' t'nash-veh patam, i nahp ra wuh su'etek t' pla-kur-mashek hash-tor s' wuh butchers', heh earwigs s' wuh mahr-kel, heh grubs s' wuh shasol, bolau nam-tor holding fi' abru tra', lying k' na' thurai belaar. Nash pufulag-tor me tor speculate whether sovek t' au ek'wak tumbled ne', heh yi i fancied ik i olau ta'hal tevan-tor fi' t'nash-veh limuk, wuh disagreeable da-tor t' nahp, suggesting vath heh weht objectionable betau abru t'nash-veh pla'. Lu i had lain kum'i wuh pi' du', eifa wehtsuri spes k' if silence teems began tor tor themselves zhu-yehat. Wuh tsorayek zhal-tor, wuh yon-sha'ti spes-tevan, wuh pi' washing-lamok ticked, heh veh guitar-string mavau occasionally svi' wuh tuf t' zish-nef. Na' pa' wuh ka wak, wuh bezhun fi' wuh temok acquired wuh uzh sagluvaya, heh svi' kanok veh t' eifa staring rounds vesht gla-tor nash-veh written, ri tor hal-tor ha-kel. Whatever mu-yor-fancies heh mu-yor-ralash crowded fi' me, au worla warded ska' nash ri tor hal-tor ha-kel. Ish-veh plaited itself vi' whatever i nahp t', u' wuh bodily kusut would ma ovsoh. Ri wu fa', i had telv-tor svi' wuh newspapers, uf wuh gentleman ri-fainu had sarlah tor wuh hummums svi' wuh mu-yor, heh had hal-tor tor sar-tak, heh had vashau himself, heh had vesh' afer-tor svi' wuh asal weltering svi' khaf. Sarlah ish-veh vi' t'nash-veh patam ik au bolau ma occupied nash maut vault t' t'nash-veh, heh i prah s' sar-tak tor assure myself ik tra' vesh' rai yon-kur ulidar pa'; yi tu'ash wuh svep tor glazhau si' vi' wuh tvur, heh cheer myself k' wuh besu'es t' wuh irak ta'hal, be' if i fai-tor wuh chamberlain tor nam-tor dozing. Tonk'peh ek' nash wak, po i vesh' ri tor hal-tor ha-kel, heh ra had pavesh-tor na' ha-kel, heh lu i dang hal-tor ha-kel, heh whether provis vesh' safe na' ha-kel, vesh' deshkau occupying t'nash-veh kashek ni busily, ish-veh lau ma supposed tra' kupi nam-tor rai weht tvi-shal svi' ish-veh na' sovek vath theme. Kauk lu i nahp t' estella, heh uf etek had parted ik gad ek'wak, heh lu i recalled ek' wuh circumstances t' etwel parting, heh ek' ish-veh glazhau heh molu, heh wuh torai t' ish-veh ozh du' she knitted, kauk yi i vesh' pursuing, la' heh tra' heh kanok-wilat, wuh yuzhat, ri tor hal-tor ha-kel. Lu na' kim-shah i dozed, svi' sheer exhaustion t' kashek heh ak'shem, ish-veh became wuh vast shadowy tor-zhit if i had tor conjugate. Imperative mood, la' wis: ri tor thou hal-tor ha-kel, kal-tor ish-veh ri hal-tor ha-kel, kal-tor etek ri hal-tor ha-kel, tor ri ye il du hal-tor ha-kel, kal-tor ri au hal-tor ha-kel. Yi potentially: i lau ri heh i fam yehat hal-tor ha-kel; heh i lau ri, kupi ri, would ri, heh dang ri hal-tor ha-kel; abi' i olau ik i vesh' going saglakolau, heh padukau abru' fi' wuh trak, heh glazhau na' wuh staring rounds fi-tor wuh temok va'ashiv. I had losrak kharat ik i vesh' tor nam-tor puvutau na' stehkuh; na' ish-veh vesh' eiktra ik i bolau gla-tor wemmick fa' seeing sovek veh else, heh kaing eiktra ik nash vesh' wuh nuf svi' if ish-veh walworth sentiments goh kupi nam-tor taken. Ish-veh vesh' wuh vas tor prah s' wuh tvi-shal wilat wuh mu-yor had vesh' ni miserable, heh i bolau rai dahr knocking na' wuh svep tor startle me s' t'nash-veh uneasy sar-tak. Wuh castle battlements arose fi-tor t'nash-veh zan-tor na' ohkuh o'wak-vel. Wuh pi' dvinsu aisha tor nam-tor entering wuh klomak k' dahkuh fal padukau, i be' dvun-tor k'fai wuh postern heh tuhsau wuh drawbridge svi' ish-veh apc'koik, heh ni sarlah rik' announcement vi' wuh la'es t' wemmick u' au vesh' tor theris-masu na' himself heh wuh aged. Wuh tu'ash svep afforded wuh vulunaya zan-tor t' wuh aged svi' sar-tak. "halloa, mr. Pip!" leralmin-tor wemmick. "du did sarlah ha-kel, yi?" "ha, " i fun-tor; "tonk'peh i didn't hal-tor ha-kel." "ik's ek' gas'rak, " leralmin-tor au, rubbing ish-veh el'ru. "i losrak wuh pitoh na' du na' tik t' wuh temple temep, fi' wuh pavesh. If temep did sarlah du tor?" i var-tor ish-veh. "i'll hal-tor pauk tor wuh vath svi' wuh rivak t' wuh gad heh vashau wuh pitoh, " leralmin-tor wemmick; "ish-veh's wuh rom tor-go worla tor trasha documentary evidence kuv du mokuhlek gol'nev ish-veh, fai'ei du ri tor fai-tor lu ish-veh lau nam-tor shitau svi'. I'm going tor nem-tor wuh liberty k' du. Would du kashek toasting nash kahm na' wuh aged p?" i leralmin-tor i dang nam-tor delighted tor tor ish-veh. "yi du mokuhlek hal-tor pa' ish-veh ar'kadan, mary anne, " leralmin-tor wemmick tor wuh pi' dvinsu; "if mor etek tor ourselves, ri tor gla-tor du, mr. Pip?" au hau, winking, u' she sasaudau. I itaren ish-veh na' ish-veh friendship heh yuzhat, heh etwel discourse proceeded svi' wuh neik molu, du' i toasted wuh aged's kahm heh au buttered wuh crumb t' wuh aged's padukau. "i', mr. Pip, du fai-tor, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "du heh i ken-tor veh wuh'ashiv. Etek nam-tor svi' etwel awek heh personal tsoh, heh etek ma vesh' engaged svi' wuh confidential transaction fa' tor-gad. Official sentiments nam-tor veh vel. Etek nam-tor hayaik official." i cordially assented. I vesh' ni maut nervous, ik i had already lighted wuh aged's kahm spo' wuh torch, heh vesh' obliged tor salur ish-veh si'. "i accidentally puzhu-tor, za-gad asal, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "hasu svi' wuh ac'ruth shi wilat i wuh'wak nem-tor du, kauk svi' du heh me, ish-veh's u' muhl ri tor mention ahm lu avoidable" "mau weh-rom ri, " leralmin-tor i. "i ken-tor du." "i puzhu-tor tra' k' pavesh, za-gad asal, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "ik wuh ac'ruth person ri altogether t' uncolonial pursuits, heh ri unpossessed t' leshanik veltra, i ri tor fai-tor vi ish-veh lau really nam-tor, etek skil-tor't ahm nash person" "ri bolayatik, " leralmin-tor i. "had tor ein pi' stir svi' wuh ac'ruth krus t' wuh panu wilat wuh rom wehk sutra hal-tor, ri kwon-hau-ov svi' gratification t' ish-veh sha' inclinations, heh ri ved irrespective t' wuh government kodona" svi' watching ish-veh limuk, i tor ved wuh firework t' wuh aged's kahm, heh greatly discomposed fi' t'nash-veh sha' attention heh wemmick's; na' if i apologised. "k' disappearing s' such shi, heh hasu rai weht puzhu-tor t' thereabouts. S' if, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "conjectures had vesh' ashenau heh wihka shidau. I isha puzhu-tor ik du na' ish-veh tvi-shal svi' bah-ker kelek, temple, had vesh' glantau, heh lau nam-tor glantau va'ashiv." "k' ik?" leralmin-tor i. "i wouldn't hal-tor vi' ik, " leralmin-tor wemmick, evasively, "ish-veh lau clash k' official responsibilities. I puzhu-tor ish-veh, u' i ma svi' t'nash-veh wak puzhu-tor vath curious vel svi' wuh ka shi. I ri tor var-tor ish-veh du fi' ro'fori poprah. I puzhu-tor ish-veh." au nem-tor wuh toasting-snauk heh kahm s' me u' au stariben, heh eku forth wuh aged's asal-yem neatly fi' wuh pi' tray. Previous tor placing ish-veh fa' ish-veh, au went vi' wuh aged's tvi-shal k' wuh sok'i wan-kur sai, heh tied wuh ka ne' wuh hinek gentleman's chin, heh propped ish-veh abru, heh shitau ish-veh nightcap fi' veh vla, heh mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh ved wuh rakish sov. Yi au shitau ish-veh asal-yem fa' ish-veh k' lo'uk tun, heh leralmin-tor, "ek' gas'rak, ain't du, aged p?" tor if wuh cheerful aged kilko-tor, "ek' gas'rak, john, t'nash-veh sa-kan, ek' gas'rak!" u' tra' seemed tor nam-tor wuh tacit understanding ik wuh aged vesh' ri svi' wuh presentable fupa s', heh vesh' therefore tor nam-tor panah-tor invisible, i tor wuh pretence t' hasu svi' ovsotik ignorance t' aifa proceedings. "nash watching t' me na' t'nash-veh tvi-shal (if i ma wuh'wak had utvau tor suspect), " i leralmin-tor tor wemmick lu sarlah ish-veh pla', "nam-tor inseparable s' wuh person tor ik du ma adverted; nam-tor ish-veh?" wemmick glazhau maut serious. "i couldn't undertake tor leralmin ik, t' t'nash-veh sha' fai-tukh. I tvai, i couldn't undertake tor leralmin ish-veh vesh' palikauk. Tonk'peh ish-veh either nam-tor, il ish-veh dungi nam-tor, il ish-veh's svi' lo'uk tehvar t' hasu." u' vesht gla-tor nash-veh ik au vesh' restrained k' fealty tor pi' britain s' taran u' mau u' au kupi, heh u' i fai-tor k' thankfulness tor ish-veh uf irak si' t' ish-veh yut au went tor leralmin ra au did, i kupi ri hish-tor ish-veh. Tonk'peh i var-tor ish-veh, po' wuh pi' meditation abru' wuh yon, ik i would spo' tor ya'akash ish-veh wuh deshker, subject tor ish-veh answering il ri answering, u' au deemed gas'rak, heh sure ik ish-veh rivak would nam-tor gas'rak. Au svizh-tor svi' ish-veh asal-yem, heh mes ish-veh kar, heh pinching ish-veh sav'el-sleeves (ish-veh notion t' svi'-svep comfort vesh' tor hayal-tor rik' sovek tor-pal), au nodded tor me wuh'wak, tor shitau t'nash-veh deshker. "du ma puzhu-tor t' wuh sasu t' rasahkos character, t'vi yeht ahm nam-tor compeyson?" au kilko-tor k' veh vath nod. "nam-tor au living?" veh vath nod. "nam-tor au svi' london?" au mazhiv-kur-tor me veh vath nod, lerakhovau wuh lehk-office exceedingly, mazhiv-kur-tor me veh kim-shah nod, heh went fi' k' ish-veh asal-yem. "i', " leralmin-tor wemmick, "questioning hasu abru', " if au emphasised heh ashiv-tor na' t'nash-veh guidance, "sarlah nash-veh tor ra i did, po' khaf-spol ra i puzhu-tor. I went tor bah-ker kelek tor talal du; ri finding du, i went tor clarriker's tor talal mr. Herbert." "heh ish-veh du afer-tor?" leralmin-tor i, k' lo'uk anxiety. "heh ish-veh i afer-tor. Rik' mentioning sovek ahm il going vi' sovek details, i mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh tor ken-tor ik kuv au vesh' aware t' anybodytom, jack, il richardbeing pa' wuh tvi-shal, il pa' wuh iyi neighbourhood, au had weh-rom prah tom, jack, il richard s' wuh yut du' du vesh' s' wuh yut." "au would nam-tor greatly puzzled ra tor tor?" "au vesh' puzzled ra tor tor; ri wuh lehkuh, fai'ei i mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh t'nash-veh opinion ik ish-veh vesh' ri safe tor ar'kadan tor prah tom, jack, il richard nuh' irak s' wuh yut na' la'. Mr. Pip, i'll var-tor du vel. Ne' existing circumstances, tra' nam-tor rai shi spo' wuh lo'uk kahr lu du nam-tor wuh'wak svi' ish-veh. Ri tor shaya wein nuh' ak. Ti ikap-tor. Bek-tor till vel slacken, fa' du ar'kadan wuh tu'ash, kauk na' k'shatri sov." i itaren ish-veh na' ish-veh taluhk na'shikh, heh ya'akash ish-veh ra herbert had ovsoh? "mr. Herbert, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "po' hasu ek' t' wuh tuh na' ulef wuh wadan, kwul-tor si' wuh dotor. Au mentioned tor me u' wuh tsat, ik au nam-tor courting wuh nu'ri t'sai vi has, u' rai vet du nam-tor aware, wuh bedridden pa. If pa, having vesh' svi' wuh purser zehl t' ha'kiv, ti wuh-sar-tak svi' wuh kes-wun-krani wilat au mokuhlek gla-tor wuh ships mashalo-thalv abru heh ne' wuh pilash. Du nam-tor acquainted k' wuh nu'ri t'sai, danik probably?" "ri personally, " leralmin-tor i. Wuh yeht'es vesh', ik she had kluchi tor me u' wuh kodonuhk besu vi did herbert rai rom, heh ik, lu herbert had wuh'rak proposed tor la' me tor ish-veh, she had poprah wuh mnah k' such maut moderate warmth, ik herbert had olau himself obliged tor confide wuh fupa s' t' wuh nuf tor me, k' wuh zan-tor tor wuh lapse t' wuh pi' wak fa' i tor ish-veh acquaintance. Lu i had palikau tor storilaya herbert's prospects k' stealth, i had vesh' kup tor lesh nash k' cheerful ven-dol-leralmin: au heh ish-veh affianced, na' ish-veh krus, had naturally ri vesh' maut anxious tor ragtau wuh wuh person vi' ish-veh interviews; heh thus, hi i vesh' assured ik i had risen svi' clara's vam, heh hi wuh nu'ri t'sai heh i had wu regularly interchanged skladan heh remembrances k' herbert, i had worla gla-tor ish-veh. However, i did ri trouble wemmick k' aifa particulars. "wuh kelek k' wuh kes-wun-krani, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "hasu k' wuh pilash-vla, ne' wuh patra tra' svi' limehouse heh greenwich, heh hasu potau, ish-veh seems, k' wuh maut respectable kir'an vi has wuh furnished upper lan-tol tor kal-tor, mr. Herbert shitau ish-veh tor me, ra did i nah-tor t' ik u' wuh rikwonik tenement na' tom, jack, il richard? I', i nahp maut muhl t' ish-veh, na' rehkuh utvau i'll mazhiv-kur-tor du. Ik nam-tor tor leralmin: firstly. Ish-veh's altogether s' ek' ish-veh kuhsh-tor, heh nam-tor muhl maf s' wuh tsuri tuh t' yut lo'uk heh pi'. Secondly. Rik' going be' ish-veh yourself, du kupi kwon-hau-ov zhu-tor t' wuh ek'manek t' tom, jack, il richard, k'fai mr. Herbert. Thirdly. Po' wuh du' heh lu ish-veh lau nam-tor prudent, kuv du dang aitlun tor trel tom, jack, il richard fi' dohn wuh k'shatri packet-masu-hali, tra' au isready." mau comforted k' aifa considerations, i itaren wemmick va'ashiv heh va'ashiv, heh eit'jae ish-veh tor proceed. "muhl, osu! Mr. Herbert threw himself vi' wuh business k' wuh dungi, heh k' naukuh o'wak-vel kim-shah mu-yor au ha-kel-tor tom, jack, il richard, whichever ish-veh lau nam-tor, du heh i ri tor aitlun tor fai-tor, ved successfully. Na' wuh hinek lodgings ish-veh vesh' ken-tor ik au vesh' summoned tor dover, heh, svi' kla-min, au vesh' taken ne' wuh dover fau-yut heh cornered s' ish-veh. I', wuh'ashiv lo'uk advantage t' ek' nash nam-tor, ik ish-veh vesh' ovsoh rik' du, heh lu, kuv sovek veh vesh' fundik himself pa' ish-veh dvun, du bolau nam-tor fainu tor nam-tor ek'wak ni wehk miles ska' heh ved vathru engaged. Nash matau suspicion heh confuses ish-veh; heh na' wuh ka utvau i recommended ik, kauk kuv sarlah du pla' kim-shah mu-yor, du dang ri hal-tor ha-kel. Ish-veh katau svi' weht confusion, heh du aitlun confusion." wemmick, having shahtau ish-veh asal-yem, la' glazhau na' ish-veh glantau, heh began tor prah ish-veh tor-pal fi'. "heh i', mr. Pip, " leralmin-tor au, k' ish-veh el'ru fam dvun svi' wuh sleeves, "i ma probably ovsoh wuh danik i mokuhlek tor; tonk'peh kuv i mokuhlek ek'wak tor weht, s' wuh walworth sfek t' zan-tor, heh svi' wuh strictly awek heh personal tsoh, i dungau nam-tor glad tor tor ish-veh. La''s wuh shi'yavekh. Tra' mokuhlek nam-tor rai klau svi' ish-veh going la' tor-mu-yor, heh seeing na' yourself ik ek' nam-tor muhl k' tom, jack, il richard, fa' du hal-tor ha-kel, if nam-tor wuh'ashiv utvau na' ish-veh ri going ha-kel kim-shah mu-yor. Tonk'peh, po' du ma hal-tor ha-kel, ri tor hal-tor pla' la'. Du nam-tor maut welcome, i am sure, mr. Pip"; ish-veh el'ru vesh' i' s' ish-veh sleeves, heh i vesh' shaking au; "heh kal-tor me t'forti impress veh yauluhk sfek fi-tor du." au laid ish-veh el'ru fi-tor t'nash-veh tipan, heh hau svi' wuh solemn zhal: "avail yourself t' nash khru tor ti meskaraya t' ish-veh leshanik veltra. Du ri tor fai-tor ra lau pavesh-tor tor ish-veh. Ri tor kal-tor sovek-vel pavesh-tor tor wuh leshanik veltra." ved despairing t' tor t'nash-veh kashek pa'shik tor wemmick fi' nash sfek, i forbore tor ar'kadan. "wak's abru, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "heh i bolau nam-tor ska'. Kuv du had nothing weht pressing tor tor do tor potau la' till gu'gelik, ik's ra i dang na'shikhau. Du glazhau maut mau worried, heh ish-veh would tor du rom ki' wuh perfectly hizhuk gad k' wuh aged, au'll nam-tor abru presently, heh wuh pi' zeshau ofyou vokau wuh pig?" "veling, " leralmin-tor i. "muhl; heh wuh pi' zeshau t' ish-veh. Ik kahm du toasted vesh' ish-veh, heh au vesh' svi' ek' respects wuh wuh'rak-rater. Tor ar'kadan ish-veh, kuv ish-veh nam-tor goh na' hinek acquaintance sake. Rom-bye, aged parent!" svi' wuh cheery saul. "ek' gas'rak, john; ek' gas'rak, t'nash-veh sa-kan!" piped wuh hinek sasu s' k'svi. I ak tevan-tor asleep fa' wemmick's yon, heh wuh aged heh i tizh-tor veh wuh'ashiv's shila'es k' tevan-tor asleep fa' ish-veh weht il lehkuh ek' gad. Etek had loin t' pork na' aru-yem, heh yar-kur grown fi' wuh estate; heh i nodded na' wuh aged k' wuh rom intention whenever i vravshau tor tor ish-veh drowsily. Lu ish-veh vesh' ved gu'gelik, i losrak wuh aged preparing wuh yon na' toast; heh i inferred s' wuh su'etek t' teacups, u' muhl u' s' ish-veh glances na' wuh dahkuh pi' svep svi' wuh temok, ik din-tor skiffins vesh' gishu. Chapter xlvi. Ohkuh o'wak-vel had kwul-tor fa' i prah vi' wuh sov, ik vesh' scented, ri disagreeably, k' wuh val heh shavings t' wuh wu-gef masu-hali-torvausu, heh mashalo-thalv-lap, fel, heh vihpan makers. Ek' ik masu-vla shal t' wuh upper heh weh-neik patra ne' mesut vesh' ri-fainu solektra tor me; heh lu i kwul-tor ne' k' wuh pilash, i afer-tor ik wuh gla-tor i aitlu vesh' ri wilat i had supposed ish-veh tor nam-tor, heh vesh' sovek-vel tonk'peh hagik tor talal. Ish-veh vesh' puvutau mill muzh kutra, chinks's basin; heh i had rai vath kakhartausu tor chinks's basin do wuh hinek yar-kur khaf-tukh man-elakh-lates. Ish-veh tukh ri ra stranded ships repairing svi' smash-hali-kif i pakik myself among, ra hinek vukh t' ships svi' rivak t' hasu knocked tor krus, ra stan-tor heh shuhk heh vath dregs t' mashen, ra ker t' hali-torvausu heh hali-raf-shayek, ra zhar-tor masu-vohrayek blindly biting vi' wuh solektra, hi na' tevun ska' gu-vam, ra mountainous shasol t' accumulated casks heh lap-tukh, uf wehk man-elakh-lates-tor ik vesh' ri wuh hinek yar-kur khaf-tukh. Po' several wak tevan-tor pen t' t'nash-veh destination heh u' k'ashiv overshooting ish-veh, vesht sarlah nash-veh unexpectedly pauk wuh teruk, fi-tor mill muzh kutra. Ish-veh vesh' wuh sluk ves t' shi, ek' circumstances panah-tor, wilat wuh salan s' wuh pilash had tvi-shal tor da-tor itself pauk; heh tra' vesh' dahkuh il rehkuh lap svi' ish-veh, heh tra' vesh' wuh stump t' wuh ruined salan-grazhakel, heh tra' vesh' wuh hinek yar-kur khaf-tukh man-elakh-lates, t'vi wu heh wonil vista i kupi zavikau svi' wuh moonlight, bi' wuh weizehl t' wooden nentu eku svi' wuh solektra, ik glazhau spo' superannuated haymaking-dref-tor if had grown hinek heh pakik danik t' ish-veh zud. Selecting s' wuh zamu queer kelek fi-tor mill muzh kutra wuh kelek k' wuh wooden khom heh rehkuh var t' kes-wun-krani (ri tchol-krani, if nam-tor wuh'ashiv vel), i glazhau na' wuh math fi-tor wuh svep, heh telv-tor tra', mrs. Whimple. Ik hasu wuh ahm i aitlu, i knocked, heh wuh shakhupik kosu t' wuh vaksurik heh smusma-tor appearance kesau. She vesh' iyi deposed, however, k' herbert, vi silently pufulag-tor me vi' wuh parlour heh ikap-tor wuh svep. Ish-veh vesh' wuh shaik kashan tor gla-tor ish-veh maut familiar limuk afer-tor ved na' ha-kel svi' ik maut unfamiliar tvi-shal heh shal; heh i afer-tor myself looking na' ish-veh, mau u' i glazhau na' wuh teruk-cupboard k' wuh makh heh china, wuh fo fi-tor wuh vuzh-mev-krus, heh wuh kur-tor engravings fi' wuh temok, representing wuh tevakh t' khart-lan fas-tor, wuh hali-supsaya, heh ish-veh majesty sa-te'kru george wuh wuh svi' wuh fupa s' coachman's wig, duf-breeches, heh fik-kluf, fi' wuh nef na' windsor. "ek' nam-tor muhl, handel, " leralmin-tor herbert, "heh au nam-tor ved satisfied, hi nayik tor gla-tor du. T'nash-veh tal-kam ko-kan nam-tor k' ish-veh sa-mekh; heh kuv du'll bek-tor till sarlah ish-veh ne', i'll tor du fainu tor ish-veh, heh yi etek'll hal-tor upstairs. Ik's ish-veh sa-mekh." i had shetau aware t' wuh alarming growling overhead, heh had probably sagluvau wuh kla-min svi' t'nash-veh countenance. "i am kwes au nam-tor wuh maf hinek rascal, " leralmin-tor herbert, smiling, "tonk'peh i ma worla gla-tor ish-veh. Ri tor du fnish-tor rum? Au nam-tor kwon-hau-ov na' ish-veh." "na' rum?" leralmin-tor i. "ha, " fun-tor herbert, "heh du lau suppose uf bovik ish-veh tor ish-veh gout. Au persists, nuh', svi' keeping ek' wuh provisions upstairs svi' ish-veh tvi-shal, heh serving au si'. Au potau au fi' nef abru' ish-veh patam, heh dungi rasathau au ek'. Ish-veh tvi-shal bolau nam-tor spo' wuh chandler's mahr-kel." du' au thus stariben, wuh growling ralash became wuh prolonged roar, heh yi tev-tor maf. "ra else mokuhlek nam-tor wuh consequence, " leralmin-tor herbert, svi' danaya, "kuv au dungi tresahk wuh thuhk? Wuh sasu k' wuh gout svi' ish-veh gas'rak handand kanok-wilat elsecan't gish tor prah k'fai wuh dahtau gloucester rik' hurting himself." au seemed ki' dash-tor himself maut mau, na' au mazhiv-kur-tor wuh'ashiv furious roar. "ki' provis na' wuh upper lodger nam-tor ved wuh godsend tor mrs. Whimple, " leralmin-tor herbert, "na' veling sutra svi' paik skil-tor't lamok ik ralash. Wuh curious shi, handel; isn't ish-veh?" ish-veh vesh' wuh curious shi, indeed; tonk'peh remarkably muhl potau heh sok'i. "mrs. Whimple, " leralmin-tor herbert, lu i var-tor ish-veh ni, "nam-tor wuh buhfik t' housewives, heh i really ri tor fai-tor ra t'nash-veh clara would tor rik' ish-veh motherly gol'nev. Na', clara has rai ko-mekh t' ish-veh sha', handel, heh rai relation svi' wuh panu tonk'peh hinek gruffandgrim." "surely ik's ri ish-veh ahm, herbert?" "rai, rai, " leralmin-tor herbert, "ik's t'nash-veh ahm na' ish-veh. Ish-veh ahm nam-tor mr. Barley. Tonk'peh ra wuh kudaya ish-veh nam-tor na' wuh sa-fu t' t'nash-veh sa-mekh heh ko-mekh tor ashaya wuh ko-kan vi has rai relations, heh vi mokuhlek worla ertau herself il anybody else pa' ish-veh skan!" herbert had var-tor me fi' former occasions, heh i' reminded me, ik au wuh'rak fai-tor din-tor clara barley lu she vesh' completing ish-veh education na' wuh establishment na' hammersmith, heh ik fi' ish-veh hasu recalled ha-kel tor nurse ish-veh sa-mekh, au heh she had confided ish-veh affection tor wuh motherly mrs. Whimple, k' ik ish-veh had vesh' fostered heh pakhartau k' kaik kindness heh discretion, ek'wak opi'. Ish-veh vesh' ken-tor ik nothing t' wuh sival malat kupi possibly nam-tor confided tor hinek barley, k' utvau t' ish-veh hasu totally unequal tor wuh consideration t' sovek subject weht psychological do gout, rum, heh purser's mahr-kel. U' etek vesh' thus conversing svi' wuh neik molu du' hinek barley's potun-tor growl vibrated svi' wuh ha-zehl ik tuhsau wuh abru-tol, wuh tvi-shal svep tu'ash, heh wuh maut takov, slight, gu'gelik-eyed ko-kan t' dah-leh il ni sarlah svi' k' wuh ki'haf svi' ish-veh el'ru: ik herbert tenderly vas-tor t' wuh ki'haf, heh presented, blushing, u' "clara." she really vesh' wuh danik sem-rik-tor ko-kan, heh lau ma be' dvun-tor na' wuh captive pu'a, ik ik truculent ogre, hinek barley, had hish-tor vi' ish-veh dvin. "glazhau la', " leralmin-tor herbert, showing me wuh ki'haf, k' wuh compassionate heh sival abru'teruklar-ru'lut, po' etek had variben wuh pi'; "la''s ri donku-tor clara's mu'yor-yem, dvin-tor si' kanok mu-yor. La''s ish-veh allowance t' kap, heh la''s ish-veh shihvek t' thuhk, heh la''s ish-veh rum, if i mon. Nash nam-tor mr. Barley's asal-yem na' tor-morrow, dvin-tor si' tor nam-tor pufas-tor. Dahkuh mutton-chops, rehkuh potatoes, ein thresh peas, wuh pi' flour, dahkuh ounces t' butter, wuh k'hy t' alem, heh ek' nash nesh-kur pepper. Ish-veh's stewed abru teretuhr, heh taken fal, heh ish-veh's wuh nice vel na' wuh gout, i dang nah-tor!" tra' vesh' vel ni malatik heh winning svi' clara's resigned yut t' looking na' aifa mahr-kel svi' detail, u' herbert sfekau au si'; heh vel ni confiding, loving, heh innocent svi' ish-veh modest manner t' yielding herself tor herbert's embracing kar; heh vel ni gentle svi' ish-veh, ni mau needing protection fi' mill muzh kutra, k' chinks's basin, heh wuh hinek yar-kur khaf-tukh man-elakh-lates, k' hinek barley growling svi' wuh ha-zehl, ik i would ri ma undone wuh engagement svi' ish-veh heh herbert na' ek' wuh donku svi' wuh abru'lik-dunap i had worla tu'ash. I vesh' looking na' ish-veh k' sanosh heh admiration, lu suddenly wuh growl puv-tor vi' wuh roar va'ashiv, heh wuh frightful bumping ralash vesh' puzhu-tor abru', u' kuv wuh masuk'veh k' wuh wooden mal vesh' trying tor spitau ish-veh k'fai wuh abru-tol tor sarlah na' etek. Fi-tor nash clara leralmin-tor tor herbert, "papa aitlu me, ashal-veh!" heh sahr-tor maf. "tra' nam-tor wuh unconscionable hinek shark na' du!" leralmin-tor herbert. "ra tor du suppose au aitlu i', handel?" "i ri tor fai-tor, " leralmin-tor i. "vel tor mon?" "ik's ish-veh!" maf-tor herbert, u' kuv i had tor wuh guess t' wehtsuri merit. "au potau ish-veh grog pok rish-tor svi' wuh pi' matuhlek fi' wuh pasu. Bek-tor wuh moment, heh du'll zhu-tor clara abertau ish-veh abru tor nem-tor ein. Tra' au hal-tor!" wuh'ashiv roar, k' wuh prolonged hutau na' wuh shaht. "i', " leralmin-tor herbert, u' ish-veh vesh' navau k' silence, "au's drinking. I', " leralmin-tor herbert, u' wuh growl resounded svi' wuh ha-zehl wuh'wak weht, "au's ne' va'ashiv fi' ish-veh pla'!" clara fun-tor ak afterwards, heh herbert accompanied me upstairs tor gla-tor etwel falun. U' etek be' dvun-tor mr. Barley's svep, au vesh' puzhu-tor hoarsely muttering k'svi, svi' wuh ish-veh ik she-tor heh tevan-tor spo' salan, wuh zahalik refrain, svi' if i substitute rom istau na' vel ved wuh reverse: "ahoy! Kudau ish-veh bezhun, la''s hinek dun barley. La''s hinek dun barley, kudau ish-veh bezhun. La''s hinek dun barley fi' wuh pa'ash t' ish-veh pla', k' wuh s'haile. Lying fi' wuh pa'ash t' ish-veh pla' spo' wuh drifting hinek tevik flounder, la''s ish-veh hinek dun barley, kudau ish-veh bezhun. Ahoy! Kudau du." svi' nash ish-veh t' consolation, herbert informed me wuh invisible barley would commune k' himself k' wuh gad heh mu-yor teretuhr; k'ashiv, du' ish-veh vesh' ta'hal, having, na' wuh ka wak, veh bezhun na' wuh irak-zan-vel if vesh' fitted fi' ish-veh sar-tak na' wuh convenience t' sweeping wuh pilash. Svi' ish-veh dahkuh thif'etek tvi-shal na' wuh fik t' wuh kelek, if vesh' sluk heh airy, heh svi' if mr. Barley vesh' lehkuh zhu-yehat do ne', i afer-tor provis comfortably settled. Au sagluvau rai vikayek, heh seemed tor olau rim ik vesh' don mentioning; tonk'peh ish-veh kwul-tor me ik au vesh' softened, indefinably, na' i kupi ri ma leralmin-tor uf, heh kupi worla afterwards recall uf lu i ar'kada, tonk'peh certainly. Wuh opportunity ik wuh gad's shom had putan-tor me na' haulan had resulted svi' t'nash-veh fully determining tor leralmin nothing tor ish-veh respecting compeyson. Na' sovek-vel i fai-tor, ish-veh animosity na' wuh sasu lau vathru ras-tukh tor ish-veh seeking ish-veh si' heh rushing fi' ish-veh sha' vashaya. Therefore, lu herbert heh i hayal-tor ne' k' ish-veh k' ish-veh yon, i ya'akash ish-veh wuh'rak t' ek' whether au relied fi' wemmick's judgment heh shu-pal t' ro'fori? "ay, ay, tal-kam sa-kan!" au kilko-tor, k' wuh shi'vukhut nod, "jaggers fai-tor." "yi, i ma variben k' wemmick, " leralmin-tor i, "heh ma sarlah tor var-tor du ra yuzhat au mazhiv-kur-tor me heh ra na'shikh." nash i did accurately, k' wuh reservation aishan mentioned; heh i var-tor ish-veh uf wemmick had puzhu-tor, svi' newgate prison (whether s' officers il prisoners i kupi ri leralmin), ik au vesh' ne' ein suspicion, heh ik t'nash-veh tvi-shal had vesh' glantau; uf wemmick had recommended ish-veh keeping ikap-tor na' wuh wak, heh t'nash-veh keeping maf s' ish-veh; heh ra wemmick had leralmin-tor pa' getting ish-veh abroad. I hau, ik veling, lu wuh wak sarlah, i dang hal-tor k' ish-veh, il dang zahal-tor ikap-tor fi-tor ish-veh, u' lau nam-tor safest svi' wemmick's judgment. Ra vesh' tor zahal-tor ik i did ri esta fi-tor; neither, indeed, vesh' i na' ek' pa'shik il kel'o pa' ish-veh svi' t'nash-veh sha' kashek, i' ik vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh svi' ik softer nosh, heh svi' afsakau peril na' t'nash-veh sake. U' tor altering t'nash-veh yut t' living k' enlarging t'nash-veh kodona, i shitau ish-veh tor ish-veh whether svi' etwel la' unsettled heh rihagik circumstances, ish-veh would ri nam-tor veling ridiculous, kuv ish-veh vesh' rai weh-rasahkos? Au kupi ri wafu nash, heh indeed vesh' maut reasonable throughout. Ish-veh coming pla' vesh' wuh venture, au leralmin-tor, heh au had kwon-hau-ov fainu ish-veh tor nam-tor wuh venture. Au would tor nothing tor tor ish-veh wuh desperate venture, heh au had maut pi' pthak t' ish-veh ek'manek k' such rom gol'nev. Herbert, vi had vesh' looking na' wuh yon heh pondering, la' leralmin-tor ik vel had sarlah vi' ish-veh nahp arising s' wemmick's suggestion, if ish-veh lau nam-tor don du' tor pursue. "etek nam-tor fi' rom watermen, handel, heh kupi nem-tor ish-veh ne' wuh pilash ourselves lu wuh gas'rak wak sarlah. Rai masu-hali would yi nam-tor hired na' wuh lof, heh rai boatmen; ik would korsau k'puu wuh pavesh t' suspicion, heh sovek pavesh nam-tor don saving. Worla kashek wuh tevun-yonuk; ri tor du nah-tor ish-veh lau nam-tor wuh rom vel kuv du began na' wuh'wak tor potau wuh masu-hali na' wuh temple kaiden, heh vesh' svi' wuh es'merka t' rowing abru heh ne' wuh pilash? Du tevan vi' ik es'merka, heh yi vi beglanau il kashkau? Tor ish-veh dah-leh il kau-leh wak, heh tra' nam-tor nothing special svi' ish-veh doing ish-veh wuh dah-leh-wuh'rak il kau-leh-wuh'rak." i tishau nash scheme, heh provis vesh' ved elated k' ish-veh. Etek sep-wafikh ik ish-veh dang nam-tor lesh vi' execution, heh ik provis dang worla naglanshau etek kuv sarlah etek ne' mesut, heh fel-tor vesht mill muzh kutra. Tonk'peh etek further sep-wafikh ik au dang seshaya ne' wuh glan-fam svi' ik krus t' ish-veh krani if mazhiv-kur-tor fi-tor wuh she'rak, whenever gla-tor ish-veh etek heh ek' vesh' gas'rak. Etwel conference hasu i' shahtau, heh kanok-vei arranged, i she-tor tor hal-tor; remarking tor herbert ik au heh i had weh-rom ri hal-tor ha-kel teretuhr, heh ik i would nem-tor ulef wuh wadan's palikaya t' ish-veh. "i ri tor spo' tor trasha du la', " i leralmin-tor tor provis, "hi i fam yehat vet ish-veh hasu safer la' do be' me. Rom-bye!" "tal-kam sa-kan, " au kilko-tor, clasping t'nash-veh el'ru, "i ri tor fai-tor lu etek lau ragel-tor va'ashiv, heh i ri tor spo' rom-bye. Leralmin rom-mu-yor!" "rom-mu-yor! Herbert dungi hal-tor regularly svi' etek, heh lu wuh wak sarlah du lau nam-tor ac'ruth i dungau nam-tor pok. Rom-mu-yor, rom-mu-yor!" etek nahp ish-veh buhfik ik au dang stay svi' ish-veh sha' tvi-shal; heh etek losrak ish-veh fi' wuh landing s'udish ish-veh svep, holding wuh ta'hal abru' wuh stair-rail tor ta'hal etek downstairs. Looking pla' na' ish-veh, i nahp t' wuh wuh'rak mu-yor t' ish-veh fun, lu etwel shul vesh' reversed, heh lu i pi' supposed t'nash-veh khaf-spol kupi ek'wak nam-tor u' ras heh anxious na' parting s' ish-veh u' ish-veh vesh' i'. Hinek barley vesh' growling heh swearing lu etek repassed ish-veh svep, k' rai appearance t' having ceased il t' meaning tor cease. Lu etek prah tor wuh ash'ya t' wuh kaiden, i ya'akash herbert whether au had korsau wuh ahm t' provis. Au kilko-tor, certainly ri, heh ik wuh lodger vesh' mr. Campbell. Au isha danau ik wuh utmost fainu t' mr. Campbell tra' vesh', ik au (herbert) had mr. Campbell consigned tor ish-veh, heh olau wuh karik personal eku'ko svi' ish-veh hasu muhl palutunau, heh living wuh secluded ha'kiv. Ni, lu etek went vi' wuh parlour wilat mrs. Whimple heh clara vesh' hayal-tor na' ar'kadan, i leralmin-tor nothing t' t'nash-veh sha' eku'ko svi' mr. Campbell, tonk'peh potau ish-veh tor myself. Lu i had taken trasha t' wuh takov, gentle, gu'gelik-eyed ko-kan, heh t' wuh motherly kosu vi had ri outlived ish-veh trau sympathy k' wuh pi' tek'ik t' yeht ashaya, i olau u' kuv wuh hinek yar-kur khaf-tukh man-elakh-lates had grown ved wuh natya shi. Hinek barley lau nam-tor u' hinek u' wuh kunel, heh lau swear spo' wuh bosh vunai t' troopers, tonk'peh tra' vesh' redeeming youth heh sahrafel heh rok hiyet svi' chinks's basin tor boshaya ish-veh tor overflowing. Heh yi i nahp t' estella, heh t' etwel parting, heh went ha-kel maut sadly. Ek' vel vesh' u' hizhuk svi' wuh temple u' ek'wak i had gla-tor au. Wuh krani t' wuh tvi-shal fi' ik vla, lately occupied k' provis, vesh' gu'gelik heh fam dvun, heh tra' vesh' rai lounger svi' bah-ker kelek. I lates-tor vesht wuh mashulek dah'wak il thrice fa' i tev-tor wuh ash-tor ik vesh' svi' me heh t'nash-veh tvi-shal, tonk'peh i vesh' ved sa'awek. Herbert, coming tor t'nash-veh bedside lu sarlah ish-veh svi', na' i went zehik tor sar-tak, dispirited heh zung-tor, tor wuh ka report. Sharu veh t' wuh krani po' ik, au glazhau si' vi' wuh moonlight, heh var-tor me ik wuh pavement vesh' u' solemnly herbosh u' wuh pavement t' sovek cathedral na' ik ka wadan. Thurai gad i eku myself tor prah wuh masu-hali. Ish-veh vesh' ak ovsoh, heh wuh masu-hali vesh' katau pauk tor wuh temple kaiden, heh ti wilat i kupi pulau ish-veh k'svi wuh minute il dahkuh. Yi, i began tor hal-tor si' u' na' training heh practice: sometimes sa'awek, sometimes k' herbert. I vesh' k'ashiv si' svi' samu, sov-masu, heh sleet, tonk'peh kling nem-tor mau pitoh t' me po' i had vesh' si' wuh zamu wak. Palikauk, i potau abru' blackfriars mesut; tonk'peh u' wuh wadan t' wuh mashen rubai, i nem-tor na' london mesut. Ish-veh vesh' hinek london mesut svi' eifa gad, heh na' ac'ruth fupa s' t' wuh mashen tra' vesh' wuh ne-koshtri heh tevan t' masu tra' if mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh wuh rasahkos reputation. Tonk'peh i fai-tor muhl hiyet uf tor 'pohshau' wuh mesut po' seeing ish-veh ovsoh, heh ni began tor zehl pa' among wuh shipping svi' wuh patra, heh ne' tor erith. Wuh wuh'rak wak i be' dvun-tor mill muzh kutra, herbert heh i vesh' pulling wuh shif t' fel; heh, fi' svi' going heh returning, gla-tor etek wuh glan-fam na' wuh she'rak sarlah ne'. Herbert vesh' rarely tra' lehkuh frequently do rehkuh wak svi' wuh wehk gad, heh au worla katau me wuh single zhit t' kash-tor'es ik vesh' na' ek' alarming. Fam dvun, i fai-tor ik tra' vesh' aishan na' vikayek, heh i kupi ri prah rid t' wuh notion t' hasu glantau. Wuh'wak poprah, ish-veh nam-tor wuh haunting idea; uf wehk undesigning persons i suspected t' watching me, ish-veh would nam-tor lerash tor ka'pra. Svi' pen, i vesh' kwon-hau-ov bosh t' ptha na' wuh kuriht sasu vi vesh' svi' hiding. Herbert had sometimes leralmin-tor tor me ik au afer-tor ish-veh vaksurik tor lamok na' veh t' etwel krani po' gu'gelik, lu wuh mashen vesh' sahran ne', heh tor nah-tor ik ish-veh vesh' flowing, k' kanok-vei ish-veh spitau, na' clara. Tonk'peh i nahp k' dread ik ish-veh vesh' flowing na' magwitch, heh ik sovek nesh-kur ulidar fi' its skonn lau nam-tor ish-veh pursuers, going swiftly, silently, heh surely, tor nem-tor ish-veh. Chapter xlvii. Ein wehk gad be' dvun-tor rik' bringing sovek rubah. Etek bek-tor na' wemmick, heh au tor rai glat. Kuv i had worla fainu ish-veh s' pi' britain, heh had worla tizh-tor wuh privilege t' hasu fi' wuh familiar footing na' wuh castle, i lau ma vet-tor ish-veh; ri ni na' wuh moment, fai-tor ish-veh u' i did. T'nash-veh worldly tek'ik began sai-vel-tor wuh gloomy appearance, heh i vesh' hish-tor na' donku k' weht do veh creditor. Kauk i myself began tor fai-tor wuh aitlun t' donku (i tvai t' pok donku svi' t'nash-veh sha' abru'lik), heh tor vas-tor ish-veh k' converting ein easily spared ua'mrki t' jewelery vi' cash. Tonk'peh i had ved satalau ik ish-veh would nam-tor wuh heartless tehs tor nem-tor weht donku s' t'nash-veh patron svi' wuh existing fupa s' t' t'nash-veh uncertain nahp heh dotoran. Therefore, i had satau ish-veh wuh unopened abru'lik-dunap k' herbert, tor meskaraya svi' ish-veh sha' keeping, heh i olau wuh ves t' satisfactionwhether ish-veh vesh' wuh riyeht ves il wuh yeht, i hardly knowin ri having profited k' ish-veh generosity opi' ish-veh revelation t' himself. U' wuh wak sai-vel-tor fi', wuh impression settled heavily fi-tor me ik estella vesh' telik. Pthak-bosh t' having ish-veh wugau, hi ish-veh vesh' ek' tonk'peh wuh conviction, i nan'woi wuh newspapers, heh eit'jae herbert (tor ik i had confided wuh circumstances t' etwel kim-shah interview) worla tor stariben t' ish-veh tor me. Po i hoarded abru nash kim-shah wretched pi' a'cit t' wuh pelal t' rok ik vesh' rent heh putan-tor tor wuh salan, uf tor i fai-tor? Po did du vi telv-tor nash, kugau ik ri dissimilar inconsistency t' ish-veh sha' kim-shah tevun, kim-shah tevun-krus, kim-shah wehk gad? Ish-veh vesh' wuh unhappy ha'kiv ik i ha-tor; heh its veh abrupik anxiety, towering abru' ek' its vath anxieties, spo' wuh pid suk'kunel abru' wuh eik'es t' suk'kunel, worla sasaudau s' t'nash-veh zan-tor. Fam dvun, rai uzh aishan na' pthak arose. Kal-tor me palikaya s' t'nash-veh sar-tak u' i would, k' wuh vash sluk fi-tor me ik au vesh' discovered; kal-tor me hayal-tor listening, u' i would k' dread, na' herbert's returning ash na' mu-yor, lest ish-veh dang nam-tor fleeter do ordinary, heh winged k' ek'rasah ro'fori, na' ek' ik, heh mau weht tor spo' lof, wuh pauk t' vel went fi'. Condemned tor inaction heh wuh fupa s' t' ek'kayik restlessness heh suspense, i fel-tor pa' svi' t'nash-veh masu-hali, heh bek-tor, bek-tor, bek-tor, u' i buhfik kupi. Tra' vesh' fupa s' t' wuh mashen lu, having vesh' ne' wuh pilash, i kupi ri zaprah k'fai wuh pi'tchef-chafed kesek heh kushel t' hinek london mesut; yi, i losrak t'nash-veh masu-hali na' wuh kif be' wuh custom kelek, tor nam-tor katau abru afterwards tor wuh temple kaiden. I vesh' ri averse tor doing nash, u' ish-veh dvin-tor tor tor me heh t'nash-veh masu-hali wuh commoner incident among wuh masu-vla sutra tra'. S' nash slight occasion sprang dahkuh latva ik i ma i' tor var-tor t'. Veh aru, tab-ma svi' wuh tevun-krus t' february, vesht sarlah nash-veh ashore na' wuh kif na' dusk. I had seshau ne' u' irak u' greenwich k' wuh ne'le-mashen, heh had da-tor k' wuh mashen. Ish-veh had vesh' wuh tok-ti ugelik gad, tonk'peh had shetau ihsekweik u' wuh yel eku-tor, heh i had had tor olau t'nash-veh yut pla' among wuh shipping, takov carefully. Fi' svi' going heh returning, i had gla-tor wuh glantokaya svi' ish-veh krani, ek' muhl. U' ish-veh vesh' wuh raw khru, heh i vesh' samu, i nahp i would comfort myself k' aru-yem na' wuh'wak; heh u' i had wadan t' dejection heh awek'es fa' me kuv i went ha-kel tor wuh temple, i nahp i would afterwards hal-tor tor wuh mavau. Wuh theatre wilat mr. Wopsle had achieved ish-veh questionable triumph vesh' svi' ik masu-vla neighbourhood (ish-veh nam-tor nowhere i'), heh tor ik theatre i resolved tor hal-tor. I vesh' aware ik mr. Wopsle had ri navau svi' zaprah-tor wuh drama, tonk'peh, fi' wuh contrary, had rather partaken t' its decline. Au had vesh' ominously puzhu-tor t', k'fai wuh mavau-dun, u' wuh faithful nesh-kur, svi' tersaya k' wuh pi' ko-kan t' thol keshtan, heh wuh monkey. Heh herbert had gla-tor ish-veh u' wuh predatory tartar t' comic propensities, k' wuh limuk spo' wuh yon-kur dok, heh wuh outrageous taik ek' abru' kus-vakh. I aru-yokul na' ra herbert heh i nam-tor-tor tor vutau wuh geographical chop-kelek, wilat tra' vesh' besan t' wuh panu svi' porter-sunil rims fi' kanok ulef-ker t' wuh tablecloths, heh besan t' gravy fi' kanok veh t' wuh lipau, tor nash gad tra' nam-tor scarcely wuh single chop-kelek k'svi wuh s'haile mayor's dominions if nam-tor ri geographical, heh sai-vel-tor si' wuh wak svi' dozing abru' crumbs, staring na' pa-tukh, heh leipaun svi' wuh fal thorshaya t' aru-yem. K' heh k', i kastorilau myself, heh went tor wuh mavau. Tra', i afer-tor wuh virtuous boatswain svi' ish-veh majesty's dvin, wuh danik marom sasu, hi i kupi ma istau ish-veh malanu ri ved ni wufik svi' ein shitau, heh ri ved ni thal svi' vath, vi knocked ek' wuh pi' sasu's taik abru' ish-veh bezhun, hi au vesh' maut generous heh kyi'i, heh vi wouldn't zhu-tor t' anybody's paying taxes, hi au vesh' maut patriotic. Au had wuh sa'haf t' donku svi' ish-veh abru'lik, spo' wuh pudding svi' wuh sai, heh fi' ik veltra telik wuh nu'ri person svi' sar-tak-furniture, k' lo'uk rejoicings; wuh bosh population t' portsmouth (naukuh svi' su'etek na' wuh kim-shah census) turning si' fi' wuh shahov tor tetaya ish-veh sha' el'ru heh hutau kanok-veh else's, heh uralau "boshaya, boshaya!" wuh ac'ruth gu'gelik-complexioned swab, however, vi wouldn't boshaya, il tor sovek-kitok ik vesh' proposed tor ish-veh, heh t'vi khaf-spol vesh' openly fupa s' (k' wuh boatswain) tor nam-tor u' nesh-kur u' ish-veh khlop-patam, proposed tor dahkuh vath swabs tor prah ek' mankind vi' rihag'es; if vesh' ni effectually ovsoh (wuh swab skan having considerable political vi-yumuk) ik ish-veh nem-tor ulef wuh khru tor eku vel gas'rak, heh yi ish-veh vesh' goh katau pa' k'fai wuh trau pi' grocer k' wuh wan-kur taik, nesh-kur gaiters, heh yon-kur han, getting vi' wuh wak-vel, k' wuh gridiron, heh listening, heh coming si', heh knocking kanok-veh ne' s' za' k' wuh gridiron ik au couldn't confute k' ra au had overheard. Nash pufulag-tor tor mr. Wopsle's (vi had worla vesh' puzhu-tor t' fa') coming svi' k' wuh yel heh ash'ai-zhel fi', u' wuh plenipotentiary t' lo'uk tepul kharik s' wuh admiralty, tor leralmin ik wuh swabs vesh' ek' tor hal-tor tor prison fi' wuh gla-tor, heh ik au had katau wuh boatswain ne' wuh union jack, u' wuh slight acknowledgment t' ish-veh tsuri dvin. Wuh boatswain, unmanned na' wuh wuh'rak wak, respectfully psethau ish-veh bezhun fi' wuh jack, heh yi cheering abru, heh addressing mr. Wopsle u' ish-veh dor, solicited permission tor nem-tor ish-veh k' wuh ralek. Mr. Wopsle, conceding ish-veh ralek k' wuh gracious dignity, vesh' iyi shoved vi' wuh grazhiv teruk, du' kanok-veh tam-tor wuh hornpipe; heh s' ik teruk, surveying wuh tsuri k' wuh discontented bezhun, became aware t' me. Wuh dahr krus vesh' wuh kim-shah uzh grand comic christmas pantomime, svi' wuh wuh'rak scene t' if, ish-veh kusut-tor me tor suspect ik i patal-tor mr. Wopsle k' yon-kur worsted mal ne' wuh highly sukmakhau phosphoric countenance heh wuh kolaya t' yon-kur curtain-geldel na' ish-veh isachya, engaged svi' wuh manufacture t' thunderbolts svi' wuh t'nash-veh, heh displaying lo'uk cowardice lu ish-veh masuk' trensu sarlah ha-kel (maut hoarse) tor aru-yem. Tonk'peh au presently presented himself ne' worthier circumstances; na', wuh genius t' youthful ashaya hasu svi' aitlun t' assistance, fi' khrosahp t' wuh parental brutality t' wuh ignorant uroshitausu vi opposed wuh dvel t' ish-veh ko-fu's khaf-spol, k' purposely tevan-tor fi-tor wuh vel, svi' wuh flour-sa'haf, s' wuh wuh'rak-lan-tol krani, summoned wuh sententious enchanter; heh au, coming abru s' wuh antipodes rather unsteadily, po' wuh sauyaing khrashik halovaya, skan-tor tor nam-tor mr. Wopsle svi' wuh pid-crowned taik, k' wuh necromantic ar'kadan svi' veh ral'es ne' ish-veh kar. Wuh business t' nash enchanter fi' terra hasu principally tor nam-tor variben na', uralau na', butted na', tam-tor na', heh kahai na' k' yon t' vuhnauk colours, au had wuh rom deal t' wak fi' ish-veh el'ru. Heh i glantau, k' lo'uk ak'wikmun, ik au vaikau ish-veh tor staring svi' t'nash-veh kharat u' kuv au vesh' pakik svi' tauraya. Tra' vesh' vel ni remarkable svi' wuh increasing glare t' mr. Wopsle's bezhun, heh au seemed tor nam-tor turning ni wehk vel abru' svi' ish-veh kashek heh tor tor'ovau ni confused, ik i kupi ri tor ish-veh si'. I hayal-tor thinking t' ish-veh wu po' au had she-tor tor wuh wan svi' wuh suk glantau-nuf, heh fam dvun i kupi ri tor ish-veh si'. I vesh' fam dvun thinking t' ish-veh lu i sasarlah t' wuh theatre wuh wadan afterwards, heh afer-tor ish-veh waiting na' me be' wuh svep. "uf tor du tor?" leralmin-tor i, shaking el'ru k' ish-veh u' etek da-tor ne' wuh yut teretuhr. "vesht gla-tor nash-veh ik gla-tor du me." "gla-tor du, mr. Pip!" au fun-tor. "ha, veling vesht gla-tor nash-veh du. Tonk'peh vi else vesh' tra'?" "vi else?" "ish-veh nam-tor wuh strangest vel, " leralmin-tor mr. Wopsle, drifting vi' ish-veh pakik glazhau va'ashiv; "heh wi i kupi swear tor ish-veh." becoming alarmed, i entreated mr. Wopsle tor danau ish-veh meaning. "whether i dang ma pubeglanau ish-veh palikauk tonk'peh na' ish-veh hasu tra', " leralmin-tor mr. Wopsle, going fi' svi' wuh ka pakik yut, "i mokuhlek't nam-tor a'rak; wi i nah-tor i dang." involuntarily i glazhau pauk me, u' i vesh' accustomed tor glazhau pauk me lu i went ha-kel; na' aifa mysterious zhit mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh chill. "oh! Au mokuhlek't nam-tor svi' glan, " leralmin-tor mr. Wopsle. "au went si' fa' i went ska'. Vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh hal-tor." having wuh utvau ik i had na' hasu suspicious, i kauk suspected nash ri donku-tor fundauik-ithop. I mistrusted wuh design tor entrap me vi' ein admission. Therefore i glanced na' ish-veh u' etek lates-tor fi' teretuhr, tonk'peh leralmin-tor nothing. "i had wuh ridiculous fancy ik au bolau nam-tor k' du, mr. Pip, till vesht gla-tor nash-veh ik du vesh' ved unconscious t' ish-veh, sitting za' du tra' spo' wuh tam'a." t'nash-veh former chill crept abru' me va'ashiv, tonk'peh i vesh' resolved ri tor stariben wi, na' ish-veh vesh' ved tsurkanik k' ish-veh zhit ik au lau nam-tor eku fi' tor vimevilau me tor tersau aifa dzhinaya k' provis. Veling, i vesh' perfectly sure heh safe ik provis had ri vesh' tra'. "i dare leralmin du wonder na' me, mr. Pip; indeed, gla-tor nash-veh du tor. Tonk'peh ish-veh nam-tor ni maut flekh! Du'll hardly dva-tor ra i am going tor var-tor du. I kupi hardly dva-tor ish-veh myself, kuv du var-tor me." "indeed?" leralmin-tor i. "rai, indeed. Mr. Pip, du vokau svi' hinek wak wuh ac'ruth christmas gad, lu du vesh' ved wuh kan, heh i aru-yokul na' gargery's, heh ein ask'ersu sarlah tor wuh svep tor prah wuh shif t' handcuffs nodolau?" "i vokau ish-veh maut muhl." "heh du vokau ik tra' vesh' wuh a'vesh' po' dahkuh convicts, heh ik etek hau svi' ish-veh, heh ik gargery nem-tor du fi' ish-veh pla', heh ik i nem-tor wuh ras-tukh, heh du potau abru k' me u' muhl u' du kupi?" "i vokau ish-veh ek' maut muhl." weh-rom do au nahp, kaula wuh kim-shah clause. "heh du vokau ik sarlah etek abru k' wuh dahkuh svi' wuh razh, heh ik tra' vesh' wuh scuffle svi' au, heh ish-veh t' au had vesh' severely handled heh mau mauled pa' wuh limuk k' wuh vath?"
