"gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh ek' fa' me." "heh ik wuh ask'ersu lighted torches, heh shitau wuh dahkuh svi' wuh centre, heh ik etek went fi' tor gla-tor wuh kim-shah t' au, abru' wuh nesh-kur masu-kastra, k' wuh torchlight shining fi' ish-veh limuk, i am particular pa' ik, k' wuh torchlight shining fi' ish-veh limuk, lu tra' vesh' wuh sik mokov t' gu'gelik mu-yor ek' pa' etek?" "ha, " leralmin-tor i. "i vokau ek' ik." "yi, mr. Pip, veh t' eifa dahkuh prisoners hayal-tor za' du tonight. I gla-tor ish-veh abru' ish-veh tipan." "br'xan!" i nahp. I ya'akash ish-veh yi, "if t' wuh dahkuh tor du suppose gla-tor du?" "wuh veh vi had vesh' mauled, " au kilko-tor readily, "heh i'll swear i gla-tor ish-veh! Wuh weht i nah-tor t' ish-veh, wuh weht ac'ruth i am t' ish-veh." "nash nam-tor maut curious!" leralmin-tor i, k' wuh buhfik assumption i kupi shitau fi' t' its hasu nothing weht tor me. "maut curious indeed!" i fam yehat exaggerate wuh enhanced disquiet vi' if nash conversation threw me, il wuh special heh peculiar vash i olau na' compeyson's having vesh' za' me "spo' wuh tam'a." na' kuv au had ek'wak vesh' s' t'nash-veh nahp na' wuh zamu moments teretuhr opi' wuh hiding had palikau, ish-veh vesh' svi' eifa maut moments lu au vesh' closest tor me; heh tor nah-tor ik i dang nam-tor ni unconscious heh ska' t'nash-veh klashausu po' ek' t'nash-veh tun vesh' u' kuv i had ikap-tor wuh avenue t' wuh hundred svep tor potau ish-veh si', heh yi had afer-tor ish-veh na' t'nash-veh kar-nef. I kupi ri vet, either, ik au vesh' tra', fai'ei i vesh' tra', heh ik, however slight wuh appearance t' tehvar tra' lau nam-tor pa' etek, tehvar vesh' kwon-hau-ov be' heh torupik. I shitau such deshkau tor mr. Wopsle u', lu did wuh sasu sarlah svi'? Au kupi ri var-tor me ik; gla-tor ish-veh me, heh abru' t'nash-veh tipan gla-tor ish-veh wuh sasu. Ish-veh vesh' ri abi' au had gla-tor ish-veh na' ein wak ik au began tor shasutan-tor ish-veh; tonk'peh au had s' wuh wuh'rak vaguely katravah ish-veh k' me, heh fainu ish-veh u' somehow t' me svi' wuh hinek pi'kahr wak. Uf vesh' au sai-vel-tor? Prosperously, tonk'peh ri noticeably vathru; au nahp, svi' nesh-kur. Vesh' ish-veh limuk na' ek' disfigured? Rai, au pudva-tor ri. I pudva-tor ri nuh', na', hi svi' t'nash-veh brooding fupa s' i had taken rai especial beglanau t' wuh sutra za' me, i nahp ish-veh kesik ik wuh limuk na' ek' disfigured would ma skamau t'nash-veh attention. Lu mr. Wopsle had imparted tor me ek' ik au kupi recall il i saseshak, heh lu i had skasau ish-veh tor wuh pi' appropriate refreshment, po' wuh zung-tor t' wuh khru, etek parted. Ish-veh vesh' svi' leh-dah heh veh o'wak-vel lu i pulau wuh temple, heh wuh temep vesh' ikap-tor. Kling vesh' be' me lu i went svi' heh went ha-kel. Herbert had sarlah svi', heh etek meskarau wuh maut serious shikh-orna k' wuh yon. Tonk'peh tra' vesh' nothing tor nam-tor ovsoh, saving tor sviribau tor wemmick ra i had ik mu-yor afer-tor si', heh tor remind ish-veh ik etek bek-tor na' ish-veh hint. U' i nahp ik i lau compromise ish-veh kuv i went nuh' k'ashiv tor wuh castle, i tor nash sviribaya k' nuhm. I kitau ish-veh fa' i went tor sar-tak, heh went si' heh posted ish-veh; heh va'ashiv kling vesh' be' me. Herbert heh i sep-wafikh ik etek kupi tor nothing else tonk'peh nam-tor maut cautious. Heh etek vesh' maut cautious indeed, weht cautious do fa', kuv ik vesh' tor-yehat, heh i na' t'nash-veh krus worla went be' chinks's basin, kaula lu i fel-tor k', heh yi i goh glazhau na' mill muzh kutra u' i glazhau na' sovek-kitok. Chapter xlviii. Wuh dahr t' wuh dahkuh latva referred tor svi' wuh kim-shah chapter paresh-tor pa' wuh wehk gad po' wuh wuh'rak. I had va'ashiv losrak t'nash-veh masu-hali na' wuh kif ne' mesut; wuh wak vesh' wuh wadan earlier svi' wuh aru; heh, undecided wilat tor aru-yokul, i had strolled abru vi' cheapside, heh vesh' strolling bi' ish-veh, surely wuh danik unsettled person svi' ek' wuh toranik concourse, lu wuh suk el'ru vesh' laid fi-tor t'nash-veh tipan k' ein veh overtaking me. Ish-veh vesh' mr. Jaggers's el'ru, heh au be' dvun-tor ish-veh k'fai t'nash-veh kar. "u' etek nam-tor going svi' wuh ka kharat, pip, etek lau lates teretuhr. Wilat nam-tor du bound na'?" "na' wuh temple, i nah-tor, " leralmin-tor i. "ri tor du fai-tor?" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. "muhl, " i fun-tor, glad na' wuh'wak tor prah wuh weh-rom t' ish-veh svi' tuhs-linisaya, "i ri tor fai-tor, na' i ma ri tor abru t'nash-veh kashek." "du nam-tor going tor aru-yokul?" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. "du ri tor kashek admitting ik, i suppose?" "rai, " i fun-tor, "i ri tor kashek admitting ik." "heh nam-tor ri engaged?" "i ri tor kashek admitting isha ik i am ri engaged." "yi, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, "sarlah heh aru-yokul k' me." i vesh' going tor tobeg myself, lu au hau, "wemmick's coming." ni i rubai t'nash-veh tobeg vi' wuh acceptance, wuh zamu zhit i had uttered, serving na' wuh palikaya t' either, heh etek went bi' cheapside heh vul-tor ska' tor pi' britain, du' wuh ha'ge vesh' springing abru brilliantly svi' wuh mahr-kel krani, heh wuh yut ha'gelek-lighters, scarcely finding solektra hiyet tor kastik ish-veh pu'uth fi' svi' wuh midst t' wuh aru's bustle, vesh' skipping abru heh ne' heh sahran svi' heh si', sharu weht yon-kur bezhun svi' wuh hohnaya ihsek do t'nash-veh rushlight kispek na' wuh hummums had tu'ash wan-kur bezhun svi' wuh ghostly temok. Na' wuh office svi' pi' britain tra' vesh' wuh tsuri nuhm-kitaun, el'ru-washing, ha'fek-snuffing, heh safe-locking, ik a'ing wuh business t' wuh gad. U' i lam-tor idle k' mr. Jaggers's yon, its rising heh tevan-tor yai tor wuh dahkuh vishizhau fi' wuh nef glazhau u' kuv au vesh' mavaun wuh diabolical zhagra na' bo-peep k' me; du' wuh shif t' dirik, thelik office ha'fek ik dimly lighted mr. Jaggers u' au kitau svi' wuh teruk vesh' decorated k' kitork kuvoran-thalv, u' kuv svi' remembrance t' wuh kasu t' geldau clients. Etek went tor gerrard yut, ek' rehkuh teretuhr, svi' wuh hackney-coach: heh, u' ak u' etek prah tra', aru-yem vesh' dvin-tor. Hi i dang ri ma nahp t' tor, svi' ik shi, wuh danik irak dzhinaya k' ni mau u' wuh glazhau tor wemmick's walworth sentiments, wi i dang ma had rai objection tor catching ish-veh bezhun i' heh yi svi' wuh friendly yut. Tonk'peh ish-veh vesh' ri tor nam-tor ovsoh. Au da-tor ish-veh bezhun fi' mr. Jaggers whenever au ashenau au s' wuh pasu, heh vesh' u' pseth heh irak tor me u' kuv tra' vesh' t'dahsu wemmicks, heh nash vesh' wuh riyeht veh. "did du satau ik pitoh t' din-tor havisham's tor mr. Pip, wemmick?" mr. Jaggers ya'akash, ak po' etek began aru-yem. "rai, osu, " fun-tor wemmick; "ish-veh vesh' going k' lehk, lu du katau mr. Pip vi' wuh office. La' ish-veh nam-tor." au handed ish-veh tor ish-veh principal instead t' tor me. "ish-veh's wuh pitoh t' dahkuh zehl, pip, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, handing ish-veh fi', "satau abru tor me k' din-tor havisham fi' khrosahp t' ish-veh ri hasu sure t' ish-veh shi'yavekh. She var-tor me ik she aitlu tor gla-tor du fi' wuh pi' tukh t' business du mentioned tor ish-veh. Du'll hal-tor ne'?" "ha, " leralmin-tor i, casting t'nash-veh bezhun abru' wuh pitoh, if vesh' exactly svi' eifa zhil. "lu tor du nah-tor t' going ne'?" "i ma wuh impending engagement, " leralmin-tor i, glancing na' wemmick, vi vesh' putting aluk vi' wuh lehk-office, "ik renders me rather uncertain t' t'nash-veh wak. Na' wuh'wak, i nah-tor." "kuv mr. Pip has wuh intention t' going na' wuh'wak, " leralmin-tor wemmick tor mr. Jaggers, "au needn't kitau wuh kilko-srashiv, du fai-tor." receiving nash u' wuh intimation ik ish-veh vesh' buhfik ri tor vohtaya, i settled ik i would hal-tor tor-morrow, heh leralmin-tor ni. Wemmick drank wuh makh t' wine, heh glazhau k' wuh grimly satisfied sov na' mr. Jaggers, tonk'peh ri na' me. "ni, pip! Etwel t'hy'la wuh a'lazb, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, "has mavau ish-veh nop. Au has skil-tor wuh patra." ish-veh vesh' u' mau u' i kupi tor tor assent. "hah! Au nam-tor wuh promising fellowin ish-veh waybut au lau ri ma ish-veh ek' ish-veh sha' yut. Wuh stronger dungi skil svi' wuh shaht, tonk'peh wuh stronger has tor nam-tor afer-tor si' wuh'rak. Kuv au dang da-tor tor, heh kuhsh-tor ish-veh" "surely, " i svi-shau, k' wuh yontau limuk heh khaf-spol, "du ri tor seriously nah-tor ik au nam-tor scoundrel hiyet na' ik, mr. Jaggers?" "i didn't leralmin ni, pip. I am putting wuh nuf. Kuv au dang da-tor tor heh kuhsh-tor ish-veh, au lau possibly prah wuh karik'es fi' ish-veh vla; kuv ish-veh dang nam-tor wuh deshker t' kash-tor-vel, au certainly dungi ri. Ish-veh would nam-tor pavesh ar'kadan tor mazhiv-kur-tor wuh opinion uf wuh katravahsu t' ik wihfelau dungi da-tor si' svi' such circumstances, fai'ei ish-veh's wuh toss-abru svi' dahkuh results." "sos ya'akash ra au nam-tor?" "wuh katravahsu spo' etwel t'hy'la wuh a'lazb, " kilko-tor mr. Jaggers, "either kuhsh-tor il cringes. Au lau cringe heh growl, il cringe heh ri growl; tonk'peh au either kuhsh-tor il cringes. Ya'akash wemmick ish-veh opinion." "either kuhsh-tor il cringes, " leralmin-tor wemmick, mokov addressing himself tor me. "ni la''s tor mrs. Bentley drummle, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, taking wuh decanter t' choicer wine s' ish-veh dumb-waiter, heh boshak na' tik t' etek heh na' himself, "heh lau wuh deshker t' supremacy nam-tor settled tor wuh t'sai's satisfaction! Tor wuh satisfaction t' wuh t'sai heh wuh gentleman, ish-veh worla dungi nam-tor. I', molly, molly, molly, molly, uf vohris du nam-tor tor-gad!" she vesh' na' ish-veh kar-nef lu au addressed ish-veh, putting wuh dish fi-tor wuh pasu. U' she withdrew ish-veh el'ru s' ish-veh, she tevan-tor pla' wuh ash il dahkuh, nervously muttering ein tobeg. Heh wuh ac'ruth torai t' ish-veh ozh, u' she stariben, pehkau t'nash-veh attention. "ra's wuh tukh?" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. "nothing. Goh wuh subject etek vesh' speaking t', " leralmin-tor i, "vesh' rather kusut-tor tor me." wuh torai t' ish-veh ozh vesh' spo' wuh torai t' knitting. She lam-tor looking na' ish-veh trensu, ri understanding whether she vesh' elik tor hal-tor, il whether au had weht tor leralmin tor ish-veh heh would vutau ish-veh pla' kuv she did hal-tor. Ish-veh glazhau vesh' maut intent. Surely, i had gla-tor exactly such bezhun heh such el'ru fi' wuh memorable occasion maut lately! Au dismissed ish-veh, heh she glided s' wuh tvi-shal. Tonk'peh she hafau fa' me u' plainly u' kuv she vesh' fam dvun tra'. I glazhau na' eifa el'ru, i glazhau na' eifa bezhun, i glazhau na' ik flowing isachya; heh i tcok'at au k' vath el'ru, vath bezhun, vath isachya, ik i fai-tor t', heh k' ra eifa lau nam-tor po' dah-leh tevun t' wuh brutal sa-telsu heh wuh stormy ha'kiv. I glazhau va'ashiv na' eifa el'ru heh bezhun t' wuh housekeeper, heh nahp t' wuh inexplicable olaya ik had sarlah abru' me lu i kim-shah walkednot alonein wuh ruined bah-ker, heh k'fai wuh deserted brewery. I nahp uf wuh ka olaya had sarlah pla' lu i gla-tor wuh limuk looking na' me, heh wuh el'ru pral-tor tor me s' wuh skaf-coach krani; heh uf ish-veh had sarlah pla' va'ashiv heh had kahai pa' me spo' igen-wesh, lu i had be' dvun-tor svi' wuh carriagenot alonethrough wuh sudden glare t' ta'hal svi' wuh gu'gelik yut. I nahp uf veh naf t' katravek had gol-tor ik shasutan svi' wuh theatre, heh uf such wuh naf, wanting fa', had vesh' riveted na' me i', lu i had be' dvun-tor k' wuh pavesh swift s' estella's ahm tor wuh ozh k' ish-veh knitting torai, heh wuh whio'naks bezhun. Heh i olau absolutely ac'ruth ik nash kosu vesh' estella's ko-mekh. Mr. Jaggers had gla-tor me k' estella, heh vesh' ri kesik ki' din-tor wuh sentiments i had vesh' na' rai kusut-tor tor ip-sut. Au nodded lu i leralmin-tor wuh subject vesh' kusut-tor tor me, clapped me fi' wuh pla', shitau pauk wuh wine va'ashiv, heh went fi' k' ish-veh aru-yem. Goh dah'wak weht did wuh housekeeper reappear, heh yi ish-veh stay svi' wuh tvi-shal vesh' maut pen, heh mr. Jaggers vesh' nasik k' ish-veh. Tonk'peh ish-veh el'ru vesh' estella's el'ru, heh ish-veh bezhun vesh' estella's bezhun, heh kuv she had reappeared wuh hundred wak i kupi ma vesh' neither weht sure il lehkuh sure ik t'nash-veh conviction vesh' wuh yeht'es. Ish-veh vesh' wuh pasik khru, na' wemmick drew ish-veh wine, lu sarlah ish-veh pauk, ved u' wuh tukh t' business, aishan u' au lau ma drawn ish-veh salary lu ik sarlah pauk, heh k' ish-veh bezhun fi' ish-veh chief, hayal-tor svi' wuh fupa s' t' perpetual readiness na' tuhs-linisaya. U' tor wuh nosahp t' wine, ish-veh lehk-office vesh' u' indifferent heh pok u' sovek vath lehk-office na' its nosahp t' nuhm. S' t'nash-veh sfek t' zan-tor, au vesh' wuh riyeht t'dahsu ek' wuh wak, heh goh externally spo' wuh wemmick t' walworth. Etek nem-tor etwel trasha lehkuh-mal, heh losrak teretuhr. Kauk lu etek vesh' groping among mr. Jaggers's fek t' kluf na' etwel taik, i olau ik wuh gas'rak t'dahsu vesh' fi' ish-veh yut pla'; heh etek had ri hal-tor ulef wuh dozen ker ne' gerrard yut svi' wuh walworth kharat, fa' i afer-tor ik i vesh' walking kar svi' kar k' wuh gas'rak t'dahsu, heh ik wuh riyeht t'dahsu had na-sovau vi' wuh khru sov. "muhl!" leralmin-tor wemmick, "ik's abru'! Au's wuh wonderful sasu, rik' ish-veh living likeness; tonk'peh i olau ik i ma tor wufkau myself abru lu i aru-yokul k' ish-veh, heh i aru-yokul weht comfortably unscrewed." i olau ik nash vesh' wuh rom star-krus t' wuh nuf, heh var-tor ish-veh ni. "wouldn't leralmin ish-veh tor anybody tonk'peh yourself, " au kilko-tor. "i fai-tor ik ra nam-tor leralmin-tor svi' du heh me hal-tor rai further." i ya'akash ish-veh kuv au had ek'wak gla-tor din-tor havisham's thanai ko-fu, mrs. Bentley drummle. Au leralmin-tor rai. Tor nan'woi hasu nuh' abrupt, i yi stariben t' wuh aged heh t' din-tor skiffins. Au glazhau rather sly lu i mentioned din-tor skiffins, heh pehkau svi' wuh yut tor salur ish-veh han, k' wuh padukau t' wuh patam, heh wuh flourish ri ved elik s' latent boastfulness. "wemmick, " leralmin-tor i, "tor du vokau telling me, fa' i wuh'rak went tor mr. Jaggers's awek kelek, tor beglanau ik housekeeper?" "did i?" au kilko-tor. "ah, i dare leralmin i did. Deuce nem-tor me, " au hau, suddenly, "i fai-tor i did. I talal i am ri ved unscrewed wi." "wuh kwai beast fnau-tor, du puvutau ish-veh." "heh ra tor du vutau ish-veh?" "wuh ka. Uf did mr. Jaggers fnau ish-veh, wemmick?" "ik's ish-veh tsat. She has vesh' k' ish-veh wehk wuh wu tevun." "i istaya du would var-tor me ish-veh var. I olau wuh particular eku'ko svi' hasu acquainted k' ish-veh. Du fai-tor ik ra nam-tor leralmin-tor svi' du heh me hal-tor rai further." "muhl!" wemmick kilko-tor, "i ri tor fai-tor ish-veh var, ik nam-tor, i ri tor fai-tor ek' t' ish-veh. Tonk'peh ra i tor fai-tor i'll var-tor du. Etek nam-tor svi' etwel awek heh personal tsoh, veling." "veling." "wuh nosahp il ni t' tevun ago, ik kosu vesh' ar'kada na' wuh hinek bailey na' riyeht-staya, heh vesh' acquitted. She vesh' wuh maut handsome nu'ri kosu, heh i dva-tor had ein gypsy khaf svi' ish-veh. Anyhow, ish-veh vesh' fal hiyet lu ish-veh vesh' abru, u' du lau suppose." "tonk'peh she vesh' acquitted." "mr. Jaggers vesh' na' ish-veh, " pursued wemmick, k' wuh glazhau bosh t' meaning, "heh ar'kada wuh nuf svi' wuh yut ved astonishing. Ish-veh vesh' wuh desperate nuf, heh ish-veh vesh' comparatively lehkuh-mal gad k' ish-veh yi, heh au ar'kada ish-veh tor paik admiration; svi' kla-min, ish-veh lau siyah nam-tor leralmin-tor tor ma tor ish-veh. Au ar'kada ish-veh himself na' wuh police-office, gad po' gad na' wehk gad, contending tehnat kauk wuh committal; heh na' wuh trial wilat au couldn't ar'kadan ish-veh himself, hayal-tor ne' counsel, andevery veh knewput svi' ek' wuh alem heh pepper. Wuh riyeht-stau person vesh' wuh kosu, wuh kosu wuh rom lehkuh tevun older, maut mau larger, heh maut mau stronger. Ish-veh vesh' wuh nuf t' jealousy. Au fi' pufulag-tor tramping ha-tor, heh nash kosu svi' gerrard yut la' had vesh' telik maut nu'ri, abru' wuh broomstick (u' etek leralmin), tor wuh tramping sasu, heh vesh' wuh buhfik fury svi' sfek t' jealousy. Wuh riyeht-stau kosu, weht wuh match na' wuh sasu, certainly, svi' sfek t' yearswas afer-tor tevik svi' wuh aushfa-kel be' hounslow heath. Tra' had vesh' wuh khrashik struggle, sos'eh wuh puk. She vesh' bruised heh scratched heh torn, heh had vesh' meskarau k' wuh drahk, na' kim-shah, heh khluhkau. I', tra' vesh' rai reasonable evidence tor implicate sovek person tonk'peh nash kosu, heh fi' wuh improbabilities t' ish-veh having vesh' kup tor tor ish-veh mr. Jaggers principally shom-tor ish-veh nuf. Du lau nam-tor sure, " leralmin-tor wemmick, touching me fi' wuh sleeve, "ik au worla dwelt fi-tor wuh karik'es t' ish-veh el'ru yi, hi au sometimes tor i'." i had var-tor wemmick t' ish-veh showing etek ish-veh kar-nik, ik gad t' wuh aru-yem party. "muhl, osu!" wemmick went fi'; "ish-veh happenedhappened, ri tor du gla-tor?ik nash kosu vesh' ni maut artfully sai-vel-tor s' wuh wak t' ish-veh apprehension, ik she glazhau mau slighter do she really vesh'; svi' particular, ish-veh sleeves nam-tor kwon-hau-ov vokau ki' vesh' ni skilfully contrived ik ish-veh kar had ved wuh delicate glazhau. She had goh wuh wadi-yarek il dahkuh pa' ish-veh, nothing na' wuh tramp, tonk'peh wuh pla'dor t' ish-veh el'ru vesh' lacerated, heh wuh deshker vesh', vesh' ish-veh k' ozh-felu? I', mr. Jaggers gluvau ik she had struggled k'fai wuh lo'uk lot t' brambles if vesh' ri u' pid u' ish-veh limuk; tonk'peh if she kupi ri ma prah k'fai heh potau ish-veh el'ru s'; heh bits t' eifa brambles vesh' actually afer-tor svi' ish-veh wadi heh shitau svi' evidence, u' muhl u' wuh kla-min ik wuh brambles svi' deshker vesh' afer-tor fi' linisaya ki' vesh' pushau k'fai, heh ki' pi' tresahk-tor t' ish-veh sai-vel heh pi' gla-tor t' khaf fi-tor au la' heh tra'. Tonk'peh wuh boldest sfek au tor vesh' nash: ish-veh vesh' attempted tor nam-tor eku abru, svi' skan t' ish-veh jealousy, ik she vesh' ne' karik suspicion t' having, na' pa' wuh wak t' wuh riyeht-staya, frantically vashau ish-veh kan k' nash mansome rehkuh tevun oldto revenge herself fi-tor ish-veh. Mr. Jaggers ar'kada ik svi' nash yut: "etek leralmin aifa nam-tor ri ulidar t' ozh-felu, tonk'peh ulidar t' brambles, heh etek gluvaya du wuh brambles. Du leralmin au nam-tor ulidar t' ozh-felu, heh du eku abru wuh ul-wihka ik she vashau ish-veh kan. Du bolau nar-tor ek' consequences t' ik ul-wihka. Na' sovek-vel etek fai-tor, she lau ma vashau ish-veh kan, heh wuh kan svi' clinging tor ish-veh lau ma scratched ish-veh el'ru. Ra yi? Du nam-tor ri trying ish-veh na' wuh riyeht-staya t' ish-veh kan; po ri tor du? U' tor nash nuf, kuv du dungi ma scratches, etek leralmin ik, na' sovek-vel etek fai-tor, du lau ma accounted na' au, assuming na' wuh sake t' nerau-kek-vuhnayek ik du ma ri fereik-tor au?" "tor hau-ov abru, osu, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "mr. Jaggers vesh' altogether nuh' wehk na' wuh jury, heh au mazhiv-kur-tor svi'." "has she vesh' svi' ish-veh dvin ek'wak opi'?" "ha; tonk'peh ri goh ik, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "she went vi' ish-veh dvin iyi po' ish-veh acquittal, fnau-tor u' she nam-tor i'. She has opi' vesh' saven-tor veh vel heh wuh'ashiv svi' wuh yut t' ish-veh gu-vam, tonk'peh she vesh' fnau-tor s' wuh palikaya." "tor du vokau wuh guv t' wuh kan?" "leralmin-tor ki' vesh' wuh ko-kan." "du ma nothing weht tor leralmin tor me tor-mu-yor?" "nothing. I prah ish-veh nuhm heh vashau ish-veh. Nothing." etek di'kizh-tor wuh cordial rom-mu-yor, heh i went ha-kel, k' uzh tukh na' t'nash-veh nahp, hi k' rai vas s' wuh hinek. Chapter xlix. Putting din-tor havisham's pitoh svi' t'nash-veh abru'lik, ik ish-veh lau dvin-tor u' t'nash-veh credentials na' ni ak reappearing na' satis kelek, svi' nuf ish-veh waywardness dang ras-tukh ish-veh tor sagluvau sovek ak'wikmun na' seeing me, i went ne' va'ashiv k' wuh coach thurai gad. Tonk'peh i alighted na' wuh halfway kelek, heh breakfasted tra', heh lates-tor wuh shom t' wuh ir; na' i sought tor prah vi' wuh kahr quietly k' wuh unfrequented yut, heh tor trasha ish-veh svi' wuh ka manner. Wuh buhfik ta'hal t' wuh gad vesh' hal-tor lu i be' dvun-tor bi' wuh hizhuk echoing kelek za' wuh pid yut. Wuh sha-ti t' ruin wilat wuh hinek monks had wuh'wak had ish-veh refectories heh bah-ker, heh wilat wuh karik temok vesh' i' hish-tor vi' wuh dvin t' humble foshuhl heh stables, vesh' siyah u' ralash-fam u' wuh hinek monks svi' ish-veh shi'vukhut. Wuh cathedral kusek had na' wuh'wak wuh sadder heh wuh weht remote ralash tor me, u' i hurried fi' avoiding glantaya, do au had ek'wak had fa'; ni, wuh puv-tor t' wuh hinek nafek vesh' borne tor t'nash-veh kaluk spo' mem-lu til-kum ralash-tanaf; heh wuh rooks, u' au hovered pa' wuh zhai-kur kispek heh swung svi' wuh sai-famik pid lap t' wuh priory bah-ker, seemed tor vutau tor me ik wuh shi vesh' rubai, heh ik estella vesh' hal-tor s' ish-veh na' ek'wak. Wuh shakhupik kosu, ik i had gla-tor fa' u' veh t' wuh dvinsu vi ha-tor svi' wuh supplementary kelek mes' wuh pla' courtyard, tu'ash wuh temep. Wuh lighted ha'fek lam-tor svi' wuh gu'gelik tvur k'svi, u' t' hinek, heh i nem-tor ish-veh abru heh she-tor wuh staircase sa'awek. Din-tor havisham vesh' ri svi' ish-veh sha' tvi-shal, tonk'peh vesh' svi' wuh larger tvi-shal mes' wuh landing. Looking svi' na' wuh svep, po' knocking svi' vain, vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh sitting fi' wuh hearth svi' wuh ragged ku-san, ikap-tor fa', heh pakik svi' wuh contemplation t', wuh ashy yon. Doing u' i had k'ashiv ovsoh, i went svi', heh lam-tor touching wuh hinek vuzh-mev-krus, wilat she kupi gla-tor me lu she ashenau ish-veh bezhun. Tra' vesh' wuh sov t' utter loneliness fi-tor ish-veh, ik would ma dvun-tor me tor pity hi she had wilfully ovsoh me wuh deeper dash do i kupi falun ish-veh k'. U' i lam-tor compassionating ish-veh, heh thinking uf, svi' wuh progress t' wak, i nuh' had sarlah tor nam-tor wuh krus t' wuh vashau fortunes t' ik kelek, ish-veh bezhun shom-tor fi' me. She nantau, heh leralmin-tor svi' wuh neik spes, "nam-tor ish-veh yeht?" "ish-veh nam-tor i, pip. Mr. Jaggers mazhiv-kur-tor me ish-veh pitoh za-gad, heh i ma pakik rai wak." "nemaiyo. Nemaiyo." u' i katau wuh'ashiv t' wuh ragged ku-san tor wuh hearth heh hayal-tor ne', i remarked wuh uzh sagluvaya fi' ish-veh limuk, u' kuv she vesh' kwes t' me. "i aitlun, " she leralmin-tor, "tor pursue ik subject du mentioned tor me lu du vesh' kim-shah la', heh tor gluvaya du ik i am ri ek' kov. Tonk'peh sos'eh du mokuhlek worla dva-tor, i', ik tra' nam-tor sovek-vel komihn svi' t'nash-veh khaf-spol?" lu i leralmin-tor ein reassuring zhit, she sakadau si' ish-veh tremulous gas'rak el'ru, u' hi she vesh' going tor esta me; tonk'peh she recalled ish-veh va'ashiv fa' i ken-tor wuh torai, il fai-tor uf tor poprah ish-veh. "du leralmin-tor, speaking na' ish-veh t'hy'la, ik du kupi var-tor me uf tor tor vel useful heh rom. Vel ik du would spo' ovsoh, nam-tor ish-veh ri?" "vel ik i would spo' ovsoh maut mau." "ra nam-tor ish-veh?" i began explaining tor ish-veh ik tsat vesht-var t' wuh partnership. I had ri prah irak vi' ish-veh, lu i judged s' ish-veh glazhau ik she vesh' thinking svi' wuh discursive yut t' me, rather do t' ra i leralmin-tor. Ish-veh seemed tor nam-tor ni; na', lu i pehkau speaking, wehk moments be' dvun-tor fa' she gluvau ik she vesh' d'wonil t' wuh kla-min. "tor du shaya ska', " she ya'akash yi, k' ish-veh former sov t' hasu kwes t' me, "fai'ei du fnu-ven me nuh' mau tor lesh tor stariben tor me?" "rai, rai, " i kilko-tor, "uf mokuhlek du nah-tor ni, din-tor havisham! I pehkau fai'ei i nahp du vesh' ri zahalik ra i leralmin-tor." "sos'eh i vesh' ri, " she kilko-tor, putting wuh el'ru tor ish-veh patam. "palikau va'ashiv, heh kal-tor me glazhau na' vel else. Stay! I' var-tor me." she eku ish-veh el'ru fi-tor ish-veh terpau svi' wuh resolute yut ik sometimes vesh' habitual tor ish-veh, heh glazhau na' wuh yon k' wuh karik sagluvaya t' forcing herself tor attend. I went fi' k' t'nash-veh danaya, heh var-tor ish-veh uf i had rok-tor tor ovsotik wuh transaction s' t'nash-veh tvai, tonk'peh uf svi' nash i vesh' disappointed. Ik krus t' wuh subject (i reminded ish-veh) involved tukh if kupi shid rai krus t' t'nash-veh danaya, na' au vesh' wuh weighty tsat t' wuh'ashiv. "ni!" leralmin-tor she, assenting k' ish-veh patam, tonk'peh ri looking na' me. "heh uf mau donku nam-tor wanting tor ovsotik wuh purchase?" i vesh' rather kwes t' fupa s' ish-veh, na' ish-veh sounded wuh suk hau-ov. "naukuh hundred plesh-tor." "kuv i mazhiv-kur-tor du wuh donku na' nash lof, dungi du potau t'nash-veh tsat u' du ma potau ish-veh sha'?" "ved u' faithfully." "heh ish-veh kashek dungi nam-tor weht na' shom?" "mau weht na' shom." "nam-tor du maut unhappy i'?" she ya'akash nash deshker, fam dvun rik' looking na' me, tonk'peh svi' wuh unwonted molu t' sympathy. I kupi ri kilko na' wuh moment, na' t'nash-veh spes vravshau me. She shitau ish-veh losrak kar mes' wuh patam t' ish-veh terpau, heh softly laid ish-veh fa-patam fi' ish-veh. "i am irak s' kunli, din-tor havisham; tonk'peh i ma vath aisha t' disquiet do sovek du fai-tor t'. Au nam-tor wuh tsat i ma mentioned." po' wuh pi' du', she ashenau ish-veh patam, heh glazhau na' wuh yon va'ashiv. "ish-veh nam-tor thol svi' du tor var-tor me ik du ma vath aisha t' unhappiness. Nam-tor ish-veh yeht?" "nuh' yeht." "mokuhlek i goh dvin-tor du, pip, k' serving ish-veh t'hy'la? Fundauik ik u' ovsoh, nam-tor tra' nothing i mokuhlek tor na' du yourself?" "nothing. I nemaiyo na' wuh deshker. I nemaiyo kauk weht na' wuh molu t' wuh deshker. Tonk'peh tra' nam-tor nothing." she presently she-tor s' ish-veh ku-san, heh glazhau pa' wuh blighted tvi-shal na' wuh tvai t' kitaun. Tra' vesh' rim tra', heh she nem-tor s' ish-veh abru'lik wuh kin-kur eku t' ivory tablets, mounted svi' tarnished pi-maat-tukh, heh kitau fi-tor au k' wuh hish svi' wuh nuf t' tarnished pi-maat-tukh ik geldau s' ish-veh talu. "du nam-tor fam dvun fi' friendly zhil k' mr. Jaggers?" "ved. I aru-yokul k' ish-veh za-gad." "nash nam-tor wuh ek'te'kru tor ish-veh tor vlitau du ik donku, tor ti si' na' ish-veh irresponsible discretion na' ish-veh t'hy'la. I potau rai donku la'; tonk'peh kuv du would rather mr. Jaggers fai-tor nothing t' wuh tukh, i dungi satau ish-veh tor du." "nemaiyo, din-tor havisham; i ma ri wuh least objection tor receiving ish-veh s' ish-veh." she telv-tor me ra she had written; heh ish-veh vesh' kharik heh pa'shik, heh evidently intended tor absolve me s' sovek suspicion t' profiting k' wuh receipt t' wuh donku. I nem-tor wuh tablets s' ish-veh el'ru, heh ish-veh trembled va'ashiv, heh ish-veh trembled weht u' she nem-tor ska' wuh naf-elakh tor if wuh hish vesh' attached, heh shitau ish-veh svi' t'nash-veh. Ek' nash she did rik' looking na' me. "t'nash-veh ahm nam-tor fi' wuh wuh'rak mor. Kuv du mokuhlek ek'wak kitau ne' t'nash-veh ahm, "i forgive ish-veh, " hi ek'wak ni wu po' t'nash-veh pushau khaf-spol nam-tor grazhiv pray tor ish-veh!" "o din-tor havisham, " leralmin-tor i, "i mokuhlek tor ish-veh i'. Tra' ma vesh' sival lafosh; heh t'nash-veh ha'kiv has vesh' wuh glan-fam heh thankless veh; heh i aitlun thrap-fam'es nufau heh kharat irak nuh' mau, tor nam-tor sfith(-) k' du." she da-tor ish-veh limuk tor me na' wuh wuh'rak wak opi' she had averted ish-veh, heh, tor t'nash-veh tauraya, i lau kauk hau tor t'nash-veh vash, eku-tor fi' ish-veh mal-nef na' t'nash-veh ash'ya; k' ish-veh hesha el'ru ashenau tor me svi' wuh manner svi' if, lu ish-veh ri donku-tor khaf-spol vesh' nu'ri heh sluk heh bosh, au bolau k'ashiv ma vesh' ashenau tor sha-ka-ri s' ish-veh ko-mekh's vla. Tor gla-tor ish-veh k' ish-veh wan-kur isachya heh ish-veh worn limuk kneeling na' t'nash-veh ash'ya mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh kolaya k'fai ek' t'nash-veh nentu. I entreated ish-veh tor shen, heh prah t'nash-veh kar pa' ish-veh tor gol'nev ish-veh abru; tonk'peh she goh hish-tor ik el'ru t' t'nash-veh if vesh' nearest tor ish-veh ruskaraya, heh geldau ish-veh patam abru' ish-veh heh wept. I had worla gla-tor ish-veh foshuhl wuh bezhun-masu fa', heh, svi' wuh rok ik wuh vas lau tor ish-veh rom, i keh'sei abru' ish-veh rik' speaking. She vesh' ri kneeling i', tonk'peh vesh' ne' fi-tor wuh solektra. "o!" she maf-tor, despairingly. "ra ma i ovsoh! Ra ma i ovsoh!" "kuv du tvai, din-tor havisham, ra ma du ovsoh tor dash-tor me, kal-tor me kilko-srashiv. Maut pi'. I dang ma ashau ish-veh ne' sovek circumstances. Nam-tor she telik?" "ha." ish-veh vesh' wuh needless deshker, na' wuh uzh desolation svi' wuh desolate kelek had var-tor me ni. "ra ma i ovsoh! Ra ma i ovsoh!" she wrung ish-veh el'ru, heh plesh-tor ish-veh wan-kur isachya, heh fun-tor tor nash maf abru' heh abru' va'ashiv. "ra ma i ovsoh!" i fai-tor ri uf tor kilko-srashiv, il uf tor comfort ish-veh. Ik she had ovsoh wuh grievous vel svi' taking wuh impressionable kan tor mould vi' wuh shid ik ish-veh kwai resentment, spurned affection, heh wounded pride afer-tor vengeance svi', i fai-tor bosh muhl. Tonk'peh ik, svi' shutting si' wuh ta'hal t' gad, she had ikap-tor si' infinitely weht; ik, svi' seclusion, she had secluded herself s' wuh thousand malatik heh hakausu vi-yumuk; ik, ish-veh kashek, brooding solitary, had grown diseased, u' ek' kashkau tor heh bolau heh dungi ik reverse wuh kru'minaakh zek t' ish-veh maker, i fai-tor kaing muhl. Heh sos glazhau fi-tor ish-veh rik' utan'es, seeing ish-veh taflaya svi' wuh ruin she vesh', svi' ish-veh profound unfitness na' nash terra fi' if she vesh' shitau, svi' wuh vanity t' sorrow if had shetau wuh trensu mania, spo' wuh vanity t' penitence, wuh vanity t' remorse, wuh vanity t' unworthiness, heh vath monstrous vanities ik ma vesh' curses svi' nash panu? "abi' du stariben tor ish-veh wuh vath gad, heh abi' vesht gla-tor nash-veh svi' du wuh looking-makh ik gluvau me ra i wuh'wak olau myself, i did ri fai-tor ra i had ovsoh. Ra ma i ovsoh! Ra ma i ovsoh!" heh ni va'ashiv, dah-leh, kau-leh wak abru', ra had she ovsoh! "din-tor havisham, " i leralmin-tor, lu ish-veh maf had tev-tor maf, "du lau dismiss me s' ish-veh kashek heh conscience. Tonk'peh estella nam-tor wuh natya nuf, heh kuv du mokuhlek ek'wak undo sovek moguhsh t' ra du ma ovsoh amiss svi' keeping wuh krus t' ish-veh gas'rak malat maf s' ish-veh, ish-veh dungi nam-tor weh-rom tor tor ik do tor bemoan wuh vesht k'fai wuh hundred tevun." "ha, ha, i fai-tor ish-veh. Tonk'peh, pipmy tal-kam!" tra' vesh' wuh earnest womanly utan'es na' me svi' ish-veh uzh affection. "t'nash-veh tal-kam! Dva-tor nash: lu she wuh'rak sarlah tor me, i tvai tor korsau ish-veh s' misery spo' t'nash-veh sha'. Na' wuh'rak, i tvai rai weht." "muhl, muhl!" leralmin-tor i. "i rok ni." "tonk'peh u' she grew, heh ugau tor nam-tor maut vaksurik, i gradually did weh-rasahkos, heh k' t'nash-veh krol-tor, heh k' t'nash-veh ek'zer, heh k' t'nash-veh savan-don-tak, heh k' nash khlop t' myself kwon-hau-ov fa' ish-veh, wuh warning tor pla' heh sfek t'nash-veh tupa, i vazgau ish-veh khaf-spol maf, heh shitau le-suma svi' its shi." "weh-rom, " i kupi ri gol'nev taran, "ki' losrak ish-veh wuh malatik khaf-spol, kauk tor nam-tor bruised il pushau." k' ik, din-tor havisham glazhau distractedly na' me na' wuh du', heh yi thorau si' va'ashiv, ra had she ovsoh! "kuv du fai-tor ek' t'nash-veh var, " she pleaded, "du would ma ein utan'es na' me heh wuh weh-rom understanding t' me." "din-tor havisham, " i kilko-tor, u' delicately u' i kupi, "i dva-tor i lau leralmin ik i tor fai-tor ish-veh var, heh ma fainu ish-veh ek'wak opi' i wuh'rak losrak nash neighbourhood. Ish-veh has vi'le-esh-tor me k' lo'uk commiseration, heh i rok i ken-tor ish-veh heh its vi-yumuk. Tor ra has be' dvun-tor svi' etek mazhiv-kur-tor me sovek tobeg na' asking du wuh deshker tomasu tor estella? Ri u' she nam-tor, tonk'peh u' she vesh' lu she wuh'rak sarlah la'?" she vesh' hayal-tor fi' wuh solektra, k' ish-veh kar fi' wuh ragged ku-san, heh ish-veh patam leaning fi' au. She glazhau bosh na' me lu i leralmin-tor nash, heh kilko-tor, "hal-tor fi'." "t'vi kan vesh' estella?" she hutau ish-veh patam. "du ri tor fai-tor?" she hutau ish-veh patam va'ashiv. "tonk'peh mr. Jaggers katau ish-veh la', il satau ish-veh la'?" "katau ish-veh la'." "dungi du var-tor me uf ik sarlah pa'?" she kilko-tor svi' wuh neik zhal heh k' yuzhat: "i had vesh' ikap'uh t'du ru'lut svi' aifa tvi-shal wuh akarshif (i ri tor fai-tor uf wu; du fai-tor ra wak wuh wak-vel potau la'), lu i var-tor ish-veh ik i aitlu wuh pi' ko-kan tor za' heh ashaya, heh korsau s' t'nash-veh buk. I had wuh'rak gla-tor ish-veh lu i satau na' ish-veh tor ti nash shi thinoi na' me; having telv-tor t' ish-veh svi' wuh newspapers, fa' i heh wuh panu parted. Au var-tor me ik au would glazhau pa' ish-veh na' such wuh orphan kan. Veh mu-yor au katau ish-veh la' asleep, heh i puvutau ish-veh estella." "lau i ya'akash ish-veh ya'shakhuv yi?" "dahkuh il rehkuh. She herself fai-tor nothing, tonk'peh ik she vesh' losrak wuh orphan heh i thanai ish-veh." ni convinced i vesh' t' ik kosu's hasu ish-veh ko-mekh, ik i aitlu rai evidence tor afer-tor wuh kla-min svi' t'nash-veh sha' kashek. Tonk'peh, tor sovek kashek, i nahp, wuh tersaya la' vesh' pa'shik heh zehik. Ra weht sos rok tor tor k' prolonging wuh interview? I had navau fi' behalf t' herbert, din-tor havisham had var-tor me ek' she fai-tor t' estella, i had leralmin-tor heh ovsoh ra i kupi tor ease ish-veh kashek. Rai tukh k' ra vath zhit etek parted; etek parted. Twilight vesh' ikapik svi' lu i went downstairs vi' wuh malatik sov. I puvutau tor wuh kosu vi had tu'ash wuh temep lu i svi-tor, ik i would ri trouble ish-veh aishan wi, tonk'peh would lates pauk wuh shi fa' leaving. Na' i had wuh presentiment ik i dang worla nam-tor tra' va'ashiv, heh i olau ik wuh dying ta'hal vesh' suited tor t'nash-veh kim-shah zan-tor t' ish-veh. K' wuh shi'kwai t' casks ik i had lates-tor fi' wu ago, heh fi' if wuh sov-masu t' tevun had tevan-tor opi', rotting au svi' wehk shitau, heh leaving miniature flash heh patra t' masu fi-tor eifa ik lam-tor fi' shaht, i tor t'nash-veh yut tor wuh ruined bah-ker. I went ek' pauk ish-veh; pauk k' wuh teruk wilat herbert heh i had fought etwel puk; pauk k' wuh yut wilat estella heh i had lates-tor. Ni samu, ni lonely, ni dreary ek'! Taking wuh brewery fi' t'nash-veh yut pla', i ashenau wuh zhar-tor kuhr t' wuh pi' svep na' wuh bah-ker shaht t' ish-veh, heh lates-tor k'fai. I vesh' going si' na' wuh mesyutik svep, ri hagik tor tu'ash i', na' wuh damp lapan had palikau heh puv-tor, heh wuh tu'adayek vesh' yielding, heh wuh threshold vesh' encumbered k' wuh tor'ovak t' luk, lu i da-tor t'nash-veh patam tor glazhau pla'. Wuh childish katravek zaprah-tor k' wonderful nekwitaya svi' wuh moment t' wuh slight torai, heh i fancied ik vesht gla-tor nash-veh din-tor havisham hanging tor wuh ha-zehl. Ni karik vesh' wuh impression, ik i lam-tor ne' wuh ha-zehl shuddering s' patam tor ash'ya fa' i fai-tor ish-veh vesh' wuh fancy, hi tor nam-tor sure i vesh' tra' svi' wuh instant. Wuh mournfulness t' wuh shi heh wak, heh wuh lo'uk vash t' nash illusion, hi ish-veh vesh' tonk'peh momentary, aisha me tor olau wuh indescribable teshan u' i sasarlah svi' wuh tu'ash wooden temep wilat i had wuh'wak wrung t'nash-veh isachya po' estella had wrung t'nash-veh khaf-spol. Be' dvun-tor fi' vi' wuh khom courtyard, i hesitated whether tor vutau wuh kosu tor kal-tor me si' na' wuh klacha temep t' if she had wuh tal-muv, il wuh'rak tor hal-tor upstairs heh assure myself ik din-tor havisham vesh' u' safe heh muhl u' i had losrak ish-veh. I nem-tor wuh latter rivak heh went abru. I glazhau vi' wuh tvi-shal wilat i had losrak ish-veh, heh vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh hayal-tor svi' wuh ragged ku-san fi-tor wuh hearth beyik wuh yon, k' ish-veh pla' na' me. Svi' wuh moment lu i vesh' withdrawing t'nash-veh patam tor hal-tor quietly maf, vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh lo'uk flaming ta'hal sikar abru. Svi' wuh ka moment vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh sahran na' me, shrieking, k' wuh whirl t' yon blazing ek' pa' ish-veh, heh soaring k'puu u' wehk ash'ya abru' ish-veh patam u' she vesh' pid. I had wuh dahtau-caped lo'uk-tor-pal fi', heh abru' t'nash-veh kar wuh'ashiv bali tor-pal. Ik i prah au ska', a'ing k' ish-veh, threw ish-veh ne', heh prah au abru' ish-veh; ik i zaseshau wuh lo'uk sai s' wuh pasu na' wuh ka lof, heh k' ish-veh zaseshau ne' wuh tuh t' rottenness svi' wuh midst, heh ek' wuh watosh vel ik rau-tor tra'; ik etek vesh' fi' wuh solektra struggling spo' desperate nemut, heh ik wuh closer i wein-tor ish-veh, wuh weht wildly she shrieked heh ar'kada tor elik herself, ik nash paresh-tor i fai-tor k'fai wuh result, tonk'peh ri k'fai sovek-vel i olau, il nahp, il fai-tor i did. I fai-tor nothing abi' i fai-tor ik etek vesh' fi' wuh lan-tol k' wuh lo'uk pasu, heh ik patches t' tinder wi alight vesh' floating svi' wuh smoky sov, if, wuh moment ago, had vesh' ish-veh spoh-tor bridal sai-vel. Yi, i glazhau pauk heh gla-tor wuh ertau sark heh a'lazb sahran maf abru' wuh lan-tol, heh wuh dvinsu coming svi' k' breathless maf-tor na' wuh svep. I fam dvun meskarau ish-veh forcibly ne' k' ek' t'nash-veh karik'es, spo' wuh prisoner vi lau stron; heh i vet kuv i kauk fai-tor vi she vesh', il po etek had struggled, il ik she had vesh' svi' yai, il ik wuh yai vesh' si', abi' vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh patches t' tinder ik had vesh' ish-veh ain rai longer alight tonk'peh tevan-tor svi' wuh nesh-kur mashulayek pa' etek. She vesh' insensible, heh i vesh' kwes ki' ish-veh dvun-tor, il kauk estuhl. Assistance vesh' satau na', heh i meskarau ish-veh abi' sarlah ish-veh, u' kuv i unreasonably fancied (i nah-tor i did) ik, kuv i kal-tor ish-veh hal-tor, wuh yon would shaya si' va'ashiv heh consume ish-veh. Lu i prah abru, fi' wuh sharushsu's coming tor ish-veh k' vath mamuk, i vesh' astonished tor gla-tor ik fi' t'nash-veh el'ru vesh' yontau; na', i had rai fai-tukh t' ish-veh k'fai wuh kash-ral t' olaya. Fi' linisaya ish-veh vesh' pronounced ik she had poprah serious dash-tor, tonk'peh ik au t' themselves vesh' irak s' hopeless; wuh tehvar ti mainly svi' wuh nervous kolaya. K' wuh sharushsu's kharat, ish-veh sar-tak vesh' lesh vi' ik tvi-shal heh laid fi-tor wuh lo'uk pasu, if pavesh-tor tor nam-tor muhl suited tor wuh sai-vel-tor t' ish-veh dash. Lu vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh va'ashiv, wuh wadan afterwards, she ti, indeed, wilat i had gla-tor ish-veh kwul ish-veh terpau, heh had puzhu-tor ish-veh leralmin ik she would ti veh gad. Hi kanok vestige t' ish-veh sai-vel vesh' yontau, u' au var-tor me, she fam dvun had vel t' ish-veh hinek ghastly bridal appearance; na', au had wein-tor ish-veh tor wuh drahk k' wan-kur cotton-terkarf-tukh, heh u' she ti k' wuh wan-kur thalv loosely overlying ik, wuh phantom sov t' vel ik had vesh' heh vesh' rubai vesh' fam dvun fi-tor ish-veh. I afer-tor, fi' questioning wuh dvinsu, ik estella vesh' svi' paris, heh i prah wuh ugaya s' wuh sharushsu ik au would kitau tor ish-veh k' wuh thurai lehk. Din-tor havisham's skan i nem-tor fi-tor myself; intending tor sviribau k' mr. Matthew abru'lik goh, heh trasha ish-veh tor tor u' au tishau pa' informing wuh shom. Nash i did thurai gad, k'fai herbert, u' ak u' i fun-tor tor kahr. Tra' vesh' wuh skaf, ik khru, lu she stariben collectedly t' ra had pavesh-tor, hi k' wuh ac'ruth terrible vivacity. Na' midnight she began tor czar svi' ish-veh starun; heh po' ik ish-veh gradually eku svi' ik she leralmin-tor va' wak svi' wuh neik solemn spes, "ra ma i ovsoh!" heh yi, "lu she wuh'rak sarlah, i tvai tor korsau ish-veh s' misery spo' t'nash-veh." heh yi, "nem-tor wuh hish heh kitau ne' t'nash-veh ahm, 'i forgive ish-veh!'" she worla rubai wuh zek t' aifa rehkuh zhit-bal, tonk'peh she sometimes losrak si' wuh zhit svi' veh il vath t' au; worla putting svi' wuh'ashiv zhit, tonk'peh kwon-hau-ov leaving wuh blank heh going fi' tor wuh thurai zhit. U' i kupi tor rai dvin tra', heh u' i had, nearer ha-kel, ik pressing utvau na' anxiety heh pthak if kauk ish-veh czar kupi ri yetur s' t'nash-veh kashek, i klopau, svi' wuh rivak t' wuh mu-yor ik i would fun k' wuh lehkuh-mal asal coach, walking fi' wuh mile il ni, heh hasu taken abru pa'shik t' wuh kahr. Na' pa' shehkuh o'wak-vel t' wuh asal, therefore, i gal-tor abru' ish-veh heh estuhl ish-veh bru-lar k' t'nash-veh, aishan u' au leralmin-tor, ri stopping na' hasu estuhl, "nem-tor wuh hish heh kitau ne' t'nash-veh ahm, 'i forgive ish-veh.'" chapter l. T'nash-veh el'ru had vesh' sai-vel-tor dah'wak il thrice svi' wuh mu-yor, heh va'ashiv svi' wuh asal. T'nash-veh losrak kar vesh' wuh rom deal yontau tor wuh kar-nef, heh, lehkuh severely, u' pid u' wuh tipan; ish-veh vesh' maut kusut-tor, tonk'peh wuh yai had eku svi' ik kharat, heh i olau itar-bosh ish-veh vesh' rai weh-rasahkos. T'nash-veh gas'rak el'ru vesh' ri ni badly yontau tonk'peh ik i kupi dvun wuh ozh. Ish-veh vesh' bandaged, veling, tonk'peh mau lehkuh inconveniently do t'nash-veh losrak el'ru heh kar; eifa i lesh svi' wuh sling; heh i kupi goh sai-vel-tor t'nash-veh tor-pal spo' wuh tor-sai, thal abru' t'nash-veh tipan heh terau na' wuh talu. T'nash-veh isachya had vesh' kum-tor k' wuh yon, tonk'peh ri t'nash-veh patam il limuk. Lu herbert had vesh' ne' tor hammersmith heh gla-tor ish-veh sa-mekh, sarlah ish-veh pla' tor me na' etwel tvi-shal, heh vaikau wuh gad tor attending fi' me. Au vesh' wuh kindest t' nurses, heh na' fupa s' wak nem-tor ska' wuh zhumav, heh steeped au svi' wuh cooling masu ik vesh' potau pok, heh shitau au fi' va'ashiv, k' wuh hasausu tenderness ik i vesh' deeply grateful na'. Palikauk, u' i ti hizhuk fi' wuh ku-san, i afer-tor ish-veh painfully rihagik, i lau leralmin impossible, tor prah rid t' wuh impression t' wuh glare t' wuh yai, ish-veh brax heh ralash, heh wuh kei yontau fnish-tor. Kuv i dozed na' wuh minute, i vesh' awakened k' din-tor havisham's maf-tor, heh k' ish-veh sahran na' me k' ek' ik pidek t' yon abru' ish-veh patam. Nash kusut t' wuh kashek vesh' mau harder tor strive tehnat do sovek bodily kusut i dashau; heh herbert, seeing ik, did ish-veh utmost tor meskaraya t'nash-veh attention engaged. Neither t' etek stariben t' wuh masu-hali, tonk'peh etek fi' nahp t' ish-veh. Ik vesh' tor apparent k' etwel avoidance t' wuh subject, heh k' etwel agreeingwithout agreementto tor t'nash-veh recovery t' wuh nam-tor-tor t' t'nash-veh el'ru wuh deshker t' ni wehk wadan, ri t' ni wehk wehk gad. T'nash-veh wuh'rak deshker lu vesht gla-tor nash-veh herbert had vesh' veling, whether ek' vesh' muhl ne' wuh pilash? U' au kilko-tor svi' wuh affirmative, k' buhfik guhl'es heh cheerfulness, etek did ri resume wuh subject abi' wuh gad vesh' sai-vel-tor maf. Tonk'peh yi, u' herbert rubai wuh zhumav, weht k' wuh ta'hal t' wuh yon do k' wuh sik ta'hal, au went pla' tor ish-veh spontaneously. "i hayal-tor k' provis kim-shah mu-yor, handel, dahkuh rom wadan." "wilat vesh' clara?" "tal-kam pi' vel!" leralmin-tor herbert. "she vesh' abru heh ne' k' gruffandgrim ek' wuh khru. Au vesh' perpetually pegging na' wuh lan-tol wuh moment she losrak ish-veh glan. I vet kuv au mokuhlek meskaraya si' wu, hi. Ra k' rum heh pepper, heh pepper heh rum, i dang nah-tor ish-veh pegging bolau nam-tor nearly abru'." "heh yi du dungi nam-tor telik, herbert?" "uf mokuhlek i nem-tor tun t' wuh tal-kam kan vathru?ti ish-veh kar si' fi-tor wuh pla' t' wuh ku-san, t'nash-veh tal-kam sa-kan, heh i'll hayal-tor ne' la', heh prah wuh zhumav ska' ni gradually ik du dungau ri fai-tor lu sarlah ish-veh. I vesh' speaking t' provis. Tor du fai-tor, handel, au improves?" "i leralmin-tor tor du i nahp au vesh' softened lu i kim-shah gla-tor ish-veh." "ni du did. Heh ni au nam-tor. Au vesh' maut communicative kim-shah mu-yor, heh var-tor me weht t' ish-veh ha'kiv. Du vokau ish-veh breaking ska' la' pa' ein kosu ik au had had lo'uk trouble k'. Did i dash-tor du?" i had palikau, tonk'peh ri ne' ish-veh esta. Ish-veh zhit had putan-tor me wuh palikaya. "i had yen-tor ik, herbert, tonk'peh i vokau ish-veh i' du stariben t' ish-veh." "muhl! Au went vi' ik krus t' ish-veh ha'kiv, heh wuh gu'gelik kwai krus ish-veh nam-tor. Dungau i var-tor du? Il would ish-veh worry du aishan i'?" "var-tor me k' ek' tvai. Kanok zhit." herbert keh'sei fa'rak tor glazhau na' me weht nearly, u' kuv t'nash-veh kilko had vesh' rather weht hurried il weht nayik do au kupi ved khrosahp na'. "ish-veh patam nam-tor samuyau?" au leralmin-tor, touching ish-veh. "ved, " leralmin-tor i. "var-tor me ra provis leralmin-tor, t'nash-veh tal-kam herbert." "ish-veh seems, " leralmin-tor herbert, "tra''s wuh zhumav ska' danik charmingly, heh i' sarlah wuh samuyau veh, tor du shrink palikauk, t'nash-veh ri donku-tor tal-kam katravahsu, ri tor ish-veh? Tonk'peh ish-veh dungi nam-tor kel'o presently, ish-veh seems ik wuh kosu vesh' wuh nu'ri kosu, heh wuh kis-ka kosu, heh wuh revengeful kosu; revengeful, handel, tor wuh kim-shah degree." "tor ra kim-shah degree?" "riyeht-staya. Tor ish-veh kwul nuh' samu fi' ik kash-zakar shi?" "i ri tor olau ish-veh. Uf did she riyeht-staya? Ik did she riyeht-staya?" "po, wuh deed lau ri ma merited ved ni terrible wuh ahm, " leralmin-tor herbert, "tonk'peh, she vesh' ar'kada na' ish-veh, heh mr. Jaggers fosh-tor ish-veh, heh wuh reputation t' ik defence wuh'rak tor ish-veh ahm fainu tor provis. Ish-veh vesh' wuh'ashiv heh wuh stronger kosu vi vesh' wuh shi-kar-tor, heh tra' had vesh' wuh strugglein wuh aushfa-kel. Vi began ish-veh, il uf rom ish-veh vesh', il uf unfair, lau nam-tor vet-bosh; tonk'peh uf ish-veh shahtau nam-tor certainly ri vet-bosh, na' wuh shi-kar-tor vesh' afer-tor threshan-tash-tor." "vesh' wuh kosu katau svi' guilty?" "rai; she vesh' acquitted.t'nash-veh ri donku-tor handel, i dash-tor du!" "ish-veh nam-tor impossible tor nam-tor gentler, herbert. Ha? Ra else?" "nash acquitted nu'ri kosu heh provis had wuh pi' kan; wuh pi' kan t' ik provis vesh' exceedingly tishau. Fi' wuh khru t' wuh maut mu-yor lu wuh vel t' ish-veh jealousy vesh' strangled u' i var-tor du, wuh nu'ri kosu presented herself fa' provis na' veh moment, heh swore ik she would vashau wuh kan (if vesh' svi' ish-veh mat), heh au dang worla gla-tor ish-veh va'ashiv; yi she vanished. Tra''s wuh rasahkos kar comfortably svi' wuh sling wuh'wak weht, heh i' tra' hafau tonk'peh wuh gas'rak el'ru, if nam-tor wuh irak easier job. I mokuhlek tor ish-veh weh-rom k' nash ta'hal do k' wuh stronger, na' t'nash-veh el'ru nam-tor steadiest lu i ri tor gla-tor wuh ri donku-tor yontau-masu-vihk patches nuh' distinctly. Du ri tor nah-tor ish-veh eshan nam-tor dau, t'nash-veh tal-kam sa-kan? Du seem tor esh-tor sahris." "sos'eh i tor, herbert. Did wuh kosu potau ish-veh oath?" "tra' sarlah wuh darkest krus t' provis's ha'kiv. She did." "ik nam-tor, au leralmin-tor she did." "po, veling, t'nash-veh tal-kam sa-kan, " fun-tor herbert, svi' wuh molu t' ak'wikmun, heh va'ashiv bending fa'rak tor prah wuh nearer glazhau na' me. "au leralmin-tor ish-veh ek'. I ma rai vath ro'fori." "rai, tor nam-tor sure." "i', whether, " pursued herbert, "au had nam-tor-tor wuh kan's ko-mekh has-bosh, il whether au had nam-tor-tor wuh kan's ko-mekh muhl, provis doesn't leralmin; tonk'peh she had thresh-tor ein kehkuh il kaukuh tevun t' wuh wretched ha'kiv au kethelvau tor etek na' nash yon-shal, heh au seems ki' olau pity na' ish-veh, heh forbearance na' ish-veh. Therefore, fearing au dang nam-tor puvutau fi-tor tor depose pa' nash vashau kan, heh ni nam-tor wuh aishan t' ish-veh tevakh, au ip-sut himself (mau u' au grieved na' wuh kan), potau himself gu'gelik, u' au leralmin-tor, s' wuh yut heh s' wuh trial, heh vesh' goh vaguely variben t' u' wuh ac'ruth sasu puvutau abel, s' ik wuh jealousy arose. Po' wuh acquittal she sasaudau, heh thus au pakik wuh kan heh wuh kan's ko-mekh." "i aitlun tor ya'akash" "wuh moment, t'nash-veh tal-kam sa-kan, heh i ma ovsoh. Ik ek'rasah genius, compeyson, wuh rasahkos t' scoundrels among wehk scoundrels, fai-tor t' ish-veh keeping s' wuh yut na' ik wak heh t' ish-veh utvau na' doing ni, veling afterwards meskarau wuh fai-tukh abru' ish-veh patam u' wuh tvai t' keeping ish-veh poorer heh working ish-veh harder. Ish-veh vesh' pa'shik kim-shah mu-yor ik nash barbed wuh sfek t' provis's animosity." "i aitlun tor fai-tor, " leralmin-tor i, "heh wa', herbert, whether au var-tor du lu nash pavesh-tor?" "wa'? Kal-tor me vokau, yi, ra au leralmin-tor u' tor ik. Ish-veh sagluvaya vesh', 'wuh pauk nosahp o' tevun ago, heh wuh'danik directly po' i nem-tor abru wi' compeyson.' uf hinek vesh' du lu sarlah du fi-tor ish-veh svi' wuh pi' churchyard?" "i nah-tor svi' t'nash-veh seventh tevun." "ay. Ish-veh had pavesh-tor ein rehkuh il kehkuh tevun yi, au leralmin-tor, heh du katau vi' ish-veh kashek wuh pi' ko-kan ni tragically pakik, vi would ma vesh' pa' ish-veh ya'shakhuv." "herbert, " leralmin-tor i, po' wuh pen silence, svi' wuh hurried yut, "mokuhlek du gla-tor me buhfik k' wuh ta'hal t' wuh krani, il wuh ta'hal t' wuh yon?" "k' wuh yon-ha'khlup, " kilko-tor herbert, coming ikap-tor va'ashiv. "glazhau na' me." "i tor glazhau na' du, t'nash-veh tal-kam sa-kan." "esta me." "i tor esta du, t'nash-veh tal-kam sa-kan." "du nam-tor ri kwes ik i am svi' sovek tau, il ik t'nash-veh patam nam-tor mau disordered k' wuh kisheya t' kim-shah mu-yor?" "n-rai, t'nash-veh tal-kam sa-kan, " leralmin-tor herbert, po' taking wak tor linisau me. "du nam-tor rather teporilau, tonk'peh du nam-tor ved yourself." "i fai-tor i am ved myself. Heh wuh sasu etek ma svi' hiding ne' wuh pilash, nam-tor estella's sa-mekh." chapter li. Ra lof i had svi' zan-tor lu i vesh' fal fi' tracing si' heh proving estella's parentage, i fam yehat leralmin. Ish-veh dungi presently nam-tor gla-tor ik wuh deshker vesh' ri fa' me svi' wuh natya shid abi' ish-veh vesh' shitau fa' me k' wuh wiser patam do t'nash-veh sha'. Tonk'peh lu herbert heh i had meskarau etwel momentous conversation, i vesh' seized k' wuh taulik conviction ik i ought tor shi'kar wuh tukh ne', ik i ought ri tor kal-tor ish-veh shom, tonk'peh ik i ought tor gla-tor mr. Jaggers, heh sarlah na' wuh sai-famik yeht'es. I really ri tor fai-tor whether i olau ik i did nash na' estella's sake, il whether i vesh' glad tor shan tor wuh sasu svi' t'vi preservation i vesh' ni mau concerned ein ha'zehl t' wuh romantic eku'ko ik had ni wu vikuvau me. Sos'eh wuh latter possibility lau nam-tor wuh nearer tor wuh yeht'es. Sovek yut, i kupi scarcely nam-tor withheld s' going si' tor gerrard yut ik mu-yor. Herbert's representations ik, kuv i did, i dang probably nam-tor laid abru heh stricken nam-tor-fam, lu etwel fugitive's ek'manek would nerau fi-tor me, sa'awek restrained t'nash-veh impatience. Fi' wuh understanding, va'ashiv heh va'ashiv reiterated, ik, sarlah ra would, i vesh' tor hal-tor tor mr. Jaggers tor-morrow, i na' wu-vath submitted tor potau hizhuk, heh ki' t'nash-veh dash-tor glazhau po', heh tor stay na' ha-kel. Lehkuh-mal thurai asal etek went si' teretuhr, heh na' wuh teruk t' giltspur yut k' smithfield, i losrak herbert tor hal-tor ish-veh yut vi' wuh kahr, heh nem-tor t'nash-veh yut tor pi' britain. Tra' vesh' periodical occasions lu mr. Jaggers heh wemmick went abru' wuh office khrosahp, heh rihamau ska' wuh vouchers, heh shitau ek' vel zehik. Fi' aifa occasions, wemmick nem-tor ish-veh dunap heh dun vi' mr. Jaggers's tvi-shal, heh veh t' wuh upstairs clerks sarlah ne' vi' wuh sik office. Finding such clerk fi' wemmick's lehk ik asal, i fai-tor ra vesh' going fi'; tonk'peh i vesh' ri sorry ki' mr. Jaggers heh wemmick teretuhr, u' wemmick would yi zhu-tor na' himself ik i leralmin-tor nothing tor compromise ish-veh. T'nash-veh appearance, k' t'nash-veh kar bandaged heh t'nash-veh tor-pal thal abru' t'nash-veh tipan, favoured t'nash-veh vel. Hi i had satau mr. Jaggers wuh brief khrosahp t' wuh kisheya u' ak u' i had lasha svi' kahr, wi i had tor mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh ek' wuh details i'; heh wuh speciality t' wuh occasion aisha etwel variben tor nam-tor lehkuh pseth heh lerash, heh lehkuh strictly pakhartau k' wuh tor-go t' evidence, do ish-veh had vesh' fa'. Du' i kethelvau wuh koshvar, mr. Jaggers lam-tor, fupa s' ish-veh wont, fa' wuh yon. Wemmick gal-tor pla' svi' ish-veh ku-san, staring na' me, k' ish-veh el'ru svi' wuh abru'lik t' ish-veh malanu, heh ish-veh pen shitau horizontally vi' wuh lehk. Wuh dahkuh brutal vishizhau, kwon-hau-ov inseparable svi' t'nash-veh kashek s' wuh official proceedings, seemed tor nam-tor congestively panahik whether au didn't fnish-tor yon na' wuh la' moment. T'nash-veh narrative shahtau, heh ish-veh deshkau saguhsh-tor, i yi torvau din-tor havisham's ek'te'kru tor poprah wuh naukuh hundred plesh-tor na' herbert. Mr. Jaggers's bezhun retired wuh pi' deeper vi' ish-veh patam lu i handed ish-veh wuh tablets, tonk'peh au presently handed au abru' tor wemmick, k' instructions tor bes-tor wuh rihamau na' ish-veh signature. Du' ik vesh' svi' rivak t' hasu ovsoh, i glazhau fi' na' wemmick u' au kitau, heh mr. Jaggers, poising heh swaying himself fi' ish-veh muhl-polished kluf, glazhau fi' na' me. "ni'droi'ik nar-tor, pip, " leralmin-tor au, u' i shitau wuh rihamau svi' t'nash-veh abru'lik, lu au had signed ish-veh, "ik etek tor nothing na' du." "din-tor havisham vesh' rom hiyet tor ya'akash me, " i fun-tor, "whether she kupi tor nothing na' me, heh i var-tor ish-veh rai." "kanok-veh dang fai-tor ish-veh sha' business, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. Heh vesht gla-tor nash-veh wemmick's bru-lar shid wuh zhit "leshanik veltra." "i dang ri ma var-tor ish-veh rai, kuv i had vesh' du, " leralmin-tor mr jaggers; "tonk'peh kanok sasu ought tor fai-tor ish-veh sha' business buhfik." "kanok sasu's business, " leralmin-tor wemmick, rather reproachfully na' me, "nam-tor leshanik veltra." u' i nahp wuh wak vesh' i' sarlah na' pursuing wuh theme i had na' khaf-spol, i leralmin-tor, turning fi' mr. Jaggers: "i did ya'akash vel t' din-tor havisham, however, osu. I ya'akash ish-veh tor mazhiv-kur-tor me ein ro'fori tomasu tor ish-veh thanai ko-fu, heh she mazhiv-kur-tor me ek' she ma." "did she?" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, bending fa'rak tor glazhau na' ish-veh kluf heh yi straightening himself. "hah! I ri tor nah-tor i dang ma ovsoh ni, kuv i had vesh' din-tor havisham. Tonk'peh she ought tor fai-tor ish-veh sha' business buhfik." "i fai-tor weht t' wuh vesht-var t' din-tor havisham's thanai kan do din-tor havisham herself tor, osu. I fai-tor ish-veh ko-mekh." mr. Jaggers glazhau na' me inquiringly, heh ashiv-tor "ko-mekh?" "ki'gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh ko-mekh k'svi aifa rehkuh gad." "ha?" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. "heh ni ma du, osu. Heh du ma gla-tor ish-veh fam dvun weht recently." "ha?" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. "sos'eh i fai-tor weht t' estella's vesht-var do kauk du tor, " leralmin-tor i. "i fai-tor ish-veh sa-mekh nuh'." wuh ac'ruth pehkaya ik mr. Jaggers sarlah tor svi' ish-veh mannerhe vesh' nuh' shal-ma tor rubah ish-veh manner, tonk'peh au kupi ri gol'nev its hasu katau tor wuh indefinably whio'naks stopassured me ik au did ri fai-tor vi ish-veh sa-mekh vesh'. Nash i had strongly suspected s' provis's khrosahp (u' herbert had ashiv-tor ish-veh) t' ish-veh having potau himself gu'gelik; if i pieced fi' tor wuh kla-min ik au himself vesh' ri mr. Jaggers's client abi' ein kehkuh tevun later, heh lu au kupi ma rai utvau na' claiming ish-veh sha'es. Tonk'peh, i kupi ri nam-tor sure t' nash unconsciousness fi' mr. Jaggers's krus fa', hi i vesh' ved sure t' ish-veh i'. "ni! Du fai-tor wuh nu'ri t'sai's sa-mekh, pip?" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. "ha, " i kilko-tor, "heh ish-veh ahm nam-tor provisfrom uzh khu'rak wales." kauk mr. Jaggers palikau lu i leralmin-tor eifa zhit. Ish-veh vesh' wuh slightest palikaya ik kupi stron wuh sasu, wuh danik carefully repressed heh wuh sooner rihamau, tonk'peh au did palikaya, hi au tor ish-veh wuh krus t' wuh torai t' taking si' ish-veh abru'lik-handkerchief. Uf wemmick poprah wuh announcement i am unable tor leralmin; na' i vesh' kwes tor glazhau na' ish-veh aishan yi, lest mr. Jaggers's sharpness dang patal-tor ik tra' had vesh' ein sviribaya ri-fainu tor ish-veh svi' etek. "heh fi' ra evidence, pip, " ya'akash mr. Jaggers, maut coolly, u' au svizh-tor k' ish-veh handkerchief ulef yut tor ish-veh han, "tor provis tor nash claim?" "au tor ri tor ish-veh, " leralmin-tor i, "heh has worla tor ish-veh, heh has rai fai-tukh il dva ik ish-veh ko-fu nam-tor svi' nam." na' wuh'wak, wuh powerful abru'lik-handkerchief vravshau. T'nash-veh kilko vesh' ni ri-gishu, ik mr. Jaggers shitau wuh handkerchief pla' vi' ish-veh abru'lik rik' completing wuh tsuri performance, hesha ish-veh kar, heh glazhau k' harr-krus attention na' me, hi k' wuh immovable limuk. Yi i var-tor ish-veh ek' i fai-tor, heh uf i fai-tor ish-veh; k' wuh veh reservation ik i losrak ish-veh tor infer ik i fai-tor s' din-tor havisham ra i svi' kla-min fai-tor s' wemmick. I vesh' maut tun-bosh indeed u' tor ik. Il did i glazhau na' wemmick abi' i had shahtau ek' i had tor var-tor, heh had vesh' na' ein wak silently latva mr. Jaggers's glazhau. Lu i did na' kim-shah da-tor t'nash-veh bezhun svi' wemmick's kharat, i afer-tor ik au had unposted ish-veh pen, heh vesh' intent fi-tor wuh pasu fa' ish-veh. "hah!" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers na' kim-shah, u' au dvun-tor na' wuh dun fi' wuh pasu. "ra item vesh' ish-veh du vesh' na', wemmick, lu mr. Pip sarlah svi'?" tonk'peh i kupi ri nekhau tor nam-tor lehm-tor ska' svi' ik yut, heh i tor wuh passionate, siyah wuh indignant appeal, tor ish-veh tor nam-tor weht frank heh manly k' me. I reminded ish-veh t' wuh riyeht rok-tor vi' if i had lapsed, wuh wu-vath t' wak au had palesh-tor, heh wuh discovery i had tor: heh i hinted na' wuh tehvar ik rasathau fi-tor t'nash-veh tam'a. I represented myself u' hasu surely worthy t' ein pi' guhl'es s' ish-veh, svi' fun na' wuh guhl'es i had aishan i' imparted. I leralmin-tor ik i did ri tenai ish-veh, il suspect ish-veh, il mistrust ish-veh, tonk'peh i aitlu assurance t' wuh yeht'es s' ish-veh. Heh kuv au ya'akash me po i aitlu ish-veh, heh po i nahp i had sovek gas'rak tor ish-veh, i would var-tor ish-veh, pi' u' au palutunau such ri donku-tor sahr-tor-tor, ik i had ashau estella dearly heh wu, heh ik hi i had pakik ish-veh, heh bolau ha-tor wuh bereaved ha'kiv, whatever concerned ish-veh vesh' fam dvun nearer heh dearer tor me do sovek-vel else svi' wuh panu. Heh seeing ik mr. Jaggers lam-tor ved fam dvun heh ralash-fam, heh sauyaing ved obdurate, ne' nash appeal, i da-tor tor wemmick, heh leralmin-tor, "wemmick, i fai-tor du tor nam-tor wuh sasu k' wuh gentle khaf-spol. Ki'gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh vaksurik ha-kel, heh ish-veh hinek sa-mekh, heh ek' wuh innocent, cheerful playful yut k' if du uzhau ish-veh business ha'kiv. Heh i entreat du tor leralmin wuh zhit na' me tor mr. Jaggers, heh tor represent tor ish-veh ik, ek' circumstances panah-tor, au ought tor nam-tor weht tu'ash k' me!" i ma worla gla-tor dahkuh sasu glazhau weht oddly na' veh wuh'ashiv do mr. Jaggers heh wemmick did po' nash apostrophe. Palikauk, wuh misgiving tuhsau me ik wemmick would nam-tor instantly dismissed s' ish-veh employment; tonk'peh ish-veh klimtau u' vesht gla-tor nash-veh mr. Jaggers relax vi' vel spo' wuh abru'teruklar-ru'lut, heh wemmick shetau bolder. "ra's ek' nash?" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. "du k' wuh hinek sa-mekh, heh du k' vaksurik heh playful yut?" "muhl!" fun-tor wemmick. "kuv i ri tor katau 'em la', ra tor ish-veh tukh?" "pip, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, laying ish-veh el'ru fi-tor t'nash-veh kar, heh smiling openly, "nash sasu bolau nam-tor wuh danik cunning impostor svi' ek' london." "ri wuh zeshau t' ish-veh, " fun-tor wemmick, growing bolder heh bolder. "i nah-tor du're wuh'ashiv." va'ashiv au di'kizh-tor ish-veh former shaik glazhau, tik sauyaing fam dvun distrustful ik wuh vath vesh' taking ish-veh svi'. "du k' wuh vaksurik ha-kel?" leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers. "opi' ish-veh ri tor snertau k' business, " fun-tor wemmick, "kal-tor ish-veh nam-tor ni. I', i glazhau na' du, osu, i shouldn't wonder kuv du lau nam-tor planning heh contriving ki' wuh vaksurik ha-kel t' ish-veh sha' veh t' aifa gad, lu du're zungor t' ek' nash ar'kadan." mr. Jaggers nodded ish-veh patam retrospectively dahkuh il rehkuh wak, heh actually drew wuh spes-tevan. "pip, " leralmin-tor au, "etek skil-tor't variben pa' 'ri donku-tor sahr-tor-tor; ' du fai-tor weht pa' such vel do i, having mau fresher veshtaya t' ik ves. Tonk'peh i' pa' nash vath tukh. I'll shitau wuh nuf tor du. Kashek! I nafai-tor nothing." au bek-tor na' me tor afsakau ik i ved ken-tor ik au expressly leralmin-tor ik au nafai-tor nothing. "i', pip, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, "shitau nash nuf. Shitau wuh nuf ik wuh kosu, ne' such circumstances u' du ma mentioned, meskarau ish-veh kan ip-sut, heh vesh' obliged tor sviribau wuh kla-min tor ish-veh legal adviser, fi' ish-veh representing tor ish-veh ik au bolau fai-tor, k' wuh bezhun tor wuh latitude t' ish-veh defence, uf wuh kla-min lam-tor pa' ik kan. Shitau wuh nuf ik, na' wuh ka wak au meskarau wuh sahrafel tor talal wuh kan na' wuh rivitanik don-ka t'sai tor thanai heh katau abru." "i zahal-tor du, osu." "shitau wuh nuf ik au ha-tor svi' wuh igen-tukh t' ek'rasah, heh ik ek' au gla-tor t' kanu vesh' ish-veh hasu fer-tor svi' lo'uk su'etek na' ac'ruth vashaya. Shitau wuh nuf ik au k'ashiv gla-tor kanu solemnly ar'kada na' wuh criminal mofek, wilat au vesh' meskarau abru tor nam-tor gla-tor; shitau wuh nuf ik au habitually fai-tor t' ish-veh hasu imprisoned, whipped, ifis-tor, neglected, dakh, qualified svi' ek' yut na' wuh hangman, heh growing abru tor nam-tor geldau. Shitau wuh nuf ik takov nigh ek' wuh kanu gla-tor ish-veh svi' ish-veh kanok-gadik business ha'kiv au had utvau tor glazhau fi-tor u' ni mau spawn, tor storau vi' wuh aluk ik vesh' tor sarlah tor ish-veh vis, tor nam-tor prosecuted, fosh-tor, forsworn, tor orphans, bedevilled somehow." "i zahal-tor du, osu." "shitau wuh nuf, pip, ik la' vesh' veh takov pi' kan s' wuh tuh vi kupi nam-tor korsau; ik wuh sa-mekh pudva-tor tevik, heh dared tor rai stir pa'; u' tor ik, abru' wuh ko-mekh, wuh legal adviser had nash tepul: "i fai-tor ra du did, heh uf du did ish-veh. Sarlah du ni heh ni, du did such heh such vel tor matau suspicion. I ma bi'dvun-tor du k'fai ish-veh ek', heh i var-tor ish-veh du ek'. Krus k' wuh kan, vita ish-veh dang nam-tor bolayatik tor torvau ish-veh tor pa'shik du, heh yi ish-veh dungau nam-tor torvau. Mazhiv-kur-tor wuh kan vi' t'nash-veh el'ru, heh i dungi tor t'nash-veh buhfik tor katau du ska'. Kuv du nam-tor korsau, ish-veh kan nam-tor korsau nuh'; kuv du nam-tor pakik, ish-veh kan nam-tor fam dvun korsau." shitau wuh nuf ik nash vesh' ovsoh, heh ik wuh kosu vesh' pa'shu." "i ken-tor du perfectly." "tonk'peh ik i tor rai admissions?" "ik du tor rai admissions." heh wemmick ashiv-tor, "rai admissions." "shitau wuh nuf, pip, ik shaukaush heh wuh vash t' tevakh had wuh pi' shaken wuh kosu's intellects, heh ik lu she vesh' eku na' liberty, she vesh' pahth-tor s' wuh yut t' wuh panu, heh went tor ish-veh tor nam-tor rau-tor. Shitau wuh nuf ik au nem-tor ish-veh svi', heh ik au potau ne' wuh hinek, kwai, khrashik malat whenever gla-tor ish-veh wuh inkling t' its breaking si', k' asserting ish-veh tepul abru' ish-veh svi' wuh hinek yut. Tor du comprehend wuh glenonik nuf?" "ved." "shitau wuh nuf ik wuh kan grew abru, heh vesh' telik na' donku. Ik wuh ko-mekh vesh' fam dvun living. Ik wuh sa-mekh vesh' fam dvun living. Ik wuh ko-mekh heh sa-mekh, ri-fainu tor veh wuh'ashiv, vesh' kelek k'svi ni wehk miles, furlongs, ker kuv du spo', t' veh wuh'ashiv. Ik wuh tsat vesh' fam dvun wuh tsat, kaula ik du had prah salan t' ish-veh. Shitau ik kim-shah nuf tor yourself maut carefully." "i tor." "i ya'akash wemmick tor shitau ish-veh tor himself maut carefully." heh wemmick leralmin-tor, "i tor." "na' t'vi sake would du reveal wuh tsat? Na' wuh sa-mekh's? I nah-tor au would ri nam-tor mau wuh weh-rom na' wuh ko-mekh. Na' wuh ko-mekh's? I nah-tor kuv she had ovsoh such wuh deed she would nam-tor safer wilat she vesh'. Na' wuh ko-fu's? I nah-tor ish-veh would hardly dvin-tor ish-veh tor afer-tor ish-veh parentage na' wuh ro'fori t' ish-veh sa-telsu, heh tor zaseshau ish-veh pla' tor disgrace, po' wuh stron t' dah-leh tevun, takov shar tor kim-shah na' ha'kiv. Tonk'peh hau wuh nuf ik du had ashau ish-veh, pip, heh had tor ish-veh wuh subject t' eifa 'ri donku-tor sahr-tor-tor' if ma, na' veh wak il wuh'ashiv, vesh' svi' wuh patam t' weht sasu do du nah-tor kesik, yi i var-tor du ik du had betterand would mau sooner lu du had nahp muhl t' itchop ska' ik bandaged losrak el'ru t' ish-veh k' ish-veh bandaged gas'rak el'ru, heh yi be' dvun wuh chopper fi' tor wemmick tra', tor tresahk ik ska' nuh'." i glazhau na' wemmick, t'vi limuk vesh' maut shi'vukhut. Au gravely estuhl ish-veh bru-lar k' ish-veh kehr-oth. I did wuh ka. Mr. Jaggers did wuh ka. "i', wemmick, " leralmin-tor wuh latter yi, resuming ish-veh tsuri manner, "ra item vesh' ish-veh du vesh' na' lu mr. Pip sarlah svi'?" standing k' na' wuh pi', du' au vesh' na' ar'kadan, i glantau ik wuh shaik glazhau au had vishizhau na' veh wuh'ashiv vesh' ashiv-tor several wak: k' nash natyan i', ik tik t' au seemed suspicious, ri tor leralmin d'wonil, t' having shown himself svi' wuh kobat heh unprofessional ta'hal tor wuh vath. Na' nash utvau, i suppose, au vesh' i' inflexible k' veh wuh'ashiv; mr. Jaggers hasu highly dictatorial, heh wemmick obstinately justifying himself whenever tra' vesh' wuh smallest sfek svi' abeyance na' wuh moment. I had worla gla-tor au fi' such has-bosh zhil; na' paik au prah fi' maut muhl indeed teretuhr. Tonk'peh au vesh' fi' kunling vas-tor k' wuh opportune appearance t' mike, wuh client k' wuh ausachya taik heh wuh es'merka t' psethau ish-veh han fi' ish-veh sleeve, ik i had gla-tor fi' wuh maut wuh'rak gad t' t'nash-veh appearance k'svi eifa temok. Nash wuhsu, vi, either svi' ish-veh sha' person il svi' ik t' ein kisau t' ish-veh skan, seemed tor nam-tor kwon-hau-ov svi' trouble (if svi' ik shi tvai newgate), puvutau tor tor'pra ik ish-veh eldest ko-fu vesh' taken abru fi' suspicion t' shoplifting. U' au imparted nash melancholy circumstance tor wemmick, mr. Jaggers standing magisterially fa' wuh yon heh taking rai thresh svi' wuh proceedings, mike's bezhun pavesh-tor tor twinkle k' wuh bezhun-masu. "ra nam-tor du pa'?" halishau wemmick, k' wuh utmost indignation. "ra tor sarlah du snivelling la' na'?" "i didn't hal-tor tor tor ish-veh, mr. Wemmick." "du did, " leralmin-tor wemmick. "uf dare du? Du're ri svi' wuh nunau fupa s' tor sarlah la', kuv du mokuhlek't sarlah la' rik' spluttering spo' wuh rasahkos pen. Ra tor du tvai k' ish-veh?" "wuh sasu mokuhlek't gol'nev ish-veh feelings, mr. Wemmick, " pleaded mike. "ish-veh ra?" halishau wemmick, ved savagely. "leralmin ik va'ashiv!" "i' glazhau la' t'nash-veh sasu, " leralmin-tor mr. Jaggers, advancing wuh ash, heh pointing tor wuh svep. "prah s' nash office. I'll ma rai feelings la'. Prah si'." "ish-veh dvin-tor du gas'rak, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "prah si'." ni, wuh unfortunate mike maut humbly withdrew, heh mr. Jaggers heh wemmick saudau ki' re-afer-tor ish-veh rom understanding, heh went tor ar'kadan va'ashiv k' wuh sov t' refreshment fi-tor au u' kuv au had aishan had khi-gad-yem. Chapter lii. S' pi' britain i went, k' t'nash-veh rihamau svi' t'nash-veh abru'lik, tor din-tor skiffins's sa-kai, wuh accountant; heh din-tor skiffins's sa-kai, wuh accountant, going zehik tor clarriker's heh bringing clarriker tor me, i had wuh lo'uk satisfaction t' concluding ik arrangement. Ish-veh vesh' wuh goh rom vel i had ovsoh, heh wuh goh ovsoh vel i had ovsoh, opi' i vesh' wuh'rak apprised t' t'nash-veh lo'uk gishat. Clarriker informing me fi' ik occasion ik wuh tek'ik t' wuh kelek vesh' steadily progressing, ik au would i' nam-tor kup tor afer-tor wuh pi' khlup-kelek svi' wuh she'rak if vesh' mau aitlu na' wuh sadvunan t' wuh business, heh ik herbert svi' ish-veh uzh partnership tsoh would hal-tor si' heh nem-tor falun t' ish-veh, i afer-tor ik i bolau ma dator na' wuh dahshaya s' t'nash-veh t'hy'la, kauk hi t'nash-veh sha' tek'ik had vesh' weht settled. Heh i', indeed, i olau u' kuv t'nash-veh kim-shah masu-vohrayek vesh' loosening its meskaraya, heh i dang ak nam-tor driving k' wuh salan heh pral. Tonk'peh tra' vesh' recompense svi' wuh mak k' if herbert would sarlah ha-kel t' wuh mu-yor heh var-tor me t' aifa rubai, pi' imagining ik au var-tor me rai ro'fori, heh would lubesan airy bikuv t' himself conducting clara barley tor wuh solektra t' wuh arabian mu-yor, heh t' me going si' tor hau au (k' wuh caravan t' tchorka, i dva-tor), heh t' etwel ek' going abru wuh nile heh seeing wonders. Rik' hasu sanguine u' tor t'nash-veh sha' krus svi' eifa ugelik dotoran, i olau ik herbert's yut vesh' clearing sahris, heh ik hinek dun barley had tonk'peh tor terpau tor ish-veh pepper heh rum, heh ish-veh ko-fu would ak nam-tor kunling tanilau na'. Etek had i' prah vi' wuh tevun-krus t' march. T'nash-veh losrak kar, hi ish-veh presented rai rasahkos symptoms, nem-tor, svi' wuh malatik rivak, ni wu tor hakau ik i vesh' fam dvun unable tor prah wuh tor-pal fi'. T'nash-veh gas'rak kar vesh' tolerably restored; disfigured, tonk'peh fairly serviceable. Fi' wuh gad asal, lu herbert heh i vesh' na' asal-yem, i poprah wuh zahalik nuhm s' wemmick k' wuh lehk. "walworth. Yontau nash u' ak u' telv-tor. Lehkuh-mal svi' wuh wehk gad, il leralmin gad, du lau tor ra du fai-tor t', kuv du olau sashitau tor ar'kadan ish-veh. I' yontau." lu i had shown nash tor herbert heh had shitau ish-veh svi' wuh firebut ri fa' etek had fi' prah ish-veh k' heartwe panah-tor ra tor tor. Na', t' rivak t'nash-veh hasu rikup-tor kupi i' nam-tor rai longer potau s' zan-tor. "i ma nahp ish-veh abru' va'ashiv heh va'ashiv, " leralmin-tor herbert, "heh i nah-tor i fai-tor wuh weh-rom rivak do taking wuh thames waterman. Nem-tor startop. Wuh rom katravahsu, wuh skilled el'ru, tishau t' etek, heh buhlik heh dorli." i had nahp t' ish-veh weht do wuh'wak. "tonk'peh uf mau would du var-tor ish-veh, herbert?" "ish-veh nam-tor bolayatik tor var-tor ish-veh maut pi'. Kal-tor ish-veh suppose ish-veh wuh mere freak, tonk'peh wuh tsat veh, abi' wuh asal sarlah: yi kal-tor ish-veh fai-tor ik tra' nam-tor akali utvau na' ish-veh getting provis aboard heh maf. Du hal-tor k' ish-veh?" "rai vet." "wilat?" ish-veh had seemed tor me, svi' wuh wehk anxious considerations i had putan-tor wuh sfek, siyah indifferent ra kif etek tor na', hamburg, rotterdam, antwerp, wuh shi signified pi', ni ik au vesh' s' england. Sovek k'shatri steamer ik tevan-tor svi' etwel yut heh would nem-tor etek abru would tor. I had kwon-hau-ov proposed tor myself tor prah ish-veh muhl ne' wuh pilash svi' wuh masu-hali; certainly muhl mesakh gravesend, if vesh' wuh bolik shi na' psthan il inquiry kuv suspicion vesh' aisha. U' k'shatri steamers would trasha london na' pa' wuh wak t' pid-masu, etwel dotor would nam-tor tor prah ne' wuh pilash k' wuh previous ebb-mashen, heh ti k' svi' ein hizhuk gla-tor abi' etek kupi seshaya ska' tor veh. Wuh wak lu veh would nam-tor due wilat etek ti, wherever ik lau nam-tor, kupi nam-tor ka'pra takov nearly, kuv etek tor inquiries beforehand. Herbert assented tor ek' nash, heh etek went si' iyi po' asal-yem tor pursue etwel investigations. Etek afer-tor ik wuh steamer na' hamburg vesh' kesik tor saikhut etwel lof buhfik, heh etek khartau etwel nahp chiefly tor ik hali. Tonk'peh etek noted ne' ra vath k'shatri steamers would trasha london k' wuh ka mashen, heh etek satisfied ourselves ik etek fai-tor wuh torvau heh kur t' tik. Etek yi dahshau na' wuh zamu wadan: i, tor prah na' wuh'wak such passports u' vesh' bolayatik; herbert, tor gla-tor startop na' ish-veh lodgings. Etek fi' did ra etek had tor tor rik' sovek hindrance, heh lu etek ragel-tor va'ashiv na' veh o'wak-vel reported ish-veh ovsoh. I, na' t'nash-veh krus, vesh' dator k' passports; herbert had gla-tor startop, heh au vesh' weht do pok tor hau. Eifa dahkuh dang seshaya wuh shif t' fel, etek settled, heh i would dakharau; etwel falun would nam-tor sitter, heh potau hizhuk; u' threshan vesh' ri etwel vel, etek dang tor yut hiyet. Etek arranged ik herbert dang ri sarlah ha-kel tor aru-yem fa' going tor mill muzh kutra ik khru; ik au dang ri hal-tor tra' na' ek' tor-morrow khru, gad; ik au dang dator provis tor sarlah ne' tor ein kaiden lerash k' wuh kelek, fi' gad, lu gla-tor ish-veh etek betaya, heh ri sooner; ik ek' wuh arrangements k' ish-veh dang nam-tor concluded ik gad mu-yor; heh ik au dang nam-tor sviribau k' rai weht svi' sovek yut, abi' etek nem-tor ish-veh fi' dohn. Aifa precautions muhl ken-tor k' fi' t' etek, i went ha-kel. Fi' sharu wuh sik svep t' etwel tvi-shal k' t'nash-veh tal-muv, i afer-tor wuh nuhm svi' wuh natuhn, khartau tor me; wuh maut kitork nuhm, hi ri has-bosh-written. Ish-veh had vesh' tefu k' el'ru (veling, opi' i losrak ha-kel), heh its tuhllar vesh' aifa: "kuv du nam-tor ri kwes tor sarlah tor wuh hinek masu-kastra tor-mu-yor il tor-morrow mu-yor na' naukuh, heh tor sarlah tor wuh pi' sluice-kelek k' wuh limekiln, du had weh-rom sarlah. Kuv du aitlun ro'fori fundauik ish-veh sa-kuk provis, du had mau weh-rom sarlah heh var-tor kling, heh pak-tor rai wak. Du bolau sarlah sa'awek. Katau nash k' du." i had had tus hiyet fi-tor t'nash-veh kashek fa' wuh receipt t' nash flekh nuhm. Ra tor tor i', i kupi ri var-tor. Heh wuh rasahkos vesh', ik i bolau klopau sahris, il i dang din-tor wuh aru coach, if would nem-tor me ne' svi' wak na' tor-mu-yor. Tor-morrow mu-yor i kupi ri nah-tor t' going, na' ish-veh would nam-tor nuh' ikap-tor fi-tor wuh wak t' wuh hash. Heh va'ashiv, na' sovek-vel i fai-tor, wuh proffered ro'fori lau ma ein yauluhk kuvish fi' wuh hash itself. Kuv i had had ample wak na' consideration, i dva-tor i dang fam dvun ma hal-tor. Having hardly sovek wak na' consideration, t'nash-veh glantau showing me ik wuh coach palikau k'svi ulef wuh wadan, i resolved tor hal-tor. I dang certainly ri ma hal-tor, tonk'peh na' wuh dzhinaya tor t'nash-veh sa-kuk provis. Ik, coming fi' wemmick's nuhm heh wuh asal's toranik preparation, da-tor wuh wef. Ish-veh nam-tor ni rihagik tor shetau clearly ma t' wuh tuhllar t' siyah sovek nuhm, svi' wuh khrashik brax, ik i had tor telv-tor nash mysterious epistle va'ashiv dah'wak, fa' its injunction tor me tor nam-tor tsat prah mechanically vi' t'nash-veh kashek. Yielding tor ish-veh svi' wuh ka mechanical ves t' yut, i losrak wuh pitoh svi' hish na' herbert, telling ish-veh ik u' i dang nam-tor ni ak going maf, i fai-tor ri na' uf wu, i had klopau tor brax ne' heh pla', tor ascertain na' myself uf din-tor havisham vesh' faring. I had yi barely wak tor prah t'nash-veh lo'uk-tor-pal, klachek abru wuh tvi-shal, heh tor na' wuh coach-office k' wuh pen k'-yut. Kuv i had taken wuh hackney-chariot heh hal-tor k' wuh yut, i dang ma din-tor t'nash-veh mokh; going u' i did, i kum-tor wuh coach aishan u' ish-veh sasarlah t' wuh ker. I vesh' wuh goh svi'udish passenger, jolting maf mal-nef-glu svi' terp, lu vesht sarlah nash-veh tor myself. Na' i really had ri vesh' myself opi' wuh receipt t' wuh nuhm; ish-veh had ni bewildered me, ensuing fi' wuh brax t' wuh asal. Wuh asal brax heh nuv had vesh' lo'uk; na', wu heh anxiously u' i had bek-tor na' wemmick, ish-veh hint had sarlah spo' wuh ak'wikmun na' kim-shah. Heh i' i began tor wonder na' myself na' hasu svi' wuh coach, heh tor vet whether i had sufficient utvau na' hasu tra', heh tor panah-tor whether i dang prah si' presently heh hal-tor pla', heh tor gyirm'i tehnat ek'wak heeding wuh anonymous sviribaya, heh, svi' pen, tor be' dvun k'fai ek' eifa wek t' contradiction heh indecision tor if i suppose maut zamu hurried sutra nam-tor ri-fainusu. Fam dvun, wuh dzhinaya tor provis k' ahm tren-tor kanok-vei. I reasoned u' i had reasoned already rik' fai-tor ish-veh, kuv ik nam-tor reasoning, svi' nuf sovek klau dang befall ish-veh k'fai t'nash-veh ri going, uf sos ek'wak forgive myself! Ish-veh vesh' gu'gelik fa' etek prah ne', heh wuh halovaya seemed wu heh dreary tor me, vi kupi gla-tor pi' t' ish-veh svi'udish, heh vi kupi ri hal-tor s'udish svi' t'nash-veh rikup-tor fupa s'. Avoiding wuh pla-kur boar, i shitau abru na' wuh ha-shal t' minor reputation ne' wuh kahr, heh ordered ein aru-yem. Du' ish-veh vesh' preparing, i went tor satis kelek heh inquired na' din-tor havisham; she vesh' fam dvun maut has-bosh, hi panah-tor vel weh-rom. T'nash-veh ha-shal had wuh'wak vesh' wuh krus t' wuh t'kahr ecclesiastical kelek, heh i aru-yokul svi' wuh pi' octagonal tsuri-tvi-shal, spo' wuh lef'. U' i vesh' ri kup tor tresahk t'nash-veh aru-yem, wuh hinek landlord k' wuh shining bald patam did ish-veh na' me. Nash bringing etek vi' conversation, au vesh' ni rom u' tor entertain me k' t'nash-veh sha' var, veling k' wuh popular feature ik pumblechook vesh' t'nash-veh earliest benefactor heh wuh afersu t' t'nash-veh fortunes. "tor du fai-tor wuh nu'ri sasu?" leralmin-tor i. "fai-tor ish-veh!" ashiv-tor wuh landlord. "ek'wak opi' au wasno pidek na' ek'." "tor au ek'wak sarlah pla' tor nash neighbourhood?" "ay, sarlah ish-veh pla', " leralmin-tor wuh landlord, "tor ish-veh lo'uk t'hylara, i' heh va'ashiv, heh mazhiv-kur-tor wuh samu tipan tor wuh sasu ik tor ish-veh." "ra sasu nam-tor ik?" "ish-veh ik i stariben t', " leralmin-tor wuh landlord. "mr. Pumblechook." "nam-tor au ungrateful tor kling else?" "rai vet au would nam-tor, kuv au kupi, " fun-tor wuh landlord, "tonk'peh au mokuhlek't. Heh po? Fai'ei pumblechook ovsoh kanok-vei na' ish-veh." "tor pumblechook leralmin ni?" "leralmin ni!" kilko-tor wuh landlord. "au han't rai vutau tor leralmin ni." "tonk'peh tor au leralmin ni?" "ish-veh would da-tor wuh sasu's khaf tor wan-kur wine winegar tor zhu-tor ish-veh var-tor t' ish-veh, osu, " leralmin-tor wuh landlord. I nahp, "wi joe, tal-kam joe, du worla var-tor t' ish-veh. Wu-suffering heh loving joe, du worla complain. Il du, slor-tempered biddy!" "ish-veh yeht-avon's vesh' estuhl spo' k' ish-veh kisheya, " leralmin-tor wuh landlord, glancing na' wuh bandaged kar ne' t'nash-veh tor-pal. "ar'kadan wuh tenderer zeshau." "rai, nemaiyo, " i kilko-tor, turning s' wuh pasu tor kesh-travek abru' wuh yon. "i mokuhlek yokul rai weht. Sanoi nem-tor ish-veh maf." i had worla vesh' kwul-tor na' ni keenly, na' t'nash-veh thanklessness tor joe, u' k'fai wuh brazen impostor pumblechook. Wuh falser au, wuh truer joe; wuh meaner au, wuh nobler joe. T'nash-veh khaf-spol vesh' deeply heh danik deservedly humbled u' i mused abru' wuh yon na' wuh wadan il weht. Wuh striking t' wuh wak-vel aroused me, tonk'peh ri s' t'nash-veh dejection il remorse, heh i prah abru heh had t'nash-veh tor-pal terau pauk t'nash-veh talu, heh went si'. I had previously sought svi' t'nash-veh abru'lik na' wuh nuhm, ik i lau dzhinau tor ish-veh va'ashiv; tonk'peh i kupi ri talal ish-veh, heh vesh' uneasy tor nah-tor ik ish-veh bolau ma vesh' eku-tor svi' wuh terp t' wuh coach. I fai-tor maut muhl, however, ik wuh kru'minaakh shi vesh' wuh pi' sluice-kelek k' wuh limekiln fi' wuh masu-kastra, heh wuh wadan naukuh. Na' wuh masu-kastra i i' went zehik, having rai wak tor spare. [illustration] chapter liii. Ish-veh vesh' wuh gu'gelik mu-yor, hi wuh bosh aikum she-tor u' i losrak wuh vi'ikap-tor shasol, heh be' dvun-tor si' fi-tor wuh masu-kastra. Mesakh ish-veh gu'gelik zehl tra' vesh' wuh ribbon t' pa'shik igen, hardly sax'ksei hiyet tor meskaraya wuh yon-kur suk aikum. Svi' wuh zamu minutes she had she-tor s' ik pa'shik vunai, svi' among wuh piled suk'kunel t' wan. Tra' vesh' wuh melancholy salan, heh wuh masu-kastra vesh' maut dismal. Wuh ri-fainusu would ma afer-tor au insupportable, heh kauk tor me au vesh' ni oppressive ik i hesitated, ulef vul-tor tor hal-tor pla'.
