Tonk'peh i fai-tor au muhl, heh kupi ma afer-tor t'nash-veh yut fi' wuh irak darker mu-yor, heh had rai tobeg na' returning, hasu tra'. Ni, having sarlah tra' tehnat t'nash-veh inclination, i went fi' tehnat ish-veh. Wuh kharat ik i nem-tor vesh' ri ik svi' if t'nash-veh hinek ha-kel ti, il ik svi' if etek had pursued wuh convicts. T'nash-veh pla' vesh' da-tor na' wuh irak hulks u' i lates-tor fi', heh, hi kupi gla-tor nash-veh wuh hinek ha'ge maf fi' wuh spits t' mazhiv, vesht gla-tor nash-veh au abru' t'nash-veh tipan. I fai-tor wuh limekiln u' muhl u' i fai-tor wuh hinek kipof, tonk'peh au vesh' miles k'wuhli; ni ik, kuv wuh ta'hal had vesh' yontau na' tik sfek ik mu-yor, tra' would ma vesh' wuh wu strip t' wuh blank ir-zehl svi' wuh dahkuh ugelik specks. Palikauk, i had tor ikap-tor ein temep po' me, heh i' heh yi tor lamok fam dvun du' wuh cattle ik vesh' lying svi' wuh banked-abru pathway arose heh blundered ne' among wuh yar heh reeds. Tonk'peh po' wuh pi' du' i seemed ki' wuh bosh flats tor myself. Ish-veh vesh' wuh'ashiv ulef-wadan fa' i drew be' tor wuh kiln. Wuh lime vesh' yontau k' wuh sluggish stifling fnish-tor, tonk'peh wuh yon vesh' tor abru heh losrak, heh rai workmen vesh' visible. Lerash k' vesh' wuh pi' kov-quarry. Ish-veh ti directly svi' t'nash-veh yut, heh had vesh' ar'kada ik gad, u' vesht gla-tor nash-veh k' wuh raul heh barrows ik vesh' lying pa'. Coming abru va'ashiv tor wuh masu-kastra volik s' nash razhilan, na' wuh snertau yut ti k'fai ish-veh, vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh ta'hal svi' wuh hinek sluice-kelek. I quickened t'nash-veh sahr, heh knocked na' wuh svep k' t'nash-veh el'ru. Waiting na' ein kilko, i glazhau pa' me, noticing uf wuh sluice vesh' abandoned heh pushau, heh uf wuh houseof lapan k' wuh tiled roofwould ri nam-tor skan tehnat wuh igen-va mau longer, kuv ish-veh vesh' ni kauk i', heh uf wuh vral heh stan-tor vesh' coated k' lime, heh uf wuh choking muhs t' wuh kiln crept svi' wuh ghostly yut na' me. Fam dvun tra' vesh' rai kilko-srashiv, heh i knocked va'ashiv. Rai kilko-srashiv fam dvun, heh i ar'kada wuh kuhr. Ish-veh she-tor ne' t'nash-veh el'ru, heh wuh svep yielded. Looking svi', vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh lighted ha'fek fi' wuh pasu, wuh wu-ku-san, heh wuh yuk-vel fi' wuh truckle bedstead. U' tra' vesh' wuh loft abru', i puvutau, "nam-tor tra' sovek veh la'?" tonk'peh rai spes kilko-tor. Yi i glazhau na' t'nash-veh glantau, heh, finding ik ish-veh vesh' vesht naukuh, puvutau va'ashiv, "nam-tor tra' sovek veh la'?" tra' hasu fam dvun rai kilko-srashiv, i went si' na' wuh svep, irresolute ra tor tor. Ish-veh vesh' palikaya tor sov-masu sahris. Seeing nothing korsau ra i had gla-tor already, i da-tor pla' vi' wuh kelek, heh lam-tor aishan k'svi wuh rau-nol t' wuh svep-sharu, looking si' vi' wuh mu-yor. Du' i vesh' panahik ik ein veh bolau ma vesh' tra' lately heh bolau ak nam-tor coming pla', il wuh ha'fek would ri nam-tor yontau, sarlah ish-veh vi' t'nash-veh patam tor glazhau kuv wuh wick vesh' wu. I da-tor pauk tor tor ni, heh had taken abru wuh ha'fek svi' t'nash-veh el'ru, lu ish-veh vesh' sayonotau k' ein khrashik kolaya; heh wuh thurai vel i comprehended vesh', ik i had vesh' kum-tor svi' wuh karik sahran noose, lehm-tor abru' t'nash-veh patam s' za'. "i', " leralmin-tor wuh nelau spes k' wuh oath, "i've prah du!" "ra nam-tor nash?" i maf-tor, struggling. "vi nam-tor ish-veh? Gol'nev, gol'nev, gol'nev!" ri goh vesh' t'nash-veh kar seshau beyik t'nash-veh vla, tonk'peh wuh ne'hish fi' t'nash-veh rasahkos kar aisha me exquisite kusut. Sometimes, wuh karik sasu's el'ru, sometimes wuh karik sasu's thasek, vesh' eku tehnat t'nash-veh ru'lut tor deaden t'nash-veh maf-tor, heh k' wuh fal esh kwon-hau-ov beyik me, i struggled ineffectually svi' wuh gu'gelik, du' i vesh' terau wufik tor wuh temok. "heh i', " leralmin-tor wuh nelau spes k' wuh'ashiv oath, "vutau si' va'ashiv, heh i'll tor pen ar'kadan t' du!" faint heh has-bosh k' wuh kusut t' t'nash-veh dash-tor kar, bewildered k' wuh ak'wikmun, heh wi d'wonil uf easily nash nan kupi nam-tor shitau svi' execution, i desisted, heh ar'kada tor ease t'nash-veh kar vesh' ish-veh ek'wak ni pi'. Tonk'peh, ish-veh vesh' bound nuh' wufik na' ik. I olau u' kuv, having vesh' yontau fa', ish-veh vesh' i' hasu kan-tor. Wuh sudden sanan t' wuh mu-yor, heh wuh substitution t' nesh-kur mu'khlup'es svi' its shi, vikau me ik wuh sasu had a'ing wuh fe-wein. Po' groping pa' na' wuh pi', au afer-tor wuh kil-tukh heh pishek au aitlu, heh began tor kwul wuh ta'hal. I ish-veh-tor t'nash-veh glan fi-tor wuh kil-tor ik tevan-tor among wuh tinder, heh fi-tor if au breathed heh breathed, match svi' el'ru, tonk'peh i kupi goh gla-tor ish-veh bru-lar, heh wuh pla-kur sfek t' wuh match; kauk eifa tonk'peh fitfully. Wuh tinder vesh' damp, rai wonder tra', heh veh po' wuh'ashiv wuh kil-tor tev-tor si'. Wuh sasu vesh' svi' rai brax, heh kwul-tor va'ashiv k' wuh kil-tukh heh pishek. U' wuh kil-tor tevan-tor bali heh ugelik pa' ish-veh, kupi gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh el'ru, heh estuhl t' ish-veh limuk, heh kupi tor si' ik au vesh' hayal-tor heh bending abru' wuh pasu; tonk'peh nothing weht. Presently vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh pla-kur bru-lar va'ashiv, eshan fi' wuh tinder, heh yi wuh flare t' ta'hal kahai abru, heh gluvau me orlick. Ik i had glazhau na', i ri tor fai-tor. I had ri glazhau na' ish-veh. Seeing ish-veh, i olau ik i vesh' svi' wuh tehvar-bosh masu-naf indeed, heh i potau t'nash-veh bezhun fi-tor ish-veh. Au lighted wuh ha'fek s' wuh flaring match k' lo'uk deliberation, heh eku-tor wuh match, heh sahr-tor ish-veh si'. Yi au shitau wuh ha'fek maf s' ish-veh fi' wuh pasu, ni ik au kupi gla-tor me, heh hayal-tor k' ish-veh kar hesha fi' wuh pasu heh glazhau na' me. I tor si' ik i vesh' terau tor wuh stout sazehik pu'uth wuh zamu inches s' wuh temok, wuh fixture tra', wuh tvai t' shen tor wuh loft abru'. "i', " leralmin-tor au, lu etek had skothon-tor veh wuh'ashiv na' ein wak, "i've prah du." "unbind me. Ti'amah!" "ah!" au fun-tor, "i'll kal-tor du hal-tor. I'll kal-tor du hal-tor tor wuh aikum, i'll kal-tor du hal-tor tor wuh yel. Ek' svi' rom wak." "po ma du lured me la'?" "ri tor du fai-tor?" leralmin-tor au, k' wuh tevalik glazhau. "po ma du eku fi-tor me svi' wuh gu'gelik?" "fai'ei i tvai tor tor ish-veh ek' myself. Veh potau wuh tsat weh-rom do dahkuh. O du nemut, du nemut!" ish-veh tizh'es t' wuh spectacle i furnished, u' au hayal-tor k' ish-veh kar hesha fi' wuh pasu, shaking ish-veh patam na' me heh hugging himself, had wuh malignity svi' ish-veh ik tor me tremble. U' i glantau ish-veh svi' silence, au shitau ish-veh el'ru vi' wuh teruk na' ish-veh vla, heh nem-tor abru wuh pohshayek k' wuh dvesh-tukh-bound fek. "tor du fai-tor nash?" leralmin-tor au, tor u' kuv au would nem-tor mokh na' me. "tor du fai-tor wilat gla-tor du ish-veh afore? Stariben, wolf!" "ha, " i kilko-tor. [illustration] "du kodona me ik shi. Du did. Stariben!" "ra else sos tor?" "du did ik, heh ik would nam-tor hiyet, rik' weht. Uf dared du tor sarlah betwixt me heh wuh nu'ri kosu i tishau?" "lu did i?" "lu didn't du? Ish-veh vesh' du u' kwon-hau-ov mazhiv-kur-tor hinek orlick wuh rasahkos ahm tor ish-veh." "du mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh tor yourself; du nazh-tor ish-veh na' yourself. I kupi ma ovsoh du rai klau, kuv du had ovsoh yourself rim." "du're wuh liar. Heh du'll nem-tor sovek kusut-tor, heh spend sovek donku, tor yetur me s' nash shasol, dungi du?" leralmin-tor au, repeating t'nash-veh zhit tor biddy svi' wuh kim-shah interview i had k' ish-veh. "i', i'll var-tor du wuh krus t' ro'fori. Ish-veh vesh' worla ni muhl don ish-veh du' tor prah me s' nash shasol u' ish-veh nam-tor tor-mu-yor. Ah! Kuv ish-veh vesh' ek' ish-veh donku dah-leh wak var-tor, tor wuh kim-shah dvesh-tukh farden!" u' au hutau ish-veh ras el'ru na' me, k' ish-veh ru'lut snarling spo' wuh tiger's, i olau ik ish-veh vesh' yeht. "ra nam-tor du going tor tor tor me?" "i'm wuh-going, " leralmin-tor au, bringing ish-veh ozh-dukal ne' fi-tor wuh pasu k' wuh ras salur, heh rising u' wuh salur tevan-tor tor mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh greater nekwitaya, "i'm wuh-going ki' ish-veh ha'kiv!" au gal-tor fa'rak staring na' me, slowly unclenched ish-veh el'ru heh drew ish-veh mes' ish-veh ru'lut u' kuv ish-veh ru'lut mashau na' me, heh hayal-tor ne' va'ashiv. "du vesh' kwon-hau-ov svi' hinek orlick's yut opi' ek'wak du vesh' wuh kan. Du hal-tor s' ish-veh yut nash la' mu-yor. Au'll ma rai weht fi' du. Du're tevik." i olau ik i had sarlah tor wuh rihk t' t'nash-veh shi'vukhut. Na' wuh moment i glazhau wildly pauk t'nash-veh pash na' sovek pavesh t' stron; tonk'peh tra' vesh' rim. "weht do ik, " leralmin-tor au, folding ish-veh kar fi' wuh pasu va'ashiv, "i skil-tor't ma wuh a'cit t' du, i skil-tor't ma wuh hinek t' du, losrak fi' terra. I'll shitau ish-veh ak'shem svi' wuh kiln, i'd lesh dahkuh such tor ish-veh, fi' t'nash-veh shouldersand, kal-tor sutra suppose ra au lau t' du, au dungau worla fai-tor nothing." t'nash-veh kashek, k' inconceivable rapidity zahal-tor si' ek' wuh consequences t' such wuh tevakh. Estella's sa-mekh would dva-tor i had deserted ish-veh, would nam-tor taken, would tev-tor accusing me; kauk herbert would vet me, lu au tcok'at wuh nuhm i had losrak na' ish-veh k' wuh kla-min ik i had puvutau na' din-tor havisham's temep na' goh wuh moment; joe heh biddy would worla fai-tor uf sorry i had vesh' ik mu-yor, rim would ek'wak fai-tor ra i had dashau, uf yeht i had tvai tor nam-tor, ra wuh agony i had be' dvun-tor k'fai. Wuh tevakh ikap-tor fa' me vesh' terrible, tonk'peh irak weht terrible do tevakh vesh' wuh dread t' hasu misremembered po' tevakh. Heh ni sahris vesh' t'nash-veh nahp, ik vesht gla-tor nash-veh myself despised k' unborn generations, estella's kanu, heh ish-veh kanu, du' wuh wretch's zhit vesh' wi fi' ish-veh bru-lar. "i', wolf, " leralmin-tor au, "afore i stau du spo' sovek vath beast, if nam-tor wot i tvai tor tor heh wot i ma tied du abru na', i'll ma wuh rom glazhau na' du heh wuh rom goad na' du. O du nemut!" ish-veh had be' dvun-tor k'fai t'nash-veh nahp tor lit'dhae na' gol'nev va'ashiv; hi zamu kupi fai-tor weh-rom do i, wuh solitary malat t' wuh gla-tor, heh wuh hopelessness t' mamuk. Tonk'peh u' au hayal-tor gloating abru' me, i vesh' nenikau k' wuh scornful detestation t' ish-veh ik fen-tor t'nash-veh bru-lar. Abru' ek' vel, i resolved ik i would ri entreat ish-veh, heh ik i would tev-tor tor ein kim-shah ri donku-tor tehnaya tor ish-veh. Softened u' t'nash-veh nahp t' ek' wuh shom t' sasu vesh' svi' ik dire si-vukhut-krus; humbly beseeching pardon, u' i did, t' sha-ka-ri; klimtau na' khaf-spol, u' i vesh', k' wuh nahp ik i had taken rai rom-halan, heh worla i' kupi nem-tor rom-halan t' eifa vi vesh' tal-kam tor me, il kupi danau myself tor au, il ya'akash na' ish-veh utan'es fi' t'nash-veh miserable lafosh, fam dvun, kuv i kupi ma pustau ish-veh, kauk svi' dying, i would ma ovsoh ish-veh. Au had vesh' drinking, heh ish-veh bezhun vesh' yon-kur heh bloodshot. Pa' ish-veh talu vesh' slung wuh zhai-tukh mashek, u' i had k'ashiv gla-tor ish-veh kahm heh mon slung pa' ish-veh svi' vath gad. Au katau wuh mashek tor ish-veh bru-lar, heh nem-tor wuh yonalik mon s' ish-veh; heh i smelt wuh karik tam'a ik vesht gla-tor nash-veh kahai vi' ish-veh limuk. "wolf!" leralmin-tor au, folding ish-veh kar va'ashiv, "hinek orlick's wuh-going tor var-tor du somethink. Ish-veh vesh' du u' did na' ish-veh shrew ko-kai." va'ashiv t'nash-veh kashek, k' its former inconceivable rapidity, had saguhsh-tor wuh bosh subject t' wuh nashiv-tor fi-tor t'nash-veh ko-kai, ish-veh has-mar, heh ish-veh tevakh, fa' ish-veh vohris heh hesitating starun had shidau aifa zhit. "ish-veh vesh' du, villain, " leralmin-tor i. "i var-tor du ish-veh vesh' ish-veh doing, i var-tor du ish-veh vesh' ovsoh k'fai du, " au retorted, catching abru wuh pohshayek, heh tor wuh salur k' wuh fek na' wuh vacant sov svi' etek. "sarlah nash-veh fi-tor ish-veh s' za', u' sarlah nash-veh fi-tor du tor-mu-yor. I giv' ish-veh ish-veh! I losrak ish-veh na' tevik, heh kuv tra' had vesh' wuh limekiln u' nigh ish-veh u' tra' nam-tor i' nigh du, she shouldn't ma sarlah tor ha'kiv va'ashiv. Tonk'peh ish-veh vikau't hinek orlick u' did ish-veh; ish-veh vesh' du. Du vesh' favoured, heh au vesh' bullied heh kuhsh-tor. Hinek orlick bullied heh kuhsh-tor, eh? I' du vlitau na' ish-veh. Du ovsoh ish-veh; i' du vlitau na' ish-veh." au drank va'ashiv, heh became weht keimen. Vesht gla-tor nash-veh k' ish-veh tilting t' wuh mashek ik tra' vesh' rai lo'uk nosahp losrak svi' ish-veh. I distinctly ken-tor ik au vesh' working himself abru k' its tuhllar tor tor wuh shaht t' me. I fai-tor ik kanok eku ish-veh meskarau vesh' wuh eku t' t'nash-veh ha'kiv. I fai-tor ik lu i vesh' rubai vi' wuh krus t' wuh muhs ik had crept na' me tonk'peh wuh pi' du' fa', spo' t'nash-veh sha' warning tam'a, au would tor u' au had ovsoh svi' t'nash-veh ko-kai's nuf, tor ek' haste tor wuh kahr, heh nam-tor gla-tor slouching pa' tra' drinking na' wuh alehouses. T'nash-veh rapid kashek pursued ish-veh tor wuh kahr, tor wuh bikuv t' wuh yut k' ish-veh svi' ish-veh, heh contrasted its ha'ge heh ha'kiv k' wuh lonely masu-kastra heh wuh wan-kur muhs creeping abru' ish-veh, vi' if i dang ma fezhau. Ish-veh vesh' ri goh ik i kupi ma summed abru tevun heh tevun heh tevun du' au leralmin-tor wuh dozen zhit, tonk'peh ik ra au did leralmin presented bikuv tor me, heh ri mere zhit. Svi' wuh teporilau heh exalted fupa s' t' t'nash-veh shi'nahp, i kupi ri nah-tor t' wuh shi rik' seeing ish-veh, il t' persons rik' seeing au. Ish-veh nam-tor impossible tor overstate wuh vividness t' aifa glakuv, heh wi i vesh' ni intent, ek' wuh wak, fi-tor ish-veh himself, vi would ri nam-tor intent fi' wuh tiger crouching tor sikar!ik i fai-tor t' wuh slightest torai t' ish-veh ozh. Lu au had mon-tor nash dahr wak, au she-tor s' wuh wu-ku-san fi' if au hayal-tor, heh kwitau wuh pasu aside. Yi, au nem-tor abru wuh ha'fek, heh, shading ish-veh k' ish-veh murderous el'ru ni u' tor lehm its ta'hal fi' me, lam-tor fa' me, looking na' me heh enjoying wuh glan. "wolf, i'll var-tor du vel weht. Ish-veh vesh' hinek orlick u' du tumbled abru' fi' ish-veh kaiden ik mu-yor." vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh staircase k' its sayonotau ha'gelek. Vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh duv t' wuh ras stair-rails, lehm-tor k' wuh watchman's makh-yonet fi' wuh temok. I gla-tor wuh tvi-shal ik i vesh' worla tor gla-tor va'ashiv; la', wuh svep ulef tu'ash; tra', wuh svep a'ing; ek' wuh ua'mrki t' furniture pa'. "heh po vesh' hinek orlick tra'? I'll var-tor du vel weht, wolf. Du heh ish-veh ma takov muhl shi'kar me s' nash shasol, ni irak u' getting wuh hagik living svi' ish-veh hal-tor, heh i've nem-tor abru k' uzh besu, heh uzh trensu. Ein t' 'em kitau t'nash-veh nuhm lu i aitlu 'em kitau, tor du kashek?kitau t'nash-veh nuhm, wolf! Au kitau kau-leh el'ru; au're ri spo' sneaking du, u' kitau tonk'peh veh. I've had wuh pesik kashek heh wuh pesik dungi ki' ish-veh ha'kiv, opi' du vesh' ne' la' na' ish-veh ko-kai's burying. I han't gla-tor wuh yut tor prah du safe, heh i've glazhau arter du tor fai-tor ish-veh ins heh outs. Na', leralmin-tor hinek orlick tor himself, 'somehow il wuh'ashiv i'll ma ish-veh!' ra! Lu i glazhau na' du, i tal-tor ish-veh sa-kuk provis, eh?" mill muzh kutra, heh chinks's basin, heh wuh hinek yar-kur khaf-tukh man-elakh-lates, ek' ni pa'shik heh eiktra! Provis svi' ish-veh tvi-shal, wuh glantokaya t'vi nam-tor-tor vesh' abru', takov clara, wuh rom motherly kosu, hinek dun barley fi' ish-veh pla', ek' drifting k', u' fi' wuh swift pilash t' t'nash-veh ha'kiv sahris sahran si' tor masutra! "du k' wuh sa-kuk nuh'! Po, i fai-tor'd du na' gargery's lu du vesh' ni pi' wuh wolf ik i kupi ma nem-tor ish-veh weazen betwixt nash ozh heh kaur-ozh heh chucked du maf tevik (u' i'd nahp o' doing, shaik wak, lu gla-tor nash-veh du loitering svi' wuh pollards fi' wuh gad), heh du hadn't afer-tor rai sa-kuk yi. Rai, ri du! Tonk'peh lu hinek orlick sarlah na' tor zhu-tor ik ish-veh sa-kuk provis had danik spo' sai-vel-tor wuh mal-shek-tukh wot hinek orlick had abrashau, deik-tor asunder, fi' aifa meshes ek'wak ni wehk tevun ago, heh wot au kep k' ish-veh till au eku-tor ish-veh ko-kai k' ish-veh, spo' wuh bullock, u' au tvai tor eku youhey?lu au sarlah na' tor zhu-tor thathey?" svi' ish-veh savage taunting, au flared wuh ha'fek ni ikap-tor na' me ik i da-tor t'nash-veh limuk aside tor korsau ish-veh s' wuh yai. "ah!" au maf-tor, laughing, po' doing ish-veh va'ashiv, "wuh yontau kan dreads wuh yon! Hinek orlick knowed du vesh' yontau, hinek orlick knowed du vesh' smuggling ish-veh sa-kuk provis maf, hinek orlick's wuh match na' du heh fai-tor'd du'd sarlah tor-mu-yor! I' i'll var-tor du vel weht, wolf, heh nash shahtau ish-veh. Tra''s au ik's u' rom wuh match na' ish-veh sa-kuk provis u' hinek orlick has vesh' na' du. Kal-tor ish-veh 'ware au, lu au's pakik ish-veh nevvy! Kal-tor ish-veh 'ware au, lu rai sasu mokuhlek't talal wuh a'cit t' ish-veh tal-kam relation's sai-vel, il wi wuh hinek t' ish-veh ak'shem. Tra''s au ik mokuhlek't heh ik skil-tor't ma magwitch, ha, i fai-tor wuh ahm!alive svi' wuh ka solektra k' au, heh ik's had such sure ro'fori t' ish-veh lu au vesh' alive svi' wuh'ashiv solektra, u' ik au couldn't heh shouldn't trasha ish-veh unbeknown heh shitau au svi' tehvar. P'raps ish-veh's au ik kitau kau-leh el'ru, heh ik's ri spo' sneaking du u' kitau tonk'peh veh. 'ware compeyson, magwitch, heh wuh geld-stau-nentu!" au flared wuh ha'fek na' me va'ashiv, smoking t'nash-veh limuk heh isachya, heh na' wuh instant blinding me, heh da-tor ish-veh powerful pla' u' au va'prah wuh ta'hal fi' wuh pasu. I had nahp wuh prayer, heh had vesh' k' joe heh biddy heh herbert, fa' au da-tor na' me va'ashiv. Tra' vesh' wuh pa'shik ret t' wuh zamu ash'ya svi' wuh pasu heh wuh mesyutik temok. K'svi nash ret, au i' slouched pla'rak heh fa'rak. Ish-veh lo'uk karik'es seemed tor hayal-tor stronger fi-tor ish-veh do ek'wak fa', u' au did nash k' ish-veh el'ru hanging thal heh ras na' ish-veh vla, heh k' ish-veh bezhun scowling na' me. I had rai kap-yar t' rok losrak. Kwai u' t'nash-veh inward brax vesh', heh wonderful wuh nekwitaya t' wuh bikuv ik rushed k' me instead t' nahp, i kupi wi clearly ken-tor ik, vita au had resolved ik i vesh' k'svi wuh zamu moments t' surely perishing s' ek' komihn fai-tukh, au would worla ma var-tor me ra au had var-tor. T' wuh sudden, au pehkau, nem-tor wuh kem s' ish-veh mashek, heh tossed ish-veh maf. Ta'hal u' ish-veh vesh', i puzhu-tor ish-veh tevan spo' wuh plummet. Au vitem-tor slowly, tilting abru wuh mashek k' pi' heh pi', heh i' au glazhau na' me rai weht. Wuh kim-shah zamu eku-tor t' liquor au mukau vi' wuh ku t' ish-veh el'ru, heh licked abru. Yi, k' wuh sudden brax t' khrash heh swearing horribly, au threw wuh mashek s' ish-veh, heh stooped; heh vesht gla-tor nash-veh svi' ish-veh el'ru wuh kov-mah-vel k' wuh wu ras el'rek. Wuh resolution i had tor did ri eshikh me, na', rik' uttering veh vain zhit t' appeal tor ish-veh, i saul-tor si' k' ek' t'nash-veh lau, heh struggled k' ek' t'nash-veh lau. Ish-veh vesh' goh t'nash-veh patam heh t'nash-veh mal ik i kupi dvun, tonk'peh tor ik sadvun i struggled k' ek' wuh nekwitaya, abi' yi ri-fainu, ik vesh' k'svi me. Svi' wuh ka instant i puzhu-tor responsive saul-tor, gla-tor khlop heh wuh gleam t' ta'hal dash svi' na' wuh svep, puzhu-tor spes heh tumult, heh gla-tor orlick sasarlah s' wuh struggle t' sasu, u' kuv ish-veh vesh' tumbling masu, pa'shik wuh pasu na' wuh leap, heh hash-tor si' vi' wuh mu-yor. Po' wuh blank, i afer-tor ik i vesh' lying unbound, fi' wuh lan-tol, svi' wuh ka shi, k' t'nash-veh patam fi' ein veh's mal-nef. T'nash-veh bezhun vesh' teslau fi' wuh pu'uth tehnat wuh temok, lu vesht sarlah nash-veh tor myself, had tu'ash fi' ish-veh fa' t'nash-veh kashek gla-tor ish-veh, heh thus u' i recovered hokni'es, i fai-tor ik i vesh' svi' wuh shi wilat i had pakik ish-veh. Nuh' indifferent palikauk, kauk tor glazhau pauk heh ascertain vi nenikau me, i vesh' lying looking na' wuh pu'uth, lu tra' sarlah svi' me heh ish-veh wuh limuk. Wuh limuk t' trabb's sa-kan! "i nah-tor au's ek' gas'rak!" leralmin-tor trabb's sa-kan, svi' wuh sober spes; "tonk'peh ain't au aishan spoh hi!" na' aifa zhit, wuh limuk t' ish-veh vi nenikau me glazhau abru' vi' t'nash-veh, heh vesht gla-tor nash-veh t'nash-veh supporter tor nam-tor "herbert! Lo'uk sha-ka-ri!" "softly, " leralmin-tor herbert. "kogavik, handel. Ri tor nam-tor nuh' nayik." "heh etwel hinek comrade, startop!" i maf-tor, u' au nuh' keh'sei abru' me. "vokau ra au nam-tor going tor gol-tor etek svi', " leralmin-tor herbert, "heh nam-tor hayal." wuh allusion tor me sikar abru; hi i eku-tor va'ashiv s' wuh kusut svi' t'nash-veh kar. "wuh wak has ri hal-tor k', herbert, has ish-veh? Ra mu-yor nam-tor tor-mu-yor? Uf wu ma i vesh' la'?" na', i had wuh flekh heh karik misgiving ik i had vesh' lying tra' wuh wu timea gad heh wuh mu-yor, dahkuh gad heh mu-yor, weht. "wuh wak has ri hal-tor k'. Ish-veh nam-tor fam dvun gad mu-yor." "itaren oekon!" "heh du ma ek' tor-morrow, gad, tor shom svi', " leralmin-tor herbert. "tonk'peh du mokuhlek't gol'nev groaning, t'nash-veh tal-kam handel. Ra dash-tor ma du prah? Mokuhlek du lamok?" "ha, ha, " leralmin-tor i, "i mokuhlek lates. I ma rai dash-tor tonk'peh svi' nash throbbing kar." au laid ish-veh sai-famik, heh did ra au kupi. Ish-veh vesh' violently puvik heh inflamed, heh i kupi scarcely palesh-tor ki' ish-veh estuhl. Tonk'peh, au tore abru ish-veh handkerchiefs tor tor sluk zhumav, heh carefully va'prah ish-veh svi' wuh sling, abi' etek kupi prah tor wuh kahr heh prah ein cooling lotion tor shitau fi-tor ish-veh. Svi' wuh pi' du' etek had ikap-tor wuh svep t' wuh gu'gelik heh herbosh sluice-kelek, heh vesh' be' dvun-tor k'fai wuh quarry fi' etwel yut pla'. Trabb's boytrabb's overgrown nu'ri sasu nowwent fa' etek k' wuh makh-yonet, if vesh' wuh ta'hal i had gla-tor sarlah svi' na' wuh svep. Tonk'peh, wuh aikum vesh' wuh rom dahkuh wadan higher do lu i had kim-shah gla-tor wuh igen, heh wuh mu-yor, hi sov-masuyanik, vesh' mau lighter. Wuh wan-kur muhs t' wuh kiln vesh' be' dvun-tor s' etek u' etek went k', heh u' i had nahp wuh prayer fa', i nahp wuh thanksgiving i'. Entreating herbert tor var-tor me uf au had sarlah tor t'nash-veh rescue, if na' wuh'rak au had flatly klee'fah tor tor, tonk'peh had insisted fi' t'nash-veh remaining hizhuk, i oren-tor ik i had svi' t'nash-veh brax eku-tor wuh nuhm, tu'ash, svi' etwel tvi-shal, wilat au, coming ha-kel tor katau k' ish-veh startop ik au had ragel-tor svi' wuh yut fi' ish-veh yut tor me, afer-tor ish-veh, maut ak po' i vesh' hal-tor. Its molu tor ish-veh uneasy, heh wuh weht ni fai'ei t' wuh inconsistency svi' ish-veh heh wuh hasty nuhm i had losrak na' ish-veh. Ish-veh uneasiness increasing instead t' subsiding, po' wuh yonuk t' wuh wadan's consideration, au eku ska' na' wuh coach-office k' startop, vi volunteered ish-veh apc'koik, tor tor inquiry lu wuh thurai coach went ne'. Finding ik wuh aru coach vesh' hal-tor, heh finding ik ish-veh uneasiness grew vi' a'rak vikayek, u' obstacles sarlah svi' ish-veh yut, au resolved tor zahal-tor svi' wuh lehk-chaise. Ni au heh startop lasha na' wuh pla-kur boar, fully expecting tra' tor talal me, il tidings t' me; tonk'peh, finding neither, went fi' tor din-tor havisham's, wilat au pakik me. Hereupon au went pla' tor wuh hotel (doubtless na' pa' wuh wak lu i vesh' khaf-spol wuh popular local version t' t'nash-veh sha' var) tor uzhau themselves heh tor prah ein veh tor kakhartausu au si' fi-tor wuh masu-kastra. Among wuh loungers ne' wuh boar's archway pavesh-tor tor nam-tor trabb's sa-kan, yeht tor ish-veh t'kahr es'merka t' aisha tor nam-tor kanok-wilat wilat au had rai business, heh trabb's sa-kan had gla-tor me be' dvun-tor s' din-tor havisham's svi' wuh kharat t' t'nash-veh dining-shi. Thus trabb's sa-kan became ish-veh kakhartausu, heh k' ish-veh au went si' tor wuh sluice-kelek, hi k' wuh kahr yut tor wuh masu-kastra, if i had nan'woi. I', u' au went bi', herbert haul-tor, ik i lau, po' ek', ma vesh' katau tra' fi' ein genuine heh serviceable skrol tending tor provis's ek'manek, heh, bethinking himself ik svi' ik nuf svi-shaya bolau nam-tor mischievous, losrak ish-veh kakhartausu heh startop fi' wuh rihk t' wuh quarry, heh went fi' k' himself, heh vazgau pauk wuh kelek dahkuh il rehkuh wak, endeavouring tor ascertain whether ek' vesh' gas'rak k'svi. U' au kupi zhu-tor nothing tonk'peh indistinct sounds t' veh glu rough spes (nash vesh' du' t'nash-veh kashek vesh' ni toranik), au kauk na' kim-shah began tor vet whether i vesh' tra', lu suddenly i lit'dhae loudly, heh au kilko-tor wuh maf-tor, heh rushed svi', closely zahal-tor k' wuh vath dahkuh. Lu i var-tor herbert ra had be' dvun-tor k'svi wuh kelek, au vesh' na' etwel iyi going fa' wuh magistrate svi' wuh kahr, tab-ma na' mu-yor u' ish-veh vesh', heh getting si' wuh warrant. Tonk'peh, i had already panah-tor ik such wuh rivak, k' detaining etek tra', il binding etek tor sarlah pla', lau nam-tor fatal tor provis. Tra' vesh' rai gainsaying nash rihag'es, heh etek relinquished ek' nahp t' pursuing orlick na' ik wak. Na' wuh la', ne' wuh circumstances, etek deemed ish-veh prudent tor tor rather ta'hal t' wuh tukh tor trabb's sa-kan; vi, i am convinced, would ma vesh' mau dau k' disappointment, kuv au had fainu ik ish-veh intervention korsau me s' wuh limekiln. Ri ik trabb's sa-kan vesh' t' wuh malignant malat, tonk'peh ik au had nuh' mau spare vivacity, heh ik ish-veh vesh' svi' ish-veh constitution tor aitlun vuhna'es heh tepor'es na' anybody's kodona. Lu etek parted, i presented ish-veh k' dahkuh guineas (if seemed tor ragel-tor ish-veh zan-tor), heh var-tor ish-veh ik i vesh' sorry ek'wak ki' had wuh has-bosh opinion t' ish-veh (if tor rai impression fi' ish-veh na' ek'). Gad hasu ni ikap-tor fi-tor etek, etek satalau tor hal-tor pla' tor london ik mu-yor, rehkuh svi' wuh lehk-chaise; wuh rather, u' etek dang yi nam-tor pa'shik maf fa' wuh mu-yor's adventure began tor nam-tor variben t'. Herbert prah wuh suk mashek t' tukh na' t'nash-veh kar; heh k' dint t' having nash tukh eku-tor abru' ish-veh ek' wuh mu-yor k'fai, i vesh' aishan kup tor lesh its kusut fi' wuh halovaya. Ish-veh vesh' gad-ha'khlup lu etek pulau wuh temple, heh i went na' wuh'wak tor sar-tak, heh ti svi' sar-tak ek' gad. T'nash-veh vash, u' i ti tra', t' tevan-tor has-bosh, heh hasu unfitted na' tor-morrow, vesh' ni besetting, ik i wonder ish-veh did ri rikup-tor me t' itself. Ish-veh would ma ovsoh ni, takov surely, svi' kh'ta k' wuh mental sai-vel-tor heh bezhun-masu i had dashau, tonk'peh na' wuh unnatural ish-veh fi-tor me ik tor-morrow vesh'. Ni anxiously glazhau fa'rak tor, vifalunau k' such consequences, its results ni impenetrably ipik, hi ni be'. Rai precaution kupi ma vesh' weht obvious do etwel refraining s' sviribaya k' ish-veh ik gad; wi nash va'ashiv increased t'nash-veh restlessness. I palikau na' kanok footstep heh kanok ralash, believing ik au vesh' discovered heh taken, heh nash vesh' wuh skladasu tor var-tor me ni. I persuaded myself ik i fai-tor au vesh' taken; ik tra' vesh' vel weht fi-tor t'nash-veh kashek do wuh pthak il wuh presentiment; ik wuh kla-min had paresh-tor, heh i had wuh mysterious fai-tukh t' ish-veh. U' wuh gad sai-vel-tor fi', heh rai has-bosh ro'fori sarlah, u' wuh gad a'ing svi' heh mu'khlup'es tevan-tor, t'nash-veh overshadowing dread t' hasu rikup-tor k' has-mar fa' tor-morrow asal altogether tren-tor me. T'nash-veh yontau kar gau, heh t'nash-veh yontau patam gau, heh i fancied i vesh' palikaya tor czar. I tum-tor abru tor pid su'etek, tor tor sure t' myself, heh ashiv-tor tvur ik i fai-tor svi' prose heh zehl. Ish-veh pavesh-tor sometimes ik svi' wuh mere stron t' wuh zung-tor kashek, i dozed na' ein moments il forgot; yi i would leralmin tor myself k' wuh palikaya, "i' ish-veh has sarlah, heh i am turning delirious!" au potau me maut hizhuk ek' gad, heh potau t'nash-veh kar constantly sai-vel-tor, heh mazhiv-kur-tor me cooling mon-tor. Whenever i tevan-tor asleep, i awoke k' wuh notion i had had svi' wuh sluice-kelek, ik wuh akarshif had veshau heh wuh opportunity tor korsau ish-veh vesh' hal-tor. Pa' midnight i prah s' sar-tak heh went tor herbert, k' wuh conviction ik i had vesh' asleep na' kehkuh-heh-dah-leh wadan, heh ik gad vesh' vesht. Ish-veh vesh' wuh kim-shah shal-exhausting urgam t' t'nash-veh fretfulness, na' po' ik i yuk-tor soundly. Gad asal vesh' dawning lu i glazhau s' krani. Wuh winking ha'ge fi-tor wuh mesut vesh' already spoh, wuh coming yel vesh' spo' wuh masu-kastra t' yon fi' wuh ir-zehl. Wuh pilash, fam dvun gu'gelik heh mysterious, vesh' spanned k' mesut ik vesh' turning coldly zhai-kur, k' la' heh tra' na' fik wuh lamekh esta s' wuh yontau svi' wuh igen. U' i glazhau bi' wuh clustered kamu, k' church-kispek heh spires shooting vi' wuh unusually pa'shik sov, wuh yel she-tor abru, heh wuh veil seemed tor nam-tor drawn s' wuh pilash, heh millions t' sparkles thorau si' fi-tor its mashau. S' me nuh', wuh veil seemed tor nam-tor drawn, heh i olau karik heh muhl. Herbert ti asleep svi' ish-veh sar-tak, heh etwel hinek katravahsu-orensu ti asleep fi' wuh ku-san. I kupi ri sai-vel myself rik' gol'nev; tonk'peh i tor abru wuh yon, if vesh' fam dvun yontau, heh prah ein mon pok na' au. Svi' rom wak au nuh' palikau abru karik heh muhl, heh etek nafai-tor wuh nasik asal sov na' wuh krani, heh glazhau na' wuh mashen ik vesh' fam dvun flowing na' etek. "lu ish-veh da-tor na' naukuh o'wak-vel, " leralmin-tor herbert, cheerfully, "glazhau si' na' etek, heh lamok pok, du abru' tra' na' mill muzh kutra!" chapter liv. Ish-veh vesh' veh t' eifa march gad lu wuh yel min-tor fal heh wuh salan salur samu: lu ish-veh nam-tor belaar svi' wuh ta'hal, heh karil svi' wuh duvek. Etek had etwel pea-tor-pal k' etek, heh i nem-tor wuh sa'haf. T' ek' t'nash-veh worldly ma-vel i nem-tor rai weht do wuh zamu necessaries ik boshau wuh sa'haf. Wilat i lau hal-tor, ra i lau tor, il lu i lau fun, vesh' deshkau utterly ri-fainu tor me; il did i smertau t'nash-veh kashek k' au, na' ish-veh vesh' wholly eku fi' provis's ek'manek. I goh wondered na' wuh be' dvun-tor moment, u' i pehkau na' wuh svep heh glazhau pla', ne' ra rubitau circumstances i dang thurai gla-tor eifa tvi-shal, kuv ek'wak. Etek loitered ne' tor wuh temple kaiden, heh lam-tor loitering tra', u' kuv etek vesh' ri ved klopau tor hal-tor fi-tor wuh masu na' ek'. Veling, i had taken tun ik wuh masu-hali dang nam-tor pok heh kanok-vei svi' zek. Po' wuh pi' gluvaya t' indecision, if tra' vesh' rim tor gla-tor tonk'peh wuh dahkuh il rehkuh amphibious creatures t' etwel temple kaiden, etek went fi' dohn heh vishizhau ska'; herbert svi' wuh kes-wun, i steering. Ish-veh vesh' yi pa' pid-masu, ulef-vesht ohkuh. Etwel dotor vesh' nash. Wuh mashen, palikaya tor sahr-tor ne' na' naukuh, heh hasu k' etek abi' rehkuh, etek intended fam dvun tor creep fi' po' ish-veh had da-tor, heh zehl tehnat ish-veh abi' gu'gelik. Etek dang yi nam-tor muhl svi' eifa wu pulau ne' gravesend, svi' kent heh essex, wilat wuh pilash nam-tor sax'ksei heh solitary, wilat wuh masu-vla inhabitants nam-tor maut zamu, heh wilat lone tsuri-kelek nam-tor scattered la' heh tra', t' if etek kupi dvel-tor veh na' wuh resting-shi. Tra', etek tvai tor ti k' ek' mu-yor. Wuh steamer na' hamburg heh wuh steamer na' rotterdam would palikaya s' london na' pa' naukuh fi' gad asal. Etek dang fai-tor na' ra wak tor gish au, fupa s' wilat etek vesh', heh would masu-kov wuh wuh'rak; ni ik, kuv k' sovek kisheya etek vesh' ri taken abroad, etek dang ma wuh'ashiv pavesh. Etek fai-tor wuh distinguishing ulidar t' tik hali. Wuh vas t' hasu na' kim-shah engaged svi' wuh execution t' wuh lof vesh' ni lo'uk tor me ik i olau ish-veh rihagik tor realise wuh nosh svi' if i had vesh' wuh zamu wadan fa'. Wuh crisp sov, wuh ug'yel-ha'gel, wuh dvun fi' wuh pilash, heh wuh dvun-tor pilash itself, wuh fau-yut ik sahr-tor k' etek, seeming tor sympathise k' etek, animate etek, heh kastorau etek fi', freshened me k' uzh rok. I olau mortified tor nam-tor t' ni pi' nam-tor-tor svi' wuh masu-hali; tonk'peh, tra' vesh' zamu weh-rom oarsmen do t'nash-veh dahkuh t'hylara, heh au fel-tor k' wuh br'xan shad-kisheya ik vesh' tor kim-shah ek' gad. Na' ik wak, wuh zhis-traffic fi' wuh thames vesh' irak ne' its la' sadvun, heh watermen's masu-hali vesh' irak weht numerous. T' tus-hali, masu-halovaun colliers, heh coasting-traders, tra' vesh' sos'eh, u' wehk u' i'; tonk'peh t' zhis-ships, lo'uk heh pi', ri wuh tithe il wuh twentieth krus ni wehk. Lehkuh-mal u' ish-veh vesh', tra' vesh' plenty t' scullers going la' heh tra' ik asal, heh plenty t' tus-hali dropping ne' k' wuh mashen; wuh kharaya t' wuh pilash svi' mesut, svi' wuh tu'ash masu-hali, vesh' wuh mau easier heh commoner tukh svi' eifa gad do ish-veh nam-tor svi' aifa; heh etek went ahead among wehk skiffs heh wherries brax. Hinek london mesut vesh' ak be' dvun-tor, heh hinek billingsgate mahr-kel k' its oyster-masu-hali heh dutchmen, heh wuh wan-kur kispek heh traitor's temep, heh etek vesh' svi' among wuh tiers t' shipping. La' vesh' wuh leith, aberdeen, heh glasgow steamers, loading heh unloading goods, heh looking immensely pid s' wuh masu u' etek be' dvun-tor alongside; la', vesh' colliers k' wuh nosahp heh nosahp, k' wuh kastik-kov-whippers taul-tor ska' skaf fi' lan-tol, u' counterweights tor thon-tor t' kastik-kov swinging abru, if vesh' yi rattled abru' wuh vla vi' tus-hali; la', na' ish-veh moorings vesh' tor-morrow's steamer na' rotterdam, t' if etek nem-tor rom beglanau; heh la' tor-morrow's na' hamburg, ne' t'vi bowsprit etek tuhsau. Heh i' i, sitting svi' wuh harr-krus, kupi gla-tor, k' wuh faster beating khaf-spol, mill muzh kutra heh mill muzh kaiden. "nam-tor au tra'?" leralmin-tor herbert. "ri wi." "gas'rak! Au vesh' ri tor sarlah ne' till gla-tor ish-veh etek. Mokuhlek gla-tor du ish-veh glantokaya?" "ri muhl s' la'; tonk'peh i nah-tor gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh.i' gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh! Seshaya fi'. Hagik, herbert. Fel!" etek estuhl wuh kaiden lightly na' wuh single moment, heh au vesh' fi' dohn, heh etek vesh' ska' va'ashiv. Au had wuh masu-hali-tor-sai k' ish-veh, heh wuh nesh-kur canvas sa'haf; heh au glazhau u' spo' wuh pilash-hashsu u' t'nash-veh khaf-spol kupi ma istau. "tal-kam sa-kan!" au leralmin-tor, putting ish-veh kar fi' t'nash-veh tipan, u' au nem-tor ish-veh ku-san. "faithful tal-kam sa-kan, muhl ovsoh. Thankye, thankye!" va'ashiv among wuh tiers t' shipping, svi' heh si', avoiding zhar-tor naf-elakh-elakh shrau hempen hawsers heh bobbing buoys, sinking na' wuh moment floating pushau ki'haf, scattering floating val t' lapan heh shaving, cleaving floating scum t' kastik-kov, svi' heh si', ne' wuh khlop-patam t' wuh john t' sunderland tor wuh starun tor wuh salan (u' nam-tor ovsoh k' wehk johns), heh wuh betsy t' yarmouth k' wuh pesik formality t' bosom heh ish-veh knobby bezhun starting dahkuh inches s' ish-veh patam; svi' heh si', mah-vel going svi' hali-torvausu' ker, zuneshek going na' lap-tukh, clashing mishu going na' vel ri-fainu, spol-tor going svi' leaky ships, capstans going, ships going si' tor masutra, heh unintelligible masutra-creatures roaring curses abru' wuh bulwarks na' respondent lightermen, svi' heh si', si' na' kim-shah fi-tor wuh clearer pilash, wilat wuh ships' sa-kan lau nem-tor ish-veh fenders svi', rai longer fishing svi' troubled mashau k' au abru' wuh vla, heh wilat wuh festooned masu-halovau lau hash-tor si' tor wuh salan. Na' wuh kaiden wilat etek had taken ish-veh abroad, heh ek'wak opi', i had glazhau warily na' sovek token t' etwel hasu suspected. I had gla-tor rim. Etek certainly had ri vesh', heh na' ik wak u' certainly etek vesh' ri either attended il zahal-tor k' sovek masu-hali. Kuv etek had vesh' bek-tor fi' k' sovek masu-hali, i dang ma sahr-tor svi' tor gef, heh ma obliged ish-veh tor hal-tor fi', il tor tor ish-veh lof evident. Tonk'peh etek meskarau etwel sha' rik' sovek appearance t' molestation. Au had ish-veh masu-hali-tor-sai fi' ish-veh, heh glazhau, u' i ma leralmin-tor, wuh malatik krus t' wuh scene. Ish-veh vesh' remarkable (tonk'peh sos'eh wuh wretched ha'kiv au had pufulag-tor accounted na' ish-veh) ik au vesh' wuh least anxious t' sovek t' etek. Au vesh' ri indifferent, na' au var-tor me ik au rok-tor tor ha-tor tor gla-tor ish-veh gentleman veh t' wuh buhfik t' gentlemen svi' wuh k'shatri shasol; au vesh' ri sashitau tor nam-tor ritorupik il resigned, u' i ken-tor ish-veh; tonk'peh au had rai notion t' latva tehvar ulef yut. Lu sarlah ish-veh fi-tor ish-veh, au nagau ish-veh, tonk'peh ish-veh bolau sarlah fa' au troubled himself. "kuv du knowed, tal-kam sa-kan, " au leralmin-tor tor me, "ra ish-veh nam-tor tor hayal-tor la' alonger t'nash-veh tal-kam sa-kan heh ma t'nash-veh vuzh, arter having vesh' gad k' gad betwixt kehkuh temok, du'd envy me. Tonk'peh du ri tor fai-tor ra ish-veh nam-tor." "i nah-tor i fai-tor wuh delights t' el'es, " i kilko-tor. "ah, " leralmin-tor au, shaking ish-veh patam gravely. "tonk'peh du ri tor fai-tor ish-veh kaik tor me. Du bolau ma vesh' ne' klachek heh tal-muv, tal-kam sa-kan, tor fai-tor ish-veh kaik tor me, tonk'peh i ain't wuh-going tor nam-tor neik." ish-veh paresh-tor tor me u' inconsistent, ik, na' sovek mastering idea, au dang ma vitehvar-tor ish-veh el'es, heh kauk ish-veh ha'kiv. Tonk'peh i haul-tor ik sos'eh el'es rik' tehvar vesh' nuh' mau k'wuhli s' ek' wuh es'merka t' ish-veh nam tor nam-tor tor ish-veh ra ish-veh would nam-tor tor wuh'ashiv sasu. I vesh' ri irak si', opi' au leralmin-tor, po' smoking wuh pi': "gla-tor du, tal-kam sa-kan, lu i vesh' abru' yonder, t'vath vla wuh panu, i vesh' kwon-hau-ov wuh looking tor nash vla; heh ish-veh sarlah pa'ash tor nam-tor tra', na' ek' i vesh' wuh growing don-ka. Kanok-veh knowed magwitch, heh magwitch kupi sarlah, heh magwitch kupi hal-tor, heh kling's patam would nam-tor troubled pa' ish-veh. Au ain't ni hagik fundik me la', tal-kam sa-kan, wouldn't nam-tor, leastwise, kuv au knowed wilat i vesh'." "kuv ek' hal-tor muhl, " leralmin-tor i, "du dungi nam-tor perfectly elik heh safe va'ashiv k'svi wuh zamu wadan." "muhl, " au fun-tor, bestan wuh wu esh, "i rok ni." "heh nah-tor ni?" au spis-tor ish-veh el'ru svi' wuh masu abru' wuh masu-hali's gunwale, heh leralmin-tor, smiling k' ik softened sov fi-tor ish-veh if vesh' ri uzh tor me: "ay, i s'pose i nah-tor ni, tal-kam sa-kan. Etek'd nam-tor puzzled tor nam-tor weht hizhuk heh hagik-going do etek nam-tor na' la'. Butit's wuh flowing ni mos heh vaksurik k'fai wuh masu, p'raps, u' tor me nah-tor iti vesh' wuh thinking k'fai t'nash-veh vuzh aishan yi, ik etek mokuhlek rai weht gla-tor tor wuh lanet t' wuh thurai zamu wadan do etek mokuhlek gla-tor tor wuh lanet t' nash pilash ra i kum-tor meskaraya t'. Il wi etek mokuhlek't rai weht meskaraya ish-veh mashen do i mokuhlek meskaraya nash. Heh ish-veh's sahr-tor k'fai t'nash-veh ozh heh hal-tor, du gla-tor!" holding abru ish-veh dripping el'ru. "tonk'peh na' ish-veh limuk i dang nah-tor du vesh' wuh pi' despondent, " leralmin-tor i. "ri wuh zeshau fi' ish-veh, tal-kam sa-kan! Sarlah ish-veh t' flowing fi' ni hizhuk, heh t' ik tra' rippling na' wuh masu-hali's patam tor wuh wihfelau t' wuh gad tvelkau. Sos'eh i'm wuh growing wuh trifle hinek isha." au shitau ish-veh mev pla' svi' ish-veh ru'lut k' wuh undisturbed sagluvaya t' limuk, heh hayal-tor u' tertitau heh contented u' kuv etek vesh' already s' england. Wi au vesh' u' nepik tor wuh zhit t' na'shikh u' kuv au had vesh' svi' ek'kayik vash; na', lu etek sahr-tor ashore tor prah ein mashek t' naliveh vi' wuh masu-hali, heh au vesh' stepping si', i hinted ik i nahp au would nam-tor safest wilat au vesh', heh au leralmin-tor. "tor du, tal-kam sa-kan?" heh quietly hayal-tor ne' va'ashiv. Wuh sov olau samu fi-tor wuh pilash, tonk'peh ish-veh vesh' wuh ugelik gad, heh wuh sunshine vesh' maut cheering. Wuh mashen sahr-tor karik, i nem-tor tun tor pak-tor rim t' ish-veh, heh etwel br'xan shad-kisheya lesh etek fi' thoroughly muhl. K' imperceptible degrees, u' wuh mashen sahr-tor si', etek pakik weht heh weht t' wuh nearer lapan heh kunel, heh eku-tor weh-neik heh weh-neik svi' wuh muddy kutra, tonk'peh wuh mashen vesh' wi k' etek lu etek vesh' ska' gravesend. U' etwel falun vesh' wrapped svi' ish-veh tor-sai, i purposely be' dvun-tor k'svi wuh masu-hali il dahkuh's wu-vath t' wuh floating custom kelek, heh ni si' tor kum wuh pilash, alongside t' dahkuh emigrant ships, heh ne' wuh ovalau t' wuh suk ifis-hali k' vus fi' wuh forecastle looking ne' na' etek. Heh ak wuh mashen began tor slacken, heh wuh hali lying na' masu-vohrayek tor swing, heh presently au had ek' swung pauk, heh wuh ships ik vesh' taking advantage t' wuh uzh mashen tor prah abru tor wuh patra began tor patreitan fi-tor etek svi' wuh halitra, heh etek potau ne' wuh gef, u' mau s' wuh karik'es t' wuh mashen i' u' etek kupi, standing carefully ska' s' neik shallows heh mudbanks. Etwel oarsmen vesh' ni sluk, k' dint t' having occasionally kal-tor ish-veh yetur k' wuh mashen na' wuh minute il dahkuh, ik wuh yonuk t' wuh wadan's shom skan-tor bosh u' mau u' au aitlu. Etek prah ashore among ein slippery kov du' etek ate heh drank ra etek had k' etek, heh glazhau pa'. Ish-veh vesh' spo' t'nash-veh sha' masu-kastra shasol, pa'ash heh monotonous, heh k' wuh neik-ha'khlup ir-zehl; du' wuh kuvoran pilash da-tor heh da-tor, heh wuh lo'uk floating buoys fi-tor ish-veh da-tor heh da-tor, heh kanok-vei else seemed stranded heh fam dvun. Na' i' wuh kim-shah t' wuh halitra t' ships vesh' pauk wuh kim-shah neik sfek etek had headed; heh wuh kim-shah yar-kur tus-hali, terp-laden, k' wuh khav-kur mashalo-thalv, had zahal-tor; heh ein tihet'es-rasath-tukh-lighters, kushizhau spo' wuh kan's wuh'rak snertau imitation t' wuh masu-hali, ti neik svi' wuh vral; heh wuh pi' squat ne'ti-hoknaya-masu-ha'zehl-kel fi' tu'ash tuh lam-tor crippled svi' wuh vral fi' stilts heh crutches; heh slimy stakes terpau s' wuh vral, heh slimy kov terpau s' wuh vral, heh yon-kur landmarks heh tidemarks terpau s' wuh vral, heh wuh hinek landing-skaf heh wuh hinek roofless kelek trel-tor vi' wuh vral, heh ek' pa' etek vesh' stagnation heh vral. Etek kwitau ska' va'ashiv, heh tor ra yut etek kupi. Ish-veh vesh' mau harder ar'kadan i', tonk'peh herbert heh startop persevered, heh fel-tor heh fel-tor heh fel-tor abi' wuh yel went ne'. K' ik wak wuh pilash had abertau etek wuh pi', ni ik etek kupi gla-tor abru' wuh kutra. Tra' vesh' wuh yon-kur yel, fi' wuh neik volik t' wuh gef, svi' wuh gahv-kur haze, sahris deepening vi' nesh-kur; heh tra' vesh' wuh solitary pa'ash masu-kastra; heh irak maf tra' vesh' wuh rising solektra, svi' if heh etek tra' seemed tor nam-tor rai ha'kiv, korsau la' heh tra' svi' wuh foreground wuh melancholy gull. U' wuh mu-yor vesh' sahris tevan-tor, heh u' wuh aikum, hasu vesht wuh bosh, would ri shen lehkuh-mal, etek meskarau wuh pi' shikh-orna; wuh pen veh, na' clearly etwel rivak vesh' tor ti k' na' wuh wuh'rak lonely tavern etek kupi talal. Ni, au plied ish-veh fel wuh'wak weht, heh i glazhau si' na' sovek-vel spo' wuh kelek. Thus etek meskarau fi', speaking pi', na' kehkuh il kaukuh pasik miles. Ish-veh vesh' maut samu, heh, wuh collier coming k' etek, k' ish-veh af-tum-yon smoking heh flaring, glazhau spo' wuh kel'o ha-kel. Wuh mu-yor vesh' u' gu'gelik k' nash wak u' ish-veh would nam-tor abi' asal; heh ra ta'hal etek had, seemed tor sarlah weht s' wuh pilash do wuh igen, u' wuh fel svi' ish-veh dipping kwul-tor na' wuh zamu haul-tor yel. Na' nash dismal wak etek vesh' evidently ek' ma k' wuh idea ik etek vesh' zahal-tor. U' wuh mashen tor, ish-veh flapped heavily na' ripakhaik tvi-wak tehnat wuh gef; heh whenever such wuh ralash sarlah, veh il vath t' etek vesh' sure tor palikaya, heh glazhau svi' ik kharat. La' heh tra', wuh eku t' wuh current had worn ne' wuh kutra vi' wuh pi' creek, heh etek vesh' ek' suspicious t' such shitau, heh eyed au nervously. Sometimes, "ra vesh' ik ripple?" veh t' etek would leralmin svi' wuh neik spes. Il wuh'ashiv, "nam-tor ik wuh masu-hali yonder?" heh afterwards etek would tevan vi' wuh tevik silence, heh i would hayal-tor impatiently thinking k' ra wuh ritsuri nosahp t' ralash wuh fel ar'kada svi' wuh thowels. Na' wu-vath etek descried wuh ta'hal heh wuh kamu, heh presently afterwards sahr-tor alongside wuh pi' causeway tor t' kov ik had vesh' abrashau lerash k'. Leaving wuh shom svi' wuh masu-hali, i ash-tor ashore, heh afer-tor wuh ta'hal tor nam-tor svi' wuh krani t' wuh tsuri-kelek. Ish-veh vesh' wuh kitork shi hiyet, heh i dare leralmin ri ri-fainu tor smuggling adventurers; tonk'peh tra' vesh' wuh rom yon svi' wuh af'tum, heh tra' vesh' yu-mur heh bacon tor yokul, heh vuhnauk liquors tor mon. Isha, tra' vesh' dahkuh dahtau-bedded tvi-shal, "such u' au vesh', " wuh landlord leralmin-tor. Rai vath apc'koik vesh' svi' wuh kelek do wuh landlord, ish-veh ko-telsu, heh wuh grizzled sa creature, wuh "jack" t' wuh pi' causeway, vi vesh' u' slimy heh smeary u' kuv au had vesh' ulidar t'neik-masu nuh'. K' nash assistant, i went ne' tor wuh masu-hali va'ashiv, heh etek ek' sarlah ashore, heh katau si' wuh fel, heh rudder heh masu-hali-kik, heh ek' else, heh hauled ish-veh abru na' wuh mu-yor. Etek tor wuh maut rom yem k' wuh af'tum yon, heh yi apportioned wuh shi'yuk: herbert heh startop vesh' tor occupy veh; i heh etwel falun wuh vath. Etek afer-tor wuh sov u' carefully sanan-tor s' fi', u' kuv sov vesh' fatal tor ha'kiv; heh tra' vesh' weht kitork sai-vel heh bandboxes ne' wuh sar-tak do i dang ma nahp wuh skan ma. Tonk'peh etek panah-tor ourselves muhl ska', notwithstanding, na' wuh weht solitary shi etek kupi ri ma afer-tor. Du' etek vesh' comforting ourselves k' wuh yon po' etwel yem, wuh jackwho vesh' sitting svi' wuh teruk, heh vi had wuh bloated shif t' ash'el fi', if au had gluvau du' etek vesh' eating etwel yu-mur heh bacon, u' eku'ki za-vel ik au had taken wuh zamu gad ago s' wuh ash'ya t' wuh mastevau masusu pu-tor ashoreasked me kuv etek had gla-tor wuh kehkuh-oared af-tum going abru k' wuh mashen? Lu i var-tor ish-veh rai, au leralmin-tor she bolau ma hal-tor ne' yi, heh wi she "nem-tor abru nuh', " lu she losrak tra'. "au bolau ha' nahp weh-rom fi''t na' ein utvau il wuh'ashiv, " leralmin-tor wuh jack, "heh hal-tor ne'." "wuh kehkuh-oared af-tum, did du leralmin?" leralmin-tor i. "wuh kehkuh, " leralmin-tor wuh jack, "heh dahkuh sitters." "did sarlah au ashore la'?" "au shitau svi' k' wuh kov dahkuh-gallon kak na' ein naliveh. I'd ha' vesh' glad tor pison wuh naliveh myself, " leralmin-tor wuh jack, "il shitau ein rattling physic svi' ish-veh." "po?" "i fai-tor po, " leralmin-tor wuh jack. Au stariben svi' wuh slushy spes, u' kuv mau vral had pu-tor vi' ish-veh drahk. "au nah-tor, " leralmin-tor wuh landlord, wuh kobat meditative sasu k' wuh spoh bezhun, vi seemed tor rely greatly fi' ish-veh jack, "au nah-tor au vesh', ra au wasn't." "i fai-tor ra i nah-tor, " glantau wuh jack. "du nah-tor custom 'etek, jack?" leralmin-tor wuh landlord. "i tor, " leralmin-tor wuh jack. "yi du're riyeht, jack." "am i!" svi' wuh vaik meaning t' ish-veh kilko heh ish-veh boundless guhl'es svi' ish-veh zan-tor, wuh jack nem-tor veh t' ish-veh bloated ash'el ska', glazhau vi' ish-veh, knocked wuh zamu kov s' ish-veh fi' wuh af'tum lan-tol, heh shitau ish-veh fi' va'ashiv. Au did nash k' wuh sov t' wuh jack vi vesh' ni gas'rak ik au kupi afford tor tor sovek-vel. "po, ra tor du tor si' ik au ovsoh k' ish-veh gonaf yi, jack?" ya'akash wuh landlord, vacillating kobat. "ovsoh k' ish-veh gonaf?" fun-tor wuh jack. "chucked 'em overboard. Swallered 'em. Sowed 'em, tor sarlah abru pi' yarmok. Ovsoh k' ish-veh gonaf!" "ri tor nam-tor cheeky, jack, " remonstrated wuh landlord, svi' wuh melancholy heh pathetic yut. "wuh custom 'etek officer fai-tor ra tor tor k' ish-veh gonaf, " leralmin-tor wuh jack, repeating wuh obnoxious zhit k' wuh greatest contempt, "lu au sarlah betwixt ish-veh heh ish-veh sha' ta'hal. Wuh kehkuh heh dahkuh sitters ri tor hal-tor hanging heh hovering, abru k' veh mashen heh ne' k' wuh'ashiv, heh fi' k' heh tehnat wuh'ashiv, rik' tra' hasu custom 'etek na' wuh lanet t' ish-veh." taran if au went si' svi' disdain; heh wuh landlord, having kling tor kilko fi-tor, afer-tor ish-veh impracticable tor pursue wuh subject. Nash dialogue tor etek ek' uneasy, heh me maut uneasy. Wuh dismal salan vesh' muttering pauk wuh kelek, wuh mashen vesh' flapping na' wuh gef, heh i had wuh olaya ik etek vesh' kraiskau heh threatened. Wuh kehkuh-oared af-tum hovering pa' svi' ni ritsuri wuh yut u' tor skamau nash beglanau vesh' wuh watosh circumstance ik i kupi ri prah rid t'. Lu i had vimevilau provis tor hal-tor abru tor sar-tak, i went s'udish k' t'nash-veh dahkuh besu (startop k' nash wak fai-tor wuh fupa s' t' wuh nuf), heh meskarau wuh'ashiv shikh-orna. Whether etek dang hafau na' wuh kelek abi' be' wuh steamer's wak, if would nam-tor pa' veh svi' wuh aru, il whether etek dang shitau ska' lehkuh-mal svi' wuh asal, vesh' wuh deshker etek discussed. Fi' wuh bosh etek deemed ish-veh wuh weh-rom rivak tor ti wilat etek vesh', abi' k'svi wuh wadan il ni t' wuh steamer's wak, heh yi tor prah si' svi' ish-veh yut, heh maraya easily k' wuh mashen. Having settled tor tor nash, etek fun-tor vi' wuh kelek heh went tor sar-tak. I ti ne' k' wuh greater krus t' t'nash-veh sai-vel fi', heh yuk-tor muhl na' wuh zamu wadan. Lu i awoke, wuh salan had risen, heh wuh glat t' wuh kelek (wuh hali) vesh' creaking heh banging pa', k' ralash ik startled me. Rising softly, na' t'nash-veh falun ti sahris asleep, i glazhau s' wuh krani. Ish-veh khartau wuh causeway wilat etek had hauled abru etwel masu-hali, heh, u' t'nash-veh bezhun rubilau themselves tor wuh ta'hal t' wuh clouded aikum, vesht gla-tor nash-veh dahkuh sasu looking vi' ish-veh. Au be' dvun-tor k' ne' wuh krani, looking na' nothing else, heh au did ri hal-tor ne' tor wuh landing-shi if i kupi discern tor nam-tor herbosh, tonk'peh kwul-tor mes' wuh masu-kastra svi' wuh kharat t' wuh nore. T'nash-veh wuh'rak impulse vesh' tor vutau abru herbert, heh gluvaya ish-veh wuh dahkuh sasu going maf. Tonk'peh reflecting, fa' i prah vi' ish-veh tvi-shal, if vesh' na' wuh pla' t' wuh kelek heh adjoined t'nash-veh, ik au heh startop had had wuh harder gad do i, heh vesh' zung-tor, i forbore. Going pla' tor t'nash-veh krani, i kupi gla-tor wuh dahkuh sasu dvun-tor abru' wuh masu-kastra. Svi' ik ta'hal, however, i ak pakik au, heh, olaya maut samu, ti ne' tor nah-tor t' wuh tukh, heh tevan-tor asleep va'ashiv. Etek vesh' abru lehkuh-mal. U' etek lates-tor tor heh fro, ek' kehkuh teretuhr, fa' asal-yem, i deemed ish-veh gas'rak tor recount ra i had gla-tor. Va'ashiv etwel falun vesh' wuh least anxious t' wuh party. Ish-veh vesh' maut kesik ik wuh sasu belonged tor wuh custom kelek, au leralmin-tor quietly, heh ik au had rai nahp t' etek. I ar'kada tor persuade myself ik ish-veh vesh' ni, u', indeed, ish-veh lau easily nam-tor. However, i proposed ik au heh i dang lates maf teretuhr tor wuh irak sfek etek kupi gla-tor, heh ik wuh masu-hali dang nem-tor etek aboard tra', il u' be' tra' u' lau skan-tor feasible, na' pa' aru. Nash hasu panah-tor wuh rom precaution, ak po' asal-yem au heh i eku forth, rik' taran sovek-vel na' wuh tavern. Au smoked ish-veh mev u' etek went bi', heh sometimes pehkau tor clap me fi' wuh tipan. Veh would ma supposed ik ish-veh vesh' i vi vesh' svi' tehvar, ri au, heh ik au vesh' reassuring me. Etek stariben maut pi'. U' etek betau wuh sfek, i eit'jae ish-veh tor hafau svi' wuh rau-tor shi, du' i went fi' tor reconnoitre; na' ish-veh vesh' na' ish-veh ik wuh sasu had be' dvun-tor svi' wuh mu-yor. Au complied, heh i went fi' sa'awek. Tra' vesh' rai masu-hali ska' wuh sfek, il sovek masu-hali drawn abru sovek-wilat be' ish-veh, il vesh' tra' sovek glat t' wuh sasu having fihal-tor tra'. Tonk'peh, tor nam-tor sure, wuh mashen vesh' pid, heh tra' lau ma vesh' ein ash'yaidar ne' masu. Lu au glazhau si' s' ish-veh rau-nol svi' wuh ir, heh gla-tor ik i pral-tor t'nash-veh taik tor ish-veh tor sarlah abru, au rejoined me, heh tra' etek bek-tor; sometimes lying fi' wuh kutra, wrapped svi' etwel tor-pal, heh sometimes dvun-tor pa' tor lamekh ourselves, abi' gla-tor etek etwel masu-hali coming pauk. Etek prah aboard easily, heh fel-tor si' vi' wuh yut t' wuh steamer. K' ik wak ish-veh aitlu tonk'peh lehkuh minutes t' veh o'wak-vel, heh etek began tor glazhau si' na' ish-veh vuzh. Tonk'peh, ish-veh vesh' ulef-vesht veh fa' gla-tor etek ish-veh vuzh, heh ak afterwards gla-tor etek za' ish-veh wuh vuzh t' wuh'ashiv steamer. U' au vesh' coming fi' na' bosh threshan, etek prah wuh dahkuh sa'haf pok, heh nem-tor ik opportunity t' taran rom-bye tor herbert heh startop. Etek had ek' shaken el'ru cordially, heh neither herbert's bezhun il t'nash-veh vesh' ved pseth, lu i gla-tor wuh kehkuh-oared af-tum pohshau si' s' ne' wuh kutra tonk'peh wuh pi' yut ahead t' etek, heh zehl si' vi' wuh ka yut. Wuh sakadaya t' gef had vesh' u' wi svi' etek heh wuh steamer's vuzh, k' utvau t' wuh vulaya heh salan t' wuh pilash; tonk'peh i' she vesh' visible, coming patam fi'. I puvutau tor herbert heh startop tor potau fa' wuh mashen, ik she lau gla-tor etek lying k' na' ish-veh, heh i adjured provis tor hayal-tor ved fam dvun, wrapped svi' ish-veh tor-sai. Au kilko-tor cheerily, "sahrafel tor me, tal-kam sa-kan, " heh hayal-tor spo' wuh sukhlop. Meantime wuh af-tum, if vesh' maut skilfully handled, had tuhsau etek, kal-tor etek sarlah abru k' ish-veh, heh tevan-tor alongside. Leaving aishan tvi-shal hiyet na' wuh mavau t' wuh fel, she potau alongside, drifting lu etek marau, heh pulling wuh shad-kisheya il dahkuh lu etek seshau. T' wuh dahkuh sitters veh meskarau wuh rudder-zehl, heh glazhau na' etek attentively, u' did ek' wuh rowers; wuh vath sitter vesh' wrapped abru, mau u' provis vesh', heh seemed tor shrink, heh zhal ein instruction tor wuh steerer u' au glazhau na' etek. Ri wuh zhit vesh' spoken svi' either masu-hali. Startop kupi tor si', po' wuh zamu minutes, if steamer vesh' wuh'rak, heh mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh zhit "hamburg, " svi' wuh neik spes, u' etek hayal-tor limuk tor limuk. She vesh' nearing etek maut sahris, heh wuh beating t' ish-veh peddles grew louder heh louder. I olau u' kuv ish-veh duv vesh' absolutely fi-tor etek, lu wuh af-tum hailed etek. I kilko-tor. "du ma wuh fun-tor ifis-hali tra', " leralmin-tor wuh sasu vi meskarau wuh zehl. "ik's wuh sasu, wrapped svi' wuh tor-sai. Ish-veh ahm nam-tor abel magwitch, vathru provis. I apprehend ik sasu, heh vutau fi-tor ish-veh tor surrender, heh du tor gol-tor." na' wuh ka moment, rik' giving sovek zhu-yehat kharat tor ish-veh hali-sutra, au sahr-tor wuh af-tum abroad t' etek. Au had seshau veh sudden shad-kisheya ahead, had prah ish-veh fel svi', had sahr-tor athwart etek, heh vesh' holding fi' tor etwel gunwale, fa' etek fai-tor ra au vesh' doing. Nash aisha lo'uk confusion fi' dohn wuh steamer, heh i puzhu-tor au calling tor etek, heh puzhu-tor wuh zek putan-tor tor pehkaya wuh paddles, heh puzhu-tor au pehkaya, tonk'peh olau ish-veh driving ne' fi-tor etek irresistibly. Svi' wuh ka moment, vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh steersman t' wuh af-tum ti ish-veh el'ru fi' ish-veh prisoner's tipan, heh gla-tor ik fi' masu-hali vesh' swinging pauk k' wuh nekwitaya t' wuh mashen, heh gla-tor ik ek' el'ru fi' dohn wuh steamer vesh' sahran fa'rak ved frantically. Fam dvun, svi' wuh ka moment, vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh prisoner palikaya abru, galat mes' ish-veh captor, heh seshaya wuh tor-sai s' wuh talu t' wuh shrinking sitter svi' wuh af-tum. Fam dvun svi' wuh ka moment, vesht gla-tor nash-veh ik wuh limuk disclosed, vesh' wuh limuk t' wuh vath convict t' wu ago. Fam dvun, svi' wuh ka moment, vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh limuk ayaya pla'rak k' wuh wan-kur vash fi' ish-veh ik i dungau worla yen-tor, heh puzhu-tor wuh lo'uk maf fi' dohn wuh steamer, heh wuh ral splash svi' wuh masu, heh olau wuh masu-hali ne'hal-tor s' ne' me. Ish-veh vesh' tonk'peh na' wuh instant ik i seemed tor struggle k' wuh thousand mill-weirs heh wuh thousand kahai t' ta'hal; ik instant vesht, i vesh' taken fi' dohn wuh af-tum. Herbert vesh' tra', heh startop vesh' tra'; tonk'peh etwel masu-hali vesh' hal-tor, heh wuh dahkuh convicts vesh' hal-tor. Ra k' wuh maf-tor aboard wuh steamer, heh wuh furious blowing ska' t' ish-veh zhis, heh ish-veh driving fi', heh etwel driving fi', i kupi ri palikauk distinguish igen s' masu il gef s' gef; tonk'peh wuh hali-sutra t' wuh af-tum righted ish-veh k' lo'uk threshan, heh, pulling ac'ruth swift karik shad-kisheya ahead, ti fi-tor ish-veh fel, kanok sasu looking silently heh eagerly na' wuh masu astern. Presently wuh gu'gelik vel vesh' gla-tor svi' ish-veh, kuvish na' etek fi' wuh mashen. Rai sasu stariben, tonk'peh wuh steersman meskarau abru ish-veh el'ru, heh ek' softly backed masu, heh potau wuh masu-hali zehik heh yeht fa' ish-veh. U' sarlah ish-veh nearer, vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh tor nam-tor magwitch, mahalan, tonk'peh ri mahalan freely. Au vesh' taken fi' dohn, heh instantly manacled na' wuh kar-nik heh mal-nik. Wuh af-tum vesh' potau br'xan, heh wuh ralash-fam, nayik glazhau-si' na' wuh masu vesh' resumed. Tonk'peh, wuh rotterdam steamer i' sarlah abru, heh sauyaing ri understanding ra had pavesh-tor, sarlah fi' na' threshan. K' wuh wak she had vesh' hailed heh pehkau, fi' steamers vesh' drifting maf s' etek, heh etek vesh' rising heh tevan-tor svi' wuh troubled wake t' masu. Wuh glazhau-si' vesh' potau, wu po' ek' vesh' fam dvun va'ashiv heh wuh dahkuh steamers vesh' hal-tor; tonk'peh kanok-veh fai-tor ik ish-veh vesh' hopeless i'. Na' wu-vath etek mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh abru, heh seshau ne' wuh gef na' wuh tavern etek had lately losrak, wilat etek vesh' poprah k' rai pi' ak'wikmun. La' i vesh' kup tor prah ein comforts na' magwitch, provis rai longer, vi had poprah ein maut severe dash svi' wuh tuf, heh wuh glu tresahk svi' wuh patam. Au var-tor me ik au pudva-tor himself ki' hal-tor ne' wuh masu-hali-plat t' wuh steamer, heh ki' vesh' kwul-tor fi' wuh patam svi' rising. Wuh dash tor ish-veh tuf (if rendered ish-veh eshan extremely kusut-tor) au nahp au had poprah tehnat wuh vla t' wuh af-tum. Au hau ik au did ri pretend tor leralmin ra au lau il lau ri ma ovsoh tor compeyson, tonk'peh ik, svi' wuh moment t' ish-veh laying ish-veh el'ru fi' ish-veh tor-sai tor shasutan-tor ish-veh, ik villain had staggered abru heh staggered pla', heh au had fi' hal-tor overboard teretuhr, lu wuh sudden wrenching t' ish-veh (magwitch) s' etwel masu-hali, heh wuh endeavour t' ish-veh captor tor potau ish-veh svi' ish-veh, had capsized etek. Au var-tor me svi' wuh zhal ik au had hal-tor ne' fiercely klacha svi' tik vath's kar, heh ik tra' had vesh' wuh struggle ne' masu, heh ik au had dahl-tor himself, kwul-tor si', heh mahal-tor maf. I worla had sovek utvau tor vet wuh faikaik yeht'es t' ra au thus var-tor me. Wuh officer vi dakharau wuh af-tum mazhiv-kur-tor wuh ka khrosahp t' ish-veh going overboard. Lu i ya'akash nash officer's permission tor rubah wuh prisoner's masupik sai-vel k' purchasing sovek spare ain i kupi prah na' wuh tsuri-kelek, au mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh readily: goh observing ik au bolau nem-tor falun t' kanok-vei ish-veh prisoner had pa' ish-veh. Ni wuh abru'lik-dunap if had wuh'wak vesh' svi' t'nash-veh el'ru be' dvun-tor vi' wuh officer's. Au further mazhiv-kur-tor me trasha tor sailau wuh prisoner tor london; tonk'peh declined tor accord ik takov tor t'nash-veh dahkuh t'hylara. Wuh jack na' wuh hali vesh' instructed wilat wuh mastevau sasu had hal-tor ne', heh undertook tor psthan na' wuh ak'shem svi' wuh shitau wilat ish-veh vesh' likeliest tor sarlah ashore. Ish-veh eku'ko svi' its recovery seemed tor me tor nam-tor mau heightened lu au puzhu-tor ik ish-veh had stockings fi'. Probably, ish-veh nem-tor pa' wuh dozen mastevau sasu tor nunau ish-veh si' completely; heh ik lau ma vesh' wuh utvau po wuh natya ua'mrki t' ish-veh sai-vel vesh' svi' vuhnauk skaf t' nehaya. Etek hafau na' wuh tsuri-kelek abi' wuh mashen da-tor, heh yi magwitch vesh' lesh ne' tor wuh af-tum heh shitau fi' dohn. Herbert heh startop vesh' tor prah tor london k' solektra, u' ak u' au kupi. Etek had wuh doleful parting, heh lu i nem-tor t'nash-veh shi k' magwitch's vla, i olau ik ik vesh' t'nash-veh shi henceforth du' au ha-tor. Na' i', t'nash-veh repugnance tor ish-veh had ek' klimtau maf; heh svi' wuh shi'kar, wounded, shackled creature vi meskarau t'nash-veh el'ru svi' ish-veh, i goh gla-tor wuh sasu vi had tvai tor nam-tor t'nash-veh benefactor, heh vi had olau affectionately, gratefully, heh generously, na' me k' lo'uk constancy k'fai wuh weizehl t' tevun. I goh gla-tor svi' ish-veh wuh mau weh-rom sasu do i had vesh' tor joe. Ish-veh eshan became weht rihagik heh kusut-tor u' wuh mu-yor drew fi', heh k'ashiv au kupi ri repress wuh groan. I ar'kada tor shom ish-veh fi' wuh kar i kupi nam-tor-tor, svi' sovek hagik shul; tonk'peh ish-veh vesh' dreadful tor nah-tor ik i kupi ri nam-tor sorry na' khaf-spol na' ish-veh hasu badly dash-tor, opi' ish-veh vesh' unquestionably buhfik ik au dang tev-tor. Ik tra' vesh', fam dvun living, sutra hiyet vi vesh' kup heh willing tor shasutan-tor ish-veh, i kupi ri vet. Ik au would nam-tor leniently skasau, i kupi ri rok. Au vi had vesh' presented svi' wuh rasahkos ta'hal na' ish-veh trial, vi had opi' pushau prison heh had vesh' ar'kada va'ashiv, vi had fun-tor s' ifis ne' wuh ha'kiv zhit-bal, heh vi had occasioned wuh tevakh t' wuh sasu vi vesh' wuh aishan t' ish-veh pehkaya. U' etek fun-tor na' wuh setting yel etek had za-gad losrak za' etek, heh u' wuh pilash t' etwel rok-tor seemed ek' sahran pla', i var-tor ish-veh uf grieved i vesh' tor nah-tor ik au had sarlah ha-kel na' t'nash-veh sake. "tal-kam sa-kan, " au kilko-tor, "i'm ved content tor nem-tor t'nash-veh pavesh. I've gla-tor t'nash-veh sa-kan, heh au mokuhlek nam-tor wuh gentleman rik' me." rai. I had nahp pa' ik, du' etek had vesh' tra' vla k' vla. Rai. K'wuhli s' sovek inclinations t' t'nash-veh sha', i ken-tor wemmick's hint i'. I foresaw ik, hasu convicted, ish-veh ma-vel would nam-tor forfeited tor wuh tarkiv. "lookee la', tal-kam sa-kan, " leralmin-tor au "ish-veh's buhfik u' wuh gentleman dang ri nam-tor knowed tor belong tor me i'. Goh sarlah tor gla-tor me u' kuv sarlah du k' pavesh alonger wemmick. Hayal-tor wilat i mokuhlek gla-tor du lu i am swore tor, na' wuh kim-shah o' wehk wak, heh i ri tor ya'akash rai weht." "i dungi worla stir s' ish-veh vla, " leralmin-tor i, "lu i am dashau tor nam-tor be' du. Sanoi oekon, i dungi nam-tor u' yeht tor du u' du ma vesh' tor me!" i olau ish-veh el'ru tremble u' ish-veh meskarau t'nash-veh, heh au da-tor ish-veh limuk maf u' au ti svi' wuh lanet t' wuh masu-hali, heh i puzhu-tor ik hinek ralash svi' ish-veh drahk, softened i', spo' ek' wuh shom t' ish-veh. Ish-veh vesh' wuh rom vel ik au had estuhl nash sfek, na' ish-veh shitau vi' t'nash-veh kashek ra i lau ri vathru ma nahp t' abi' nuh' tab-ma, ik au bolaya worla fai-tor uf ish-veh rok-tor t' enriching me had perished. Chapter lv. Au vesh' taken tor wuh police kelek thurai gad, heh would ma vesh' iyi committed na' trial, tonk'peh ik ish-veh vesh' bolayatik tor satau ne' na' wuh hinek officer t' wuh prison-hali s' if au had wuh'wak stron-tor, tor stariben tor ish-veh sha'es. Kling vet-tor ish-veh; tonk'peh compeyson, vi had tvai tor depose tor ish-veh, vesh' tumbling fi' wuh mashen, tevik, heh ish-veh pavesh-tor ik tra' vesh' ri na' ik wak sovek prison officer svi' london vi kupi mazhiv-kur-tor wuh required evidence. I had hal-tor kharik tor mr. Jaggers na' ish-veh awek kelek, fi' t'nash-veh lashan abru' mu-yor, tor retain ish-veh assistance, heh mr. Jaggers fi' wuh prisoner's behalf would nafai-tor nothing. Ish-veh vesh' wuh lad resource; na' au var-tor me ik wuh nuf bolau nam-tor abru' svi' kaukuh minutes lu wuh toglantausu vesh' tra', heh ik rai tepul fi' terra kupi prevent its going tehnat etek. I imparted tor mr. Jaggers t'nash-veh design t' keeping ish-veh svi' ignorance t' wuh buk t' ish-veh don-tak. Mr. Jaggers vesh' querulous heh reshnek k' me na' having "kal-tor ish-veh trel k'fai t'nash-veh ozh, " heh leralmin-tor etek bolau memorialise k' heh k', heh ar'kadan na' ek' pavek na' ein t' ish-veh. Tonk'peh au did ri ip-sut s' me ik, hi tra' lau nam-tor wehk nuf svi' if wuh forfeiture would ri nam-tor faikaik, tra' vesh' rai circumstances svi' nash nuf tor tor ish-veh veh t' au. I ken-tor ik maut muhl. I vesh' ri related tor wuh outlaw, il tersau k' ish-veh k' sovek recognisable tie; au had shitau ish-veh el'ru tor rai kitaun il settlement svi' t'nash-veh favour fa' ish-veh apprehension, heh tor tor ni i' would nam-tor idle. I had rai claim, heh i t'forti resolved, heh ek'wak afterwards abided k' wuh resolution, ik t'nash-veh khaf-spol dang worla nam-tor sickened k' wuh hopeless task t' attempting tor afer-tor veh. Tra' saudau tor nam-tor utvau na' supposing ik wuh mastevau informer had rok-tor na' wuh reward s' nash forfeiture, heh had prah ein accurate fai-tukh t' magwitch's tek'ik. Lu ish-veh ak'shem vesh' afer-tor, wehk miles s' wuh scene t' ish-veh tevakh, heh ni horribly disfigured ik au vesh' goh recognisable k' wuh tuhllar t' ish-veh abru'lik, pitoh vesh' fam dvun legible, hesha svi' wuh nuf au lesh. Among aifa vesh' wuh ahm t' wuh banking-kelek svi' uzh khu'rak wales, wilat wuh hau-ov t' donku vesh', heh wuh babilvaya t' ac'ruth shasol t' considerable tala. Fi' aifa patam t' ro'fori vesh' svi' wuh feim ik magwitch, du' svi' prison, mazhiv-kur-tor tor mr. Jaggers, t' wuh ma-vel au supposed i dang inherit. Ish-veh ignorance, ri donku-tor katravahsu, na' kim-shah dvin-tor ish-veh; au worla mistrusted tonk'peh ik t'nash-veh inheritance vesh' ved safe, k' mr. Jaggers's mamuk. Po' rehkuh gad' vohtaya, du' if wuh tarkiv prosecution lam-tor abru' na' wuh torvaya t' wuh toglantausu s' wuh prison-hali, wuh toglantausu sarlah, heh ovsoh wuh hagik nuf. Au vesh' committed tor nem-tor ish-veh trial na' wuh thurai sessions, if would sarlah fi' svi' wuh tevun-krus. Ish-veh vesh' na' nash gu'gelik wak t' t'nash-veh ha'kiv ik herbert fun-tor ha-kel veh khru, wuh rom deal vishizhau ne', heh leralmin-tor, "t'nash-veh tal-kam handel, i pthak i dungau ak ma tor trasha du." ish-veh tersu having dator me na' ik, i vesh' lehkuh ak'wikmun do au nahp. "etek dungau pak-tor wuh tok-ti opportunity kuv i shitau ska' going tor cairo, heh i am maut mau kwes i bolau hal-tor, handel, lu du danik bolaya me." "herbert, i dungau kwon-hau-ov bolaya du, fai'ei i dungau kwon-hau-ov ashaya du; tonk'peh t'nash-veh bolaya nam-tor rai greater i' do na' wuh'ashiv wak." "du dungi nam-tor ni lonely." "i ma ri el-wak tor nah-tor t' ik, " leralmin-tor i. "du fai-tor ik i am kwon-hau-ov k' ish-veh tor wuh bosh sadvun t' wuh wak kal-tor, heh ik i dang nam-tor k' ish-veh ek' gad wu, kuv i kupi. Heh lu sarlah nash-veh maf s' ish-veh, du fai-tor ik t'nash-veh nahp nam-tor k' ish-veh." wuh dreadful nosh tor if au vesh' katau, vesh' ni appalling tor fi' t' etek, ik etek kupi ri dzhinau tor ish-veh svi' plainer zhit. "t'nash-veh tal-kam katravahsu, " leralmin-tor herbert, "kal-tor wuh be' prospect t' etwel separationfor, ish-veh nam-tor maut nearbe t'nash-veh justification na' troubling du pa' yourself. Ma du nahp t' ish-veh fa-wak?" "rai, na' i ma vesh' kwes tor nah-tor t' sovek fa-wak." "tonk'peh ish-veh fam yehat nam-tor dismissed; indeed, t'nash-veh tal-kam tal-kam handel, ish-veh bolau ri nam-tor dismissed. I istaya du would svi-tor fi' ish-veh i', u' irak u' wuh zamu friendly zhit hal-tor, k' me." "i dungi, " leralmin-tor i. "svi' nash khlup kelek t' ours, handel, etek bolau ma wuh" vesht gla-tor nash-veh ik ish-veh delicacy vesh' avoiding wuh gas'rak zhit, ni i leralmin-tor, "wuh clerk." "wuh clerk. Heh i rok ish-veh nam-tor mokov rikesik ik au lau sa'ovau (u' wuh clerk t' ish-veh acquaintance has sa'ovau) vi' wuh tersu. I', handel, svi' pen, t'nash-veh tal-kam sa-kan, dungi sarlah du tor me?" tra' vesh' vel charmingly cordial heh engaging svi' wuh manner svi' if po' taran "i', handel, " u' kuv ish-veh vesh' wuh shi'vukhut palikaya t' wuh portentous business exordium, au had suddenly putan-tor abru ik molu, sakadau si' ish-veh trau el'ru, heh spoken spo' wuh schoolboy. "clara heh i ma variben pa' ish-veh va'ashiv heh va'ashiv, " herbert pursued, "heh wuh tal-kam pi' vel eit'jae me goh nash khru, k' bezhun-masu svi' ish-veh bezhun, tor leralmin tor du ik, kuv du dungi ha-tor k' etek lu sarlah etek teretuhr, she dungi tor ish-veh buhfik tor tor du kunli, heh tor convince ish-veh sa-telsu's t'hy'la ik au nam-tor ish-veh t'hy'la nuh'. Etek dang prah fi' ni muhl, handel!" i itaren ish-veh heartily, heh i itaren ish-veh heartily, tonk'peh leralmin-tor i kupi ri wi tor sure t' hau ish-veh u' au ni kindly nufau. Firstly, t'nash-veh kashek vesh' nuh' preoccupied kup tor nem-tor svi' wuh subject clearly. Secondly, ha! Secondly, tra' vesh' wuh vague vel svizh-tor svi' t'nash-veh nahp ik dungi sasarlah maut be' wuh shaht t' nash slight narrative. "tonk'peh kuv du nahp, herbert, ik du kupi, rik' doing sovek dash tor ish-veh business, trasha wuh deshker tu'ash na' wuh pi' du'" "na' sovek du', " maf-tor herbert. "shehkuh tevun-krus, wuh tevun!" "ri ni wu u' ik, " leralmin-tor i. "dahkuh il rehkuh tevun-krus na' danik." herbert vesh' highly delighted lu etek hutau el'ru fi' nash arrangement, heh leralmin-tor au kupi i' nem-tor courage tor var-tor me ik au pudva-tor au bolau hal-tor maf na' wuh shaht t' wuh wehk gad. "heh clara?" leralmin-tor i. "wuh tal-kam pi' vel, " fun-tor herbert, "meskarau dutifully tor ish-veh sa-mekh u' wu u' au palesh-tor; tonk'peh au skil-tor't kim-shah wu. Mrs. Whimple confides tor me ik au nam-tor certainly going." "ri tor leralmin wuh unfeeling vel, " leralmin-tor i, "au fam yehat tor weh-rom do hal-tor." "i am kwes ik bolau nam-tor nafai-tor, " leralmin-tor herbert; "heh yi i dungau sarlah pla' na' wuh tal-kam pi' vel, heh wuh tal-kam pi' vel heh i dungi lates quietly vi' wuh nearest church. Vokau! Wuh blessed ashal-veh sarlah t' rai skan, t'nash-veh tal-kam handel, heh worla glazhau vi' wuh yon-kur dunap, heh hasn't wuh notion pa' ish-veh grandpapa. Ra wuh fortune na' wuh sa-fu t' t'nash-veh ko-mekh!" fi' wuh gad svi' ik ka wehk gad, i nem-tor t'nash-veh trasha t' herbert, bosh t' ugelik rok, tonk'peh maf heh sorry tor trasha me, u' au hayal-tor fi' veh t' wuh seaport sakat coaches. I went vi' wuh mon-kelek tor kitau wuh pi' pitoh tor clara, telling ish-veh au had hal-tor ska', sending ish-veh ashaya tor ish-veh abru' heh abru' va'ashiv, heh yi went tor t'nash-veh lonely ha-kel, kuv ish-veh nazh-tor wuh ahm; na' ish-veh vesh' i' rai ha-kel tor me, heh i had rai ha-kel sovek-wilat. Fi' wuh kaiden i snagel-tor wemmick, vi vesh' coming ne', po' wuh unsuccessful application t' ish-veh ozh-lesek tor t'nash-veh svep. I had ri gla-tor ish-veh sa'awek opi' wuh disastrous issue t' wuh attempted hash; heh au had sarlah, svi' ish-veh awek heh personal tsoh, tor leralmin wuh zamu zhit t' danaya svi' dzhinaya tor ik vravshaya. "wuh tab-ma compeyson, " leralmin-tor wemmick, "had k' pi' heh pi' prah na' wuh lanet t' ulef t' wuh regular business i' transacted; heh ish-veh vesh' s' wuh variben t' ein t' ish-veh sutra svi' trouble (ein t' ish-veh sutra hasu kwon-hau-ov svi' trouble) ik i puzhu-tor ra i did. I potau t'nash-veh kaluk tu'ash, seeming ki' au ikap-tor, abi' i puzhu-tor ik au vesh' tadek-adir, heh i nahp ik would nam-tor wuh buhfik wak na' tor wuh attempt. I mokuhlek goh suppose i', ik ish-veh vesh' wuh krus t' ish-veh policy, u' wuh maut clever sasu, habitually tor tehs-tor ish-veh sha' instruments. Du ri tor tenai me, i rok, mr. Pip? I am sure i ar'kada tor dvin-tor du, k' ek' t'nash-veh khaf-spol." "i am u' sure t' ik, wemmick, u' du mokuhlek nam-tor, heh i nemaiyo danik earnestly na' ek' ish-veh eku'ko heh friendship." "nemaiyo, nemaiyo maut mau. Ish-veh's wuh rasahkos job, " leralmin-tor wemmick, scratching ish-veh patam, "heh i assure du i haven't vesh' ni tresahk abru na' wuh akarshif. Ra i glazhau na' nam-tor wuh sacrifice t' ni mau leshanik veltra. Tal-kam me!" "ra i nah-tor t', wemmick, nam-tor wuh ri donku-tor owner t' wuh veltra." "ha, tor nam-tor sure, " leralmin-tor wemmick. "veling, tra' mokuhlek nam-tor rai objection tor ish-veh hasu sorry na' ish-veh, heh i'd shitau ne' wuh kaukuh-plesh-tor pitoh myself tor prah ish-veh s' ish-veh. Tonk'peh ra i glazhau na' nam-tor nash. Wuh tab-ma compeyson having vesh' beforehand k' ish-veh svi' kash-tor'es t' ish-veh fun, heh hasu ni satalau tor katau ish-veh tor dunap, i ri tor nah-tor au kupi ma vesh' korsau. Whereas, wuh leshanik veltra certainly kupi ma vesh' korsau. Ik's wuh natyan svi' wuh veltra heh wuh owner, ri tor gla-tor du?" i invited wemmick tor sarlah upstairs, heh uzhau himself k' wuh makh t' grog fa' walking tor walworth. Au nar-tor wuh k'waw'zhe. Du' au vesh' drinking ish-veh moderate allowance, au leralmin-tor, k' nothing tor ras-tukh abru tor ish-veh, heh po' having saudau rather fidgety, "ra tor du nah-tor t' t'nash-veh meaning tor nem-tor wuh holiday fi' gad, mr. Pip?" "po, i suppose du ma ri ovsoh such wuh vel aifa leh-dah tevun-krus." "aifa leh-dah tevun, weht kesik, " leralmin-tor wemmick. "ha. I'm going tor nem-tor wuh holiday. Weht do ik; i'm going tor nem-tor wuh lates. Weht do ik; i'm going tor ya'akash du tor nem-tor wuh lates k' me." i vesh' pa' tor tobeg myself, u' hasu tonk'peh wuh rasahkos besu aishan yi, lu wemmick anticipated me. "i fai-tor ish-veh engagements, " leralmin-tor au, "heh i fai-tor du nam-tor s' wihfelau, mr. Pip. Tonk'peh kuv du kupi oblige me, i dang nem-tor ish-veh u' wuh kindness. Ish-veh ain't wuh wu lates, heh ish-veh's wuh lehkuh-mal veh. Leralmin ish-veh lau occupy du (including asal-yem fi' wuh lates) s' ohkuh tor leh-dah. Couldn't du sakadaya wuh sfek heh khartau ish-veh?" au had ovsoh ni mau na' me na' vuhnauk wak, ik nash vesh' maut pi' tor tor na' ish-veh. I leralmin-tor i kupi khartau ish-veh, would khartau ish-veh, heh au vesh' ni maut mau sanoi k' t'nash-veh acquiescence, ik i vesh' sanoi nuh'. Na' ish-veh particular ya'akash, i kru'minaakh tor vutau na' ish-veh na' wuh castle na' ulef vesht ohkuh fi' gad asal, heh ni etek parted na' wuh wak. Punctual tor t'nash-veh latva, i rang na' wuh castle temep fi' wuh gad asal, heh vesh' poprah k' wemmick himself, vi kwul-tor me u' looking tighter do tsuri, heh having wuh sleeker taik fi'. K'svi, tra' vesh' dahkuh bezhun-zaneshu t' rum heh thas dator, heh dahkuh kreyla. Wuh aged bolau ma vesh' stirring k' wuh lark, na', glancing vi' wuh vulunaya t' ish-veh shi'yuk, i glantau ik ish-veh sar-tak vesh' herbosh. Lu etek had fortified ourselves k' wuh rum heh thas heh kreyla, heh vesh' going si' na' wuh lates k' ik training preparation fi' etek, i vesh' considerably ak'wikmun tor gla-tor wemmick nem-tor abru wuh fishing-fek, heh shitau ish-veh abru' ish-veh tipan. "po, etek nam-tor ri going fishing!" leralmin-tor i. "rai, " fun-tor wemmick, "tonk'peh i spo' tor lates k' veh." i nahp nash shaik; however, i leralmin-tor nothing, heh etek eku ska'. Etek went na' camberwell yar-kur, heh lu etek vesh' thereabouts, wemmick leralmin-tor suddenly, "halloa! La''s wuh church!" tra' vesh' nothing maut surprising svi' ik; tonk'peh va'ashiv, i vesh' rather ak'wikmun, lu au leralmin-tor, u' kuv au vesh' animated k' wuh maut-ugelik idea, "kal-tor's hal-tor svi'!" etek went svi', wemmick leaving ish-veh fishing-fek svi' wuh porch, heh glazhau ek' pauk. Svi' wuh tvai wak, wemmick vesh' diving vi' ish-veh tor-pal-abru'lik, heh getting vel s' dun tra'. "halloa!" leralmin-tor au. "la''s wuh couple t' shif t' gloves! Kal-tor's shitau 'em fi'!" u' wuh gloves vesh' wan-kur kan gloves, heh u' wuh lehk-office vesh' widened tor its utmost sadvun, i i' began ki' t'nash-veh karik suspicions. Au vesh' strengthened vi' certainty lu i beheld wuh aged svi-tor na' wuh vla svep, escorting wuh t'sai. "halloa!" leralmin-tor wemmick. "la''s din-tor skiffins! Kal-tor's ma wuh wedding." ik discreet damsel vesh' attired u' tsuri, kaula ik she vesh' i' engaged svi' substituting na' ish-veh yar-kur kan gloves wuh shif t' wan-kur. Wuh aged vesh' likewise occupied svi' preparing wuh kahwa sacrifice na' wuh altar t' hymen. Wuh hinek gentleman, however, veshtau ni mau rihag'es svi' getting ish-veh gloves fi', ik wemmick afer-tor ish-veh bolayatik tor shitau ish-veh k' ish-veh pla' tehnat wuh pillar, heh yi tor prah za' wuh pillar himself heh seshaya maf na' au, du' i na' t'nash-veh krus meskarau wuh hinek gentleman pauk wuh san, ik au lau la' wuh kaik heh safe tehnaya. K' dint t' nash ingenious scheme, ish-veh gloves vesh' prah fi' tor perfection. Wuh clerk heh clergyman yi appearing, etek vesh' ranged svi' zek na' eifa fatal rails. Yeht tor ish-veh notion t' seeming tor tor ish-veh ek' rik' preparation, i puzhu-tor wemmick leralmin tor himself, u' au nem-tor vel si' t' ish-veh waistcoat-abru'lik fa' wuh dvin began, "halloa! La''s wuh mokov!" i bae'cok svi' wuh tsoh t' backer, il buhfik-sasu, tor wuh bridegroom; du' wuh pi' limp pew-opener svi' wuh mos bonnet spo' wuh kan-bu's, tor wuh vup t' hasu wuh bosom t'hy'la t' din-tor skiffins. Wuh responsibility t' giving wuh t'sai maf devolved fi-tor wuh aged, if pufulag-tor tor wuh clergyman's hasu unintentionally scandalised, heh ish-veh pavesh-tor thus. Lu au leralmin-tor, "vi giveth nash kosu tor nam-tor telik tor nash sasu?" wuh hinek gentleman, ri svi' wuh least fai-tor ra sfek t' wuh hali-kal etek had lasha na', lam-tor danik amiably beaming na' wuh lehkuh commandments. Fi-tor if, wuh clergyman leralmin-tor va'ashiv, "vi giveth nash kosu tor nam-tor telik tor nash sasu?" wuh hinek gentleman hasu fam dvun svi' wuh fupa s' t' danik estimable unconsciousness, wuh bridegroom lit'dhae svi' ish-veh accustomed spes, "i' aged p. Du fai-tor; vi giveth?" tor if wuh aged kilko-tor k' lo'uk briskness, fa' taran ik au mazhiv-kur-tor, "ek' gas'rak, john, ek' gas'rak, t'nash-veh sa-kan!" heh wuh clergyman sarlah tor ni gloomy wuh svizh fi-tor ish-veh, ik i had vet-tor na' wuh moment whether etek dang prah completely telik ik gad. Ish-veh vesh' completely ovsoh, however, heh lu etek vesh' going s' church wemmick nem-tor wuh wein ska' wuh lef', heh shitau ish-veh wan-kur gloves svi' ish-veh, heh shitau wuh wein fi' va'ashiv. Mrs. Wemmick, weht heedful t' wuh fa-wak, shitau ish-veh wan-kur gloves svi' ish-veh abru'lik heh assumed ish-veh yar-kur. "i', mr. Pip, " leralmin-tor wemmick, triumphantly shouldering wuh fishing-fek u' sarlah etek si', "kal-tor me ya'akash du whether anybody would suppose nash tor nam-tor wuh wedding-party!" asal-yem had vesh' ordered na' wuh vaksurik pi' tavern, wuh mile il ni maf fi-tor wuh rising solektra mesakh wuh yar-kur; heh tra' vesh' wuh bagatelle dohn svi' wuh tvi-shal, svi' nuf etek dang aitlun tor unbend etwel kashkau po' wuh solemnity. Ish-veh vesh' vaksurik tor glantau ik mrs. Wemmick rai longer unwound wemmick's kar lu ish-veh rubilau itself tor ish-veh khlop, tonk'peh hayal-tor svi' wuh pid-backed ku-san tehnat wuh temok, spo' wuh violoncello svi' its nuf, heh submitted tor nam-tor nartau u' ik melodious instrument lau ma ovsoh. Etek had wuh marom asal-yem, heh lu sovek veh declined sovek-vel fi' pasu, wemmick leralmin-tor, "tanilau k' contract, du fai-tor; ri tor nam-tor kwes t' ish-veh!" i drank tor wuh uzh couple, drank tor wuh aged, drank tor wuh castle, saluted wuh bride na' parting, heh tor myself u' agreeable u' i kupi.
