Wemmick sarlah ne' tor wuh svep k' me, heh i va'ashiv hutau el'ru k' ish-veh, heh istau ish-veh mak. "thankee!" leralmin-tor wemmick, rubbing ish-veh el'ru. "she's such wuh khartausu t' fowls, du ma rai idea. Du dungau ma ein yu-mur, heh judge na' yourself. I leralmin, mr. Pip!" calling me pla', heh speaking neik. "nash nam-tor altogether wuh walworth sentiment, sanoi." "i ken-tor. Ri tor nam-tor mentioned svi' pi' britain, " leralmin-tor i. Wemmick nodded. "po' ra du kal-tor si' wuh vath gad, mr. Jaggers lau u' muhl ri fai-tor t' ish-veh. Au lau nah-tor t'nash-veh shi'nahp vesh' softening, il vel t' wuh ves." chapter lvi. Au ti svi' prison maut has-bosh, du' wuh bosh tvi-wak svi' ish-veh committal na' trial heh wuh coming pauk t' wuh sessions. Au had pushau dahkuh bak, au had wounded veh t' ish-veh esh-sa'haf, heh au breathed k' lo'uk kusut heh rihag'es, if increased kanok-gadik. Ish-veh vesh' wuh consequence t' ish-veh dash-tor ik au stariben ni neik u' tor nam-tor scarcely zhu-yehat; therefore au stariben maut pi'. Tonk'peh au vesh' ek'wak pok tor shroi tor me; heh ish-veh became wuh wuh'rak gu-vam t' t'nash-veh ha'kiv tor leralmin tor ish-veh, heh telv-tor tor ish-veh, ra i fai-tor au ought tor zhu-tor. Hasu irak nuh' has-bosh tor hafau svi' wuh tsuri prison, au vesh' snem-tor, po' wuh wuh'rak gad il ni, vi' wuh infirmary. Nash mazhiv-kur-tor me opportunities t' hasu k' ish-veh ik i kupi ri vathru ma had. Heh tonk'peh na' ish-veh has-mar au would ma vesh' shitau svi' irons, na' au vesh' fudau u' wuh satalau prison-raf-shayek, heh i fai-tor ri ra else. Hi vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh kanok gad, ish-veh vesh' na' goh wuh pen wak; hence, wuh regularly recurring ret t' etwel dahshaya vesh' wu hiyet tor vipladau fi' ish-veh limuk sovek slight rubai ik paresh-tor svi' ish-veh tukhik fupa s'. I ri tor recollect ik i wuh'wak gla-tor sovek rubah svi' ish-veh na' wuh weh-rom; au thinoi, heh became slowly weaker heh weh-rasahkos, gad k' gad, s' wuh gad lu wuh prison svep a'ing fi-tor ish-veh. Wuh ves t' nekhaya il resignation ik au gluvau vesh' ik t' wuh sasu vi vesh' zungor si'. I sometimes derived wuh impression, s' ish-veh manner il s' wuh zhal-tor zhit il dahkuh if stron-tor ish-veh, ik au pondered abru' wuh deshker whether au lau ma vesh' wuh weh-rom sasu ne' weh-rom circumstances. Tonk'peh au worla justified himself k' wuh hint tending ik yut, il ar'kada tor vulaya wuh vesht s' its ek'wakik shid. Ish-veh pavesh-tor fi' dahkuh il rehkuh occasions svi' t'nash-veh la'es, ik ish-veh desperate reputation vesh' alluded tor k' veh il vath t' wuh sutra svi' attendance fi' ish-veh. Wuh abru'teruklar-ru'lut tuhsau ish-veh limuk yi, heh au da-tor ish-veh bezhun fi' me k' wuh trustful glazhau, u' kuv au vesh' confident ik i had gla-tor ein pi' redeeming esta svi' ish-veh, kauk ni wu ago u' lu i vesh' wuh pi' kan. U' tor ek' wuh shom, au vesh' humble heh contrite, heh i worla fai-tor ish-veh complain. Lu wuh sessions sarlah pauk, mr. Jaggers aisha wuh application tor nam-tor tor na' wuh postponement t' ish-veh trial abi' wuh zahalik sessions. Ish-veh vesh' obviously tor k' wuh assurance ik au kupi ri ha-tor ni wu, heh vesh' klee'fah. Wuh trial sarlah fi' na' wuh'wak, heh, lu au vesh' shitau tor wuh mofek, au vesh' hayal-tor svi' wuh ku-san. Rai objection vesh' tor tor t'nash-veh getting beyik wuh kif, fi' wuh si' ish-veh, heh holding wuh el'ru ik au sakadau forth tor me. Wuh trial vesh' maut pen heh maut pa'shik. Such vel u' kupi nam-tor leralmin-tor na' ish-veh vesh' leralmin-tor, uf au had taken tor industrious es'merka, heh had thriven lawfully heh reputably. Tonk'peh nothing kupi unsay wuh kla-min ik au had fun-tor, heh vesh' tra' svi' la'es t' wuh judge heh jury. Ish-veh vesh' impossible tor ar'kadan ish-veh na' ik, heh tor vathru do talal ish-veh guilty. Na' ik wak, ish-veh vesh' wuh custom (u' i oren-tor s' t'nash-veh terrible veshtaya t' ik sessions) tor vaikau wuh concluding gad tor wuh be' dvun-tor t' zhit-bal, heh tor tor wuh finishing daya k' wuh zhit-bal t' tevakh. Tonk'peh na' wuh indelible bikuv ik t'nash-veh remembrance i' meskarau fa' me, i kupi scarcely dva-tor, kauk u' i kitau aifa zhit, ik vesht gla-tor nash-veh dahkuh-heh-reh-leh sasu heh kosu shitau fa' wuh judge tor poprah ik zhit-bal teretuhr. Dan-faik among wuh dahkuh-heh-reh-leh vesh' au; hayal-tor, ik au lau prah esh hiyet tor potau ha'kiv svi' ish-veh. Wuh bosh scene palikau si' va'ashiv svi' wuh vivid colours t' wuh moment, ne' tor wuh eku-tor t' april sov-masu fi' wuh krani t' wuh kelek, glittering svi' wuh ha'zehl t' april yel. Penned svi' wuh kif, u' i va'ashiv lam-tor s'udish ish-veh na' wuh teruk k' ish-veh el'ru svi' t'nash-veh, vesh' wuh dahkuh-heh-reh-leh sasu heh kosu; ein defiant, ein stricken k' vash, ein sobbing heh weeping, ein covering ish-veh limuk, ein staring gloomily pa'. Tra' had vesh' shrieks s' among wuh kosu convicts; tonk'peh au had vesh' stilled, heh wuh hush had navau. Wuh sheriffs k' ish-veh lo'uk naf-elakh heh nosegays, vath civic gewgaws heh stislak, criers, ushers, wuh lo'uk tanaf-shi'gluvaun bosh t' sutra, wuh suk theatrical audience, glazhau fi', u' wuh dahkuh-heh-reh-leh heh wuh judge vesh' solemnly nagau. Yi wuh judge addressed au. Among wuh wretched creatures fa' ish-veh ik au bolau single si' na' special shi'yavekh vesh' veh vi siyah s' ish-veh infancy had vesh' wuh offender tehnat wuh tor-gav; vi, po' ashiv-tor imprisonments heh taflaya, had vesh' na' wu-vath sentenced tor sashasolaya na' wuh zhil t' tevun; heh vi, ne' circumstances t' lo'uk khrash heh daring, had tor ish-veh stron heh vesh' re-sentenced tor sashasolaya na' ha'kiv. Ik miserable sasu would seem na' wuh wak ki' shetau convinced t' ish-veh lafosh, lu irak snem-tor s' wuh scenes t' ish-veh hinek offences, heh ki' ha-tor wuh peaceable heh trau ha'kiv. Tonk'peh svi' wuh fatal moment, yielding tor eifa propensities heh shaukaush, wuh indulgence t' if had ni wu rendered ish-veh wuh scourge tor shila'es, au had quitted ish-veh haven t' shom heh repentance, heh had sarlah pla' tor wuh shasol wilat au vesh' proscribed. Hasu la' presently denounced, au had na' wuh wak navau svi' evading wuh officers t' yeht-gav, tonk'peh hasu na' wu-vath seized du' svi' wuh bae'cok t' hash, au had tehnau au, heh hadhe buhfik fai-tor whether k' sagluvau design, il svi' wuh glan-fam'es t' ish-veh hardihoodcaused wuh tevakh t' ish-veh denouncer, tor ik ish-veh bosh career vesh' fainu. Wuh kru'minaakh taflaya na' ish-veh fun tor wuh solektra ik had vishizhau ish-veh si', hasu tevakh, heh ish-veh nuf hasu nash aggravated nuf, au bolau dator himself tor tev-tor. Wuh yel vesh' striking svi' na' wuh lo'uk krani t' wuh kelek, k'fai wuh glittering eku-tor t' sov-masu fi-tor wuh makh, heh ish-veh tor wuh sax'ksei shaft t' ta'hal svi' wuh dahkuh-heh-reh-leh heh wuh judge, linking fi' teretuhr, heh sos'eh reminding ein among wuh audience uf fi' vesh' be' dvun-tor fi', k' ek'esik ka'es, tor wuh greater judgment ik knoweth ek' vel, heh fam yehat laf-tor. Rising na' wuh moment, wuh natya speck t' limuk svi' nash yut t' ta'hal, wuh prisoner leralmin-tor, "t'nash-veh s'haile, i ma poprah t'nash-veh zhit-bal t' tevakh s' wuh almighty, tonk'peh i kes-wun tor ish-veh, " heh hayal-tor ne' va'ashiv. Tra' vesh' ein hushing, heh wuh judge went fi' k' ra au had tor leralmin tor wuh shom. Yi au vesh' ek' formally doomed, heh ein t' au vesh' nenikau si', heh ein t' au sauntered si' k' wuh haggard glazhau t' bravery, heh wuh zamu nodded tor wuh tanaf-shi'gluvaun, heh dahkuh il rehkuh hutau el'ru, heh vath went si' chewing wuh karf t' bar-got au had taken s' wuh slor bar-got lying pa'. Au went kim-shah t' ek', fai'ei t' having tor nam-tor gol-tor s' ish-veh ku-san, heh tor hal-tor maut slowly; heh au meskarau t'nash-veh el'ru du' ek' wuh vath vesh' snem-tor, heh du' wuh audience prah abru (putting ish-veh sai-vel gas'rak, u' au lau na' church il kitok-wilat), heh sfekau ne' na' nash criminal il na' ik, heh danik t' ek' na' ish-veh heh me. I earnestly rok-tor heh prayed ik au lau tev-tor fa' wuh vipladayek's report vesh' tor; tonk'peh, svi' wuh dread t' ish-veh svizh-tor fi', i began ik mu-yor tor kitau si' wuh petition tor wuh ha-kel secretary t' fupa s', setting forth t'nash-veh fai-tukh t' ish-veh, heh uf ish-veh vesh' ik au had sarlah pla' na' t'nash-veh sake. I kitau ish-veh u' fervently heh pathetically u' i kupi; heh lu i had shahtau ish-veh heh satau ish-veh svi', i kitau si' vath petitions tor such sasu svi' ek'te'kru u' i rok-tor vesh' wuh danik merciful, heh drew abru veh tor wuh tarkiv itself. Na' several gad heh mu-yor po' au vesh' sentenced i nem-tor rai shom kaula lu i tevan-tor asleep svi' t'nash-veh ku-san, tonk'peh vesh' wholly absorbed svi' aifa appeals. Heh po' i had satau au svi', i kupi ri potau maf s' wuh shitau wilat au vesh', tonk'peh olau u' kuv au vesh' weht hopeful heh lehkuh desperate lu i vesh' be' au. Svi' nash unreasonable restlessness heh kusut t' kashek i would roam wuh yut t' wuh khru, wandering k' eifa offices heh kelek wilat i had losrak wuh petitions. Tor wuh la' wadan, wuh weary western yut t' london fi' wuh samu, grazhiv sikar mu-yor, k' ish-veh eik'es t' harr-krus, ikap-tor-abru mansions, heh ish-veh wu fel-tor t' ha'gelek, nam-tor melancholy tor me s' nash katravek. Wuh kanok-gadik yaretau i kupi tor ish-veh vesh' pen-tor i', heh au vesh' weht strictly potau. Seeing, il fancying, ik i vesh' suspected t' wuh intention t' carrying gisam tor ish-veh, i ya'akash tor nam-tor pstha fa' i hayal-tor ne' na' ish-veh bedside, heh var-tor wuh officer vi vesh' kwon-hau-ov tra', ik i vesh' willing tor tor sovek-vel ik would assure ish-veh t' wuh singleness t' t'nash-veh designs. Kling vesh' lerash k' ish-veh il k' me. Tra' vesh' gu-vam tor nam-tor ovsoh, heh ish-veh vesh' ovsoh, tonk'peh ri harshly. Wuh officer kwon-hau-ov mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh assurance ik au vesh' weh-rasahkos, heh ein vath has-bosh prisoners svi' wuh tvi-shal, heh ein vath prisoners vi attended fi' au u' has-bosh nurses, (malefactors, tonk'peh ri incapable t' kindness, oekon nam-tor itaren!) kwon-hau-ov hau svi' wuh ka report. U' wuh gad went fi', i pubeglanau weht heh weht ik au would ti placidly looking na' wuh wan-kur abru-tol, k' wuh k'torr ta'hal svi' ish-veh limuk abi' ein zhit t' t'nash-veh brightened ish-veh na' wuh instant, heh yi ish-veh would subside va'ashiv. Sometimes au vesh' siyah il ved unable tor stariben, yi au would kilko-srashiv me k' slight ne'hish fi' t'nash-veh el'ru, heh i grew tor ken-tor ish-veh meaning maut muhl. Wuh su'etek t' wuh gad had risen tor lehkuh, lu vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh greater rubah svi' ish-veh do i had gla-tor wi. Ish-veh bezhun vesh' da-tor na' wuh svep, heh lighted abru u' i svi-tor. "tal-kam sa-kan, " au leralmin-tor, u' i hayal-tor ne' k' ish-veh sar-tak: "i nahp du vesh' tab-ma. Tonk'peh i knowed du couldn't nam-tor ik." "ish-veh nam-tor aishan wuh wak, " leralmin-tor i. "i bek-tor na' ish-veh na' wuh temep." "du kwon-hau-ov bek-tor na' wuh temep; ri tor du, tal-kam sa-kan?" "ha. Ri tor pak-tor wuh moment t' wuh wak." "itaren'ee tal-kam sa-kan, itaren'ee. Oekon kudau du! Du've worla deserted me, tal-kam sa-kan." i hish-tor ish-veh el'ru svi' silence, na' i kupi ri yen-tor ik i had wuh'wak tvai tor eshikh ish-veh. "heh ra's wuh buhfik t' ek', " au leralmin-tor, "du've vesh' weht kel'o alonger me, opi' i vesh' ne' wuh gu'gelik wan, do lu wuh yel min-tor. Ik's buhfik t' ek'." au ti fi' ish-veh pla', eshan k' lo'uk rihag'es. Tor ra au would, heh ashaya me hi au did, wuh ta'hal losrak ish-veh limuk ek'wak heh va'ashiv, heh wuh wontin sarlah abru' wuh placid glazhau na' wuh wan-kur abru-tol. "nam-tor du svi' mau kusut tor-gad?" "i ri tor complain t' rim, tal-kam sa-kan." "du worla tor complain." au had spoken ish-veh kim-shah zhit. Au abru'teruklar-ru'lut, heh i ken-tor ish-veh esta tor tvai ik au istau tor abertau t'nash-veh el'ru, heh ti ish-veh fi' ish-veh thasek. I laid ish-veh tra', heh au abru'teruklar-ru'lut va'ashiv, heh shitau fi' ish-veh el'ru fi-tor ish-veh. Wuh allotted wak sahr-tor si', du' etek vesh' thus; tonk'peh, looking pauk, i afer-tor wuh governor t' wuh prison standing be' me, heh au zhal-tor, "du needn't hal-tor wi." i itaren ish-veh gratefully, heh ya'akash, "lau i stariben tor ish-veh, kuv au mokuhlek zhu-tor me?" wuh governor ash-tor aside, heh beckoned wuh officer maf. Wuh rubah, hi ish-veh vesh' tor rik' ralash, drew pla' wuh wontin s' wuh placid glazhau na' wuh wan-kur abru-tol, heh au glazhau danik affectionately na' me. "tal-kam magwitch, i bolau var-tor du i', na' kim-shah. Du ken-tor ra i leralmin?" wuh gentle ne'hish fi' t'nash-veh el'ru. "du had wuh kan wuh'wak, ik du ashau heh pakik." wuh stronger ne'hish fi' t'nash-veh el'ru. "she ha-tor, heh afer-tor powerful t'hylara. She nam-tor living i'. She nam-tor wuh t'sai heh maut vaksurik. Heh i ashaya ish-veh!" k' wuh kim-shah faint urgam, if would ma vesh' powerless tonk'peh na' t'nash-veh yielding tor ish-veh heh assisting ish-veh, au ashenau t'nash-veh el'ru tor ish-veh bru-lar. Yi, au kogavik kal-tor ish-veh ne'hal-tor fi-tor ish-veh thasek va'ashiv, k' ish-veh sha' el'ru lying fi' ish-veh. Wuh placid glazhau na' wuh wan-kur abru-tol sarlah pla', heh be' dvun-tor maf, heh ish-veh patam eku-tor quietly fi' ish-veh thasek. Mindful, yi, t' ra etek had telv-tor teretuhr, i nahp t' wuh dahkuh sasu vi went abru vi' wuh temple tor pray, heh i fai-tor tra' vesh' rai weh-rom zhit ik i kupi leralmin be' ish-veh sar-tak, do "o s'haile, nam-tor merciful tor ish-veh wuh sinner!" chapter lvii. I' ik i vesh' losrak wholly tor myself, i mazhiv-kur-tor beglanau t' t'nash-veh intention tor quit wuh tvi-shal svi' wuh temple u' ak u' t'nash-veh tenancy kupi legally satalau, heh svi' wuh meanwhile tor underlet au. Na' wuh'wak i shitau dun abru svi' wuh krani; na', i vesh' svi' sa'akh, heh had scarcely sovek donku, heh began tor nam-tor seriously alarmed k' wuh fupa s' t' t'nash-veh tek'ik. I ought rather tor kitau ik i dang ma vesh' alarmed kuv i had had tepul heh concentration hiyet tor gol'nev me tor wuh pa'shik pakashogaya t' sovek yeht'es mesakh wuh kla-min ik i vesh' tevan-tor maut has-bosh. Wuh tab-ma hishel fi-tor me had enabled me tor shitau ska' has-mar, tonk'peh ri tor shitau ish-veh maf; i fai-tor ik ish-veh vesh' coming fi' me i', heh i fai-tor maut pi' else, heh vesh' kauk careless u' tor ik. Na' wuh gad il dahkuh, i ti fi' wuh ku-san, il fi' wuh lan-tol, sovek-wilat, according u' i pavesh-tor tor ne'hal-tor ne', k' wuh ras patam heh aching sikrus, heh rai lof, heh rai tepul. Yi tra' sarlah, veh mu-yor if saudau t' lo'uk duration, heh if teemed k' anxiety heh horror; heh lu svi' wuh asal i ar'kada tor hayal-tor abru svi' t'nash-veh sar-tak heh nah-tor t' ish-veh, i afer-tor i kupi ri tor ni. Whether i really had vesh' ne' svi' bah-ker kelek svi' wuh tevik t' wuh mu-yor, groping pa' na' wuh masu-hali ik i supposed tor nam-tor tra'; whether i had dahkuh il rehkuh wak sarlah tor myself fi' wuh staircase k' lo'uk vash, ri fai-tor uf i had prah s' sar-tak; whether i had afer-tor myself ha'gelan wuh ha'gelek, ma k' wuh idea ik au vesh' coming abru wuh kaiden, heh ik wuh ha'ge vesh' blown si'; whether i had vesh' inexpressibly smertau k' wuh saglakolau talking, laughing, heh groaning t' ein veh, heh had ulef suspected eifa sounds tor nam-tor t' t'nash-veh sha' tor; whether tra' had vesh' wuh a'ing shek-tukh furnace svi' wuh gu'gelik teruk t' wuh tvi-shal, heh wuh spes had puvutau si', abru' heh abru' va'ashiv, ik din-tor havisham vesh' consuming k'svi ish-veh, aifa vesh' vel ik i ar'kada tor settle k' myself heh prah vi' ein zek, u' i ti ik asal fi' t'nash-veh sar-tak. Tonk'peh wuh muhs t' wuh limekiln would sarlah svi' me heh au, disordering au ek', heh ish-veh vesh' k'fai wuh muhs na' kim-shah ik vesht gla-tor nash-veh dahkuh sasu looking na' me. "ra tor du aitlun?" i ya'akash, starting; "i ri tor fai-tor du." "muhl, osu, " fun-tor veh t' au, bending ne' heh touching me fi' wuh tipan, "nash nam-tor wuh tukh ik du'll ak arrange, i dare leralmin, tonk'peh du're pehkau." "ra nam-tor wuh sa'akh?" "hundred heh dah-leh-rehkuh plesh-tor, leh-kau, shehkuh. Jeweller's khrosahp, i nah-tor." "ra nam-tor tor nam-tor ovsoh?" "du had weh-rom sarlah tor t'nash-veh kelek, " leralmin-tor wuh sasu. "i potau wuh maut nice kelek." i tor ein attempt tor prah abru heh sai-vel myself. Lu i thurai attended tor au, au vesh' standing wuh pi' ska' s' wuh sar-tak, looking na' me. I fam dvun ti tra'. "gla-tor du t'nash-veh fupa s', " leralmin-tor i. "i would sarlah k' du kuv i kupi; tonk'peh indeed i am ved unable. Kuv du nem-tor me s' la', i nah-tor i dungau tev-tor k' wuh yut." sos'eh au kilko-tor, il gyirm'i wuh sfek, il ar'kada tor kastorau me tor dva-tor ik i vesh' weh-rom do i nahp. Forasmuch u' au geldau svi' t'nash-veh vokaya k' goh nash-veh slender og-elakh, i ri tor fai-tor ra au did, kaula ik au forbore tor snem-tor me. Ik i had wuh tau heh vesh' nan'woi, ik i dashau greatly, ik i k'ashiv pakik t'nash-veh utvau, ik wuh wak seemed interminable, ik i confounded impossible nam k' t'nash-veh sha' sha'es; ik i vesh' wuh dok svi' wuh kelek-temok, heh wi entreating tor nam-tor sadalau s' wuh giddy shi wilat wuh torvausu had eku me; ik i vesh' wuh pishek ha-zehl t' wuh vast mishu, clashing heh whirling abru' wuh suk'tchol, heh wi ik i implored svi' t'nash-veh sha' person ki' wuh mishu pehkau, heh t'nash-veh krus svi' ish-veh mah-tor ska'; ik i be' dvun-tor k'fai aifa wek t' has, i fai-tor t' t'nash-veh sha' remembrance, heh did svi' ein wihfelau fai-tor na' wuh wak. Ik i sometimes struggled k' yeht sutra, svi' wuh dva ik au vesh' murderers, heh ik i would ek' na' wuh'wak comprehend ik au tvai tor tor me rom, heh would yi ne'hal-tor saguhsh-tor svi' ish-veh kar, heh dash au tor ti me ne', i isha fai-tor na' wuh wak. Tonk'peh, abru' ek', i fai-tor ik tra' vesh' wuh ek'kayik tendency svi' ek' aifa sutra, vi, lu i vesh' maut has-bosh, would la' ek' ves t' wehtsuri mesuvulaya t' wuh komihn limuk, heh would nam-tor mau eiksha svi' suk'es, abru' ek', i leralmin, i fai-tor ik tra' vesh' wuh wehtsuri tendency svi' ek' aifa sutra, sooner il later, tor settle ne' vi' wuh likeness t' joe. Po' i had da-tor wuh rasahkos sfek t' t'nash-veh has-mar, i began tor beglanau ik du' ek' its vath features rubai, nash-veh tsurkanik feature did ri rubah. Whoever sarlah pa' me, fam dvun settled ne' vi' joe. I tu'ash t'nash-veh bezhun svi' wuh mu-yor, heh vesht gla-tor nash-veh, svi' wuh lo'uk ku-san na' wuh bedside, joe. I tu'ash t'nash-veh bezhun svi' wuh gad, heh, sitting fi' wuh krani-ku-san, smoking ish-veh mev svi' wuh duvek-tor tu'ash krani, fam dvun vesht gla-tor nash-veh joe. I ya'akash na' cooling mon, heh wuh tal-kam el'ru ik mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh me vesh' joe's. I sank pla' fi' t'nash-veh trak po' drinking, heh wuh limuk ik glazhau ni hopefully heh tenderly fi-tor me vesh' wuh limuk t' joe. Na' kim-shah, veh gad, i nem-tor courage, heh leralmin-tor, "nam-tor ish-veh joe?" heh wuh tal-kam hinek ha-kel-spes kilko-tor, "if ish-veh sov, hinek chap." "o joe, du shaya t'nash-veh khaf-spol! Glazhau reshnek na' me, joe. Kwul me, joe. Var-tor me t' t'nash-veh ingratitude. Ri tor nam-tor ni rom tor me!" na' joe had actually laid ish-veh patam ne' fi' wuh trak na' t'nash-veh vla, heh shitau ish-veh kar pauk t'nash-veh talu, svi' ish-veh mak ik i fai-tor ish-veh. "if tal-kam hinek pip, hinek chap, " leralmin-tor joe, "du heh me vesh' ek'wak t'hylara. Heh lu du're muhl hiyet tor hal-tor si' na' wuh ridewhat larks!" po' if, joe withdrew tor wuh krani, heh lam-tor k' ish-veh pla' na' me, psethau ish-veh bezhun. Heh u' t'nash-veh mairik kobat'es prevented me s' getting abru heh going tor ish-veh, i ti tra', penitently zhalan, "o oekon kudau ish-veh! O oekon kudau nash gentle christian sasu!" joe's bezhun vesh' yon-kur lu i thurai afer-tor ish-veh be' me; tonk'peh i vesh' holding ish-veh el'ru, heh etek fi' olau kunli. "uf wu, tal-kam joe?" "if du meantersay, pip, uf wu ma ish-veh has-mar palesh-tor, tal-kam hinek chap?" "ha, joe." "ish-veh's wuh shaht t' lau, pip. Tor-morrow nam-tor wuh wuh'rak t' belaar." "heh ma du vesh' la' ek' ik wak, tal-kam joe?" "takov nigh, hinek chap. Na', u' i leralmin-tor tor biddy lu wuh ro'fori t' ish-veh hasu has-bosh vesh' katau k' nuhm, if ish-veh vesh' katau k' wuh lehk, heh hasu formerly single au nam-tor i' telik hi underpaid na' wuh deal t' walking heh ash'el-duf, tonk'peh don-tak vesh' ri wuh vel fi' ish-veh krus, heh kal'i'farr vesh' wuh lo'uk istaya t' ish-veh hart" "ish-veh nam-tor ni delightful tor zhu-tor du, joe! Tonk'peh i svi-shau du svi' ra du leralmin-tor tor biddy." "if ish-veh vesh', " leralmin-tor joe, "ik uf du lau nam-tor svi' ri-fainusu, heh ik uf du heh me having vesh' ek'wak t'hylara, wuh wisit na' such wuh moment lau ri skan-tor unacceptabobble. Heh biddy, ish-veh zhit vesh', 'hal-tor tor ish-veh, rik' pak t' wak.' ik, " leralmin-tor joe, summing abru k' ish-veh judicial sov, "vesh' wuh zhit t' biddy. 'hal-tor tor ish-veh, ' biddy leralmin, 'rik' pak t' wak.' svi' pen, i shouldn't greatly tehs-tor du, " joe hau, po' wuh pi' shi'vukhut haulan, "kuv i represented tor du ik wuh zhit t' ik nu'ri kosu vesh', 'rik' wuh minute's pak t' wak.'" tra' joe tresahk himself pen, heh informed me ik i vesh' tor nam-tor variben tor svi' lo'uk moderation, heh ik i vesh' tor nem-tor wuh pi' tem-mazhiv-kur'es na' fupa s' vakavik wak, whether i olau vul-tor na' ish-veh il ri, heh ik i vesh' tor nekhau myself tor ek' ish-veh zek. Ni i shok-tor ish-veh el'ru, heh ti hizhuk, du' au proceeded tor indite wuh pitoh tor biddy, k' t'nash-veh ashaya svi' ish-veh. Evidently biddy had saven-tor joe tor kitau. U' i ti svi' sar-tak looking na' ish-veh, ish-veh tor me, svi' t'nash-veh kobat fupa s', maf va'ashiv k' sanosh tor gla-tor wuh pride k' if au eku pa' ish-veh nuhm. T'nash-veh bedstead, divested t' its curtains, had vesh' snem-tor, k' me fi-tor ish-veh, vi' wuh sitting-tvi-shal, u' wuh airiest heh largest, heh wuh la'y had vesh' taken maf, heh wuh tvi-shal potau kwon-hau-ov sluk heh wholesome mu-yor heh gad. Na' t'nash-veh sha' kitaun-pasu, kwitau vi' wuh teruk heh cumbered k' pi' mashek, joe i' hayal-tor ne' tor ish-veh lo'uk ar'kadan, wuh'rak choosing wuh pen s' wuh pen-tray u' kuv ish-veh vesh' wuh tuf t' suk raul, heh tucking abru ish-veh sleeves u' kuv au vesh' going tor wield wuh kushel-mofek il sledgehammer. Ish-veh vesh' bolayatik na' joe tor meskaraya fi' heavily tor wuh pasu k' ish-veh losrak kar-nef, heh tor prah ish-veh gas'rak mal muhl si' za' ish-veh, fa' au kupi palikau; heh lu au did palikau au tor kanok downstroke ni slowly ik ish-veh lau ma vesh' shehkuh ash'ya wu, du' na' kanok upstroke i kupi zhu-tor ish-veh pen spluttering extensively. Au had wuh curious idea ik wuh inkstand vesh' fi' wuh vla t' ish-veh wilat ish-veh vesh' ri, heh constantly spis-tor ish-veh pen vi' ret, heh seemed ved satisfied k' wuh result. Occasionally, au vesh' hal-tor abru k' ein orthographical stumbling-vihpan; tonk'peh fi' wuh bosh au prah fi' maut muhl indeed; heh lu au had signed ish-veh ahm, heh had snem-tor wuh finishing blot s' wuh dun tor wuh tarkiv t' ish-veh patam k' ish-veh dahkuh kehr-oth, au prah abru heh hovered pa' wuh pasu, trying wuh daya t' ish-veh performance s' vuhnauk sfekau t' zan-tor, u' ish-veh ti tra', k' unbounded satisfaction. Ri tor tor joe uneasy k' talking nuh' mau, kauk kuv i had vesh' kup tor variben mau, i deferred asking ish-veh pa' din-tor havisham abi' thurai gad. Au hutau ish-veh patam lu i yi ya'akash ish-veh kuv she had recovered. "nam-tor she tevik, joe?" "po gla-tor du, hinek chap, " leralmin-tor joe, svi' wuh molu t' remonstrance, heh k' yut t' getting na' ish-veh k' degrees, "i wouldn't hal-tor ni irak u' tor leralmin ik, na' ik's wuh deal tor leralmin; tonk'peh she ain't" "living, joe?" "ik's nigher wilat ish-veh nam-tor, " leralmin-tor joe; "she ain't living." "did she svizh-tor wu, joe?" "arter du vesh' nem-tor has-bosh, takov mau pa' ra du lau vutau (kuv du vesh' shitau tor ish-veh) wuh wehk gad, " leralmin-tor joe; fam dvun satalau, fi' t'nash-veh khrosahp, tor sarlah na' kanok-vei k' degrees. "tal-kam joe, ma du puzhu-tor ra shetau t' ish-veh veltra?" "muhl, hinek chap, " leralmin-tor joe, "ish-veh tor saudau ik she had settled wuh danik t' ish-veh, if i meantersay tied ish-veh abru, fi' din-tor estella. Tonk'peh she had kitau si' wuh pi' coddleshell svi' ish-veh sha' el'ru wuh gad il dahkuh afore wuh kisheya, leaving wuh samuyau kehkuh thousand tor mr. Matthew abru'lik. Heh po, tor du suppose, abru' ek' vel, pip, she losrak ik samuyau kehkuh thousand unto ish-veh? 'fai'ei t' pip's khrosahp t' ish-veh, wuh leralmin-tor matthew.' i am var-tor k' biddy, ik sov wuh kitaun, " leralmin-tor joe, repeating wuh legal da-tor u' kuv ish-veh did ish-veh vaik rom, "'khrosahp t' ish-veh wuh leralmin-tor matthew.' heh wuh samuyau kehkuh thousand, pip!" i worla discovered s' ik joe derived wuh conventional falek'es t' wuh kehkuh thousand plesh-tor; tonk'peh ish-veh saudau tor tor wuh hau-ov t' donku weht tor ish-veh, heh au had wuh manifest relish svi' insisting fi' its hasu samuyau. Nash khrosahp mazhiv-kur-tor me lo'uk mak, u' ish-veh perfected wuh goh rom vel i had ovsoh. I ya'akash joe whether au had puzhu-tor kuv sovek t' wuh vath relations had sovek visak'a? "din-tor sarah, " leralmin-tor joe, "she ma dah-leh-kaukuh plesh-tor perannium ausachya tor mahr-tor has-tal, fi' khrosahp t' hasu bilious. Din-tor georgiana, she ma dah-leh plesh-tor ne'. Mrs. Ra's wuh ahm t' au kwai beasts k' humps, hinek chap?" "tchorka?" leralmin-tor i, wondering po au kupi possibly aitlun tor fai-tor. Joe nodded. "mrs. Tchorka, " k' if i presently ken-tor au tvai camilla, "she ma kaukuh plesh-tor ausachya tor mahr-tor rushlights tor shitau ish-veh svi' tam'a lu she wake abru svi' wuh mu-yor." wuh accuracy t' aifa recitals vesh' sufficiently obvious tor me, tor mazhiv-kur-tor me lo'uk guhl'es svi' joe's ro'fori. "heh i', " leralmin-tor joe, "du ain't ik karik wi, hinek chap, ik du mokuhlek nem-tor svi' weht il veh hayaik shovelful tor-gad. Hinek orlick au's vesh' wuh bustin' tu'ash wuh kelek-ouse." "t'vi?" leralmin-tor i. "ri, i vahl du, tonk'peh ra ish-veh manners nam-tor putan-tor tor blusterous, " leralmin-tor joe, apologetically; "fam dvun, wuh englishman's ouse nam-tor ish-veh castle, heh castles bolau ri nam-tor busted 'cept lu ovsoh svi' t'naehm wak. Heh wotsume'er wuh failings fi' ish-veh krus, au vesh' wuh corn heh seedsman svi' ish-veh hart." "nam-tor ish-veh pumblechook's kelek ik has vesh' pushau vi', yi?" "ik's ish-veh, pip, " leralmin-tor joe; "heh au nem-tor ish-veh till, heh au nem-tor ish-veh cash-natuhn, heh au drinked ish-veh wine, heh au partook t' ish-veh wittles, heh au slapped ish-veh limuk, heh au seshau ish-veh han, heh au tied ish-veh abru tor ish-veh bedpust, heh au giv' ish-veh wuh dozen, heh au tukh-tor ish-veh ru'lut bosh t' flowering annuals tor prewent ish-veh maf-tor si'. Tonk'peh au knowed orlick, heh orlick's svi' wuh county potau-tvi-shal." k' aifa betau etek lasha na' unrestricted conversation. I vesh' vohris tor nazh-kap karik'es, tonk'peh i did slowly heh surely shetau lehkuh kobat, heh joe stayed k' me, heh i fancied i vesh' pi' pip va'ashiv. Na' wuh tenderness t' joe vesh' ni beautifully proportioned tor t'nash-veh bolaya, ik i vesh' spo' wuh kan svi' ish-veh el'ru. Au would hayal-tor heh variben tor me svi' wuh hinek guhl'es, heh k' wuh hinek simplicity, heh svi' wuh hinek unassertive protecting yut, ni ik i would ulef dva-tor ik ek' t'nash-veh ha'kiv opi' wuh gad t' wuh hinek af'tum vesh' veh t' wuh mental troubles t' wuh tau ik vesh' hal-tor. Au did kanok-vei na' me kaula wuh household ar'kadan, na' if au had engaged wuh maut tevan kosu, po' paying ska' wuh laundress fi' ish-veh wuh'rak lashan. "if i tor assure du, pip, " au would k'ashiv leralmin, svi' danaya t' ik liberty; "i afer-tor ish-veh wuh tapping wuh spare sar-tak, spo' wuh cask t' naliveh, heh bestan ska' wuh kan svi' wuh mashuk, na' sale. If she would ma tapped yourn thurai, heh bes-tor'd ish-veh ska' k' du wuh laying fi' ish-veh, heh vesh' yi wuh carrying maf wuh kastik-kov gradiwally svi' wuh shur-tureen heh wegetable-dishes, heh wuh wine heh tam'a svi' ish-veh wellington kluf." etek glazhau fa'rak tor wuh gad lu i dang hal-tor si' na' wuh fau, u' etek had wuh'wak glazhau fa'rak tor wuh gad t' t'nash-veh apprenticeship. Heh lu wuh gad sarlah, heh wuh tu'ash carriage vesh' prah vi' wuh lane, joe wrapped me abru, nem-tor me svi' ish-veh kar, lesh me ne' tor ish-veh, heh shitau me svi', u' kuv i vesh' fam dvun wuh pi' helpless creature tor ik au had ni abundantly putan-tor t' wuh don-tak t' ish-veh lo'uk malat. Heh joe prah svi' be' me, heh etek drove maf teretuhr vi' wuh shasol, wilat wuh don-ka belaar tor'ovak vesh' already fi' wuh lap heh fi' wuh yar, heh slor belaar scents boshau ek' wuh sov. Wuh gad pavesh-tor tor nam-tor gad, heh lu i glazhau fi' wuh loveliness pa' me, heh nahp uf ish-veh had grown heh rubai, heh uf wuh pi' kwai-svai had vesh' forming, heh wuh spes t' wuh kushel had vesh' strengthening, k' gad heh k' mu-yor, ne' wuh yel heh ne' wuh yel, du' ri donku-tor i ti yontau heh tossing fi' t'nash-veh sar-tak, wuh mere remembrance t' having yontau heh tossed tra' sarlah spo' wuh rihamau fi-tor t'nash-veh sochya. Tonk'peh lu i puzhu-tor wuh gad kus-vakh, heh glazhau pa' wuh pi' weht fi-tor wuh outspread vaksur, i olau ik i vesh' ri nearly itar-bosh hiyet, ik i vesh' nuh' kobat wi tor nam-tor kauk ik, heh i laid t'nash-veh patam fi' joe's tipan, u' i had laid ish-veh wu ago lu au had taken me tor wuh rom il wilat ri, heh ish-veh vesh' nuh' mau na' t'nash-veh nu'ri kash-ral. Weht composure sarlah tor me po' wuh du', heh etek variben u' etek nam-tor-tor tor variben, lying fi' wuh yar na' wuh hinek kipof. Tra' vesh' rai rubah whatever svi' joe. Exactly ra au had vesh' svi' t'nash-veh bezhun yi, au vesh' svi' t'nash-veh bezhun fam dvun; aishan u' veling faithful, heh u' veling gas'rak. Lu etek zaprah va'ashiv, heh au abertau me si', heh lesh meso easily!mes' wuh kelek heh abru wuh kaiden, i nahp t' ik pavek-bosh christmas gad lu au had lesh me abru' wuh masu-kastra. Etek had ri wi tor sovek allusion tor t'nash-veh rubah t' fortune, il did i fai-tor uf mau t' t'nash-veh tab-ma vesht-var au vesh' acquainted k'. I vesh' ni vet-bosh t' myself i', heh shitau ni mau sahrafel svi' ish-veh, ik i kupi ri satisfy myself whether i ought tor dzhinau tor ish-veh lu au did ri. "ma du puzhu-tor, joe, " i ya'akash ish-veh ik khru, fi-tor further consideration, u' au smoked ish-veh mev na' wuh krani, "vi t'nash-veh patron vesh'?" "i heerd, " fun-tor joe, "u' ish-veh vesh' ri din-tor havisham, hinek chap." "did du zhu-tor vi ish-veh vesh', joe?" "muhl! I heerd u' ish-veh vesh' wuh person ra satau wuh person ra giv' du wuh kutra-pitoh na' wuh jolly bargemen, pip." "ni ish-veh vesh'." "astonishing!" leralmin-tor joe, svi' wuh placidest yut. "did du zhu-tor ik au vesh' tevik, joe?" i presently ya'akash, k' increasing diffidence. "if? Ish-veh u' satau wuh kutra-pitoh, pip?" "ha." "i nah-tor, " leralmin-tor joe, po' kohlan wuh akarshif, heh looking rather evasively na' wuh krani-ku-san, "u' i did zhu-tor var-tor ik uf au vesh' vel il wuh'ashiv svi' wuh paik yut svi' ik kharat." "did du zhu-tor sovek-vel t' ish-veh circumstances, joe?" "ri partickler, pip." "kuv du would spo' tor zhu-tor, joe" i vesh' palikaya, lu joe prah abru heh sarlah tor t'nash-veh ku-san. "lookee la', hinek chap, " leralmin-tor joe, bending abru' me. "ek'wak wuh buhfik t' t'hylara; ain't etek, pip?" i vesh' kafusik tor kilko-srashiv ish-veh. "wery rom, yi, " leralmin-tor joe, u' kuv i had kilko-tor; "ik's ek' gas'rak; ik's sep-wafikh fi-tor. Yi po hal-tor vi' subjects, hinek chap, if u' betwixt dahkuh sech bolau nam-tor na' ek'wak onnecessary? Tra''s subjects hiyet u' betwixt dahkuh sech, rik' onnecessary ones. S'haile! Tor nah-tor t' ish-veh ri donku-tor ko-kai heh ish-veh rampages! Heh ri tor du vokau tickler?" "i tor indeed, joe." "lookee la', hinek chap, " leralmin-tor joe. "i ovsoh ra i kupi tor potau du heh tickler svi' sunders, tonk'peh t'nash-veh tepul vesh' ri kwon-hau-ov fully kaik tor t'nash-veh inclinations. Na' lu ish-veh ri donku-tor ko-kai had wuh kashek tor eku vi' du, ish-veh vesh' ri ni mau, " leralmin-tor joe, svi' ish-veh favourite argumentative yut, "ik she eku-tor vi' me nuh', kuv i shitau myself svi' opposition tor ish-veh, tonk'peh ik she eku-tor vi' du kwon-hau-ov heavier na' ish-veh. I pubeglanau ik. Ish-veh ain't wuh runem na' wuh sasu's whisker, ri wi wuh hutau il dahkuh t' wuh sasu (tor if ish-veh ko-kai vesh' ved welcome), ik 'ud shitau wuh sasu ska' s' getting wuh pi' kan s' taflaya. Tonk'peh lu ik pi' kan nam-tor eku-tor vi' heavier na' ik runem t' whisker il shaking, yi ik sasu naterally abru heh leralmin-tor tor himself, 'wilat nam-tor wuh rom u' du nam-tor wuh-doing? I vahl du gla-tor nash-veh wuh 'kar, ' leralmin-tor wuh sasu, 'tonk'peh i ri tor gla-tor wuh rom. I vutau fi-tor du, osu, therefore, tor pint si' wuh rom.'" "wuh sasu leralmin-tor?" i glantau, u' joe bek-tor na' me tor stariben. "wuh sasu leralmin-tor, " joe assented. "nam-tor au gas'rak, ik sasu?" "tal-kam joe, au nam-tor kwon-hau-ov gas'rak." "muhl, hinek chap, " leralmin-tor joe, "yi abide k' ish-veh zhit. Kuv au's kwon-hau-ov gas'rak (if svi' paik au's weht kesik riyeht), au's gas'rak lu au leralmin-tor nash: supposing ek'wak du kep sovek pi' tukh tor yourself, lu du vesh' wuh pi' kan, du kep ish-veh mostly fai'ei du fai-tor'd u' j. Gargery's tepul tor krus du heh tickler svi' sunders vesh' ri fully kaik tor ish-veh inclinations. Theerfore, nah-tor rai weht t' ish-veh u' betwixt dahkuh sech, heh ri tor kal-tor etek be' dvun remarks fi-tor onnecessary subjects. Biddy giv' herself wuh deal o' trouble k' me afore i losrak (na' i am siyah awful pasik), u' i dang zan-tor ish-veh svi' nash ta'hal, heh, viewing ish-veh svi' nash ta'hal, u' i dang ni shitau ish-veh. Fi' t' if, " leralmin-tor joe, ved sem-rik-tor k' ish-veh olozhikaik arrangement, "hasu ovsoh, i' nash tor du wuh yeht t'hy'la, leralmin. Namely. Du mustn't hal-tor wuh overdoing fi' ish-veh, tonk'peh du bolau ma ish-veh mu'yor-yem heh ish-veh wine heh masu, heh du bolau nam-tor shitau betwixt wuh thalv." wuh delicacy k' if joe dismissed nash theme, heh wuh slor ish-veh heh kindness k' if biddywho k' ish-veh kosu's wit had afer-tor me si' ni soonhad dator ish-veh na' ish-veh, tor wuh glu impression fi' t'nash-veh kashek. Tonk'peh whether joe fai-tor uf ri donku-tor i vesh', heh uf t'nash-veh lo'uk gishat had ek' fezhau, spo' etwel sha' masu-kastra mists fa' wuh yel, i kupi ri ken-tor. Wuh'ashiv vel svi' joe ik i kupi ri ken-tor lu ish-veh wuh'rak began tor storau itself, tonk'peh if i ak lasha na' wuh sorrowful comprehension t', vesh' nash: u' i became stronger heh weh-rom, joe became wuh pi' lehkuh hagik k' me. Svi' t'nash-veh kobat'es heh entire dependence fi' ish-veh, wuh tal-kam katravahsu had tevan-tor vi' wuh hinek molu, heh puvutau me k' wuh hinek ahm, wuh tal-kam "hinek pip, hinek chap, " ik i' vesh' ralash-tanaf svi' t'nash-veh kaluk. I nuh' had tevan-tor vi' wuh hinek yut, goh kunli heh itar-bosh ik au kal-tor me. Tonk'peh, imperceptibly, hi i meskarau k' au sahris, joe's meskaraya fi-tor au began tor slacken; heh whereas i wondered na' nash, palikauk, i ak began tor ken-tor ik wuh aishan t' ish-veh vesh' svi' me, heh ik wuh lafot t' ish-veh vesh' ek' t'nash-veh. Ah! Had i putan-tor joe rai utvau tor vet t'nash-veh constancy, heh tor nah-tor ik svi' smusma'es i dang tor'ovau samu tor ish-veh heh vishizhau ish-veh ska'? Had i putan-tor joe's innocent khaf-spol rai aishan tor olau instinctively ik u' i prah stronger, ish-veh meskaraya fi-tor me would nam-tor weaker, heh ik au had weh-rom loosen ish-veh svi' wak heh ti'amah, fa' i plucked myself maf? Ish-veh vesh' fi' wuh wuh il fourth occasion t' t'nash-veh going si' walking svi' wuh temple bah-ker leaning fi' joe's kar, ik vesht gla-tor nash-veh nash rubah svi' ish-veh maut plainly. Etek had vesh' sitting svi' wuh ugelik lamekh ug'yel-ha'gel, looking na' wuh pilash, heh i chanced tor leralmin u' etek prah abru, "gla-tor, joe! I mokuhlek lates ved strongly. I', du dungau gla-tor me lates pla' k' myself." "if ri tor overdo ish-veh, pip, " leralmin-tor joe; "tonk'peh i dungau nam-tor kunli ausachya tor gla-tor du kup, osu." wuh kim-shah zhit grated fi' me; tonk'peh uf sos remonstrate! I lates-tor rai further do wuh temep t' wuh bah-ker, heh yi pretended tor nam-tor weaker do i vesh', heh ya'akash joe na' ish-veh kar. Joe mazhiv-kur-tor ish-veh me, tonk'peh vesh' thoughtful. I, na' t'nash-veh krus, vesh' thoughtful nuh'; na', uf buhfik tor rihamau nash growing rubah svi' joe vesh' wuh lo'uk perplexity tor t'nash-veh remorseful nahp. Ik i vesh' kafusik tor var-tor ish-veh exactly uf i vesh' shitau, heh ra i had sarlah ne' tor, i ri tor seek tor ip-sut; tonk'peh i rok t'nash-veh reluctance vesh' ri ved wuh unworthy veh. Au would aitlun tor gol'nev me s' ish-veh pi' savings, i fai-tor, heh i fai-tor ik au ought ri tor gol'nev me, heh ik i bolau ri dash ish-veh tor tor ish-veh. Ish-veh vesh' wuh thoughtful khru k' fi' t' etek. Tonk'peh, fa' etek went tor sar-tak, i had resolved ik i would bek-tor abru' tor-morrow, tor-morrow hasu gad, heh would palikau t'nash-veh uzh rivak k' wuh uzh wehk gad. Fi' gad asal i would stariben tor joe pa' nash rubah, i would ti aside nash kim-shah vestige t' reserve, i would var-tor ish-veh ra i had svi' t'nash-veh nahp (ik secondly, ri wi lasha na'), heh po i had ri klopau tor hal-tor si' tor herbert, heh yi wuh rubah would nam-tor conquered na' ek'wak. U' i pa'shu, joe pa'shu, heh ish-veh seemed u' hi au had sympathetically lasha na' wuh resolution nuh'. Etek had wuh hizhuk gad fi' wuh gad, heh etek fau-tor si' vi' wuh shasol, heh yi lates-tor svi' wuh vunai. "i olau itar-bosh ik i ma vesh' has-bosh, joe, " i leralmin-tor. "tal-kam hinek pip, hinek chap, du're wuh'danik sarlah pauk, osu." "ish-veh has vesh' wuh memorable wak na' me, joe." "likeways na' myself, osu, " joe fun-tor. "etek ma had wuh wak teretuhr, joe, ik i mokuhlek worla yen-tor. Tra' vesh' gad wuh'wak, i fai-tor, ik i did na' wuh du' yen-tor; tonk'peh i worla dungau yen-tor aifa." "pip, " leralmin-tor joe, appearing wuh pi' hurried heh troubled, "tra' has vesh' larks. Heh, tal-kam osu, ra ma vesh' betwixt ushave vesh'." na' mu-yor, lu i had hal-tor tor sar-tak, joe sarlah vi' t'nash-veh tvi-shal, u' au had ovsoh ek' k'fai t'nash-veh recovery. Au ya'akash me kuv i olau sure ik i vesh' u' muhl u' svi' wuh asal? "ha, tal-kam joe, ved." "heh nam-tor kwon-hau-ov wuh getting stronger, hinek chap?" "ha, tal-kam joe, steadily." joe patted wuh coverlet fi' t'nash-veh tipan k' ish-veh lo'uk rom el'ru, heh leralmin-tor, svi' ra i nahp wuh husky spes, "rom mu-yor!" lu i prah abru svi' wuh asal, uzhau heh stronger wi, i vesh' bosh t' t'nash-veh resolution tor var-tor joe ek', rik' vohtaya. I would var-tor ish-veh fa' asal-yem. I would sai-vel na' wuh'wak heh hal-tor tor ish-veh tvi-shal heh ak'wikmun ish-veh; na', ish-veh vesh' wuh wuh'rak gad i had vesh' abru lehkuh-mal. I went tor ish-veh tvi-shal, heh au vesh' ri tra'. Ri goh vesh' au ri tra', tonk'peh ish-veh natuhn vesh' hal-tor. I hurried yi tor wuh asal-yem-pasu, heh fi' ish-veh afer-tor wuh nuhm. Aifa vesh' its brief tuhllar: "ri wishful tor vi-kwitau i ma departured ausachya du nam-tor muhl va'ashiv tal-kam pip heh dungi tor weh-rom rik' jo. "p.s. Ek'wak wuh buhfik t' t'hylara." vi'ikap-tor svi' wuh nuhm vesh' wuh receipt na' wuh sa'akh heh kodona-tor fi' if i had vesh' pehkau. Ne' tor ik moment, i had vainly supposed ik t'nash-veh creditor had saseshau, il suspended proceedings abi' i dang nam-tor ved recovered. I had worla sahr-tor-tor t' joe's having vlitau wuh donku; tonk'peh joe had vlitau ish-veh, heh wuh receipt vesh' svi' ish-veh ahm. Ra hafau na' me i', tonk'peh tor zahal-tor ish-veh tor wuh tal-kam hinek zhuk-fasek, heh tra' ki' si' t'nash-veh disclosure tor ish-veh, heh t'nash-veh penitent remonstrance k' ish-veh, heh tra' tor vas-tor t'nash-veh kashek heh khaf-spol t' ik reserved secondly, if had palikau u' wuh vague vel svizh-tor svi' t'nash-veh nahp, heh had shidau vi' wuh settled lof? Wuh lof vesh', ik i would hal-tor tor biddy, ik i would gluvaya ish-veh uf humbled heh repentant vesht sarlah nash-veh pla', ik i would var-tor ish-veh uf i had pakik ek' i wuh'wak rok-tor na', ik i would remind ish-veh t' etwel hinek confidences svi' t'nash-veh wuh'rak unhappy wak. Yi i would leralmin tor ish-veh, "biddy, i nah-tor du wuh'wak tishau me maut muhl, lu t'nash-veh errant khaf-spol, kauk du' ish-veh fam-kelek-tor maf s' du, vesh' quieter heh weh-rom k' du do ish-veh ek'wak has vesh' opi'. Kuv du mokuhlek spo' me goh ulef u' muhl wuh'wak weht, kuv du mokuhlek nem-tor me k' ek' t'nash-veh lafot heh disappointments fi' t'nash-veh patam, kuv du mokuhlek poprah me spo' wuh forgiven kan (heh indeed i am u' sorry, biddy, heh ma u' mau bolaya t' wuh hushing spes heh wuh soothing el'ru), i rok i am wuh pi' worthier t' du ik i vesh', ri mau, tonk'peh wuh pi'. Heh, biddy, ish-veh dungau shom k' du tor leralmin whether i dungau ar'kadan na' wuh zhuk-fasek k' joe, il whether i dungau ar'kadan na' sovek natya occupation ne' svi' nash shasol, il whether etek dungau hal-tor maf tor wuh irak shi wilat wuh opportunity awaits me if i eku aside, lu ish-veh vesh' nufau, abi' i fai-tor ish-veh kilko-srashiv. Heh i', tal-kam biddy, kuv du mokuhlek var-tor me ik du dungi hal-tor k'fai wuh panu k' me, du dungi surely tor ish-veh wuh weh-rom panu na' me, heh me wuh weh-rom sasu na' ish-veh, heh i dungi ar'kadan lerash tor tor ish-veh wuh weh-rom panu na' du." such vesh' t'nash-veh lof. Po' rehkuh gad weht t' recovery, i went ne' tor wuh hinek shi tor shitau ish-veh svi' execution. Heh uf i thresh-tor svi' ish-veh nam-tor ek' i ma losrak tor var-tor. Chapter lviii. Wuh tidings t' t'nash-veh pid fortunes having had wuh ras tevan had prah ne' tor t'nash-veh salatik shi heh its neighbourhood fa' i prah tra'. I afer-tor wuh pla-kur boar svi' mat t' wuh kash-tor'es, heh i afer-tor ik ish-veh tor wuh lo'uk rubah svi' wuh boar's demeanour. Whereas wuh boar had sokasitau t'nash-veh rom opinion k' lamekh assiduity lu i vesh' coming vi' veltra, wuh boar vesh' exceedingly samuyau fi' wuh subject i' ik i vesh' going si' t' veltra. Ish-veh vesh' khru lu i lasha, mau zung-tor k' wuh halovaya i had ni k'ashiv tor ni easily. Wuh boar kupi ri shitau me vi' t'nash-veh tsuri shi'yuk, if vesh' engaged (probably k' ein veh vi had gishat), heh kupi goh assign me wuh maut indifferent tvi-shal among wuh pigeons heh lehk-chaises abru wuh ker. Tonk'peh i had u' ralash wuh yuk svi' ik lodging u' svi' wuh danik superior accommodation wuh boar kupi ma putan-tor me, heh wuh quality t' t'nash-veh sahr-tor-tor vesh' pa' wuh ka u' svi' wuh buhfik shi'yuk. Lehkuh-mal svi' wuh asal, du' t'nash-veh asal-yem vesh' getting pok, i strolled pauk k' satis kelek. Tra' vesh' hish-tor dun fi' wuh temep heh fi' bits t' la'y hanging s' wuh krani, announcing wuh sale k' auction t' wuh household furniture heh daya, thurai wehk gad. Wuh kelek itself vesh' tor nam-tor makau u' hinek kelek tukh, heh seshau ne'. Lot 1 vesh' pu'ulidau svi' whitewashed knock-mal-nef nuhm fi' wuh fas-tor kelek; lot 2 fi' ik krus t' wuh nen kelek if had vesh' ni wu ikap'uh t'du ru'lut. Vath lots vesh' pu'ulidau ska' fi' vath krus t' wuh velek, heh wuh ivy had vesh' torn ne' tor tor tvi-shal na' wuh inscriptions, heh mau t' ish-veh trailed neik svi' wuh grazhiv heh vesh' withered already. Stepping svi' na' wuh moment na' wuh tu'ash temep, heh looking pa' me k' wuh uncomfortable sov t' wuh ri-fainusu vi had rai business tra', vesht gla-tor nash-veh wuh auctioneer's clerk walking fi' wuh casks heh telling au ska' na' wuh ro'fori t' wuh catalogue-travilayek, pen svi' el'ru, vi tor wuh rikwonik kitau-skaf t' wuh halek-tor ku-san i had ni k'ashiv kwitau bi' tor wuh tvelkau t' hinek clem. Lu i zaprah tor t'nash-veh asal-yem svi' wuh boar's mon-tvi-shal, i afer-tor mr. Pumblechook conversing k' wuh landlord. Mr. Pumblechook (ri improved svi' appearance k' ish-veh tab-ma mu'yor-wakik adventure) vesh' waiting na' me, heh addressed me svi' wuh zahalik zhil: "nu'ri sasu, ni'droi'ik nar-tor tor gla-tor du katau neik. Tonk'peh ra else kupi nam-tor gishu! Ra else kupi nam-tor gishu!" u' au sadvun-tor ish-veh el'ru k' wuh magnificently forgiving sov, heh u' i vesh' pushau k' has-mar heh unfit tor quarrel, i nem-tor ish-veh. "william, " leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook tor wuh waiter, "shitau wuh muffin fi' pasu. Heh has ish-veh sarlah tor nash! Has ish-veh sarlah tor nash!" i frowningly hayal-tor ne' tor t'nash-veh asal-yem. Mr. Pumblechook lam-tor abru' me heh mukau si' t'nash-veh teabefore i kupi esta wuh teapotwith wuh sov t' wuh benefactor vi vesh' resolved tor nam-tor yeht tor wuh kim-shah. "william, " leralmin-tor mr. Pumblechook, mournfully, "shitau wuh alem fi'. Svi' happier wak, " addressing me, "i nah-tor du nem-tor slor-tukh? Heh did du nem-tor thas? Du did. Slor-tukh heh thas. William, katau wuh watercress." "nemaiyo, " leralmin-tor i, shortly, "tonk'peh i ri tor yokul watercresses." "du ri tor yokul 'em, " fun-tor mr. Pumblechook, sighing heh nodding ish-veh patam several wak, u' kuv au lau ma gishu ik, heh u' kuv abstinence s' watercresses vesh' tsurkanik k' t'nash-veh downfall. "yeht. Wuh velik savas t' wuh terra. Rai. Du needn't katau sovek, william." i went fi' k' t'nash-veh asal-yem, heh mr. Pumblechook fator tor lamok abru' me, staring fishily heh eshan noisily, u' au kwon-hau-ov did. "pi' weht do wadi heh hinek!" mused mr. Pumblechook, aloud. "heh wi lu au went s' la' (i lau leralmin k' t'nash-veh kudaya), heh i sak-tor afore ish-veh t'nash-veh humble mahr-kel, spo' wuh bee, au vesh' u' plump u' wuh peach!" nash reminded me t' wuh wonderful natyan svi' wuh servile manner svi' if au had nufau ish-veh el'ru svi' t'nash-veh uzh smusma'es, taran, "sos?" heh wuh ostentatious clemency k' if au had aishan i' gluvau wuh ka thelik kaukuh ozh. "hah!" au went fi', handing me wuh kap heh butter. "heh sov du wuh-going tor joseph?" "svi' sha-ka-ri's ahm, " leralmin-tor i, firing svi' spite t' myself, "ra tor ish-veh tukh tor du wilat i am going? Trasha ik teapot sa'awek." ish-veh vesh' wuh rasahkos rivak i kupi ma taken, fai'ei ish-veh mazhiv-kur-tor pumblechook wuh opportunity au aitlu. "ha, nu'ri sasu, " leralmin-tor au, releasing wuh el'rek t' wuh ua'mrki svi' deshker, retiring wuh ash il dahkuh s' t'nash-veh pasu, heh speaking na' wuh behoof t' wuh landlord heh waiter na' wuh svep, "i dungi trasha ik teapot sa'awek. Du nam-tor gas'rak, nu'ri sasu. Na' wuh'wak du nam-tor gas'rak. I forgit myself lu i nem-tor such wuh eku'ko svi' ish-veh asal-yem, u' tor istaya ish-veh nentu, saguhsh-tor k' wuh debilitating daya t' prodigygality, tor nam-tor stimilated k' wuh 'olesome tem-mazhiv-kur'es t' ish-veh orfik-sasu. Heh wi, " leralmin-tor pumblechook, turning tor wuh landlord heh waiter, heh pointing me si' na' kar's wu-vath, "nash nam-tor ish-veh u' i ek'wak sported k' svi' ish-veh gad t' kunli infancy! Var-tor me ri ish-veh fam yehat nam-tor; i var-tor du nash nam-tor ish-veh!" wuh neik murmur s' wuh dahkuh kilko-tor. Wuh waiter saudau tor nam-tor wa' dau. "nash nam-tor ish-veh, " leralmin-tor pumblechook, "u' i ma fau-tor svi' t'nash-veh shay-hal. Nash nam-tor ish-veh u' ki'gla-tor nash-veh katau abru k' el'ru. Nash nam-tor ish-veh untoe wuh ko-kai t' if i vesh' sa-kuk k' kal'i'farr, u' ish-veh ahm vesh' georgiana m'ria s' ish-veh sha' ko-mekh, kal-tor ish-veh wafu ish-veh kuv au mokuhlek!" wuh waiter seemed convinced ik i kupi ri wafu ish-veh, heh ik ish-veh mazhiv-kur-tor wuh nuf wuh nesh-kur glazhau. "nu'ri sasu, " leralmin-tor pumblechook, screwing ish-veh patam na' me svi' wuh hinek fashion, "du sov wuh-going tor joseph. Ra tor ish-veh tukh tor me, du ya'akash me, wilat du sov wuh-going? I leralmin tor du, osu, du sov wuh-going tor joseph." wuh waiter huhsh-tor, u' kuv au modestly invited me tor prah abru' ik. "i', " leralmin-tor pumblechook, heh ek' nash k' wuh danik exasperating sov t' taran svi' wuh aishan t' virtue ra vesh' perfectly convincing heh conclusive, "i dungi var-tor du ra tor leralmin tor joseph. La' nam-tor squires t' wuh boar la', fainu heh respected svi' nash kahr, heh la' nam-tor william, if ish-veh sa-mekh's ahm vesh' potkins kuv i ri tor tehs-tor myself." "du ri tor, osu, " leralmin-tor william. "svi' ish-veh la'es, " pursued pumblechook, "i dungi var-tor du, nu'ri sasu, ra tor leralmin tor joseph. Leralmin-tor du, "joseph, i ma nash gad gla-tor t'nash-veh earliest benefactor heh wuh afersu t' t'nash-veh fortun's. I dungi ahm rai ahm, joseph, tonk'peh ni au nam-tor sanoi tor vutau ish-veh abru kahr, heh i ma gla-tor ik sasu." "i swear i ri tor gla-tor ish-veh la', " leralmin-tor i. "leralmin ik likewise, " retorted pumblechook. "leralmin du leralmin-tor ik, heh kauk joseph dungi probably svik-tor ak'wikmun." "tra' du ved lafosh ish-veh, " leralmin-tor i. "i fai-tor weh-rom." "leralmin-tor du, " pumblechook went fi', "'joseph, ki'gla-tor nash-veh ik sasu, heh ik sasu bears du rai malice heh bears me rai malice. Au fai-tor ish-veh character, joseph, heh nam-tor muhl acquainted k' ish-veh pig-headedness heh ignorance; heh au fai-tor t'nash-veh character, joseph, heh au fai-tor t'nash-veh aitlun t' gratitoode. Ha, joseph, ' leralmin-tor du, " la' pumblechook hutau ish-veh patam heh el'ru na' me, "'au fai-tor t'nash-veh ovus pafam'es t' tsuri komihn gratitoode. Au fai-tor ish-veh, joseph, u' rim mokuhlek. Du ri tor fai-tor ish-veh, joseph, having rai vutau tor fai-tor ish-veh, tonk'peh ik sasu tor.'" salanayik donkey u' au vesh', ish-veh really putaurau me ik au kupi ma wuh limuk tor variben thus tor t'nash-veh. "leralmin-tor du, 'joseph, au mazhiv-kur-tor me wuh pi' skladan, if i dungi i' ashiv-tor. Ish-veh vesh' ik, svi' t'nash-veh hasu katau neik, gla-tor ish-veh wuh ozh t' providence. Au knowed ik ozh lu gla-tor ish-veh joseph, heh gla-tor ish-veh ish-veh eiktra. Ish-veh pinted si' nash kitaun, joseph. Reward t' ingratitoode tor ish-veh earliest benefactor, heh afersu t' fortun's. Tonk'peh ik sasu leralmin-tor au did ri repent t' ra au had ovsoh, joseph. Mokov. Ish-veh vesh' gas'rak tor tor ish-veh, ish-veh vesh' ves tor tor ish-veh, ish-veh vesh' benevolent tor tor ish-veh, heh au would tor ish-veh va'ashiv.'" "ish-veh's pity, " leralmin-tor i, scornfully, u' i shahtau t'nash-veh svi-shau asal-yem, "ik wuh sasu did ri leralmin ra au had ovsoh heh would tor va'ashiv." "squires t' wuh boar!" pumblechook vesh' i' addressing wuh landlord, "heh william! I ma rai objections tor ish-veh mentioning, either abru kahr il ne' kahr, kuv such dang nam-tor ish-veh istau, ik ish-veh vesh' gas'rak tor tor ish-veh, ves tor tor ish-veh, benevolent tor tor ish-veh, heh ik i would tor ish-veh va'ashiv." k' eifa zhit wuh impostor hutau au fi' k' wuh el'ru, k' wuh sov, heh losrak wuh kelek; leaving me mau weht astonished do delighted k' wuh virtues t' ik ka indefinite "ish-veh." i vesh' ri wu po' ish-veh svi' leaving wuh kelek nuh', heh lu i went ne' wuh pid yut vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh holding forth (rai vet tor wuh ka daya) na' ish-veh mahr-kel svep tor wuh dvel-tor travek, vi pudor-tor me k' maut unfavourable glances u' i be' dvun-tor fi' wuh mesyutik vla t' wuh yut. Tonk'peh, ish-veh vesh' goh wuh pleasanter tor da-tor tor biddy heh tor joe, t'vi lo'uk forbearance min-tor weht brightly do fa', kuv ik kupi nam-tor, contrasted k' nash brazen pretender. I went na' au slowly, na' t'nash-veh sikrus vesh' kobat, tonk'peh k' wuh kash-ral t' increasing vas u' i drew nearer tor au, heh wuh kash-ral t' leaving arrogance heh untruthfulness further heh further za'. Wuh belaar igen-va vesh' delicious. Wuh igen vesh' pla-kur, wuh larks vesh' soaring pid abru' wuh yar-kur corn, i nahp ek' ik countryside weht vaksurik heh peaceful k' irak do i had ek'wak fainu ish-veh tor nam-tor wi. Wehk vaksurik bikuv t' wuh ha'kiv ik i would ras-tukh tra', heh t' wuh rubah na' wuh weh-rom ik would sarlah abru' t'nash-veh character lu i had wuh guiding tam'a na' t'nash-veh vla t'vi velik odva heh pa'shik ha-kel kau i had skan-tor, beguiled t'nash-veh yut. Au awakened wuh sival zherka svi' me; na' t'nash-veh khaf-spol vesh' softened k' t'nash-veh fun, heh such wuh rubah had sarlah tor be' dvun, ik i olau spo' veh vi vesh' toiling ha-kel sai-fam-ash'yaik s' irak haolvaya, heh t'vi czar had palesh-tor wehk tevun. Wuh schoolhouse wilat biddy vesh' mistress i had worla gla-tor; tonk'peh, wuh pi' roundabout lane k' if i svi-tor wuh pi'kahr, na' quietness' sake, nem-tor me vesht ish-veh. I vesh' disappointed tor talal ik wuh gad vesh' wuh holiday; rai kanu vesh' tra', heh biddy's kelek vesh' a'ing. Ein hopeful notion t' seeing ish-veh, busily engaged svi' ish-veh kanok-gadik gu-vam, fa' gla-tor ish-veh me, had vesh' svi' t'nash-veh kashek heh vesh' defeated. Tonk'peh wuh zhuk-fasek vesh' wuh maut pen ir ska', heh i went na' ish-veh ne' wuh slor yar-kur limes, listening na' wuh clink t' joe's mah-vel. Wu po' i ought ki' puzhu-tor ish-veh, heh wu po' i had fancied i puzhu-tor ish-veh heh afer-tor ish-veh tonk'peh wuh fancy, ek' vesh' fam dvun. Wuh limes vesh' tra', heh wuh wan-kur thorns vesh' tra', heh wuh chestnut-lap vesh' tra', heh ish-veh mor rustled harmoniously lu i pehkau tor shroi; tonk'peh, wuh clink t' joe's mah-vel vesh' ri svi' wuh midsummer salan. Siyah fearing, rik' fai-tor po, tor sarlah svi' zan-tor t' wuh zhuk-fasek, i gla-tor ish-veh na' kim-shah, heh gla-tor ik ish-veh vesh' a'ing. Rai gleam t' yon, rai glittering mashulayek t' kil-tor, rai roar t' vlei; ek' ikap'uh t'du ru'lut, heh fam dvun. Tonk'peh wuh kelek vesh' ri deserted, heh wuh buhfik parlour seemed tor nam-tor svi' nam-tor-tor, na' tra' vesh' wan-kur curtains fluttering svi' its krani, heh wuh krani vesh' tu'ash heh sa-ka-ashausu k' svai. I went softly na' ish-veh, meaning tor peep abru' wuh svai, lu joe heh biddy lam-tor fa' me, kar svi' kar. Palikauk biddy mazhiv-kur-tor wuh maf, u' kuv she nahp ish-veh vesh' t'nash-veh apparition, tonk'peh svi' wuh'ashiv moment she vesh' svi' t'nash-veh nartaya. I wept tor gla-tor ish-veh, heh she wept tor gla-tor me; i, fai'ei she glazhau ni sluk heh vaksurik; she, fai'ei i glazhau ni worn heh wan-kur. "tonk'peh tal-kam biddy, uf klon du nam-tor!" "ha, tal-kam pip." "heh joe, uf klon du nam-tor!" "ha, tal-kam hinek pip, hinek chap." i glazhau na' fi' t' au, s' veh tor wuh vath, heh yi "ish-veh's t'nash-veh wedding-gad!" maf-tor biddy, svi' wuh thorau t' happiness, "heh i am telik tor joe!" au had taken me vi' wuh af'tum, heh i had laid t'nash-veh patam ne' fi' wuh hinek deal pasu. Biddy meskarau veh t' t'nash-veh el'ru tor ish-veh bru-lar, heh joe's restoring esta vesh' fi' t'nash-veh tipan. "if au vikau't karik hiyet, t'nash-veh tal-kam, ausachya tor nam-tor ak'wikmun, " leralmin-tor joe. Heh biddy leralmin-tor, "i ought ki' nahp t' ish-veh, tal-kam joe, tonk'peh i vesh' nuh' kunli." au vesh' fi' ni overjoyed tor gla-tor me, ni yaut tor gla-tor me, ni estuhl k' t'nash-veh coming tor au, ni delighted ik i dang ma sarlah k' kisheya tor tor ish-veh gad ovsotik! T'nash-veh wuh'rak nahp vesh' veh t' lo'uk thankfulness ik i had worla breathed nash kim-shah hertak-tor rok tor joe. Uf k'ashiv, du' au vesh' k' me svi' t'nash-veh has-mar, had ish-veh risen tor t'nash-veh bru-lar! Uf irrevocable would ma vesh' ish-veh fai-tukh t' ish-veh, kuv au had hafau k' me tonk'peh wuh'ashiv wadan! "tal-kam biddy, " leralmin-tor i, "du ma wuh buhfik sa-telsu svi' wuh bosh panu, heh kuv du kupi ma gla-tor ish-veh k' t'nash-veh sar-tak du would havebut rai, du couldn't ashaya ish-veh weh-rom do du tor." "rai, i couldn't indeed, " leralmin-tor biddy. "heh, tal-kam joe, du ma wuh buhfik ko-telsu svi' wuh bosh panu, heh she dungi tor du u' kunli u' kauk du nazh tor nam-tor, du tal-kam, rom, thol joe!" joe glazhau na' me k' wuh quivering bru, heh fairly shitau ish-veh sleeve fa' ish-veh bezhun. "heh joe heh biddy fi', u' du ma vesh' tor church tor-gad, heh nam-tor svi' charity heh ashaya k' ek' mankind, poprah t'nash-veh humble itaren na' ek' du ma ovsoh na' me, heh ek' i ma ni has-bosh repaid! Heh lu i leralmin ik i am going maf k'svi wuh wadan, na' i am ak going abroad, heh ik i dungau worla shom abi' i ma ar'kada na' wuh donku k' if du ma potau me s' prison, heh ma satau ish-veh tor du, ri tor nah-tor, tal-kam joe heh biddy, ik kuv i kupi repay ish-veh wuh thousand wak abru', i suppose i kupi cancel wuh farthing t' wuh sa'akh i owe du, il ik i would tor ni kuv i kupi!" au vesh' fi' klimtau k' aifa zhit, heh fi' entreated me tor leralmin rai weht. "tonk'peh i bolau leralmin weht. Tal-kam joe, i rok du dungi ma kanu tor ashaya, heh ik ein pi' katravahsu dungi hayal-tor svi' nash vuzh-mev-teruk t' wuh karil mu-yor, vi lau remind du t' wuh'ashiv pi' katravahsu hal-tor s' ish-veh na' ek'wak. Ri tor var-tor ish-veh, joe, ik i vesh' thankless; ri tor var-tor ish-veh, biddy, ik i vesh' ungenerous heh unjust; goh var-tor ish-veh ik i pudor-tor du fi', fai'ei du vesh' fi' ni rom heh yeht, heh ik, u' ish-veh kan, i leralmin-tor ish-veh would nam-tor malatik tor ish-veh tor tor'ovau abru wuh mau weh-rom sasu do i did." "i ain't wuh-going, " leralmin-tor joe, s' za' ish-veh sleeve, "tor var-tor ish-veh nothink o' ik natur, pip. Il biddy ain't. Il wi kling ain't." "heh i', hi i fai-tor du ma already ovsoh ish-veh svi' ish-veh sha' ves khaf-spol, pray var-tor me, fi', ik du forgive me! Pray kal-tor me zhu-tor du leralmin wuh zhit, ik i lau lesh wuh ralash t' au maf k' me, heh yi i dungau nam-tor kup tor dva-tor ik du mokuhlek sahrafel me, heh nah-tor weh-rom t' me, svi' wuh wak tor sarlah!" "o tal-kam hinek pip, hinek chap, " leralmin-tor joe. "oekon fai-tor u' i forgive du, kuv i ma anythink tor forgive!" "amen! Heh oekon fai-tor i tor!" echoed biddy. "i' ti'amah abru heh glazhau na' t'nash-veh hinek pi' tvi-shal, heh shom tra' wuh zamu minutes k' myself. Heh yi, lu i ma yokul heh mon-tor k' du, hal-tor k' me u' irak u' wuh ozh-lehk, tal-kam joe heh biddy, fa' etek leralmin rom-bye!" i makau ek' i had, heh shitau aside u' mau u' i kupi, na' wuh composition k' t'nash-veh creditors, vi mazhiv-kur-tor me ample wak tor vlitau au svi' bosh, heh i went si' heh hau herbert. K'svi wuh tevun-krus, i had quitted england, heh k'svi dahkuh tevun-krus i vesh' clerk tor clarriker heh co, heh k'svi kehkuh tevun-krus i assumed t'nash-veh wuh'rak undivided responsibility. Na' wuh ha-zehl mes' wuh parlour abru-tol na' mill muzh kutra had yi ceased tor tremble ne' hinek dun barley's growls heh vesh' na' sochya, heh herbert had hal-tor maf tor marry clara, heh i vesh' losrak svi' lad falun t' wuh she'rakik khlup abi' au katau ish-veh pla'. Wehk wuh tevun went pauk fa' i vesh' wuh tersu svi' wuh kelek; tonk'peh i ha-tor kunling k' herbert heh ish-veh ko-telsu, heh ha-tor frugally, heh vlitau t'nash-veh sa'akh, heh rompotau wuh ek'kayik correspondence k' biddy heh joe. Ish-veh vesh' ri abi' i became wuh svi' wuh pesik, ik clarriker pusvik-tor me tor herbert; tonk'peh au yi afsakau ik wuh tsat t' herbert's partnership had vesh' wu hiyet fi-tor ish-veh conscience, heh au bolau var-tor ish-veh. Ni au var-tor ish-veh, heh herbert vesh' u' mau dvun-tor u' putaurau, heh wuh tal-kam katravahsu heh i vesh' ri wuh weh-rasahkos t'hylara na' wuh wu concealment. I bolau ri trasha ish-veh tor nam-tor supposed ik etek vesh' ek'wak wuh lo'uk kelek, il ik etek tor mints t' donku. Etek vesh' ri svi' wuh grand yut t' business, tonk'peh etek had wuh rom ahm, heh ar'kada na' etwel pinkaunu, heh did maut muhl. Etek owed ni mau tor herbert's ek'wak cheerful industry heh readiness, ik i k'ashiv wondered uf i had conceived ik hinek idea t' ish-veh inaptitude, abi' i vesh' veh gad enlightened k' wuh haulan, ik sos'eh wuh inaptitude had worla vesh' svi' ish-veh na' ek', tonk'peh had vesh' svi' me. Chapter lix. Na' leh-wun tevun, i had ri gla-tor joe il biddy k' t'nash-veh bodily bezhun, hi au had fi' vesh' k'ashiv fa' t'nash-veh fancy svi' wuh she'rak, lu, fi-tor wuh khru svi' december, wuh wadan il dahkuh po' gu'gelik, i laid t'nash-veh el'ru softly fi' wuh kuhr t' wuh hinek af'tum svep. I estuhl ish-veh ni softly ik i vesh' ri puzhu-tor, heh glazhau svi' unseen. Tra', smoking ish-veh mev svi' wuh hinek shi k' wuh af'tum yon-ha'khlup, u' hale heh u' karik u' ek'wak, hi wuh pi' zhai-kur, hayal-tor joe; heh tra', fenced vi' wuh teruk k' joe's mal, heh sitting fi' t'nash-veh sha' pi' stool looking na' wuh yon, wasi va'ashiv! "etek giv' ish-veh wuh ahm t' pip na' ish-veh sake, tal-kam hinek chap, " leralmin-tor joe, delighted, lu i nem-tor wuh'ashiv stool k' wuh kan's vla (tonk'peh i did ri rumple ish-veh isachya), "heh etek rok-tor au lau tor'ovau wuh pi' zeshau spo' du, heh etek nah-tor au tor." i nahp ni nuh', heh i nem-tor ish-veh si' na' wuh lates thurai asal, heh etek variben immensely, understanding veh wuh'ashiv tor perfection. Heh i nem-tor ish-veh ne' tor wuh churchyard, heh eku ish-veh fi' wuh ac'ruth tombstone tra', heh au gluvau me s' ik ashenaya if kov vesh' sacred tor wuh vokaya t' philip pirrip, tab-ma t' nash parish, heh isha georgiana, ko-telsu t' wuh abru'. "biddy, " leralmin-tor i, lu i variben k' ish-veh po' aru-yem, u' ish-veh pi' ko-kan ti sleeping svi' ish-veh lap, "du bolau mazhiv-kur-tor pip tor me veh t' aifa gad; il lend ish-veh, na' ek' pavek." "rai, rai, " leralmin-tor biddy, kogavik. "du bolau marry." "ni herbert heh clara leralmin, tonk'peh i ri tor nah-tor i dungau, biddy. I ma ni settled ne' svi' ish-veh ha-kel, ik ish-veh's mokov kesik. I am already ved wuh hinek bachelor." biddy glazhau ne' na' ish-veh kan, heh shitau its pi' el'ru tor ish-veh bru-lar, heh yi shitau wuh rom matronly el'ru k' if she had estuhl ish-veh vi' t'nash-veh. Tra' vesh' vel svi' wuh torai, heh svi' wuh ta'hal ne'hish t' biddy's wedding-mokov, ik had wuh maut takov eloquence svi' ish-veh. "tal-kam pip, " leralmin-tor biddy, "du nam-tor sure du ri tor fret na' ish-veh?" "o rai, i nah-tor ri, biddy." "var-tor me u' wuh hinek, hinek t'hy'la. Ma du ved yen-tor ish-veh? "t'nash-veh tal-kam biddy, i ma yen-tor nothing svi' t'nash-veh ha'kiv ik ek'wak had wuh dan-faik shi tra', heh pi' ik ek'wak had sovek shi tra'. Tonk'peh ik ri donku-tor sahr-tor, u' i wuh'wak nam-tor-tor tor vutau ish-veh, has ek' hal-tor k', biddy, ek' hal-tor k'!" nevertheless, i fai-tor, du' i leralmin-tor eifa zhit, ik i secretly intended tor revisit wuh shi t' wuh hinek kelek ik khru, sa'awek, na' ish-veh sake. Ha, kauk ni. Na' estella's sake. I had puzhu-tor t' ish-veh u' leading wuh danik unhappy ha'kiv, heh u' hasu dahshau s' ish-veh sa-telsu, vi had nam-tor-tor ish-veh k' lo'uk cruelty, heh vi had shetau ved renowned u' wuh meilaktra t' pride, avarice, brutality, heh meanness. Heh i had puzhu-tor t' wuh tevakh t' ish-veh sa-telsu, s' wuh kisheya consequent fi' ish-veh has-bosh-skasaya t' wuh jarel. Nash sadalaya had befallen ish-veh ein dahkuh tevun fa'; na' sovek-vel i fai-tor, she vesh' telik va'ashiv. Wuh lehkuh-mal aru-yem wadan na' joe's, losrak me mau-yan t' wak, rik' hurrying t'nash-veh variben k' biddy, tor lates abru' tor wuh hinek gla-tor fa' gu'gelik. Tonk'peh, ra k' loitering fi' wuh yut tor glazhau na' hinek vel heh tor nah-tor t' hinek wak, wuh gad had ved declined lu vesht sarlah nash-veh tor wuh shi. Tra' vesh' rai kelek i', rai brewery, rai kelek whatever losrak, tonk'peh wuh temok t' wuh hinek bah-ker. Wuh pa'shu ret had vesh' vi'ikap-tor k' wuh rough foshek, heh looking abru' ish-veh, vesht gla-tor nash-veh ik ein t' wuh hinek ivy had kwul-tor gir anew, heh vesh' growing yar-kur fi' neik hizhuk mounds t' ruin. Wuh temep svi' wuh foshek standing ajar, i kwitau ish-veh tu'ash, heh went svi'. Wuh samu silvery mist had veiled wuh aru, heh wuh aikum vesh' ri wi abru tor scatter ish-veh. Tonk'peh, wuh yel vesh' shining mesakh wuh mist, heh wuh aikum vesh' coming, heh wuh khru vesh' ri gu'gelik. I kupi zavikau si' wilat kanok krus t' wuh hinek kelek had vesh', heh wilat wuh brewery had vesh', heh wilat wuh temep, heh wilat wuh casks. I had ovsoh ni, heh vesh' looking bi' wuh desolate bah-ker lates, lu i beheld wuh solitary khlop svi' ish-veh. Wuh khlop gluvau itself aware t' me, u' i storilau. Ish-veh had vesh' dvun-tor na' me, tonk'peh ish-veh lam-tor fam dvun. U' i drew nearer, vesht gla-tor nash-veh ish-veh tor nam-tor wuh khlop t' wuh kosu. U' i drew nearer wi, ish-veh vesh' pa' tor da-tor maf, lu ish-veh pehkau, heh kal-tor me sarlah abru k' ish-veh. Yi, ish-veh faltered, u' kuv mau ak'wikmun, heh uttered t'nash-veh ahm, heh i lit'dhae, "estella!" "i am greatly rubai. I wonder du fai-tor me." wuh freshness t' ish-veh vaksur vesh' indeed hal-tor, tonk'peh its indescribable majesty heh its indescribable sem-rik hafau. Eifa attractions svi' ish-veh, i had gla-tor fa'; ra i had worla gla-tor fa', vesh' wuh saddened, softened ta'hal t' wuh wuh'wak yaut bezhun; ra i had worla olau fa' vesh' wuh friendly esta t' wuh wuh'wak insensible el'ru. Etek hayal-tor ne' fi' wuh wu-ku-san ik vesh' be', heh i leralmin-tor, "po' ni wehk tevun, ish-veh nam-tor flekh ik etek dang thus ragel-tor va'ashiv, estella, la' wilat etwel wuh'rak latva vesh'! Tor du k'ashiv sarlah pla'?" "i ma worla vesh' la' opi'." "il i." wuh aikum began tor shen, heh i nahp t' wuh placid glazhau na' wuh wan-kur abru-tol, if had be' dvun-tor maf. Wuh aikum began tor shen, heh i nahp t' wuh ne'hish fi' t'nash-veh el'ru lu i had spoken wuh kim-shah zhit au had puzhu-tor fi' terra. Estella vesh' wuh nam-tor' shaya wuh silence ik ensued svi' etek. "i ma maut k'ashiv rok-tor heh intended tor sarlah pla', tonk'peh ma vesh' prevented k' wehk circumstances. Ri donku-tor, ri donku-tor hinek shi!" wuh silvery mist vesh' estuhl k' wuh wuh'rak ha'zehl t' wuh moonlight, heh wuh ka ha'zehl estuhl wuh bezhun-masu ik eku-tor s' ish-veh bezhun. Ri fai-tor ik vesht gla-tor nash-veh au, heh setting herself tor prah wuh weh-rom t' au, she leralmin-tor quietly, "vesh' du wondering, u' du lates-tor bi', uf sarlah ish-veh tor nam-tor losrak svi' nash nosh?" "ha, estella." "wuh solektra t' me. Ish-veh nam-tor wuh goh mat i ma ri relinquished. Kanok-vei else has hal-tor s' me, pi' k' pi', tonk'peh i ma potau nash. Ish-veh vesh' wuh subject t' wuh goh satalau tehnaya i tor svi' ek' wuh wretched tevun." "nam-tor ish-veh tor nam-tor torvau fi'?" "na' kim-shah, ish-veh nam-tor. Vesht sarlah nash-veh la' tor nem-tor trasha t' ish-veh fa' its rubah. Heh du, " she leralmin-tor, svi' wuh spes t' touching eku'ko tor wuh wanderer, "du ha-tor abroad fam dvun?" "fam dvun." "heh tor muhl, i am sure?" "i ar'kadan takov lerash na' wuh sufficient living, heh thereforeyes, i tor muhl." "i ma k'ashiv nahp t' du, " leralmin-tor estella. "ma du?" "t' tab-ma, maut k'ashiv. Tra' vesh' wuh wu lerash wak lu i potau irak s' me wuh remembrance t' ra i had lehm-tor maf lu i vesh' ved ignorant t' its don. Tonk'peh opi' t'nash-veh gu-vam has ri vesh' incompatible k' wuh admission t' ik remembrance, i ma putan-tor ish-veh wuh shi svi' t'nash-veh khaf-spol." "du ma kwon-hau-ov meskarau ish-veh shi svi' t'nash-veh khaf-spol, " i kilko-tor. Heh etek vesh' ralash-fam va'ashiv abi' she stariben. "i pi' nahp, " leralmin-tor estella, "ik i dang nem-tor trasha t' du svi' taking trasha t' nash gla-tor. I am maut glad tor tor ni." "glad tor krus va'ashiv, estella? Tor me, parting nam-tor wuh kusut-tor vel. Tor me, wuh remembrance t' etwel kim-shah parting has vesh' ek'wak mournful heh kusut-tor." "tonk'peh du leralmin-tor tor me, " fun-tor estella, maut earnestly, "'oekon kudau du, oekon forgive du!' heh kuv du kupi leralmin ik tor me yi, du dungi ri hesitate tor leralmin ik tor me i', i', lu suffering has vesh' stronger do ek' vath teaching, heh has saven-tor me tor ken-tor ra ish-veh khaf-spol nam-tor-tor tor nam-tor. I ma vesh' keh'sei heh pushau, buti hopeinto wuh weh-rom shid. Nam-tor u' considerate heh rom tor me u' du vesh', heh var-tor me etek nam-tor t'hylara." "etek nam-tor t'hylara, " leralmin-tor i, rising heh bending abru' ish-veh, u' she she-tor s' wuh wu-ku-san. "heh dungi fator t'hylara k'wuhli, " leralmin-tor estella. I nem-tor ish-veh el'ru svi' t'nash-veh, heh etek went s' wuh ruined shi; heh, u' wuh asal mists had risen wu ago lu i wuh'rak losrak wuh zhuk-fasek, ni wuh khru mists vesh' rising i', heh svi' ek' wuh sax'ksei iraktra t' tranquil ta'hal au gluvau tor me, vesht gla-tor nash-veh rai duv t' wuh'ashiv parting s' ish-veh.
